tika-vin02t:182_0: Vācāva karaṇanti vākkaraṇaṃ, udāhāraghoso. Kalyāṇaṃ madhuraṃ vākkaraṇaṃ assāti kalyāṇavākkaraṇo.
tika-vin02t:182_1: Tenevāha “madhurassaro”ti. Hīḷetīti avajānāti. Mātugāmoti sambandho. Manaṃ apāyati
tika-vin02t:182_2: vaḍḍhetīti manāpo. Tenāha “manavaḍḍhanako”ti. Vaṭṭabhayena tajjetvāti yobbanamadādimattā
tika-vin02t:182_3: bhikkhuniyo saṃsārabhayena tāsetvā. Gihikāleti attano gihikāle. Bhikkhuniyā methunena
tika-vin02t:182_4: bhikkhunīdūsako hotīti bhikkhuniyā kāyasaṃsaggameva vadati. Sikkhamānāsāmaṇerīsu
tika-vin02t:182_5: pana methunenapi bhikkhunīdūsako na hotīti āha “sikkhamānāsāmaṇerīsu methunadhamma”nti.
tika-vin02t:182_7: ajjhāpannapubbo paṭikkhittoyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tassā bhikkhuniyā abhāvepi yā yā tassā
tika-vin02t:182_8: vacanaṃ assosuṃ, tā tā tatheva maññantīti āha “mātugāmo hī”tiādi.
tika-vin02t:183_0: Idāni aṭṭha aṅgāni samodhānetvā dassetuṃ “ettha cā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Imehi pana aṭṭhahaṅgehi
tika-vin02t:183_1: asamannāgataṃ ñatticatutthena kammena sammannento dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati, bhikkhu pana sammatoyeva hoti.
tika-vin02t:184_1: vā imassa “vadatī”ti atthe sati sampadānavacanampi yujjati. Bhikkhūnaṃ santike upasampannā
tika-vin02t:185_0: 149. Āsanaṃ paññapetvāti ettha “sace bhūmi manāpā hoti, āsanaṃ apaññāpetumpi vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin02t:185_1: tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Mātugāmaggahaṇena bhikkhunīpi saṅgahitāti āha “dhammadesanāpattimocanattha”nti.
tika-vin02t:185_2: Sammatassa bhikkhuno santikaṃ pāṭipade ovādatthāya sabbāhi bhikkhunīhi āgantabbato
tika-vin02t:185_3: “samaggāttha bhaginiyo”ti iminā sabbāsaṃ āgamanaṃ pucchatīti āha “sabbā āgatātthā”ti.
tika-vin02t:185_4: Gilānāsu anāgatāsupi gilānānaṃ anāgamanassa anuññātattā āgantuṃ samatthāhi ca sabbāhi
tika-vin02t:185_5: āgatattā “samaggāmhayyā”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Antogāme vātiādīsu yattha pañca aṅgāni
tika-vin02t:185_6: bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā vandituṃ na sakkā hoti, tattha ṭhitāya eva kāyaṃ purato nāmetvā
tika-vin02t:185_7: “vandāmi ayyā”ti añjaliṃ paggayha gantumpi vaṭṭati. Antaragharanti katthaci nagaradvārassa
tika-vin02t:185_8: bahiindakhīlato paṭṭhāya antogāmo vuccati, katthaci gharummārato paṭṭhāya antogehaṃ.
tika-vin02t:185_9: Idha pana “antogāme vā”ti visuṃ vuttattā “antaraghare vā”ti antogehaṃ sandhāya vuttanti
tika-vin02t:185_10: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yattha katthacīti antogāmādīsu yattha katthaci.
tika-vin02t:186_0: Vaṭṭatīti “vasatha ayye, mayaṃ bhikkhū ānessāmā”ti vuttavacanaṃ saddahantīhi vasituṃ
tika-vin02t:186_1: vaṭṭati. Na nimantitā hutvā gantukāmāti manussehi nimantitā hutvā gantukāmā na hontīti
tika-vin02t:186_2: attho, tattheva vassaṃ upagantukāmā hontīti adhippāyo. Yatoti bhikkhunupassayato.
tika-vin02t:186_3: Yācitvāti “tumhehi ānītaovādeneva mayampi vasissāmā”ti yācitvā. Tatthāti tasmiṃ bhikkhunupassaye.
tika-vin02t:186_4: Āgatānaṃ santike ovādena vasitabbanti pacchimikāya vassaṃ vasitabbaṃ. Abhikkhukāvāse
tika-vin02t:186_5: vasantiyā āpattīti codanāmukhena sāmaññato āpattippasaṅgaṃ vadati, na pana tassā
tika-vin02t:186_6: āpatti. Vassacchedaṃ katvā gacchantiyāpi āpattīti vassānupagamamūlaṃ āpattiṃ vadati.
tika-vin02t:186_7: Itarāya āpattiyā anāpattikāraṇasabbhāvato “sā rakkhitabbā”ti vuttaṃ, sā vassānupagamamūlā
tika-vin02t:186_8: āpatti rakkhitabbāti attho, abhikkhukepi āvāse īdisāsu āpadāsu vassaṃ upagantabbanti
tika-vin02t:186_9: adhippāyo. Tenāha “āpadāsu hi…pe… anāpatti vuttā”ti. Itarāya pana āpattiyā anāpatti,
tika-vin02t:186_10: kāraṇe asati pacchimikāyapi vassaṃ na upagantabbaṃ. Santesu hi bhikkhūsu vassaṃ anupagacchantiyā
tika-vin02t:186_11: āpatti. Tattha gantvā pavāretabbanti ettha apavārentīnaṃ āpattisambhavato. Sace dūrepi
tika-vin02t:186_12: bhikkhūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ hoti, sakkā ca hoti navamiyaṃ gantvā pavāretuṃ, tattha gantvā
tika-vin02t:186_13: pavāretabbaṃ. Sace pana navamiyaṃ nikkhamitvā sampāpuṇituṃ na sakkā hoti, agacchantīnaṃ anāpatti.
tika-vin02t:187_0: Uposathassa pucchanaṃ uposathapucchā, sāyeva ka-ppaccayaṃ rassattañca katvā uposathapucchakanti
tika-vin02t:187_1: vuttāti āha “uposathapucchana”nti. Uposatho pucchitabboti “kadā, ayya, uposatho”ti
tika-vin02t:187_2: pucchitabbo. Bhikkhunāpi “sve, bhagini, uposatho”ti vattabbaṃ. Bhikkhū kadāci kenaci
tika-vin02t:187_3: kāraṇena pannarasikaṃ vā cātuddasīuposathaṃ, cātuddasikaṃ vā pannarasīuposathaṃ karonti,
tika-vin02t:187_4: yasmiñca divase bhikkhūhi uposatho kato, tasmiṃyeva bhikkhunīhipi uposatho kātabboti
tika-vin02t:187_5: adhippāyena “pakkhassa terasiyaṃyeva gantvā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Evaṃ pucchitena bhikkhunā
tika-vin02t:187_6: sace cātuddasiyaṃ uposathaṃ karonti, “cātuddasiko bhaginī”ti vattabbaṃ. Sace pana
tika-vin02t:187_7: pannarasiyaṃ karonti, “pannarasiko bhaginī”ti ācikkhitabbaṃ. Ovādatthāyāti ovādayācanatthāya.
tika-vin02t:187_8: Pāṭipadadivasato pana paṭṭhāya dhammasavanatthāya gantabbanti pāṭipadadivase ovādaggahaṇatthāya
tika-vin02t:187_9: dutiyadivasato paṭṭhāya antarantarā dhammasavanatthāya gantabbaṃ. Ovādaggahaṇampi
tika-vin02t:187_10: hi “dhammasavanamevā”ti abhedena vuttaṃ. Nirantaraṃ vihāraṃ upasaṅkamiṃsūti yebhuyyena
tika-vin02t:187_11: upasaṅkamanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Vuttañhetantiādinā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjissāmāti
tika-vin02t:187_12: sabbāsaṃyeva bhikkhunīnaṃ upasaṅkamanadīpanatthaṃ pāḷi nidassitā. Ovādaṃ gacchatīti
tika-vin02t:187_13: ovādaṃ yācituṃ gacchati. Dve tissoti dvīhi tīhi. Karaṇatthe cetaṃ paccattavacanaṃ.
tika-vin02t:188_0: Pāsādikenāti pasādajanakena niddosena kāyakammādinā. Sampādetūti tividhaṃ sikkhaṃ
tika-vin02t:188_1: sampādetu. Sace pātimokkhuddesakaṃyeva disvā tāhi bhikkhunīhi ovādo yācito bhaveyya,
tika-vin02t:188_2: tena kiṃ kātabbanti? Uposathagge sannipatite bhikkhusaṅghe pubbakiccavasena “atthi
tika-vin02t:188_3: kāci bhikkhuniyo ovādaṃ yācamānā”ti pucchiyamāne “evaṃ vadehī”ti ovādapaṭiggāhakena
tika-vin02t:188_4: vattabbavacanaṃ aññena bhikkhunā kathāpetvā pātimokkhuddesakena vattabbavacanaṃ attanā
tika-vin02t:188_5: vatvā puna sayameva gantvā bhikkhunīnaṃ ārocetabbaṃ, aññena vā bhikkhunā tasmiṃ divase
tika-vin02t:188_6: pātimokkhaṃ uddisāpetabbaṃ. Etaṃ vuttanti “tāhī”ti etaṃ bahuvacanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:189_0: Ekā bhikkhunī vāti idaṃ bahūhi bhikkhunupassayehi ekāya eva bhikkhuniyā sāsanapaṭiggahaṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:189_1: sandhāya vuttaṃ, na pana dutiyikāya abhāvaṃ sandhāya. Bahūhi bhikkhunupassayehīti
tika-vin02t:189_2: antarāmagge vā tasmiṃyeva vā gāme bahūhi bhikkhunupassayehi. “Bhikkhunisaṅgho ca
tika-vin02t:189_3: ayya bhikkhuniyo ca bhikkhunī cā”ti iminā nānāupassayehi sāsanaṃ gahetvā āgatabhikkhuniyā
tika-vin02t:189_4: vattabbavacanaṃ dasseti. Idañca ekena pakārena mukhamattanidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmiṃ
tika-vin02t:189_5: tasmiṃ pana bhikkhunupassaye bhikkhunīnaṃ pamāṇaṃ sallakkhetvā tadanurūpena nayena
tika-vin02t:189_6: vattabbaṃ. Bhikkhusaṅghassa ayyānaṃ ayyassāti idaṃ saṅkhipitvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:190_0: Pātimokkhuddesakenapīti idaṃ saṅghuposathavaseneva dassitaṃ. Yattha pana tiṇṇaṃ dvinnaṃ
tika-vin02t:190_1: vā vasanaṭṭhāne pātimokkhuddeso natthi, tatthāpi ñattiṭhapanakena itarena vā bhikkhunā
tika-vin02t:190_2: imināva nayena vattabbaṃ. Ekapuggalenapi uposathadivase ovādayācanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā
tika-vin02t:190_3: pāṭipade āgatānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ “natthi kocī”tiādi vattabbameva. Sace sayameva, “sammato
tika-vin02t:190_4: aha”nti vattabbaṃ. Imaṃ vidhiṃ ajānanto idha bāloti adhippeto.
tika-vin02t:191_0: 150. Adhammakamme adhammakammasaññī vaggaṃ bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ vaggasaññī ovadati, āpatti
tika-vin02t:191_2: pācittiyameva pāḷiyaṃ sabbattha vuttanti āha “adhammakamme dvinnaṃ navakānaṃ vasena
tika-vin02t:191_3: aṭṭhārasa pācittiyānī”ti. Sesamettha uttānameva. Asammatatā, bhikkhuniyā paripuṇṇūpasampannatā,
tika-vin02t:191_4: ovādavasena aṭṭhagarudhammabhaṇananti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:194_0: 153. Dutiye kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ sātaccakiriyāyāti pubbabhāgappaṭipattivasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:194_1: Munātīti jānāti. Tena ñāṇenāti tena arahattaphalapaññāsaṅkhātena ñāṇena. Pathesūti
tika-vin02t:194_2: upāyamaggesu. Arahato pariniṭṭhitasikkhattā āha “idañca…pe… vutta”nti. Atha vā “appamajjato
tika-vin02t:194_3: sikkhato”ti imesaṃ padānaṃ hetuatthatā daṭṭhabbā, tasmā appamajjanahetu sikkhanahetu
tika-vin02t:194_4: ca adhicetasoti attho. Sokāti cittasantāpā. Ettha ca adhicetasoti iminā adhicittasikkhā,
tika-vin02t:194_5: appamajjatoti iminā adhisīlasikkhā, munino monapathesu sikkhatoti etehi adhipaññāsikkhā,
tika-vin02t:194_6: muninoti vā etena adhipaññāsikkhā, monapathesu sikkhatoti etena tāsaṃ lokuttarasikkhānaṃ
tika-vin02t:194_7: pubbabhāgappaṭipadā, sokā na bhavantītiādīhi sikkhāpāripūriyā ānisaṃsā pakāsitāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:195_0: Kokanudanti padumavisesanaṃ yathā “kokāsaya”nti, taṃ kira bahupattaṃ vaṇṇasampannaṃ
tika-vin02t:195_1: ativiya sugandhañca hoti. “Kokanudaṃ nāma setapaduma”ntipi vadanti. Pātoti pageva.
tika-vin02t:195_2: Ayañhettha attho – yathā kokanudasaṅkhātaṃ padumaṃ pāto sūriyuggamanavelāyaṃ phullaṃ
tika-vin02t:195_3: vikasitaṃ avītagandhaṃ siyā virocamānaṃ, evaṃ sarīragandhena guṇagandhena ca sugandhaṃ
tika-vin02t:195_4: saradakāle antalikkhe ādiccamiva attano tejasā tapantaṃ aṅgehi niccharaṇajutitāya
tika-vin02t:196_0: Abhabboti paṭipattisāramidaṃ sāsanaṃ, paṭipatti ca pariyattimūlikā, tvañca pariyattiṃ
tika-vin02t:196_1: uggahetuṃ asamattho, tasmā abhabboti adhippāyo. Suddhaṃ pilotikakhaṇḍanti iddhiyā
tika-vin02t:196_2: abhisaṅkhataṃ parisuddhaṃ coḷakhaṇḍaṃ. Tadā kira bhagavā “na sajjhāyaṃ kātuṃ asakkonto
tika-vin02t:196_3: mama sāsane abhabbo nāma hoti, mā soci bhikkhū”ti taṃ bāhāyaṃ gahetvā vihāraṃ pavisitvā
tika-vin02t:196_4: iddhiyā pilotikakhaṇḍaṃ abhinimminitvā “handa, bhikkhu, imaṃ parimajjanto ‘rajoharaṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:196_5: rajoharaṇa’nti punappunaṃ sajjhāyaṃ karohī”ti vatvā adāsi tattha pubbekatādhikārattā.
tika-vin02t:197_0: So kira pubbe rājā hutvā nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karonto nalāṭato sede muccante parisuddhena
tika-vin02t:197_1: sāṭakena nalāṭaṃ puñchi, sāṭako kiliṭṭho ahosi. So “imaṃ sarīraṃ nissāya evarūpo
tika-vin02t:197_2: parisuddhasāṭako pakatiṃ jahitvā kiliṭṭho jāto, aniccā vata saṅkhārā”ti aniccasaññaṃ
tika-vin02t:197_3: paṭilabhati, tena kāraṇenassa rajoharaṇameva paccayo jāto. Rajaṃ haratīti rajoharaṇaṃ.
tika-vin02t:197_4: Saṃvegaṃ paṭilabhitvāti asubhasaññaṃ aniccasaññañca upaṭṭhapento saṃvegaṃ paṭilabhitvā.
tika-vin02t:197_5: So hi yoniso ummajjanto “parisuddhaṃ vatthaṃ, natthettha doso, attabhāvassa panāyaṃ
tika-vin02t:197_6: doso”ti asubhasaññaṃ aniccasaññañca paṭilabhitvā nāmarūpapariggahādinā pañcasu khandhesu
tika-vin02t:197_7: ñāṇaṃ otāretvā kalāpasammasanādikkamena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā udayabbayañāṇādipaapāṭiyā
tika-vin02t:197_8: vipassanaṃ anulomagotrabhusamīpaṃ pāpesi. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “vipassanaṃ ārabhī”ti.
tika-vin02t:197_9: Obhāsagāthaṃ abhāsīti obhāsavissajjanapubbakabhāsitagāthā obhāsagāthā, taṃ abhāsīti attho.
tika-vin02t:198: Ettha ca “adhicetasoti imaṃ obhāsagāthaṃ abhāsī”ti idheva vuttaṃ. Visuddhimagge pana dhammapadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ theragāthāsaṃvaṇṇanāyañca –
tika-vin02t:199: “Rāgo rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccati;
tika-vin02t:204: “Moho rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccati;
tika-vin02t:208_0: Imā tisso obhāsagāthā abhāsī”ti vuttaṃ. Adhicetasoti ca ayaṃ cūḷapanthakattherassa
tika-vin02t:208_1: udānagāthāti imissāyeva pāḷiyā āgataṃ. Theragāthāyaṃ pana cūḷapanthakattherassa udānagāthāsu
tika-vin02t:208_2: ayaṃ anāruḷhā, “ekudāniyattherassa pana ayaṃ udānagāthā”ti tattha vuttaṃ. Evaṃ santepi
tika-vin02t:208_3: imissā pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāya ca evamāgatattā cūḷapanthakattherassapi ayaṃ udānagāthā
tika-vin02t:208_4: obhāsagāthāvasena ca bhagavatā bhāsitāti gahetabbaṃ. Arahattaṃ pāpuṇīti abhiññāpaṭisambhidāparivāraṃ
tika-vin02t:208_5: arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Abhabbo tvantiādivacanato anukampāvasena saddhivihārikādiṃ saṅghikavihārā
tika-vin02t:208_6: nikkaḍḍhāpentassa anāpatti viya dissati. Abhabbo hi thero sañcicca taṃ kātuṃ, nikkaḍḍhanasikkhāpade
tika-vin02t:208_7: vā apaññatte therena evaṃ katanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:209_0: 156. Ovadantassa pācittiyanti atthaṅgate sūriye garudhammehi vā aññena vā dhammeneva
tika-vin02t:209_1: ovadantassa sammatassapi pācittiyaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva. Atthaṅgatasūriyatā, paripuṇṇūpasampannatā,
tika-vin02t:212: 162. Tatiyaṃ uttānatthameva. Upassayūpagamanaṃ, paripuṇṇūpasampannatā, samayābhāvo, garudhammehi ovadananti imāni panettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:215_1: sambandho. “Avaṇṇaṃ kattukāmo ayasaṃ kattukāmo”ti imesaṃ pana vasena “upasampanna”ntiādīsu
tika-vin02t:215_3: vuttanayenevattho veditabbo”ti vuttaṃ. “Cīvarahetu ovadatī”tiādinā bhaṇantassa ekekasmiṃ
tika-vin02t:215_4: vacane niṭṭhite pācittiyaṃ veditabbaṃ. “Upasampannaṃ saṅghena asammata”nti pāḷivacanato
tika-vin02t:215_5: “sammatena vā saṅghena vā bhāraṃ katvā ṭhapito”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanato ca aṭṭhahi aṅgehi
tika-vin02t:215_6: samannāgato sammatena vā vippavasitukāmena “yāvāhaṃ āgamissāmi, tāva te bhāro hotū”ti
tika-vin02t:215_7: yācitvā ṭhapito tassābhāvato saṅghena vā tatheva bhāraṃ katvā ṭhapito aṭṭhahi garudhammehi
tika-vin02t:215_8: aññena vā dhammena ovadituṃ labhatīti veditabbaṃ. Tasmā “yo pana, bhikkhu, asammato
tika-vin02t:215_9: bhikkhuniyo ovadeyya, pācittiya”nti idaṃ pageva bhāraṃ katvā aṭṭhapitaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin02t:216_0: 168. Anāpatti pakatiyā cīvarahetu…pe… ovadantaṃ bhaṇatīti ettha āmisahetu ovadantaṃ
tika-vin02t:216_1: “āmisahetu ovadatī”ti saññāya evaṃ bhaṇantassa anāpatti, “na āmisahetu ovadatī”ti
tika-vin02t:216_2: saññino pana dukkaṭaṃ, na āmisahetu ovadantaṃ pana “āmisahetu ovadatī”ti saññāya
tika-vin02t:216_3: bhaṇantassapi anāpatti sacittakattā sikkhāpadassa. Sesamettha uttānameva. Upasampannatā,
tika-vin02t:216_4: dhammena laddhasammutitā, anāmisantaratā, avaṇṇakāmatāya evaṃ bhaṇananti imāni panettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:220_0: 175. Chaṭṭhe sace sā bhikkhunī taṃ cīvaraṃ āditova pārupeyya, aññā bhikkhuniyo disvā
tika-vin02t:220_1: ujjhāpeyyuṃ, tato mahājano passituṃ na labhatīti maññamāno “yathāsaṃhaṭaṃ haritvā
tika-vin02t:221_0: 176. Nīharatīti sakiṃ nīharati. Yepi tesaṃ nissitakāti sambandho. Kathinavattanti
tika-vin02t:221_2: dukkaṭanti akappiyasamādānavasena dukkaṭaṃ. Vañcetvāti “tava ñātikāyā”ti avatvā “ekissā
tika-vin02t:221_3: bhikkhuniyā”ti ettakameva vatvā. “Ekissā bhikkhuniyā”ti sutvā te aññātikasaññino
tika-vin02t:221_4: bhaveyyunti āha “akappiye niyojitattā”ti. “Idaṃ te mātu cīvara”ntiādīni avatvāpi
tika-vin02t:222_0: 179. Upāhanatthavikādinti ādi-saddena yaṃ cīvaraṃ nivāsetuṃ vā pārupituṃ vā na sakkā
tika-vin02t:222_1: hoti, tampi saṅgaṇhāti. Sesamettha uttānameva. Aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā santakatā,
tika-vin02t:222_2: nivāsanapārupanūpagatā, vuttanayena sibbanaṃ vā sibbāpanaṃ vāti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:225_0: 181. Sattame “pacchā gacchantīnaṃ corā acchindiṃsū”ti ettha “pattacīvara”nti pāṭhasesoti
tika-vin02t:225_1: āha “pacchā gacchantīnaṃ pattacīvara”nti. Tā bhikkhuniyoti pacchā gacchantiyo bhikkhuniyo.
tika-vin02t:225_2: “Pacchā gacchantīna”nti ca vibhattivipariṇāmenettha sambandho veditabbo. Pāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin02t:225_3: “gacchāma bhagini, gacchāma ayyā”ti bhikkhupubbakaṃ saṃvidhānaṃ vuttaṃ, “gacchāma
tika-vin02t:225_4: ayya, gacchāma bhaginī”ti bhikkhunīpubbakaṃ. Ekaddhānamagganti ekaṃ addhānasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin02t:225_5: maggaṃ, ekato vā addhānamaggaṃ. Hiyyoti suve. Pareti tatiyadivase.
tika-vin02t:226_0: 182-183. Dvidhā vuttappakāroti pādagamanavasena pakkhagamanavasena vāti dvidhā vuttappabhedo.
tika-vin02t:226_1: Catunnaṃ maggānaṃ sambandhaṭṭhānaṃ catukkaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ sambandhaṭṭhānaṃ siṅghāṭakaṃ.
tika-vin02t:226_2: “Gāmantare gāmantare”ti ettha añño gāmo gāmantaranti āha “nikkhamane anāpatti…pe…
tika-vin02t:226_3: bhikkhuno pācittiya”nti. “Saṃvidhāyā”ti pāḷiyaṃ avisesena vuttattā “neva pāḷiyā sametī”ti
tika-vin02t:226_4: vuttaṃ, “etthantare saṃvidahitepi bhikkhuno dukkaṭa”nti vuttattā “na sesaaṭṭhakathāya
tika-vin02t:226_5: sametī”ti vuttaṃ. Addhayojanaṃ atikkamantassāti asati gāme addhayojanaṃ atikkamantassa.
tika-vin02t:226_6: Yattha hi addhayojanabbhantare añño gāmo na hoti, taṃ idha agāmakaṃ araññanti adhippetaṃ,
tika-vin02t:226_7: addhayojanabbhantare pana gāme sati gāmantaragaṇanāya eva āpatti.
tika-vin02t:227_0: 185. Raṭṭhabhedeti raṭṭhavilope. Cakkasamāruḷhāti iriyāpathacakkaṃ sakaṭacakkaṃ vā
tika-vin02t:227_1: samāruḷhā. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Dvinnampi saṃvidahitvā maggappaṭipatti, avisaṅketaṃ,
tika-vin02t:227_2: samayābhāvo, anāpadā, gāmantarokkamanaṃ vā addhayojanātikkamo vāti imāni panettha
tika-vin02t:227_3: pañca aṅgāni. Ekatoupasampannādīhi saddhiṃ gacchantassa pana mātugāmasikkhāpadena āpatti.
tika-vin02t:230_0: 188. Aṭṭhame lokassādamittasanthavavasena kīḷāpurekkhārā saṃvidahitvāti ayaṃ viseso
tika-vin02t:230_1: “evamime…pe… bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ nāvāya kīḷantī”ti iminā “uddhaṃgāminiṃ vā adhogāminiṃ
tika-vin02t:231_0: 189. Nadiyā kuto gāmantaranti āha “yassā nadiyā”tiādi. “Tassā sagāmakatīrapassena…pe…
tika-vin02t:231_1: addhayojanagaṇanāyāti ekekapasseneva gamanaṃ sandhāya vuttattā tādisikāya nadiyā
tika-vin02t:231_2: majjhena gacchantassa gāmantaragaṇanāya addhayojanagaṇanāya ca āpattī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:231_4: saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya nāvaṃ abhiruhantassa nadiyaṃyeva pācittiyassa vuttattā vāpisamuddādīsu
tika-vin02t:231_6: kīḷāpurekkhārā saṃvidahitvā”ti vacanato keci “imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ akusalacittaṃ lokavajja”nti
tika-vin02t:231_7: vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Kīḷāpurekkhāratāya hi abhiruhitvāpi gāmantarokkamane
tika-vin02t:231_8: addhayojanātikkame vā kusalābyākatacittasamaṅgīpi hutvā āpattiṃ āpajjati. Yadi hi
tika-vin02t:231_9: so saṃvegaṃ paṭilabhitvā arahattaṃ vā sacchikareyya, niddaṃ vā okkameyya, kammaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin02t:231_10: vā manasi karonto gaccheyya, kuto tassa akusalacittasamaṅgitā, yenidaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ
tika-vin02t:231_11: akusalacittaṃ lokavajjanti vuccati, tasmā paṇṇattivajjaṃ ticittanti siddhaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva.
tika-vin02t:234: 194. Navame paṭiyāditanti bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya sampāditaṃ. Ñātakā vā honti pavāritā vāti ettha sacepi bhikkhuno aññātakā appavāritā ca siyuṃ, bhikkhuniyā ñātakā pavāritā ce, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:235_0: 197. Pāpabhikkhūnaṃ pakkhupacchedāya idaṃ paññattaṃ, tasmā pañcabhojaneyeva āpatti
tika-vin02t:235_1: vuttā. Pañca bhojanāni ṭhapetvā sabbattha anāpattīti idaṃ pana iminā sikkhāpadena
tika-vin02t:235_2: anāpattidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Viññattiyā uppannaṃ paribhuñjantassa hi aññattha vuttanayena
tika-vin02t:235_3: dukkaṭaṃ. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Bhikkhuniparipācitabhāvo, jānanaṃ, gihisamārambhābhāvo,
tika-vin02t:235_4: odanādīnaṃ aññataratā, tassa ajjhoharaṇanti imāni panettha pañca aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:238_0: 198. Dasame upanandassa catutthasikkhāpadenāti appaṭicchanne mātugāmena saddhiṃ rahonisajjasikkhāpadaṃ
tika-vin02t:238_1: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Kiñcāpi taṃ acelakavagge pañcamasikkhāpadaṃ hoti, upanandattheraṃ
tika-vin02t:238_2: ārabbha paññattesu pana catutthabhāvato “upanandassa catutthasikkhāpadenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:238_3: Catutthasikkhāpadassa vatthuto imassa sikkhāpadassa vatthuno paṭhamaṃ uppannattā
tika-vin02t:238_4: idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paṭhamaṃ paññattaṃ. Iminā ca sikkhāpadena kevalaṃ bhikkhuniyā eva
tika-vin02t:238_5: rahonisajjāya āpatti paññattā, upari mātugāmena saddhiṃ rahonisajjāya āpatti visuṃ
tika-vin02t:243_0: 206. Bhojanavaggassa paṭhamasikkhāpade addhayojanaṃ vā yojanaṃ vā gantuṃ sakkotīti
tika-vin02t:243_1: ettha tattakaṃ gantuṃ sakkontassapi tāvatakaṃ gantvā aladdhabhikkhassa ito bhuñjituṃ
tika-vin02t:243_2: vaṭṭati. Imesaṃyevāti imesaṃ pāsaṇḍānaṃyeva. Ettakānanti imasmiṃ pāsaṇḍe ettakānaṃ.
tika-vin02t:243_3: Ekadivasaṃ bhuñjitabbanti ekadivasaṃ sakiṃyeva bhuñjitabbaṃ. “Ekadivasaṃ bhuñjitabba”nti
tika-vin02t:243_4: vacanato pana ekasmiṃ divase punappunaṃ bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti na gahetabbaṃ. Puna ādito
tika-vin02t:243_5: paṭṭhāya bhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭatīti iminā paṭhamaṃ bhuttaṭṭhānesu puna ekasmimpi ṭhāne
tika-vin02t:244_0: 208. “Gacchanto vā āgacchanto vāti idaṃ addhayojanavasena gahetabba”nti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:244_1: Antarāmagge gataṭṭhāneti ekasseva santakaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. “Āgacchantepi eseva nayo”ti
tika-vin02t:244_3: puna bhuñjantassa anāpatti vattabbāti gamane āgamane ca paṭhamaṃ bhojanaṃ avatvā
tika-vin02t:244_4: antarāmagge ekadivasaṃ gataṭṭhāne ca ekadivasanti punappunaṃ bhojanameva dassitaṃ,
tika-vin02t:244_5: gamanadivase pana āgamanadivase ca “gamissāmi āgamissāmī”ti bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin02t:244_6: Suddhacittena punappunaṃ bhuñjantassapi punappunaṃ bhojane anāpatti. Aññassatthāya
tika-vin02t:244_7: uddisitvā paññattaṃ bhikkhuno gahetumeva na vaṭṭatīti āha “bhikkhūnaṃyeva atthāyā”ti.
tika-vin02t:244_8: Sesamettha uttānameva. Āvasathapiṇḍatā, agilānatā, anuvasitvā bhojananti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:247_0: 209. Dutiye abhimāreti abhigantvā bhagavato māraṇatthāya niyojite dhanuddhare. Guḷhapaṭicchannoti
tika-vin02t:247_1: apākaṭo. Pavijjhīti vissajjesi. Nanu rājānampi mārāpesīti vacanato idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ
tika-vin02t:247_2: ajātasattuno kāle paññattanti siddhaṃ, evañca sati parato anupaññattiyaṃ –
tika-vin02t:248_0: “Tena kho pana samayena rañño māgadhassa seniyassa bimbisārassa ñātisālohito ājīvakesu
tika-vin02t:248_1: pabbajito hoti. Atha kho so ājīvako yena rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro tenupasaṅkami,
tika-vin02t:248_2: upasaṅkamitvā rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ seniyaṃ bimbisāraṃ etadavoca…pe… kukkuccāyantā nādhivāsentī”ti –
tika-vin02t:249_0: Idaṃ kasmā vuttanti? So kira ājīvako taṃ dānaṃ dento bimbisārakālato paṭṭhāya adāsi,
tika-vin02t:249_1: pacchā ajātasattukāle sikkhāpadapaññattito paṭṭhāya bhikkhū kukkuccāyantā taṃ dānaṃ
tika-vin02t:249_2: na paṭiggaṇhiṃsu, tasmā ādito paṭṭhāya taṃ vatthu dassitanti veditabbaṃ. “Atha kho
tika-vin02t:249_3: so ājīvako bhikkhūnaṃ santike dūtaṃ pāhesī”ti idañca tato pabhuti so ājīvako antarantarā
tika-vin02t:249_4: bhikkhū nimantetvā dānaṃ dento ajātasattukāle sikkhāpade paññatte yaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin02t:249_5: santike dūtaṃ pāhesi, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:250_0: 215. Aññamaññavisiṭṭhattā visadisaṃ rajjaṃ virajjaṃ, tato āgatā, tattha vā jātā,
tika-vin02t:250_1: bhavāti vā verajjā, te eva verajjakā. Te pana yasmā gottacaraṇādivibhāgena nānappakārā,
tika-vin02t:250_2: tasmā vuttaṃ “nānāverajjake”ti. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana nānāvidhehi aññarajjehi āgateti
tika-vin02t:251_0: 217-218. Imassa sikkhāpadassa viññattiṃ katvā bhuñjanavatthusmiṃ paññattattā viññattito
tika-vin02t:251_1: gaṇabhojanaṃ vatthuvaseneva pākaṭanti taṃ avatvā “gaṇabhojanaṃ nāma yattha…pe… nimantitā
tika-vin02t:251_2: bhuñjantī”ti nimantanavaseneva padabhājane gaṇabhojanaṃ vuttaṃ. “Kiñci pana sikkhāpadaṃ
tika-vin02t:251_3: vatthuananurūpampi siyāti padabhājane vuttanayena nimantanavaseneva gaṇabhojanaṃ
tika-vin02t:251_4: hotīti kesañci āsaṅkā bhaveyyā”ti taṃnivattanatthaṃ “taṃ panetaṃ gaṇabhojanaṃ dvīhākārehi
tika-vin02t:251_5: pasavatī”ti vuttaṃ. Pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ nāmaṃ gahetvāti ettha “bhojanaṃ gaṇhathāti
tika-vin02t:251_6: vuttepi gaṇabhojanaṃ hotiyevā”ti vadanti. “Heṭṭhā addhānagamanavatthusmiṃ nāvābhiruhanavatthusmiñca
tika-vin02t:251_7: ‘idheva, bhante, bhuñjathā’ti vutte yasmā kukkuccāyantā na paṭiggaṇhiṃsu, tasmā ‘bhuñjathā’ti
tika-vin02t:251_8: vuttepi gaṇabhojanaṃ na hotiyevā”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. “Pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ
tika-vin02t:251_9: nāmaṃ gahetvā nimantetī”ti vuttattā pana “odanaṃ bhuñjathā”ti vā “bhattaṃ bhuñjathā”ti
tika-vin02t:251_10: vā bhojananāmaṃ gahetvāva vutte gaṇabhojanaṃ hoti, na aññathā. “Idheva, bhante, bhuñjathā”ti
tika-vin02t:251_11: etthāpi “odana”nti vā “bhatta”nti vā vatvāva te evaṃ nimantesunti gahetabbaṃ. Gaṇavasena
tika-vin02t:251_12: vā nimantitattā te bhikkhū apakataññutāya kukkuccāyantā na paṭiggaṇhiṃsūti ayaṃ amhākaṃ
tika-vin02t:252_0: Ekato gaṇhantīti ettha aññamaññassa dvādasahatthaṃ amuñcitvā ṭhitā ekato gaṇhanti
tika-vin02t:252_1: nāmāti gahetabbaṃ. “Amhākaṃ catunnampi bhattaṃ dehīti vā viññāpeyyu”nti vacanato
tika-vin02t:252_2: heṭṭhā “tvaṃ ekassa bhikkhuno bhattaṃ dehi, tvaṃ dvinnanti evaṃ viññāpetvā”ti vacanato
tika-vin02t:252_3: ca attano atthāya aññehi viññattampi sādiyantassa gaṇabhojanaṃ hotiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:252_4: Evaṃ viññattito pasavatīti ettha viññattiyā sati gaṇhantassa ekato hutvā gahaṇe iminā
tika-vin02t:252_5: sikkhāpadena āpatti, visuṃ gahaṇe paṇītabhojanasūpodanaviññattīhi āpatti veditabbā.
tika-vin02t:253_0: Vicāretīti pañcakhaṇḍādivasena saṃvidahati. Ghaṭṭetīti anuvātaṃ chinditvā hatthena
tika-vin02t:253_1: daṇḍakena vā ghaṭṭeti. Suttaṃ karotīti suttaṃ vaṭṭeti. Valetīti daṇḍake vā hatthe
tika-vin02t:253_2: vā āvaṭṭeti. “Abhinavasseva cīvarassa karaṇaṃ idha cīvarakammaṃ nāma, purāṇacīvare
tika-vin02t:253_3: sūcikammaṃ nāma na hotī”ti vadanti. “Catutthe āgate na yāpentīti vacanato sace añño
tika-vin02t:253_4: koci āgacchanto natthi, cattāroyeva ca tattha nisinnā yāpetuṃ na sakkonti, na vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:254_1: nisīdāpetvā. Gaṇo bhijjatīti gaṇo āpattiṃ na āpajjatīti adhippāyo. “Yattha cattāro
tika-vin02t:254_2: bhikkhū…pe… bhuñjantī”ti imāya pāḷiyā saṃsandanato “itaresaṃ pana gaṇapūrako hotī”ti
tika-vin02t:254_3: vuttaṃ. Avisesenāti “gilāno vā cīvarakārako vā”ti avisesetvā sabbasādhāraṇavacanena.
tika-vin02t:254_4: Tasmāti avisesitattā. Bhutvā gatesūti ettha agatesupi bhojanakicce niṭṭhite gaṇhituṃ
tika-vin02t:254_5: vaṭṭati. Tāni ca tehi ekato na gahitānīti yehi bhojanehi visaṅketo natthi, tāni bhojanāni
tika-vin02t:254_6: tehi bhikkhūhi ekato na gahitāni ekena pacchā gahitattā. Mahāthereti bhikkhū sandhāya
tika-vin02t:254_7: vuttaṃ. Dūtassa puna paṭipathaṃ āgantvā “bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vacanabhayena “gāmadvāre
tika-vin02t:254_8: aṭṭhatvāvā”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha tattha gantvāti antaravīthiādīsu tattha tattha ṭhitānaṃ
tika-vin02t:254_9: santikaṃ gantvā. Bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya gharadvāre ṭhapetvā diyyamānepi eseva nayo. Nivattathāti
tika-vin02t:254_10: vuttapade nivattituṃ vaṭṭatīti “nivattathā”ti vicchinditvā pacchā “bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti
tika-vin02t:254_11: vuttattā vaṭṭati. Sesamettha uttānameva. Gaṇabhojanatā, samayābhāvo, ajjhoharaṇanti
tika-vin02t:257_0: 221. Tatiye kulapaṭipāṭiyā abbocchinnaṃ katvā nirantaraṃ diyyamānattā “bhattapaṭipāṭi
tika-vin02t:257_1: aṭṭhitā hotī”ti pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ, antarā aṭṭhatvā nirantaraṃ pavattāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin02t:257_2: Upacāravasenāti vohāravasena. Na hi so badaramattameva deti, upacāravasena pana evaṃ
tika-vin02t:258_0: 226. Vikappanāvaseneva taṃ bhattaṃ asantaṃ nāma hotīti anupaññattivasena vikappanaṃ
tika-vin02t:258_1: aṭṭhapetvā yathāpaññattaṃ sikkhāpadameva ṭhapitaṃ. Parivāre pana vikappanāya anujānanampi
tika-vin02t:258_2: anupaññattisamānanti katvā “catasso anupaññattiyo”ti vuttaṃ. Mahāpaccariādīsu vuttanayaṃ
tika-vin02t:258_3: pacchā vadanto pāḷiyā saṃsandanato parammukhāvikappanameva patiṭṭhāpesi. Keci pana
tika-vin02t:258_4: “tadā attano santike ṭhapetvā bhagavantaṃ aññassa abhāvato thero sammukhāvikappanaṃ
tika-vin02t:258_5: nākāsi, bhagavatā ca visuṃ sammukhāvikappanā na vuttā, tathāpi sammukhāvikappanāpi
tika-vin02t:258_6: vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. Teneva mātikāaṭṭhakathāyampi “yo bhikkhu pañcasu sahadhammikesu
tika-vin02t:258_7: aññatarassa ‘mayhaṃ bhattapaccāsaṃ tuyhaṃ dammī’ti vā ‘vikappemī’ti vā evaṃ sammukhā
tika-vin02t:258_8: vā ‘itthannāmassa dammī’ti vā ‘vikappemī’ti vā evaṃ parammukhā vā paṭhamanimantanaṃ
tika-vin02t:258_9: avikappetvā pacchā nimantitakule laddhabhikkhato ekasitthampi ajjhoharati, pācittiya”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:259_0: 229. Pañcahi bhojanehi nimantitassa yena yena paṭhamaṃ nimantito, tassa tassa bhojanato
tika-vin02t:259_1: uppaṭipāṭiyā avikappetvā vā parassa parassa bhojanaṃ paramparabhojananti āha “sace
tika-vin02t:259_2: pana mūlanimantanaṃ heṭṭhā hoti, pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ upari, taṃ uparito paṭṭhāya
tika-vin02t:259_3: bhuñjantassa āpattī”ti. Hatthaṃ anto pavesetvā sabbaheṭṭhimaṃ gaṇhantassa majjhe
tika-vin02t:259_4: ṭhitampi antohatthagataṃ hotīti āha “hatthaṃ pana…pe… yathā tathā vā bhuñjantassa
tika-vin02t:259_5: anāpattī”ti. Khīrassa rasassa ca bhattena amissaṃ hutvā upari ṭhitattā “khīraṃ vā
tika-vin02t:260_1: vacanaṃ viruddhaṃ viya dissati, dvinnampi adhippāyo mahāpaccariyaṃ vibhāvito”ti mahāgaṇṭhipadesu
tika-vin02t:260_2: vuttaṃ. Sabbe nimantentīti akappiyanimantanena nimantenti. “Paramparabhojanaṃ nāma
tika-vin02t:260_3: pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññatarena bhojanena nimantito, taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ pañcannaṃ
tika-vin02t:260_4: bhojanānaṃ aññataraṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjati, etaṃ paramparabhojanaṃ nāmā”ti vuttattā satipi
tika-vin02t:260_5: bhikkhācariyāya paṭhamaṃ laddhabhāve “piṇḍāya caritvā laddhabhattaṃ bhuñjati, āpattī”ti
tika-vin02t:260_6: vuttaṃ. Avikappavasena “vacīkamma”nti vuttaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva. Paramparabhojanatā,
tika-vin02t:260_7: samayābhāvo, ajjhoharaṇanti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:263_0: 230-231. Catutthe kāṇāya mātāti kāṇāti laddhanāmāya dārikāya mātā. Kasmā panesā kāṇā
tika-vin02t:263_1: nāma jātāti āha “sā kirassā”tiādi. Imissā daharakāle mātāpitaro sinehavasena “amma
tika-vin02t:263_2: kāṇe, amma kāṇe”ti vohariṃsu, sā tadupādāya kāṇā nāma jātā, tassā ca mātā “kāṇamātā”ti
tika-vin02t:263_3: pākaṭā ahosīti evamettha kāraṇaṃ vadanti. Paṭiyālokanti pacchimaṃ disaṃ, paccādiccanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin02t:264_1: pācittiyaṃ. “Dvattipattapūrā paṭiggahetabbā”ti hi vacanato mukhavaṭṭiyā heṭṭhimalekhaṃ
tika-vin02t:264_2: anatikkante dve vā tayo vā pattapūre gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:265_0: 235. Aṭṭhakathāsu pana…pe… vuttanti idaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu tathā āgatabhāvamattadīpanatthaṃ
tika-vin02t:265_1: vuttaṃ, na pana tassa vādassa patiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāsu vuttañhi pāḷiyā na
tika-vin02t:265_3: Aññathā “anāpatti dvattipattapūre paṭiggaṇhātī”ti imināva pamāṇayuttaggahaṇe anāpattisiddhito
tika-vin02t:265_4: “ñātakānaṃ pavāritāna”nti visuṃ na vattabbaṃ. Yadi evaṃ “taṃ pāḷiyā na sametī”ti
tika-vin02t:265_5: kasmā na vuttanti? Heṭṭhā tatuttarisikkhāpade vuttanayeneva sakkā viññātunti na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:265_6: Vuttañhi tattha “aṭṭhakathāsu pana ñātakapavāritaṭṭhāne pakatiyāva bahumpi vaṭṭati,
tika-vin02t:265_7: acchinnakāraṇā pamāṇameva vaṭṭatīti vuttaṃ, taṃ pāḷiyā na sametī”ti. “Apātheyyādiatthāya
tika-vin02t:265_8: paṭiyādita”nti saññāya gaṇhantassapi āpattiyeva acittakattā sikkhāpadassa. Attanoyeva
tika-vin02t:265_9: gahaṇatthaṃ “imassa hatthe dehī”ti vacanenapi āpajjanato “vacīkamma”nti vuttaṃ. Sesaṃ
tika-vin02t:265_10: uttānameva. Vuttalakkhaṇapūvamanthatā, asesakatā, apaṭippassaddhagamanatā, na ñātakāditā,
tika-vin02t:268_0: 236. Pañcame bhuttāvīti bhuttāvino bhuttavanto, katabhattakiccāti vuttaṃ hoti. Pavāritāti
tika-vin02t:268_1: ettha catūsu pavāraṇāsu yāvadatthapavāraṇā paṭikkhepapavāraṇā ca labbhatīti āha “brāhmaṇena…pe…
tika-vin02t:268_2: paṭikkhepapavāraṇāya pavāritā”ti. Catubbidhā hi pavāraṇā vassaṃvutthapavāraṇā, paccayapavāraṇā,
tika-vin02t:268_4: bhikkhūnaṃ tīhi ṭhānehi pavāretu”nti ayaṃ vassaṃvutthapavāraṇā. Pakārehi diṭṭhādīhi
tika-vin02t:268_5: vāreti saṅghādike bhajāpeti bhatte karoti etāyāti pavāraṇā, āpattivisodhanāya attavossaggokāsadānaṃ.
tika-vin02t:268_6: Sā pana yasmā yebhuyyena vassaṃvutthehi kātabbā vuttā, tasmā “vassaṃvutthapavāraṇā”ti
tika-vin02t:268_7: vuccati. “Icchāmahaṃ, bhante, saṅghaṃ cātumāsaṃ bhesajjena pavāretu”nti ca, “aññatra
tika-vin02t:268_8: puna pavāraṇāya aññatra niccapavāraṇāyā”ti ca ayaṃ paccayapavāraṇā pavāreti paccaye
tika-vin02t:268_9: icchāpeti etāyāti katvā, cīvarādīhi upanimantanāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. “Pavārito nāma
tika-vin02t:268_10: asanaṃ paññāyati, bhojanaṃ paññāyati, hatthapāse ṭhito abhiharati, paṭikkhepo paññāyati,
tika-vin02t:268_11: eso pavārito nāmā”ti ayaṃ paṭikkhepapavāraṇā. Vippakatabhojanatādipañcaṅgasahito
tika-vin02t:268_12: bhojanapaṭikkhepoyeva hettha pakārayuttā vāraṇāti pavāraṇā. “Paṇītena khādanīyena
tika-vin02t:268_13: bhojanīyena sahatthā santappesi sampavāresī”ti ayaṃ yāvadatthapavāraṇā. Yāvadatthaṃ
tika-vin02t:269: 237. Ti-kāraṃ avatvā…pe… vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti idaṃ vattabbākāradassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. “Ti-kāre pana vuttepi akataṃ nāma na hotī”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:270_0: 238-239. Pavāritoti paṭikkhepito. Yo hi bhuñjanto parivesakena upanītaṃ bhojanaṃ
tika-vin02t:270_1: anicchanto paṭikkhipati, so tena pavārito paṭikkhepito nāma hoti. Byañjanaṃ pana
tika-vin02t:270_2: anādiyitvā atthamattameva dassetuṃ “katapavāraṇo katapaṭikkhepo”ti vuttaṃ. Yasmā
tika-vin02t:270_3: “asana”nti imināva padena “bhuttāvī”ti imassa attho vutto, tasmā na tassa kiñci payojanaṃ
tika-vin02t:270_4: visuṃ upalabbhati. Yadi hi upalabbheyya, pavāraṇā chaḷaṅgasamannāgatā āpajjeyyāti
tika-vin02t:270_5: manasi katvā pañcasamannāgatattaṃyeva dassetuṃ “vuttampi ceta”ntiādinā pāḷiṃ āharati.
tika-vin02t:270_6: Keci pana “hatthapāse ṭhito abhiharatī”ti ekameva aṅgaṃ katvā “caturaṅgasamannāgatā
tika-vin02t:271_0: Ambilapāyāsādīsūti ādi-saddena khīrapāyāsādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Tattha ambilapāyāsaggahaṇena
tika-vin02t:271_1: takkādiambilasaṃyuttā ghanayāgu vuttā. Khīrapāyāsaggahaṇena khīrasaṃyuttā yāgu saṅgayhati.
tika-vin02t:271_2: Pavāraṇaṃ na janetīti anatirittabhojanāpattinibandhanaṃ paṭikkhepaṃ na sādheti. Katopi
tika-vin02t:271_3: paṭikkhepo anatirittabhojanāpattinibandhano na hotīti akataṭṭhāneyeva tiṭṭhatīti
tika-vin02t:271_5: gaṇhathā’ti vuttepi pavāraṇā hotīti pavāraṇaṃ janetiyevāti vutta”nti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu
tika-vin02t:271_6: vuttaṃ, taṃ parato tattheva “bhattamissakaṃ yāguṃ āharitvā”ti ettha vuttakāraṇena
tika-vin02t:271_7: na sameti. Vuttañhi tattha “heṭṭhā ayāguke nimantane udakakañjikakhīrādīhi saddhiṃ
tika-vin02t:271_8: madditaṃ bhattameva sandhāya ‘yāguṃ gaṇhathā’ti vuttattā pavāraṇā hoti, ‘bhattamissakaṃ
tika-vin02t:271_9: yāguṃ āharitvā’ti ettha pana visuṃ yāguyā vijjamānattā pavāraṇā na hotī”ti. Tasmā
tika-vin02t:271_10: tattha vuttanayeneva khīrādīhi saṃmadditaṃ bhattameva sandhāya “yāguṃ gaṇhathā”ti
tika-vin02t:271_11: vuttattā yāguyā ca tattha abhāvato pavāraṇā hotīti evamettha kāraṇaṃ vattabbaṃ. Evañhi
tika-vin02t:271_12: sati parato “yenāpucchito, tassa atthitāyā”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttakāraṇenapi saṃsandati,
tika-vin02t:271_13: aññathā gaṇṭhipadesuyeva pubbāparavirodho āpajjati. Aṭṭhakathāvacanena ca na sameti.
tika-vin02t:271_14: Sace…pe… paññāyatīti iminā vuttappamāṇassa macchamaṃsakhaṇḍassa nahāruno vā sabbhāvamattaṃ
tika-vin02t:272_0: Sālivīhiyavehi katasattūti yebhuyyanayena vuttaṃ, satta dhaññāni pana bhajjitvā katopi
tika-vin02t:272_2: sattuyo piṇḍetvā kato apakko sattuguḷo. Pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññataravasena vippakatabhojanabhāvassa
tika-vin02t:272_3: upacchinnattā “mukhe sāsapamattampi…pe… na pavāretī”ti vuttaṃ. “Akappiyamaṃsaṃ paṭikkhipati,
tika-vin02t:272_4: na pavāretī”ti vacanato sace saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ attano apāpuṇantaṃ jānitvā vā ajānitvā
tika-vin02t:272_5: vā paṭikkhipati, na pavāreti paṭikkhipitabbasseva paṭikkhittattā. Alajjisantakaṃ
tika-vin02t:272_6: paṭikkhipantopi na pavāreti. Avatthutāyāti anatirittāpattisādhikāya pavāraṇāya avatthubhāvato.
tika-vin02t:272_7: Etena paṭikkhipitabbasseva paṭikkhittabhāvaṃ dīpeti. Yañhi paṭikkhipitabbaṃ hoti,
tika-vin02t:272_8: tassa paṭikkhepo āpattiaṅgaṃ na hotīti taṃ “pavāraṇāya avatthū”ti vuccati.
tika-vin02t:273_0: Upanāmetīti iminā kāyābhihāraṃ dasseti. Hatthapāsato bahi ṭhitassa satipi dātukāmābhihāre
tika-vin02t:273_1: paṭikkhipantassa dūrabhāveneva pavāraṇāya abhāvato therassapi dūrabhāvamattaṃ gahetvā
tika-vin02t:273_2: pavāraṇāya abhāvaṃ dassento “therassa dūrabhāvato”ti āha, na pana therassa abhihārasabbhāvato.
tika-vin02t:273_3: Sacepi gahetvā gato hatthapāse ṭhito hoti, kiñci pana avatvā ādhārakaṭṭhāne ṭhitattā
tika-vin02t:273_4: abhihāro nāma na hotīti “dūtassa ca anabhiharaṇato”ti vuttaṃ. “Gahetvā gatena ‘bhattaṃ
tika-vin02t:273_5: gaṇhathā’ti vutte abhihāro nāma hotīti ‘sace pana gahetvā āgato bhikkhu…pe… pavāraṇā
tika-vin02t:273_6: hotī’ti vutta”nti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Keci pana “pattaṃ kiñci upanāmetvā
tika-vin02t:273_7: ‘imaṃ bhattaṃ gaṇhathā’ti vuttanti gahetabba”nti vadanti, taṃ yuttaṃ viya dissati
tika-vin02t:274_0: Parivesanāyāti bhattagge. Abhihaṭāva hotīti parivesakeneva abhihaṭā hoti. Tato dātukāmatāya
tika-vin02t:274_1: gaṇhantaṃ paṭikkhipantassa pavāraṇā hotīti ettha agaṇhantampi paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā
tika-vin02t:274_2: hotiyeva. Kasmā? Dātukāmatāya abhihaṭattā. “Tasmā sā abhihaṭāva hotī”ti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:274_3: Teneva tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu “dātukāmābhihāre sati kevalaṃ ‘dassāmī’ti gahaṇameva abhihāro
tika-vin02t:274_4: nāma na hoti, ‘dassāmī’ti gaṇhantepi agaṇhantepi dātukāmābhihārova abhihāro nāma
tika-vin02t:274_5: hoti, tasmā gahaṇasamaye vā aggahaṇasamaye vā taṃ paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:274_6: Idāni asati tassa dātukāmābhihāre gahaṇasamayepi paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā na hotīti
tika-vin02t:275_0: “Rasaṃ gaṇhathā”ti apavāraṇajanakassa nāmaṃ gahetvā vuttattā “taṃ sutvā paṭikkhipato
tika-vin02t:275_1: pavāraṇā natthī”ti vuttaṃ. Maccharasaṃ maṃsarasanti ettha pana na kevalaṃ macchassa
tika-vin02t:275_2: rasaṃ maccharasamicceva viññāyati, atha kho maccho ca maccharasañca maccharasanti
tika-vin02t:275_3: evaṃ pavāraṇajanakasādhāraṇanāmavasenapi viññāyamānattā taṃ paṭikkhipato pavāraṇāva
tika-vin02t:275_4: hoti. Parato macchasūpanti etthāpi eseva nayo. “Idaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vuttepīti ettha
tika-vin02t:275_5: evaṃ avatvāpi pavāraṇapahonakaṃ yaṃkiñci abhihaṭaṃ paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā hotiyevāti
tika-vin02t:275_6: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Karambakoti missakādhivacanametaṃ. Yañhi aññenaññena missetvā karonti,
tika-vin02t:275_7: so “karambako”ti vuccati. So sacepi maṃsena missetvā katova hoti, “karambakaṃ gaṇhathā”ti
tika-vin02t:275_8: apavāraṇārahassa nāmena vuttattā paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā na hoti. “Maṃsakarambakaṃ
tika-vin02t:275_9: gaṇhathā”ti vutte pana maṃsamissakaṃ gaṇhathāti vuttaṃ hoti, tasmā pavāraṇāva hoti.
tika-vin02t:276_1: acittakattā imassa sikkhāpadassa pavāraṇā hotī”ti vadanti. “Heṭṭhā ayāguke nimantane
tika-vin02t:276_2: udakakañjikakhīrādīhi saddhiṃ madditaṃ bhattameva sandhāya ‘yāguṃ gaṇhathā’ti vuttattā
tika-vin02t:276_3: pavāraṇā hoti, ‘bhattamissakaṃ yāguṃ āharitvā’ti ettha pana visuṃ yāguyā vijjamānattā
tika-vin02t:276_4: pavāraṇā na hotī”ti vadanti. Ayamettha adhippāyoti “yenāpucchito”tiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ
tika-vin02t:276_5: sandhāya vadati. Kāraṇaṃ panettha duddasanti ettha eke tāva vadanti “yasmā yāgumissakaṃ
tika-vin02t:276_6: nāma bhattameva na hoti, khīrādikampi hotiyeva, tasmā karambake viya pavāraṇāya na
tika-vin02t:276_7: bhavitabbaṃ. Evañca sati yāgu bahutarā vā hoti samasamā vā, na pavāreti. ‘Yāgu mandā,
tika-vin02t:276_8: bhattaṃ bahutaraṃ, pavāretī’ti ettha kāraṇaṃ duddasa”nti. Keci pana vadanti “yāgumissakaṃ
tika-vin02t:276_9: nāma bhattaṃ, tasmā taṃ paṭikkhipato pavāraṇāya eva bhavitabbaṃ. Evañca sati ‘idha
tika-vin02t:276_10: pavāraṇā hoti na hotī’ti ettha kāraṇaṃ duddasa”nti.
tika-vin02t:277_0: Yathā cettha kāraṇaṃ duddasaṃ, evaṃ parato “missakaṃ gaṇhathā”ti etthāpi kāraṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:277_1: duddasamevāti veditabbaṃ. Na hi pavāraṇappahonakassa appabahubhāvo pavāraṇāya bhāvābhāvanimittaṃ,
tika-vin02t:277_2: kiñcarahi pavāraṇajanakassa nāmaggahaṇamevettha pamāṇaṃ, tasmā “idañca karambakena
tika-vin02t:277_3: na samānetabba”ntiādinā yampi kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ, tampi pubbe vuttena saṃsandiyamānaṃ
tika-vin02t:277_4: na sameti. Yadi hi “missaka”nti bhattamissakeyeva ruḷhaṃ siyā, evaṃ sati yathā “bhattamissakaṃ
tika-vin02t:277_5: gaṇhathā”ti vutte bhattaṃ bahutaraṃ vā samaṃ vā appataraṃ vā hoti, pavāretiyeva,
tika-vin02t:277_6: evaṃ “missakaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vuttepi appatarepi bhatte pavāraṇāya bhavitabbaṃ missakanti
tika-vin02t:277_7: bhattamissakeyeva ruḷhattā. Tathā hi “missakanti bhattamissakeyeva ruḷhavohārattā
tika-vin02t:277_8: idaṃ pana ‘bhattamissakamevā’ti vutta”nti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Atha “missaka”nti
tika-vin02t:277_9: bhattamissake ruḷhaṃ na hoti, missakabhattaṃ pana sandhāya “missakaṃ gaṇhathā”ti
tika-vin02t:277_10: vuttanti. Evampi yathā ayāguke nimantane khīrādīhi saddhiṃ madditaṃ bhattameva sandhāya
tika-vin02t:277_11: “yāguṃ gaṇhathā”ti vutte pavāraṇā hoti, evamidhāpi missakabhattameva sandhāya “missakaṃ
tika-vin02t:277_12: gaṇhathā”ti vutte bhattaṃ appaṃ vā hotu bahu vā, pavāraṇā eva siyā. Tasmā “missaka”nti
tika-vin02t:277_13: bhattamissake ruḷhaṃ vā hotu sandhāyabhāsitaṃ vā, ubhayatthāpi pubbenāparaṃ na sametīti
tika-vin02t:277_14: kimettha kāraṇacintāya, īdisesu pana ṭhānesu aṭṭhakathāpamāṇeneva gantabbanti ayaṃ amhākaṃ khanti.
tika-vin02t:278_0: “Visuṃ katvā detīti bhattassa upari ṭhitaṃ rasādiṃ visuṃ gahetvā detī”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu
tika-vin02t:278_1: vuttaṃ. Kenaci pana “yathā bhattasitthaṃ na patati, tathā gāḷhaṃ hatthena pīḷetvā
tika-vin02t:278_2: parissāvetvā detī”ti vuttaṃ. Tathāpi kāraṇaṃ na dissati. Yathā hi bhattamissakaṃ
tika-vin02t:278_3: yāguṃ āharitvā “yāguṃ gaṇhathā”ti vatvā yāgumissakaṃ bhattampi dentaṃ paṭikkhipato
tika-vin02t:278_4: pavāraṇā na hoti, evamidhāpi bahukhīrarasādīsu bhattesu “khīraṃ gaṇhathā”tiādīni
tika-vin02t:278_5: vatvā khīrādīni vā detu khīrādimissakabhattaṃ vā, ubhayathāpi pavāraṇāya na bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-vin02t:278_6: tasmā “visuṃ katvā detī”ti tenākārena dentaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na pana bhattamissakaṃ
tika-vin02t:278_7: katvā diyyamānaṃ paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā hotīti dassanatthanti gahetabbaṃ. Yadi pana
tika-vin02t:278_8: bhattamissakaṃ katvā diyyamāne pavāraṇā hotīti adhippāyena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “visuṃ katvā
tika-vin02t:278_9: detī”ti vuttaṃ, evaṃ sati aṭṭhakathāyevettha pamāṇanti gahetabbaṃ, na pana kāraṇantaraṃ gavesitabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:279_0: Sace ukkuṭikaṃ nisinno pāde amuñcitvāpi bhūmiyaṃ nisīdati, iriyāpathaṃ vikopento
tika-vin02t:279_1: nāma hotīti ukkuṭikāsanaṃ avikopetvāva sukhena nisīdituṃ “tassa pana heṭṭhā…pe… nisīdanakaṃ
tika-vin02t:279_2: dātabba”nti vuttaṃ. “Āsanaṃ acāletvāti pīṭhe phuṭṭhokāsato ānisadamaṃsaṃ amocetvā,
tika-vin02t:279_3: anuṭṭhahitvāti vuttaṃ hoti, adinnādāne viya ṭhānācāvanaṃ na gahetabba”nti tīsupi
tika-vin02t:280_0: Akappiyakatanti ettha akappiyakatasseva anatirittabhāvato kappiyaṃ akārāpetvā tasmiṃ
tika-vin02t:280_1: patte pakkhittamūlaphalādiyeva atirittaṃ na hoti, sesaṃ pana pattapariyāpannaṃ atirittameva
tika-vin02t:280_2: hoti, paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Taṃ pana mūlaphalādiṃ paribhuñjitukāmena tato nīharitvā
tika-vin02t:280_3: kappiyaṃ kārāpetvā aññasmiṃ bhājane ṭhapetvā atirittaṃ kārāpetvā bhuñjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:281_0: So puna kātuṃ na labhatīti tasmiṃyeva bhājane kariyamānaṃ paṭhamaṃ katena saddhiṃ
tika-vin02t:281_1: kataṃ hotīti puna soyeva kātuṃ na labhati, añño labhati. Aññasmiṃ pana bhājane tena
tika-vin02t:281_2: vā aññena vā kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Tenāha “yena akataṃ, tena kātabbaṃ. Yañca akataṃ, taṃ
tika-vin02t:281_3: kātabba”nti. Tenapīti ettha pi-saddo na kevalaṃ aññena vāti imamatthaṃ dīpeti. Evaṃ
tika-vin02t:281_4: katanti aññasmiṃ bhājane kataṃ. Pesetvāti anupasampannassa hatthe pesetvā. Imassa
tika-vin02t:281_5: vinayakammabhāvato “anupasampannassa hatthe ṭhitaṃ na kāretabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:282_0: Sace pana āmisasaṃsaṭṭhānīti ettha sace mukhagatenapi anatirittena āmisena saṃsaṭṭhāni
tika-vin02t:282_1: honti, pācittiyamevāti veditabbaṃ. Tasmā pavāritena bhojanaṃ atirittaṃ kārāpetvā
tika-vin02t:282_2: bhuñjantenapi yathā akatena missaṃ na hoti, evaṃ mukhañca hatthañca suddhaṃ katvā
tika-vin02t:282_3: bhuñjitabbaṃ. Kiñcāpi appavāritassa purebhattaṃ yāmakālikādīni āhāratthāya paribhuñjatopi
tika-vin02t:282_4: anāpatti, pavāritassa pana pavāraṇamūlakaṃ dukkaṭaṃ hotiyevāti “yāmakālikaṃ…pe… ajjhohāre
tika-vin02t:283_0: 241. Kāyena bhuñjanato vācāya āṇāpetvā atirittaṃ akārāpanato ca āpajjatīti “kāyavācato”ti
tika-vin02t:283_1: vuttaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva. Pavāritabhāvo, āmisassa anatirittatā, kāle ajjhoharaṇanti
tika-vin02t:286_0: 243. Chaṭṭhe sādhāraṇamevāti “handa bhikkhu khāda vā”tiādinā vuttapavāraṇāya sādhāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin02t:286_1: “Bhuttasmiṃ pācittiya”nti mātikāyaṃ vuttattā bhojanapariyosāne āpatti, na ajjhohāre
tika-vin02t:286_2: ajjhohāre. Abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāreti, āpatti pācittiyassāti idañca bhojanapariyosānaṃyeva
tika-vin02t:286_3: sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva. Pavāritatā, pavāritasaññitā,
tika-vin02t:286_4: āsādanāpekkhatā, anatirittena abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāraṇā, bhojanapariyosānanti imāni panettha pañca aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:289_0: 247. Sattame aggasamajjoti uttamaṃ naccaṃ. Taṃ kira pabbatamatthake ṭhatvā ekaṃ devataṃ
tika-vin02t:289_1: uddissa karonti. Naṭānaṃ nāṭakāni naṭanāṭakāni, sītāharaṇādīni. Apaññatte sikkhāpadeti
tika-vin02t:289_2: ūnavīsativassasikkhāpade apaññatte. Adaṃsūti “vihāraṃ netvā khādissathā”ti adaṃsu.
tika-vin02t:290_0: 248-249. Mūlakamūlādīni upadesatoyeva veditabbāni. Na hi tāni pariyāyantarena vuccamānānipi
tika-vin02t:290_1: sakkā viññātuṃ. Pariyāyantarepi hi vuccamāne taṃ taṃ nāmaṃ ajānantānaṃ sammohoyeva
tika-vin02t:290_2: siyā, tasmā tattha na kiñci vakkhāma. Khādanīyatthanti khādanīyena kattabbakiccaṃ.
tika-vin02t:290_3: Neva pharantīti na nipphādenti. Tesu tesu janapadesūti ettha “ekasmiṃ janapade āhārakiccaṃ
tika-vin02t:290_4: sādhentaṃ sesajanapadesupi na kappatī”ti vadanti. Rukkhavalliādīnanti heṭṭhā vuttameva
tika-vin02t:290_5: sampiṇḍetvā vuttaṃ. Antopathavīgatoti sālakalyāṇīkhandhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sabbakappiyānīti
tika-vin02t:290_6: mūlakhandhatacapattādivasena sabbaso kappiyāni. Tesampi nāmavasena na sakkā pariyantaṃ
tika-vin02t:290_7: dassetunti sambandho. Acchivādīnaṃ aparipakkāneva phalāni yāvajīvikānīti dassetuṃ
tika-vin02t:291_0: Harītakādīnaṃ aṭṭhīnīti ettha miñjaṃ paṭicchādetvā ṭhitakapālāni yāvajīvikānīti ācariyā.
tika-vin02t:291_1: Miñjampi yāvajīvikanti eke. Hiṅgūti hiṅgurukkhato paggharitaniyyāso. Hiṅgujatuādayopi
tika-vin02t:291_2: hiṅguvikatiyo eva. Tattha hiṅgujatu nāma hiṅgurukkhassa daṇḍapattāni pacitvā kataniyyāso,
tika-vin02t:291_3: hiṅgusipāṭikaṃ nāma hiṅgupattāni pacitvā kataniyyāso. “Aññena missetvā kato”tipi
tika-vin02t:291_4: vadanti. Takanti aggakoṭiyā nikkhantasileso. Takapattinti pattato nikkhantasileso.
tika-vin02t:291_5: Takapaṇṇinti palāse bhajjitvā katasileso. “Daṇḍato nikkhantasileso tipi vadanti.
tika-vin02t:291_6: Sesamettha uttānameva. Vikālatā, yāvakālikatā, ajjhoharaṇanti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:294_0: 252-3. Aṭṭhame tādisanti asūpabyañjanaṃ. Yaṃkiñci yāvakālikaṃ vā yāmakālikaṃ vāti
tika-vin02t:294_1: ettha “yāmakālika”nti iminā na kevalaṃ yāvakālike eva sannidhipaccayā pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin02t:294_2: atha kho yāmakālikepīti dasseti. Nanu ca yāmakālikaṃ neva khādanīyesu antogadhaṃ,
tika-vin02t:294_3: na bhojanīyesu. Teneva padabhājanīye “khādanīyaṃ nāma pañca bhojanāni yāmakālikaṃ
tika-vin02t:294_4: sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ khādanīyaṃ nāma. Bhojanīyaṃ nāma pañca
tika-vin02t:294_5: bhojanānī”ti vuttaṃ, “yo pana bhikkhu sannidhikārakaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā
tika-vin02t:294_6: khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā, pācittiya”nti ca vuttaṃ, tasmā yāmakālike pācittiyena bhavitabbanti
tika-vin02t:294_7: kathaṃ viññāyatīti? Vuccate – padabhājane khādanīya-saddassa atthadassanatthaṃ “yāmakālikaṃ
tika-vin02t:294_8: ṭhapetvā”ti vuttaṃ, na pana sannidhipaccayā anāpattidassanatthaṃ. Khāditabbañhi yaṃkiñci
tika-vin02t:294_9: khādanīyanti adhippetaṃ, na ca yāmakālikesu kiñci khāditabbaṃ atthi pātabyabhāvato.
tika-vin02t:294_10: Tasmā kiñcāpi yāmakālikaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyehi na saṅgahitaṃ, tathāpi anāpattiṃ dassentena
tika-vin02t:294_11: “anāpatti yāmakālikaṃ yāme nidahitvā bhuñjatī”ti vacanato yāmātikkame sannidhipaccayā
tika-vin02t:294_12: pācittiyena bhavitabbanti viññāyati. “Yāmakālikena, bhikkhave, sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ
tika-vin02t:294_13: tadahupaṭiggahitaṃ yāme kappati, yāmātikkante na kappatī”ti imināpi cāyamattho siddho.
tika-vin02t:294_14: Teneva bhagavato adhippāyaññūhi aṭṭhakathācariyehi yāmakālike pācittiyameva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:295_0: Paṭiggahaṇeti gahaṇameva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Paṭiggahitameva hi taṃ, puna paṭiggahaṇakiccaṃ
tika-vin02t:295_1: natthi. Teneva “ajjhoharitukāmatāya gaṇhantassa paṭiggahaṇe”ti vuttaṃ. Mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin02t:295_2: pana “ajjhoharissāmīti gaṇhantassa paṭiggahaṇe”icceva vuttaṃ. Yanti yaṃ pattaṃ. Sandissatīti
tika-vin02t:295_3: yāguyā upari sandissati. Telavaṇṇe patte satipi nisnehabhāve aṅguliyā ghaṃsantassa
tika-vin02t:295_4: vaṇṇavaseneva lekhā paññāyati, tasmā tattha anāpattīti dassanatthaṃ “sā abbohārikā”ti
tika-vin02t:295_5: vuttaṃ. Sayaṃ paṭiggahetvā apariccattameva hi dutiyadivase na vaṭṭatīti ettha paṭiggahaṇe
tika-vin02t:295_6: anapekkhavissajjanena anupasampannassa nirapekkhadānena vā vijahitapaṭiggahaṇaṃ pariccattameva
tika-vin02t:295_7: hotīti “apariccatta”nti iminā ubhayathāpi avijahitapaṭiggahaṇameva vuttaṃ. Tasmā
tika-vin02t:295_8: yaṃ parassa pariccajitvā adinnampi sace paṭiggahaṇe nirapekkhavissajjanena vijahitapaṭiggahaṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:296_0: Yadi evaṃ “patto duddhoto hotī”tiādīsu kasmā āpatti vuttāti? “Paṭiggahaṇaṃ avissajjetvāva
tika-vin02t:296_1: sayaṃ vā aññena vā tucchaṃ katvā na sammā dhovitvā niṭṭhāpite patte laggampi avijahitapaṭiggahaṇameva
tika-vin02t:296_2: hotīti tattha āpattī”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Keci pana “sāmaṇerānaṃ pariccajantīti
tika-vin02t:296_3: imasmiṃ adhikāre ṭhatvā ‘apariccattamevā’ti vuttattā anupasampannassa pariccattameva
tika-vin02t:296_4: vaṭṭati, apariccattaṃ na vaṭṭatīti āpannaṃ, tasmā nirālayabhāvena paṭiggahaṇe vijahitepi
tika-vin02t:296_5: anupasampannassa apariccattaṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti, taṃ yuttaṃ viya na dissati.
tika-vin02t:296_6: Yadaggena hi paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijahati, tadaggena sannidhimpi na karoti vijahitapaṭiggahaṇassa
tika-vin02t:296_7: appaṭiggahitasadisattā. Paṭiggahetvā nidahiteyeva ca sannidhipaccayā āpatti vuttā.
tika-vin02t:297_0: Pāḷiyaṃ “sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ āhāratthāya paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassā”tiādinā
tika-vin02t:297_1: sannihitesu sattāhakālikayāvajīvikesu purebhattampi āhāratthāya ajjhoharaṇepi dukkaṭassa
tika-vin02t:297_2: vuttattā yāmakālikepi āhāratthāya ajjhoharaṇe visuṃ dukkaṭenapi bhavitabbanti āha
tika-vin02t:297_3: “āhāratthāya ajjhoharato dukkaṭena saddhiṃ pācittiya”nti. Pakatiāmiseti odanādikappiyāmise.
tika-vin02t:297_4: Yāmakālikaṃ sati paccaye sāmisena mukhena ajjhoharato dveti hiyyo paṭiggahitayāmakālikaṃ
tika-vin02t:297_5: ajja purebhattaṃ sāmisena mukhena bhuñjato sannihitayāmakālikapaccayā ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin02t:297_6: sannihitena saṃsaṭṭhaāmisapaccayā ekanti dve pācittiyāni. Vikappadvayepīti sāmisena
tika-vin02t:297_7: nirāmisenāti vuttavidhānadvaye. Dukkaṭaṃ vaḍḍhatīti āhāratthāya ajjhoharaṇapaccayā
tika-vin02t:297_8: dukkaṭaṃ vaḍḍhati. Thullaccayañca dukkaṭañca vaḍḍhatīti manussamaṃse thullaccayaṃ,
tika-vin02t:298_0: 255. Paṭiggahaṇapaccayā tāva dukkaṭanti ettha sannihitattā purebhattampi dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin02t:298_1: Sati paccaye pana sannihitampi sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ bhesajjatthāya gaṇhantassa
tika-vin02t:298_2: paribhuñjantassa ca anāpattiyeva. Sesamettha uttānameva. Yāvakālikayāmakālikatā,
tika-vin02t:298_3: sannidhibhāvo, tassa ajjhoharaṇanti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:301_0: 257-259. Navame paṇītasaṃsaṭṭhāni bhojanāni paṇītabhojanāni. Yathā hi ājaññayutto
tika-vin02t:301_2: bhojanāni “paṇītabhojanānī”ti vuttāni. Yehi pana paṇītehi saṃsaṭṭhāni, tāni “paṇītabhojanānī”ti
tika-vin02t:301_3: vuccanti, tesaṃ pabhedadassanatthaṃ “seyyathidaṃ, sappi navanīta”ntiādi pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:301_4: “Yesaṃ maṃsaṃ kappatī”ti idañca pācittiyavatthuparicchedadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, na
tika-vin02t:301_5: pana kappiyavatthuparicchedadassanatthaṃ. Na hi akappiyamaṃsasattānaṃ sappiādīni
tika-vin02t:301_6: na kappanti. Ekañhi manussavasātelaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbesaṃ khīrasappinavanītavasātelesu
tika-vin02t:301_7: akappiyaṃ nāma natthi. Sappibhattanti ettha kiñcāpi sappisaṃsaṭṭhaṃ bhattaṃ sappibhattaṃ,
tika-vin02t:301_8: sappi ca bhattañca sappibhattantipi viññāyati, aṭṭhakathāsu pana “sālibhattaṃ viya
tika-vin02t:301_9: sappibhattaṃ nāma natthī”ti kāraṇaṃ vatvā dukkaṭasseva daḷhataraṃ katvā vuttattā
tika-vin02t:301_10: na sakkā aññaṃ vattuṃ. Aṭṭhakathācariyā eva hi īdisesu ṭhānesu pamāṇaṃ.
tika-vin02t:302_0: Mūlanti kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Anāpattīti visaṅketattā sabbāhiyeva āpattīhi
tika-vin02t:302_1: anāpatti. Keci pana “pācittiyeneva anāpatti vuttā, sūpodanaviññattidukkaṭaṃ pana
tika-vin02t:302_2: hotiyevā”ti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Kappiyasappinā akappiyasappināti ca idaṃ
tika-vin02t:302_3: kappiyākappiyamaṃsānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ, tasmā kappiyamaṃsasappinā akappiyamaṃsasappināti
tika-vin02t:302_4: evamettha attho gahetabbo. Nānāvatthukānīti sappinavanītādīnaṃ vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:304: “Agilānena bhikkhunā catumāsapaccayapavāraṇā sāditabbā aññatra punapavāraṇāya aññatra niccapavāraṇāya, tato ce uttari sādiyeyya, pācittiya”nti –
tika-vin02t:305_0: Idaṃ mahānāmasikkhāpadaṃ nāma. Iminā ca sikkhāpadena saṅghavasena gilānapaccayapavāraṇāya
tika-vin02t:305_1: pavāritaṭṭhāne sace tattha rattīhi vā bhesajjehi vā paricchedo kato hoti, ettakāyeva
tika-vin02t:305_2: rattiyo ettakāni vā bhesajjāni viññāpetabbānīti. Atha tato rattipariyantato vā bhesajjapariyantato
tika-vin02t:305_3: vā uttari na bhesajjakaraṇīyena vā bhesajjaṃ aññabhesajjakaraṇīyena vā aññaṃ bhesajjaṃ
tika-vin02t:305_4: viññāpentassa pācittiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Tasmā agilāno gilānasaññī hutvā pañca bhesajjāni
tika-vin02t:305_5: viññāpento na bhesajjakaraṇīyena bhesajjaṃ viññāpento nāma hotīti “mahānāmasikkhāpadena
tika-vin02t:305_6: kāretabbo”ti vuttaṃ. Etāni pāṭidesanīyavatthūnīti pāḷiyaṃ āgatasappiādīni sandhāya
tika-vin02t:305_7: vuttaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ anāgatāni pana akappiyasappiādīni bhikkhunīnampi dukkaṭavatthūnīti
tika-vin02t:305_8: veditabbaṃ. Sūpodanaviññattiyanti bhikkhūnaṃ pācittiyavatthūni bhikkhunīnaṃ pāṭidesanīyavatthūni
tika-vin02t:305_9: ca ṭhapetvā avasesaviññattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva. Paṇītabhojanatā,
tika-vin02t:305_10: agilānatā, akataviññattiyā paṭilābho, ajjhoharaṇanti imāni panettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:308_0: 263. Dasame ayyavosāṭitakānīti pitupiṇḍassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Ummāreti susāne katagehassa
tika-vin02t:308_1: attano gehassa vā ummāre. Ghanabaddhoti ghanamaṃsena sambaddho, kathinasaṃhatasarīroti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin02t:309_0: 264. Mukhadvāranti galanāḷikaṃ. Āhāranti ajjhoharitabbaṃ yaṃkiñci yāvakālikādiṃ.
tika-vin02t:309_1: Āhareyyāti mukhadvāraṃ paveseyya. Mukhena vā paviṭṭhaṃ hotu nāsikāya vā, galena ajjhoharaṇīyattā
tika-vin02t:309_2: sabbampi taṃ mukhadvāraṃ pavesitameva hoti. Yasmā pana te bhikkhū anāhārepi udake
tika-vin02t:309_3: āhārasaññāya dantapone ca mukhadvāraṃ āhaṭaṃ idanti saññāya kukkuccāyiṃsu, tasmā
tika-vin02t:309_4: vuttaṃ “te bhikkhū adinnaṃ…pe… sammā atthaṃ asallakkhetvā kukkuccāyiṃsū”ti. Udakañhi
tika-vin02t:309_5: yathāsukhaṃ pātuṃ dantakaṭṭhañca dantaponaparibhogena paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati, tassa
tika-vin02t:309_6: pana rasaṃ gilituṃ na vaṭṭati. Sacepi dantakaṭṭharaso ajānantassa anto pavisati,
tika-vin02t:309_7: pācittiyameva. Anajjhoharantena pana dantakaṭṭhaṃ vā hotu aññaṃ vā, kiñci mukhe pakkhipituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:310_0: 265. Akallakoti gilāno sahatthā paribhuñjituṃ asakkonto mukhena paṭiggaṇhāti. Uccāraṇamattanti
tika-vin02t:310_1: ukkhipanamattaṃ. Ekadesenapīti aṅguliyāpi phuṭṭhamattena. Taṃ ce paṭiggaṇhāti, sabbaṃ
tika-vin02t:310_2: paṭiggahitamevāti veṇukoṭiyā bandhitvā ṭhapitattā. Sacepi bhūmiyaṃ ṭhitameva ghaṭaṃ
tika-vin02t:310_3: dāyakena hatthapāse ṭhatvā ghaṭaṃ dassāmīti dinnaveṇukoṭiggahaṇavasena paṭiggaṇhāti,
tika-vin02t:310_4: ubhayakoṭibaddhaṃ sabbampi paṭiggahitameva hoti. Bhikkhussa atthāya apīḷetvā pakatiyā
tika-vin02t:310_5: pīḷiyamānaucchurasaṃ sandhāya “gaṇhathā”ti vuttattā “abhihāro na paññāyatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:310_6: Hatthapāse ṭhitassa pana bhikkhussa atthāya pīḷiyamānā ucchuto paggharantaṃ rasaṃ
tika-vin02t:310_7: gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati, doṇikāya sayaṃ paggharantaṃ ucchurasaṃ majjhe āvaritvā āvaritvā
tika-vin02t:311_1: sākhāsu paṭiggahaṇaṃ ruhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Puñchitvā paṭiggahetvāti ettha “puñchite
tika-vin02t:311_2: paṭiggahaṇakiccaṃ natthi, tasmā puñchitvā gahetvāti evamattho gahetabbo”ti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:311_3: Puñchitvā paṭiggahetvā vāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Patte patitarajanacuṇṇañhi
tika-vin02t:311_4: abbhantaraparibhogatthāya aparihaṭabhāvato paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Pubbābhogassa
tika-vin02t:311_5: anurūpena “anupasampannassa datvā…pe… vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana taṃ “aññassa
tika-vin02t:311_6: dassāmī”ti cittuppādamattena parasantakaṃ nāma na hoti, tasmā tassa adatvāpi paṭiggahetvā
tika-vin02t:312_0: Bhikkhussa detīti aññassa bhikkhussa deti. Kañjikanti khīrarasādiṃ yaṃkiñci dravaṃ
tika-vin02t:312_1: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Hatthato mocetvā puna gaṇhāti, uggahitakaṃ hotīti āha “hatthato
tika-vin02t:312_2: amocentenevā”ti. Ālulentānanti ālolentānaṃ, ayameva vā pāṭho. Āharitvā bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapitattā
tika-vin02t:312_3: abhihāro natthīti āha “patto paṭiggahetabbo”ti. Paṭhamataraṃ uḷuṅkato thevā patte
tika-vin02t:312_4: patantīti ettha “yathā paṭhamataraṃ patitatheve doso natthi, tathā ākiritvā apanentānaṃ
tika-vin02t:312_5: pacchā patitathevepi abhihaṭattā nevatthi doso”ti vadanti. Carukenāti khuddakabhājanena.
tika-vin02t:312_6: Mukhavaṭṭiyāpi gahetuṃ vaṭṭatīti mukhavaṭṭiṃ ukkhipitvā hatthe phusāpite gaṇhituṃ
tika-vin02t:312_7: vaṭṭati. Kecīti abhayagirivāsino. Esa nayoti kāyapaṭibaddhapaṭibaddhampi kāyapaṭibaddhamevāti
tika-vin02t:312_8: ayaṃ nayo. Tathā ca tattha kāyapaṭibaddhe taṃpaṭibaddhe ca thullaccayameva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:313_0: Tenāti yassa bhikkhuno santikaṃ gataṃ, tena. Tasmāti yasmā mūlaṭṭhasseva paribhogo
tika-vin02t:313_1: anuññāto, tasmā. Taṃ divasaṃ hatthena gahetvā dutiyadivase paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjantassa
tika-vin02t:313_3: anāpattī”ti vuttaṃ. Appaṭiggahetvā paribhuñjantassa adinnamukhadvārāpatti hotīti
tika-vin02t:313_4: āha “paṭiggahetvā pana paribhuñjitabba”nti. “Taṃ divasaṃ…pe… na tato para”nti vacanato
tika-vin02t:313_5: taṃ divasaṃ hatthena gahetvā vā aggahetvā vā ṭhapitaṃ dutiyadivase appaṭiggahetvā
tika-vin02t:313_6: paribhuñjantassa adinnamukhadvārāpatti hoti, hatthena gahetvā ṭhapitaṃ dutiyadivase
tika-vin02t:313_7: paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjantassa pana uggahitakapaṭiggahitaṃ hoti. Appaṭiggahitameva
tika-vin02t:313_8: hi hatthena gahetvā ṭhapitaṃ. “Sāmaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjitu”nti hi vacanato appaṭiggahitasseva
tika-vin02t:313_9: tasmiṃ divase paribhogo anuññāto. Tasmā yaṃ vuttaṃ gaṇṭhipade “taṃ diyyamānaṃ patatīti
tika-vin02t:313_10: ettha yathā gaṇabhojanādīsu gilānādīnaṃ kukkuccāyantānaṃ gaṇabhojanaṃ anuññātaṃ,
tika-vin02t:313_11: evamidhāpi bhagavatā paṭiggahitameva kukkuccavinodanatthaṃ anuññāta”nti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:313_12: “Taṃ diyyamānaṃ patatī”ti avisesena vuttattā catūsupi kālikesu ayaṃ nayo veditabbo.
tika-vin02t:314_0: Satthakenāti paṭiggahitasatthakena. Kasmā panettha uggahitapaccayā sannidhipaccayā
tika-vin02t:314_1: vā doso na siyāti āha “na hi taṃ paribhogatthāya pariharantī”ti. Imināva bāhiraparibhogatthaṃ
tika-vin02t:314_2: sāmaṃ gahetvā anupasampannena dinnaṃ vā gahetvā pariharituṃ vaṭṭatīti dīpeti. Tasmā
tika-vin02t:314_3: pattasammakkhanādiatthaṃ sāmaṃ gahetvā parihaṭatelādiṃ sace paribhuñjitukāmo hoti,
tika-vin02t:314_4: paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjantassa anāpatti. Abbhantaraparibhogatthaṃ pana sāmaṃ gahitaṃ
tika-vin02t:314_5: paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjantassa uggahitakapaṭiggahitaṃ hoti, appaṭiggahetvā paribhuñjantassa
tika-vin02t:314_6: adinnamukhadvārāpatti hoti, abbhantaraparibhogatthameva anupasampannena dinnaṃ gahetvā
tika-vin02t:314_7: pariharantassa siṅgīloṇakappo viya sannidhipaccayā āpatti hoti. Keci pana “thāmamajjhimassa
tika-vin02t:314_8: purisassa uccāraṇamattaṃ hotītiādinā vuttapañcaṅgasampattiyā paṭiggahaṇassa ruhanato
tika-vin02t:314_9: bāhiraparibhogatthampi sace anupasampannena dinnaṃ gaṇhāti, paṭiggahitamevā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:314_10: Evaṃ sati idha bāhiraparibhogatthaṃ anupasampannena dinnaṃ gahetvā pariharantassa
tika-vin02t:314_11: sannidhipaccayā āpatti vattabbā siyā, “na hi taṃ paribhogatthāya pariharantī”ti ca
tika-vin02t:314_12: na vattabbaṃ, tasmā bāhiraparibhogatthaṃ gahitaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ nāma na hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:314_13: Yadi evaṃ pañcasu paṭiggahaṇaṅgesu “paribhogatthāyā”ti visesanaṃ vattabbanti? Na
tika-vin02t:314_14: vattabbaṃ. Paṭiggahaṇañhi paribhogatthameva hotīti “paribhogatthāyā”ti visuṃ avatvā
tika-vin02t:314_15: “tañce bhikkhu kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā paṭiggaṇhātī”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ. Apare
tika-vin02t:314_16: pana “satipi paṭiggahaṇe ‘na hi taṃ paribhogatthāya pariharantī’ti idha aparibhogatthāya
tika-vin02t:314_17: pariharaṇe anāpatti vuttā”ti vadanti. Udukkhalamusalāni khiyyantīti ettha udukkhalamusalānaṃ
tika-vin02t:314_18: khayena pisitakoṭṭitabhesajjesu sace āgantukavaṇṇo paññāyati, na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:315_0: Suddhaṃ udakaṃ hotīti rukkhasākhādīhi gaḷitvā patanaudakaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Patto
tika-vin02t:315_1: vāssa paṭiggahetabboti etthāpi pattagataṃ chupitvā dentassa hatthalaggena āmisena
tika-vin02t:315_3: Yaṃ sāmaṇerassa patte patati…pe… paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vijahatīti ettha punappunaṃ gaṇhantassa
tika-vin02t:315_4: attano patte pakkhittameva “attano santaka”nti sanniṭṭhānakaraṇato hatthagataṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:315_5: na vijahati, paricchinditvā dinnaṃ pana gaṇhantassa gahaṇasamayeyeva “attano santaka”nti
tika-vin02t:315_6: sanniṭṭhānassa katattā hatthagataṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijahati. Kesañci atthāya odanaṃ
tika-vin02t:315_7: pakkhipatīti ettha anupasampannassa atthāya pakkhipantepi “āgantvā gaṇhissatī”ti
tika-vin02t:315_8: sayameva pakkhipitvā ṭhapanato paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vijahati, anupasampannassa hatthe
tika-vin02t:315_9: pakkhittaṃ pana anupasampanneneva ṭhapitaṃ nāma hotīti paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijahati pariccattabhāvato.
tika-vin02t:316_0: Paṭiggahaṇūpagaṃ bhāraṃ nāma thāmamajjhimassa purisassa ukkhepārahaṃ. Kiñcāpi avissajjetvāva
tika-vin02t:316_1: aññena hatthena pidahantassa doso natthi, tathāpi na pidahitabbanti aṭṭhakathāpamāṇeneva
tika-vin02t:316_2: gahetabbaṃ. Macchikavāraṇatthanti ettha “sacepi sākhāya laggarajaṃ patte patati,
tika-vin02t:316_3: sukhena paribhuñjituṃ sakkāti sākhāya paṭiggahitattā abbhantaraparibhogatthamevidha
tika-vin02t:316_4: paṭiggahaṇanti mūlapaṭiggahaṇameva vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Apare pana “macchikavāraṇatthanti
tika-vin02t:316_5: ettha vacanamattaṃ gahetvā bāhiraparibhogatthaṃ gahita”nti vadanti. Tasmimpi asatīti
tika-vin02t:316_6: cāṭiyā vā kuṇḍake vā asati. Anupasampannaṃ gāhāpetvāti taṃyeva ajjhoharaṇīyabhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin02t:316_7: anupasampannena gāhāpetvā. Therassa pattaṃ anutherassāti therassa pattaṃ attanā gahetvā
tika-vin02t:316_8: anutherassa deti. Tuyhaṃ yāguṃ mayhaṃ dehīti ettha evaṃ vatvā sāmaṇerassa pattaṃ
tika-vin02t:316_9: gahetvā attanopi pattaṃ tassa deti. Ettha panāti paṇḍito sāmaṇerotiādipattaparivattanakathāya.
tika-vin02t:316_10: Kāraṇaṃ upaparikkhitabbanti yathā mātuādīnaṃ telādīni haranto tathārūpe kicce anupasampannena
tika-vin02t:316_11: aparivattetvāva paribhuñjituṃ labhati, evamidha pattaparivattanaṃ akatvā paribhuñjituṃ
tika-vin02t:316_12: na labhatīti ettha kāraṇaṃ vīmaṃsitabbanti attho.
tika-vin02t:317_0: Ettha pana “sāmaṇerehi gahitataṇḍulesu parikkhīṇesu avassaṃ amhākaṃ sāmaṇerā saṅgahaṃ
tika-vin02t:317_1: karontīti vitakkuppatti sambhavati, tasmā taṃ parivattetvāva paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Mātāpitūnaṃ
tika-vin02t:317_2: atthāya pana chāyatthāya vā gahaṇe paribhogāsā natthi, tasmā taṃ vaṭṭatī”ti kāraṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:321: Tassa sālayabhāvaṃ tu, visesaṃ takkayāma ta”nti.
tika-vin02t:322_0: Idamevettha yuttataraṃ avassaṃ tathāvidhavitakkuppattiyā sambhavato. Na sakkā hi
tika-vin02t:322_1: ettha vitakkaṃ sodhetunti. Mātādīnaṃ atthāya haraṇe pana nāvassaṃ tathāvidhavitakkuppattīti
tika-vin02t:322_2: sakkā vitakkaṃ sodhetuṃ. Yattha hi vitakkaṃ sodhetuṃ sakkā, tattha nevatthi doso.
tika-vin02t:322_3: Teneva vakkhati “sace pana sakkoti vitakkaṃ sodhetuṃ, tato laddhaṃ khāditumpi vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-vin02t:323_0: Niccāletuṃ na sakkotīti niccāletvā sakkharā apanetuṃ na sakkoti. Ādhārake patto ṭhapito
tika-vin02t:323_1: hotīti paṭiggahetabbapattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Cāletīti vinā kāraṇaṃ cāleti. Satipi
tika-vin02t:323_2: kāraṇe bhikkhūnaṃ paribhogārahaṃ cāletuṃ na vaṭṭati. Kiñcāpi “anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin02t:323_3: amanussikābādhe āmakamaṃsaṃ āmakalohita”nti tādise ābādhe attano atthāya āmakamaṃsapaṭiggahaṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:323_4: anuññātaṃ, “āmakamaṃsapaṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato hotī”ti ca sāmaññato paṭikkhittaṃ, tathāpi
tika-vin02t:323_5: attano aññassa vā bhikkhuno atthāya aggahitattā “sīhavighāsādiṃ…pe… vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:323_6: Sakkoti vitakkaṃ sodhetunti mayhampi detīti vitakkassa anuppannabhāvaṃ sallakkhetuṃ
tika-vin02t:323_7: sakkoti, sāmaṇerassa dassāmīti suddhacittena mayā gahitanti vā sallakkhetuṃ sakkoti.
tika-vin02t:324_0: Sace pana mūlepi paṭiggahitaṃ hotīti ettha “gahetvā gate mayhampi dadeyyunti saññāya
tika-vin02t:324_1: sace paṭiggahitaṃ hotī”ti vadanti. Koṭṭhāse karotīti bhikkhusāmaṇerā ca attano attano
tika-vin02t:324_2: abhirucitaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ gaṇhantūti sabbesaṃ samake koṭṭhāse karoti. Gahitāvasesanti
tika-vin02t:324_3: sāmaṇerehi gahitakoṭṭhāsato avasesaṃ. Gaṇhitvāti “mayhaṃ idaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti gahetvā.
tika-vin02t:324_4: Idha gahitāvasesaṃ nāma tena gaṇhitvā puna ṭhapitaṃ. Paṭiggahetvāti tadahu paṭiggahetvā.
tika-vin02t:324_5: Teneva “yāvakālikena yāvajīvikasaṃsagge doso natthī”ti vuttaṃ. Sace pana purimadivase
tika-vin02t:324_6: paṭiggahetvā ṭhapitā hoti, sāmisena mukhena tassā vaṭṭiyā dhūmaṃ pivituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:324_7: Samuddodakenāti appaṭiggahitasamuddodakena. Yasmā katakaṭṭhi udakaṃ pasādetvā visuṃ
tika-vin02t:324_8: tiṭṭhati, tasmā “abbohārika”nti vuttaṃ. Laggatīti mukhe hatthe ca udake sukkhe setavaṇṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:324_9: dassentaṃ laggati. Pānīyaṃ gahetvāti attanoyeva atthāya gahetvā. Sace pana pītāvasesaṃ
tika-vin02t:324_10: tattheva ākirissāmīti gaṇhāti, puna paṭiggahaṇakiccaṃ natthi. Vikkhambhetvāti viyūhitvā, apanetvāti attho.
tika-vin02t:325_0: Mahābhūtesūti sarīranissitesu mahābhūtesu. Patatīti vicchinditvā patati. Vicchinditvā
tika-vin02t:325_1: patitameva hi paṭiggahetabbaṃ, na itaraṃ. Alladāruṃ rukkhato chinditvāpi kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin02t:325_2: ettha mattikatthāya pathaviṃ khaṇitumpi vaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ. Sappadaṭṭhakkhaṇeyeva
tika-vin02t:325_3: vaṭṭatīti asati kappiyakārake sāmaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati, aññadā paṭiggahāpetvā
tika-vin02t:325_4: paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva. Appaṭiggahitatā, ananuññātatā, dhūmādiabbohārikābhāvo,
tika-vin02t:330_0: 273. Acelakavaggassa paṭhamasikkhāpade tesanti titthiyānaṃ. Tatthāti bhājane. Itoti
tika-vin02t:330_1: pattato. Sace titthiyo vadatīti “paṭhamameva maṃ sandhāya abhiharitvā ṭhapitaṃ mayhaṃ
tika-vin02t:330_2: santakaṃ hoti, imasmiṃ bhājane ākirathā”ti vadati, vaṭṭati. Sesamettha uttānameva.
tika-vin02t:330_3: Aññatitthiyatā, ajjhoharaṇīyatā, ajjhoharaṇatthāya sahatthā anikkhittabhājane dānanti
tika-vin02t:333: 274. Dutiyaṃ uttānatthameva. Anācāraṃ ācaritukāmatā, tadatthameva upasampannassa uyyojanā, evaṃ uyyojentassa upacārātikkamoti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:336_0: 280. Tatiye piṭṭhasaṅghāṭoti dvārabāhāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Khuddakaṃ nāma sayanigharaṃ
tika-vin02t:336_1: vitthārato pañcahatthappamāṇaṃ hoti, tassa ca majjhimaṭṭhānaṃ piṭṭhasaṅghāṭato aḍḍhateyyahatthappamāṇameva
tika-vin02t:336_2: hoti, tasmā tādise sayanighare piṭṭhasaṅghāṭato hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā nisinno piṭṭhivaṃsaṃ
tika-vin02t:336_3: atikkamitvā nisinno nāma hoti. Evaṃ nisinno ca majjhaṃ atikkamitvā nisinno nāma hotīti
tika-vin02t:336_4: āha “iminā majjhātikkamaṃ dassetī”ti. Yathā vā tathā vā katassāti piṭṭhivaṃsaṃ āropetvā
tika-vin02t:336_5: vā anāropetvā vā katassa. Sacittakanti anupavisitvā nisīdanacittena sacittakaṃ. Sesamettha
tika-vin02t:336_7: bhikkhuno abhāvo, anupakhajja nisīdananti imāni panettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:340_0: 298. Chaṭṭhe pakativacanenāti ettha yaṃ dvādasahatthabbhantare ṭhitena sotuṃ sakkā
tika-vin02t:340_1: bhaveyya, taṃ pakativacanaṃ nāma. Āpucchitabboti “ahaṃ itthannāmassa gharaṃ gacchāmī”ti
tika-vin02t:340_2: vā “cārittaṃ āpajjāmī”ti vā īdisena vacanena āpucchitabbo. Sesamettha uttānameva.
tika-vin02t:340_3: Pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññatarena nimantanasādiyanaṃ, santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchanā,
tika-vin02t:340_4: bhattiyagharato aññagharappavesanaṃ, majjhanhikānatikkamo, samayassa vā āpadānaṃ
tika-vin02t:340_5: vā abhāvoti imāni panettha pañca aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:343_0: 303. Sattame mahānāmo nāmāti anuruddhattherassa bhātā bhagavato cūḷapitu putto. Suddhodano
tika-vin02t:343_1: sakkodano sukkodano dhotodano amitodanoti ime hi pañca janā bhātaro. Amitā nāma devī
tika-vin02t:343_2: tesaṃ bhaginī, tissatthero tassā putto. Tathāgato ca nandatthero ca suddhodanassa
tika-vin02t:343_3: puttā, mahānāmo ca anuruddhatthero ca sukkodanassa, ānandatthero amitodanassa. So
tika-vin02t:343_4: bhagavato kaniṭṭho, mahānāmo mahallakataro sakadāgāmī ariyasāvako. Tena vuttaṃ “mahānāmo
tika-vin02t:344_0: 305-306. Pāḷiyaṃ ajjaṇhoti ajja ekadivasanti attho, “ajjano”ti vā attho gahetabbo,
tika-vin02t:344_1: no amhākaṃ. Kālaṃ āharissathāti sve harissatha. Tato ce uttari sādiyeyyāti sace tattha
tika-vin02t:344_2: rattīhi vā bhesajjehi vā paricchedo kato hoti “ettakāyeva vā rattiyo ettakāni vā
tika-vin02t:344_3: bhesajjāni viññāpetabbānī”ti, tato rattipariyantato vā bhesajjapariyantato vā uttari
tika-vin02t:344_4: viññāpento sādiyeyya. “Imehi tayā bhesajjehi pavāritamha, amhākañca imināva bhesajjena
tika-vin02t:345_0: 310. Yasmā saṅghapavāraṇāyamevāyaṃ vidhi, tasmā “ye attano puggalikāya pavāraṇāya
tika-vin02t:345_1: pavāritā”ti vuttaṃ. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Saṅghapavāraṇatā, bhesajjaviññatti, agilānatā,
tika-vin02t:348: 311. Aṭṭhamaṃ uttānatthameva. Uyyuttasenā, dassanatthāya gamanaṃ, anuññātokāsato aññatra dassanaṃ, tathārūpapaccayassa āpadāya vā abhāvoti imāni panettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:351: 317. Navamasikkhāpadampi uttānameva. Tirattātikkamo, senāya sūriyassa atthaṅgamo, gilānatādīnaṃ abhāvoti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:354_0: 322. Dasame kati te lakkhāni laddhānīti tava sarappahārassa lakkhaṇabhūtā kittakā
tika-vin02t:354_1: janā tayā laddhāti attho, kittakā tayā viddhāti vuttaṃ hoti. Sesamettha uttānameva.
tika-vin02t:354_2: Uyyodhikādidassanatthāya gamanaṃ, anuññātokāsato aññatra dassanaṃ, tathārūpapaccayassa
tika-vin02t:354_3: āpadāya vā abhāvoti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:359_1: piṭṭhasurādīsu piṭṭhaṃ bhājane pakkhipitvā tajjaṃ udakaṃ datvā madditvā katā piṭṭhasurā.
tika-vin02t:359_2: Evaṃ pūve odane ca bhājane pakkhipitvā tajjaṃ udakaṃ datvā madditvā katā pūvasurā
tika-vin02t:359_3: odanasurāti ca vuccati. “Kiṇṇā”ti pana tassā surāya bījaṃ vuccati. Ye surāmodakātipi
tika-vin02t:359_4: vuccanti, te pakkhipitvā katā kiṇṇapakkhittā. Harītakīsāsapādinānāsambhārehi saṃyojitā sambhārasaṃyuttā.
tika-vin02t:360_2: raso ciraparivāsito sambhārasaṃyutto. Bījato paṭṭhāyāti sambhāre paṭiyādetvā cāṭiyaṃ
tika-vin02t:360_3: pakkhittakālato, tālanāḷikerādīnaṃ puppharasassa gahitaabhinavakālatoyeva ca paṭṭhāya.
tika-vin02t:361_0: 329. Loṇasovīrakaṃ suttañca anekehi bhesajjehi abhisaṅkhato amajjabhūto āsavaviseso.
tika-vin02t:361_1: Vāsaggāhāpanatthanti sugandhibhāvaggāhāpanatthaṃ. Acittakaṃ lokavajjanti ettha yaṃ
tika-vin02t:361_2: vattabbaṃ, taṃ paṭhamapārājikavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayena veditabbaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva.
tika-vin02t:361_3: Majjabhāvo, tassa pānañcāti imāni panettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:364_0: 330. Dutiye bhikkhunīpi anupasampannaṭṭhāne ṭhitāti ettha bhikkhupi bhikkhuniyā anupasampannaṭṭhāne
tika-vin02t:364_1: ṭhitoti veditabbo. Sesamettha uttānameva. Hasādhippāyatā, upasampannassa kāyena kāyāmasananti
tika-vin02t:367: 335. Tatiyaṃ uttānatthameva. Uparigopphakatā, hasādhippāyena kīḷananti imāni panettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:370_0: 344. Catutthe gārayho ācariyuggaho na gahetabboti yasmā ucchuraso sattāhakāliko,
tika-vin02t:370_1: tassa kasaṭo yāvajīviko, dvinnaṃyeva samavāyo ucchuyaṭṭhi, tasmā vikāle ucchuyaṭṭhiṃ
tika-vin02t:370_2: khādituṃ vaṭṭati guḷaharītakaṃ viyāti evamādiko gārayhācariyavādo na gahetabbo. Lokavajje
tika-vin02t:370_3: ācariyuggaho na vaṭṭatīti lokavajjasikkhāpade āpattiṭṭhāne yo ācariyavādo, so na
tika-vin02t:370_4: gahetabbo, lokavajjaṃ atikkamitvā “idaṃ amhākaṃ ācariyuggaho”ti vadantassa uggaho
tika-vin02t:370_5: na vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo. Suttānulomaṃ nāma aṭṭhakathā. Paveṇiyā āgatasamodhānaṃ gacchatīti
tika-vin02t:370_6: “paveṇiyā āgato ācariyuggahova gahetabbo”ti evaṃ vutte mahāaṭṭhakathāvādeyeva saṅgahaṃ
tika-vin02t:370_7: gacchatīti adhippāyo. Sesamettha uttānameva. Upasampannassa paññattena vacanaṃ, anādariyakaraṇanti
tika-vin02t:373: 345. Pañcamaṃ uttānatthameva. Upasampannatā, tassa dassanasavanavisaye bhiṃsāpetukāmatāya vāyamananti imāni panettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:376_0: 350. Chaṭṭhe bhaggā nāma janapadino rājakumārā, tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado ruḷhīsaddena
tika-vin02t:376_1: “bhaggā”ti vuccati. Tena vuttaṃ “bhaggāti janapadassa nāma”nti. Susumāragireti evaṃnāmake
tika-vin02t:376_2: nagare. Tassa kira nagarassa māpanatthaṃ vatthuvijjācariyena nagaraṭṭhānassa pariggaṇhanadivase
tika-vin02t:376_3: avidūre susumāro saddamakāsi giraṃ nicchāresi. Atha anantarāyena nagare māpite tameva
tika-vin02t:376_4: susumāragiraṇaṃ subhanimittaṃ katvā susumāragiraṃtvevassa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Keci pana
tika-vin02t:376_5: “susumārasaṇṭhānattā susumāro nāma eko giri, so tassa nagarassa samīpe, tasmā taṃ
tika-vin02t:376_6: susumāragiri etassa atthīti ‘susumāragirī’ti vuccatī”ti vadanti. Tathā vā hotu aññathā
tika-vin02t:376_7: vā, nāmametaṃ tassa nagarassāti āha “susumāragiranti nagarassa nāma”nti. Bhesakaḷāti
tika-vin02t:376_8: ghampaṇḍanāmako gacchaviseso. Keci “setarukkho”tipi vadanti. Tesaṃ bahulatāya pana
tika-vin02t:376_9: taṃ vanaṃ bhesakaḷāvanantveva paññāyittha. “Bhesagaḷāvane”tipi pāṭho. “Bheso nāma
tika-vin02t:376_10: eko yakkho ayuttakārī, tassa tato gaḷitaṭṭhānatāya taṃ vanaṃ bhesagaḷāvanaṃ nāma jāta”nti hi keci.
tika-vin02t:377: 352. Jotikaraṇeti aggikaraṇe. Sesamettha uttānameva. Agilānatā, anuññātakaraṇābhāvo, visibbetukāmatā, samādahananti imāni panettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:380_0: 357. Sattamasikkhāpadassa pāḷiyaṃ asambhinnenāti amakkhitena, anaṭṭhenāti attho.
tika-vin02t:380_1: Orenaddhamāsaṃ nahāyeyyāti nahātadivasato paṭṭhāya addhamāse aparipuṇṇe nahāyeyya.
tika-vin02t:380_2: Sesamettha uttānameva. Majjhimadeso, ūnakaddhamāse nahānaṃ, samayānaṃ vā nadīpāragamanassa
tika-vin02t:380_3: vā āpadānaṃ vā abhāvoti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:383_0: 368. Aṭṭhame “cammakāranīlaṃ nāma pakatinīla”nti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Gaṇṭhipade
tika-vin02t:383_1: pana “cammakārā udake tipumalaṃ ayagūthañca pakkhipitvā cammaṃ kāḷaṃ karonti, taṃ
tika-vin02t:383_2: cammakāranīla”nti vuttaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva. Vuttappakārassa cīvarassa akatakappatā,
tika-vin02t:383_3: anaṭṭhacīvarāditā, nivāsanaṃ vā pārupanaṃ vāti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:386_0: 374. Navame apaccuddhāraṇanti “mayhaṃ santakaṃ paribhuñja vā vissajjehi vā”tiādinā
tika-vin02t:386_1: akatapaccuddhāraṃ. Yena vinayakammaṃ katanti yena saddhiṃ vinayakammaṃ kataṃ. Tiṃsakavaṇṇanāyanti
tika-vin02t:386_2: nissaggiyavaṇṇanāyaṃ. Paribhogena kāyakammaṃ, apaccuddhārāpanena vacīkammaṃ. Sesamettha
tika-vin02t:386_3: uttānameva. Sāmaṃ vikappitassa apaccuddhāro, vikappanupagacīvaratā, paribhogoti imāni
tika-vin02t:389: 377. Dasamaṃ uttānatthameva. Upasampannassa santakānaṃ pattādīnaṃ apanidhānaṃ, vihesetukāmatā vā hasādhippāyatā vāti imāni panettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:394_0: 382. Sappāṇakavaggassa paṭhamasikkhāpade usuṃ saraṃ assati khipatīti issāso, dhanusippakusaloti
tika-vin02t:394_1: āha “dhanuggahācariyo”ti. Paṭisattuvidhamanatthaṃ dhanuṃ gaṇhantīti dhanuggahā, tesaṃ
tika-vin02t:394_2: ācariyo dhanuggahācariyo. Appamattena vattaṃ kātabbanti yathā te pāṇā na maranti,
tika-vin02t:394_3: evaṃ sūpaṭṭhitassatinā senāsane vattaṃ kātabbaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva. Aṅgānipi
tika-vin02t:397_0: 387. Dutiye udakasaṇṭhānakappadeseti yattha bhūmibhāge udakaṃ nikkhittaṃ santiṭṭhati,
tika-vin02t:397_1: na sahasā parikkhayaṃ gacchati, tādise padese. Sesamettha uttānameva. Aṅgāni siñcanasikkhāpade vuttanayāneva.
tika-vin02t:400_0: 392. Tatiye yathāpatiṭṭhitabhāvena patiṭṭhātuṃ na dentīti tesaṃ pavattiākāradassanatthaṃ
tika-vin02t:400_1: vuttaṃ. Yaṃ pana dhammena adhikaraṇaṃ nihataṃ, taṃ sunihatameva. Sace vippakate kamme
tika-vin02t:400_2: paṭikkosati, taṃ saññāpetvāva kātabbaṃ. Itarathā kammañca kuppati, kārakānañca āpatti.
tika-vin02t:400_3: Sesamettha uttānameva. Yathādhammaṃ nihatabhāvo, jānanā, ukkoṭanāti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:403_0: 399. Catutthe tassevāti yo āpanno, tasseva. Ārocetīti paṭicchādanatthameva mā kassaci
tika-vin02t:403_1: ārocesīti vadati. Vatthupuggaloti āpannapuggalo. Yenassa ārocitanti yena dutiyena
tika-vin02t:403_2: assa tatiyassa ārocitaṃ. Koṭi chinnā hotīti yasmā paṭicchādanapaccayā āpattiṃ āpajjitvāva
tika-vin02t:403_3: dutiyena tatiyassa ārocitaṃ, tasmā tappaccayā puna tena āpajjitabbāpattiyā abhāvato
tika-vin02t:404_0: 400. “Anupasampannassa sukkavissaṭṭhi ca kāyasaṃsaggo cāti ayaṃ duṭṭhullaajjhācāro
tika-vin02t:404_1: nāmā”ti idaṃ duṭṭhullārocanasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāya na sameti. Vuttañhi tattha “anupasampannassa
tika-vin02t:404_2: duṭṭhullaṃ vā aduṭṭhullaṃ vā ajjhācāranti ettha ādito pañca sikkhāpadāni duṭṭhullo
tika-vin02t:404_4: ajjhācāro nāmā”ti. “Ārocane anupasampannassa duṭṭhullaṃ aññathā adhippetaṃ, paṭicchādane
tika-vin02t:404_5: aññathā”ti etthāpi visesakāraṇaṃ na dissati, tasmā aṭṭhakathāya pubbenāparaṃ na sameti.
tika-vin02t:404_6: Avirodhaṃ icchantena pana vīmaṃsitabbamettha kāraṇaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva. Upasampannassa
tika-vin02t:404_7: duṭṭhullāpattijānanaṃ, paṭicchādetukāmatāya nārocessāmīti dhuranikkhepoti imāni panettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:407_0: 402. Pañcame rūpasuttanti heraññikānaṃ suttaṃ. Duruttānanti akkosavasena duruttānaṃ,
tika-vin02t:407_1: duruttattāyeva durāgatānaṃ. Vacanapathānanti ettha vacanameva tadatthaṃ ñātukāmānaṃ
tika-vin02t:407_2: ñāpetukāmānañca pathoti vacanapatho. Dukkhamānanti dukkhena khamitabbānaṃ.
tika-vin02t:408_0: 404. Gabbhe sayitakālena saddhiṃ vīsatimaṃ vassaṃ assāti gabbhavīso. Hāyanavaḍḍhananti
tika-vin02t:408_1: gabbhamāsesu adhikesu uttarihāyanaṃ, ūnesu vaḍḍhananti veditabbaṃ. Ekūnavīsativassanti
tika-vin02t:408_2: dvādasamāse mātukucchismiṃ vasitvā mahāpavāraṇāya jātakālato paṭṭhāya ekūnavīsativassaṃ.
tika-vin02t:408_4: “cattāro māsā parihāyantī”ti vuttaṃ. Vassaṃ ukkaḍḍhantīti vassaṃ uddhaṃ kaḍḍhanti,
tika-vin02t:408_5: tatiye saṃvacchare ekamāsaṃ adhikamāsavasena pariccajantā vassaṃ uddhaṃ kaḍḍhantīti
tika-vin02t:408_6: attho, tasmā tatiyo saṃvaccharo terasamāsiko hoti, saṃvaccharassa pana dvādasamāsikattā
tika-vin02t:408_7: aṭṭhārasasu vassesu adhikamāse visuṃ gahetvā “cha māsā vaḍḍhantī”ti vuttaṃ. Tatoti
tika-vin02t:408_8: chamāsato. Nikkaṅkhā hutvāti adhikamāsehi saddhiṃ paripuṇṇavīsativassattā nibbematikā
tika-vin02t:408_9: hutvā. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ tīsu gaṇṭhipadesu “aṭṭhārasannaṃyeva vassānaṃ adhikamāse gahetvā
tika-vin02t:408_10: gaṇitattā sesavassadvayassapi adhikāni divasāni honteva, tāni adhikadivasāni sandhāya
tika-vin02t:408_11: ‘nikkaṅkhā hutvā’ti vutta”nti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Na hi dvīsu vassesu adhikadivasāni
tika-vin02t:408_12: nāma visuṃ upalabbhanti tatiye vasse vassukkaḍḍhanavasena adhikamāse pariccatteyeva
tika-vin02t:408_13: atirekamāsasambhavato. Tasmā dvīsu vassesu atirekadivasāni nāma visuṃ na sambhavanti.
tika-vin02t:409_0: Nanu ca “te dve māse gahetvā vīsativassāni paripuṇṇāni hontī”ti kasmā vuttaṃ, ekūnavīsativassamhi
tika-vin02t:409_1: puna aparasmiṃ vasse pakkhitte vīsativassāni paripuṇṇāni hontīti āha “ettha pana…pe…
tika-vin02t:409_2: vutta”nti. Anekatthattā nipātānaṃ pana-saddo hi-saddatthe, ettha hīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin02t:409_3: Idañhi vuttassevatthassa samatthanavasena vuttaṃ. Iminā ca imaṃ dīpeti “yaṃ vuttaṃ
tika-vin02t:409_5: tattha gabbhamāsepi aggahetvā dvīhi māsehi aparipuṇṇavīsativassaṃ sandhāya ‘ekūnavīsativassa’nti
tika-vin02t:409_6: vuttaṃ, tasmā adhikamāsesu dvīsu gahitesu vīsativassāni paripuṇṇāni nāma hontī”ti.
tika-vin02t:409_7: Tasmāti yasmā gabbhamāsāpi gaṇanūpagā honti, tasmā. Ekavīsativasso hotīti jātadivasato
tika-vin02t:409_8: paṭṭhāya vīsativasso samāno gabbhamāsehi saddhiṃ ekavīsativasso hoti.
tika-vin02t:410: 406. Aññaṃ upasampādetīti upajjhāyo kammavācācariyo vā hutvā upasampādeti. Sesamettha uttānameva. Ūnavīsativassatā, ūnakasaññitā, upasampādananti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:413: 407. Chaṭṭhasikkhāpadaṃ uttānatthameva. Theyyasatthakabhāvo, jānanaṃ, saṃvidhānaṃ, avisaṅketena gamananti imāni panettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin02t:417_0: 417. Aṭṭhame bādhayiṃsūti haniṃsu. Taṃtaṃsampattiyā vibandhanavasena sattasantānassa
tika-vin02t:417_1: antare vemajjhe eti āgacchatīti antarāyo, diṭṭhadhammikādianattho. Anatikkamanaṭṭhena
tika-vin02t:417_2: tasmiṃ antarāye niyuttā, antarāyaṃ vā phalaṃ arahanti, antarāyassa vā karaṇasīlāti
