tika-vin02t:755_1: kā ettha cintā. Apicettha idaṃ vatthumpi udāharanti, cūḷamātāya kira putto muṇḍo,
tika-vin02t:755_2: mahāmātāya putto amuṇḍo. Taṃ suttaṃ muṇḍesuṃ. So uṭṭhāya “ahaṃ nu kho cūḷamātāya
tika-vin02t:755_3: putto”ti cintesi. Evaṃ “ahaṃ nu khosmī”ti kaṅkhā hoti.
tika-vin02t:756_0: No nu khosmīti attano natthibhāvaṃ kaṅkhati. Tatrāpi idaṃ vatthu – eko kira macche
tika-vin02t:756_1: gaṇhanto udake ciraṭṭhānena sītibhūtaṃ attano ūruṃ “maccho”ti cintetvā pahari. Aparo
tika-vin02t:756_2: susānapasse khettaṃ rakkhanto bhīto saṅkuṭito sayi. So paṭibujjhitvā attano jaṇṇukāni
tika-vin02t:756_3: “dve yakkhā”ti cintetvā pahari, evaṃ “no nu khosmī”ti kaṅkhati.
tika-vin02t:757_0: Kiṃ nu khosmīti khattiyova samāno attano khattiyabhāvaṃ kaṅkhati kaṇṇo viya sūtaputtasaññī.
tika-vin02t:757_1: Esa nayo sesesu. Devo pana samāno devabhāvaṃ ajānanto nāma natthi. Sopi pana “ahaṃ
tika-vin02t:757_2: rūpī nu kho arūpī nu kho”tiādinā nayena kaṅkhati. Khattiyādayo kasmā na jānantīti
tika-vin02t:757_3: ce? Appaccakkhā tesaṃ tattha tattha kule uppatti. Gahaṭṭhāpi ca pātalikādayo pabbajitasaññino.
tika-vin02t:757_4: Pabbajitāpi “kuppaṃ nu kho me kamma”ntiādinā nayena gahaṭṭhasaññino. Manussāpi ca
tika-vin02t:757_5: ekacce rājāno viya attani devasaññino honti.
tika-vin02t:758_0: Kathaṃ nu khosmīti vuttanayameva. Kevalañhettha abbhantare jīvo nāma atthīti gahetvā
tika-vin02t:758_2: aññatarappakāro”ti kaṅkhanto “kathaṃ nu khosmī”ti kaṅkhatīti veditabbo. Sarīrasaṇṭhānaṃ
tika-vin02t:759: Kuto āgato, so kuhiṃ gāmī bhavissatīti attabhāvassa āgatigatiṭṭhānaṃ kaṅkhati.
tika-vin02t:760: Vapayantīti viapayanti, ikāralopenāyaṃ niddeso. Byapayantīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tenāha “vapayanti apagacchantī”ti. Apagamanañca anuppattinirodhavasenāti āha “nirujjhantī”ti.
tika-vin02t:761_0: 3. Kadā panassa bodhipakkhiyadhammā catusaccadhammā vā pātubhavanti uppajjanti pakāsantīti?
tika-vin02t:761_1: Vipassanāmaggañāṇesu pavattamānesu. Tattha vipassanāñāṇe tāva vipassanāñāṇasampayuttā
tika-vin02t:761_2: satiādayo vipassanāñāṇañca yathārahaṃ attano attano visayesu tadaṅgappahānavasena
tika-vin02t:761_3: subhasaññādike pajahantā kāyānupassanādivasena visuṃ visuṃ uppajjanti. Maggakkhaṇe
tika-vin02t:761_4: pana te nibbānamālambitvā samucchedavasena paṭipakkhe pajahantā catūsupi ariyasaccesu
tika-vin02t:761_5: asammohapaṭivedhasādhanavasena sakideva uppajjanti. Evaṃ tāvettha bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ
tika-vin02t:761_6: uppajjanaṭṭhena pātubhāvo veditabbo. Ariyasaccadhammānaṃ pana lokiyānaṃ vipassanākkhaṇe
tika-vin02t:761_7: vipassanāya ārammaṇakaraṇavasena lokuttarānaṃ tadadhimuttatāvasena maggakkhaṇe nirodhasaccassa
tika-vin02t:762_0: Iti bhagavā satipi sabbākārena sabbadhammānaṃ attano ñāṇassa pākaṭabhāve paṭiccasamuppādamukhena
tika-vin02t:762_1: vipassanābhinivesassa katattā nipuṇagambhīrasududdasatāya paccayākārassa taṃ paccavekkhitvā
tika-vin02t:762_2: uppannabalavasomanasso paṭipakkhasamucchedavibhāvanena saddhiṃ attano tadabhisamayānubhāvadīpakamevettha udānaṃ udānesi.
tika-vin02t:763: “Kāmā te paṭhamā senā”tiādinā nayena vuttappakāraṃ mārasenanti –
tika-vin02t:764: “Kāmā te paṭhamā senā, dutiyā arati vuccati;
tika-vin02t:765: Tatiyā khuppipāsā te, catutthī taṇhā pavuccati.
tika-vin02t:767: Sattamī vicikicchā te, makkho thambho ca aṭṭhamā.
tika-vin02t:768: “Lābho siloko sakkāro, micchāladdho ca yo yaso;
tika-vin02t:769: Yo cattānaṃ samukkaṃse, pare ca avajānati.
tika-vin02t:771: Na naṃ asūro jināti, jetvā ca labhate sukha”nti. –
tika-vin02t:773_0: Tattha yasmā āditova agāriyabhūte satte vatthukāmesu kilesakāmā mohayanti, te abhibhuyya
tika-vin02t:773_1: anagāriyabhāvaṃ upagatānaṃ pantesu vā senāsanesu aññataraññataresu vā adhikusalesu
tika-vin02t:773_2: dhammesu arati uppajjati. Vuttampi cetaṃ “pabbajitena kho, āvuso, abhirati dukkarā”ti.
tika-vin02t:773_3: Tato te parapaṭibaddhajīvikattā khuppipāsā bādhati, tāya bādhitānaṃ pariyesana taṇhā
tika-vin02t:773_4: cittaṃ kilamayati, atha nesaṃ kilantacittānaṃ thinamiddhaṃ okkamati, tato visesamanadhigacchantānaṃ
tika-vin02t:773_5: durabhisambhavesu araññavanapatthesu senāsanesu viharataṃ utrāsasaññitā bhīru jāyati,
tika-vin02t:773_7: “na siyā nu kho esa maggo”ti paṭipattiyaṃ vicikicchā uppajjati, taṃ vinodetvā viharataṃ
tika-vin02t:773_8: appamattakena visesādhigamena mānamakkhathambhā jāyanti, tepi vinodetvā viharataṃ
tika-vin02t:773_9: tato adhikataraṃ visesādhigamaṃ nissāya lābhasakkārasilokā uppajjanti, lābhādimucchitā
tika-vin02t:773_10: dhammapatirūpakāni pakāsentā micchāyasaṃ adhigantvā tattha ṭhitā jātiādīhi attānaṃ
tika-vin02t:773_11: ukkaṃsenti paraṃ vambhenti, tasmā kāmādīnaṃ paṭhamasenādibhāvo veditabbo.
tika-vin02t:774_0: Evametaṃ dasavidhaṃ senaṃ uddisitvā yasmā sā kaṇhadhammasamannāgatattā kaṇhassa namucino
tika-vin02t:774_1: upakārāya saṃvattati, tasmā naṃ “tava senā”ti niddisantena “esā namuci te senā, kaṇhassābhippahārinī”ti
tika-vin02t:774_2: vuttaṃ. Tattha abhippahārinīti samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ ghātanī nippothanī, antarāyakarīti
tika-vin02t:774_3: attho. Na naṃ asūro jināti, jetvā ca labhate sukhanti evaṃ tava senaṃ asūro kāye
tika-vin02t:774_4: ca jīvite ca sāpekkho puriso na jināti, sūro pana jināti, jetvā ca maggasukhaṃ phalasukhañca
tika-vin02t:774_5: adhigacchatīti attho. Sopi brāhmaṇoti sopi khīṇāsavabrāhmaṇo.
tika-vin02t:775_0: Idāni “tena kho pana samayena bhagavā sattāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena nisinno hoti vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedī.
tika-vin02t:775_1: Atha kho bhagavā tassa sattāhassa accayena tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhahitvā rattiyā paṭhamaṃ
tika-vin02t:775_2: yāmaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ anulomaṃ sādhukaṃ manasākāsi. Rattiyā majjhimaṃ yāmaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ
tika-vin02t:775_3: paṭilomaṃ sādhukaṃ manasākāsi. Rattiyā pacchimaṃ yāmaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ anulomapaṭilomaṃ
tika-vin02t:775_4: sādhukaṃ manasākāsī”ti evaṃ vuttāya udānapāḷiyā imissā ca khandhakapāḷiyā avirodhaṃ
tika-vin02t:775_5: dassetuṃ “udāne panā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Ettha tassa vasenāti tassa paccayākārapajānanassa
tika-vin02t:775_6: paccayakkhayādhigamassa ca vasena. Ekekameva koṭṭhāsanti anulomapaṭilomesu ekekameva
tika-vin02t:775_7: koṭṭhāsaṃ. Pāṭipadarattiyā evaṃ manasākāsīti rattiyā tīsupi yāmesu anulomapaṭilomaṃyeva
tika-vin02t:775_8: manasākāsi. Bhagavā kira ṭhapetvā ratanagharasattāhaṃ sesesu chasu sattāhesu antarantarā
tika-vin02t:775_9: dhammaṃ paccavekkhitvā yebhuyyena vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedī vihāsi, ratanagharasattāhe
tika-vin02t:775_10: pana abhidhammapavicayavaseneva vihāsi. Tasmā antarantarā dhammapaccavekkhaṇavasena
tika-vin02t:775_11: uppāditamanasikāresu pāṭipadarattiyā uppāditaṃ manasikāraṃ sandhāya imissaṃ khandhakapāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin02t:778_0: 4. Tassa sattāhassa accayenāti pallaṅkasattāhassa apagamanena. Tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhahitvāti
tika-vin02t:778_1: tato arahattaphalasamāpattisamādhito yathākālaparicchedaṃ vuṭṭhahitvā. Aññepi buddhattakarāti
tika-vin02t:778_2: visākhapuṇṇamito paṭṭhāya rattindivaṃ evaṃ niccasamāhitabhāvahetubhūtānaṃ buddhaguṇānaṃ
tika-vin02t:778_3: upari aññepi buddhattasādhakā. “Ayaṃ buddho”ti buddhabhāvassa paresaṃ vibhāvanā dhammā
tika-vin02t:778_4: kiṃ nu kho santīti yojanā. Ekaccānaṃ devatānanti yā adhigatamaggā sacchikatanirodhā
tika-vin02t:778_5: ekapadesena buddhaguṇe jānanti, tā ṭhapetvā tadaññāsaṃ devatānaṃ. Animisehīti dhammapītivipphāravasena
tika-vin02t:778_6: pasādavibhāvaniccaladalatāya nimesarahitehi. Ratanacaṅkameti devatāhi māpite ratanamayacaṅkame.
tika-vin02t:778_7: “Ratanabhūtānaṃ sattannaṃ pakaraṇānaṃ tattha ca anuttarassa dhammaratanassa sammasanena
tika-vin02t:778_8: taṃ ṭhānaṃ ratanagharacetiyaṃ nāma jāta”ntipi vadanti. Teneva aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ “ratanagharaṃ
tika-vin02t:778_9: nāma na ratanamayaṃ gehaṃ, sattannaṃ pana pakaraṇānaṃ sammasitaṭṭhānaṃ ratanagharanti
tika-vin02t:779_0: Kasmā panāyaṃ ajapālanigrodho nāma jātoti āha “tassa kirā”tiādi. Keci pana “yasmā
tika-vin02t:779_1: tattha vede sajjhāyituṃ asamatthā mahallakabrāhmaṇā pākāraparikkhepayuttāni nivesanāni
tika-vin02t:779_2: katvā sabbe vasiṃsu, tasmāssa ‘ajapālanigrodho’ti nāmaṃ jāta”nti vadanti. Tatrāyaṃ
tika-vin02t:779_3: vacanattho – na japantīti ajapā, mantānaṃ anajjhāyakāti attho. Ajapā lanti ādiyanti
tika-vin02t:779_4: nivāsaṃ etthāti ajapāloti. Apare pana vadanti “yasmā majjhanhike samaye anto paviṭṭhe
tika-vin02t:779_5: aje attano chāyāya pāleti rakkhati, tasmā ‘ajapālo’tissa nāmaṃ ruḷha”nti. Sabbathāpi
tika-vin02t:780_0: Vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedentoti dhammaṃ vicinantoyeva antarantarā vimuttisukhañca
tika-vin02t:780_1: paṭisaṃvedento. “Dhammaṃ vicinanto vimuttisukhañca paṭisaṃvedento”ti evaṃ vā ettha
tika-vin02t:780_2: pāṭho gahetabbo. Udānaṭṭhakathāyampi hi ayameva pāṭho. Dhammaṃ vicinanto cettha evaṃ
tika-vin02t:780_3: abhidhamme nayamaggaṃ sammasi paṭhamaṃ dhammasaṅgaṇīpakaraṇaṃ nāma, tato vibhaṅgappakaraṇaṃ,
tika-vin02t:780_4: dhātukathāpakaraṇaṃ, puggalapaññattippakaraṇaṃ, kathāvatthuṃ nāma, yamakaṃ nāma,
tika-vin02t:780_5: tato mahāpakaraṇaṃ paṭṭhānaṃ nāmāti. Tatthassa saṇhasukhumaṭṭhānamhi citte otiṇṇe
tika-vin02t:780_6: pīti uppajji, pītiyā uppannāya lohitaṃ pasīdi, lohite pasanne chavi pasīdi, chaviyā
tika-vin02t:780_7: pasannāya puratthimakāyato kūṭāgārādippamāṇā rasmiyo uṭṭhahitvā ākāse pakkhandaṃ
tika-vin02t:780_8: chaddantanāgakulaṃ viya pācīnadisāya anantāni cakkavāḷāni pakkhandā. Pacchimakāyato
tika-vin02t:780_9: uṭṭhahitvā pacchimadisāya, dakkhiṇaṃsakūṭato uṭṭhahitvā dakkhiṇadisāya, vāmaṃsakūṭato
tika-vin02t:780_10: uṭṭhahitvā uttaradisāya anantāni cakkavāḷāni pakkhandā. Pādatalehi pavāḷaṅkuravaṇṇā
tika-vin02t:780_11: rasmiyo nikkhamitvā mahāpathaviṃ vinibbijjha udakaṃ dvidhā bhinditvā vātakkhandhaṃ
tika-vin02t:780_12: padāletvā ajaṭākāsaṃ pakkhandā. Sīsato saṃparivattiyamānaṃ maṇidāmaṃ viya nīlavaṇṇarasmivaṭṭi
tika-vin02t:780_13: uṭṭhahitvā cha devaloke vinivijjhitvā nava brahmaloke atikkamma ajaṭākāsaṃ pakkhandā.
tika-vin02t:780_14: Tasmiṃ divase aparimāṇesu cakkavāḷesu aparimāṇā sattā sabbe suvaṇṇavaṇṇāva ahesuṃ.
tika-vin02t:780_15: Taṃ divasañca pana bhagavato sarīrā nikkhantā yāvajjadivasāpi kira tā rasmiyo anantalokadhātuyo
tika-vin02t:780_16: gacchantiyeva. Na kevalañca imasmiṃyeva sattāhe dhammaṃ vicinantassa sarīrato rasmiyo
tika-vin02t:780_17: nikkhamiṃsu, atha kho ratanagharasattāhepi paṭṭhānaṃ sammasantassa evameva sarīrato
tika-vin02t:782_0: “Imesu ca ekavīsatiyā divasesu ekadivasepi satthu sarīrato rasmiyo na nikkhantā,
tika-vin02t:782_1: catutthe pana sattāhe pacchimuttarāya disāya ratanaghare nisīdi. Tattha dhammasaṅgaṇiṃ
tika-vin02t:782_2: sammasantassapi sarīrato rasmiyo na nikkhantā. Vibhaṅgappakaraṇaṃ, dhātukathaṃ, puggalapaññattiṃ,
tika-vin02t:782_3: kathāvatthuppakaraṇaṃ, yamakappakaraṇaṃ sammasantassapi rasmiyo na nikkhantā. Yadā
tika-vin02t:782_4: pana mahāpakaraṇaṃ oruyha ‘hetupaccayo ārammaṇapaccayo…pe… avigatapaccayo’ti sammasanaṃ
tika-vin02t:782_5: ārabhi, athassa catuvīsatisamantapaṭṭhānaṃ sammasantassa ekantato sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:782_6: mahāpakaraṇe okāsaṃ labhi. Yathā hi timirapiṅgalamahāmaccho caturāsītiyojanasahassagambhīre
tika-vin02t:782_7: mahāsamuddeyeva okāsaṃ labhati, evameva sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ ekantato mahāpakaraṇeyeva okāsaṃ labhi.
tika-vin02t:783_0: “Satthu evaṃ laddhokāsena sabbaññutaññāṇena yathāsukhaṃ saṇhasukhumadhammaṃ sammasantassa
tika-vin02t:783_2: Kesamassūhi ceva akkhīnañca nīlaṭṭhānehi nīlarasmiyo nikkhamiṃsu, yāsaṃ vasena gaganatalaṃ
tika-vin02t:783_4: viya sampasāritamecakapaṭaṃ viya ca ahosi. Chavito ceva akkhīnañca pītaṭṭhānehi pītarasmiyo
tika-vin02t:783_5: nikkhamiṃsu, yāsaṃ vasena disābhāgā suvaṇṇarasanisiñcamānā viya suvaṇṇapaṭapasāritā
tika-vin02t:783_6: viya kuṅkumacuṇṇakaṇikārapupphasamparikiṇṇā viya ca virociṃsu. Maṃsalohitehi ceva
tika-vin02t:783_7: akkhīnañca rattaṭṭhānehi lohitarasmiyo nikkhamiṃsu, yāsaṃ vasena disābhāgā cīnapiṭṭhacuṇṇarañjitā
tika-vin02t:783_9: viya ca virociṃsu. Aṭṭhīhi ceva dantehi ca akkhīnañca setaṭṭhānehi odātarasmiyo nikkhamiṃsu,
tika-vin02t:783_10: yāsaṃ vasena disābhāgā rajatakuṭehi āsiñcamānakhīradhārāsamparikiṇṇā viya pasāritarajatapaṭavitānā
tika-vin02t:783_12: viya ca virociṃsu. Mañjiṭṭhapabhassarā pana tamhā tamhā sarīrappadesā nikkhamiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:783_13: Iti tā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo nikkhamitvā ghanamahāpathaviṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:784_1: ahosi. Pathaviṃ bhinditvā heṭṭhā udakaṃ gaṇhiṃsu. Pathavīsandhārakaṃ aṭṭhanahutādhikacatuyojanasatasahassabahalaṃ
tika-vin02t:784_2: udakaṃ suvaṇṇakalasehi āsiñcamānavilīnasuvaṇṇaṃ viya ahosi. Udakaṃ vinivijjhitvā
tika-vin02t:784_4: viya ahosi. Vātaṃ vinivijjhitvā heṭṭhā ajaṭākāsaṃ pakkhandiṃsu. Uparibhāgena uggantvāpi
tika-vin02t:784_5: catumahārājike gaṇhiṃsu. Te vinivijjhitvā tāvatiṃse, tato yāme, tato tusite, tato
tika-vin02t:784_6: nimmānaratī, tato paranimmitavasavattī, tato nava brahmaloke, tato vehapphale, tato
tika-vin02t:784_7: pañca suddhāvāse vinivijjhitvā cattāro āruppe gaṇhiṃsu. Cattāro ca āruppe vinivijjhitvā
tika-vin02t:785_0: “Tiriyabhāgehi anantā lokadhātuyo pakkhandiṃsu, ettake ṭhāne candamhi candappabhā
tika-vin02t:785_1: natthi, sūriye sūriyappabhā natthi, tārakarūpesu tārakarūpappabhā natthi, devatānaṃ
tika-vin02t:785_2: uyyānavimānakapparukkhesu sarīre ābharaṇesūti sabbattha pabhā natthi. Tisahassimahāsahassilokadhātuyā
tika-vin02t:785_3: ālokapharaṇasamattho mahābrahmāpi sūriyuggamane khajjopanako viya ahosi, candasūriyatārakarūpadevatuyyānavimānakapparukkhānaṃ
tika-vin02t:785_4: paricchedamattakameva paññāyittha. Ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ buddharasmīhiyeva ajjhotthaṭaṃ
tika-vin02t:785_5: ahosi. Ayañca neva buddhānaṃ adhiṭṭhāniddhi, na bhāvanāmayiddhi. Saṇhasukhumadhammaṃ
tika-vin02t:785_6: pana sammasato lokanāthassa lohitaṃ pasīdi, vatthurūpaṃ pasīdi, chavivaṇṇo pasīdi.
tika-vin02t:785_7: Cittasamuṭṭhānā vaṇṇadhātu samantā asītihatthamatte padese niccalā aṭṭhāsī”ti.
tika-vin02t:786_0: Evaṃ nisinneti tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhahitvā nisinne. Eko brāhmaṇoti nāmagottavasena
tika-vin02t:786_1: anabhiññāto apākaṭo eko brāhmaṇo. “Huṃ hu”nti karonto vicaratīti sabbaṃ acokkhajātikaṃ
tika-vin02t:786_2: passitvā jigucchanto “huṃ hu”nti karonto vicarati. Etadavocāti etaṃ idāni vattabbaṃ
tika-vin02t:786_3: “kittāvatā nu kho”tiādivacanaṃ avoca. Tattha kittāvatāti kittakena pamāṇena. Nu-ti
tika-vin02t:786_4: saṃsayatthe nipāto, kho-ti padapūraṇe. Bho-ti brāhmaṇānaṃ jātisamudāgataṃ ālapanaṃ.
tika-vin02t:786_5: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “bhovādi nāma so hoti, sace hoti sakiñcano”ti. Gotamāti bhagavantaṃ
tika-vin02t:786_6: gottena ālapati. Kathaṃ panāyaṃ brāhmaṇo sampati samāgato bhagavato gottaṃ jānātīti?
tika-vin02t:786_7: Nāyaṃ sampati samāgato, chabbassāni padhānakaraṇakāle upaṭṭhahantehi pañcavaggiyehi
tika-vin02t:786_8: saddhiṃ caramāno aparabhāge taṃ vataṃ chaḍḍetvā uruvelāyaṃ senanigame eko adutiyo
tika-vin02t:786_9: hutvā piṇḍāya caramānopi tena brāhmaṇena diṭṭhapubbo ceva sallapitapubbo ca, tena
tika-vin02t:786_10: so pubbe pañcavaggiyehi gayhamānaṃ bhagavato gottaṃ anussaranto “bho gotamā”ti bhagavantaṃ
tika-vin02t:786_11: gottena ālapati. Yato paṭṭhāya vā bhagavā mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhanto anomānadītīre
tika-vin02t:786_12: pabbaji, tato pabhuti “samaṇo gotamo”ti cando viya sūriyo viya pākaṭo paññāto hoti,
tika-vin02t:786_13: na ca tassa gottajānane kāraṇaṃ gavesitabbaṃ. Brāhmaṇakaraṇāti brāhmaṇaṃ karontīti
tika-vin02t:786_14: brāhmaṇakaraṇā, brāhmaṇabhāvakarāti attho. Ettha ca “kittāvatā”ti etena yehi dhammehi
tika-vin02t:786_15: brāhmaṇo hoti, tesaṃ dhammānaṃ parimāṇaṃ pucchati. “Katame”ti pana iminā tesaṃ sarūpaṃ pucchati.
tika-vin02t:787_0: Udānaṃ udānesīti “yo brāhmaṇo”tiādikaṃ udānaṃ udānesi, na pana tassa brāhmaṇassa
tika-vin02t:787_1: dhammaṃ desesi. Kasmā? Dhammadesanāya abhājanabhāvato. Tathā hi tassa brāhmaṇassa
tika-vin02t:787_2: imaṃ gāthaṃ sutvā na saccābhisamayo ahosi. Yathā ca imassa, evaṃ upakassa ājīvakassa
tika-vin02t:787_3: buddhaguṇappakāsanaṃ sutvā. Dhammacakkappavattanato hi pubbabhāge bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ
tika-vin02t:787_4: paresaṃ suṇantānampi tapussabhallikānaṃ saraṇadānaṃ viya vāsanābhāgiyameva jātaṃ,
tika-vin02t:787_5: na asekkhabhāgiyaṃ vā nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ vā. Esā hi dhammatāti. Vedehi vā antanti ettha
tika-vin02t:787_6: antaṃ nāma sabbasaṅkhārapariyosānaṃ nibbānaṃ. Ime ussadā natthīti sabbaso ime pahīnattā na santi.
tika-vin02t:790_0: 5. Mucalindamūleti ettha mucalindo vuccati nīparukkho, yo “niculo”tipi vuccati, tassa
tika-vin02t:790_1: samīpeti attho. Keci pana “mucaloti tassa rukkhassa nāmaṃ, vanajeṭṭhakatāya pana
tika-vin02t:790_2: mucalindoti vutta”nti vadanti. Udapādīti sakalacakkavāḷagabbhaṃ pūrento mahāmegho
tika-vin02t:790_3: udapādi. Evarūpo kira megho dvīsuyeva kālesu vassati cakkavattimhi vā uppanne buddhe
tika-vin02t:790_4: vā, idha buddhuppādakāle udapādi. Pokkharaṇiyā nibbattoti pokkharaṇiyā heṭṭhā nāgabhavanaṃ
tika-vin02t:790_5: atthi, tattha nibbatto. Sakabhavanāti attano nāgabhavanato. Evaṃ bhogehi parikkhipitvāti
tika-vin02t:790_6: satta vāre attano sarīrabhogehi bhagavato kāyaṃ parivāretvā. Uparimuddhani mahantaṃ
tika-vin02t:790_7: phaṇaṃ vihaccāti bhagavato muddhappadesassa upari attano mahantaṃ phaṇaṃ pasāretvā.
tika-vin02t:791_0: Tassa kira nāgarājassa etadahosi “bhagavā ca mayhaṃ bhavanasamīpe rukkhamūle nisinno,
tika-vin02t:791_1: ayañca sattāhavaddalikā vattati, vāsāgāramassa laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. So sattaratanamayaṃ
tika-vin02t:791_2: pāsādaṃ nimminituṃ sakkontopi “evaṃ kate kāyasāro gahito na bhavissati, dasabalassa
tika-vin02t:791_3: kāyaveyyāvaccaṃ karissāmī”ti mahantaṃ attabhāvaṃ katvā satthāraṃ sattakkhattuṃ bhogehi
tika-vin02t:791_4: parikkhipitvā upari phaṇaṃ dhāresi. “Tassa parikkhepabbhantaraṃ lohapāsāde bhaṇḍāgāragabbhappamāṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:792_0: “Parikkhepassa anto okāso heṭṭhā lohapāsādappamāṇo ahosi, ‘icchiticchitena iriyāpathena
tika-vin02t:792_1: satthā viharissatī’ti nāgarājassa ajjhāsayo ahosi, tasmā evaṃ mahantaṃ okāsaṃ parikkhipi,
tika-vin02t:792_2: majjhe ratanapallaṅko paññatto hoti, upari suvaṇṇatārakavicittaṃ samosaritagandhadāmakusumacelavitānaṃ
tika-vin02t:792_3: ahosi, catūsu koṇesu gandhatelena dīpā jalitā, catūsu disāsu vivaritvā candanakaraṇḍakā ṭhapitā”ti –
tika-vin02t:793: Vuttaṃ. Icchiticchitena iriyāpathena viharissatīti ca nāgarājassa ajjhāsayamattametaṃ, bhagavā pana yathānisinnova sattāhaṃ vītināmesi.
tika-vin02t:794_0: Kiñcāpi…pe… cintetuṃ yuttanti ettha keci vadanti “uṇhaggahaṇaṃ bhogaparikkhepassa
tika-vin02t:794_1: vipulabhāvakaraṇe kāraṇakittanaṃ. Khuddake hi tasmiṃ bhagavantaṃ nāgarājassa sarīrasambhūtā
tika-vin02t:794_2: usmā bādheyya, vipulabhāvakaraṇena pana tādisaṃ mā uṇhaṃ bādhayitthā”ti. Saupasaggapadassa
tika-vin02t:794_3: attho upasaggena vināpi viññāyatīti āha “viddhanti ubbiddha”nti, sā cassa ubbiddhatā
tika-vin02t:794_4: upakkilesavigamena dūrabhāvena upaṭṭhānanti āha “meghavigamena dūrībhūta”nti. Indanīlamaṇi
tika-vin02t:794_5: viya dibbati jotatīti devo, ākāso. Viditvāti “idāni vigatavalāhako ākāso, natthi
tika-vin02t:794_6: bhagavato sītādiupaddavo”ti ñatvā. Viniveṭhetvāti apanetvā. Attano rūpanti attano
tika-vin02t:795_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti “vivekasukhapaṭisaṃvedino yattha katthaci sukhameva hotī”ti
tika-vin02t:795_1: etaṃ atthaṃ sabbākārena jānitvā. Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ vivekasukhānubhāvadīpakaṃ udānaṃ
tika-vin02t:795_2: udānesi. Sutadhammassāti vissutadhammassa. Tenāha “pakāsitadhammassā”ti. Akuppanabhāvoti akuppanasabhāvo.
tika-vin02t:798_0: 6. Osadhaharītakaṃ upanesīti na kevalaṃ osadhaharītakameva, dantakaṭṭhampi upanesi.
tika-vin02t:798_1: Paccaggheti ettha purimaṃ atthavikappaṃ keci na icchanti, teneva ācariyadhammapālattherena
tika-vin02t:798_2: vuttaṃ “paccaggheti abhinave. Paccekaṃ mahagghatāya paccaggheti keci, taṃ na sundaraṃ.
tika-vin02t:798_3: Na hi buddhā bhagavanto mahagghaṃ paṭiggaṇhanti paribhuñjanti vā”ti.
tika-vin02t:801_0: 7. Āciṇṇasamāciṇṇoti ācarito ceva ācarantehi ca sammadeva ācaritoti attho. Etena
tika-vin02t:801_1: ayaṃ parivitakko sabbabuddhānaṃ paṭhamābhisambodhiyaṃ uppajjatevāti ayamettha dhammatāti
tika-vin02t:801_2: dasseti. Gambhīropi dhammo paṭipakkhavidhamanena supākaṭo bhaveyya, paṭipakkhavidhamanaṃ
tika-vin02t:801_3: pana sammāpaṭipattipaṭibaddhaṃ, sā saddhammasavanādhīnā, taṃ satthari dhamme ca pasādāyattaṃ.
tika-vin02t:801_4: So visesato loke sambhāvanīyassa garukātabbassa abhipatthanāhetukoti paramparāya
tika-vin02t:801_5: sattānaṃ dhammasampaṭipattiyā brahmuno yācanānimittanti taṃ dassento “brahmunā yācite
tika-vin02t:802_0: Adhigatoti paṭividdho, sayambhūñāṇena “idaṃ dukkha”ntiādinā yathābhūtaṃ avabuddhoti
tika-vin02t:802_1: attho. Dhammoti catusaccadhammo tabbinimuttassa paṭivijjhitabbadhammassa abhāvato.
tika-vin02t:802_2: Gambhīroti mahāsamuddo viya makasatuṇḍasūciyā aññatra samupacitaparipakkañāṇasambhārehi
tika-vin02t:802_3: aññesaṃ ñāṇena alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭho. Gambhīrattāva duddaso dukkhena daṭṭhabbo, na
tika-vin02t:802_4: sakkā sukhena daṭṭhuṃ. Yo hi alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭho, so ogāhituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya sarūpato
tika-vin02t:802_5: ca visesato ca sukhena passituṃ na sakkā, atha kho kicchena kenaci kadācideva daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin02t:802_6: Duddasattāva duranubodho dukkhena avabujjhitabbo, na sakkā sukhena avabujjhituṃ.
tika-vin02t:802_7: Yañhi daṭṭhumeva na sakkā, tassa ogāhetvā anubujjhane kathā eva natthi avabodhassa
tika-vin02t:802_8: dukkarabhāvato. Imasmiṃ ṭhāne “taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, katamaṃ nu kho dukkarataraṃ
tika-vin02t:803_0: Santoti anupasantasabhāvānaṃ kilesānaṃ saṅkhārānañca abhāvato vūpasantasabbapariḷāhatāya
tika-vin02t:803_1: santo nibbuto, santārammaṇatāya vā santo. Ettha ca nirodhasaccaṃ santaṃ ārammaṇanti
tika-vin02t:803_2: santārammaṇaṃ, maggasaccaṃ santaṃ santārammaṇañcāti santārammaṇaṃ. Padhānabhāvaṃ
tika-vin02t:803_3: nītoti paṇīto. Atha vā paṇītoti atittikaraṇaṭṭhena atappako sādurasabhojanaṃ viya.
tika-vin02t:803_4: Santapaṇītabhāveneva cettha asecanakatāya atappakatā daṭṭhabbā. Idañhi dvayaṃ lokuttarameva
tika-vin02t:803_5: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Atakkāvacaroti uttamañāṇavisayattā takkena avacaritabbo ogāhitabbo
tika-vin02t:803_6: na hoti, ñāṇeneva avacaritabbo. Tato eva nipuṇañāṇagocaratāya saṇhasukhumasabhāvattā
tika-vin02t:803_7: ca nipuṇo saṇho. Paṇḍitavedanīyoti bālānaṃ avisayattā sammāpaṭipadaṃ paṭipannehi
tika-vin02t:804_0: Allīyanti abhiramitabbaṭṭhena seviyantīti ālayā, pañca kāmaguṇāti āha “sattā pañcakāmaguṇe
tika-vin02t:804_1: allīyanti, tasmā te ālayāti vuccantī”ti. Tattha pañcakāmaguṇe allīyantīti pañcakāmaguṇe
tika-vin02t:804_2: sevantīti attho. Teti pañca kāmaguṇā. Ramantīti ratiṃ vindanti kīḷanti laḷanti. Ālīyanti
tika-vin02t:804_3: abhiramaṇavasena sevantīti ālayā, aṭṭhasataṃ taṇhāvicaritāni, tehi ālayehi ramantīti
tika-vin02t:804_4: ālayarāmāti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Ime hi sattā yathā kāmaguṇe, evaṃ rāgampi
tika-vin02t:804_6: uyyānaṃ paviṭṭho rājā tāya tāya sampattiyā ramati, sammudito āmoditapamodito hoti,
tika-vin02t:804_7: na ukkaṇṭhati, sāyampi nikkhamituṃ na icchati, evamimehi kāmālayataṇhālayehi sattā
tika-vin02t:804_8: ramanti, saṃsāravaṭṭe sammoditā anukkaṇṭhitā vasanti. Tena nesaṃ bhagavā duvidhampi
tika-vin02t:804_9: ālayaṃ uyyānabhūmiṃ viya dassento “ālayarāmā”tiādimāha. Ratāti niratā. Suṭṭhu muditāti
tika-vin02t:805_0: Ṭhānaṃ sandhāyāti ṭhānasaddaṃ sandhāya. Atthato pana ṭhānanti ca paṭiccasamuppādo
tika-vin02t:805_1: eva adhippeto. Tiṭṭhati ettha phalaṃ tadāyattavuttitāyāti ṭhānaṃ, saṅkhārādīnaṃ paccayabhūtā
tika-vin02t:805_2: avijjādayo. Imesaṃ saṅkhārādīnaṃ paccayāti idappaccayā, avijjādayova. Idappaccayā
tika-vin02t:805_3: eva idappaccayatā yathā devo eva devatā. Idappaccayānaṃ vā avijjādīnaṃ attano phalaṃ
tika-vin02t:805_4: paṭicca paccayabhāvo uppādanasamatthatā idappaccayatā. Tena samatthapaccayalakkhaṇo
tika-vin02t:805_5: paṭiccasamuppādo dassito hoti. Paṭicca samuppajjati phalaṃ etasmāti paṭiccasamuppādo.
tika-vin02t:805_6: Padadvayenapi dhammānaṃ paccayaṭṭho eva vibhāvito. Saṅkhārādipaccayānañhi avijjādīnaṃ
tika-vin02t:805_8: atthato nibbānameva. Yasmā hi taṃ āgamma paṭicca ariyamaggassa ārammaṇapaccayabhāvahetu
tika-vin02t:805_10: vuccati. Sabbasaṅkhatavisaṃyutte hi nibbāne saṅkhāravūpasamapariyāyo ñāyāgatoyevāti.
tika-vin02t:805_11: Idaṃ panettha nibbacanaṃ – sabbe saṅkhārā sammanti etthāti sabbasaṅkhārasamathoti.
tika-vin02t:806_0: Yasmā ca taṃ āgamma sabbe upadhayo paṭinissaṭṭhā samucchedavasena pariccattā honti,
tika-vin02t:806_1: aṭṭhasatappabhedā sabbāpi taṇhā khīyanti, sabbe kilesarāgā virajjanti, jarāmaraṇādibhedaṃ
tika-vin02t:806_2: sabbaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ nirujjhati, tasmā “sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhākkhayo virāgo
tika-vin02t:806_3: nirodho”ti vuccati, yā panesā taṇhā tena tena bhavena bhavantaraṃ bhavanikantibhāvena
tika-vin02t:806_4: vinati saṃsibbati, phalena vā saddhiṃ kammaṃ vinati saṃsibbatīti katvā vānanti vuccati,
tika-vin02t:806_5: tato nikkhantaṃ vānatoti nibbānaṃ. Kilamathoti kāyakilamatho. Vihesāpi kāyavihesāyeva,
tika-vin02t:806_6: citte pana ubhayampetaṃ buddhānaṃ natthi bodhimūleyeva samucchinnattā. Ettha ca ciranisajjācirabhāsanehi
tika-vin02t:806_7: piṭṭhiāgilāyanatālugalasosādivasena kāyakilamatho ceva kāyavihesā ca veditabbā, sā
tika-vin02t:806_8: ca kho desanāya atthaṃ ajānantānañca appaṭipajjantānañca vasena. Jānantānaṃ pana
tika-vin02t:806_9: paṭipajjantānañca desanāya kāyaparissamopi satthu aparissamova, tenāha bhagavā “na
tika-vin02t:806_10: ca maṃ dhammādhikaraṇaṃ vihesetī”ti. Teneva vuttaṃ “yā ajānantānaṃ desanā nāma, so
tika-vin02t:807_0: Apissūti sampiṇḍanatthe nipāto. So na kevalaṃ etadahosi, imāpi gāthā paṭibhaṃsūti
tika-vin02t:807_1: dīpeti. Bhagavantanti paṭisaddayogena sāmiatthe upayogavacananti āha “bhagavato”ti.
tika-vin02t:807_2: Vuddhippattā acchariyā vā anacchariyā. Vuddhiatthopi hi a-kāro hoti yathā “asekkhā
tika-vin02t:807_3: dhammā”ti. Kappānaṃ cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni satasahassañca sadevakassa lokassa dhammasaṃvibhāgakaraṇatthameva
tika-vin02t:807_4: pāramiyo pūretvā idāni samadhigatadhammarajjassa tattha appossukkatāpattidīpanattā
tika-vin02t:807_5: gāthātthassa anuacchariyatā tassa vuddhippatti ca veditabbā. Atthadvārena hi gāthānaṃ
tika-vin02t:807_6: anacchariyatā. Gocarā ahesunti upaṭṭhahaṃsu, upaṭṭhānañca vitakkayitabbatāti āha
tika-vin02t:808_0: Kicchenāti na dukkhappaṭipadāya. Buddhānañhi cattāropi maggā sukhappaṭipadāva honti.
tika-vin02t:808_1: Pāramīpūraṇakāle pana sarāgasadosasamohasseva sato āgatāgatānaṃ yācakānaṃ alaṅkatappaṭiyattaṃ
tika-vin02t:808_2: sīsaṃ kantitvā galalohitaṃ nīharitvā suañjitāni akkhīni uppāṭetvā kulavaṃsappadīpaṃ
tika-vin02t:808_3: puttaṃ manāpacāriniṃ bhariyanti evamādīni dentassa aññāni ca khantivādisadisesu attabhāvesu
tika-vin02t:808_4: chejjabhejjādīni pāpuṇantassa āgamanīyapaṭipadaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Ha-iti vā byattanti
tika-vin02t:808_5: etasmiṃ atthe nipāto. Ekaṃsattheti keci. Ha byattaṃ ekaṃsena vā alaṃ nippayojanaṃ
tika-vin02t:808_6: evaṃ kicchena adhigataṃ dhammaṃ desetunti yojanā. Halanti vā alanti iminā samānatthaṃ
tika-vin02t:808_7: padaṃ “halanti vadāmī”tiādīsu viya. “Pakāsita”ntipi paṭhanti, desitanti attho. Evaṃ
tika-vin02t:808_8: kicchena adhigatassa dhammassa alaṃ desitaṃ pariyattaṃ desitaṃ, ko attho desitenāti
tika-vin02t:808_9: vuttaṃ hoti. Rāgadosaparetehīti rāgadosaphuṭṭhehi, phuṭṭhavisena viya sappena rāgena
tika-vin02t:808_10: dosena ca samphuṭṭhehi abhibhūtehīti attho. Atha vā rāgadosaparetehīti rāgadosānugatehi,
tika-vin02t:808_11: rāgena ca dosena ca anubandhehīti attho.
tika-vin02t:809_0: Paṭisotagāminti niccagāhādīnaṃ paṭisotaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā asubhanti evaṃ gataṃ
tika-vin02t:809_1: pavattaṃ catusaccadhammanti attho. Rāgarattāti kāmarāgena bhavarāgena diṭṭhirāgena
tika-vin02t:809_2: ca rattā. Na dakkhantīti aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā asubhanti iminā sabhāvena na passissanti,
tika-vin02t:809_3: te apassante ko sakkhissati aniccantiādinā sabhāvena yāthāvato dhammaṃ jānāpetunti
tika-vin02t:809_4: adhippāyo. Rāgadosaparetatāpi nesaṃ sammuḷhabhāvenevāti āha “tamokhandhena āvuṭā”ti,
tika-vin02t:810: Appossukkatāya cittaṃ namatīti kasmā panassa evaṃ cittaṃ nami, nanu esa “muttohaṃ mocessāmi, tiṇṇohaṃ tāressāmi,
tika-vin02t:813_0: Patthanaṃ katvā pāramiyo pūretvā sabbaññutaṃ pattoti? Saccameva, tadeva paccavekkhaṇānubhāvena
tika-vin02t:813_1: panassa evaṃ cittaṃ nami. Tassa hi sabbaññutaṃ patvā sattānaṃ kilesagahanataṃ dhammassa
tika-vin02t:813_2: ca gambhīrataṃ paccavekkhantassa sattānaṃ kilesagahanatā ca dhammagambhīratā ca sabbākārena
tika-vin02t:813_3: pākaṭā jātā. Athassa “ime sattā kañjiyapuṇṇalābu viya takkabharitacāṭi viya vasātelapītapilotikā
tika-vin02t:813_4: viya añjanamakkhitahattho viya ca kilesabharitā atisaṃkiliṭṭhā rāgarattā dosaduṭṭhā
tika-vin02t:813_5: mohamuḷhā, te kiṃ nāma paṭivijjhissantī”ti cintayato kilesagahanapaccavekkhaṇānubhāvenapi evaṃ cittaṃ nami.
tika-vin02t:814_0: “Ayaṃ dhammo pathavīsandhārakaudakakkhandho viya gambhīro, pabbatena paṭicchādetvā
tika-vin02t:814_1: ṭhapito sāsapo viya duddaso, satadhā bhinnassa vālassa koṭi viya aṇu. Mayā hi imaṃ
tika-vin02t:814_2: dhammaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ vāyamantena adinnaṃ dānaṃ nāma natthi, arakkhitaṃ sīlaṃ nāma
tika-vin02t:814_3: natthi, aparipūritā kāci pāramī nāma natthi, tassa me nirussāhaṃ viya mārabalaṃ vidhamantassapi
tika-vin02t:814_4: pathavī na kampittha, paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsaṃ anussarantassapi na kampittha, majjhimayāme
tika-vin02t:814_5: dibbacakkhuṃ visodhentassapi na kampittha, pacchimayāme pana paṭiccasamuppādaṃ paṭivijjhantasseva
tika-vin02t:814_6: me dasasahassilokadhātu kampittha. Iti mādisenapi tikkhañāṇena kicchenevāyaṃ dhammo
tika-vin02t:814_7: paṭividdho, taṃ lokiyamahājanā kathaṃ paṭivijjhissantī”ti dhammagambhīratāya paccavekkhaṇānubhāvenapi
tika-vin02t:815_0: Apica brahmunā yācite desetukāmatāyapissa evaṃ cittaṃ nami. Jānāti hi bhagavā “mama
tika-vin02t:815_1: appossukkatāya citte namamāne mahābrahmā dhammadesanaṃ yācissati, ime ca sattā brahmagarukā,
tika-vin02t:815_2: te ‘satthā kira dhammaṃ na desetukāmo ahosi, atha naṃ mahābrahmā yācitvā desāpeti,
tika-vin02t:815_3: santo vata bho dhammo paṇīto’ti maññamānā sussūsissantī”ti. Idampissa kāraṇaṃ paṭicca
tika-vin02t:815_4: appossukkatāya cittaṃ nami, no dhammadesanāyāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:816_0: 8. Sahampatissāti so kira kassapassa bhagavato sāsane sahako nāma thero paṭhamajjhānaṃ
tika-vin02t:816_1: nibbattetvā paṭhamajjhānabhūmiyaṃ kappāyukabrahmā hutvā nibbatto, tatra naṃ sahampati
tika-vin02t:816_2: brahmāti sañjānanti. Taṃ sandhāyāha “brahmuno sahampatissā”ti. Nassati vatāti so
tika-vin02t:816_3: kira imaṃ saddaṃ tathā nicchāreti, yathā dasasahassilokadhātubrahmāno sutvā sabbe
tika-vin02t:816_4: sannipatiṃsu. Apparajakkhajātikāti paññāmaye akkhimhi appaṃ parittaṃ rāgadosamoharajaṃ
tika-vin02t:816_5: etesaṃ evaṃsabhāvāti apparajakkhajātikā. Appaṃ rāgādirajaṃ yesaṃ te sabhāvā apparajakkhajātikāti
tika-vin02t:816_6: evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Assavanatāti “sayaṃ abhiññā”tiādīsu viya karaṇatthe paccattavacanaṃ,
tika-vin02t:816_7: assavanatāyāti attho. Bhavissantīti purimabuddhesu dasapuññakiriyavasena katādhikārā
tika-vin02t:816_8: paripākagatapadumāni viya sūriyarasmisamphassaṃ dhammadesanaṃyeva ākaṅkhamānā catuppadikagāthāvasāne
tika-vin02t:816_9: ariyabhūmiṃ okkamanārahā na eko, na dve, anekasatasahassā dhammassa aññātāro bhavissantīti dasseti.
tika-vin02t:817_0: Pāturahosīti pātubhavi. Samalehi cintitoti samalehi pūraṇakassapādīhi chahi satthārehi
tika-vin02t:817_1: cintito. Te hi puretaraṃ uppajjitvā sakalajambudīpe kaṇṭake pattharamānā viya visaṃ
tika-vin02t:817_2: siñcamānā viya ca samalaṃ micchādiṭṭhidhammaṃ desayiṃsu. Te kira buddhakolāhalānussavena
tika-vin02t:817_3: sañjātakutūhalā lokaṃ vañcetvā kohaññe ṭhatvā sabbaññutaṃ paṭijānantā yaṃ kiñci adhammaṃyeva
tika-vin02t:817_4: dhammoti dīpesuṃ. Apāpuretanti vivara etaṃ. Amatassa dvāranti amatassa nibbānassa
tika-vin02t:817_5: dvārabhūtaṃ ariyamaggaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – etaṃ kassapassa bhagavato sāsanantaradhānato
tika-vin02t:817_6: pabhuti pihitaṃ nibbānanagarassa mahādvāraṃ ariyamaggaṃ saddhammadesanāhatthena apāpura
tika-vin02t:817_7: vivara ugghāṭehīti. Suṇantu dhammaṃ vimalenānubuddhanti ime sattā rāgādimalānaṃ abhāvato
tika-vin02t:817_8: vimalena sammāsambuddhena anubuddhaṃ catusaccadhammaṃ suṇantu tāva bhagavāti yācati.
tika-vin02t:818_0: Selapabbato ucco hoti thiro ca, na paṃsupabbato missakapabbato vāti āha “sele yathā
tika-vin02t:818_2: Na hi tattha ṭhitassa dassanatthaṃ gīvukkhipanapasāraṇādikiccaṃ atthī”ti. Tathūpamanti
tika-vin02t:818_3: tappaṭibhāgaṃ selapabbatūpamaṃ. Dhammamayaṃ pāsādanti lokuttaradhammamāha. So hi
tika-vin02t:818_4: sabbaso pasādāvaho sabbadhamme atikkamma abbhuggataṭṭhena pāsādasadiso ca, paññāpariyāyo
tika-vin02t:818_5: vā idha dhamma-saddo. Paññā hi abbhuggataṭṭhena pāsādoti abhidhamme niddiṭṭhā. Tathā cāha –
tika-vin02t:821_0: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepattho – yathā selapabbatamuddhani yathāṭhitova cakkhumā puriso
tika-vin02t:821_1: samantato janataṃ passeyya, tathā tvampi sumedha sundarapañña sabbaññutaññāṇena samantacakkhu
tika-vin02t:821_2: bhagavā dhammamayaṃ paññāmayaṃ pāsādamāruyha sayaṃ apetasoko sokāvatiṇṇaṃ jātijarābhibhūtaṃ
tika-vin02t:821_3: janataṃ avekkhassu upadhāraya upaparikkhāti. Ayaṃ panettha adhippāyo – yathā hi pabbatapāde
tika-vin02t:821_4: samantā mahantaṃ khettaṃ katvā tattha kedārapāḷīsu kuṭikāyo katvā rattiṃ aggiṃ jāleyyuṃ,
tika-vin02t:821_5: caturaṅgasamannāgatañca andhakāraṃ assa, atha tassa pabbatassa matthake ṭhatvā cakkhumato
tika-vin02t:821_6: purisassa bhūmiṃ olokayato neva khettaṃ, na kedārapāḷiyo, na kuṭiyo, na tattha sayitamanussā
tika-vin02t:821_7: paññāyeyyuṃ anujjalabhāvato, kuṭikāsu pana aggijālāmattameva paññāyeyya ujjalabhāvato,
tika-vin02t:821_8: evaṃ dhammapāsādaṃ āruyha sattanikāyaṃ olokayato tathāgatassa ye te akatakalyāṇā
tika-vin02t:821_9: sattā, te ekavihāre dakkhiṇajāṇupasse nisinnāpi buddhacakkhussa āpāthaṃ nāgacchanti
tika-vin02t:821_10: ñāṇagginā anujjalabhāvato anuḷārabhāvato ca, rattiṃ khittā sarā viya honti. Ye pana
tika-vin02t:821_11: katakalyāṇā veneyyapuggalā, te evassa dūrepi ṭhitā āpāthamāgacchanti paripakkañāṇaggitāya
tika-vin02t:821_12: samujjalabhāvato uḷārasantānatāya ca, so aggi viya himavantapabbato viya ca. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
tika-vin02t:823: Asantettha na dissanti, rattiṃ khittā yathā sarā”ti. ;
tika-vin02t:824_0: Uṭṭhehīti bhagavato dhammadesanatthaṃ cārikacaraṇaṃ yācanto bhaṇati. Uṭṭhehīti vā
tika-vin02t:824_3: vijitattā vijitasaṅgāmo, jātikantārādito veneyyasatthaṃ vāhanasamatthatāya nibbānasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin02t:824_4: khemappadesaṃ sampāpanasamatthatāya satthavāho, kāmacchandaiṇassa abhāvato aṇaṇoti
tika-vin02t:824_5: veditabbo. Yo hi paresaṃ iṇaṃ gahetvā vināseti, so tehi “iṇaṃ dehī”ti tajjamānopi
tika-vin02t:824_6: pharusaṃ vuccamānopi vambhamānopi vadhiyamānopi kiñci paṭippaharituṃ na sakkoti,
tika-vin02t:824_7: sabbaṃ titikkhati. Titikkhakāraṇañhissa taṃ iṇaṃ hoti, evameva yo yamhi kāmacchandena
tika-vin02t:824_8: rajjati, taṇhāgahaṇena taṃ vatthuṃ gaṇhāti, so tena pharusaṃ vuccamānopi vambhamānopi
tika-vin02t:824_9: vadhiyamānopi kiñci paṭippaharituṃ na sakkoti, sabbaṃ titikkhati. Titikkhakāraṇañhissa
tika-vin02t:824_10: so kāmacchando hoti gharasāmikehi viheṭhiyamānānaṃ itthīnaṃ viya. Kasmā? Iṇasadisattā kāmacchandassa.
tika-vin02t:825_0: 9. Ajjhesananti garuṭṭhānīyaṃ payirupāsitvā garutaraṃ payojanaṃ uddissa abhipatthanā
tika-vin02t:825_1: ajjhesanā, sāpi atthato yācanā eva. Buddhacakkhunāti indriyaparopariyattañāṇena ca
tika-vin02t:825_2: āsayānusayañāṇena ca. Imesañhi dvinnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ buddhacakkhūti nāmaṃ, sabbaññutaññāṇassa
tika-vin02t:825_3: samantacakkhūti. Heṭṭhimānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ maggañāṇānaṃ dhammacakkhūti. Apparajakkhetiādīsu
tika-vin02t:825_4: yesaṃ vuttanayeneva paññācakkhumhi rāgādirajaṃ appaṃ, te apparajakkhā. Yesaṃ taṃ
tika-vin02t:825_5: mahantaṃ, te mahārajakkhā. Yesaṃ saddhādīni indriyāni tikkhāni, te tikkhindriyā.
tika-vin02t:825_6: Yesaṃ tāni mudūni, te mudindriyā. Yesaṃ teyeva saddhādayo ākārā sundarā, te svākārā.
tika-vin02t:825_7: Ye kathitakāraṇaṃ sallakkhenti, sukhena sakkā honti viññāpetuṃ, te suviññāpayā. Ye
tika-vin02t:825_8: paralokañceva vajjañca bhayato passanti, te paralokavajjabhayadassāvino nāma.
tika-vin02t:826_0: Uppalāni ettha santīti uppalinī, gacchopi jalāsayopi, idha pana jalāsayo adhippeto,
tika-vin02t:826_1: tasmā uppaliniyanti uppalavaneti evamattho gahetabbo. Ito paresupi eseva nayo. Antonimuggaposīnīti
tika-vin02t:826_2: yāni udakassa anto nimuggāneva hutvā pussanti vaḍḍhanti, tāni antonimuggaposīni.
tika-vin02t:826_3: Udakaṃ accuggamma tiṭṭhantīti udakaṃ atikkamitvā tiṭṭhanti. Tattha yāni accuggamma
tika-vin02t:826_4: ṭhitāni sūriyarasmisamphassaṃ āgamayamānāni, tāni ajja pupphanakāni. Yāni samodakaṃ
tika-vin02t:826_5: ṭhitāni, tāni sve pupphanakāni. Yāni udakā anuggatāni antonimuggaposīni, tāni tatiyadivase
tika-vin02t:826_6: pupphanakāni. Udakā pana anuggatāni aññānipi sarogauppalādīni nāma atthi, yāni neva
tika-vin02t:826_7: pupphissanti macchakacchapabhakkhāneva bhavissanti, tāni pāḷiṃ nāruḷhāni, āharitvā
tika-vin02t:826_8: pana dīpetabbānīti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pakāsitāni. Yatheva hi tāni catubbidhāni pupphāni,
tika-vin02t:826_9: evameva ugghaṭitaññū vipañcitaññū neyyo padaparamoti cattāro puggalā.
tika-vin02t:827_0: Tattha yassa puggalassa saha udāhaṭavelāya dhammābhisamayo hoti, ayaṃ “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”tiādinā
tika-vin02t:827_1: nayena saṅkhittena mātikāya ṭhapiyamānāya desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā arahattaṃ
tika-vin02t:827_2: gaṇhituṃ samattho puggalo ugghaṭitaññūti vuccati. Yassa puggalassa saṅkhittena bhāsitassa
tika-vin02t:827_3: vitthārena atthe vibhajiyamāne dhammābhisamayo hoti, ayaṃ vuccati puggalo vipañcitaññū.
tika-vin02t:827_4: Yassa puggalassa uddesato paripucchato yoniso manasikaroto kalyāṇamitte sevato bhajato
tika-vin02t:827_5: payirupāsato anupubbena dhammābhisamayo hoti, ayaṃ vuccati puggalo neyyo. Yassa puggalassa
tika-vin02t:827_6: bahumpi suṇato bahumpi bhaṇato bahumpi dhārayato bahumpi vācayato na tāya jātiyā
tika-vin02t:827_7: dhammābhisamayo hoti, tena attabhāvena maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā antamaso jhānaṃ vā vipassanaṃ
tika-vin02t:827_8: vā nibbattetuṃ na sakkoti, ayaṃ vuccati puggalo padaparamo. Tattha bhagavā uppalavanādisadisaṃ
tika-vin02t:827_9: dasasahassilokadhātuṃ olokento ajja pupphanakāni viya ugghaṭitaññū, sve pupphanakāni
tika-vin02t:827_10: viya vipañcitaññū, tatiyadivase pupphanakāni viya neyye, macchakacchapabhakkhapupphāni
tika-vin02t:827_11: viya padaparame ca addasa, passanto ca “ettakā apparajakkhā, ettakā mahārajakkhā,
tika-vin02t:827_12: tatrāpi ettakā ugghaṭitaññū”ti evaṃ sabbākāratova addasa.
tika-vin02t:828_0: Tattha tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ imasmiññeva attabhāve bhagavato dhammadesanā atthaṃ sādheti.
tika-vin02t:828_1: Padaparamānaṃ anāgatatthāya vāsanā hoti. Atha bhagavā imesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ
tika-vin02t:828_2: atthāvahaṃ dhammadesanaṃ viditvā desetukamyataṃ uppādetvā puna sabbepi tīsu bhavesu
tika-vin02t:828_3: satte bhabbābhabbavasena dve koṭṭhāse akāsi. Ye sandhāya vuttaṃ “ye te sattā kammāvaraṇena
tika-vin02t:828_4: samannāgatā vipākāvaraṇena samannāgatā kilesāvaraṇena samannāgatā assaddhā acchandikā
tika-vin02t:828_5: duppaññā abhabbā niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṃ, ime te sattā abhabbā.
tika-vin02t:828_6: Katame te sattā bhabbā? Ye te sattā na kammāvaraṇena…pe… ime te sattā bhabbā”ti.
tika-vin02t:828_7: Tattha sabbepi abhabbapuggale pahāya bhabbapuggaleyeva ñāṇena pariggahetvā “ettakā
tika-vin02t:828_8: rāgacaritā, ettakā dosa, moha, vitakka, saddhā, buddhicaritā”ti cha koṭṭhāse akāsi,
tika-vin02t:828_9: evaṃ katvā dhammaṃ desessāmīti cintesi. Ettha ca apparajakkhādibhabbādivasena āvajjentassa
tika-vin02t:828_10: bhagavato te sattā puñjapuñjāva hutvā upaṭṭhahanti, na ekekāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:829_0: Paccabhāsīti patiabhāsi. Apārutāti vivaṭā. Amatassa dvārāti ariyamaggo. So hi amatasaṅkhātassa
tika-vin02t:829_1: nibbānassa dvāraṃ, so mayā vivaritvā ṭhapito mahākaruṇūpanissayena sayambhūñāṇena
tika-vin02t:829_2: adhigatattāti dasseti. “Apārutaṃ tesaṃ amatassa dvāra”nti keci paṭhanti. Pamuñcantu
tika-vin02t:829_3: saddhanti sabbe attano saddhaṃ muñcantu vissajjentu pavedentu, mayā desite dhamme
tika-vin02t:829_4: mayi ca attano saddahanākāraṃ uṭṭhāpentūti attho. Pacchimapadadvaye ayamattho – ahañhi
tika-vin02t:829_5: attano paguṇaṃ suppavattitampi imaṃ paṇītaṃ uttamaṃ dhammaṃ kāyavācākilamathasaññī
tika-vin02t:829_6: hutvā na bhāsiṃ, na bhāsissāmīti cintesiṃ, idāni pana sabbo jano saddhābhājanaṃ upanetu,
tika-vin02t:829_7: pūressāmi nesaṃ saṅkappanti. Antaradhāyīti satthāraṃ gandhamālādīhi pūjetvā antarahito,
tika-vin02t:829_8: sakaṭṭhānameva gatoti attho. Satthusantikañhi upagatānaṃ devānaṃ brahmānañca tassa
tika-vin02t:832_0: 10. Etadahosīti etaṃ ahosi, “kassa nu kho ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyya”nti ayaṃ
tika-vin02t:832_1: dhammadesanāpaṭisaṃyutto vitakko udapādīti attho. Āḷāroti tassa nāmaṃ. Dīghapiṅgalo
tika-vin02t:832_2: kiresa. So hi tuṅgasarīratāya dīgho, piṅgalacakkhutāya piṅgalo, tenassa “āḷāro”ti
tika-vin02t:832_3: nāmaṃ ahosi. Kālāmoti gottaṃ. Paṇḍitoti paṇḍiccena samannāgato, samāpattipaṭilābhasaṃsiddhena
tika-vin02t:832_4: adhigamabāhusaccasaṅkhātena paṇḍitabhāvena samannāgatoti attho. Byattoti veyyattiyena
tika-vin02t:832_6: samannāgatoti attho. Medhāvīti ṭhānuppattiyā paññāya samannāgato. Atha vā medhāvīti
tika-vin02t:832_8: evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Apparajakkhajātikoti samāpattiyā vikkhambhitattā nikkilesajātiko
tika-vin02t:833_0: Bhagavatopi kho ñāṇaṃ udapādīti bhagavatopi sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ uppajji. Bhagavā kira
tika-vin02t:833_1: devatāya kathiteneva niṭṭhaṃ agantvā sayampi sabbaññutaññāṇena olokento ito sattamadivasamatthake
tika-vin02t:833_2: kālaṃ katvā ākiñcaññāyatane nibbattoti addasa. Taṃ sandhāyāha “bhagavatopi kho ñāṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:833_3: udapādī”ti. Mahājāniyoti sattadivasabbhantare pattabbamaggaphalato parihīnattā mahatī
tika-vin02t:833_4: jāni parihāni assāti mahājāniyo. Akkhaṇe nibbattatthā idha dhammadesanaṭṭhānaṃ āgamanapādāpi
tika-vin02t:833_5: natthi, athāhaṃ tattha gaccheyyaṃ, gantvā desiyamānaṃ dhammampissa sotuṃ sotapasādopi
tika-vin02t:833_6: natthi, evaṃ mahājāniyo jātoti dasseti. Kiṃ pana bhagavatā taṃ attano buddhānubhāvena
tika-vin02t:833_7: dhammaṃ ñāpetuṃ na sakkāti? Āma na sakkā, na hi paratoghosamantarena sāvakānaṃ dhammābhisamayo
tika-vin02t:833_8: sambhavati, aññathā itarapaccayarahitassapi dhammābhisamayena bhavitabbaṃ, na ca
tika-vin02t:833_9: taṃ atthi. Vuttañhetaṃ – “dveme, bhikkhave, paccayā sammādiṭṭhiyā uppādāya parato
tika-vin02t:834_0: Udakoti tassa nāmaṃ, rāmassa pana puttatāya rāmaputto. Abhidosakālakatoti aḍḍharatte
tika-vin02t:834_1: kālakato. Bhagavatopi kho ñāṇaṃ udapādīti idhāpi kira bhagavā devatāya kathitavacanena
tika-vin02t:834_2: sanniṭṭhānaṃ akatvā sabbaññutaññāṇena olokento “hiyyo aḍḍharatte kālaṃ katvā udako
tika-vin02t:834_3: rāmaputto nevasaññānāsaññāyatane nibbatto”ti addasa, tasmā evaṃ vuttaṃ. Sesaṃ purimasadisameva.
tika-vin02t:835_0: Bahūpakārāti bahuupakārā. Padhānapahitattaṃ upaṭṭhahiṃsūti padhānatthāya pesitattabhāvaṃ
tika-vin02t:835_1: vasanaṭṭhāne pariveṇasammajjanena pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā anubandhanena mukhodakadantakaṭṭhadānādinā
tika-vin02t:835_2: ca upaṭṭhahiṃsu. Ke panete pañcavaggiyā nāma? Ye te –
tika-vin02t:840_0: Bodhisattassa jātakāle supinapaṭiggāhakā ceva lakkhaṇapaṭiggāhakā ca aṭṭha brāhmaṇā.
tika-vin02t:840_1: Tesu tayo dvedhā byākariṃsu “imehi lakkhaṇehi samannāgato agāraṃ ajjhāvasamāno rājā
tika-vin02t:840_2: hohiti cakkavattī, pabbajamāno buddho”ti. Pañca brāhmaṇā ekaṃsabyākaraṇā ahesuṃ “imehi
tika-vin02t:840_3: lakkhaṇehi samannāgato agāre na tiṭṭhati, buddhova hotī”ti. Tesu purimā tayo yathāmantapadaṃ
tika-vin02t:840_4: gatā. Ete hi lakkhaṇamantasaṅkhātavedavacanānurūpaṃ paṭipannā dve gatiyo bhavanti
tika-vin02t:840_5: anaññāti vuttaniyāmena nicchinituṃ asakkontā vuttameva paṭipajjiṃsu, na mahāpurisassa
tika-vin02t:840_6: buddhabhāvappattiṃ paccāsīsiṃsu. Ime pana koṇḍaññādayo pañca “ekaṃsato buddho bhavissatī”ti
tika-vin02t:840_7: jātanicchayattā mantapadaṃ atikkantā. Te attanā laddhaṃ tuṭṭhidānaṃ ñātakānaṃ vissajjetvā
tika-vin02t:840_8: “ayaṃ mahāpuriso agāre na ajjhāvasissati, ekantena buddho bhavissatī”ti nibbematikā
tika-vin02t:840_9: bodhisattaṃ uddissa samaṇapabbajjaṃ pabbajitā, tesaṃ puttātipi vadanti, taṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin02t:840_10: paṭikkhittaṃ. Ete kira daharakāleva bahū mante jāniṃsu, tasmā ne brāhmaṇā ācariyaṭṭhāne
tika-vin02t:840_11: ṭhapayiṃsu. Te “pacchā amhehi puttadārajaṭaṃ chinditvā na sakkā bhavissati pabbajitu”nti
tika-vin02t:840_12: daharakāleyeva pabbajitvā ramaṇīyāni senāsanāni paribhuñjantā vicariṃsu. Kālena kālaṃ
tika-vin02t:840_13: pana “kiṃ bho mahāpuriso mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhanto”ti pucchanti. Manussā “kuhiṃ
tika-vin02t:840_14: tumhe mahāpurisaṃ passissatha, tīsu pāsādesu vividhanāṭakamajjhe devo viya sampattiṃ
tika-vin02t:840_15: anubhotī”ti vadanti. Te sutvā “na tāva mahāpurisassa ñāṇaṃ paripākaṃ gacchatī”ti
tika-vin02t:841_0: Kasmā panettha bhagavā “bahukārā kho me pañcavaggiyā”ti āha. Kiṃ upakārakānaṃyeva
tika-vin02t:841_1: esa dhammaṃ deseti, anupakārakānaṃ na desetīti? No na deseti. Paricayavasena hesa
tika-vin02t:841_2: āḷārañceva kālāmaṃ udakañca rāmaputtaṃ olokesi. Etasmiṃ pana buddhakkhette ṭhapetvā
tika-vin02t:841_3: aññāsikoṇḍaññaṃ añño paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ sacchikātuṃ samattho nāma natthi. Kasmā? Tathāvidhaupanissayattā.
tika-vin02t:841_4: Pubbe kira puññakaraṇakāle dve bhātaro ahesuṃ. Te ca ekato sassaṃ akaṃsu. Tattha
tika-vin02t:841_5: jeṭṭhassa “ekasmiṃ sasse nava vāre aggasassadānaṃ mayā dātabba”nti ahosi. So vappakāle
tika-vin02t:841_6: bījaggaṃ nāma datvā gabbhakāle kaniṭṭhena saddhiṃ mantesi “gabbhakāle gabbhaṃ phāletvā
tika-vin02t:841_7: dassāmī”ti. Kaniṭṭho “taruṇasassaṃ nāsetukāmosī”ti āha. Jeṭṭho kaniṭṭhassa ananuvattanabhāvaṃ
tika-vin02t:841_8: ñatvā khettaṃ vibhajitvā attano koṭṭhāsato gabbhaṃ phāletvā khīraṃ nīharitvā sappiphāṇitena
tika-vin02t:841_9: yojetvā adāsi, puthukakāle puthukaṃ kāretvā adāsi, lāyane lāyanaggaṃ, veṇikaraṇe
tika-vin02t:841_10: veṇaggaṃ, veṇiyo purisabhāravasena bandhitvā kalāpakaraṇe kalāpaggaṃ, khale kalāpānaṃ
tika-vin02t:841_11: ṭhapanadivase khalaggaṃ, madditvā vīhīnaṃ rāsikaraṇadivase khalabhaṇḍaggaṃ, koṭṭhāgāre
tika-vin02t:841_12: dhaññassa pakkhipanadivase koṭṭhagganti evaṃ ekasmiṃ sasse nava vāre aggadānaṃ adāsi.
tika-vin02t:841_13: Kaniṭṭho pana khalato dhaññaṃ uddharitvā gahaṇadivase adāsi. Tesu jeṭṭho aññāsikoṇḍaññatthero
tika-vin02t:841_14: jāto, kaniṭṭho subhaddaparibbājako. Iti ekasmiṃ sasse navannaṃ aggadānānaṃ dinnattā
tika-vin02t:841_15: ṭhapetvā theraṃ añño paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ sacchikātuṃ samattho nāma natthi. “Navannaṃ
tika-vin02t:841_16: aggadānānaṃ dinnattā”ti idañca tassa rattaññūnaṃ aggabhāvatthāya katābhinīhārānurūpaṃ
tika-vin02t:841_17: pavattitasāvakapāramiyā ciṇṇante pavattitattā vuttaṃ. Tiṇṇampi hi bodhisattānaṃ taṃtaṃpāramiyā
tika-vin02t:841_18: sikhāppattakāle pavattitaṃ puññaṃ apuññaṃ vā garutaravipākameva hoti, dhammassa ca
tika-vin02t:841_19: sabbapaṭhamaṃ sacchikiriyāya vinā kathaṃ rattaññūnaṃ aggabhāvasiddhīti? “Bahukārā
tika-vin02t:841_20: kho me pañcavaggiyā”ti idaṃ pana upakārānussaraṇamattakeneva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:842_0: Isipatane migadāyeti tasmiṃ kira padese anuppanne buddhe paccekasambuddhā gandhamādanapabbate
tika-vin02t:842_1: sattāhaṃ nirodhasamāpattiyā vītināmetvā nirodhā vuṭṭhāya nāgalatādantakaṭṭhaṃ khāditvā
tika-vin02t:842_2: anotattadahe mukhaṃ dhovitvā pattacīvaramādāya ākāsena āgantvā nipatanti. Tattha
tika-vin02t:842_3: cīvaraṃ pārupitvā nagare piṇḍāya caritvā katabhattakiccā gamanakālepi tatoyeva uppatitvā
tika-vin02t:842_4: gacchanti. Iti isayo ettha nipatanti uppatanti cāti taṃ ṭhānaṃ “isipatana”nti saṅkhaṃ
tika-vin02t:842_5: gataṃ, migānaṃ pana abhayatthāya dinnattā “migadāyo”ti vuccati. Tena vuttaṃ “isipatane
tika-vin02t:842_6: migadāye”ti. Aññe buddhā paṭhamaṃ dhammadesanatthāya gacchantā ākāsena gantvā tattheva
tika-vin02t:842_7: otaranti, amhākaṃ pana bhagavā upakassa ājīvakassa upanissayaṃ disvā “upako imaṃ
tika-vin02t:842_8: addhānaṃ paṭipanno, so maṃ disvā sallapitvā gamissati, atha puna nibbinno āgamma
tika-vin02t:842_9: arahattaṃ sacchikarissatī”ti ñatvā aṭṭhārasayojanaṃ maggaṃ padasāva agamāsi. Tena
tika-vin02t:843_0: 11. Antarā ca gayaṃ antarā ca bodhinti gayāya ca bodhissa ca vivare tigāvutantare
tika-vin02t:843_1: ṭhāne. Bodhimaṇḍato hi gayā tīṇi gāvutāni, bārāṇasī aṭṭhārasa yojanāni. Upako bodhimaṇḍassa
tika-vin02t:843_2: ca gayāya ca antare bhagavantaṃ addasa. Antarā-saddena pana yuttattā upayogavacanaṃ
tika-vin02t:843_3: kataṃ. Īdisesu ca ṭhānesu akkharacintakā “antarā gāmañca nadiñca yātī”ti evaṃ ekameva
tika-vin02t:843_4: antarā-saddaṃ payujjanti, so dutiyapadenapi yojetabbo hoti, ayojiyamāne upayogavacanaṃ
tika-vin02t:843_5: na pāpuṇāti sāmivacanassa pasaṅge antarā-saddayogena upayogavacanassa icchitattā.
tika-vin02t:843_6: Idha pana yojetvā eva vutto. Addhānamagganti addhānasaṅkhātaṃ maggaṃ, dīghamagganti
tika-vin02t:843_8: addhayojanampi addhānamaggo hoti. Bodhimaṇḍato pana gayā tigāvutaṃ. Vippasannānīti
tika-vin02t:843_9: suṭṭhu pasannāni. Indriyānīti manacchaṭṭhāni indriyāni. Parisuddhoti niddoso. Pariyodātoti
tika-vin02t:843_10: tasseva vevacanaṃ. Nirupakkilesatāyeva hi esa “pariyodāto”ti vutto, na setabhāvena.
tika-vin02t:843_11: Etassa pariyodātataṃ disvāva indriyānaṃ vippasannataṃ aññāsi, nayaggāhīpaññā kiresā tassa ājīvakassa.
tika-vin02t:844_0: Sabbābhibhūti sabbaṃ tebhūmakadhammaṃ abhibhavitvā ṭhito. Sabbavidūti sabbaṃ catubhūmakadhammaṃ
tika-vin02t:844_1: avediṃ aññāsiṃ sabbaso ñeyyāvaraṇassa pahīnattā. Sabbesu dhammesu anūpalittoti sabbesu
tika-vin02t:844_2: tebhūmakadhammesu rajjanadussanamuyhanādinā kilesalepena alitto. Sabbañjahoti sabbaṃ
tika-vin02t:844_3: tebhūmakadhammaṃ jahitvā ṭhito. Appahātabbampi hi kusalābyākataṃ tappaṭibaddhakilesappahānena
tika-vin02t:844_4: pahīnattā na hotīti jahitameva hoti. Taṇhakkhaye vimuttoti taṇhakkhaye nibbāne ārammaṇakaraṇavasena
tika-vin02t:844_5: vimutto. Sayaṃ abhiññāyāti sabbaṃ catubhūmakadhammaṃ attanāva jānitvā. Kamuddiseyyanti
tika-vin02t:845_0: Na me ācariyo atthīti lokuttaradhamme mayhaṃ ācariyo nāma natthi. Kiñcāpi hi lokiyadhammānampi
tika-vin02t:845_1: yādiso lokanāthassa adhigamo, na tādiso adhigamo parūpadeso atthi, lokuttaradhamme
tika-vin02t:845_2: panassa lesopi natthi. Natthi me paṭipuggaloti mayhaṃ sīlādīhi guṇehi paṭinidhibhūto
tika-vin02t:845_3: puggalo nāma natthi. Sammāsambuddhoti hetunā nayena cattāri saccāni sayaṃ buddho.
tika-vin02t:845_4: Sītibhūtoti sabbakilesagginibbāpanena sītibhūto, kilesānaṃ yeva nibbutattā nibbuto.
tika-vin02t:846_0: Kāsinaṃ puranti kāsiraṭṭhe nagaraṃ. Āhañchanti āhanissāmi. Amatadundubhinti veneyyānaṃ
tika-vin02t:846_1: amatādhigamāya ugghosanādiṃ katvā satthu dhammadesanā “amatadundubhī”ti vuttā, dhammacakkapaṭilābhāya
tika-vin02t:846_2: taṃ amatabheriṃ paharissāmīti gacchāmīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin02t:847_0: Arahasi anantajinoti anantajinopi bhavituṃ yuttoti attho. Anantañāṇo jitakilesoti
tika-vin02t:847_1: anantajino. Hupeyyapāvusoti āvuso evampi nāma bhaveyya, evaṃvidhe nāma rūparatane
tika-vin02t:847_2: īdisena ñāṇena bhavitabbanti adhippāyo. Ayañhissa pabbajjāya paccayo jāto. Katādhikāro
tika-vin02t:847_3: hesa. Tathā hi bhagavā tena samāgamanatthaṃ padasāva taṃ maggaṃ paṭipajji. Pakkāmīti
tika-vin02t:848_0: Tatthekaṃ migaluddakagāmakaṃ nissāya vāsaṃ kappesi, jeṭṭhakaluddako taṃ upaṭṭhāsi.
tika-vin02t:848_1: Tasmiñca janapade caṇḍā makkhikā honti. Atha naṃ ekāya cāṭiyā vasāpesuṃ. Migaluddako
tika-vin02t:848_2: dūraṃ migavaṃ gacchanto “amhākaṃ arahante mā pamajjī”ti cāpaṃ nāma dhītaraṃ āṇāpetvā
tika-vin02t:848_3: agamāsi saddhiṃ puttabhātukehi. Sā cassa dhītā dassanīyā hoti koṭṭhāsasampannā. Dutiyadivase
tika-vin02t:848_4: upako gharaṃ āgato taṃ dārikaṃ sabbaṃ upacāraṃ katvā parivisituṃ upagataṃ disvā rāgena
tika-vin02t:848_5: abhibhūto bhuñjitumpi asakkonto bhājanena bhattaṃ ādāya vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā bhattaṃ
tika-vin02t:848_6: ekamantaṃ nikkhipitvā “sace cāpaṃ labhāmi, jīvāmi. No ce, marāmī”ti nirāhāro sayi.
tika-vin02t:848_7: Sattame divase māgaviko āgantvā dhītaraṃ upakassa pavattiṃ pucchi. Sā “ekadivasameva
tika-vin02t:849_0: Māgaviko āgataveseneva naṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchissāmīti taṅkhaṇaṃyeva gantvā “kiṃ,
tika-vin02t:849_1: bhante, aphāsuka”nti pāde parāmasanto pucchi. Upako nitthunanto parivattatiyeva.
tika-vin02t:849_2: So “vada bhante, yaṃ mayā sakkā kātuṃ, sabbaṃ karissāmī”ti āha. Upako “sace cāpaṃ
tika-vin02t:849_3: labhāmi, jīvāmi, no ce, mayhameva maraṇaṃ seyyo”ti āha. Jānāsi kira, bhante, kiñci
tika-vin02t:849_4: sippanti? Na jānāmīti. Na, bhante, kiñci sippaṃ ajānantena sakkā gharāvāsaṃ adhiṭṭhātunti.
tika-vin02t:849_5: So āha “nāhaṃ kiñci sippaṃ jānāmi, apica tumhākaṃ maṃsahārako bhavissāmi, maṃsañca
tika-vin02t:849_6: vikkiṇissāmī”ti. Māgaviko “amhākampi etadeva ruccatī”ti uttarasāṭakaṃ datvā gharaṃ
tika-vin02t:849_7: ānetvā dhītaraṃ adāsi. Tesaṃ saṃvāsamanvāya putto vijāyi, “subhaddo”tissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
tika-vin02t:849_8: Cāpā tassa rodanakāle “maṃsahārakassa putta migaluddakassa putta mā rodi mā rodī”tiādīni
tika-vin02t:849_9: vadamānā puttatosanagītena upakaṃ uppaṇḍesi. “Bhadde tvaṃ maṃ anāthoti maññasi, atthi
tika-vin02t:849_10: me anantajino nāma sahāyo, tassāhaṃ santikaṃ gamissāmī”ti āha. Cāpā “evamayaṃ aṭṭīyatī”ti
tika-vin02t:849_11: ñatvā punappunaṃ kathesi. So ekadivasaṃ anārocetvāva majjhimadesābhimukho pakkāmi.
tika-vin02t:850_0: Bhagavā ca tena samayena sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane, atha kho bhagavā paṭikacceva
tika-vin02t:850_1: bhikkhū āṇāpesi “yo, bhikkhave, anantajinoti pucchamāno āgacchati, tassa maṃ dasseyyāthā”ti.
tika-vin02t:850_2: Upakopi kho “kuhiṃ anantajino vasatī”ti pucchanto anupubbena sāvatthiṃ āgantvā vihāramajjhe
tika-vin02t:850_3: ṭhatvā “kuhiṃ anantajino”ti pucchi. Taṃ bhikkhū bhagavato santikaṃ nayiṃsu. So ca
tika-vin02t:850_4: bhagavantaṃ disvā “sañjānātha maṃ bhagavā”ti āha. Āma upaka sañjānāmi, kuhiṃ pana
tika-vin02t:850_5: tvaṃ vasitthāti. Vaṅkahārajanapade, bhanteti. Upaka mahallakosi jāto, pabbajituṃ
tika-vin02t:850_6: sakkhissasīti. Pabbajissāmi, bhanteti. Bhagavā pabbājetvā tassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ adāsi.
tika-vin02t:850_7: So kammaṭṭhāne kammaṃ karonto anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhāya kālaṃ katvā avihesu nibbatto,
tika-vin02t:850_8: nibbattikkhaṇeyeva ca arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Avihe nibbattamattā hi satta janā arahattaṃ
tika-vin02t:853: “Upako palagaṇḍo ca, pukkusāti ca te tayo;
tika-vin02t:854: Bhaddiyo khaṇḍadevo ca, bāhuraggi ca saṅgiyo;
tika-vin02t:855: Te hitvā mānusaṃ dehaṃ, dibbayogaṃ upaccagu”nti. ;
tika-vin02t:856_0: 12. Saṇṭhapesunti “neva abhivādetabbo”tiādinā katikaṃ akaṃsu. Bāhullikoti cīvarabāhullādīnaṃ
tika-vin02t:856_1: atthāya paṭipanno. Padhānavibbhantoti padhānato pubbe anuṭṭhitadukkaracaraṇato vibbhanto
tika-vin02t:856_2: bhaṭṭho parihīno. Āvatto bāhullāyāti cīvarādibahubhāvatthāya āvatto. Apica kho āsanaṃ
tika-vin02t:856_3: ṭhapetabbanti apica kho panassa uccakule nibbattassa āsanamattaṃ ṭhapetabbanti vadiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:856_4: Asaṇṭhahantāti buddhānubhāvena buddhatejena abhibhūtā attano katikāya ṭhātuṃ asakkontā.
tika-vin02t:856_5: Nāmena ca āvusovādena ca samudācarantīti “gotamā”ti ca “āvuso”ti ca vadanti, “āvuso
tika-vin02t:856_6: gotama, mayaṃ uruvelāyaṃ padhānakāle tuyhaṃ pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā vicarimha, mukhodakaṃ
tika-vin02t:856_7: dantakaṭṭhaṃ adamha, vutthapariveṇaṃ sammajjimha, pacchā te ko vattapaṭipattiṃ akāsi,
tika-vin02t:856_8: kacci amhesu pakkantesu na cintayitthā”ti evarūpaṃ kathaṃ kathentīti attho.
tika-vin02t:857_0: Na cirassevāti acireneva. Kulaputtāti duvidhā kulaputtā jātikulaputtā ācārakulaputtā
tika-vin02t:857_1: ca, ete pana ubhayathāpi kulaputtāyeva. Agārasmāti gharā. Agārāya hitaṃ agāriyaṃ,
tika-vin02t:857_2: kasigorakkhādi kuṭumbaposanakammaṃ vuccati. Natthi ettha agāriyanti anagāriyaṃ. Pabbajjāyetaṃ
tika-vin02t:857_3: adhivacanaṃ. Pabbajantīti upagacchanti upasaṅkamanti. Tadanuttaranti taṃ anuttaraṃ.
tika-vin02t:857_5: hoti. Tassa hi atthāya kulaputtā pabbajanti. Diṭṭheva dhammeti tasmiṃyeva attabhāve.
tika-vin02t:857_6: Sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvāti attanoyeva paññāya paccakkhaṃ katvā, aparappaccayaṃ katvāti
tika-vin02t:857_7: attho. Upasampajja viharissathāti pāpuṇitvā sampādetvā viharissatha.
tika-vin02t:858_0: Iriyāyāti dukkarairiyāya. Paṭipadāyāti dukkarapaṭipattiyā. Dukkarakārikāyāti pasatapasatamuggayūsādiāharaṇādinā
tika-vin02t:858_1: dukkarakaraṇena. Uttari manussadhammāti manussadhammato upari. Alaṃ ariyaṃ kātunti
tika-vin02t:858_2: alamariyo, ariyabhāvāya samatthoti vuttaṃ hoti, ñāṇadassanameva ñāṇadassanaviseso,
tika-vin02t:858_3: alamariyo ca so ñāṇadassanaviseso cāti alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso. Ñāṇadassananti
tika-vin02t:858_4: ca dibbacakkhupi vipassanāpi maggopi phalampi paccavekkhaṇañāṇampi sabbaññutaññāṇampi
tika-vin02t:858_5: vuccati. “Appamatto samāno ñāṇadassanaṃ ārādhetī”ti hi ettha dibbacakkhu ñāṇadassanaṃ
tika-vin02t:858_6: nāma. “Ñāṇadassanāya cittaṃ abhinīharati abhininnāmetī”ti ettha vipassanāñāṇaṃ. “Abhabbā
tika-vin02t:858_7: te ñāṇadassanāya anuttarāya sambodhāyā”ti ettha maggo. “Ayamañño uttarimanussadhammā
tika-vin02t:858_8: alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso adhigato phāsuvihāro”ti ettha phalaṃ. “Ñāṇañca pana me
tika-vin02t:858_9: dassanaṃ udapādi ‘akuppā me cetovimutti, ayamantimā jāti, natthi dāni punabbhavo”’ti
tika-vin02t:858_10: ettha paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ. “Ñāṇañca pana me dassanaṃ udapādi ‘sattāhakālakato āḷāro
tika-vin02t:858_11: kālāmo”’ti ettha sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ. Idha pana sabbaññutaññāṇapadaṭṭhāno ariyamaggo
tika-vin02t:859_0: Abhijānātha me noti abhijānātha nu me. Evarūpaṃ pabhāvitametanti ettha evarūpaṃ vākyabhedanti
tika-vin02t:859_1: attho, api nu ahaṃ uruvelāyaṃ padhāne tumhākaṃ saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ anukkaṇṭhanatthaṃ
tika-vin02t:859_2: rattiṃ vā divā vā āgantvā “āvuso, mayaṃ yattha katthaci gamissāmāti mā vitakkayittha,
tika-vin02t:859_3: mayhaṃ obhāso vā kammaṭṭhānanimittaṃ vā paññāyatī”ti evarūpaṃ kañci vacanabhedaṃ
tika-vin02t:859_4: akāsinti adhippāyo. Te ekapadeneva satiṃ labhitvā uppannagāravā “addhā esa buddho
tika-vin02t:859_5: jāto”ti saddahitvā “no hetaṃ bhante”ti āhaṃsu. Asakkhi kho bhagavā pañcavaggiye bhikkhū
tika-vin02t:859_6: saññāpetunti bhagavā pañcavaggiye bhikkhū “buddho aha”nti jānāpetuṃ asakkhi. Aññā
tika-vin02t:859_7: cittaṃ upaṭṭhāpesunti aññāya arahattappattiyā cittaṃ upaṭṭhapesuṃ abhinīhariṃsu.
tika-vin02t:861_0: 13. Dveme, bhikkhave, antāti dve ime, bhikkhave, koṭṭhāsā, dve bhāgāti attho. Bhāgavacano
tika-vin02t:861_1: hettha anta-saddo “pubbante ñāṇaṃ aparante ñāṇa”ntiādīsu viya. Imassa pana padassa
tika-vin02t:861_2: uccāraṇasamakālaṃ pavattanigghoso buddhānubhāvena heṭṭhā avīciṃ upari bhavaggaṃ patvā
tika-vin02t:861_3: dasasahassilokadhātuṃ pharitvā aṭṭhāsi. Tasmiṃyeva samaye paripakkakusalamūlā saccābhisambodhāya
tika-vin02t:861_4: katādhikārā aṭṭhārasakoṭisaṅkhā brahmāno samāgacchiṃsu. Pacchimadisāya sūriyo atthameti,
tika-vin02t:861_5: pācīnadisāya āsāḷhanakkhattena yutto puṇṇacando uggacchati. Tasmiṃ samaye bhagavā
tika-vin02t:862_0: Tattha pabbajitenāti gihibandhanaṃ chetvā pabbajjupagatena. Na sevitabbāti na vaḷañjetabbā
tika-vin02t:862_1: nānuyuñjitabbā. Yo cāyaṃ kāmesu kāmasukhallikānuyogoti yo ca ayaṃ vatthukāmesu kilesakāmasukhassa
tika-vin02t:862_2: anuyogo, kilesakāmasaṃyuttassa sukhassa anugatoti attho. Hīnoti lāmako. Gammoti gāmavāsīnaṃ
tika-vin02t:862_3: santako tehi sevitabbatāya. Pothujjanikoti puthujjanena andhabālajanena āciṇṇo. Anariyoti
tika-vin02t:862_4: na ariyo na visuddho na uttamo, na vā ariyānaṃ santako. Anatthasaṃhitoti na atthasaṃhito,
tika-vin02t:862_5: hitasukhāvahakāraṇaṃ anissitoti attho. Attakilamathānuyogoti attano kilamathassa
tika-vin02t:862_6: anuyogo, dukkhakaraṇaṃ dukkhuppādananti attho. Dukkhoti kaṇṭakāpassayaseyyādīhi attabādhanehi
tika-vin02t:862_7: dukkhāvaho. Majjhimā paṭipadāti ariyamaggaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Maggo hi kāmasukhallikānuyogo
tika-vin02t:862_8: eko anto, attakilamathānuyogo eko anto, ete dve ante na upeti na upagacchati, vimutto
tika-vin02t:862_9: etehi antehi, tasmā “majjhimā paṭipadā”ti vuccati. Etesaṃ majjhe bhavattā majjhimā,
tika-vin02t:862_10: vaṭṭadukkhanissaraṇatthikehi paṭipajjitabbato ca paṭipadāti, tathā lobho eko anto,
tika-vin02t:862_11: doso eko anto. Sassataṃ ekaṃ antaṃ, ucchedo eko antoti purimanayeneva vitthāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:863_0: Cakkhukaraṇītiādīhi tameva paṭipadaṃ thometi. Paññācakkhuṃ karotīti cakkhukaraṇī.
tika-vin02t:863_1: Sā hi catunnaṃ saccānaṃ dassanāya saṃvattati pariññābhisamayādibhedassa dassanassa
tika-vin02t:863_2: pavattanaṭṭhenāti “cakkhukaraṇī”ti vuccati. Tayidaṃ satipi paṭipadāya anaññatte avayavavasena
tika-vin02t:863_3: sijjhamāno attho samudāyena kato nāma hotīti upacāravasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Dutiyapadaṃ
tika-vin02t:863_4: tasseva vevacanaṃ. Upasamāyāti kilesupasamatthāya. Abhiññāyāti catunnaṃ saccānaṃ
tika-vin02t:863_5: abhijānanatthāya. Sambodhāyāti tesaṃyeva sambujjhanatthāya. Nibbānāyāti nibbānasacchikiriyāya.
tika-vin02t:863_6: Atha vā nibbānāyāti anupādisesanibbānāya. “Upasamāyā”ti hi iminā saupādisesanibbānaṃ gahitaṃ.
tika-vin02t:864_0: Idāni taṃ majjhimappaṭipadaṃ sarūpato dassetukāmo “katamā ca sā”ti pucchitvā “ayamevā”tiādinā
tika-vin02t:864_1: nayena vissajjesi. Tattha ayamevāti avadhāraṇavacanaṃ aññassa nibbānagāmimaggassa
tika-vin02t:864_2: atthibhāvapaṭisedhanatthaṃ. Sattāpaṭikkhepo hi idha paṭisedhanaṃ alabbhamānattā aññassa
tika-vin02t:864_3: maggassa. Ariyoti kilesānaṃ ārakattā ariyo niruttinayena. Aripahānāya saṃvattatītipi
tika-vin02t:864_4: ariyo arayo pāpadhammā yanti apagacchanti etenāti katvā. Ariyena bhagavatā desitattā
tika-vin02t:864_5: ariyassa ayantipi ariyo, ariyabhāvappaṭilābhāya saṃvattatītipi ariyo. Ettha pana
tika-vin02t:864_6: ariyakaro ariyotipi uttarapadalopena ariya-saddasiddhi veditabbā. Aṭṭhahi aṅgehi
tika-vin02t:864_7: upetattā aṭṭhaṅgiko. Maggaṅgasamudāye hi maggavohāro, samudāyo ca samudāyīhi samannāgato
tika-vin02t:864_8: nāma hoti. Ayaṃ panettha vacanattho – attano avayavabhūtāni aṭṭhaṅgāni etassa santīti
tika-vin02t:864_9: aṭṭhaṅgikoti. Paramatthato pana aṅgāniyeva maggo pañcaṅgikatūriyādīni viya, na ca
tika-vin02t:864_10: aṅgavinimutto chaḷaṅgo vedo viya. Kilese mārento gacchatīti maggo niruttinayena,
tika-vin02t:864_11: nibbānaṃ maggati gavesatīti vā maggo. Ariyamaggo hi nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karonto gavesanto
tika-vin02t:864_12: viya hoti. Nibbānatthikehi maggīyatīti vā maggo vivaṭṭūpanissayapuññakaraṇato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin02t:864_13: tadatthapaṭipattito. Gammati vā tehi paṭipajjīyatīti maggo. Ettha pana ādiantavipariyāyena
tika-vin02t:865_0: Seyyathidanti nipāto, tassa katamo so iti ceti attho, katamāni vā tāni aṭṭhaṅgānīti.
tika-vin02t:865_1: Sabbaliṅgavibhattivacanasādhāraṇo hi ayaṃ nipāto. Ekamekampi aṅgaṃ maggoyeva. Yathāha
tika-vin02t:865_2: “sammādiṭṭhi maggo ceva hetu cā”ti. Porāṇāpi bhaṇanti “dassanamaggo sammādiṭṭhi,
tika-vin02t:865_3: abhiniropanamaggo sammāsaṅkappo…pe… avikkhepamaggo sammāsamādhī”ti. Nanu ca aṅgāni
tika-vin02t:865_4: samuditāni maggo antamaso sattaṅgavikalassa ariyamaggassa abhāvatoti? Saccametaṃ
tika-vin02t:865_5: saccasampaṭivedhe, maggappaccayatāya pana yathāsakaṃ kiccakaraṇena paccekampi tāni
tika-vin02t:865_6: maggoyeva, aññathā samuditānampi tesaṃ maggakiccaṃ na sambhaveyyāti. Sammādiṭṭhiādīsu
tika-vin02t:865_7: sammā passatīti sammādiṭṭhi, sammā saṅkappeti sampayuttadhamme nibbānasaṅkhāte ārammaṇe
tika-vin02t:865_8: abhiniropetīti sammāsaṅkappo, sammā vadati etāyāti sammāvācā, sammā karoti etenāti
tika-vin02t:865_9: sammākammaṃ, tadeva sammākammanto, sammā ājīvati etenāti sammāājīvo, sammā vāyamati
tika-vin02t:865_10: ussahatīti sammāvāyāmo, sammā sarati anussaratīti sammāsati, sammā samādhiyati cittaṃ
tika-vin02t:865_11: etenāti sammāsamādhīti evaṃ nibbacanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Idāni ayaṃ kho sā bhikkhaveti
tika-vin02t:865_12: tameva paṭipadaṃ nigamento āha. Tassattho – yvāyaṃ cattāropi lokuttaramagge ekato
tika-vin02t:865_13: katvā kathito aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, ayaṃ kho sā bhikkhave…pe… nibbānāya saṃvattatīti.
tika-vin02t:866_0: 14. Evaṃ majjhimapaṭipadaṃ sarūpato dassetvā idāni cattāri ariyasaccāni dassetuṃ
tika-vin02t:866_1: “idaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave”tiādimāha. Tattha dukkhanti ettha du-iti ayaṃ saddo kucchite
tika-vin02t:866_2: dissati. Kucchitañhi puttaṃ “duputto”ti vadanti, khaṃ-saddo pana tucche. Tucchañhi
tika-vin02t:866_3: ākāsaṃ “kha”nti vuccati. Idañca paṭhamasaccaṃ kucchitaṃ anekaupaddavādhiṭṭhānato,
tika-vin02t:866_5: ca “dukkha”nti vuccati. Yasmā panetaṃ buddhādayo ariyā paṭivijjhanti, tasmā “ariyasacca”nti
tika-vin02t:866_7: vuttaṃ. Ariyassa tathāgatassa saccantipi ariyasaccaṃ. Tathāgatena hi sayaṃ adhigatattā
tika-vin02t:866_8: paveditattā tato eva ca aññehi adhigamanīyattā taṃ tassa hotīti. Atha vā etassa abhisambuddhattā
tika-vin02t:866_9: ariyabhāvasiddhito ariyasādhakaṃ saccantipi ariyasaccaṃ pubbe viya uttarapadalopena.
tika-vin02t:866_10: Avitathabhāvena vā araṇīyattā adhigantabbattā ariyaṃ saccantipi ariyasaccaṃ. Saccatthaṃ
tika-vin02t:866_11: pana catunnampi saccānaṃ parato ekajjhaṃ dassayissāma.
tika-vin02t:867_0: Idāni taṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ sarūpato dassetuṃ “jātipi dukkhā”tiādimāha. Tatrāyaṃ
tika-vin02t:867_1: jāti-saddo anekattho. Tathā hesa “ekampi jātiṃ dvepi jātiyo”ti ettha bhave āgato.
tika-vin02t:867_2: “Atthi, visākhe, nigaṇṭhā nāma samaṇajātī”ti ettha nikāye. “Jāti dvīhi khandhehi
tika-vin02t:867_3: saṅgahitā”ti ettha saṅkhatalakkhaṇe. “Yaṃ mātukucchismiṃ paṭhamaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ
tika-vin02t:867_4: paṭhamaṃ viññāṇaṃ pātubhūtaṃ, tadupādāya sāvassa jātī”ti ettha paṭisandhiyaṃ. “Sampatijāto,
tika-vin02t:867_5: ānanda, bodhisatto”ti ettha pasūtiyaṃ. “Akkhitto anupakuṭṭho jātivādenā”ti ettha
tika-vin02t:867_6: kule. Svāyamidha gabbhaseyyakānaṃ paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya yāva mātukucchimhā nikkhamanaṃ,
tika-vin02t:867_7: tāva pavattesu khandhesu, itaresaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇesvevāti daṭṭhabbo. Ayampi ca pariyāyakathāva,
tika-vin02t:867_8: nippariyāyato pana tattha tattha nibbattamānānaṃ sattānaṃ ye khandhā pātubhavanti,
tika-vin02t:868_0: Kasmā panesā dukkhāti ce? Anekesaṃ dukkhānaṃ vatthubhāvato. Anekāni hi dukkhāni.
tika-vin02t:868_3: dukkhā vedanā sabhāvato ca nāmato ca dukkhattā dukkhadukkhanti vuccati. Sukhā vedanā
tika-vin02t:868_4: vipariṇāmadukkhuppattihetuto vipariṇāmadukkhaṃ. Upekkhā vedanā ceva sesā ca tebhūmakā
tika-vin02t:868_6: ābādhā pucchitvā jānitabbato upakkamassa ca apākaṭabhāvato paṭicchannadukkhaṃ. Dvattiṃsakammakāraṇādisamuṭṭhāno
tika-vin02t:868_7: ābādho apucchitvāva jānitabbato upakkamassa ca pākaṭabhāvato appaṭicchannadukkhaṃ.
tika-vin02t:868_8: Ṭhapetvā dukkhadukkhaṃ sesadukkhaṃ saccavibhaṅge āgataṃ jātiādi sabbampi tassa tassa
tika-vin02t:868_9: dukkhassa vatthubhāvato pariyāyadukkhaṃ. Dukkhadukkhaṃ pana nippariyāyadukkhanti
tika-vin02t:868_10: vuccati. Tatrāyaṃ jāti yaṃ taṃ bālapaṇḍitasuttādīsu bhagavatāpi upamāvasena pakāsitaṃ
tika-vin02t:868_11: āpāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ, yañca sugatiyampi manussaloke gabbhokkantimūlakādibhedaṃ dukkhaṃ
tika-vin02t:868_12: uppajjati, tassa vatthubhāvato dukkhā. Tenāhu porāṇā –
tika-vin02t:875: Yaṃ taṃ kathaṃ tattha bhaveyya jātiṃ;
tika-vin02t:883: Na taṃ bhave tattha na cassa jāti;
tika-vin02t:888: Jātiṃ vinā itipi jāti ayañhi dukkhā.
tika-vin02t:893_0: Jarāpi dukkhāti ettha pana duvidhā jarā saṅkhatalakkhaṇañca khaṇḍiccādisammato santatiyaṃ
tika-vin02t:893_1: ekabhavapariyāpannakkhandhapurāṇabhāvo ca, sā idha adhippetā. Sā panesā jarā saṅkhāradukkhabhāvato
tika-vin02t:893_3: kāyikacetasikaṃ dukkhamuppajjati, jarā tassa vatthu. Tenāhu porāṇā –
tika-vin02t:898: “Pappoti dukkhaṃ yaṃ macco, kāyikaṃ mānasaṃ tathā;
tika-vin02t:899: Sabbametaṃ jarāhetu, yasmā tasmā jarā dukhā”ti. ;
tika-vin02t:900_0: Byādhipi dukkhoti idaṃ padaṃ vibhaṅge dukkhasaccaniddesapāḷiyaṃ na āgataṃ, teneva
tika-vin02t:900_1: visuddhimaggepi dukkhasaccaniddese taṃ na uddhaṭaṃ, dhammacakkapavattanasuttantapāḷiyaṃyeva
tika-vin02t:900_2: pana upalabbhati, tasmā tatthevimassa vacane aññattha ca avacane kāraṇaṃ vīmaṃsitabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:901_0: Maraṇampi dukkhanti etthāpi duvidhaṃ maraṇaṃ saṅkhatalakkhaṇañca. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ
tika-vin02t:901_2: ca. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “niccaṃ maraṇato bhaya”nti, taṃ idha adhippetaṃ. Jātipaccayamaraṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:901_3: upakkamamaraṇaṃ sarasamaraṇaṃ āyukkhayamaraṇaṃ puññakkhayamaraṇantipi tasseva nāmaṃ.
tika-vin02t:901_4: Tayidaṃ dukkhassa vatthubhāvato dukkhanti veditabbaṃ. Tenāhu porāṇā –
tika-vin02t:909: Imasmiñca ṭhāne “sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsāpi dukkhā”ti vibhaṅge dukkhasaccaniddese āgataṃ, idha pana taṃ natthi, tatthāpi kāraṇaṃ pariyesitabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:910: Appiyehi sampayogo dukkhoti ettha appiyasampayogo nāma amanāpehi sattasaṅkhārehi samodhānaṃ. Sopi dukkhavatthuto dukkho. Tenāhu porāṇā –
tika-vin02t:915: Piyehi vippayogo dukkhoti ettha pana piyavippayogo nāma manāpehi sattasaṅkhārehi vinābhāvo. Sopi sokadukkhassa vatthuto dukkho. Tenāhu porāṇā –
tika-vin02t:920_0: Yampicchaṃ na labhatīti ettha “aho vata mayaṃ na jātidhammā assāmā”tiādīsu alabbhaneyyavatthūsu
tika-vin02t:920_1: icchāva “yampicchaṃ na labhati, tampi dukkha”nti vuttā, sāpi dukkhavatthuto dukkhā. Tenāhu porāṇā –
tika-vin02t:922: Yaṃ vighātamayaṃ dukkhaṃ, sattānaṃ idha jāyati.
tika-vin02t:925_0: Saṃkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhāti ettha pana yasmā indhanamiva pāvako, lakkhamiva
tika-vin02t:925_1: paharaṇāni, gorūpaṃ viya ḍaṃsamakasādayo, khettamiva lāyakā, gāmaṃ viya gāmaghātakā,
tika-vin02t:925_2: upādānakkhandhapañcakameva jātiādayo nānappakārehi vibādhentā tiṇalatādīni viya bhūmiyaṃ,
tika-vin02t:925_3: pupphaphalapallavāni viya rukkhesu upādānakkhandhesuyeva nibbattanti, upādānakkhandhānañca
tika-vin02t:925_4: ādidukkhaṃ jāti, majjhedukkhaṃ jarā, pariyosānadukkhaṃ maraṇaṃ, manorathavighātappattānañca
tika-vin02t:925_5: icchāvighātadukkhaṃ icchitālābhoti evaṃ nānappakārato upaparikkhiyamānā upādānakkhandhāva
tika-vin02t:925_6: dukkhāti yadetaṃ ekamekaṃ dassetvā vuccamānaṃ anekehipi kappehi na sakkā anavasesato
tika-vin02t:925_7: vattuṃ, tasmā taṃ sabbampi dukkhaṃ ekajalabindumhi sakalasamuddajalarasaṃ viya yesu
tika-vin02t:927: Avuttaṃ yañca taṃ sabbaṃ, vinā ete na vijjati.
tika-vin02t:930_0: Evaṃ sarūpato dukkhasaccaṃ dassetvā idāni samudayasaccaṃ dassetuṃ “idaṃ kho pana,
tika-vin02t:930_1: bhikkhave, dukkhasamudaya”ntiādimāha. Tattha saṃ-iti ayaṃ saddo “samāgamo sameta”ntiādīsu
tika-vin02t:930_2: saṃyogaṃ dīpeti, u-iti ayaṃ “uppannaṃ udita”ntiādīsu uppattiṃ. Aya-saddo pana kāraṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:930_3: dīpeti. Idañcāpi dutiyasaccaṃ avasesapaccayasamāyoge sati dukkhassuppattikāraṇanti
tika-vin02t:930_4: dukkhassa saṃyoge uppattikāraṇattā “dukkhasamudaya”nti vuccati. Yāyaṃ taṇhāti yā
tika-vin02t:930_5: ayaṃ taṇhā. Ponobbhavikāti punabbhavakaraṇaṃ punabbhavo uttarapadalopena, punabbhavo
tika-vin02t:930_6: sīlametissāti ponobbhavikā. Nandīrāgena sahagatāti nandīrāgasahagatā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ
tika-vin02t:930_7: hoti “nandanato rajjanato ca nandīrāgabhāvaṃ sabbāsu avatthāsu appaccakkhāya vuttiyā
tika-vin02t:930_8: nandīrāgasahagatā”ti. Tatratatrābhinandinīti yatra yatra attabhāvo nibbattati, tatratatrābhinandinī.
tika-vin02t:931_0: Seyyathidanti nipāto, tassa sā katamāti ceti ayamattho. Rūpataṇhādibhedena chabbidhāyeva
tika-vin02t:931_1: taṇhā pavattiākārabhedato kāmataṇhādivasena tividhā vuttā. Rūpataṇhāyeva hi yadā
tika-vin02t:931_2: cakkhussa āpāthamāgataṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ kāmassādavasena assādayamānā pavattati, tadā
tika-vin02t:931_3: kāmataṇhā nāma hoti. Yadā tadevārammaṇaṃ dhuvaṃ sassatanti pavattāya sassatadiṭṭhiyā
tika-vin02t:931_4: saddhiṃ pavattati, tadā bhavataṇhā nāma hoti. Sassatadiṭṭhisahagato hi rāgo “bhavataṇhā”ti
tika-vin02t:931_5: vuccati. Yadā pana tadevārammaṇaṃ ucchijjati vinassatīti pavattāya ucchedadiṭṭhiyā
tika-vin02t:931_6: saddhiṃ pavattati, tadā vibhavataṇhā nāma hoti. Ucchedadiṭṭhisahagato hi rāgo “vibhavataṇhā”ti
tika-vin02t:932_0: Kasmā panettha taṇhāva samudayasaccaṃ vuttāti? Visesahetubhāvato. Avijjā hi bhavesu
tika-vin02t:932_1: ādīnavaṃ paṭicchādentī diṭṭhiādiupādānañca tattha tattha abhinivisamānaṃ taṇhaṃ abhivaḍḍheti,
tika-vin02t:932_2: dosādayopi kammassa kāraṇaṃ honti, taṇhā pana taṃtaṃbhavayonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāāvāsasattanikāyakulabhogissariyādivicittataṃ
tika-vin02t:932_3: abhipatthentī kammavicittatāya upanissayataṃ kammassa ca sahāyabhāvaṃ upagacchantī
tika-vin02t:932_4: bhavādivicittataṃ niyameti, tasmā dukkhassa visesahetubhāvato aññesupi avijjāupādānakammādīsu
tika-vin02t:932_5: sutte abhidhamme ca avasesakilesākusalamūlādīsu vuttesu dukkhahetūsu vijjamānesu
tika-vin02t:933_0: Idāni dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ dassetuṃ “idaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhanirodha”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin02t:933_1: Tattha yasmā ni-saddo abhāvaṃ, rodha-saddo ca cārakaṃ dīpeti, tasmā abhāvo ettha
tika-vin02t:933_2: saṃsāracārakasaṅkhātassa dukkharodhassa sabbagatisuññattā, samadhigate vā tasmiṃ
tika-vin02t:933_4: vuccati. Dukkhassa vā anuppādanirodhapaccayattā dukkhanirodhaṃ. Dukkhanirodhaṃ dassentena
tika-vin02t:933_5: cettha “yo tassāyeva taṇhāyā”tiādinā nayena samudayanirodho vutto, so kasmā vuttoti
tika-vin02t:933_6: ce? Samudayanirodhena dukkhanirodho. Byādhinimittavūpasamena byādhivūpasamo viya
tika-vin02t:933_7: hi hetunirodhena phalanirodho, tasmā samudayanirodheneva dukkhaṃ nirujjhati, na aññathā. Tenāha –
tika-vin02t:938_0: Iti yasmā samudayanirodheneva dukkhaṃ nirujjhati, tasmā bhagavā dukkhanirodhaṃ dassento
tika-vin02t:938_1: samudayanirodhena desesi. Sīhasamānavuttino hi tathāgatā. Te dukkhaṃ nirodhentā dukkhanirodhañca
tika-vin02t:938_2: desentā hetumhi paṭipajjanti, na phale. Yathā hi sīho yenattani saro khitto, tattheva
tika-vin02t:938_3: attano balaṃ dasseti, na sare, tathā buddhānaṃ kāraṇe paṭipatti, na phale. Titthiyā
tika-vin02t:938_4: pana suvānavuttino. Te dukkhaṃ nirodhentā dukkhanirodhañca desentā attakilamathānuyogadesanādīhi
tika-vin02t:938_5: phale paṭipajjanti, na hetumhi. Yathā hi sunakhā kenaci leḍḍuppahāre dinne bhussantā
tika-vin02t:938_6: leḍḍuṃ khādanti, na pahāradāyake uṭṭhahanti, evaṃ aññatitthiyā dukkhaṃ nirodhetukāmā
tika-vin02t:938_7: kāyakhedamanuyujjanti, na kilesanirodhanaṃ, evaṃ tāva dukkhanirodhassa samudayanirodhavasena
tika-vin02t:939_0: Ayaṃ panettha attho. Tassāyeva taṇhāyāti tassā “ponobbhavikā”ti vatvā kāmataṇhādivasena
tika-vin02t:939_1: vibhattataṇhāya. Virāgo vuccati maggo. “Virāgā vimuccatī”ti hi vuttaṃ. Virāgena nirodho
tika-vin02t:939_2: virāganirodho, anusayasamugghātato aseso virāganirodho asesavirāganirodho. Atha vā
tika-vin02t:939_3: virāgoti pahānaṃ vuccati, tasmā anusayasamugghātato aseso virāgo aseso nirodhoti
tika-vin02t:939_4: evampettha yojanā daṭṭhabbā, atthato pana sabbāneva etāni nibbānassa vevacanāni.
tika-vin02t:939_5: Paramatthato hi dukkhanirodho ariyasaccanti nibbānaṃ vuccati. Yasmā pana taṃ āgamma
tika-vin02t:939_6: taṇhā virajjati ceva nirujjhati ca, tasmā “virāgo”ti ca “nirodho”ti ca vuccati. Yasmā
tika-vin02t:939_7: ca tadeva āgamma tassā cāgādayo honti, kāmaguṇālayādīsu cettha ekopi ālayo natthi,
tika-vin02t:939_8: tasmā cāgo paṭinissaggo mutti anālayoti vuccati.
tika-vin02t:940_0: Idāni dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadāariyasaccaṃ dassetuṃ “idaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave,
tika-vin02t:940_1: dukkhanirodhagāminī”tiādimāha. Yasmā panetaṃ ariyasaccaṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ gacchati
tika-vin02t:940_2: ārammaṇavasaena tadabhimukhabhūtattā, paṭipadā ca hoti dukkhanirodhappattiyā, tasmā
tika-vin02t:940_3: “dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā”ti vuccati. Sesamettha vuttanayameva. Ko pana nesaṃ
tika-vin02t:940_4: dukkhādīnaṃ saccaṭṭhoti? Yo paññācakkhunā upaparikkhiyamānānaṃ māyāva viparīto, marīciva
tika-vin02t:940_5: visaṃvādako, titthiyānaṃ attā viya anupalabbhasabhāvo ca na hoti, atha kho bādhanappabhavasantiniyyānappakārena
tika-vin02t:940_6: tacchāviparītabhūtabhāvena ariyañāṇassa gocaro hotiyeva, esa aggilakkhaṇaṃ viya lokapakati
tika-vin02t:940_7: viya ca tacchāviparītabhūtabhāvo saccaṭṭhoti veditabbo. Ettha ca aggilakkhaṇaṃ nāma
tika-vin02t:940_8: uṇhattaṃ. Tañhi katthaci kaṭṭhādiupādānabhede visaṃvādakaṃ viparītaṃ abhūtaṃ vā kadācipi
tika-vin02t:940_9: na hoti, “jātidhammā jarādhammā, atho maraṇadhammino”ti evaṃ vuttajātiādikā lokapakatīti
tika-vin02t:940_10: veditabbā. “Ekaccānaṃ tiracchānānaṃ tiriyaṃ dīghatā, manussādīnaṃ uddhaṃ dīghatā,
tika-vin02t:940_11: vuddhiniṭṭhappattānaṃ puna avaḍḍhananti evamādikā ca lokapakatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:942: Nābādhakaṃ yato dukkhaṃ, dukkhā aññaṃ na bādhakaṃ;
tika-vin02t:944: Taṃ vinā nāññato dukkhaṃ, na hoti na ca taṃ tato;
tika-vin02t:946: Nāññā nibbānato santi, santaṃ na ca na taṃ yato;
tika-vin02t:948: Maggā aññaṃ na niyyānaṃ, aniyyāno na cāpi so;
tika-vin02t:952_0: 15. Pubbe ananussutesūti ito pubbe “idaṃ dukkha”ntiādinā na anussutesu assutapubbesu
tika-vin02t:952_1: catusaccadhammesu. Cakkhuntiādīni ñāṇavevacanāneva. Ñāṇameva hettha paccakkhato dassanaṭṭhena
tika-vin02t:952_2: cakkhu viyāti cakkhu, ñāṇaṭṭhena ñāṇaṃ, pakārato jānanaṭṭhena paññā, paṭivijjhanaṭṭhena
tika-vin02t:952_3: vijjā, saccappaṭicchādakassa mohandhakārassa vidhamanato obhāsanaṭṭhena ālokoti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:952_4: Taṃ panetaṃ catūsu saccesu lokiyalokuttaramissakaṃ niddiṭṭhanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:953_1: tiṇṇaṃ parivaṭṭānaṃ vasena tiparivaṭṭaṃ. Saccañāṇādivasena hi tayo parivaṭṭā etassāti
tika-vin02t:953_2: tiparivaṭṭanti vuccati ñāṇadassanaṃ. Ettha ca “idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ, idaṃ dukkhasamudaya”nti
tika-vin02t:953_3: evaṃ catūsu saccesu yathābhūtañāṇaṃ saccañāṇaṃ nāma. Tesuyeva “pariññeyyaṃ pahātabbaṃ
tika-vin02t:953_4: sacchikātabbaṃ bhāvetabba”nti evaṃ kattabbakiccajānanañāṇaṃ kiccañāṇaṃ nāma. “Pariññātaṃ
tika-vin02t:953_5: pahīnaṃ sacchikataṃ bhāvita”nti evaṃ tassa katabhāvajānanañāṇaṃ katañāṇaṃ nāma. Dvādasākāranti
tika-vin02t:953_6: tesaṃyeva ekekasmiṃ sacce tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ākārānaṃ vasena dvādasākāraṃ. Ñāṇadassananti
tika-vin02t:953_7: etesaṃ tiparivaṭṭānaṃ dvādasannaṃ ākārānaṃ vasena uppannañāṇasaṅkhātaṃ dassanaṃ.
tika-vin02t:954_0: Anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhinti uttaravirahitaṃ sabbaseṭṭhaṃ sammā sāmañca bodhiṃ. Atha
tika-vin02t:954_1: vā pasatthaṃ sundarañca bodhiṃ. Bodhīti ca bhagavato arahattamaggo idhādhippeto.
tika-vin02t:954_2: Sāvakānaṃ arahattamaggo anuttarā bodhi hoti, na hotīti? Na hoti. Kasmā? Asabbaguṇadāyakattā.
tika-vin02t:954_3: Tesañhi kassaci arahattamaggo arahattaphalameva deti, kassaci tisso vijjā, kassaci
tika-vin02t:954_4: cha abhiññā, kassaci catasso paṭisambhidā, kassaci sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ. Paccekabuddhānampi
tika-vin02t:954_5: paccekabodhiñāṇameva deti, buddhānaṃ pana sabbaguṇasampattiṃ deti abhiseko viya rañño
tika-vin02t:954_6: sabbalokissariyabhāvaṃ. Tasmā aññassa kassacipi anuttarā bodhi na hotīti. Abhisambuddhoti
tika-vin02t:954_7: paccaññāsinti abhisambuddho ahaṃ patto paṭivijjhitvā ṭhitoti evaṃ paṭijāniṃ. Ñāṇañca
tika-vin02t:954_8: pana me dassanaṃ udapādīti adhigataguṇānaṃ yāthāvato dassanasamatthaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇañca
tika-vin02t:954_9: pana me udapādi. Akuppā me vimuttīti ayaṃ mayhaṃ arahattaphalavimutti akuppā paṭipakkhehi
tika-vin02t:954_10: na kopetabbāti evaṃ ñāṇaṃ udapādi. Tattha dvīhākārehi akuppatā veditabbā maggasaṅkhātakāraṇato
tika-vin02t:954_11: ca ārammaṇato ca. Sā hi catūhi maggehi samucchinnakilesānaṃ puna anivattanatāya kāraṇatopi
tika-vin02t:954_12: akuppā, akuppadhammaṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattatāya ārammaṇatopi akuppā anākuppārammaṇānaṃ
tika-vin02t:954_13: lokiyasamāpattīnaṃ tadabhāvato. Antimāti pacchimā. Natthi dāni punabbhavoti idāni
tika-vin02t:955_0: Imasmiñca pana veyyākaraṇasminti imasmiṃ niggāthake sutte. Niggāthakañhi suttaṃ pucchāvissajjanasahitaṃ
tika-vin02t:955_1: “veyyākaraṇa”nti vuccati. Bhaññamāneti bhaṇiyamāne, desiyamāneti attho. Virajanti
tika-vin02t:955_4: vītamalaṃ. Dhammacakkhunti brahmāyusutte heṭṭhimā tayo maggā vuttā, cūḷarāhulovāde
tika-vin02t:955_5: āsavakkhayo, idha pana sotāpattimaggo adhippeto. Catusaccasaṅkhātesu dhammesu tesaṃ
tika-vin02t:955_6: dassanaṭṭhena cakkhūti dhammacakkhu, heṭṭhimesu vā tīsu maggadhammesu ekaṃ sotāpattimaggasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin02t:955_8: vā dhammamayaṃ cakkhūtipi dhammacakkhu, tassa uppattiākāradassanatthaṃ “yaṃ kiñci
tika-vin02t:955_9: samudayadhammaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma”nti āha. Nanu ca maggañāṇaṃ asaṅkhatadhammārammaṇaṃ,
tika-vin02t:955_10: na saṅkhatadhammārammaṇanti? Saccametaṃ, yasmā taṃ nirodhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā kiccavasena
tika-vin02t:955_11: sabbasaṅkhataṃ asammohappaṭivedhavasena paṭivijjhantaṃ uppajjati, tasmā tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:956_0: 17. Dhammacakketi paṭivedhañāṇañceva desanāñāṇañca pavattanaṭṭhena cakkanti dhammacakkaṃ.
tika-vin02t:956_1: Bodhipallaṅke nisinnassa hi catūsu saccesu uppannaṃ dvādasākāraṃ paṭivedhañāṇampi,
tika-vin02t:956_2: isipatane nisinnassa dvādasākārāya saccadesanāya pavattakaṃ desanāñāṇampi dhammacakkaṃ
tika-vin02t:956_3: nāma. Ubhayampi hetaṃ dasabalassa ure pavattañāṇameva. Tadubhayaṃ imāya desanāya
tika-vin02t:956_4: pakāsentena bhagavatā dhammacakkaṃ pavattitaṃ nāma. Taṃ panetaṃ dhammacakkaṃ yāva
