tika-vin02t:956_5: aññāsikoṇḍaññatthero aṭṭhārasahi brahmakoṭīhi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāti,
tika-vin02t:956_6: tāva bhagavā pavatteti nāma pavattanakiccassa aniṭṭhitattā. Patiṭṭhite pavattitaṃ
tika-vin02t:956_7: nāma kassapasammāsambuddhassa sāsanantaradhānato paṭṭhāya yāva buddhuppādo, ettakaṃ
tika-vin02t:956_8: kālaṃ appavattapubbassa pavattitattā. Taṃ sandhāya “pavattite ca pana bhagavatā dhammacakke
tika-vin02t:956_9: bhummā devā saddamanussāvesu”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha bhummāti bhūmaṭṭhakadevatā. Saddamanussāvesunti
tika-vin02t:956_10: ekappahāreneva sādhukāraṃ datvā “etaṃ bhagavatā”tiādīni vadantā anussāvayiṃsu. Obhāsoti
tika-vin02t:956_11: sabbaññutaññāṇānubhāvena pavatto cittapaccayautusamuṭṭhāno obhāso. So hi tadā devānaṃ
tika-vin02t:956_12: devānubhāvaṃ atikkamitvā virocittha. Aññāsi vata bho koṇḍaññoti imassapi udānassa
tika-vin02t:956_13: udāharaṇaghoso dasasahassilokadhātuṃ pharitvā aṭṭhāsi. Bhagavato hi dhammacakkappavattanassa
tika-vin02t:956_14: ārambhe viya parisamāpanepi ativiya uḷāratamaṃ pītisomanassaṃ udapādi.
tika-vin02t:957_0: 18. Diṭṭho ariyasaccadhammo etenāti diṭṭhadhammo. Esa nayo sesapadesupi. Ettha ca
tika-vin02t:957_1: dassanaṃ nāma ñāṇadassanato aññampi atthīti taṃnivattanatthaṃ “pattadhammo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:957_2: Patti ca ñāṇasampattito aññāpi vijjatīti tato visesanatthaṃ “viditadhammo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:957_3: Sā panesā viditadhammatā ekadesatopi hotīti nippadesato viditabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “pariyogāḷhadhammo”ti
tika-vin02t:957_4: vuttaṃ. Tenassa saccābhisambodhiṃyeva dīpeti. Maggañāṇañhi ekābhisamayavasena pariññādikiccaṃ
tika-vin02t:957_5: sādhentaṃ nippadesena catusaccadhammaṃ samantato ogāḷhaṃ nāma hoti. Sappaṭibhayakantārasadisā
tika-vin02t:957_6: soḷasavatthukā aṭṭhavatthukā ca tiṇṇā vicikicchā anenāti tiṇṇavicikiccho. Pavattiādīsu
tika-vin02t:957_7: “evaṃ nukho na nukho”ti evaṃ pavattikā vigatā samucchinnā kathaṃkathā assāti vigatakathaṃkatho.
tika-vin02t:957_8: Vesārajjappattoti sārajjakarānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ pahīnattā tappaṭipakkhesu ca sīlādīsu
tika-vin02t:957_9: guṇesu suppatiṭṭhitattā visāradabhāvaṃ veyyattiyaṃ patto adhigato. Svāyaṃ vesārajjappattisuppatiṭṭhitabhāvo
tika-vin02t:957_10: katthāti āha “satthusāsane”ti. Attanā paccakkhato adhigatattā na paraṃ pacceti, parassa
tika-vin02t:957_11: saddhāya ettha nappavattati, na tassa paro paccetabbo atthīti aparappaccayo.
tika-vin02t:958_0: Labheyyāhanti labheyyaṃ ahaṃ, āyācanavacanametaṃ. Ehīti āyācitānaṃ pabbajjūpasampadānaṃ
tika-vin02t:958_1: anumatabhāvappakāsanavacanaṃ, tasmā ehi sampaṭicchāhi yathāyācitaṃ pabbajjūpasampadavisesanti
tika-vin02t:958_3: Tadavasāno hi tassa bhikkhubhāvo. Tenevāha “ehi bhikkhūti bhagavato vacanena abhinipphannā
tika-vin02t:958_4: sāva tassa āyasmato ehibhikkhūpasampadā ahosī”ti. Cara brahmacariyanti uparimaggattayasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin02t:958_5: brahmacariyaṃ samadhigaccha. Kimatthaṃ? Sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāya. Idhāpi “avocā”ti
tika-vin02t:958_7: samādiyitvā vattanena uparibhūtā aggabhūtā sampadāti upasampadā.
tika-vin02t:959_0: 19. Nīhārabhattoti nīhaṭabhatto, gāmato bhikkhaṃ nīharitvā bhikkhūhi dinnabhattoti
tika-vin02t:959_1: attho. Bhagavā hi daharakumārake viya te bhikkhū pariharanto pāṭipadadivasato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin02t:962_0: 20. Āmantesīti āsāḷhīpuṇṇamadivase dhammacakkappavattanato paṭṭhāya anukkamena sotāpattiphale
tika-vin02t:962_1: patiṭṭhite aññāsikoṇḍaññappamukhe pañcavaggiye “idāni tesaṃ āsavakkhayāya dhammaṃ
tika-vin02t:962_2: desessāmī”ti pañcamiyā pakkhassa āmantesi. Anattāti avasavattanaṭṭhena asāmikaṭṭhena
tika-vin02t:962_3: suññataṭṭhena attapaṭikkhepaṭṭhenāti evaṃ catūhi kāraṇehi anattā. Tattha “uppannaṃ
tika-vin02t:962_4: rūpaṃ ṭhitiṃ mā pāpuṇātu, ṭhānappattaṃ mā jīratu, jarappattaṃ mā bhijjatu, udayabbayehi
tika-vin02t:962_5: mā kilamayatū”ti na ettha kassaci vasībhāvo atthi, svāyamassa avasavattanaṭṭho. Sāmibhūtassa
tika-vin02t:962_6: kassaci abhāvo asāmikaṭṭho. Nivāsīkārakavedakaadhiṭṭhāyakavirahena tato suññatā suññataṭṭho.
tika-vin02t:962_7: Paraparikappitaattasabhāvābhāvo eva attapaṭikkhepaṭṭho. Idāni anattataṃyeva vibhāvetuṃ
tika-vin02t:962_8: “rūpañca hidaṃ bhikkhave”tiādimāha. Tattha attā abhavissāti kārako vedako sayaṃvasīti
tika-vin02t:962_9: evaṃbhūto attā abhavissāti adhippāyo. Evañhi sati rūpassa ābādhāya saṃvattanaṃ ayujjamānakaṃ
tika-vin02t:962_10: siyā. Kāmañcettha “yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ anattā, tasmā rūpaṃ ābādhāya saṃvattatī”ti
tika-vin02t:962_11: rūpassa anattatāya dukkhatā vibhāvitā viya dissati, tathāpi “yasmā rūpaṃ ābādhāya
tika-vin02t:962_12: saṃvattati, tasmā anattā”ti pākaṭāya sābādhatāya rūpassa attasārābhāvo vibhāvito,
tika-vin02t:962_13: tato eva ca “na ca labbhati rūpe ‘evaṃ me rūpaṃ hotu, evaṃ me rūpaṃ mā ahosī’ti”
tika-vin02t:962_14: rūpe kassaci anissaratā tassa ca avasavattanākāro dassito. Vedanādīsupi eseva nayo.
tika-vin02t:963_0: 21. Taṃ kiṃmaññatha bhikkhaveti idaṃ kasmā āraddhaṃ? Ettakena ṭhānena anattalakkhaṇameva
tika-vin02t:963_1: kathitaṃ, na aniccadukkhalakkhaṇāni, idāni tāni dassetvā samodhānetvā tīṇipi lakkhaṇāni
tika-vin02t:963_2: dassetuṃ idamāraddhanti veditabbaṃ. Aniccaṃ bhanteti bhante yasmā hutvā na hoti,
tika-vin02t:963_3: tasmā aniccaṃ. Yasmā pubbe asantaṃ paccayasamavāyena hutvā uppajjitvā puna bhaṅgupagamanena
tika-vin02t:963_4: na hoti, tasmā na niccanti aniccaṃ, addhuvanti adhippāyo. Atha vā uppādavayavantatāya
tika-vin02t:963_5: tāvakālikatāya vipariṇāmakoṭiyā niccappaṭikkhepatoti imehipi kāraṇehi aniccaṃ. Ettha
tika-vin02t:963_6: khaṇe khaṇe uppajjanavasena nirujjhanavasena ca pavattanato uppādavayavantatā. Taṅkhaṇikatāya
tika-vin02t:963_8: vipariṇāmantaṃ vināsaṃ pāpuṇāti. Niccasabhāvābhāvo eva niccapaṭikkhepo. Aniccā hi
tika-vin02t:963_9: dhammā, teneva attano aniccabhāvena atthato niccataṃ paṭikkhipanti nāma.
tika-vin02t:964_0: Dukkhaṃ bhanteti bhante paṭipīḷanākārena dukkhaṃ. Uppādajarābhaṅgavasena hi rūpassa
tika-vin02t:964_1: nirantaraṃ bādhati, paṭipīḷanākārenassa dukkhatā. Atha vā santāpaṭṭhena dukkhamaṭṭhena
tika-vin02t:964_2: dukkhavatthukaṭṭhena sukhapaṭikkhepaṭṭhena cāti catūhi kāraṇehi dukkhaṃ. Ettha ca
tika-vin02t:964_3: santāpo nāma dukkhadukkhatādivasena santāpanaṃ paridahanaṃ. Tato evassa dussahatāya
tika-vin02t:964_4: dukkhamatā. Tissannaṃ dukkhatānaṃ saṃsāradukkhassa ca adhiṭṭhānatāya dukkhavatthukatā.
tika-vin02t:964_5: Sukhasabhāvābhāvo eva sukhapaṭikkhepo. Vipariṇāmadhammanti jarāya maraṇena ca vipariṇāmasabhāvaṃ.
tika-vin02t:964_6: Kallaṃ nūti yuttaṃ nu. Tanti evaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ rūpaṃ. Etaṃ mamāti
tika-vin02t:964_7: taṇhāgāho mamaṅkārabhāvato. Esohamasmīti mānagāho ahaṅkārabhāvato. Eso me attāti
tika-vin02t:964_9: mānagāho navavidhamānavasena, diṭṭhigāho dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhivasena veditabbo. Imesaṃ
tika-vin02t:964_10: tiṇṇaṃ taṇhāmānadiṭṭhigāhānaṃ vasena yuttaṃ nu taṃ samanupassitunti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin02t:965_0: Iti bhagavā aniccadukkhavasena anattalakkhaṇaṃyeva dassesi. Bhagavā hi katthaci aniccavasena
tika-vin02t:965_1: anattataṃ dasseti, katthaci dukkhavasena, katthaci ubhayavasena. Tathā hi “cakkhu
tika-vin02t:965_2: attāti yo vadeyya, taṃ na upapajjati, cakkhussa uppādopi vayopi paññāyati. Yassa
tika-vin02t:965_3: kho pana uppādopi vayopi paññāyati, ‘attā me uppajjati ceva veti cā’ti iccassa evamāgataṃ
tika-vin02t:965_4: hoti, tasmā taṃ na upapajjati. ‘Cakkhu attā’ti yo vadeyya, iti cakkhu anattā”ti imasmiñca
tika-vin02t:965_5: chachakkasutte aniccavasena anattataṃ dassesi. “Rūpañca hidaṃ, bhikkhave, attā abhavissa…pe…
tika-vin02t:965_6: evaṃ me rūpaṃ mā ahosī”ti imasmiṃyeva anattalakkhaṇasutte dukkhavasena anattataṃ
tika-vin02t:965_7: dassesi. “Rūpaṃ, bhikkhave, aniccaṃ, yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkhaṃ, yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadanattā,
tika-vin02t:965_8: yadanattā, taṃ ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na me so attā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya
tika-vin02t:965_9: daṭṭhabba”nti imasmiṃ arahantasutte ubhayavasena anattataṃ dassesi. Kasmā? Aniccaṃ
tika-vin02t:965_10: dukkhañca pākaṭaṃ, anattā apākaṭaṃ. Paribhogabhājanādīsu hi bhinnesu “aho anicca”nti
tika-vin02t:965_11: vadanti, “aho anattā”ti pana vattā nāma natthi. Sarīre gaṇḍapiḷakāsu vā uṭṭhitāsu
tika-vin02t:965_12: kaṇṭakena vā viddhā “aho dukkha”nti vadanti, “aho anattā”ti pana vattā nāma natthi.
tika-vin02t:965_13: Kasmā? Idañhi anattalakkhaṇaṃ nāma avibhūtaṃ duddasaṃ duppaññāpanaṃ. Tathā hi sarabhaṅgādayopi
tika-vin02t:965_14: satthāro nāddasaṃsu, kuto paññāpanā, tena naṃ bhagavā aniccavasena vā dukkhavasena
tika-vin02t:965_15: vā ubhayavasena vā dassesi. Tayidaṃ imasmimpi teparivaṭṭe aniccadukkhavaseneva dassitaṃ.
tika-vin02t:966_0: 22. Tasmātihāti tasmā icceva vuttaṃ. Ti-kāra ha-kārā nipātā, yasmā ime pañcakkhandhā
tika-vin02t:966_1: aniccā dukkhā anattā, tasmāti attho. Yaṃ kiñcīti anavasesapariyādānametaṃ. Yanti
tika-vin02t:966_2: hi sāmaññena aniyamadassanaṃ, kiñcīti pakārato bhedaṃ āmasitvā aniyamadassanaṃ. Ubhayenapi
tika-vin02t:966_3: atītaṃ vā…pe… santike vā appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā yādisaṃ vā tādisaṃ vā napuṃsakaniddesārahaṃ
tika-vin02t:966_4: sabbaṃ byāpetvā saṅgaṇhāti, tasmā anavasesapariyādānametaṃ “yaṃ kiñcī”ti. Evañca
tika-vin02t:966_5: sati aññesupi napuṃsakaniddesārahesu pasaṅgaṃ disvā tattha adhippetatthaṃ adhicca
tika-vin02t:966_6: pavattanato atippasaṅgassa niyamanatthaṃ “rūpa”nti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ padadvayenapi rūpassa
tika-vin02t:966_7: asesapariggaho kato hoti. Athassa atītādivibhāgaṃ ārabhati “atītānāgatapaccuppanna”ntiādinā.
tika-vin02t:966_8: Tañhi kiñci atītaṃ kiñci anāgatādibhedanti. Esa nayo vedanādīsupi.
tika-vin02t:967_0: Tattha rūpaṃ tāva addhāsantatisamayakhaṇavasena catudhā atītaṃ nāma hoti, tathā anāgatapaccuppannaṃ.
tika-vin02t:967_1: Tattha addhāvasena tāva ekassa ekasmiṃ bhave paṭisandhito pubbe atītaṃ, cutito uddhamanāgataṃ,
tika-vin02t:967_3: pubbāpariyavasena vattamānampi paccuppannaṃ, tato pubbe visabhāgautuāhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin02t:967_4: atītaṃ, pacchā anāgataṃ. Cittajaṃ ekavīthiekajavanaekasamāpattisamuṭṭhānaṃ paccuppannaṃ,
tika-vin02t:967_5: tato pubbe atītaṃ, pacchā anāgataṃ. Kammasamuṭṭhānassa pāṭiyekkaṃ santativasena atītādibhedo
tika-vin02t:967_6: natthi. Tesaṃyeva pana utuāhāracittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ upatthambhakavasena tassa atītādibhāvo
tika-vin02t:967_8: pavattamānaṃ taṃtaṃsamayavantaṃ rūpaṃ paccuppannaṃ nāma, tato pubbe atītaṃ, pacchā
tika-vin02t:967_9: anāgataṃ. Khaṇavasena uppādādikkhaṇattayapariyāpannaṃ paccuppannaṃ, tato pubbe atītaṃ,
tika-vin02t:967_10: pacchā anāgataṃ, idamevettha nippariyāyaṃ, sesā pariyāyakathā.
tika-vin02t:968_0: Ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vāti cakkhādipañcavidhaṃ rūpaṃ attabhāvaṃ adhikicca pavattattā
tika-vin02t:968_1: ajjhattaṃ, sesaṃ tato bāhirattā bahiddhā. Apica niyakajjhattampi idha ajjhattaṃ,
tika-vin02t:968_2: parapuggalikampi ca bahiddhāti veditabbaṃ. Oḷārikaṃ vā sukhumaṃ vāti cakkhādīni nava,
tika-vin02t:968_3: āpodhātuvajjā tisso dhātuyo cāti dvādasavidhaṃ rūpaṃ ghaṭṭanavasena gahetabbato oḷārikaṃ,
tika-vin02t:968_4: sesaṃ tato viparītattā sukhumaṃ. Hīnaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vāti ettha hīnapaṇītabhāvo pariyāyato
tika-vin02t:968_5: nippariyāyato ca. Tattha akaniṭṭhānaṃ rūpato sudassīnaṃ rūpaṃ hīnaṃ, tadeva sudassānaṃ
tika-vin02t:968_6: rūpato paṇītaṃ. Evaṃ yāva narakasattānaṃ rūpaṃ, tāva pariyāyato hīnapaṇītatā veditabbā.
tika-vin02t:968_7: Nippariyāyato pana yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā akusalavipākaviññāṇaṃ uppajjati, taṃ hīnaṃ
tika-vin02t:968_8: aniṭṭhabhāvato. Yaṃ pana ārammaṇaṃ katvā kusalavipākaviññāṇaṃ uppajjati, taṃ paṇītaṃ
tika-vin02t:968_9: iṭṭhabhāvato. Yathā hi akusalavipāko sayaṃ aniṭṭho aniṭṭhe eva uppajjati, na iṭṭhe,
tika-vin02t:968_10: evaṃ kusalavipākopi sayaṃ iṭṭho iṭṭheyeva uppajjati, na aniṭṭhe. Yaṃ dūre santike
tika-vin02t:968_11: vāti yaṃ sukhumaṃ, tadeva duppaṭivijjhasabhāvattā dūre, itaraṃ suppaṭivijjhasabhāvattā
tika-vin02t:968_12: santike. Apicettha okāsatopi upādāyupādāya dūrasantikatā veditabbā. Taṃ sabbanti
tika-vin02t:968_13: taṃ atītādīhi padehi visuṃ niddiṭṭhaṃ sabbaṃ rūpaṃ. Sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbanti sahavipassanāya
tika-vin02t:969_0: Yā kāci vedanātiādīsu pana santativasena ca khaṇavasena ca vedanāya atītānāgatapaccuppannabhāvo
tika-vin02t:969_2: ca divasampi buddharūpaṃ passantassa dhammaṃ suṇantassa pavattasaddhādisahitavedanā
tika-vin02t:969_3: paccuppannā, tato pubbe atītā, pacchā anāgatā. Khaṇavasena khaṇattayapariyāpannā
tika-vin02t:969_4: paccuppannā, tato pubbe atītā, pacchā anāgatā. Ajjhattabahiddhābhedo niyakajjhattavasena
tika-vin02t:969_5: veditabbo. Oḷārikasukhumabhedo “akusalā vedanā oḷārikā, kusalābyākatā vedanā sukhumā”tiādinā
tika-vin02t:969_6: nayena vibhaṅge vuttena jātisabhāvapuggalalokiyalokuttaravasena veditabbo. Jātivasena
tika-vin02t:969_7: tāva akusalavedanā sāvajjakiriyahetuto kilesasantāpasabhāvato ca avūpasantavuttīti
tika-vin02t:969_8: kusalavedanāya oḷārikā, sabyāpārato saussāhato savipākato kilesasantāpasabhāvato
tika-vin02t:969_9: sāvajjato ca vipākābyākatāya oḷārikā, savipākato kilesasantāpasabhāvato sabyāpajjato
tika-vin02t:969_10: sāvajjato ca kiriyābyākatāya oḷārikā, kusalābyākatā pana vuttavipariyāyato akusalāya
tika-vin02t:969_11: sukhumā. Dvepi kusalākusalavedanā sabyāpārato saussāhato savipākato ca yathāyogaṃ
tika-vin02t:969_12: duvidhāyapi abyākatāya oḷārikā, vuttavipariyāyena duvidhāpi abyākatā tāhi sukhumā.
tika-vin02t:970_0: Sabhāvavasena pana dukkhavedanā nirassādato savipphārato ubbejanīyato abhibhavanato
tika-vin02t:970_1: ca itarāhi dvīhi oḷārikā, itarā pana dve sātato santato paṇītato manāpato majjhattato
tika-vin02t:970_2: ca yathāyogaṃ dukkhāya sukhumā. Ubho pana sukhadukkhā savipphārato khobhakaraṇato
tika-vin02t:970_3: pākaṭato ca adukkhamasukhāya oḷārikā, sā vuttavipariyāyena tadubhayato sukhumā. Evaṃ
tika-vin02t:970_4: sabhāvavasena oḷārikasukhumatā veditabbā. Puggalavasena pana asamāpannassa vedanā
tika-vin02t:970_5: nānārammaṇavikkhittabhāvato samāpannassa vedanāya oḷārikā, vipariyāyena itarā sukhumā.
tika-vin02t:970_6: Evaṃ puggalavasena oḷārikasukhumatā veditabbā. Lokiyalokuttaravasena pana sāsavā
tika-vin02t:970_7: vedanā lokiyā. Sā āsavuppattihetuto oghaniyato yoganiyato ganthaniyato nīvaraṇiyato
tika-vin02t:970_8: upādāniyato saṃkilesikato puthujjanasādhāraṇato ca anāsavāya oḷārikā, sā vipariyāyena
tika-vin02t:970_9: sāsavāya sukhumā. Evaṃ lokiyalokuttaravasena oḷārikasukhumatā veditabbā.
tika-vin02t:971_0: Tattha jātiādivasena sambhedo pariharitabbo. Akusalavipākakāyaviññāṇasampayuttā hi
tika-vin02t:971_1: vedanā jātivasena abyākatattā sukhumāpi samānā sabhāvādivasena oḷārikā hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ
tika-vin02t:971_2: “abyākatā vedanā sukhumā, dukkhā vedanā oḷārikā. Asamāpannassa vedanā oḷārikā, sāsavā
tika-vin02t:971_3: vedanā oḷārikā”ti. Yathā ca dukkhavedanā, evaṃ sukhādayopi jātivasena oḷārikā, sabhāvādivasena
tika-vin02t:971_4: sukhumā honti. Tasmā yathā jātiādivasena sambhedo na hoti, tathā vedanānaṃ oḷārikasukhumatā
tika-vin02t:971_5: veditabbā. Seyyathidaṃ – abyākatā jātivasena kusalākusalāhi sukhumā. Na tattha “katamā
tika-vin02t:971_6: abyākatā, kiṃ dukkhā, kiṃ sukhā, kiṃ samāpannassa, kiṃ asamāpannassa, kiṃ sāsavā,
tika-vin02t:971_7: kiṃ anāsavā”ti evaṃ sabhāvādibhedo parāmasitabbo. Esa nayo sabbattha.
tika-vin02t:972_0: Apica “taṃ taṃ vā pana vedanaṃ upādāyupādāya vedanā oḷārikā sukhumā daṭṭhabbā”ti
tika-vin02t:972_1: vacanato akusalādīsupi lobhasahagatāya dosasahagatavedanā aggi viya attano nissayadahanato
tika-vin02t:972_2: oḷārikā, lobhasahagatā sukhumā. Dosasahagatāpi niyatā oḷārikā, aniyatā sukhumā. Niyatāpi
tika-vin02t:972_3: kappaṭṭhitikā oḷārikā, itarā sukhumā. Kappaṭṭhitikāsupi asaṅkhārikā oḷārikā, itarā
tika-vin02t:972_4: sukhumā. Lobhasahagatā pana diṭṭhisampayuttā oḷārikā, itarā sukhumā. Sāpi niyatā
tika-vin02t:972_5: kappaṭṭhitikā asaṅkhārikā oḷārikā, itarā sukhumā, avisesena akusalā bahuvipākā oḷārikā,
tika-vin02t:972_6: appavipākā sukhumā. Kusalā pana appavipākā oḷārikā, bahuvipākā sukhumā.
tika-vin02t:973_0: Apica kāmāvacarakusalā oḷārikā, rūpāvacarā sukhumā, tato arūpāvacarā, tato lokuttarā.
tika-vin02t:973_1: Kāmāvacarā ca dānamayā oḷārikā, sīlamayā sukhumā, tato bhāvanāmayā. Bhāvanāmayāpi
tika-vin02t:973_2: duhetukā oḷārikā, tihetukā sukhumā. Tihetukāpi sasaṅkhārikā oḷārikā, asaṅkhārikā
tika-vin02t:973_3: sukhumā. Rūpāvacarā paṭhamajjhānikā oḷārikā…pe… pañcamajjhānikā sukhumāva. Arūpāvacarā
tika-vin02t:973_5: Lokuttarā ca sotāpattimaggasampayuttā oḷārikā…pe… arahattamaggasampayuttā sukhumāva.
tika-vin02t:973_6: Esa nayo taṃtaṃbhūmivipākakiriyavedanāsu dukkhādiasamāpannādisāsavādivasena vuttavedanāsu ca.
tika-vin02t:974_0: Okāsavasena cāpi niraye dukkhā oḷārikā, tiracchānayoniyaṃ sukhumā…pe… paranimmitavasavattī
tika-vin02t:974_1: sukhumāva. Yathā ca dukkhā, evaṃ sukhāpi sabbattha yathānurūpaṃ yojetabbā. Vatthuvasena
tika-vin02t:974_2: cāpi hīnavatthukā yā kāci vedanā oḷārikā, paṇītavatthukā sukhumā. Hīnappaṇītabhede
tika-vin02t:974_3: yā oḷārikā, sā hīnā. Yā ca sukhumā, sā paṇītāti veditabbā. Dūrapadaṃ pana akusalā
tika-vin02t:974_4: vedanā kusalābyākatāhi vedanāhi dūre, santikapadaṃ akusalā vedanā akusalāya vedanāya
tika-vin02t:974_5: santiketiādinā nayena vibhattaṃ. Tasmā akusalā vedanā visabhāgato asaṃsaṭṭhato asarikkhato
tika-vin02t:974_6: ca kusalābyākatāhi dūre, tathā kusalābyākatā akusalāya. Esa nayo sabbavāresu. Akusalā
tika-vin02t:974_7: pana vedanā sabhāgato ca saṃsaṭṭhato ca sarikkhato ca akusalāya santiketi. Taṃtaṃvedanāsampayuttānaṃ
tika-vin02t:975_0: 23. Sutavāti āgamādhigamasaṅkhātena bāhusaccena samannāgatattā sutavā. Nibbindatīti
tika-vin02t:975_1: ukkaṇṭhati. Ettha ca nibbidāti vuṭṭhānagāminīvipassanā adhippetā. Nibbindaṃ virajjatīti
tika-vin02t:975_2: ettha virāgavasena cattāro maggā kathitā. Virāgā vimuccatīti virāgena maggeneva hetubhūtena
tika-vin02t:975_3: paṭippassaddhivimuttivasena vimuccati. Iminā cattāri sāmaññaphalāni kathitāni. Vimuttasmiṃ
tika-vin02t:975_4: vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ hotīti iminā pana paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ kathitaṃ. Khīṇā jātītiādīhi
tika-vin02t:975_5: tassa bhūmi. Tena hi ñāṇena ariyasāvako paccavekkhanto “khīṇā jātī”tiādīni pajānāti.
tika-vin02t:975_6: Katamā panassa jāti khīṇā, kathañca naṃ pajānātīti? Na tāvassa atītā jāti khīṇā pubbeva
tika-vin02t:975_7: khīṇattā, na anāgatā anāgate vāyāmābhāvato, na paccuppannā. Yā pana maggassa abhāvitattā
tika-vin02t:975_8: uppajjeyya ekacatupañcavokārabhavesu ekacatupañcakkhandhappabhedā jāti, sā maggassa
tika-vin02t:975_9: bhāvitattā anuppādadhammataṃ āpajjanena khīṇā, taṃ so maggabhāvanāya pahīnakilese
tika-vin02t:975_10: paccavekkhitvā kilesābhāve vijjamānampi kammaṃ āyatiṃ appaṭisandhikaṃ hotīti jānanto pajānāti.
tika-vin02t:976_0: Vusitanti vutthaṃ parivutthaṃ, kataṃ caritaṃ niṭṭhitanti attho. Brahmacariyanti maggabrahmacariyaṃ.
tika-vin02t:976_1: Puthujjanakalyāṇakena hi saddhiṃ satta sekkhā maggabrahmacariyaṃ vasanti nāma, khīṇāsavo
tika-vin02t:976_2: vutthavāso, tasmā ariyasāvako attano brahmacariyavāsaṃ paccavekkhanto “vusitaṃ brahmacariya”nti
tika-vin02t:976_3: pajānāti. Kataṃ karaṇīyanti catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi pariññāpahānasacchikiriyābhāvanāvasena
tika-vin02t:976_4: soḷasavidhampi kiccaṃ niṭṭhāpitanti attho. Puthujjanakalyāṇakādayo hi taṃ kiccaṃ
tika-vin02t:976_5: karonti, khīṇāsavo katakaraṇīyo. Tasmā ariyasāvako attano karaṇīyaṃ paccavekkhanto
tika-vin02t:976_6: “kataṃ karaṇīya”nti pajānāti. Nāparaṃ itthattāyāti idāni puna itthabhāvāya evaṃsoḷasakiccabhāvāya,
tika-vin02t:976_7: kilesakkhayāya vā maggabhāvanākiccaṃ me natthīti pajānāti. Atha vā itthattāyāti itthabhāvā
tika-vin02t:976_8: imasmā evaṃpakārā idāni vattamānakkhandhasantānā aparaṃ khandhasantānaṃ mayhaṃ natthi,
tika-vin02t:976_9: ime pana pañcakkhandhā pariññātā tiṭṭhanti chinnamūlakā rukkhā viya. Te carimakaviññāṇanirodhena
tika-vin02t:977_0: 24. Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti te bhikkhū sakamanā tuṭṭhamanā,
tika-vin02t:977_1: pītisomanassehi vā samattamanā hutvā karavīkarutamañjunā kaṇṇasukhena paṇḍitajanahadayānaṃ
tika-vin02t:977_2: amatābhisekasadisena brahmassarena bhāsato bhagavato vacanaṃ sukathitaṃ sulapitaṃ
tika-vin02t:977_3: “evametaṃ bhagavā, evametaṃ sugatā”ti matthakena sampaṭicchantā anumodiṃsu ceva sampaṭicchiṃsu
tika-vin02t:977_4: cāti attho. Ayañhi abhinanda-saddo “abhinandati abhivadatī”tiādīsu taṇhāyapi āgato.
tika-vin02t:980_0: Ādīsu sampaṭicchanepi. “Abhinanditvā anumoditvā”tiādīsu anumodanepi. Svāyamidha anumodanasampaṭicchanesu
tika-vin02t:980_1: yujjati. Tena vuttaṃ “anumodiṃsu ceva sampaṭicchiṃsu cā”ti. Anupādāya āsavehi cittāni
tika-vin02t:980_2: vimucciṃsūti anuppādanirodhena nirujjhamānehi āsavehi anupādāya aggahetvā kañci dhammaṃ
tika-vin02t:980_3: “ahaṃ mamā”ti anādiyitvāva cittāni vimucciṃsu. Cha arahantoti bhagavatā saddhiṃ cha
tika-vin02t:980_4: janā arahanto. Aññesaṃ pana devabrahmānampi arahattappattisambhavato idaṃ manussaarahanteyeva
tika-vin02t:980_5: sandhāya vuttanti āha “cha manussā arahanto hontī”ti.
tika-vin02t:984_0: 25. Idāni yasassa pabbajjaṃ dassetuṃ “tena kho pana samayenā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ
tika-vin02t:984_1: anuttānapadavaṇṇanā – hemantikotiādīsu yattha sukhaṃ hoti hemantakāle vasituṃ, ayaṃ
tika-vin02t:984_2: hemantiko. Itaresupi eseva nayo. Ayaṃ panettha vacanattho – hemante vāso hemantaṃ
tika-vin02t:984_3: uttarapadalopena, hemantaṃ arahatīti hemantiko. Itaresupi eseva nayo. Tattha vassiko
tika-vin02t:984_4: pāsādo nātiucco hoti nātinīco, dvāravātapānānipissa nātibahūni nātitanūni, bhūmattharaṇapaccattharaṇakhajjabhojjānipettha
tika-vin02t:984_5: missakāneva vaṭṭanti. Hemantike thambhāpi bhittiyopi nīcā honti, dvāravātapānāni
tika-vin02t:984_7: panettha uṇhavikiriyāni kambalādīni vaṭṭanti, khajjabhojjaṃ siniddhaṃ kaṭukasannissitañca.
tika-vin02t:984_8: Gimhike thambhāpi bhittiyopi uccā honti, dvāravātapānāni panettha bahūni vipulajātāni
tika-vin02t:984_9: honti, bhūmattharaṇāni sītavikiriyāni dukūlamayāni vaṭṭanti, khajjabhojjāni madhurarasasītavikiriyāni,
tika-vin02t:984_10: vātapānasamīpesu cettha navā cāṭiyo ṭhapetvā udakassa pūretvā nīluppalādīhi sañchādenti,
tika-vin02t:984_11: tesu tesu padesesu udakayantāni karonti, yehi deve vassante viya udakadhārā nikkhamanti.
tika-vin02t:985_0: Nippurisehīti purisavirahitehi. Na kevalañcettha tūriyāneva nippurisāni, sabbaṭṭhānānipi
tika-vin02t:985_1: nippurisāneva. Dovārikāpi itthiyova, nahāpanādiparikammakarāpi itthiyova. Pitā kira
tika-vin02t:985_2: “tathārūpaṃ issariyasukhasampattiṃ anubhavamānassa purisaṃ disvā parisaṅkā uppajjati,
tika-vin02t:985_3: sā me puttassa mā ahosī”ti sabbakiccesu itthiyova ṭhapāpesi. Pañcahi kāmaguṇehīti
tika-vin02t:985_4: rūpasaddādīhi pañcahi kāmakoṭṭhāsehi. Samappitassāti sammā appitassa, upetassāti
tika-vin02t:985_5: attho. Samaṅgībhūtassāti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Paricārayamānassāti parito cārayamānassa,
tika-vin02t:985_6: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāmaguṇe indriyāni cārayamānassāti attho. Āḷambaranti paṇavaṃ. Vikesikanti
tika-vin02t:985_7: muttakesaṃ, vippakiṇṇakesanti attho. Vikkheḷikanti vissandamānalālaṃ. Vippalapantiyoti
tika-vin02t:985_8: viruddhaṃ palapantiyo vā rudantiyo vā. Susānaṃ maññeti āmakasusānaṃ viya addasa sakaṃ
tika-vin02t:985_9: parijananti sambandho. Udānaṃ udānesīti saṃvegavasena udānaṃ udānesi, saṃvegavasappavattaṃ
tika-vin02t:986_0: 26. Idaṃ kho yasāti bhagavā nibbānaṃ sandhāyāha. Tañhi taṇhādīhi kilesehi anupaddutaṃ
tika-vin02t:986_1: anupassaṭṭhañca. Anupubbiṃ kathanti dānānantaraṃ sīlaṃ, sīlānantaraṃ saggaṃ, saggānantaraṃ
tika-vin02t:986_2: magganti evamanupaṭipāṭikathaṃ. Tattha dānakathā nāma “idaṃ dānaṃ nāma sukhānaṃ nidānaṃ,
tika-vin02t:986_3: sampattīnaṃ mūlaṃ, bhogānaṃ patiṭṭhā, visamagatassa tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ gati parāyaṇaṃ, idhalokaparalokesu
tika-vin02t:986_4: dānasadiso avassayo patiṭṭhā ārammaṇaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ gati parāyaṇaṃ natthi. Idañhi
tika-vin02t:986_6: ālambanarajjusadisaṃ, idañhi dukkhanittharaṇaṭṭhena nāvā, samassāsanaṭṭhena saṅgāmasūro,
tika-vin02t:986_8: tesaṃ nidahanaṭṭhena aggi, durāsadaṭṭhena āsīviso, asantāsanaṭṭhena sīho, balavantaṭṭhena
tika-vin02t:986_10: assarājā. Dānaṃ nāmetaṃ mayā gatamaggo, mayheveso vaṃso, mayā dasa pāramiyo pūrentena
tika-vin02t:986_12: aneke mahāyaññā pavattitā, sasabhūtena jalite aggikkhandhe attānaṃ niyyātentena sampattayācakānaṃ
tika-vin02t:986_13: cittaṃ gahitaṃ. Dānañhi loke sakkasampattiṃ deti, mārasampattiṃ brahmasampattiṃ cakkavattisampattiṃ
tika-vin02t:986_14: sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ abhisambodhiñāṇaṃ detī”ti evamādinā dānaguṇappaṭisaṃyuttakathā.
tika-vin02t:987_0: Yasmā pana dānaṃ dadanto sīlaṃ samādātuṃ sakkoti, tasmā tadanantaraṃ sīlakathaṃ kathesi.
tika-vin02t:987_1: Dānañhi nāma dakkhiṇeyyesu hitajjhāsayena pūjanajjhāsayena vā attano santakassa paresaṃ
tika-vin02t:987_2: pariccajanaṃ, tasmā dāyako sattesu ekantahitajjhāsayo purisapuggalo, paresaṃ vā santakaṃ
tika-vin02t:987_3: haratīti aṭṭhānametaṃ. Tasmā dānaṃ dadanto sīlaṃ samādātuṃ sakkotīti dānānantaraṃ
tika-vin02t:987_4: sīlaṃ vuttaṃ. Apica dānakathā tāva pacurajanesupi pavattiyā sabbasādhāraṇattā sukarattā
tika-vin02t:987_5: sīle patiṭṭhānassa upāyabhāvato ca ādito kathitā. Pariccāgasīlo hi puggalo pariggahavatthūsu
tika-vin02t:987_6: nissaṅgabhāvato sukheneva sīlāni samādiyati, tattha ca suppatiṭṭhito hoti. Sīlena
tika-vin02t:988_0: Sīlakathā nāma “sīlaṃ nāmetaṃ avassayo patiṭṭhā ārammaṇaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ gati parāyaṇaṃ.
tika-vin02t:988_1: Sīlaṃ nāmetaṃ mama vaṃso, ahaṃ saṅkhapālanāgarājakāle bhūridattanāgarājakāle campeyyanāgarājakāle
tika-vin02t:988_3: sīlaṃ paripūresiṃ. Idhalokaparalokasampattīnañhi sīlasadiso avassayo sīlasadisā patiṭṭhā
tika-vin02t:988_4: ārammaṇaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ gati parāyaṇaṃ natthi, sīlālaṅkārasadiso alaṅkāro natthi, sīlapupphasadisaṃ
tika-vin02t:988_5: pupphaṃ natthi, sīlagandhasadiso gandho natthi. Sīlālaṅkārena hi alaṅkataṃ sīlakusumapiḷandhanaṃ
tika-vin02t:988_6: sīlagandhānulittaṃ sadevakopi loko olokento tittiṃ na gacchatī”ti evamādisīlaguṇappaṭisaṃyuttakathā.
tika-vin02t:989_0: Idaṃ pana sīlaṃ nissāya ayaṃ saggo labbhatīti dassanatthaṃ sīlānantaraṃ saggakathaṃ
tika-vin02t:989_1: kathesi. Saggakathā nāma “ayaṃ saggo nāma iṭṭho kanto manāpo, niccamettha kīḷā, niccaṃ
tika-vin02t:989_2: sampattiyo labbhanti, cātumahārājikā devā navutivassasatasahassāni dibbasukhaṃ dibbasampattiṃ
tika-vin02t:989_3: paṭilabhanti, tāvatiṃsā tisso ca vassakoṭiyo saṭṭhi ca vassasatasahassānī”ti evamādisaggaguṇapaṭisaṃyuttakathā.
tika-vin02t:989_4: Saggasampattiṃ kathayantānañhi buddhānaṃ mukhaṃ nappahoti. Vuttampi cetaṃ “anekapariyāyena
tika-vin02t:990_0: Evaṃ saggakathāya palobhetvā puna hatthiṃ alaṅkaritvā tassa soṇḍaṃ chindanto viya
tika-vin02t:990_1: ayampi saggo anicco addhuvo, na ettha chandarāgo kātabboti dassanatthaṃ “appassādā
tika-vin02t:990_2: kāmā bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā, ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo”tiādinā nayena kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ
tika-vin02t:990_3: okāraṃ saṃkilesaṃ kathesi. Tattha ādīnavoti doso, aniccatādinā appassādatādinā ca
tika-vin02t:990_4: dūsitabhāvoti attho. Atha vā ādīnaṃ vāti pavattatīti ādīnavo, paramakapaṇatā. Tathā
tika-vin02t:990_5: ca kāmā yathābhūtaṃ paccavekkhantānaṃ paccupatiṭṭhanti. Okāroti lāmakabhāvo nihīnabhāvo
tika-vin02t:990_6: aseṭṭhehi sevitabbatā seṭṭhehi na sevitabbatā ca. Saṃkilesoti tehi sattānaṃ saṃkilissanaṃ,
tika-vin02t:991_0: Evaṃ kāmādīnavena tajjetvā nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ pakāsesi. Yattakā ca kāmesu ādīnavā,
tika-vin02t:991_1: paṭipakkhato tattakāva nekkhamme ānisaṃsā. Apica “nekkhammaṃ nāmetaṃ asambādhaṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ,
tika-vin02t:991_2: nikkhantaṃ kāmehi, nikkhantaṃ kāmasaññāya, nikkhantaṃ kāmavitakkehi, nikkhantaṃ kāmapariḷāhehi,
tika-vin02t:991_3: nikkhantaṃ byāpārato”tiādinā nayena nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ pakāsesi, pabbajjāya jhānādīsu
tika-vin02t:991_4: ca guṇe vibhāvesi vaṇṇesi. Ettha ca saggaṃ kathetvā svāyaṃ saggo rāgādīhi upakkiliṭṭho,
tika-vin02t:991_5: sabbathāpi anupakkiliṭṭho ariyamaggoti dassanatthaṃ saggānantaraṃ maggo kathetabbo.
tika-vin02t:991_6: Maggañca kathentena tadadhigamupāyasandassanatthaṃ saggapariyāpannāpi pageva itare
tika-vin02t:991_7: sabbepi kāmā nāma bahvādīnavā aniccā addhuvā vipariṇāmadhammāti kāmānaṃ ādīnavo,
tika-vin02t:991_8: hīnā gammā pothujjanikā anariyā anatthasañhitāti tesaṃ okāro lāmakabhāvo, sabbepi
tika-vin02t:991_9: bhavā kilesānaṃ vatthubhūtāti tattha saṃkileso, sabbasaṃkilesavippamuttaṃ nibbānanti
tika-vin02t:991_10: nekkhamme ānisaṃso ca kathetabboti kāmesu ādīnavo okāro saṃkileso nekkhamme ca ānisaṃso
tika-vin02t:992_0: Kallacittanti kammaniyacittaṃ, heṭṭhā pavattitadesanāya assaddhiyādīnaṃ cittadosānaṃ
tika-vin02t:992_1: vigatattā uparidesanāya bhājanabhāvūpagamanena kammakkhamacittanti attho. Assaddhiyādayo
tika-vin02t:992_2: vā yasmā cittassa rogabhūtā tadā tassa vigatā, tasmā kallacittaṃ arogacittanti attho.
tika-vin02t:992_4: uḷārapītipāmojjayogena udaggacittaṃ. Tattha saddhāsampattiyā pasannacittaṃ yadā bhagavā
tika-vin02t:992_5: aññāsīti sambandho. Atha vā kallacittanti kāmacchandavigamena arogacittaṃ. Muducittanti
tika-vin02t:992_7: vikkhepassa vigatattā tena apihitacittaṃ. Udaggacittanti thinamiddhavigamena sampaggahavasena
tika-vin02t:992_9: evampettha attho veditabbo. Sāmukkaṃsikāti sāmaṃ ukkaṃsikā, attanāyeva uddharitvā
tika-vin02t:992_10: gahitā, sayambhūñāṇena diṭṭhā asādhāraṇā aññesanti attho. Kā ca pana sāti? Ariyasaccadesanā.
tika-vin02t:993_0: Seyyathāpītiādinā upamāvasena tassa kilesappahānaṃ ariyamagguppādañca dasseti. Apagatakāḷakanti
tika-vin02t:993_1: vigatakāḷakaṃ. Sammadevāti suṭṭhu eva. Rajananti nīlapītādiraṅgajātaṃ. Paṭiggaṇheyyāti
tika-vin02t:993_2: gaṇheyya, pabhassaraṃ bhaveyya. Tasmiṃyeva āsaneti tassaṃyeva nisajjāyaṃ. Etenassa
tika-vin02t:993_3: lahuvipassakatā tikkhapaññatā sukhapaṭipadakhippābhiññatā ca dassitā hoti. Virajantiādi
tika-vin02t:993_4: vuttanayameva. Tatridaṃ upamāsaṃsandanaṃ – vatthaṃ viya cittaṃ, vatthassa āgantukamalehi
tika-vin02t:993_5: kiliṭṭhabhāvo viya cittassa rāgādimalehi saṃkiliṭṭhabhāvo, dhovanasilā viya anupubbikathā,
tika-vin02t:993_6: udakaṃ viya saddhā, udakena temetvā temetvā ūsagomayachārikakhārakehi kāḷakapadese
tika-vin02t:993_7: sammadditvā vatthassa dhovanapayogo viya saddhāsinehena temetvā temetvā satisamādhipaññāhi
tika-vin02t:993_8: dose sithile katvā sīlasutādividhinā cittassa sodhane vīriyārambho, tena payogena
tika-vin02t:993_9: vatthe kāḷakāpagamo viya vīriyārambhena kilesavikkhambhanaṃ, raṅgajātaṃ viya ariyamaggo,
tika-vin02t:993_10: tena suddhassa vatthassa pabhassarabhāvo viya vikkhambhitakilesassa cittassa maggena pariyodapananti.
tika-vin02t:994_0: 27. Assadūteti āruḷhaasse dūte. Iddhābhisaṅkhāranti iddhikiriyaṃ. Abhisaṅkharesīti
tika-vin02t:994_1: abhisaṅkhari, akāsīti attho. Kimatthanti ce? Ubhinnaṃ paṭilabhitabbavisesantarāyanisedhanatthaṃ.
tika-vin02t:994_2: Yadi hi so puttaṃ passeyya, puttassapi arahattappatti seṭṭhissapi dhammacakkhupaṭilābho
tika-vin02t:994_3: na siyā. Adiṭṭhasaccopi hi “dehi te mātuyā jīvita”nti yācanto kathañhi nāma vikkhepaṃ
tika-vin02t:994_4: paṭibāhitvā bhagavato dhammadesanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā dhammacakkhuṃ paṭilabheyya,
tika-vin02t:994_5: yaso ca evaṃ tena yāciyamāno kathaṃ taṃ vikkhepaṃ paṭibāhitvā arahatte patiṭṭhaheyya.
tika-vin02t:995: Etadavocāti bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ abbhanumodamāno etaṃ “abhikkantaṃ bhante”tiādivacanaṃ avoca. Abhikkanta-saddo cāyamidha abbhanumodane, tasmā sādhu sādhu bhanteti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin02t:997: Hāse soke pasāde ca, kare āmeḍitaṃ budho”ti. –
tika-vin02t:998_0: Imināva lakkhaṇena idha pasādavasena pasaṃsāvasena cāyaṃ dvikkhattuṃ vuttoti veditabbo.
tika-vin02t:998_1: Seyyathāpītiādinā catūhi upamāhi bhagavato desanaṃ thometi. Tattha nikkujjitanti
tika-vin02t:998_2: adhomukhaṭhapitaṃ, heṭṭhāmukhajātaṃ vā. Ukkujjeyyāti uparimukhaṃ kareyya. Paṭicchannanti
tika-vin02t:998_3: tiṇapaṇṇādichāditaṃ. Vivareyyāti ugghāṭeyya. Mūḷhassāti disāmūḷhassa. Maggaṃ ācikkheyyāti
tika-vin02t:998_4: hatthe gahetvā “esa maggo”ti vadeyya. Andhakāreti kāḷapakkhacātuddasī aḍḍharatti
tika-vin02t:999_0: Evaṃ desanaṃ thometvā imāya desanāya ratanattaye pasannacitto pasannākāraṃ karonto
tika-vin02t:999_1: “esāha”ntiādimāha. Tattha esāhanti eso ahaṃ. Upāsakaṃ maṃ bhagavā dhāretūti maṃ bhagavā
tika-vin02t:999_2: “upāsako aya”nti evaṃ dhāretu, jānātūti attho. Ajjataggeti etthāyaṃ agga-saddo ādiatthe,
tika-vin02t:999_3: tasmā ajjataggeti ajjataṃ ādiṃ katvāti evamattho veditabbo. Ajjatanti ajjabhāvaṃ.
tika-vin02t:999_4: “Ajjadagge”ti vā pāṭho, da-kāro padasandhikaro, ajja aggaṃ katvāti attho. Pāṇupetanti
tika-vin02t:999_5: pāṇehi upetaṃ. Yāva me jīvitaṃ pavattati, tāva upetaṃ, anaññasatthukaṃ tīhi saraṇagamanehi
tika-vin02t:999_6: saraṇaṃ gataṃ upāsakaṃ kappiyakārakaṃ maṃ bhagavā dhāretu jānātu. Ahañhi sacepi me
tika-vin02t:999_7: tikhiṇena asinā sīsaṃ chindeyya, neva buddhaṃ “na buddho”ti vā, dhammaṃ “na dhammo”ti
tika-vin02t:999_8: vā, saṅghaṃ “na saṅgho”ti vā vadeyyanti evaṃ attasanniyyātanena saraṇaṃ agamāsi.
tika-vin02t:999_9: Evaṃ “abhikkanta”ntiādīnaṃ anuttānapadattho veditabbo, vitthāro pana heṭṭhā verañjakaṇḍavaṇṇanāyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1000_0: 28. Bhūmiṃ paccavekkhantassāti attanā diṭṭhamatthaṃ paccavekkhantassa. Iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ
tika-vin02t:1000_1: paṭippassambhesīti yathā taṃ seṭṭhi gahapati tattha nisinnova yasaṃ kulaputtaṃ passati,
tika-vin02t:1000_2: tathā adhiṭṭhāsīti attho. Adhivāsetūti sampaṭicchatu. Ajjatanāyāti yaṃ me tumhesu
tika-vin02t:1000_3: sakkāraṃ karoto ajja bhavissati puññañca pītipāmojjañca, tadatthāya. Adhivāsesi bhagavā
tika-vin02t:1000_4: tuṇhībhāvenāti bhagavā kāyaṅgaṃ vā vācaṅgaṃ vā acopetvā abbhantareyeva khantiṃ karonto
tika-vin02t:1000_5: tuṇhībhāvena adhivāsesi, seṭṭhissa anuggahatthaṃ manasāva sampaṭicchīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin02t:1000_6: “Ehi bhikkhū”ti bhagavā avocāti tassa kira iddhimayapattacīvarassa upanissayaṃ olokento
tika-vin02t:1000_7: anekāsu jātīsu cīvarādiaṭṭhaparikkhāradānaṃ disvā “ehi bhikkhū”ti avoca. So tāvadeva
tika-vin02t:1000_8: bhaṇḍu kāsāvavasano aṭṭhahi bhikkhuparikkhārehi sarīre paṭimukkeheva vassasaṭṭhikatthero
tika-vin02t:1000_9: viya bhagavantaṃ namassamānova nisīdi. Yo hi cīvarādike aṭṭha parikkhāre pattacīvarameva
tika-vin02t:1000_10: vā sotāpannādiariyassa puthujjanasseva vā sīlasampannassa datvā “idaṃ parikkhāradānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1000_11: anāgate ehibhikkhubhāvāya paccayo hotū”ti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapeti, tassa taṃ sati adhikārasampattiyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1001_0: 29. Paṇītenāti uttamena. Sahatthāti sahatthena. Santappetvāti suṭṭhu tappetvā, paripuṇṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:1001_1: suhitaṃ yāvadatthaṃ katvā. Sampavāretvāti suṭṭhu pavāretvā, alaṃ alanti hatthasaññāya
tika-vin02t:1001_2: paṭikkhipāpetvā. Bhuttāvinti bhuttavantaṃ. Onītapattapāṇinti pattato onītapāṇiṃ,
tika-vin02t:1001_3: apanītahatthanti vuttaṃ hoti. “Onittapattapāṇi”ntipi pāṭho, tassattho – onittaṃ nānābhūtaṃ
tika-vin02t:1001_4: vinābhūtaṃ pattaṃ pāṇito assāti onittapattapāṇi, taṃ onittapattapāṇiṃ, hatthe ca
tika-vin02t:1001_5: pattañca dhovitvā ekamantaṃ pattaṃ nikkhipitvā nisinnanti attho. Ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsūti
tika-vin02t:1001_6: bhagavantaṃ evaṃbhūtaṃ ñatvā ekasmiṃ okāse nisīdiṃsūti attho. Dhammiyā kathāyātiādīsu
tika-vin02t:1001_7: taṅkhaṇānurūpāya dhammiyā kathāya diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaatthaṃ sandassetvā kusale
tika-vin02t:1001_8: ca dhamme samādapetvā tattha ca naṃ samuttejetvā saussāhaṃ katvā tāya ca saussāhatāya
tika-vin02t:1001_9: aññehi ca vijjamānaguṇehi sampahaṃsetvā dhammaratanavassaṃ vassitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
tika-vin02t:1004_0: 30. Idāni tassa sahāyānaṃ pabbajjaṃ dassento “assosuṃ kho”tiādimāha. Tatrāyaṃ anuttānapadavaṇṇanā
tika-vin02t:1004_1: – seṭṭhino ca anuseṭṭhino ca yesaṃ kulānaṃ tāni seṭṭhānuseṭṭhīni kulāni, tesaṃ seṭṭhānuseṭṭhīnaṃ
tika-vin02t:1004_2: kulānaṃ, paveṇivasena āgatehi seṭṭhīhi ca anuseṭṭhīhi ca samannāgatānaṃ kulānanti
tika-vin02t:1004_3: attho. Vimalotiādīni tesaṃ puttānaṃ nāmāni. Kesamassuṃ ohāretvāti kesañca massuñca
tika-vin02t:1004_4: oropetvā. Kāsāyāni vatthānīti kasāyarasapītāni brahmacariyaṃ carantānaṃ anucchavikāni
tika-vin02t:1004_5: vatthāni. Orakoti ūnako lāmako. Sesamettha vuttanayameva.
tika-vin02t:1007_0: 31. Paññāsamattānaṃ gihisahāyānaṃ pabbajjāyapi yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ vuttameva. Imesaṃ
tika-vin02t:1007_1: pana sabbesaṃ pubbayogo vattabboti taṃ dassetuṃ “yasaādīnaṃ kulaputtānaṃ ayaṃ pubbayogo”tiādimāha.
tika-vin02t:1007_2: Tattha vaggabandhanenāti gaṇabandhanena, ekībhūtāti vuttaṃ hoti. Anāthasarīrānīti
tika-vin02t:1007_3: anāthāni matakaḷevarāni. Paṭijaggantāti bahi nīharitvā jhāpentā.
tika-vin02t:1010_0: 32. Idāni saraṇagamanūpasampadaṃ dassetuṃ “atha kho bhagavā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1010_1: anupubbapadavaṇṇanā – muttāhanti mutto ahaṃ. Cārikanti anupubbagamanacārikaṃ, gāmanigamarājadhānīsu
tika-vin02t:1010_2: anukkamena gamanasaṅkhātaṃ cārikanti attho. Carathāti divasaṃ yojanaparamaṃ gacchantā
tika-vin02t:1010_3: caratha. Mā ekena dve agamitthāti ekena maggena dvīsu gatesu ekasmiṃ dhammaṃ desente
tika-vin02t:1010_4: ekena tuṇhībhūtena ṭhātabbaṃ hoti, tasmā evamāha. Ādikalyāṇanti ādimhi kalyāṇaṃ sundaraṃ
tika-vin02t:1010_5: bhaddakaṃ, tathā majjhapariyosānesu. Ādimajjhapariyosānañca nāmetaṃ sāsanassa ca
tika-vin02t:1010_6: desanāya ca vasena dubbidhaṃ. Tattha sāsanassa sīlaṃ ādi, samathavipassanāmaggā majjhaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1010_7: phalanibbānāni pariyosānaṃ. Sīlasamādhayo vā ādi, vipassanāmaggā majjhaṃ, phalanibbānāni
tika-vin02t:1010_8: pariyosānaṃ. Sīlasamādhivipassanā vā ādi, maggo majjhaṃ, phalanibbānāni pariyosānaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1010_9: Desanāya pana catuppadikagāthāya tāva paṭhamapādo ādi, dutiyatatiyā majjhaṃ, catuttho
tika-vin02t:1010_10: pariyosānaṃ. Pañcapadachappadānaṃ paṭhamapādo ādi, avasānapādo pariyosānaṃ, sesā
tika-vin02t:1010_11: majjhaṃ. Ekānusandhikassa suttassa nidānaṃ ādi, idamavocāti pariyosānaṃ, sesaṃ majjhaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1010_12: Anekānusandhikassa suttassa majjhe bahukampi anusandhi majjhameva, nidānaṃ ādi, idamavocāti
tika-vin02t:1010_13: pariyosānaṃ. Sātthanti sātthakaṃ katvā desetha. Sabyañjananti byañjanehi ceva padehi
tika-vin02t:1010_14: ca paripūraṃ katvā desetha. Kevalaparipuṇṇanti sakalaparipuṇṇaṃ. Parisuddhanti nirupakkilesaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1010_15: Brahmacariyanti sikkhattayasaṅgahaṃ sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ. Pakāsethāti āvi karotha.
tika-vin02t:1011_1: viya catuppadikagāthāpariyosāne arahattaṃ pattuṃ samatthā sattā santīti attho. Parihāyantīti
tika-vin02t:1011_2: alābhaparihāniyā dhammato parihāyanti. Tenevāha “anadhigataṃ nādhigacchantā visesādhigamato
tika-vin02t:1011_3: parihāyantī”ti. Senānigamoti senāya nigamo. Paṭhamakappikānaṃ kira tasmiṃ ṭhāne senāniveso
tika-vin02t:1011_4: ahosi, tasmā so padeso “senānigamo”ti vuccati. “Senānigāmo”tipi pāṭho, senāni nāma
tika-vin02t:1011_5: sujātāya pitā, tassa gāmoti attho. Tenupasaṅkamissāmīti nāhaṃ tumhe uyyojetvā pariveṇādīni
tika-vin02t:1011_6: kāretvā upaṭṭhākādīhi paricariyamāno viharissāmi, tiṇṇaṃ pana jaṭilānaṃ aḍḍhuḍḍhāni
tika-vin02t:1012_0: 33. Māro pāpimāti attano visayaṃ atikkamituṃ paṭipanne satte māretīti māro, pare
tika-vin02t:1012_1: pāpe niyojeti, sayaṃ vā pāpe niyuttoti pāpimā. Aññānipissa kaṇho adhipati vasavattī
tika-vin02t:1012_2: antako namuci pamattabandhūtiādīni bahūni nāmāni, idha pana nāmadvayameva gahitaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1012_3: Upasaṅkamīti “ayaṃ samaṇo gotamo mahāyuddhaṃ vicārento viya ‘mā ekena dve agamittha,
tika-vin02t:1012_4: dhammaṃ desethā’ti saṭṭhi jane uyyojeti, imasmiṃ pana ekasmimpi dhammaṃ desente mayhaṃ
tika-vin02t:1012_5: cittassa sātaṃ natthi, evaṃ bahūsu desentesu kuto bhavissati, paṭibāhāmi na”nti cintetvā upasaṅkami.
tika-vin02t:1013_0: Sabbapāsehīti sabbehi kilesapāsehi. Ye dibbā ye ca mānusāti ye dibbakāmaguṇasaṅkhātā
tika-vin02t:1013_1: mānusakakāmaguṇasaṅkhātā ca kilesapāsā nāma atthi, sabbehi tehi tvaṃ baddhoti vadati.
tika-vin02t:1013_2: Mahābandhanabaddhoti mahatā kilesabandhanena baddho, mahati vā bandhane baddho, kilesabandhanassa
tika-vin02t:1013_3: ṭhānabhūte bhavacārake baddhoti attho. Na me samaṇa mokkhasīti samaṇa tvaṃ mama visayato
tika-vin02t:1013_4: na muccissasi. “Na me samaṇa mokkhasī”ti ca idaṃ māro “muttāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sabbapāsehī”ti
tika-vin02t:1013_5: bhagavato vacanaṃ asaddahanto vadati, saddahantopi vā “evamayaṃ paresaṃ sattānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1013_6: mokkhāya ussāhaṃ na kareyyā”ti santajjento kohaññe ṭhatvā vadati.
tika-vin02t:1014_0: Nihatoti tvaṃ mayā nihato, nibbisevanabhāvaṃ gamito parājitoti attho. Antalikkhe
tika-vin02t:1014_1: carante pañcābhiññepi bandhatīti antalikkhacaro. Rāgapāso hi antalikkhacaresupi kiccasādhanato
tika-vin02t:1014_2: “antalikkhacaro”ti vuccati, teneva naṃ māropi antalikkhacaroti maññati. Manasi jātoti
tika-vin02t:1017_0: 34. “Anujānāmi bhikkhave”tiādikāya pana pāḷiyā yo pabbajjūpasampadāvinicchayo vattabbo,
tika-vin02t:1017_1: taṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “pabbajjāpekkhaṃ kulaputtaṃ pabbājentenā”tiādimāha. Tattha
tika-vin02t:1017_2: ye puggalā paṭikkhittāti sambandho. Sayaṃ pabbājetabboti kesacchedanādīni sayaṃ karontena
tika-vin02t:1017_3: pabbājetabbo. Kesacchedanaṃ kāsāyacchādanaṃ saraṇadānanti hi imāni tīṇi karonto “pabbājetī”ti
tika-vin02t:1017_4: vuccati. Etesu ekaṃ dve vāpi karonto tathā voharīyatiyeva, tasmā etaṃ pabbājehīti
tika-vin02t:1017_5: kesacchedanaṃ kāsāyacchādanañca sandhāya vuttaṃ. Upajjhāyaṃ uddissa pabbājetīti etthāpi
tika-vin02t:1017_6: eseva nayo. Khaṇḍasīmaṃ netvāti bhaṇḍukammārocanapariharaṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tena sabhikkhuke
tika-vin02t:1017_7: vihāre aññampi “etassa kese chindā”ti vattuṃ na vaṭṭati. Pabbājetvāti kesacchedanaṃ
tika-vin02t:1017_8: sandhāya vadati. Bhikkhuto añño pabbājetuṃ na labhatīti saraṇadānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1017_9: Tenevāha “sāmaṇero panā”tiādi. Bhabbarūpoti bhabbasabhāvo. Tamevatthaṃ pariyāyantarena
tika-vin02t:1017_10: vibhāveti “sahetuko”ti. Ñātoti pākaṭo. Yasassīti parivārasampattiyā samannāgato.
tika-vin02t:1018_1: sambandho. Tattha kesā nāmete vaṇṇatopi paṭikūlā, saṇṭhānatopi gandhatopi āsayatopi
tika-vin02t:1018_2: okāsatopi paṭikūlā. Manuññepi hi yāgupatte vā bhattapatte vā kesavaṇṇaṃ kiñci disvā
tika-vin02t:1018_3: “kesamissakamidaṃ, haratha na”nti jigucchanti, evaṃ kesā vaṇṇato paṭikūlā. Rattiṃ
tika-vin02t:1018_4: bhuñjantāpi kesasaṇṭhānaṃ akkavākaṃ vā makacivākaṃ vā chupitvā tatheva jigucchanti,
tika-vin02t:1018_6: gandho paramajeguccho hoti, tato jegucchataro aggimhi pakkhittānaṃ. Kesā hi vaṇṇasaṇṭhānato
tika-vin02t:1018_7: appaṭikūlāpi siyuṃ, gandhena pana paṭikūlāyeva. Yathā hi daharassa kumārakassa vaccaṃ
tika-vin02t:1018_8: vaṇṇato haliddivaṇṇaṃ, saṇṭhānatopi haliddipiṇḍisaṇṭhānaṃ. Saṅkāraṭṭhāne chaḍḍitañca
tika-vin02t:1018_9: uddhumātakakāḷasunakhasarīraṃ vaṇṇato tālapakkavaṇṇaṃ, saṇṭhānato vaṭṭetvā vissaṭṭhamudiṅgasaṇṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1018_10: dāṭhāpissa sumanamakuḷasadisā, taṃ ubhayampi vaṇṇasaṇṭhānato siyā appaṭikūlaṃ, gandhena
tika-vin02t:1018_11: pana paṭikūlameva, evaṃ kesāpi siyuṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānato appaṭikūlā, gandhena pana paṭikūlāyevāti.
tika-vin02t:1018_12: Yathā pana asuciṭṭhāne gāmanissandena jātāni sūpeyyapaṇṇāni nāgarikamanussānaṃ jegucchāni
tika-vin02t:1018_14: paramajegucchāti evaṃ āsayato paṭikūlā. Ime ca kesā nāma gūtharāsimhi uṭṭhitakaṇṇakaṃ
tika-vin02t:1018_15: viya ekatiṃsakoṭṭhāsarāsimhi jātā, te susānasaṅkāraṭṭhānādīsu jātasākaṃ viya parikhādīsu
tika-vin02t:1018_16: jātakamalakuvalayādipupphaṃ viya ca asuciṭṭhāne jātattā paramajegucchāti evaṃ okāsato
tika-vin02t:1018_17: paṭikūlātiādinā nayena tacapañcakassa vaṇṇādivasena paṭikūlabhāvaṃ pakāsentenāti attho.
tika-vin02t:1019_0: Nijjīvanissattabhāvaṃ vā pākaṭaṃ karontenāti ime kesā nāma sīsakaṭāhapaliveṭhanacamme
tika-vin02t:1019_1: jātā. Tattha yathā vammikamatthake jātesu kunthatiṇesu na vammikamatthako jānāti
tika-vin02t:1019_2: “mayi kunthatiṇāni jātānī”ti, nāpi kunthatiṇāni jānanti “mayaṃ vammikamatthake jātānī”ti,
tika-vin02t:1019_3: evameva na sīsakaṭāhapaliveṭhanacammaṃ jānāti “mayi kesā jātā”ti, nāpi kesā jānanti
tika-vin02t:1019_5: dhammā. Iti kesā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto
tika-vin02t:1019_6: thaddho pathavīdhātūtiādinā nayena nijjīvanissattabhāvaṃ pakāsentena. Pubbeti purimabuddhānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1019_7: santike. Madditasaṅkhāroti nāmarūpavavatthānena ceva paccayapariggahavasena ca ñāṇena
tika-vin02t:1020_0: Adinnaṃ na vaṭṭatīti ettha pabbajjā na ruhatīti vadanti. Anuññātaupasampadāti ñatticatutthakammena
tika-vin02t:1020_1: anuññātaupasampadā. Ṭhānakaraṇasampadanti ettha urādīni ṭhānāni, saṃvutādīni karaṇānīti
tika-vin02t:1020_2: veditabbāni. Anunāsikantaṃ katvā dānakāle antarā vicchedaṃ akatvā dātabbānīti dassetuṃ
tika-vin02t:1020_3: “ekasambandhānī”ti vuttaṃ. Vicchinditvāti ma-kārantaṃ katvā dānasamaye vicchedaṃ
tika-vin02t:1020_4: katvā. Sabbamassa kappiyākappiyaṃ ācikkhitabbanti dasasikkhāpadavinimuttaṃ parāmāsāparāmāsādibhedaṃ
tika-vin02t:1020_6: pūretabbaṃ, tattha ca kattabbassa akaraṇe akattabbassa ca karaṇe daṇḍakammāraho hotīti dīpeti.
tika-vin02t:1023_0: 35. Atha kho bhagavā vassaṃvuṭṭhotiādikāya pana pāḷiyā ayaṃ apubbapadavaṇṇanā. Yonisomanasikārāti
tika-vin02t:1023_1: upāyamanasikārena, aniccādīsu aniccādito manasikaraṇenāti attho. Yoniso sammappadhānāti
tika-vin02t:1023_3: ukkaṭṭhaniddesena arahattaphalavimutti vuttā. Ajjhabhāsīti “ayaṃ attanā vīriyaṃ katvā
tika-vin02t:1023_4: arahattaṃ patvāpi na tussati, idāni aññesampi ‘pāpuṇāthā’ti ussāhaṃ karoti, paṭibāhessāmi
tika-vin02t:1023_5: na”nti cintetvā abhāsi. Mārapāsenāti kilesapāsena. Sesamettha vuttanayameva.
tika-vin02t:1026_1: Buddhānañhi ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vasantānaṃ chāyūdakādīnaṃ vipattiṃ vā aphāsukasenāsanaṃ
tika-vin02t:1026_2: vā manussānaṃ assaddhādibhāvaṃ vā āgamma anabhirati nāma natthi, tesaṃ sampattiyā
tika-vin02t:1026_3: “idha phāsuṃ viharāmā”ti abhiramitvā ciravihāropi natthi. Yattha pana tathāgate viharante
tika-vin02t:1026_4: sattā saraṇesu vā tīsu patiṭṭhahanti, sīlāni vā samādiyanti, pabbajanti vā, sotāpattimaggādīnaṃ
tika-vin02t:1026_5: vā paresaṃ upanissayo hoti, tattha buddhā satte tāsu sampattīsu patiṭṭhāpanaajjhāsayena
tika-vin02t:1026_6: vasanti, tāsaṃ abhāve pakkamanti. Tena vuttaṃ “yathāajjhāsayaṃ viharitvā”ti. Ajjhogāhetvāti
tika-vin02t:1029_0: 37-38. Uruvelakassapavatthumhi jaṭiloti jaṭādharo. Jaṭā assa atthīti hi jaṭilo. Netīti
tika-vin02t:1029_1: nāyako, sāmaṃ vineti attano laddhiṃ sikkhāpetīti vināyako. Sace te kassapa agarūti
tika-vin02t:1029_2: kassapa sace tuyhaṃ bhāriyaṃ aphāsukaṃ kiñci natthi. Agyāgāreti aggisālāyaṃ. Ubhinnaṃ
tika-vin02t:1029_3: sajotibhūtānanti ubhosu sajotibhūtesu pajjalitesu. Yatra hi nāmāti yo nāma.
tika-vin02t:1030_0: 39. Ajjaṇhoti ajja ekadivasaṃ. Aggisālamhīti agyāgāre. Sumanamanasoti sundaracittasaṅkhātamano.
tika-vin02t:1030_1: Tejodhātūsu kusaloti tejokasiṇasamāpattīsu kusalo. Udicchareti ullokesuṃ, parivāresunti
tika-vin02t:1030_2: vā attho. Pattamhi odahitvāti patte pakkhipitvā. Dhuvabhattenāti niccabhattena.
tika-vin02t:1031_0: 40. Abhikkantāya rattiyāti ettha abhikkanta-saddo khaye vattati, tena parikkhīṇāyarattiyāti
tika-vin02t:1031_1: attho. Ete hi cattāro mahārājāno majjhimayāmasamanantare āgatā. Niyāmo kiresa devatānaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1031_2: yadidaṃ buddhānaṃ vā buddhasāvakānaṃ vā upaṭṭhānaṃ āgacchantā majjhimayāmasamanantare
tika-vin02t:1031_3: āgacchanti. Abhikkantavaṇṇāti abhirūpachavivaṇṇā, iṭṭhavaṇṇā manāpavaṇṇāti vuttaṃ
tika-vin02t:1031_4: hoti. Devatā hi manussalokaṃ āgacchamānā pakativaṇṇaṃ pakatiiddhiṃ jahitvā oḷārikaṃ
tika-vin02t:1031_5: attabhāvaṃ katvā atirekavaṇṇavatthālaṅkārakāyādīhi obhāsaṃ muñcamānādivasena ca dibbaṃ
tika-vin02t:1031_6: iddhānubhāvañca nimminitvā naṭasamajjādīni gacchantā manussā viya abhisaṅkhatena
tika-vin02t:1031_7: kāyena āgacchanti. Tattha kāmāvacarā anabhisaṅkhatenapi āgantuṃ sakkonti oḷārikarūpattā.
tika-vin02t:1031_8: Tathā hi te kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhā, rūpāvacarā pana anabhisaṅkhatena kāyena āgantuṃ
tika-vin02t:1031_9: na sakkonti sukhumatararūpattā. Tesañhi atisukhumova attabhāvo, na tena iriyāpathakappanaṃ
tika-vin02t:1031_10: hoti. Tasmā brahmalokepi brahmāno yebhuyyena nimmitarūpeneva pavattanti. Mūlapaṭisandhirūpañhi
tika-vin02t:1031_11: nesaṃ ativiya sukhumamahārūpaṃ, kevalaṃ taṃ cittuppādassa nissayādhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ
tika-vin02t:1032_0: Kevalakappanti ettha kevala-saddassa anavasesattaṃ attho, kappa-saddassa samantabhāvo,
tika-vin02t:1032_1: tasmā kevalakappaṃ vanasaṇḍanti anavasesaṃ samantato vanasaṇḍanti attho. Anavasesaṃ
tika-vin02t:1032_2: pharituṃ samatthassapi hi obhāsassa kenaci kāraṇena ekadesapharaṇampi siyā, ayaṃ
tika-vin02t:1032_3: pana sabbaso pharatīti dassetuṃ samantattho kappa-saddo gahito. Atha vā īsaṃ asamatthaṃ
tika-vin02t:1032_4: kevalakappaṃ. Bhagavato pabhāya anobhāsitameva hi padesaṃ devatā attano pabhāya obhāsenti.
tika-vin02t:1032_5: Na hi bhagavato pabhā kāyaci pabhāya abhibhūyati, sūriyādīnampi pana pabhaṃ sā abhibhuyya
tika-vin02t:1032_6: tiṭṭhatīti. Obhāsetvāti vatthālaṅkārasarīrasamuṭṭhitāya ābhāya pharitvā, cando viya
tika-vin02t:1032_7: sūriyo viya ca ekobhāsaṃ ekapajjotaṃ karitvāti attho. Devatānañhi sarīrābhā dasadvādasayojanamattaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1032_8: tato bhiyyopi pharitvā tiṭṭhati, tathā vatthābharaṇādīsu samuṭṭhitā pabhā. Catuddisāti
tika-vin02t:1032_9: catūsu disāsu. Yatra hi nāmāti yaṃ nāma.
tika-vin02t:1033_0: 43. Aṅgamagadhāti ubho aṅgamagadharaṭṭhavāsino. Iddhipāṭihāriyanti iddhibhūtaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1033_1: na ādesanānusāsanīpāṭihāriyanti attho. Tividhañhi pāṭihāriyaṃ iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ ādesanāpāṭihāriyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1033_2: anusāsanīpāṭihāriyanti. Tattha “idha bhikkhu ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti, bahudhāpi
tika-vin02t:1033_3: hutvā eko hoti āvibhāvaṃ tirobhāva”ntiādinayappavattaṃ iddhividhameva iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1033_4: “Idha bhikkhu parasattānaṃ parapuggalānaṃ cittampi ādisati, cetasikampi ādisati,
tika-vin02t:1033_5: vitakkitampi ādisati, vicāritampi ādisati ‘evampi te mano, itthampi te mano”’tiādinayappavattaṃ
tika-vin02t:1033_6: parassa cittaṃ ñatvā kathanaṃ ādesanāpāṭihāriyaṃ. “Idha bhikkhu evamanusāsati ‘evaṃ
tika-vin02t:1033_7: vitakketha, mā evaṃ vitakkayittha, evaṃ manasi karotha, mā evaṃ mānasā karittha,
tika-vin02t:1033_8: idaṃ pajahatha, idaṃ upasampajja viharathā”’ti evamādinayappavattā sāvakānaṃ buddhānañca
tika-vin02t:1034_0: Tattha pāṭihāriyapadassa vacanatthaṃ paṭipakkhaharaṇato rāgādikilesāpanayanato pāṭihāriyanti
tika-vin02t:1034_1: vadanti. Bhagavato pana paṭipakkhā rāgādayo na santi ye haritabbā, puthujjanānampi
tika-vin02t:1034_2: vigatūpakkilese aṭṭhaguṇasamannāgate citte hatapaṭipakkhe iddhividhaṃ vattati, tasmā
tika-vin02t:1034_3: tattha pavattavohārena ca na sakkā idha pāṭihāriyanti vattuṃ. Sace pana mahākāruṇikassa
tika-vin02t:1034_4: bhagavato veneyyagatā ca kilesā paṭipakkhā, tesaṃ haraṇato pāṭihāriyanti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1034_5: evaṃ sati yuttametaṃ. Atha vā bhagavato ca sāsanassa ca paṭipakkhā titthiyā, tesaṃ
tika-vin02t:1034_6: haraṇato pāṭihāriyaṃ. Te hi diṭṭhiharaṇavasena diṭṭhippakāsane asamatthabhāvena ca
tika-vin02t:1034_7: iddhiādesanānusāsanīhi haritā apanītā hontīti. Paṭīti vā ayaṃ saddo pacchāti etassa
tika-vin02t:1034_8: atthaṃ bodheti “tasmiṃ paṭipaviṭṭhamhi, añño āgañchi brāhmaṇo”tiādīsu viya, tasmā
tika-vin02t:1034_9: samāhite citte vigatūpakkilesena katakiccena pacchā haritabbaṃ pavattetabbanti paṭihāriyaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1034_10: attano vā upakkilesesu catutthajjhānamaggehi haritesu pacchā haraṇaṃ paṭihāriyaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1034_11: iddhiādesanānusāsaniyo ca vigatūpakkilesena katakiccena sattahitatthaṃ puna pavattetabbā,
tika-vin02t:1034_12: haritesu ca attano upakkilesesu parasattānaṃ upakkilesaharaṇāni hontīti paṭihāriyāni
tika-vin02t:1034_13: bhavanti, paṭihāriyameva pāṭihāriyaṃ. Paṭihāriye vā iddhiādesanānusāsanīsamudāye
tika-vin02t:1034_14: bhavaṃ ekekaṃ pāṭihāriyanti vuccati. Paṭihāriyaṃ vā catutthajjhānaṃ maggo ca paṭipakkhaharaṇato,
tika-vin02t:1034_15: tattha jātaṃ nimittabhūte, tato vā āgatanti pāṭihāriyaṃ. Svātanāyāti sve dātabbassa atthāya.
tika-vin02t:1035_0: 44. Paṃsukūlaṃ uppannaṃ hotīti pariyesamānassa paṭilābhavasena uppannaṃ hoti. Vicittapāṭihāriyadassanatthāva
tika-vin02t:1035_1: sā pariyesanā. Yasmā pāṇinā phuṭṭhamatte sā pokkharaṇī nimmitā ahosi, tasmā vuttaṃ
tika-vin02t:1036_0: 46-49. Jaṭilāti tāpasā. Te hi jaṭādhāritāya idha “jaṭilā”ti vuttā. Antaraṭṭhakāsu
tika-vin02t:1036_1: himapātasamayeti hemantassa utuno abbhantarabhūte māghamāsassa avasāne catasso, phagguṇamāsassa
tika-vin02t:1036_2: ādimhi catassoti evaṃ ubhinnamantare aṭṭharattīsu himapatanakāle. Nerañjarāya ummujjantīti
tika-vin02t:1036_3: keci tasmiṃ titthasammate udake paṭhamaṃ nimuggasakalasarīrā tato ummujjantā vuṭṭhahanti
tika-vin02t:1036_4: uppilavanti. Nimujjantīti sasīsaṃ udake osīdanti. Ummujjananimujjanampi karontīti
tika-vin02t:1036_5: punappunaṃ ummujjananimujjanānipi karonti. Tattha hi keci “ekummujjaneneva pāpasuddhi
tika-vin02t:1036_6: hotī”ti evaṃdiṭṭhikā, te ummujjanameva katvā gacchanti. Ummujjanaṃ pana nimujjanamantarena
tika-vin02t:1036_7: natthīti avinābhāvato nimujjanampi te karontiyeva. Yepi “ekanimujjaneneva pāpasuddhi
tika-vin02t:1036_8: hotī”ti evaṃdiṭṭhikā, tepi ekavārameva nimujjitvā vuttanayeneva avinābhāvato ummujjanampi
tika-vin02t:1036_9: katvā pakkamanti. Apare “punappunaṃ ummujjananimujjanāni katvā nahāte pāpasuddhi
tika-vin02t:1036_10: hotī”ti evaṃdiṭṭhikā, te kālena kālaṃ ummujjananimujjanāni karonti. Te sabbepi sandhāya
tika-vin02t:1036_11: vuttaṃ “ummujjantipi nimujjantipi ummujjananimujjanampi karontī”ti. Ettha ca kiñcāpi
tika-vin02t:1036_12: nimujjanapubbakaṃ ummujjanaṃ, nimujjanameva pana karontā katipayā, ummujjanaṃ tadubhayañca
tika-vin02t:1036_13: karontā bahūti tesaṃ yebhuyyabhāvadassanatthaṃ ummujjanaṃ paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1037_0: 50-51. Udakavāhakoti udakogho. Reṇuhatāyāti rajogatāya, rajokiṇṇāyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin02t:1037_1: Neva ca kho tvaṃ kassapa arahāti etena tadā kassapassa asekkhabhāvaṃ paṭikkhipati,
tika-vin02t:1037_2: nāpi arahattamaggasamāpannoti etena sekkhabhāvaṃ. Ubhayenapissa anariyabhāvameva
tika-vin02t:1037_3: dīpeti. Sāpi te paṭipadā natthi, yāya tvaṃ arahā vā assasi arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpannoti
tika-vin02t:1037_4: iminā panassa kalyāṇaputhujjanabhāvampi paṭikkhipati. Tattha paṭipadāti sīlavisuddhiādayo
tika-vin02t:1037_5: cha visuddhiyo. Paṭipajjati etāya ariyamaggoti paṭipadā. Assasīti bhaveyyāsi. Cirapaṭikāti
tika-vin02t:1037_6: cirakālato paṭṭhāya, nāgadamanato paṭṭhāyāti attho. Khārikājamissanti ettha khārīti
tika-vin02t:1037_7: araṇīkamaṇḍalusūciādayo tāpasaparikkhārā, taṃ haraṇakājaṃ khārikājaṃ. Aggihutamissanti
tika-vin02t:1038_0: 52-53. Upasaggoti upaddavo. Idāni aḍḍhuḍḍhāni pāṭihāriyasahassāni ekato gaṇetvā dassetuṃ
tika-vin02t:1038_1: “bhagavato adhiṭṭhānena pañca kaṭṭhasatāni na phāliyiṃsū”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Nāgadamanādīni
tika-vin02t:1038_2: pana soḷasa pāṭihāriyāni idha na gaṇitāni, tehi saddhiṃ soḷasātirekaaḍḍhuḍḍhapāṭihāriyasahassānīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1040_0: 54. Idāni tassa bhikkhusahassassa ādittapariyāyadesanāya arahattappattiṃ dassetuṃ
tika-vin02t:1040_1: “atha kho bhagavā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha gayāyaṃ viharati gayāsīseti gayānāmikāya
tika-vin02t:1040_2: nadiyā avidūre bhavattā gāmo gayā nāma, tassaṃ gayāyaṃ viharati. Samīpatthe cetaṃ
tika-vin02t:1040_3: bhummavacanaṃ. Gayāgāmassa hi avidūre gayāti ekā pokkharaṇīpi atthi nadīpi gayāsīsanāmako
tika-vin02t:1040_4: hatthikumbhasadiso piṭṭhipāsāṇopi. Yattha bhikkhusahassassa okāso pahoti, bhagavā
tika-vin02t:1040_5: tattha viharati. Tena vuttaṃ “gayāsīse”ti, gayāgāmassa āsanne gayāsīsanāmake piṭṭhipāsāṇe
tika-vin02t:1040_6: viharatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Bhikkhū āmantesīti tesaṃ sappāyadhammadesanaṃ vicinitvā taṃ
tika-vin02t:1040_7: desessāmīti āmantesi. Bhagavā hi taṃ iddhimayapattacīvaradharaṃ samaṇasahassaṃ ādāya
tika-vin02t:1040_8: gayāsīsaṃ gantvā tena parivārito nisīditvā “katarā nu kho etesaṃ dhammakathā sappāyā”ti
tika-vin02t:1040_9: cintento “ime sāyaṃ pātaṃ aggiṃ paricaranti, imesaṃ dvādasāyatanāni ādittāni sampajjalitāni
tika-vin02t:1040_10: viya katvā dassessāmi, evaṃ ime arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ sakkhissantī”ti sanniṭṭhānamakāsi.
tika-vin02t:1040_11: Atha nesaṃ tathā desetuṃ “sabbaṃ, bhikkhave, āditta”ntiādinā imaṃ ādittapariyāyaṃ abhāsi.
tika-vin02t:1041: Tattha sabbaṃ nāma catubbidhaṃ sabbasabbaṃ āyatanasabbaṃ sakkāyasabbaṃ padesasabbanti. Tattha –
tika-vin02t:1046_0: Idaṃ sabbasabbaṃ nāma. “Sabbaṃ vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi, taṃ suṇāthā”ti idaṃ āyatanasabbaṃ
tika-vin02t:1046_1: nāma. “Sabbadhammamūlapariyāyaṃ vo, bhikkhave, desessāmī”ti idaṃ sakkāyasabbaṃ nāma.
tika-vin02t:1046_2: “Sabbadhammesu vā paṭhamasamannāhāro uppajjati cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ tajjā manoviññāṇadhātū”ti
tika-vin02t:1046_3: idaṃ padesasabbaṃ nāma. Iti pañcārammaṇamattaṃ padesasabbaṃ, tebhūmakā dhammā sakkāyasabbaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1046_4: catubhūmakā dhammā āyatanasabbaṃ, yaṃ kiñci neyyaṃ sabbasabbaṃ. Padesasabbaṃ sakkāyasabbaṃ
tika-vin02t:1046_5: na pāpuṇāti tassa tebhūmakadhammesupi ekadesassa asaṅgaṇhanato. Sakkāyasabbaṃ āyatanasabbaṃ
tika-vin02t:1046_6: na pāpuṇāti lokuttaradhammānaṃ asaṅgaṇhanato. Āyatanasabbaṃ sabbasabbaṃ na pāpuṇāti.
tika-vin02t:1046_7: Kasmā? Yasmā āyatanasabbena catubhūmakadhammāva pariggahitā, na lakkhaṇapaññattiyoti.
tika-vin02t:1046_8: Imasmiṃ pana sutte āyatanasabbaṃ adhippetaṃ, tatthāpi idha vipassanupagadhammāva gahetabbā.
tika-vin02t:1047_0: Cakkhūti dve cakkhūni ñāṇacakkhu ceva maṃsacakkhu ca. Tattha ñāṇacakkhu pañcavidhaṃ
tika-vin02t:1047_1: buddhacakkhu dhammacakkhu samantacakkhu dibbacakkhu paññācakkhūti. Tesu buddhacakkhu
tika-vin02t:1047_3: volokento”ti āgataṃ. Dhammacakkhu nāma heṭṭhimā tayo maggā tīṇi ca phalāni, yaṃ “virajaṃ
tika-vin02t:1047_4: vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādī”ti āgataṃ. Samantacakkhu nāma sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, yaṃ
tika-vin02t:1047_5: “pāsādamāruyha samantacakkhū”ti āgataṃ. Dibbacakkhu nāma ālokavaḍḍhanena uppannañāṇaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1047_6: yaṃ “dibbena cakkhunā visuddhenā”ti āgataṃ. Paññācakkhu nāma catusaccaparicchedakañāṇaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1047_7: yaṃ “cakkhuṃ udapādī”ti āgataṃ. Maṃsacakkhupi duvidhaṃ sasambhāracakkhu pasādacakkhūti.
tika-vin02t:1047_8: Tesu yvāyaṃ akkhikūpake akkhipaṭalehi parivārito maṃsapiṇḍo, yattha catasso dhātuyo
tika-vin02t:1047_9: vaṇṇagandharasojā sambhavo jīvitaṃ bhāvo cakkhuppasādo kāyappasādoti saṅkhepato terasa
tika-vin02t:1047_10: sambhārā honti, vitthārato pana catasso dhātuyo vaṇṇagandharasojā sambhavoti ime
tika-vin02t:1047_11: nava catusamuṭṭhānavasena chattiṃsa, jīvitaṃ bhāvo cakkhuppasādo kāyappasādoti ime
tika-vin02t:1047_12: kammasamuṭṭhānā tāva cattāroti cattālīsa sambhārā honti, idaṃ sasambhāracakkhu nāma.
tika-vin02t:1047_13: Yaṃ panettha setamaṇḍalaparicchinnena kaṇhamaṇḍalena parivārite diṭṭhimaṇḍale sanniviṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin02t:1047_14: rūpadassanasamatthaṃ pasādamattaṃ, idaṃ pasādacakkhu nāma. Tassa tato paresañca sotādīnaṃ
tika-vin02t:1048_0: Tattha yadidaṃ pasādacakkhu, tañca gahetvā bhagavā “cakkhu āditta”ntiādimāha. Tattha
tika-vin02t:1048_1: ādittanti padittaṃ, sampajjalitaṃ ekādasahi aggīhi ekajālībhūtanti attho. Cakkhusannissitaṃ
tika-vin02t:1048_2: viññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, cakkhussa vā kāraṇabhūtassa viññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ. Kāmaṃ
tika-vin02t:1048_3: rūpālokamanasikārādayopi tassa viññāṇassa kāraṇaṃ, te pana sādhāraṇakāraṇaṃ, cakkhu
tika-vin02t:1048_5: eseva nayo. Cakkhusannissito phasso cakkhusamphasso, cakkhuviññāṇasampayuttaphassassetaṃ
tika-vin02t:1048_6: adhivacanaṃ. Sotasamphassādīsupi eseva nayo. Cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitanti
tika-vin02t:1048_8: Cakkhuviññāṇasampayuttāya pana vedanāya cakkhusamphassassa paccayabhāve vattabbameva
tika-vin02t:1048_9: natthi. Cakkhusamphasso hi sahajātāya vedanāya sahajātādivasena, asahajātāya upanissayādivasena
tika-vin02t:1048_10: paccayo hoti. Teneva “cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ
tika-vin02t:1048_11: vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā”ti vuttaṃ. Sotadvāravedanādīsupi eseva nayo. Ettha pana manoti
tika-vin02t:1048_12: bhavaṅgacittaṃ manodvārassa adhippetattā. Dhammāti dhammārammaṇaṃ. Manoviññāṇanti
tika-vin02t:1048_13: sahāvajjanakaṃ javanaṃ. Manosamphassoti bhavaṅgasahajāto phasso. Vedayitanti āvajjanavedanāya
tika-vin02t:1048_14: saddhiṃ javanavedanā. Bhavaṅgasampayuttāya pana vedanāya gahaṇe vattabbameva natthi.
tika-vin02t:1048_15: Āvajjanaṃ vā bhavaṅgato amocetvā manoti sāvajjanaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Dhammāti
tika-vin02t:1048_17: phasso. Vedayitanti javanasahajātā vedanā, bhavaṅgāvajjanasahajātāpi vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin02t:1049_0: Rāgagginātiādīsu rāgova anudahanaṭṭhena aggīti rāgaggi. Rāgo hi tikhiṇaṃ hutvā uppajjamāno
tika-vin02t:1049_1: satte anudahati jhāpeti, tasmā “aggī”ti vuccati. Itaresupi dvīsu eseva nayo. Tatrimāni
tika-vin02t:1049_2: vatthūni – ekā daharabhikkhunī cittalapabbatavihāre uposathāgāraṃ gantvā dvārapālarūpaṃ
tika-vin02t:1049_3: olokayamānā ṭhitā. Athassā anto rāgo tikhiṇataro hutvā uppanno, tasmā taṃsamuṭṭhānā
tika-vin02t:1049_4: tejodhātu ativiya tikhiṇabhāvena saddhiṃ attanā sahajātadhammehi hadayapadesaṃ jhāpesi
tika-vin02t:1049_5: yathā taṃ bāhirā tejodhātu sannissayaṃ, tena sā bhikkhunī jhāyitvā kālamakāsi. Bhikkhuniyo
tika-vin02t:1049_6: gacchamānā “ayaṃ daharā ṭhitā, pakkosatha na”nti āhaṃsu. Ekā gantvā “kasmā ṭhitāsī”ti
tika-vin02t:1049_7: hatthe gaṇhi. Gahitamattā parivattitvā papatā. Idaṃ tāva rāgassa anudahanatāya vatthu.
tika-vin02t:1050_0: Dosassa pana anudahanatāya manopadosikā devā daṭṭhabbā. Tesu kira eko devaputto “nakkhattaṃ
tika-vin02t:1050_1: kīḷissāmī”ti saparivāro rathena vīthiṃ paṭipajjati. Athañño nikkhamanto taṃ purato
tika-vin02t:1050_2: gacchantaṃ disvā “bho ayaṃ kapaṇo adiṭṭhapubbaṃ viya etaṃ disvā pītiyā uddhumāto
tika-vin02t:1050_3: viya bhijjamāno viya ca gacchatī”ti kujjhati. Purato gacchantopi nivattitvā taṃ kuddhaṃ
tika-vin02t:1050_4: disvā kuddhā nāma suvijānā hontīti kuddhabhāvamassa ñatvā “tvaṃ kuddho mayhaṃ kiṃ
tika-vin02t:1050_5: karissasi, ayaṃ sampatti mayā dānasīlādīnaṃ vasena laddhā, na tuyhaṃ vasenā”ti paṭikujjhati.
tika-vin02t:1050_6: Ekasmiñhi kuddhe itaro akuddho rakkhati. Kuddhassa hi so kodho itarasmiṃ akujjhante
tika-vin02t:1050_7: anupādāno ekavārameva uppattiyā anāsevano cāvetuṃ na sakkoti, udakaṃ patvā aggi viya
tika-vin02t:1050_8: nibbāyati, tasmā akuddho taṃ cavanato rakkhati. Ubhosu pana kuddhesu ekassa kodho
tika-vin02t:1050_9: itarassa paccayo hoti, tassapi kodho itarassa paccayo hotīti ubho kandantānaṃyeva
tika-vin02t:1050_10: orodhānaṃ cavanti. Ubhosu hi kuddhesu bhiyyo bhiyyo aññamaññamhi parivaḍḍhanavasena
tika-vin02t:1050_11: tikhiṇasamudācāro nissayadahanaraso kodho uppajjamāno hadayavatthuṃ niddahanto accantasukhumālaṃ
tika-vin02t:1050_12: karajakāyaṃ vināseti, tato sakalopi attabhāvo antaradhāyati. Idaṃ dosassa anudahanatāya vatthu.
tika-vin02t:1051_0: Mohassa pana anudahanatāya khiḍḍāpadosikā devā daṭṭhabbā. Mohavasena hi tesaṃ satisammoso
tika-vin02t:1051_1: hoti, tasmā khiḍḍāvasena āhārakālaṃ ativattetvā kālaṃ karonti. Te kira puññavisesādhigatena
tika-vin02t:1051_2: mahantena attano sirivibhavena nakkhattaṃ kīḷantā tāya sampattimahantatāya “āhāraṃ
tika-vin02t:1051_3: paribhuñjimha, na paribhuñjimhā”tipi na jānanti. Atha ekāhārātikkamanato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin02t:1051_4: nirantaraṃ khādantāpi pivantāpi cavantiyeva na tiṭṭhanti. Kasmā? Kammajatejassa balavatāya.
tika-vin02t:1051_5: Manussānañhi kammajatejo mando, karajakāyo balavā. Tesaṃ tejassa mandatāya karajakāyassa
tika-vin02t:1051_6: balavatāya sattāhampi atikkamitvā uṇhodakaacchayāguādīhi sakkā vatthuṃ upatthambhetuṃ.
tika-vin02t:1051_7: Devānaṃ pana tejo balavā hoti uḷārapuññanibbattattā uḷāragarusiniddhasudhāhārajiraṇato
tika-vin02t:1051_8: ca, karajaṃ mandaṃ mudusukhumālabhāvato. Teneva hi bhagavā indasālaguhāyaṃ pakatipathaviyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1051_9: patiṭṭhātuṃ asakkontaṃ sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ “oḷārikakāyaṃ adhiṭṭhāhī”ti āha, tasmā
tika-vin02t:1051_10: te ekaṃ āhāravelaṃ atikkamitvā saṇṭhātuṃ na sakkonti. Yathā nāma gimhānaṃ majjhanhike
tika-vin02t:1051_11: tattapāsāṇe ṭhapitaṃ padumaṃ vā uppalaṃ vā sāyanhasamaye ghaṭasatenapi siñciyamānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1051_12: pākatikaṃ na hoti vinassatiyeva, evameva pacchā nirantaraṃ khādantāpi pivantāpi cavantiyeva na tiṭṭhanti.
tika-vin02t:1052_0: Ko pana tesaṃ āhāro, kā āhāravelāti? Sabbesampi kāmāvacaradevānaṃ sudhā āhāro, so
tika-vin02t:1052_1: heṭṭhimehi heṭṭhimehi uparimānaṃ uparimānaṃ paṇītatamo hoti. Taṃ yathāsakaṃ divasavasena
tika-vin02t:1052_2: divase divase bhuñjanti. Keci pana “biḷārapadappamāṇaṃ sudhāhāraṃ bhuñjanti. So jivhāya
tika-vin02t:1052_3: ṭhapitamatto yāva kesagganakhaggā kāyaṃ pharati, tesaṃyeva divasavasena sattadivasaṃ
tika-vin02t:1053_0: Ke pana te khiḍḍāpadosikā nāma devāti? Ime nāmāti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vicāraṇā natthi,
tika-vin02t:1053_1: “kammajatejo balavā hoti, karajaṃ manda”nti avisesena vuttattā pana ye keci kabaḷīkārāhārūpajīvino
tika-vin02t:1053_2: evaṃ karonti, te evaṃ cavantīti veditabbā. Keci panāhu “nimmānaratiparanimmitavasavattino
tika-vin02t:1053_3: te devā. Khiḍḍāya padussanamatteneva hete khiḍḍāpadosikāti vuttā”ti. Manopadosikā
tika-vin02t:1053_4: pana cātumahārājikāti aṭṭhakathāyameva vuttaṃ. Keci pana “khiḍḍāpadosikāpi cātumahārājikāyevā”ti
tika-vin02t:1053_5: vadanti. Evaṃ tāva rāgādayo tayo anudahanaṭṭhena “aggī”ti veditabbā. Jātiādittayaṃ
tika-vin02t:1053_6: pana nānappakāradukkhavatthubhāvena anudahanato aggi. Sokādīnaṃ anudahanatā pākaṭāyeva.
tika-vin02t:1053_7: Sesamettha vuttanayameva. Iti imasmiṃ sutte dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ kathitaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ
tika-vin02t:1053_8: ekādasahi aggīhi ādittabhāvena dukkhamatāya dukkhabhāvassa kathitattā.
tika-vin02t:1057_0: 55. Idāni “atha kho bhagavā gayāsīse yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā”tiādīsu yā sā anuttānapadavaṇṇanā,
tika-vin02t:1057_1: taṃ dassetuṃ “laṭṭhivaneti tāluyyāne”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha tāluyyāneti tālarukkhānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1057_2: bahubhāvato evaṃladdhanāme uyyāne. Appekacce yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvātiādīsu
tika-vin02t:1057_3: añjaliṃ paṇāmetvāti ye ubhatopakkhikā, te sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Te kira evaṃ cintayiṃsu
tika-vin02t:1057_4: “sace no micchādiṭṭhikā codessanti ‘kasmā tumhe samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ vanditthā’ti, tesaṃ
tika-vin02t:1057_5: ‘kiṃ añjalimattakaraṇenapi vanditaṃ hotī’ti vakkhāma. Sace no sammādiṭṭhikā codessanti
tika-vin02t:1057_6: ‘kasmā bhagavantaṃ na vanditthā’ti, ‘kiṃ sīsena bhūmiṃ paharanteneva vanditaṃ hoti,
tika-vin02t:1057_7: nanu añjalikammampi vandanā evā’ti vakkhāmā”ti. Nāmagottaṃ sāvetvāti “bho gotama,
tika-vin02t:1057_8: ahaṃ asukassa putto datto nāma mitto nāma idha āgato”ti vadantā nāmaṃ sāventi nāma,
tika-vin02t:1057_9: “bho gotama, ahaṃ vāseṭṭho nāma kaccāno nāma idhāgato”ti vadantā gottaṃ sāventi nāma.
tika-vin02t:1057_10: Ete kira daliddā jiṇṇakulaputtā parisamajjhe nāmagottavasena pākaṭā bhavissāmāti
tika-vin02t:1057_11: evaṃ akaṃsu. Ye pana tuṇhībhūtā nisīdiṃsu, te kerāṭikā ceva andhabālā ca. Tattha
tika-vin02t:1057_12: kerāṭikā “ekaṃ dve kathāsallāpe karonte vissāsiko hoti, atha vissāse sati ekaṃ dve
tika-vin02t:1057_13: bhikkhā adātuṃ na yutta”nti tato attānaṃ mocentā tuṇhī nisīdanti. Andhabālā aññāṇatāyeva
tika-vin02t:1057_14: avakkhittā mattikāpiṇḍo viya yattha katthaci tuṇhībhūtā nisīdanti.
tika-vin02t:1058_0: Kisakovadānoti ettha kisakānaṃ ovadāno kisakovadānoti imaṃ tāva atthavikappaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-vin02t:1058_2: idha kāmanīyaṭṭhena “kāmā”ti vuttāti āha “ete rūpādayo kāme”ti. Yaññā abhivadantīti
tika-vin02t:1058_3: yāgahetu ijjhantīti vadanti. Upadhīsūti ettha cattāro upadhī kāmupadhi khandhupadhi
tika-vin02t:1058_4: kilesupadhi abhisaṅkhārupadhīti. Kāmāpi hi “yaṃ pañca kāmaguṇe paṭicca uppajjati
tika-vin02t:1058_5: sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, ayaṃ kāmānaṃ assādo”ti evaṃ vuttassa sukhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato
tika-vin02t:1058_6: upadhīyati ettha sukhanti iminā vacanatthena “upadhī”ti vuccanti. Khandhāpi khandhamūlakassa
tika-vin02t:1058_7: dukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato, kilesāpi apāyadukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato, abhisaṅkhārāpi
tika-vin02t:1058_8: bhavadukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato “upadhī”ti vuccanti, tesu khandhupadhi idhādhippetoti
tika-vin02t:1058_9: āha “khandhupadhīsu malanti ñatvā”ti. Yaññā malameva vadantīti yāgahetu malameva
tika-vin02t:1058_10: ijjhatīti vadanti. Yiṭṭheti mahāyāge. Huteti divase divase kattabbaaggiparicaraṇe.
tika-vin02t:1058_11: Kāmabhave asattanti kāmabhave alaggaṃ, tabbinimuttanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin02t:1059_1: vuttaṃ. Yatheva hi manussaparibhoge suvaṇṇe yuttikataṃ hīnaṃ, tato rasaviddhaṃ seṭṭhaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1059_2: rasaviddhato ākaruppannaṃ, tato yaṃ kiñci dibbaṃ seṭṭhaṃ, evaṃ dibbasuvaṇṇesupi cāmīkarato
tika-vin02t:1059_3: sātakumbhaṃ, sātakumbhato jambunadaṃ, jambunadato siṅgīsuvaṇṇaṃ, tasmā taṃ sabbaseṭṭhaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1059_4: Siṅgīnikkhanti ca nikkhaparimāṇena siṅgīsuvaṇṇena kataṃ suvaṇṇapaṭṭaṃ. Ūnakanikkhena
tika-vin02t:1059_5: katañhi ghaṭṭanamajjanakkhamaṃ na hoti, atirekena kataṃ ghaṭṭanamajjanaṃ khamati,
tika-vin02t:1059_6: vaṇṇavantaṃ pana na hoti, pharusadhātukaṃ khāyati, nikkhena kataṃ ghaṭṭanamajjanañceva
tika-vin02t:1059_7: khamati vaṇṇavantañca hoti. Nikkhaṃ pana vīsatisuvaṇṇanti keci. Pañcavīsatisuvaṇṇanti
tika-vin02t:1059_8: apare. Majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “nikkhaṃ nāma pañcasuvaṇṇā”ti vuttaṃ. Suvaṇṇo
tika-vin02t:1061_0: “Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pañcaṅgavippahīno hoti chaḷaṅgasamannāgato ekārakkho caturāpasseno
tika-vin02t:1061_1: panuṇṇapaccekasacco samavayasaṭṭhesano anāvilasaṅkappo passaddhakāyasaṅkhāro suvimuttacitto suvimuttapañño.
tika-vin02t:1062_0: “Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pañcaṅgavippahīno hoti? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno
tika-vin02t:1062_1: kāmacchando pahīno hoti, byāpādo pahīno hoti, thinamiddhaṃ pahīnaṃ hoti, uddhaccakukkuccaṃ
tika-vin02t:1062_2: pahīnaṃ hoti, vicikicchā pahīnā hoti. Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pañcaṅgavippahīno hoti.
tika-vin02t:1063_0: “Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chaḷaṅgasamannāgato hoti? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu
tika-vin02t:1063_1: cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā neva sumano hoti na dummano, upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno.
tika-vin02t:1063_2: Sotena saddaṃ sutvā…pe… ghānena gandhaṃ ghāyitvā… jivhāya rasaṃ sāyitvā… kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṃ
tika-vin02t:1063_3: phusitvā… manasā dhammaṃ viññāya neva sumano hoti na dummano, upekkhako viharati
tika-vin02t:1063_4: sato sampajāno. Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chaḷaṅgasamannāgato hoti.
tika-vin02t:1064: “Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ekārakkho hoti? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satārakkhena cetasā samannāgato hoti. Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ekārakkho hoti.
tika-vin02t:1065_0: “Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu caturāpasseno hoti? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saṅkhāyekaṃ
tika-vin02t:1065_1: paṭisevati, saṅkhāyekaṃ adhivāseti, saṅkhāyekaṃ parivajjeti, saṅkhāyekaṃ vinodeti.
tika-vin02t:1065_2: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu caturāpasseno hoti.
tika-vin02t:1066_0: “Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu panuṇṇapaccekasacco hoti? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu
tika-vin02t:1066_1: yāni tāni puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ puthupaccekasaccāni, sabbāni tāni nuṇṇāni honti
tika-vin02t:1066_2: panuṇṇāni cattāni vantāni muttāni pahīnāni paṭinissaṭṭhāni. Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave,
tika-vin02t:1067_0: “Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu samavayasaṭṭhesano hoti? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno
tika-vin02t:1067_1: kāmesanā pahīnā hoti, bhavesanā pahīnā hoti, brahmacariyesanā paṭippassaddhā. Evaṃ
tika-vin02t:1068_0: “Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anāvilasaṅkappo hoti? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno kāmasaṅkappo
tika-vin02t:1068_1: pahīno hoti, byāpādasaṅkappo pahīno hoti, vihiṃsāsaṅkappo pahīno hoti. Evaṃ kho,
tika-vin02t:1069_0: “Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu passaddhakāyasaṅkhāro hoti? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu
tika-vin02t:1069_1: sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṃ
tika-vin02t:1069_2: upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṃ catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati. Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave,
tika-vin02t:1070_0: “Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu suvimuttacitto hoti? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno rāgācittaṃ
tika-vin02t:1070_1: vimuttaṃ hoti, dosā cittaṃ vimuttaṃ hoti, mohā cittaṃ vimuttaṃ hoti. Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave,
tika-vin02t:1071_0: “Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu suvimuttapañño hoti? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘rāgo
tika-vin02t:1071_1: me pahīno ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṃkato āyatiṃ anuppādadhammo’ti pajānāti,
tika-vin02t:1071_2: ‘doso me pahīno…pe… moho me pahīno ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṃkato āyatiṃ
tika-vin02t:1071_3: anuppādadhammo’ti pajānāti. Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu suvimuttapañño hotī”ti –
tika-vin02t:1073_0: Tattha vasanti etthāti vāsā, ariyānaṃ eva vāsāti ariyavāsā anariyānaṃ tādisānaṃ vāsānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1073_1: asambhavato. Ariyāti cettha ukkaṭṭhaniddesena khīṇāsavā gahitā. Ekārakkhoti ekā satisaṅkhātā
tika-vin02t:1073_2: ārakkhā etassāti ekārakkho. Khīṇāsavassa hi tīsu dvāresu sabbakāle sati ārakkhakiccaṃ
tika-vin02t:1073_3: sādheti. Tenevassa carato ca tiṭṭhato ca suttassa ca jāgarassa ca satataṃ samitaṃ
tika-vin02t:1074_0: Caturāpassenoti cattāri apassenāni apassayā etassāti caturāpasseno. Saṅkhāyāti ñāṇena.
tika-vin02t:1074_1: Paṭisevatīti ñāṇena ñatvā sevitabbayuttakameva sevati. Tassa vitthāro “paṭisaṅkhā
tika-vin02t:1074_2: yoniso cīvaraṃ paribhuñjatī”tiādinā nayena veditabbo. Saṅkhāyekaṃ adhivāsetīti ñāṇena
tika-vin02t:1074_3: ñatvā adhivāsetabbayuttakameva adhivāseti. Vitthāro panettha “paṭisaṅkhā yoniso khamo
tika-vin02t:1074_4: hoti sītassā”tiādinā nayena veditabbo. Parivajjetīti ñāṇena ñatvā parivajjetabbayuttakameva
tika-vin02t:1074_5: parivajjeti. Tassa vitthāro “paṭisaṅkhā yoniso caṇḍaṃ hatthiṃ parivajjetī”tiādinā
tika-vin02t:1074_6: nayena veditabbo. Vinodetīti ñāṇena ñatvā vinodetabbameva vinodeti nudati nīharati
tika-vin02t:1074_7: anto vasituṃ na deti. Tassa vitthāro “uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāsetī”tiādinā nayena veditabbo.
tika-vin02t:1075_0: Panuṇṇapaccekasaccoti “idameva dassanaṃ saccaṃ, idameva sacca”nti evaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ
tika-vin02t:1075_1: gahitattā paccekasaṅkhātāni diṭṭhisaccāni panuṇṇāni nīhaṭāni pahīnāni assāti panuṇṇapaccekasacco.
tika-vin02t:1075_2: Puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇānanti bahūnaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ. Ettha ca samaṇāti pabbajjupagatā.
tika-vin02t:1075_3: Brāhmaṇāti bhovādino. Puthupaccekasaccānīti bahūni pāṭekkasaccāni, “idameva dassanaṃ
tika-vin02t:1075_4: saccaṃ, idameva sacca”nti pāṭiyekkaṃ gahitāni bahūni saccānīti attho. Nuṇṇānīti nīhaṭāni.
tika-vin02t:1075_5: Panuṇṇānīti suṭṭhu nīhatāni. Cattānīti vissaṭṭhāni. Vantānīti vamitāni. Muttānīti
tika-vin02t:1075_6: chinnabandhanāni katāni. Pahīnānīti pajahitāni. Paṭinissaṭṭhānīti yathā na puna cittaṃ
tika-vin02t:1075_7: ārohanti, evaṃ paṭivissajjitāni. Sabbāneva cetāni ariyamaggādhigamato pubbe gahitassa
tika-vin02t:1076_0: Samavayasaṭṭhesanoti ettha avayāti anūnā. Saṭṭhāti nissaṭṭhā. Sammā avayā saṭṭhā
tika-vin02t:1076_1: esanā assāti samavayasaṭṭhesano, sammā vissaṭṭhasabbaesanoti attho. “Rāgā cittaṃ
tika-vin02t:1076_2: vimutta”ntiādīhi maggassa kiccanipphatti kathitā rāgādīnaṃ pahīnabhāvadīpanato. “Rāgo
tika-vin02t:1076_3: me pahīno”tiādīhi paccavekkhaṇāmukhena ariyaphalaṃ kathitaṃ. Adhigate hi aggaphale
tika-vin02t:1076_4: sabbaso rāgādīnaṃ anuppādadhammataṃ pajānāti, tañca pajānanaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇanti.
tika-vin02t:1076_6: adhivāseti parivajjeti vinodetī”ti vuttesu apassenesu vinodanā ca maggakiccāneva,
tika-vin02t:1077_0: Dasabaloti kāyabalasaṅkhātāni ñāṇabalasaṅkhātāni ca dasa balāni etassāti dasabalo.
tika-vin02t:1077_1: Duvidhañhi tathāgatassa balaṃ kāyabalaṃ ñāṇabalañca. Tesu kāyabalaṃ hatthikulānusārena
tika-vin02t:1080_0: Imāni hi dasa hatthikulāni. Tattha kāḷāvakanti pakatihatthikulaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yaṃ
tika-vin02t:1080_1: dasannaṃ purisānaṃ kāyabalaṃ, taṃ ekassa kāḷāvakassa hatthino. Yaṃ dasannaṃ kāḷāvakānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1080_2: balaṃ, taṃ ekassa gaṅgeyyassa. Yaṃ dasannaṃ gaṅgeyyānaṃ, taṃ ekassa paṇḍarassa. Yaṃ
tika-vin02t:1080_3: dasannaṃ paṇḍarānaṃ, taṃ ekassa tambassa. Yaṃ dasannaṃ tambānaṃ, taṃ ekassa piṅgalassa.
tika-vin02t:1080_4: Yaṃ dasannaṃ piṅgalānaṃ, taṃ ekassa gandhahatthino. Yaṃ dasannaṃ gandhahatthīnaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1080_5: taṃ ekassa maṅgalassa. Yaṃ dasannaṃ maṅgalānaṃ, taṃ ekassa hemavatassa. Yaṃ dasannaṃ
tika-vin02t:1080_6: hemavatānaṃ, taṃ ekassa uposathassa. Yaṃ dasannaṃ uposathānaṃ, taṃ ekassa chaddantassa.
tika-vin02t:1080_7: Yaṃ dasannaṃ chaddantānaṃ, taṃ ekassa tathāgatassa kāyabalaṃ. Nārāyanasaṅghātabalantipi
tika-vin02t:1080_8: idameva vuccati. Tattha nārā vuccanti rasmiyo, tā bahū nānāvidhā tato uppajjantīti
tika-vin02t:1080_9: nārāyanaṃ, vajiraṃ, tasmā vajirasaṅghātabalanti attho. Tadetaṃ pakatihatthigaṇanāya
tika-vin02t:1080_10: hatthīnaṃ koṭisahassānaṃ, purisagaṇanāya dasannaṃ purisakoṭisahassānaṃ balaṃ hoti.
tika-vin02t:1081: Ñāṇabalaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ āgatameva. Tatrāyaṃ pāḷi –
tika-vin02t:1082_0: “Dasa kho panimāni, sāriputta, tathāgatassa tathāgatabalāni, yehi balehi samannāgato
tika-vin02t:1082_1: tathāgato āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti, parisāsu sīhanādaṃ nadati, brahmacakkaṃ pavatteti.
tika-vin02t:1082_2: Katamāni dasa? Idha, sāriputta, tathāgato ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ
tika-vin02t:1082_3: pajānāti, yampi, sāriputta, tathāgato ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ
tika-vin02t:1082_4: pajānāti. Idampi, sāriputta, tathāgatassa tathāgatabalaṃ hoti, yaṃ balaṃ āgamma tathāgato
tika-vin02t:1082_5: āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti, parisāsu sīhanādaṃ nadati, brahmacakkaṃ pavatteti. (1)
tika-vin02t:1083: “Puna caparaṃ, sāriputta, tathāgato atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ kammasamādānānaṃ ṭhānaso hetuso vipākaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti…pe…. (2)
tika-vin02t:1084: “Puna caparaṃ, sāriputta, tathāgato sabbatthagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti…pe…. (3)
tika-vin02t:1085: “Puna caparaṃ, sāriputta, tathāgato anekadhātuṃ nānādhātuṃ lokaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti…pe…. (4)
tika-vin02t:1086: “Puna caparaṃ, sāriputta, tathāgato sattānaṃ nānādhimuttikataṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti…pe…. (5)
tika-vin02t:1087: “Puna caparaṃ, sāriputta, tathāgato parasattānaṃ parapuggalānaṃ indriyaparopariyattaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti…pe…. (6)
tika-vin02t:1088: “Puna caparaṃ, sāriputta, tathāgato jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattīnaṃ saṃkilesaṃ vodānaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti…pe…. (7)
tika-vin02t:1089_0: “Puna caparaṃ, sāriputta, tathāgato anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati. Seyyathidaṃ?
tika-vin02t:1089_1: Ekampi jātiṃ dvepi jātiyo…pe… iti sākāraṃ sauddesaṃ anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati…pe…. (8)
tika-vin02t:1090_0: “Puna caparaṃ, sāriputta, tathāgato dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena
tika-vin02t:1090_1: satte passati cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe sugate duggate,
tika-vin02t:1091_0: “Puna caparaṃ, sāriputta, tathāgato āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ
tika-vin02t:1091_1: diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati…pe… idampi, sāriputta,
tika-vin02t:1091_2: tathāgatassa tathāgatabalaṃ hoti, yaṃ balaṃ āgamma tathāgato āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti,
tika-vin02t:1091_3: parisāsu sīhanādaṃ nadati, brahmacakkaṃ pavatteti. Imāni kho, sāriputta, dasa tathāgatassa
tika-vin02t:1092_0: Tattha ṭhānañca ṭhānatoti kāraṇañca kāraṇato. “Ye ye dhammā yesaṃ yesaṃ dhammānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1092_1: hetū paccayā uppādāya, taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ. Ye ye dhammā yesaṃ yesaṃ dhammānaṃ na hetū
tika-vin02t:1092_2: na paccayā uppādāya, taṃ taṃ aṭṭhāna”nti pajānanto ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato
tika-vin02t:1093_0: Kammasamādānānanti samādiyitvā katānaṃ kusalākusalakammānaṃ, kammameva vā kammasamādānaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1093_1: Ṭhānaso hetusoti paccayato ceva hetuto ca. Tattha gatiupadhikālapayogā vipākassa
tika-vin02t:1094_0: Sabbatthagāmininti sabbagatigāminiñca agatigāminiñca. Paṭipadanti maggaṃ. Yathābhūtaṃ
tika-vin02t:1094_1: pajānātīti bahūsupi manussesu ekameva pāṇaṃ ghātentesu kāmaṃ sabbesampi cetanā tassevekassa
tika-vin02t:1094_2: jīvitindriyārammaṇā, taṃ pana kammaṃ tesaṃ nānākāraṃ. Tesu hi eko ādarena chandajāto
tika-vin02t:1094_3: karoti, eko “ehi tvampi karohī”ti parehi nippīḷito karoti, eko samānacchando viya
tika-vin02t:1094_4: hutvā appaṭibāhiyamāno vicarati, tasmā tesu eko teneva kammena niraye nibbattati,
tika-vin02t:1094_5: eko tiracchānayoniyaṃ, eko pettivisaye. Taṃ tathāgato āyūhanakkhaṇeyeva “iminā nīhārena
tika-vin02t:1094_6: āyūhitattā esa niraye nibbattissati, esa tiracchānayoniyaṃ, esa pettivisaye”ti jānāti.
tika-vin02t:1094_7: Niraye nibbattamānampi “esa mahāniraye nibbattissati, esa ussadaniraye”ti jānāti.
tika-vin02t:1094_8: Tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbattamānampi “esa apādako bhavissati, esa dvipādako, esa catuppādo,
tika-vin02t:1094_9: esa bahuppādo”ti jānāti. Pettivisaye nibbattamānampi “esa nijjhāmataṇhiko bhavissati,
tika-vin02t:1094_10: esa khuppipāsiko, esa paradattūpajīvī”ti jānāti. Tesu ca kammesu “idaṃ kammaṃ paṭisandhiṃ
tika-vin02t:1094_11: ākaḍḍhissati, etaṃ aññena dinnāya paṭisandhiyā upadhivepakkaṃ bhavissatī”ti jānāti.
tika-vin02t:1095_0: Tathā sakalagāmavāsikesu ekato piṇḍapātaṃ dadamānesu kāmaṃ sabbesampi cetanā piṇḍapātārammaṇāva,
tika-vin02t:1095_1: taṃ pana kammaṃ tesaṃ nānākāraṃ. Tesu hi eko ādarena karotīti sabbaṃ purimasadisaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1095_2: Tasmā tesu ca keci devaloke nibbattanti, keci manussaloke. Taṃ tathāgato āyūhanakkhaṇeyeva
