tika-vin02t:1095_3: jānāti. “Iminā nīhārena āyūhitattā esa manussaloke nibbattissati, esa devaloke, tatthāpi
tika-vin02t:1095_4: esa khattiyakule, esa brāhmaṇakule, esa vessakule, esa suddakule, esa paranimmitavasavattīsu,
tika-vin02t:1095_5: esa nimmānaratīsu, esa tusitesu, esa yāmesu, esa tāvatiṃsesu, esa cātumahārājikesu,
tika-vin02t:1096_0: Tathā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapentesuyeva “iminā nīhārena esa kiñci sallakkhetuṃ na sakkhissati,
tika-vin02t:1096_1: esa mahābhūtamattameva vavatthapessati, esa rūpapariggahe eva ṭhassati, esa arūpapariggaheyeva,
tika-vin02t:1096_2: esa nāmarūpapariggaheyeva, esa paccayapariggaheyeva, esa lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāyameva,
tika-vin02t:1096_3: esa paṭhamaphaleyeva, esa dutiyaphale eva, esa tatiyaphale eva, esa arahattaṃ pāpuṇissatī”ti
tika-vin02t:1096_4: jānāti. Kasiṇaparikammaṃ karontesupi “imassa parikammamattameva bhavissati, esa nimittaṃ
tika-vin02t:1096_5: uppādessati, esa appanaṃ eva pāpuṇissati, esa jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā
tika-vin02t:1097_0: Anekadhātunti cakkhudhātuādīhi, kāmadhātuādīhi vā dhātūhi bahudhātuṃ. Nānādhātunti
tika-vin02t:1097_1: tāsaṃyeva dhātūnaṃ vilakkhaṇattā nānappakāradhātuṃ. Lokanti khandhāyatanadhātulokaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1097_2: Yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti tāsaṃ dhātūnaṃ aviparītato sabhāvaṃ paṭivijjhati.
tika-vin02t:1098_0: Nānādhimuttikatanti hīnādīhi adhimuttīhi nānādhimuttikabhāvaṃ. Parasattānanti padhānasattānaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1098_1: Parapuggalānanti tato paresaṃ hīnasattānaṃ. Ekatthameva vā etaṃ padadvayaṃ, veneyyavasena
tika-vin02t:1098_2: pana dvedhā vuttaṃ. Indriyaparopariyattanti saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ parabhāvañca aparabhāvañca,
tika-vin02t:1099_0: Jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattīnanti paṭhamādīnaṃ catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ, “rūpī rūpāni passatī”tiādīnaṃ
tika-vin02t:1099_1: aṭṭhannaṃ vimokkhānaṃ, savitakkasavicārādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ samādhīnaṃ, paṭhamajjhānasamāpattiādīnañca
tika-vin02t:1099_2: navannaṃ anupubbasamāpattīnaṃ. Saṃkilesanti hānabhāgiyadhammaṃ. Vodānanti visesabhāgiyadhammaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1099_3: Vuṭṭhānanti “vodānampi vuṭṭhānaṃ, tamhā tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhānampi vuṭṭhāna”nti
tika-vin02t:1099_4: evaṃ vuttaṃ paguṇajjhānañceva bhavaṅgaphalasamāpattiyo ca. Heṭṭhimaṃ heṭṭhimañhi
tika-vin02t:1099_5: paguṇajjhānaṃ uparimassa uparimassa padaṭṭhānaṃ hoti, tasmā “vodānampi vuṭṭhāna”nti
tika-vin02t:1099_6: vuttaṃ. Bhavaṅgena sabbajhānehi vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti, phalasamāpattiyā nirodhasamāpattito
tika-vin02t:1099_7: vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti. Tametaṃ sandhāya “tamhā tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhānampi vuṭṭhāna”nti
tika-vin02t:1099_8: vuttaṃ. Sabbañāṇānañca vitthārakathāya vinicchayo sammohavinodaniyaṃ vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1100_0: Imāni kho sāriputtāti yāni pubbe “dasa kho panimāni, sāriputta, tathāgatassa tathāgatabalānī”ti
tika-vin02t:1100_1: avocaṃ, imāni tānīti appanaṃ karoti. Tattha paravādikathā hoti “dasabalañāṇaṃ nāma
tika-vin02t:1100_2: pāṭiyekkaṃ natthi, sabbaññutaññāṇassevāyaṃ pabhedo”ti, taṃ na tathā daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aññameva
tika-vin02t:1100_3: hi dasabalañāṇaṃ, aññaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ. Dasabalañāṇaṃ sakasakakiccameva jānāti,
tika-vin02t:1100_4: sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ tampi tato avasesampi pajānāti. Dasabalañāṇesu hi paṭhamaṃ kāraṇākāraṇameva
tika-vin02t:1100_5: jānāti, dutiyaṃ kammantaravipākantarameva, tatiyaṃ kammaparicchedameva, catutthaṃ
tika-vin02t:1100_6: dhātunānattakāraṇameva, pañcamaṃ sattānaṃ ajjhāsayādhimuttimeva, chaṭṭhaṃ indriyānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1100_7: tikkhamudubhāvameva, sattamaṃ jhānādīhi saddhiṃ tesaṃ saṃkilesādimeva, aṭṭhamaṃ pubbenivutthakkhandhasantatimeva,
tika-vin02t:1100_8: navamaṃ sattānaṃ cutipaṭisandhimeva, dasamaṃ saccaparicchedameva. Sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:1100_9: pana etehi jānitabbañca tato uttariñca pajānāti, etesaṃ pana kiccaṃ na sabbaṃ karoti.
tika-vin02t:1100_10: Tañhi jhānaṃ hutvā appetuṃ na sakkoti, iddhi hutvā vikubbituṃ na sakkoti, maggo hutvā
tika-vin02t:1100_11: kilese khepetuṃ na sakkoti. Iti yathāvuttakāyabalena ceva ñāṇabalena ca samannāgatattā
tika-vin02t:1101_0: Dasahi asekkhehi aṅgehi upetoti “asekkhā sammādiṭṭhi, asekkho sammāsaṅkappo, asekkhā
tika-vin02t:1101_1: sammāvācā, asekkho sammākammanto, asekkho sammāājīvo, asekkho sammāvāyāmo, asekkhā
tika-vin02t:1101_2: sammāsati, asekkho sammāsamādhi, asekkhaṃ sammāñāṇaṃ, asekkhā sammāvimuttī”ti evaṃ
tika-vin02t:1101_3: vuttehi dasahi asekkhadhammehi samannāgato. Asekkhā sammādiṭṭhiādayo ca sabbe phalasampayuttadhammā
tika-vin02t:1101_4: eva. Ettha ca sammādiṭṭhi sammāñāṇanti dvīsu ṭhānesu paññāva kathitā “sammā dassanaṭṭhena
tika-vin02t:1101_5: sammādiṭṭhi, sammā pajānanaṭṭhena sammāñāṇa”nti. Atthi hi dassanajānanānaṃ visaye
tika-vin02t:1101_6: pavattiākāraviseso. Sammāvimuttīti iminā pana padena vuttāvasesā phalasamāpattisahagatadhammā
tika-vin02t:1101_7: saṅgahitāti veditabbā. Ariyaphalasampayuttadhammāpi hi sabbaso paṭipakkhato vimuttataṃ
tika-vin02t:1102_0: 59. Vacanasaddena appasaddanti ārāmupacārena gacchato addhikajanassapi vacanasaddena
tika-vin02t:1102_1: appasaddaṃ. Nagaranigghosasaddenāti avibhāvitatthena nagare manussānaṃ nigghosasaddena.
tika-vin02t:1102_2: Manussehi samāgamma ekajjhaṃ pavattitasaddo hi nigghoso. Anusañcaraṇajanassāti antosañcārino
tika-vin02t:1102_3: janassa. Manussānaṃ rahassakiriyaṭṭhāniyanti manussānaṃ rahassakaraṇassa yuttaṃ anucchavikaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1105_0: 60. Idāni “tena kho pana samayena sañcayo paribbājako”tiādīsu apubbapadavaṇṇanaṃ
tika-vin02t:1105_1: dassento “sāriputtamoggallānā”tiādimāha. Tattha sārībrāhmaṇiyā putto sāriputto, moggallībrāhmaṇiyā
tika-vin02t:1105_2: putto moggallāno. Amhākaṃ kira bhagavato nibbattito puretarameva sāriputto rājagahanagarassa
tika-vin02t:1105_3: avidūre upatissagāme sārībrāhmaṇiyā nāma kucchiyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Taṃdivasamevassa
tika-vin02t:1105_4: sahāyopi rājagahasseva avidūre kolitagāme moggallībrāhmaṇiyā kucchiyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ
tika-vin02t:1105_5: gaṇhi. Tāni kira dvepi kulāni yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā ābaddhapaṭibaddhasahāyāneva.
tika-vin02t:1105_6: Tesaṃ dvinnaṃ ekadivasameva gabbhaparihāraṃ adaṃsu. Dasamāsaccayena jātānampi tesaṃ
tika-vin02t:1105_7: chasaṭṭhi dhātiyo upanayiṃsu. Nāmaggahaṇadivase sārībrāhmaṇiyā puttassa upatissagāme
tika-vin02t:1105_8: jeṭṭhakulassa puttattā “upatisso”ti nāmaṃ akaṃsu, itarassa kolitagāme jeṭṭhakulassa
tika-vin02t:1105_9: puttattā “kolito”ti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Tena vuttaṃ “gihikāle upatisso kolitoti evaṃ paññāyamānanāmā”ti.
tika-vin02t:1106: Aḍḍhateyyasatamāṇavakaparivārāti ettha pañcapañcasatamāṇavakaparivārātipi vadanti. Vuttañhetaṃ aṅguttaranikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ –
tika-vin02t:1107_0: “Upatissamāṇavakassa kīḷanatthāya nadiṃ vā uyyānaṃ vā gamanakāle pañca suvaṇṇasivikāsatāni
tika-vin02t:1107_1: parivārāni honti, kolitamāṇavakassa pañca ājaññarathasatāni. Dvepi janā pañcapañcamāṇavakasataparivārā hontī”ti.
tika-vin02t:1108_0: Rājagahe ca anusaṃvaccharaṃ giraggasamajjaṃ nāma hoti. Tesaṃ dvinnampi ekaṭṭhāneyeva
tika-vin02t:1108_1: mañcakaṃ bandhanti. Dvepi ekatova nisīditvā samajjaṃ passitvā hasitabbaṭṭhāne hasanti,
tika-vin02t:1108_2: saṃvegaṭṭhāne saṃvijjanti, dāyaṃ dātuṃ yuttaṭṭhāne dāyaṃ denti. Tesaṃ imināva niyāmena
tika-vin02t:1108_3: ekadivasaṃ samajjaṃ passantānaṃ paripākagatattā ñāṇassa purimadivasesu viya hasitabbaṭṭhāne
tika-vin02t:1108_4: hāso vā saṃvegaṭṭhāne saṃvijjanaṃ vā dāyaṃ dātuṃ yuttaṭṭhāne dāyadānaṃ vā nāhosi.
tika-vin02t:1108_5: Dvepi pana janā evaṃ cintayiṃsu “kiṃ ettha oloketabbaṃ atthi, sabbepime appatte vassasate
tika-vin02t:1108_6: apaṇṇattikabhāvaṃ gamissanti, amhehi pana ekaṃ mokkhadhammaṃ gavesituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin02t:1108_7: ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā nisīdiṃsu. Tato kolito upatissaṃ āha “samma upatissa, na tvaṃ aññadivasesu
tika-vin02t:1108_8: viya haṭṭhapahaṭṭho, anattamanadhātukosi, kiṃ te sallakkhita”nti. “Samma kolita,
tika-vin02t:1108_9: etesaṃ olokane sāro natthi, niratthakametaṃ, attano mokkhadhammaṃ gavesituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin02t:1108_10: idaṃ cintayanto nisinnomhīti. Tvaṃ pana kasmā anattamanoti. Sopi tatheva āha. Athassa
tika-vin02t:1108_11: attanā saddhiṃ ekajjhāsayataṃ ñatvā upatisso evamāha “amhākaṃ ubhinnaṃ sucintitaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1108_12: mokkhadhammaṃ pana gavesantehi ekā pabbajjā laddhuṃ vaṭṭati, kassa santike pabbajāmā”ti.
tika-vin02t:1109_0: Tena kho pana samayena sañcayo paribbājako rājagahe paṭivasati mahatiyā paribbājakaparisāya
tika-vin02t:1109_1: saddhiṃ. Te “tassa santike pabbajissāmā”ti pañcahi māṇavakasatehi saddhiṃ sañcayassa
tika-vin02t:1109_2: santike pabbajiṃsu. Tesaṃ pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya sañcayo atirekalābhaggayasaggappatto
tika-vin02t:1109_3: ahosi. Te katipāheneva sabbaṃ sañcayassa samayaṃ parimadditvā “ācariya, tumhākaṃ
tika-vin02t:1109_4: jānanasamayo ettakova, udāhu uttaripi atthī”ti pucchiṃsu. Sañcayo “ettakova, sabbaṃ
tika-vin02t:1109_5: tumhehi ñāta”nti āha. Tassa kathaṃ sutvā cintayiṃsu “evaṃ sati imassa santike brahmacariyavāso
tika-vin02t:1109_6: niratthako, mayaṃ mokkhadhammaṃ gavesituṃ nikkhantā, so imassa santike uppādetuṃ
tika-vin02t:1109_7: na sakkā, mahā kho pana jambudīpo, gāmanigamarājadhāniyo carantā avassaṃ mokkhadhammadesakaṃ
tika-vin02t:1109_8: ācariyaṃ labhissāmā”ti. Te tato paṭṭhāya “yattha yattha paṇḍitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā atthī”ti
tika-vin02t:1109_9: suṇanti, tattha tattha gantvā pañhasākacchaṃ karonti, tehi puṭṭhaṃ pañhaṃ añño kathetuṃ
tika-vin02t:1109_10: samattho nāma natthi, te pana tesaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjenti. Evaṃ sakalajambudīpaṃ pariggaṇhitvā
tika-vin02t:1109_11: nivattitvā sakaṭṭhānameva āgantvā “samma kolita, yo paṭhamaṃ amataṃ adhigacchati,
tika-vin02t:1109_12: so ārocetū”ti katikaṃ akaṃsu. Imameva vatthuṃ saṅkhipitvā dassento “tatra nesaṃ mahājanaṃ
tika-vin02t:1110_0: Tattha channaparibbājakassāti setapaṭadharassa paribbājakassa. Tena nāyaṃ naggaparibbājakoti
tika-vin02t:1110_1: dasseti. Pāsādikena abhikkantenātiādīsu pāsādikenāti pasādāvahena sāruppena samaṇānucchavikena.
tika-vin02t:1110_2: Abhikkantenāti gamanena. Paṭikkantenāti nivattanena. Ālokitenāti purato dassanena.
tika-vin02t:1110_3: Vilokitenāti ito cito dassanena. Samiñjitenāti pabbasaṅkocanena. Pasāritenāti tesaṃyeva
tika-vin02t:1110_4: pasāraṇena. Sabbattha itthambhūtalakkhaṇe karaṇavacanaṃ, tasmā satisampajaññakehi
tika-vin02t:1110_6: vuttaṃ hoti. Okkhittacakkhūti heṭṭhākhittacakkhu. Iriyāpathasampannoti tāya pāsādikaabhikkantāditāya
tika-vin02t:1110_7: sampannairiyāpatho. Atthikehi upaññātanti “maraṇe sati amatenapi bhavitabba”nti evaṃ
tika-vin02t:1110_8: anumānañāṇena “atthī”ti upagataṃ nibbānaṃ nāma, taṃ magganto pariyesanto yannūnāhaṃ
tika-vin02t:1110_9: imaṃ bhikkhuṃ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandheyyanti sambandho. Sudinnakaṇḍe vuttappakāranti
tika-vin02t:1110_10: “dānapatīnaṃ gharesu sālā honti, āsanāni cettha paññattāni honti, upaṭṭhāpitaṃ udakakañjiyaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1110_11: tattha pabbajitā piṇḍāya caritvā nisīditvā bhuñjanti. Sace icchanti, dānapatīnampi
tika-vin02t:1110_12: santakaṃ gaṇhanti, tasmā tampi aññatarassa kulassa īdisāya sālāya aññataraṃ kuṭṭamūlanti
tika-vin02t:1111_0: Appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā bhāsassūti paribbājako “ahaṃ upatisso nāma, tvaṃ yathāsattiyā appaṃ
tika-vin02t:1111_1: vā bahuṃ vā pāvada, etaṃ nayasatena nayasahassena paṭivijjhituṃ mayhaṃ bhāro”ti cintetvā
tika-vin02t:1111_2: evamāha. Nirodho ca nirodhupāyo ca ekadesasarūpekasesanayena “nirodho”ti vuttoti
tika-vin02t:1111_3: dassento “atha vā”tiādimāha. Paṭipādentoti nigamento. Imaṃ dhammapariyāyaṃ sutvā
tika-vin02t:1111_4: virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādīti ettha paribbājako paṭhamapadadvayameva
tika-vin02t:1111_5: sutvā sahassanayasampanne sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. Itarapadadvayaṃ sotāpannakāle
tika-vin02t:1112_0: Bahukehi kappanahutehīti ettha dasa dasakāni sataṃ, dasa satāni sahassaṃ, sahassānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1112_1: sataṃ satasahassaṃ, satasahassānaṃ sataṃ koṭi, koṭisatasahassānaṃ sataṃ pakoṭi, pakoṭisatasahassānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1112_2: sataṃ koṭipakoṭi, koṭipakoṭisatasahassānaṃ sataṃ ekanahutanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1113_0: 61. Atha kho sāriputto paribbājako yena moggallāno paribbājako tenupasaṅkamīti sotāpanno
tika-vin02t:1113_1: hutvā uparivisese appavattante “bhavissati ettha kāraṇa”nti sallakkhetvā theraṃ āha
tika-vin02t:1113_2: “bhante, mā upari dhammadesanaṃ vaḍḍhayittha, ettakameva hotu, kahaṃ amhākaṃ satthā
tika-vin02t:1113_3: vasatī”ti. Veḷuvane paribbājakāti. “Bhante, tumhe purato yātha, mayhaṃ eko sahāyako
tika-vin02t:1113_4: atthi, amhehi ca aññamaññaṃ katikā katā ‘yo paṭhamaṃ amataṃ adhigacchati, so ārocetū’ti,
tika-vin02t:1113_5: ahaṃ taṃ paṭiññaṃ mocetvā sahāyakaṃ gahetvā tumhākaṃ gatamaggeneva satthu santikaṃ
tika-vin02t:1113_6: āgamissāmī”ti pañcapatiṭṭhitena therassa pādesu nipatitvā tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:1114_0: 62. Sāriputtaṃ paribbājakaṃ etadavocāti “ajja mayhaṃ sahāyassa mukhavaṇṇo na aññadivasesu
tika-vin02t:1114_1: viya, addhā anena amataṃ adhigataṃ bhavissatī”ti amatādhigamaṃ pucchanto etadavoca.
tika-vin02t:1114_2: Sopissa “āmāvuso, amataṃ adhigata”nti paṭijānitvā sabbaṃ pavattiṃ ārocetvā tameva
tika-vin02t:1114_3: gāthaṃ abhāsi. Gāthāpariyosāne moggallāno paribbājako sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi.
tika-vin02t:1114_4: Tena vuttaṃ “atha kho moggallānassa paribbājakassa…pe… dhammacakkhuṃ udapādī”ti.
tika-vin02t:1114_5: Gacchāma mayaṃ, āvuso, bhagavato santiketi “kahaṃ samma satthā vasatī”ti pucchitvā
tika-vin02t:1114_6: “veḷuvane kira samma, evaṃ no ācariyena assajittherena kathita”nti vutte evamāha.
tika-vin02t:1115_0: Sāriputtatthero ca nāmesa sadāpi ācariyapūjakova, tasmā sahāyaṃ moggallānaṃ paribbājakaṃ
tika-vin02t:1115_1: evamāha “amhehi adhigataṃ amataṃ amhākaṃ ācariyassa sañcayaparibbājakassapi kathessāma,
tika-vin02t:1115_2: bujjhamāno paṭivijjhissati, appaṭivijjhanto amhākaṃ saddahitvā satthu santikaṃ gamissati,
tika-vin02t:1115_3: buddhānaṃ desanaṃ sutvā maggaphalappaṭivedhaṃ karissatī”ti. Tato dvepi janā sañcayassa
tika-vin02t:1115_4: santikaṃ agamaṃsu. Tena vuttaṃ “atha kho sāriputtamoggallānā yena sañcayo paribbājako
tika-vin02t:1115_5: tenupasaṅkamiṃsū”ti. Upasaṅkamitvā ca “ācariya, tvaṃ kiṃ karosi, loke buddho uppanno,
tika-vin02t:1115_6: svākkhāto dhammo, suppaṭipanno saṅgho, āyāma dasabalaṃ passissāmā”ti. So “kiṃ vadatha
tika-vin02t:1115_7: tātā”ti tepi vāretvā lābhaggayasaggappavattimeva nesaṃ dīpeti. Te “amhākaṃ evarūpo
tika-vin02t:1115_8: antevāsikavāso niccameva hotu, tumhākaṃ pana gamanaṃ vā agamanaṃ vā jānāthā”ti āhaṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1115_9: Sañcayo “ime ettakaṃ jānantā mama vacanaṃ na karissantī”ti ñatvā “gacchatha tumhe
tika-vin02t:1115_10: tātā, ahaṃ mahallakakāle antevāsikavāsaṃ vasituṃ na sakkomī”ti āha. Te anekehipi
tika-vin02t:1115_11: kāraṇasatehi taṃ bodhetuṃ asakkontā attano ovāde vattamānaṃ janaṃ ādāya veḷuvanaṃ
tika-vin02t:1115_12: agamaṃsu. Pañcasu antevāsikasatesu aḍḍhateyyasatā nivattiṃsu, aḍḍhateyyasatā tehi
tika-vin02t:1115_13: saddhiṃ agamaṃsu. Tena vuttaṃ “atha kho sāriputtamoggallānā tāni aḍḍhateyyāni paribbājakasatāni
tika-vin02t:1116: Vimutteti yathāvuttalakkhaṇe nibbāne tadārammaṇāya phalavimuttiyā adhimutte ne sāriputtamoggallāne byākāsīti sambandho.
tika-vin02t:1117_0: Evaṃ byākaritvā ca satthā catuparisamajjhe dhammaṃ desento nesaṃ parisāya cariyavasena
tika-vin02t:1117_1: dhammadesanaṃ vaḍḍhesi, ṭhapetvā dve aggasāvake sabbepi aḍḍhateyyasatā paribbājakā
tika-vin02t:1117_2: arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Satthā “etha bhikkhavo”ti hatthaṃ pasāresi, sabbesaṃ kesamassu
tika-vin02t:1117_3: antaradhāyi, iddhimayapattacīvaraṃ kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ ahosi. Aggasāvakānampi iddhimayapattacīvaraṃ
tika-vin02t:1117_4: āgataṃ, uparimaggattayakiccaṃ pana na niṭṭhāti. Kasmā? Sāvakapāramīñāṇassa mahantatāya.
tika-vin02t:1117_5: Athāyasmā mahāmoggallāno pabbajitadivasato sattame divase magadharaṭṭhe kallavāḷagāmakaṃ
tika-vin02t:1117_6: upanissāya samaṇadhammaṃ karonto thinamiddhaṃ okkamanto satthārā saṃvejito thinamiddhaṃ
tika-vin02t:1117_7: vinodetvā tathāgatena dinnaṃ dhātukammaṭṭhānaṃ suṇantova uparimaggattayakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā
tika-vin02t:1117_8: sāvakapāramīñāṇassa matthakaṃ patto. Sāriputtattheropi pabbajitadivasato addhamāsaṃ
tika-vin02t:1117_9: atikkamitvā satthārā saddhiṃ tameva rājagahaṃ upanissāya sūkarakhataleṇe viharanto
tika-vin02t:1117_11: suttānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā parassa vaḍḍhitabhattaṃ bhuñjanto viya sāvakapāramīñāṇassa
tika-vin02t:1117_12: matthakaṃ patto. Tenevāha “mahāmoggallānatthero sattahi divasehi arahatte patiṭṭhito,
tika-vin02t:1118_0: Yadipi mahāmoggallānatthero na cirasseva arahattaṃ patto, dhammasenāpati tato cirena,
tika-vin02t:1118_1: evaṃ santepi sāriputtattherova mahāpaññataro. Mahāmoggallānatthero hi sāvakānaṃ sammasanacāraṃ
tika-vin02t:1118_2: yaṭṭhikoṭiyā uppīḷento viya ekadesameva sammasanto satta divase vāyamitvā arahattaṃ
tika-vin02t:1118_3: patto. Sāriputtatthero ṭhapetvā buddhānaṃ paccekabuddhānañca sammasanacāraṃ sāvakānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1118_4: sammasanacāraṃ nippadesaṃ sammasi, evaṃ sammasanto addhamāsaṃ vāyami. Ukkaṃsagatassa
tika-vin02t:1118_5: sāvakānaṃ sammasanacārassa nippadesena pavattiyamānattā sāvakapāramīñāṇassa ca tathā
tika-vin02t:1118_6: paripācetabbattā. Yathā hi puriso “veṇuyaṭṭhiṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti mahājaṭaṃ veṇuṃ disvā
tika-vin02t:1118_7: “jaṭaṃ chindantassa papañco bhavissatī”ti antarena hatthaṃ pavesetvā sampattameva
tika-vin02t:1118_8: yaṭṭhiṃ mūle ca agge ca chinditvā ādāya pakkameyya, so kiñcāpi paṭhamataraṃ gacchati,
tika-vin02t:1118_9: yaṭṭhiṃ pana sāraṃ vā ujuṃ vā na labhati. Aparo tathārūpameva veṇuṃ disvā sace sampattayaṭṭhiṃ
tika-vin02t:1118_10: gaṇhissāmi, sāraṃ vā ujuṃ vā na labhissāmīti kacchaṃ bandhitvā mahantena satthena
tika-vin02t:1118_11: veṇujaṭaṃ chinditvā sārā ceva ujū ca yaṭṭhiyo uccinitvā ādāya pakkameyya, ayaṃ kiñcāpi
tika-vin02t:1118_12: pacchā gacchati, yaṭṭhiyo pana sārā ceva ujū ca labhati, evaṃsampadamidaṃ imesaṃ
tika-vin02t:1119_0: Sammasanacāro ca nāmettha vipassanābhūmi veditabbā sammasanaṃ carati etthāti sammasanacāroti
tika-vin02t:1119_1: katvā. Tattha buddhānaṃ sammasanacāro dasasahassalokadhātuyaṃ sattasantānagatā anindriyabaddhā
tika-vin02t:1119_2: ca saṅkhārāti vadanti. Koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesūti apare. Tathā hi attaniyavasena
tika-vin02t:1119_5: anindriyabaddhā ca saṅkhārā sammasanacāroti vadanti. Jambudīpavāsīsantānagatāti keci.
tika-vin02t:1119_6: Sasantānagate sabbadhamme parasantānagate ca santānavibhāgaṃ akatvā bahiddhābhāvasāmaññato
tika-vin02t:1119_7: sammasanaṃ, ayaṃ sāvakānaṃ sammasanacāro. Moggallānatthero pana bahiddhā dhammepi
tika-vin02t:1119_8: sasantānavibhāgena keci keci uddharitvā sammasi, tañca kho ñāṇena phuṭṭhamattaṃ katvā.
tika-vin02t:1119_9: Tena vuttaṃ “yaṭṭhikoṭiyā uppīḷento viya ekadesameva sammasanto”ti. Tattha ñāṇena
tika-vin02t:1119_10: nāma yāvatā neyyaṃ vattitabbaṃ, tāvatā avattanato “yaṭṭhikoṭiyā uppīḷento viyā”ti
tika-vin02t:1119_11: vuttaṃ, anupadadhammavipassanāya abhāvato “ekadesameva sammasanto”ti vuttaṃ. Dhammasenāpatinopi
tika-vin02t:1119_12: yathāvuttasāvakānaṃ vipassanāya bhūmiyeva sammasanacāro. Tattha pana thero sātisayaṃ
tika-vin02t:1119_13: niravasesaṃ anupadañca sammā vipassi. Tena vuttaṃ “sāvakānaṃ sammasanacāraṃ nippadesaṃ sammasī”ti.
tika-vin02t:1120_0: Ettha ca sukkhavipassakā lokiyābhiññappattā pakatisāvakā mahāsāvakā aggasāvakā paccekabuddhā
tika-vin02t:1120_1: sammāsambuddhāti chasu janesu sukkhavipassakānaṃ jhānābhiññāhi anadhigatapaññānepuññattā
tika-vin02t:1120_2: andhānaṃ viya icchitapadesokkamanaṃ vipassanākāle icchiticchitadhammabhāvanā natthi,
tika-vin02t:1120_3: te yathāpariggahitadhammamatteyeva vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhenti. Lokiyābhiññappattā pana
tika-vin02t:1120_4: pakatisāvakā yena mukhena vipassanaṃ ārabhanti, tato aññenapi vipassanaṃ vitthārikaṃ
tika-vin02t:1120_5: kātuṃ sakkonti vipulañāṇattā. Mahāsāvakā abhinīhārasampannattā tato sātisayaṃ vipassanaṃ
tika-vin02t:1120_6: vitthārikaṃ kātuṃ sakkonti. Aggasāvakesu dutiyo abhinīhārasampattiyā samādhānassa
tika-vin02t:1120_7: sātisayattā vipassanaṃ tatopi vitthārikaṃ karoti. Paṭhamo pana tatopi mahāpaññatāya
tika-vin02t:1120_8: sāvakehi asādhāraṇaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vitthārikaṃ karoti. Paccekabuddhā tehipi mahābhinīhāratāya
tika-vin02t:1120_9: attano abhinīhārānurūpaṃ tatopi vitthārikaṃ vipassanaṃ karonti. Buddhānaṃ sammadeva
tika-vin02t:1120_10: paripūritapaññāpāramīpabhāvitā sabbaññutaññāṇādhigamassa anurūpā yathā nāma katavālavedhaparicayena
tika-vin02t:1120_11: sarabhaṅgasadisena dhanuggahena khitto saro antarā rukkhalatādīsu asajjamāno lakkheyeva
tika-vin02t:1120_12: patati, na sajjati na virajjati, evaṃ antarā asajjamānā avirajjamānā vipassanā sammasanīyadhammesu
tika-vin02t:1121_0: Etesu ca sukkhavipassakānaṃ vipassanācāro khajjotappabhāsadiso, abhiññappattapakatisāvakānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1121_3: hutvā upaṭṭhāti. Tathā sukkhavipassakānaṃ vipassanācāro andhānaṃ yaṭṭhikoṭiyā gamanasadiso,
tika-vin02t:1122: Idāni ubhinnampi therānaṃ pubbayogaṃ dassetuṃ “atīte kirā”tiādimāha. Taṃ sabbaṃ uttānatthameva.
tika-vin02t:1123_0: 63. Giribbajanagaranti samantā pabbataparikkhittaṃ vajasadisaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhatīti giribbajanti
tika-vin02t:1123_1: evaṃladdhanāmaṃ rājagahanagaraṃ. Usūyanakiriyāya kammabhāvaṃ sandhāya “upayogatthe vā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1126_0: 64. Vajjāvajjaṃ upanijjhāyatīti upajjhāyo, natthi upajjhāyo etesanti anupajjhāyakā.
tika-vin02t:1126_1: Tenāha “vajjāvajjaṃ upanijjhāyakena garunā virahitā”ti. Tattha vajjāvajjanti khuddakaṃ
tika-vin02t:1126_2: mahantañca vajjaṃ. Vuddhiattho hi ayamakāro “phalāphala”ntiādīsu viya. Uttiṭṭhapattanti
tika-vin02t:1126_3: ettha ucchiṭṭha-saddasamānattho uttiṭṭha-saddo. Tenevāha “tasmiñhi manussā ucchiṭṭhasaññino,
tika-vin02t:1126_4: tasmā uttiṭṭhapattanti vutta”nti. Piṇḍāya caraṇakapattanti iminā pana pattassa sarūpadassanamukhena
tika-vin02t:1126_5: ucchiṭṭhakappanāya kāraṇaṃ vibhāvitaṃ. Tasminti tasmiṃ piṇḍāya caraṇakapatte.
tika-vin02t:1127_0: 65. Sagāravā sappatissāti ettha garubhāvo gāravaṃ, pāsāṇacchattaṃ viya garukaraṇīyatā.
tika-vin02t:1127_1: Saha gāravenāti sagāravā. Garunā kismiñci vutte gāravavasena patissavanaṃ patisso,
tika-vin02t:1127_2: patissavabhūtaṃ taṃsabhāgañca yaṃkiñci gāravanti attho. Saha patissenāti sappatissā,
tika-vin02t:1127_3: ovādaṃ sampaṭicchantāti attho. Patissīyatīti vā patisso, garukātabbo. Tena saha patissenāti
tika-vin02t:1127_4: sappatissā. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana byañjanavicāraṃ akatvā atthamattameva dassetuṃ “garukabhāvañceva
tika-vin02t:1127_5: jeṭṭhakabhāvañca upaṭṭhapetvā”ti vuttaṃ. Sāhūti sādhu. Lahūti agaru, mama tuyhaṃ
tika-vin02t:1127_6: upajjhāyabhāve bhāriyaṃ nāma natthīti attho. Opāyikanti upāyapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ te upajjhāyaggahaṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:1127_7: iminā upāyena tvaṃ me ito paṭṭhāya bhāro jātosīti vuttaṃ hoti. Patirūpanti anurūpaṃ
tika-vin02t:1127_8: tava upajjhāyaggahaṇanti attho. Pāsādikenāti pasādāvahena kāyavacīpayogena. Sampādehīti
tika-vin02t:1127_9: tividhasikkhaṃ nipphādehīti attho. Kāyena vāti hatthamuddādiṃ dassento kāyena vā
tika-vin02t:1127_10: viññāpeti. Gahito tayā…pe… viññāpetīti “sāhū”tiādīsu ekaṃ vadantoyeva imamatthaṃ
tika-vin02t:1127_11: viññāpetīti vuccati. Tenevāha “idameva hī”tiādi. Sādhūti sampaṭicchanaṃ sandhāyāti
tika-vin02t:1127_14: me, bhante, hohī”ti āyācanamattena, upajjhāyassa ca “sāhū”tiādinā dānavacanamattenāti
tika-vin02t:1127_15: attho. Na ettha sampaṭicchanaṃ aṅganti saddhivihārikassa sampaṭicchanavacanaṃ ettha
tika-vin02t:1128_0: 66. Sammāvattanāti sammāpavatti. Assāti saddhivihārikassa. Tādisameva mukhadhovanodakaṃ
tika-vin02t:1128_1: dātabbanti utumhi sarīrasabhāve ca ekākāre tādisameva dātabbaṃ. Dve cīvarānīti pārupanaṃ
tika-vin02t:1128_2: saṅghāṭiñca sandhāya vadati. Yadi evaṃ “saṅghāṭiyo”ti kasmā vuttanti āha “sabbañhi
tika-vin02t:1128_3: cīvaraṃ saṅghaṭitattā saṅghāṭīti vuccatī”ti. Padavītihārehīti ettha padaṃ vītiharati
tika-vin02t:1128_4: etthāti padavītihāro, padavītiharaṇaṭṭhānaṃ dūtavilambitaṃ akatvā samagamane dvinnaṃ
tika-vin02t:1128_5: padānaṃ antare muṭṭhiratanamattaṃ. Padānaṃ vā vītiharaṇaṃ abhimukhaṃ haritvā nikkhepo
tika-vin02t:1128_6: padavītihāroti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Ito paṭṭhāyāti “na upajjhāyassa bhaṇamānassā”ti
tika-vin02t:1128_7: ettha vutta na-kārato paṭṭhāya. Sabbattha dukkaṭāpatti veditabbāti “īdisesu gilānopi
tika-vin02t:1128_8: na muccatī”ti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Aññampi hi yathāvuttaṃ upajjhāyavattaṃ anādariyena
tika-vin02t:1128_9: akarontassa agilānassa vattabhede sabbattha dukkaṭameva. Teneva vakkhati “agilānena
tika-vin02t:1128_10: hi saddhivihārikena saṭṭhivassenapi sabbaṃ upajjhāyavattaṃ kātabbaṃ, anādarena akarontassa
tika-vin02t:1128_11: vattabhede dukkaṭaṃ. Na-kārapaṭisaṃyuttesu pana padesu gilānassapi paṭikkhittakiriyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1128_12: karontassa dukkaṭamevā”ti. Āpattiyā āsannavācanti āpattijanakameva vacanaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin02t:1128_13: vadati. Yāya hi vācāya āpattiṃ āpajjati, sā vācā tassā āpattiyā āsannāti vuccati.
tika-vin02t:1129_0: Cīvarena pattaṃ veṭhetvāti ettha “uttarāsaṅgassa ekena kaṇṇena veṭhetvā”ti gaṇṭhipadesu
tika-vin02t:1129_1: vuttaṃ. Gāmeti gāmapariyāpanne tādise kismiñci padese. Antaraghareti antogehe. Paṭikkamaneti
tika-vin02t:1129_2: āsanasālāyaṃ. Tikkhattuṃ pānīyena pucchitabboti sambandho, ādimhi majjhe anteti evaṃ
tika-vin02t:1129_3: tikkhattuṃ pucchitabboti attho. Upakaṭṭhoti āsanno. Dhotavālikāyāti nirajāya parisuddhavālikāya.
tika-vin02t:1129_4: Sace pahotīti vuttamevatthaṃ vibhāveti “na kenaci gelaññena abhibhūto hotī”ti. Pariveṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:1133_0: 68. Nasammāvattanādikathāyaṃ gehassitapemanti “pitā me aya”nti evaṃ uppannapemaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1133_1: Upajjhāyamhi pitucittupaṭṭhānameva hi idha gehassitapemaṃ nāma. Na hi idaṃ akusalapakkhiyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1133_2: gehassitapemaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ paṭividdhasaccānaṃ pahīnānugedhānaṃ tadasambhavato,
tika-vin02t:1133_3: na ca bhagavā bhikkhū saṃkilese niyojeti, gehassitapemasadisattā pana pemamukhena
tika-vin02t:1133_4: mettāsineho idha vuttoti veditabbaṃ. “Tesu eko vattasampanno bhikkhu…pe… tesaṃ anāpattī”ti
tika-vin02t:1133_5: vacanato sace eko vattasampanno bhikkhu “bhante, tumhe appossukkā hotha, ahaṃ tumhākaṃ
tika-vin02t:1133_6: saddhivihārikaṃ antevāsikaṃ vā gilānaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmi, ovaditabbaṃ ovadissāmi, iti
tika-vin02t:1133_7: karaṇīyesu ussukkaṃ āpajjissāmī”ti vadati, te eva vā saddhivihārikādayo “bhante,
tika-vin02t:1133_8: tumhe kevalaṃ appossukkā hothā”ti vadanti, vattaṃ vā na sādiyanti, tato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin02t:1136_0: 69. Rādhabrāhmaṇavatthumhi kiso ahosīti khādituṃ vā bhuñjituṃ vā asakkonto tanuko
tika-vin02t:1136_3: adhikiriyaṃ, sakkāranti vuttaṃ hoti. Kataṃ jānantīti kataññuno, kataṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā
tika-vin02t:1136_4: jānantīti katavedino. Kiṃ pana thero bhagavatā bārāṇasiyaṃ tīhi saraṇagamanehi anuññātaṃ
tika-vin02t:1136_5: pabbajjaṃ upasampadañca na jānātīti? No na jānāti. Yadi evaṃ “kathāhaṃ, bhante, taṃ
tika-vin02t:1136_6: brāhmaṇaṃ pabbājemi upasampādemī”ti kasmā āhāti imaṃ anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha “kiñcāpi
tika-vin02t:1136_7: āyasmā sāriputto”tiādi. Parimaṇḍalehīti paripuṇṇehi. Aññathā vā vattabbaṃ aññathā
tika-vin02t:1137_1: karoti. Attabhāvapariharaṇatthaṃ nissīyantīti nissayā, piṇḍiyālopabhojanādikā cattāro
tika-vin02t:1137_2: paccayā. Tattha piṇḍiyālopabhojananti jaṅghapiṇḍiyabalena caritvā ālopamattaṃ laddhabhojanaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1137_4: saṅghabhattādi. Tattha sakalassa saṅghassa dātabbabhattaṃ saṅghabhattaṃ. Katipaye
tika-vin02t:1137_5: bhikkhū uddisitvā dātabbabhattaṃ uddesabhattaṃ. Nimantetvā dātabbabhattaṃ nimantanaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1137_6: Salākaṃ gāhāpetvā dātabbabhattaṃ salākabhattaṃ. Ekasmiṃ pakkhe ekadivasaṃ dātabbabhattaṃ
tika-vin02t:1137_7: pakkhikaṃ. Uposathe dātabbabhattaṃ uposathikaṃ. Pāṭipadadivase dātabbabhattaṃ pāṭipadikaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1139_0: Dīghapāsādo. Garuḷasaṇṭhānapāsādotipi vadanti. Pāsādoti caturassapāsādo. Hammiyanti
tika-vin02t:1139_1: muṇḍacchadanapāsādo. Apare pana bhaṇanti “vihāro nāma dīghamukhapāsādo, aḍḍhayogo
tika-vin02t:1139_2: ekapassacchadanakasenāsanaṃ, tassa kira ekapasse bhitti uccatarā hoti, itarapasse
tika-vin02t:1139_3: nīcā, tena taṃ ekapassacchadanakaṃ hoti, pāsādo āyatacaturassapāsādo, hammiyaṃ muṇḍacchadanaṃ
tika-vin02t:1139_4: candikaṅgaṇayutta”nti. Guhāti pabbataguhā. Pūtimuttanti yaṃ kiñci muttaṃ. Yathā suvaṇṇavaṇṇopi
tika-vin02t:1139_5: kāyo “pūtikāyo”ti vuccati, evaṃ abhinavampi muttaṃ pūtimuttameva. Sesamettha uttānatthameva.
tika-vin02t:1142_0: 75. Upasenavatthumhi āciṇṇanti caritaṃ vattaṃ anudhammatā. Kacci bhikkhu khamanīyanti
tika-vin02t:1142_1: bhikkhu kacci tuyhaṃ idaṃ catucakkaṃ navadvāraṃ sarīrayantaṃ khamanīyaṃ sakkā khamituṃ
tika-vin02t:1142_2: sahituṃ pariharituṃ, na kiñci dukkhaṃ uppādetīti. Kacci yāpanīyanti kacci sabbakiccesu
tika-vin02t:1142_3: yāpetuṃ sakkā, na kiñci antarāyaṃ dassetīti. Jānantāpi tathāgatātievamādi yaṃ parato
tika-vin02t:1142_4: “kati vassosi tvaṃ bhikkhū”tiādinā pucchi, tassa parihāradassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1142_5: saṅkhepattho – tathāgatā nāma jānantāpi sace tādisaṃ pucchākāraṇaṃ hoti, pucchanti.
tika-vin02t:1142_6: Sace pana tādisaṃ pucchākāraṇaṃ natthi, jānantāpi na pucchanti. Yasmā pana buddhānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1142_7: ajānanaṃ nāma natthi, tasmā “ajānantāpī”ti na vuttaṃ. Kālaṃ viditvā pucchantīti sace
tika-vin02t:1142_8: tassā pucchāya so kālo hoti, evaṃ taṃ kālaṃ viditvā pucchanti. Sace na hoti, evampi
tika-vin02t:1142_9: kālaṃ viditvāva na pucchanti. Evaṃ pucchantāpi ca atthasaṃhitaṃ tathāgatā pucchanti,
tika-vin02t:1142_10: yaṃ atthanissitaṃ kāraṇanissitaṃ, tadeva pucchanti, no anatthasaṃhitaṃ. Kasmā? Yasmā
tika-vin02t:1142_11: anatthasaṃhite setughāto tathāgatānaṃ. Setu vuccati maggo, maggeneva tādisassa vacanassa
tika-vin02t:1143_0: Idāni atthasaṃhitanti ettha yaṃ atthanissitaṃ vacanaṃ tathāgatā pucchanti, taṃ dassento
tika-vin02t:1143_1: “dvīhi ākārehī”tiādimāha. Tattha ākārehīti kāraṇehi. Dhammaṃ vā desessāmāti aṭṭhuppattiyuttaṃ
tika-vin02t:1143_2: suttaṃ vā pubbacaritakāraṇayuttaṃ jātakaṃ vā kathayissāma. Sāvakānaṃ vā sikkhāpadaṃ
tika-vin02t:1143_3: paññapessāmāti sāvakānaṃ vā tāya pucchāya vītikkamaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā garukaṃ vā lahukaṃ
tika-vin02t:1143_4: vā sikkhāpadaṃ paññapessāma āṇaṃ ṭhapessāma. Atilahunti atisīghaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1144_0: 76. Aññatitthiyavatthumhi aññatitthiyapubboti pubbe aññatitthiyo bhūtoti aññatitthiyapubbo.
tika-vin02t:1144_1: Ettha ca titthaṃ jānitabbaṃ, titthakaro jānitabbo, titthiyā jānitabbā, titthiyasāvakā
tika-vin02t:1144_2: jānitabbā. Tattha titthaṃ nāma dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo. Ettha hi sattā taranti uppilavanti
tika-vin02t:1144_3: ummujjanimujjaṃ karonti, tasmā “tittha”nti vuccanti. Tāsaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ uppādetā titthakaro
tika-vin02t:1144_4: nāma pūraṇakassapādiko. Tassa laddhiṃ gahetvā pabbajitā titthiyā nāma. Te hi titthe
tika-vin02t:1144_5: jātāti titthiyā, yathāvuttaṃ vā diṭṭhigatasaṅkhātaṃ titthaṃ etesaṃ atthīti titthikā,
tika-vin02t:1144_6: titthikā eva titthiyā. Tesaṃ paccayadāyakā titthiyasāvakāti veditabbā. Sahadhammikaṃ
tika-vin02t:1144_7: vuccamānoti sahadhammikena vuccamāno, karaṇatthe upayogavacanaṃ. Pañcahi sahadhammikehi
tika-vin02t:1144_8: sikkhitabbattā, tesaṃ vā santakattā “sahadhammika”nti laddhanāmena buddhapaññattena
tika-vin02t:1144_9: sikkhāpadena vuccamānoti attho. Pasūroti tassa nāmaṃ. Paribbājakoti gihibandhanaṃ
tika-vin02t:1145_0: Taṃyeva titthāyatananti ettha dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhisaṅkhātaṃ titthameva āyatananti titthāyatanaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1145_1: titthaṃ vā etesaṃ atthīti titthino, titthiyā, tesaṃ āyatanantipi titthāyatanaṃ. Āyatananti
tika-vin02t:1145_2: ca “assānaṃ kambojo āyatanaṃ, gunnaṃ dakkhiṇapatho āyatana”nti ettha sañjātiṭṭhānaṃ āyatanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin02t:1148_0: Ettha samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ. “Pañcimāni, bhikkhave, vimuttāyatanānī”ti ettha kāraṇaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1148_1: taṃ idha sabbampi labbhati. Sabbepi hi diṭṭhigatikā sañjāyamānā imāsuyeva dvāsaṭṭhiyā
tika-vin02t:1148_2: diṭṭhīsu sañjāyanti, samosaramānāpi etāsuyeva samosaranti sannipatanti, diṭṭhigatikabhāve
tika-vin02t:1148_3: ca nesaṃ imāyeva dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo kāraṇaṃ, tasmā yathāvuttaṃ titthameva sañjātiādinā
tika-vin02t:1148_4: atthena āyatananti titthāyatanaṃ, tenevatthena titthīnaṃ āyatanantipi titthāyatanaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1149_0: Āyasmato nissāya vacchāmīti ettha āyasmatoti upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ, āyasmantaṃ
tika-vin02t:1149_1: nissāya vasissāmīti attho. Byatto…pe… vuttalakkhaṇoyevāti parisupaṭṭhāpakabahussutaṃ
tika-vin02t:1149_2: sandhāya vadati. Pañcahupāli aṅgehītiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ parato āvi bhavissati.
tika-vin02t:1152_0: 80. Yaṃ pubbe lakkhaṇaṃ vuttanti sambandho, “teneva lakkhaṇena nissayantevāsikassa
tika-vin02t:1152_1: āpatti veditabbā”ti potthakesu pāṭho dissati, “na teneva lakkhaṇena nissayantevāsikassa
tika-vin02t:1152_2: āpatti veditabbā”ti evaṃ panettha pāṭho veditabbo. Saddhivihārikassa vuttalakkhaṇena
tika-vin02t:1152_3: nissayantevāsikassa āpatti na veditabbāti evaṃ panettha atthopi veditabbo. Aññathā
tika-vin02t:1152_4: “nissayantevāsikena hi yāva ācariyaṃ nissāya vasati, tāva sabbaṃ ācariyavattaṃ kātabba”nti
tika-vin02t:1152_5: idaṃ virujjheyya. Idañhi vacanaṃ nissayantevāsikassa amuttanissayasseva vattaṃ akarontassa
tika-vin02t:1152_6: āpattīti dīpeti. Tasmā saddhivihārikassa yathāvuttavattaṃ akarontassa nissayamuttakassa
tika-vin02t:1152_7: amuttakassapi āpatti, nissayantevāsikassa pana amuttanissayasseva āpattīti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1153_1: ghare mātā pitā bhaginī bhātāti evamādikā. Te gilānā imassa palibodhā honti, tasmā
tika-vin02t:1153_2: so palibodho upaṭṭhahitvā tesaṃ pākatikakaraṇena upacchinditabbo. Tattha upajjhāyo
tika-vin02t:1153_3: tāva gilāno sace lahuṃ na vuṭṭhāti, yāvajīvaṃ paṭijaggitabbo. Tathā pabbajjācariyo
tika-vin02t:1153_5: Nissayācariya uddesācariya nissayantevāsika uddesantevāsikasamānācariyakā pana yāva
tika-vin02t:1154_0: Vibhāgena vuttaṃ. Ayañca vibhāgo “teneva lakkhaṇena nissayantevāsikassa āpatti veditabbā”ti
tika-vin02t:1154_1: evaṃ pāṭhe sati na yujjeyya. Ayañhi pāṭho saddhivihārikassa viya nissayantevāsikassapi
tika-vin02t:1154_2: yathāvuttavattaṃ akarontassa nissayamuttakassa amuttakassapi āpattīti imamatthaṃ
tika-vin02t:1156_0: Etehi yathāvuttavattaṃ kātabbaṃ. Tattha yena sikkhāpadāni dinnāni, ayaṃ pabbajjācariyo.
tika-vin02t:1156_1: Yena upasampadakammavācā vuttā, ayaṃ upasampadācariyo. Yo uddesaṃ paripucchaṃ vā
tika-vin02t:1156_2: deti, ayaṃ dhammācariyoti veditabbaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva.
tika-vin02t:1159_0: 83. Nissayapaṭippassaddhikathāyaṃ disaṃ gatoti puna āgantukāmo anāgantukāmo vā hutvā
tika-vin02t:1159_1: vāsatthāya kañci disaṃ gato. Bhikkhuno sabhāgatanti pesalabhāvaṃ. Oloketvāti upaparikkhitvā.
tika-vin02t:1159_2: Vibbhante…pe… tattha gantabbanti ettha sace kenaci karaṇīyena tadaheva gantuṃ asakkonto
tika-vin02t:1159_3: katipāhena gamissāmīti gamane saussāho hoti, rakkhatīti vadanti. Mā idha paṭikkamīti
tika-vin02t:1159_4: mā idha pavisi. Tatreva vasitabbanti tattheva nissayaṃ gahetvā vasitabbaṃ. Taṃyeva
tika-vin02t:1159_5: vihāraṃ…pe… vasituṃ vaṭṭatīti ettha upajjhāyena pariccattattā upajjhāyasamodhānaparihāro
tika-vin02t:1159_6: natthi, tasmā upajjhāyena samodhānagatassapi ācariyassa santike gahitanissayo na paṭippassambhati.
tika-vin02t:1160_0: Ācariyamhā nissayapaṭippassaddhīsu ācariyo pakkanto vā hotīti ettha “pakkantoti disaṃ
tika-vin02t:1160_1: gato”tiādinā upajjhāyassa pakkamane yo vinicchayo vutto, so tattha vuttanayeneva
tika-vin02t:1160_2: idhāpi sakkā viññātunti taṃ avatvā “koci ācariyo āpucchitvā pakkamatī”tiādinā aññoyeva
tika-vin02t:1160_3: nayo āraddho, ayañca nayo upajjhāyapakkamanepi veditabboyeva. Īdisesu hi ṭhānesu
tika-vin02t:1160_4: ekattha vuttalakkhaṇaṃ aññatthāpi daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sace dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā nivattati,
tika-vin02t:1160_5: paṭippassaddho hotīti ettha ettāvatā disāpakkanto nāma hotīti antevāsike anikkhittadhurepi
tika-vin02t:1160_6: nissayo paṭippassambhati. Ācariyupajjhāyā dve leḍḍupāte atikkamma aññasmiṃ vihāre
tika-vin02t:1160_7: vasantīti bahiupacārasīmāyaṃ antevāsikasaddhivihārikānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānato dve leḍḍupāte
tika-vin02t:1160_8: atikkamma aññasmiṃ senāsane vasanti, antoupacārasīmāyaṃ pana dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvāpi
tika-vin02t:1160_9: vasato nissayo na paṭippassambhati. “Sacepi ācariyo muñcitukāmova hutvā nissayapaṇāmanāya
tika-vin02t:1160_10: paṇāmetī”tiādi sabbaṃ upajjhāyassa āṇattiyampi veditabbaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva.
tika-vin02t:1163: 84. Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatenātiādīsu na sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabboti upajjhāyena hutvā sāmaṇero na gahetabbo. Ayamattho aṅguttaranikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttoyeva.
tika-vin02t:1166_0: Imassa anurūpavasena paṭhamaṃ tāva attasampattiyaṃ niyojetuṃ “na asekkhena sīlakkhandhenā”tiādi
tika-vin02t:1166_1: vuttaṃ, na āpattiaṅgavasena. Tattha asekkhena sīlakkhandhenāti asekkhassa sīlakkhandho
tika-vin02t:1166_2: asekkho sīlakkhandho nāma. Asekkhassa ayanti hi asekkho, sīlakkhandho. Evaṃ sabbattha.
tika-vin02t:1166_3: Evañca katvā vimuttiñāṇadassanasaṅkhātassa paccavekkhaṇañāṇassapi asekkhatā upapannā.
tika-vin02t:1166_4: Asekkhasīlanti ca na maggaphalameva adhippetaṃ, atha kho yaṃkiñci asekkhasantāne
tika-vin02t:1166_6: vimuttikkhandhapariyosānesu ayameva nayo. Tasmā yathā sīlasamādhipaññakkhandhā missakā
tika-vin02t:1166_7: adhippetā, evaṃ vimuttikkhandhopīti tadaṅgavimuttiādayopi veditabbā, na paṭippassaddhivimutti
tika-vin02t:1166_8: eva. Vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ pana lokiyameva. Teneva saṃyuttanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ
tika-vin02t:1167_0: Assaddhotiādīsu tīsu vatthūsu saddhā etassa natthīti assaddho. Sukkapakkhe saddahatīti
tika-vin02t:1167_1: saddho, saddhā vā etassa atthītipi saddho. Natthi etassa hirīti ahiriko, akusalasamāpattiyā
tika-vin02t:1167_2: ajigucchamānassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Hirī etassa atthīti hirimā. Na ottappatīti anottappī,
tika-vin02t:1167_3: akusalasamāpattiyā na bhāyatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tabbiparīto ottappī. Kucchitaṃ sīdatīti
tika-vin02t:1167_4: kusīto, hīnavīriyassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Āraddhaṃ vīriyaṃ etassāti āraddhavīriyo, sammappadhānayuttassetaṃ
tika-vin02t:1167_5: adhivacanaṃ. Muṭṭhā sati etassāti muṭṭhassati, naṭṭhassatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Upaṭṭhitā
tika-vin02t:1167_6: sati etassāti upaṭṭhitassati, niccaṃ ārammaṇābhimukhappavattasatissetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1168_0: Adhisīle sīlavipanno ca ajjhācāre ācāravipanno ca āpajjitvā avuṭṭhito. Sassatucchedasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin02t:1168_1: antaṃ gaṇhāti gāhayatīti vā antaggāhikā, micchādiṭṭhi. Purimāni dve padānīti “na
tika-vin02t:1168_2: paṭibalo hoti antevāsiṃ vā saddhivihāriṃ vā gilānaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ vā upaṭṭhāpetuṃ vā,
tika-vin02t:1168_3: anabhirataṃ vūpakāsetuṃ vā vūpakāsāpetuṃ vā”ti imāni dve padāni.
tika-vin02t:1169_0: Abhivisiṭṭho uttamo samācāroti abhisamācāro, abhisamācārova sikkhitabbato sikkhāti
tika-vin02t:1169_1: ābhisamācārikā sikkhā, abhisamācāraṃ vā ārabbha paññattā sikkhā ābhisamācārikā. Maggabrahmacariyassa
tika-vin02t:1169_4: visuddhimagge vuttaṃ. Tasmā sekkhapaṇṇattiyanti ettha sikkhitabbato sabbāpi ubhatovibhaṅgapariyāpannā
tika-vin02t:1169_5: paṇṇattīti gahetabbā. Teneva gaṇṭhipadepi vuttaṃ “sekkhapaṇṇattiyanti pārājikamādiṃ
tika-vin02t:1172_0: 86. Aññatitthiyavatthumhi ājīvako acelakoti duvidho naggaparibbājakoti āha “naggaparibbājakasseva
tika-vin02t:1172_1: ājīvakassa vā”tiādi. Tattha ājīvako upari ekameva vatthaṃ upakacchake pavesetvā paridahati,
tika-vin02t:1172_2: heṭṭhā naggo. Acelako sabbena sabbaṃ naggoyeva.
tika-vin02t:1173_0: 87. Āmisakiñcikkhasampadānaṃ nāma appamattakasseva deyyadhammassa anuppadānaṃ. Rūpūpajīvikāti
tika-vin02t:1173_1: attano rūpaṃyeva nissāya jīvantiyo. Vesiyā gocaro mittasanthavavasena upasaṅkamitabbaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1173_2: assāti vesiyāgocaro. Esa nayo sabbattha. Yobbanappattā yobbanātītā vāti ubhayenapi
tika-vin02t:1173_3: mahallikā anividdhakumāriyova vadati. Bhikkhuniyo nāma ussannabrahmacariyā, tathā
tika-vin02t:1173_4: bhikkhūpi. Tesaṃ aññamaññavisabhāgavatthubhāvato santhavavasena upasaṅkamane katipāheneva
tika-vin02t:1173_5: brahmacariyantarāyo siyāti āha “tāhi saddhiṃ khippameva vissāso hoti, tato sīlaṃ
tika-vin02t:1176_1: tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. “Tañce nakhapiṭṭhippamāṇampi vaḍḍhanakapakkhe ṭhitaṃ
tika-vin02t:1176_2: hoti, na pabbājetabbo”ti iminā sāmaññato lakkhaṇaṃ dassitaṃ, tasmā yattha katthaci
tika-vin02t:1176_3: sarīrāvayavesu nakhapiṭṭhippamāṇaṃ vaḍḍhanakapakkhe ṭhitañce, na vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1176_4: Evañca sati nakhapiṭṭhippamāṇampi avaḍḍhanakapakkhe ṭhitañce, sabbattha vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin02t:1176_5: āpannaṃ, tañca na sāmaññato adhippetanti padesaviseseyeva niyametvā dassento “sace
tika-vin02t:1176_6: panā”tiādimāha. Sace hi avisesena nakhapiṭṭhippamāṇaṃ avaḍḍhanakapakkhe ṭhitaṃ vaṭṭeyya,
tika-vin02t:1176_7: “nivāsanapārupanehi pakatipaacchanne ṭhāne”ti padesaniyamaṃ na kareyya, tasmā nivāsanapārupanehi
tika-vin02t:1176_9: na vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ, nakhapiṭṭhippamāṇato khuddakataraṃ pana avaḍḍhanakapakkhe vaḍḍhanakapakkhe
tika-vin02t:1176_10: vā ṭhitaṃ hotu, vaṭṭati nakhapiṭṭhippamāṇato khuddakatarassa vaḍḍhanakapakkhe avaḍḍhanakapakkhe
tika-vin02t:1177_0: Gaṇḍepi imināva nayena vinicchayo veditabbo. Tattha pana mukhādīsu kolaṭṭhimattato
tika-vin02t:1177_1: khuddakataropi gaṇḍo na vaṭṭatīti visuṃ na dassito. “Mukhādike appaṭicchannaṭṭhāne
tika-vin02t:1177_2: avaḍḍhanakapakkhe ṭhitopi na vaṭṭatī”ti ettakameva hi tattha vuttaṃ, tathāpi kuṭṭhe
tika-vin02t:1177_3: vuttanayena mukhādīsu kolaṭṭhippamāṇato khuddakataropi gaṇḍo na vaṭṭatīti viññāyati,
tika-vin02t:1177_4: tasmā avaḍḍhanakapakkhe ṭhitopīti ettha pi-saddo avuttasampiṇḍanattho. Tena kolaṭṭhimattato
tika-vin02t:1177_5: khuddakataropi na vaṭṭatīti ayamattho dassitoyevāti ayamamhākaṃ khanti. Pakativaṇṇe
tika-vin02t:1177_6: jāteti rogahetukassa vikāravaṇṇassa abhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Kolaṭṭhimattakoti badaraṭṭhippamāṇo.
tika-vin02t:1177_7: Suchaviṃ kāretvāti sañjātachaviṃ kāretvā. “Sañchaviṃ kāretvā”tipi pāṭho, vijjamānachaviṃ
tika-vin02t:1180_0: 90-96. Rājabhaṭādivatthūsu āhaṃsūti manussā vadiṃsu. Tasmā…pe… evamāhāti yasmā sayaṃ
tika-vin02t:1180_1: dhammassāmī, tasmā bhikkhūhi apabbājitabbaṃ coraṃ aṅgulimālaṃ pabbājetvā āyatiṃ akaraṇatthāya
tika-vin02t:1180_2: bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapento “na, bhikkhave, dhajabandho coro pabbājetabbo,
tika-vin02t:1180_3: yo pabbājeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti āha. Uparamantīti viramanti nivattanti. Bhinditvāti
tika-vin02t:1180_4: andubandhanaṃ bhinditvā. Chinditvāti saṅkhalikabandhanaṃ chinditvā. Muñcitvāti rajjubandhanaṃ
tika-vin02t:1180_5: muñcitvā. Vivaritvāti gāmabandhanādīsu gāmadvārādīni vivaritvā. Apassamānānaṃ vā
tika-vin02t:1180_6: palāyatīti purisaguttiyaṃ purisānaṃ apassamānānaṃ palāyati. Upaḍḍhupaḍḍhanti thokaṃ thokaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1181_0: 97. Abhisekādīsu bandhanāgārādīni sodhenti, taṃ sandhāyāha “sabbasādhāraṇena vā nayenā”ti.
tika-vin02t:1181_1: Sace sayameva paṇṇaṃ āropenti, na vaṭṭatīti tā bhujissitthiyo “mayampi dāsiyo homā”ti
tika-vin02t:1181_2: sayameva dāsipaṇṇaṃ likhāpenti, na vaṭṭati. Takkaṃ sīse āsittakasadisāva hontīti
tika-vin02t:1181_3: yathā adāse karontā takkena sīsaṃ dhovitvā adāsaṃ karonti, evaṃ ārāmikavacanena dinnattā
tika-vin02t:1181_4: adāsāva teti adhippāyo. Takkāsiñcanaṃ pana sīhaḷadīpe cārittanti vadanti. Neva pabbājetabboti
tika-vin02t:1181_5: vuttanti kappiyavacanena dinnepi saṅghassa ārāmikadāsattā evaṃ vuttaṃ. Nissāmikadāso
tika-vin02t:1181_6: nāma yassa sāmikā saputtadārādayo matā honti, na koci tassa pariggāhako, sopi pabbājetuṃ
tika-vin02t:1181_7: na vaṭṭati, taṃ pana attanāpi bhujissaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Ye vā pana tasmiṃ raṭṭhe sāmino,
tika-vin02t:1181_8: tehipi kārāpetuṃ vaṭṭati. “Devadāsiputtaṃ pabbājetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti tīsu gaṇṭhipadesu
tika-vin02t:1181_9: vuttaṃ. Dāsassa pabbajitvā attano sāmike disvā palāyantassa āpatti natthīti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:1184_0: 103. Nissayamuccanakassa vattesu pañcakachakkesu pana ubhayāni kho pana…pe… anubyañjanasoti
tika-vin02t:1184_1: ettha “sabbopi cāyaṃ pabhedo mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ ñātāyaṃ ñāto hotī”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu
tika-vin02t:1184_2: vuttaṃ. Āpattiṃ jānātītiādīsu ca “pāṭhe avattamānepi ‘idaṃ nāma katvā idaṃ āpajjatī’ti
tika-vin02t:1184_3: jānāti ce, vaṭṭatī”ti tattheva vuttaṃ. Tañca kho pubbe pāṭhe paguṇe kateti gahetabbanti
tika-vin02t:1184_4: ca ācariyupajjhāyānampi eseva nayoti ca keci vadanti. Sesamettha uttānameva.
tika-vin02t:1187_0: 105. Rāhulavatthumhi tattheva vihariṃsūti sabbepi te arahattaṃ pattakālato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin02t:1187_1: ariyā nāma majjhattāva hontīti rañño pahitasāsanaṃ dasabalassa anārocetvāva tattha
tika-vin02t:1187_2: vihariṃsu. Ekadivasaṃ jātaṃ kāḷudāyiṃ nāma amaccanti ayaṃ kira padumuttarabuddhakāle
tika-vin02t:1187_3: haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbatto satthu dhammadesanaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ
tika-vin02t:1187_4: kulappasādakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ
tika-vin02t:1187_5: patthesi. So yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto amhākaṃ bodhisattassa
tika-vin02t:1187_7: gaṇhi. Jātadivase bodhisattena saddhiṃyeva jātoti taṃ divasaṃyeva dukūlacumbaṭake
tika-vin02t:1187_8: nipajjāpetvā bodhisattassa upaṭṭhānatthāya nayiṃsu. Bodhisattena hi saddhiṃ bodhirukkho
tika-vin02t:1187_9: rāhulamātā catasso nidhikumbhiyo ārohaniyahatthī kaṇḍako channo kāḷudāyīti ime satta
tika-vin02t:1187_10: ekadivase jātattā sahajātā nāma ahesuṃ. Athassa nāmaggahaṇadivase sakalanagarassa
tika-vin02t:1187_11: udaggacittadivase jātoti udāyītveva nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Thokaṃ kāḷadhātukattā pana kāḷudāyī
tika-vin02t:1187_12: nāma jāto. So bodhisattena saddhiṃ kumārakīḷaṃ kīḷanto vuddhiṃ agamāsi.
tika-vin02t:1194: Saddalā haritā bhūmi, esa kālo mahāmunī”ti. –
tika-vin02t:1195_1: vuttaṃ. Pokkharapattappamāṇaṃ majjhe uṭṭhahitvā anukkamena satapaṭalaṃ sahassapaṭalaṃ
tika-vin02t:1195_2: hutvā vassanakavassantipi vadanti. Tasmiṃ kira vassante temetukāmāva tementi, na
tika-vin02t:1195_3: itare. Ekopi rājā vā…pe… gato natthīti dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pakkantesu ñātīsu ekopi
tika-vin02t:1195_4: rājā vā rājamahāmatto vā “sve amhākaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti nimantetvā gato natthi.
tika-vin02t:1195_5: Pitāpissa suddhodanamahārājā “mayhaṃ putto mama gehaṃ anāgantvā kahaṃ gamissatī”ti
tika-vin02t:1195_6: animantetvāva agamāsi, gantvā pana gehe vīsatiyā bhikkhusahassānaṃ yāguādīni paṭiyādāpetvā āsanāni paññāpesi.
tika-vin02t:1196_0: Kulanagareti ñātikulassa nagare. Uṇhīsato paṭṭhāyāti sīsato paṭṭhāya. Uṇhīsanti hi
tika-vin02t:1196_1: uṇhīsasadisattā bhagavato paripuṇṇanalāṭassa paripuṇṇasīsassa ca etaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1196_2: Bhagavato hi dakkhiṇakaṇṇacūḷikato paṭṭhāya maṃsapaṭalaṃ uṭṭhahitvā sakalanalāṭaṃ
tika-vin02t:1196_3: chādayamānaṃ pūrayamānaṃ gantvā vāmakaṇṇacūḷikāya patiṭṭhitaṃ saṇhatamatāya suvaṇṇavaṇṇatāya
tika-vin02t:1196_4: pabhassaratāya paripuṇṇatāya ca rañño baddhauṇhīsapaṭṭo viya virocati. Bhagavato
tika-vin02t:1196_5: kira imaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ disvā rājūnaṃ uṇhīsapaṭṭaṃ akaṃsu. Aññe pana janā aparipuṇṇasīsā
tika-vin02t:1196_6: honti, keci kappasīsā, keci phalasīsā, keci aṭṭhisīsā, keci tumbasīsā, keci kumbhasīsā,
tika-vin02t:1196_7: keci pabbhārasīsā, bhagavato pana āraggena vaṭṭetvā ṭhapitaṃ viya suparipuṇṇaṃ udakapubbuḷasadisampi
tika-vin02t:1196_8: hoti. Teneva uṇhīsaveṭhitasīsasadisattā uṇhīsaṃ viya sabbattha parimaṇḍalasīsattā
tika-vin02t:1239_0: Imā nava gāthāyopi ettha dassitā, tā pana “aṭṭhahi gāthāhī”ti vacanena na samenti.
tika-vin02t:1239_1: Uṇhīsato paṭṭhāya yāva pādatalāti vuttānukkamopi tattha na dissati. Bhikkhāya caratīti bhikkhācāro.
tika-vin02t:1240_0: Uttiṭṭheti uttiṭṭhitvā paresaṃ gharadvāre ṭhatvā gahetabbapiṇḍe. Nappamajjheyyāti
tika-vin02t:1240_1: piṇḍacārikavattaṃ hāpetvā paṇītabhojanāni pariyesanto uttiṭṭhe pamajjati nāma, sapadānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1240_2: piṇḍāya caranto pana nappamajjati nāma, evaṃ karonto uttiṭṭhe nappamajjeyya. Dhammanti
tika-vin02t:1240_3: anesanaṃ pahāya sapadānaṃ caranto tameva bhikkhācariyadhammaṃ sucaritaṃ care. Sukhaṃ
tika-vin02t:1240_4: setīti desanāmattametaṃ, evaṃ panetaṃ bhikkhāya cariyadhammaṃ caranto dhammacārī
tika-vin02t:1240_5: idhaloke ca paraloke ca catūhipi iriyāpathehi sukhaṃ viharatīti attho.
tika-vin02t:1241_0: Dutiyagāthāya na naṃ duccaritanti vesiyādibhede agocare caranto naṃ bhikkhācariyadhammaṃ
tika-vin02t:1241_1: duccaritaṃ carati nāma, evaṃ acaritvā taṃ dhammaṃ care sucaritaṃ, na naṃ duccaritaṃ
tika-vin02t:1241_2: care. Sesamettha vuttatthameva. Imaṃ pana dutiyagāthaṃ pitu nivesanaṃ gantvā abhāsīti
tika-vin02t:1241_4: piṇḍāya paviṭṭho ‘uttiṭṭhe nappamajjeyyā’ti gāthāya pitaraṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpetvā
tika-vin02t:1241_5: nivesanaṃ gantvā ‘dhammaṃ care sucarita’nti gāthāya mahāpajāpatiṃ sotāpattiphale
tika-vin02t:1241_7: piṇḍāya paviṭṭho ‘uttiṭṭhe nappamajjeyyā’ti gāthāya pitaraṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpetvā
tika-vin02t:1241_8: ‘dhammaṃ care’ti gāthāya mahāpajāpatiṃ sotāpattiphale rājānañca sakadāgāmiphale patiṭṭhāpesī”ti.
tika-vin02t:1242_0: Dhammapālajātakaṃ sutvā anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhāsīti punekadivasaṃ rājanivesane katapātarāso
tika-vin02t:1242_1: ekamantaṃ nisinnena raññā “bhante, tumhākaṃ dukkarakārikakāle ekā devatā maṃ upasaṅkamitvā
tika-vin02t:1242_2: ‘putto te kālakato’ti āha. Ahaṃ tassā vacanaṃ asaddahanto ‘na mayhaṃ putto bodhiṃ
tika-vin02t:1242_3: appatvā kālaṃ karotī’ti paṭikkhipinti vutte idāni kathaṃ saddahissatha, pubbepi aṭṭhikāni
tika-vin02t:1242_4: dassetvā ‘putto te mato’ti vutte na saddahitthā”ti imissā aṭṭhuppattiyā mahādhammapālajātakaṃ
tika-vin02t:1242_5: kathesi. Taṃ sutvā rājā anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhahi.
tika-vin02t:1243_2: yuvarājachattamaṅgalaṃ. Janapadakalyāṇīti janapadamhi kalyāṇī uttamā chasarīradosarahitā
tika-vin02t:1243_3: pañcakalyāṇasamannāgatā. Sā hi yasmā nātidīghā nātirassā nātikisā nātithūlā nātikāḷā
tika-vin02t:1243_4: nāccodātāti atikkantā mānusaṃ vaṇṇaṃ, appattā dibbaṃ vaṇṇaṃ, tasmā chasarīradosarahitā.
tika-vin02t:1243_5: Chavikalyāṇaṃ maṃsakalyāṇaṃ nahārukalyāṇaṃ aṭṭhikalyāṇaṃ vayakalyāṇanti imehi pana
tika-vin02t:1243_6: pañcahi kalyāṇehi samannāgatattā pañcakalyāṇasamannāgatā nāma. Tassā hi āgantukobhāsakiccaṃ
tika-vin02t:1243_7: natthi. Attano sarīrobhāseneva dvādasahatthaṭṭhāne ālokaṃ karoti, piyaṅgusāmā vā
tika-vin02t:1243_8: hoti suvaṇṇasāmā vā, ayamassā chavikalyāṇatā. Cattāro panassā hatthapādā mukhapariyosānañca
tika-vin02t:1243_9: lākhārasaparikammakataṃ viya rattapavāḷarattakambalasadisaṃ hoti, ayamassā maṃsakalyāṇatā.
tika-vin02t:1243_10: Vīsati pana nakhapattāni maṃsato amuttaṭṭhāne lākhārasapūritāni viya muttaṭṭhāne
tika-vin02t:1243_11: khīradhārāsadisāni honti, ayamassā nahārukalyāṇatā. Dvattiṃsa dantā suphusitā sudhotavajirapanti
tika-vin02t:1243_12: viya khāyanti, ayamassā aṭṭhikalyāṇatā. Vīsativassasatikāpi samānā soḷasavassuddesikā
tika-vin02t:1243_13: viya hoti nivalipalitā, ayamassā vayakalyāṇatā. Iti imehi pañcahi kalyāṇehi samannāgatattā
tika-vin02t:1244_0: Tuvaṭanti sīghaṃ. Sopi bhagavantaṃ “pattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vattuṃ avisahamāno vihāraṃyeva
tika-vin02t:1244_1: agamāsīti. So kira tathāgate gāravena “pattaṃ vo bhante gaṇhathā”ti vattuṃ nāsakkhi.
tika-vin02t:1244_2: Evaṃ pana cintesi “sopānasīse pattaṃ gaṇhissatī”ti. Satthā tasmimpi ṭhāne na gaṇhi.
tika-vin02t:1244_3: Itaro “sopānapādamūle gaṇhissatī”ti cintesi. Satthā tatthāpi na gaṇhi. Itaro “rājaṅgaṇe
tika-vin02t:1244_4: gaṇhissatī”ti cintesi. Satthā tatthāpi na gaṇhi. Kumāro nivattitukāmo aruciyā gacchanto
tika-vin02t:1244_5: satthu gāravena “pattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vattumpi asakkonto “idha gaṇhissati, ettha gaṇhissatī”ti
tika-vin02t:1244_6: cintento gacchati. Janapadakalyāṇiyā ca vuttavacanaṃ tassa hadaye tiriyaṃ patitvā
tika-vin02t:1244_7: viya ṭhitaṃ. Nandakumārañhi abhisekamaṅgalaṃ na tathā pīḷesi, yathā janapadakalyāṇiyā
tika-vin02t:1244_8: vuttavacanaṃ, tenassa cittasantāpo balavā ahosi. Atha naṃ “imasmiṃ ṭhāne nivattissati,
tika-vin02t:1244_9: imasmiṃ ṭhāne nivattissatī”ti cintentameva satthā vihāraṃ netvā “pabbajissasi nandā”ti
tika-vin02t:1244_10: āha. So buddhagāravena “na pabbajissāmī”ti avatvā “āma pabbajissāmī”ti āha. Satthā
tika-vin02t:1244_11: “tena hi nandaṃ pabbājethā”ti vatvā pabbājesi. Tena vuttaṃ “anicchamānaṃyeva bhagavā
tika-vin02t:1244_12: pabbājesī”ti. “Satthā kapilapuraṃ gantvā tatiyadivase nandaṃ pabbājesī”ti dhammapadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1245_0: “Mahāsattopi sabbaññutaṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakko lokānuggahaṃ karonto rājagahato
tika-vin02t:1245_1: kapilavatthuṃ gantvā paṭhamadassaneneva pitaraṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpesi, punadivase
tika-vin02t:1245_2: pitu nivesanaṃ gantvā rāhulamātāya ovādaṃ katvā sesajanassapi dhammaṃ kathesi, punadivase
tika-vin02t:1245_3: nandakumārassa abhisekagehappavesanaāvāhamaṅgalesu vattamānesu tassa nivesanaṃ gantvā
tika-vin02t:1245_4: kumāraṃ pattaṃ gāhāpetvā pabbājetuṃ vihārābhimukho pāyāsī”ti –
tika-vin02t:1246_0: Vuttaṃ, idha pana “bhagavā kapilapuraṃ āgantvā dutiyadivase nandaṃ pabbājesī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1246_1: sabbampetaṃ ācariyena taṃtaṃbhāṇakānaṃ tathā tathā anussavavasena pariharitvā āgatabhāvato
tika-vin02t:1246_2: tattha tattha tathā tathā vuttanti natthettha ācariyavacane pubbāparavirodho.
tika-vin02t:1247_0: Brahmarūpavaṇṇanti brahmarūpasamānarūpaṃ. Tyassāti te assa. Vaṭṭānugatanti vaṭṭapariyāpannaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1247_1: Savighātanti dukkhasahitattā savighātaṃ, sadukkhanti attho. Sattavidhaṃ ariyadhananti –
tika-vin02t:1249: Sutadhanañca cāgo ca, paññā ve sattamaṃ dhana”nti. –
tika-vin02t:1250_0: Evaṃ vuttaṃ sattavidhaṃ ariyadhanaṃ. Uñchācariyāyāti bhikkhācariyāya. Puttasineho
tika-vin02t:1250_1: uppajjamāno sakalasarīraṃ khobhetvā aṭṭhimiñjaṃ āhacca tiṭṭhatīti āha “puttapemaṃ
tika-vin02t:1250_2: bhante…pe… aṭṭhimiñjaṃ āhacca tiṭṭhatī”ti. Puttasineho hi balavabhāvato sahajātapītivegassa
tika-vin02t:1250_3: savipphāratāya taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpadhammehi pharaṇavasena sakalasarīraṃ āloḷetvā aṭṭhimiñjaṃ
tika-vin02t:1250_4: āhacca tiṭṭhati. Yatra hi nāmāti yo nāma. Sesamettha uttānameva.
tika-vin02t:1253_0: 106. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sāmaṇerānaṃ dasa sikkhāpadānītiādīsu sikkhitabbāni padāni
tika-vin02t:1253_1: sikkhāpadāni, sikkhākoṭṭhāsāti attho. Sikkhāya vā padāni sikkhāpadāni, adhisīlaadhicittaadhipaññāsikkhāya
tika-vin02t:1253_2: adhigamupāyāti attho. Atthato pana kāmāvacarakusalacittasampayuttā viratiyo, taṃsampayuttadhammā
tika-vin02t:1253_3: panettha taggahaṇeneva gahetabbā. Saraseneva patanasabhāvassa antarā eva atipātanaṃ
tika-vin02t:1253_4: atipāto, saṇikaṃ patituṃ adatvā sīghaṃ pātananti attho. Atikkamma vā satthādīhi abhibhavitvā
tika-vin02t:1253_5: pātanaṃ atipāto, pāṇassa atipāto pāṇātipāto, pāṇavadho pāṇaghātoti vuttaṃ hoti. Pāṇoti
tika-vin02t:1253_6: cettha vohārato satto, paramatthato jīvitindriyaṃ. Tasmiṃ pana pāṇe pāṇasaññino jīvitindriyupacchedakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā
tika-vin02t:1253_7: kāyavacīdvārānaṃ aññatarappavattā vadhakacetanā pāṇātipāto, tato pāṇātipātā.
tika-vin02t:1254_0: Veramaṇīti verahetutāya verasaññitaṃ pāṇātipātādipāpadhammaṃ maṇati, “mayi idha ṭhitāya
tika-vin02t:1254_1: kathamāgacchasī”ti vā tajjentī viya nīharatīti veramaṇī. Viramati etāyāti vā viramaṇīti
tika-vin02t:1254_2: vattabbe niruttinayena “veramaṇī”ti vuttaṃ. Atthato pana veramaṇīti kāmāvacarakusalacittasampayuttā
tika-vin02t:1254_3: viratiyo. Sā “pāṇātipātādiṃ viramantassa yā tasmiṃ samaye pāṇātipātā ārati virati
tika-vin02t:1254_4: paṭivirati veramaṇī akiriyā akaraṇaṃ anajjhāpatti velānatikkamo setughāto”ti evamādinā
tika-vin02t:1254_5: nayena vibhaṅge vuttā. Kāmañcesā veramaṇī nāma lokuttarāpi atthi, idha pana samādānavasappavattā
tika-vin02t:1254_6: virati adhippetāti lokuttarāya viratiyā samādānavasena pavattiasambhavato kāmāvacarakusalacittasampayuttā viratiyo gahetabbā.
tika-vin02t:1255_0: Adinnādānā veramaṇītiādīsu adinnassa ādānaṃ adinnādānaṃ, parassaharaṇaṃ, theyyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1255_1: corikāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha adinnanti parapariggahitaṃ. Yattha paro yathākāmakāritaṃ
tika-vin02t:1255_2: āpajjanto adaṇḍāraho anupavajjo ca hoti, tasmiṃ pana parapariggahite parapariggahitasaañano
tika-vin02t:1256_0: Abrahmacariyaṃ nāma aseṭṭhacariyaṃ dvayaṃdvayasamāpatti. Sā hi “appassādā kāmā bahudukkhā
tika-vin02t:1256_1: bahupāyāsā, ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo”tiādinā hīḷitattā aseṭṭhā appasatthā cariyāti vā
tika-vin02t:1256_2: aseṭṭhānaṃ nihīnānaṃ itthipurisānaṃ cariyāti vā aseṭṭhacariyaṃ, aseṭṭhacariyattā
tika-vin02t:1256_3: abrahmacariyanti ca vuccati, atthato pana asaddhammasevanādhippāyena kāyadvārappavattā
tika-vin02t:1257_0: Musāti abhūtaṃ atacchaṃ vatthu, vādoti tassa bhūtato tacchato viññāpanaṃ. Lakkhaṇato
tika-vin02t:1257_1: pana atathaṃ vatthuṃ tathato paraṃ viññāpetukāmassa tathāviññattisamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā
tika-vin02t:1257_2: musāvādo musā vadīyati vuccati etāyāti katvā.
tika-vin02t:1258_0: Surāmerayamajjappamādaṭṭhānāti ettha surāti pūvasurā piṭṭhasurā odanasurā kiṇṇapakkhittā
tika-vin02t:1258_1: sambhārasaṃyuttāti pañca surā. Merayanti pupphāsavo phalāsavo madhvāsavo guḷāsavo
tika-vin02t:1258_2: sambhārasaṃyuttoti pañca āsavā. Tattha pūve bhājane pakkhipitvā tajjaṃ udakaṃ datvā
tika-vin02t:1258_3: madditvā katā pūvasurā. Evaṃ sesasurāpi. Kiṇṇāti pana tassā surāya bījaṃ vuccati,
tika-vin02t:1258_4: ye surāmodakāti vuccanti, te pakkhipitvā katā kiṇṇapakkhittā. Harītakīsāsapādinānāsambhārehi
tika-vin02t:1258_6: Panasādiphalaraso phalāsavo. Muddikāraso madhvāsavo. Ucchuraso guḷāsavo. Harītakaāmalakakaṭukabhaṇḍādinānāsambhārānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1258_7: raso ciraparivāsito sambhārasaṃyutto. Taṃ sabbampi madakaraṇavasena majjaṃ pivantaṃ
tika-vin02t:1258_8: madayatīti katvā. Pamādaṭṭhānanti pamādakāraṇaṃ. Yāya cetanāya taṃ majjaṃ pivanti,
tika-vin02t:1258_9: tassā etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Surāmerayamajje pamādaṭṭhānaṃ surāmerayamajjappamādaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1259_0: Vikālabhojanāti aruṇuggamanato paṭṭhāya yāva majjhanhikā. Ayaṃ buddhādīnaṃ ariyānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1259_1: āciṇṇasamāciṇṇo bhojanassa kālo nāma, tadañño vikālo. Bhuñjitabbaṭṭhena bhojanaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1259_2: yāgubhattādi sabbaṃ yāvakālikavatthu. Yathā ca “rattūparato”ti ettha rattiyā bhojanaṃ
tika-vin02t:1259_3: rattīti uttarapadalopena vuccati, evamettha bhojanajjhoharaṇaṃ bhojananti. Vikāle
tika-vin02t:1259_4: bhojanaṃ vikālabhojanaṃ, tato vikālabhojanā, vikāle yāvakālikavatthussa ajjhoharaṇāti
tika-vin02t:1259_5: attho. Atha vā na ettha kammasādhano bhuñjitabbatthavācako bhojanasaddo, atha kho
tika-vin02t:1259_6: bhāvasādhano ajjhoharaṇatthavācako gahetabbo, tasmā vikāle bhojanaṃ ajjhoharaṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:1259_7: vikālabhojanaṃ. Kassa pana ajjhoharaṇanti? Yāmakālikādīnaṃ anuññātattā vikālabhojana-saddassa
tika-vin02t:1259_8: vā yāvakālikajjhoharaṇe niruḷhattā yāvakālikassāti viññāyati, atthato pana kāyadvārappavattā
tika-vin02t:1260_0: Naccagītavāditavisūkadassanāti ettha sāsanassa ananulomattā visūkaṃ paṭāṇībhūtaṃ
tika-vin02t:1260_1: dassananti visūkadassanaṃ. Naccādīnañhi dassanaṃ sachandarāgappavattito saṅkhepato
tika-vin02t:1260_2: “sabbapāpassa akaraṇa”ntiādinayappavattaṃ bhagavato sāsanaṃ na anulometi. Naccañca
tika-vin02t:1260_3: gītañca vāditañca visūkadassanañca naccagītavāditavisūkadassanaṃ. Attanā payojiyamānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1260_4: parehi payojāpiyamānañcettha naccaṃ naccabhāvasāmaññato pāḷiyaṃ ekeneva nacca-saddena
tika-vin02t:1260_5: gahitaṃ, tathā gītavādita-saddehi gāyanagāyāpanavādanavādāpanāni, tasmā attanā naccananaccāpanādivasena
tika-vin02t:1260_6: naccā ca gītā ca vāditā ca antamaso mayūranaccādivasenapi pavattānaṃ naccādīnaṃ visūkabhūtā
tika-vin02t:1260_7: dassanā ca veramaṇīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Naccādīni attanā payojetuṃ vā parehi
tika-vin02t:1260_8: payojāpetuṃ vā payuttāni passituṃ vā neva bhikkhūnaṃ na bhikkhunīnaṃ vaṭṭati. Dassanena
tika-vin02t:1260_9: cettha savanampi saṅgahitaṃ virūpekasesanayena. Yathā sakaṃ visayaālocanasabhāvatāya
tika-vin02t:1260_10: vā pañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ savanakiriyāyapi dassanasaṅkhepasambhavato “dassanā” icceva
tika-vin02t:1260_11: vuttaṃ. Teneva vuttaṃ “pañcahi viññāṇehi na kañci dhammaṃ paṭivijānāti aññatra abhinipātamattā”ti.
tika-vin02t:1260_12: Dassanakamyatāya upasaṅkamitvā passato eva cettha vītikkamo hoti, ṭhitanisinnasayanokāse
tika-vin02t:1260_13: pana āgataṃ gacchantassa vā āpāthagataṃ passato siyā saṃkileso, na vītikkamo.
tika-vin02t:1261_1: Kiñcāpi hi mālā-saddo loke baddhamālavācako, sāsane pana ruḷhiyā pupphesupi vutto,
tika-vin02t:1261_2: tasmā yaṃ kiñci pupphaṃ baddhamabaddhaṃ vā, taṃ sabbaṃ “mālā”ti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Gandhanti
tika-vin02t:1261_3: vāsacuṇṇadhūmādikaṃ vilepanato aññaṃ yaṃ kiñci gandhajātaṃ. Vilepananti vilepanatthaṃ
tika-vin02t:1261_4: pisitvā paṭiyattaṃ yaṃ kiñci chavirāgakaraṇaṃ. Piḷandhanaṃ dhāraṇaṃ, ūnaṭṭhānapūraṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:1261_5: maṇḍanaṃ, gandhavasena chavirāgavasena ca sādiyanaṃ vibhūsanaṃ. Teneva dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1261_6: majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāyañca “piḷandhanto dhāreti nāma, ūnaṭṭhānaṃ pūrento maṇḍeti
tika-vin02t:1261_7: nāma, gandhavasena chavirāgavasena ca sādiyanto vibhūseti nāmā”ti vuttaṃ. Paramatthajotikāyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1261_8: pana khuddakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “mālādīsu dhāraṇādīni yathāsaṅkhyaṃ yojetabbānī”ti ettakameva
tika-vin02t:1261_9: vuttaṃ. Ṭhānaṃ vuccati kāraṇaṃ, tasmā yāya dussīlyacetanāya tāni mālādhāraṇādīni
tika-vin02t:1262_0: Uccāsayanamahāsayanāti ettha uccāti ucca-saddena samānatthaṃ ekaṃ saddantaraṃ. Seti
tika-vin02t:1262_1: etthāti sayanaṃ, uccāsayanañca mahāsayanañca uccāsayanamahāsayanaṃ. Uccāsayanaṃ vuccati
tika-vin02t:1262_2: pamāṇātikkantaṃ mañcādi. Mahāsayanaṃ akappiyattharaṇehi atthataṃ āsandādi. Āsanañcettha
tika-vin02t:1262_3: sayaneneva saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yasmā pana ādhāre paṭikkhitte tadādhārā kiriyā
tika-vin02t:1262_4: paṭikkhittāva hoti, tasmā “uccāsayanamahāsayanā” icceva vuttaṃ, atthato pana tadupabhogabhūtanisajjānipajjanehi
tika-vin02t:1262_5: virati dassitāti daṭṭhabbā. Atha vā uccāsayanamahāsayanasayanāti etasmiṃ atthe ekasesanayena
tika-vin02t:1262_6: ayaṃ niddeso kato yathā “nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatana”nti, āsanakiriyāpubbakattā sayanakiriyāya
tika-vin02t:1263_0: Jātarūparajatapaṭiggahaṇāti ettha jātarūpanti suvaṇṇaṃ. Rajatanti kahāpaṇo lohamāsako
tika-vin02t:1263_1: jatumāsako dārumāsakoti ye vohāraṃ gacchanti, tassa ubhayassapi paṭiggahaṇaṃ jātarūparajatapaṭiggahaṇaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1263_2: Tividhañcettha paṭiggahaṇaṃ kāyena vācāya manasāti. Tattha kāyena paṭiggahaṇaṃ uggaṇhanaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1263_3: vācāya paṭiggahaṇaṃ uggahāpanaṃ, manasā paṭiggahaṇaṃ sādiyanaṃ. Tividhampi paṭiggahaṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:1263_4: sāmaññaniddesena ekasesanayena vā gahetvā “paṭiggahaṇā”ti vuttaṃ, tasmā neva uggahetuṃ
tika-vin02t:1263_5: na uggahāpetuṃ na upanikkhittaṃ vā sādituṃ vaṭṭati. Imāni pana dasa sikkhāpadāni
tika-vin02t:1263_7: pañca sikkhāpadāni, sati vā ussāhe dasa, uposathaṅgavasena aṭṭhāti idaṃ gahaṭṭhasīla”nti.
tika-vin02t:1263_8: Ettha hi dasāti sāmaṇerehi rakkhitabbasīlamāha ghaṭikārādīnaṃ viya. Paramatthajotikāyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1263_9: pana khuddakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ādito dve catutthapañcamāni upāsakānaṃ sāmaṇerānañca sādhāraṇāni
tika-vin02t:1263_10: niccasīlavasena, uposathasīlavasena pana upāsakānaṃ sattamaṭṭhamaṃ cekaṃ aṅgaṃ katvā
tika-vin02t:1263_11: sabbapacchimavajjāni sabbānipi sāmaṇerehi sādhāraṇāni, pacchimaṃ pana sāmaṇerānameva
tika-vin02t:1263_12: visesabhūta”nti vuttaṃ, taṃ “sati vā ussāhe dasā”ti iminā na sameti. Nāsanavatthūti
tika-vin02t:1263_13: liṅganāsanāya vatthu, adhiṭṭhānaṃ kāraṇanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin02t:1264_0: 107. Kintīti kena nu kho upāyena. “Attano pariveṇanti idaṃ puggalikaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti
tika-vin02t:1264_1: gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Ayamettha gaṇṭhipadakārānaṃ adhippāyo – “vassaggena pattasenāsana”nti
tika-vin02t:1264_2: iminā tassa vassaggena pattaṃ saṅghikasenāsanaṃ vuttaṃ, “attano pariveṇa”nti imināpi
tika-vin02t:1264_3: tasseva puggalikasenāsanaṃ vuttanti. Ayaṃ panettha amhākaṃ khanti – “yattha vā vasatī”ti
tika-vin02t:1264_4: iminā saṅghikaṃ vā hotu puggalikaṃ vā, tassa nibaddhavasanakasenāsanaṃ vuttaṃ. “Yattha
tika-vin02t:1264_5: vā paṭikkamatī”ti iminā pana yaṃ ācariyassa upajjhāyassa vā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ upaṭṭhānādinimittaṃ
tika-vin02t:1264_6: nibaddhaṃ pavisati, taṃ ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ. Tasmā tadubhayaṃ
tika-vin02t:1264_7: dassetuṃ “ubhayenapi attano pariveṇañca vassaggena pattasenāsanañca vutta”nti āha.
tika-vin02t:1264_8: Tattha attano pariveṇanti iminā ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ dassitaṃ, vassaggena
tika-vin02t:1264_9: pattasenāsananti iminā pana tassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ. Tadubhayampi saṅghikaṃ vā hotu puggalikaṃ
tika-vin02t:1264_10: vā, āvaraṇaṃ kātabbamevāti. Mukhadvārikanti mukhadvārena bhuñjitabbaṃ. Daṇḍakammaṃ
tika-vin02t:1264_11: katvāti daṇḍakammaṃ yojetvā. Daṇḍenti vinenti etenāti daṇḍo, soyeva kātabbattā kammanti
tika-vin02t:1267_0: 108. Daṇḍakammamassa karothāti assa daṇḍakammaṃ yojetha āṇāpetha. Daṇḍakammanti vā
tika-vin02t:1267_1: niggahakammaṃ, tasmā niggahamassa karothāti vuttaṃ hoti. Esa nayo sabbattha īdisesu
tika-vin02t:1267_2: ṭhānesu. Senāsanaggāho ca paṭippassambhatīti iminā ca chinnavasso ca hotīti dīpeti.
tika-vin02t:1267_3: Sace ākiṇṇadosova hoti, āyatiṃ saṃvare na tiṭṭhati, nikkaḍḍhitabboti ettha sace yāvatatiyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1267_4: vuccamāno na oramati, saṅghaṃ apaloketvā nāsetabbo. Puna pabbajjaṃ yācamānopi apaloketvā
tika-vin02t:1267_5: pabbājetabboti vadanti. Pacchimikāya vassāvāsikaṃ lacchatīti pacchimikāya puna vassaṃ
tika-vin02t:1267_6: upagatattā lacchati. Apaloketvā lābho dātabboti chinnavassatāya vuttaṃ. Itarāni pañca
tika-vin02t:1267_7: sikkhāpadānīti vikālabhojanādīni pañca. Accayaṃ desāpetabboti “accayo maṃ, bhante,
tika-vin02t:1270_0: 109. Paṇḍakavatthumhi “yo kāḷapakkhe itthī hoti, juṇhapakkhe puriso, ayaṃ pakkhapaṇḍako”ti
tika-vin02t:1270_1: keci vadanti, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “kāḷapakkhe paṇḍako hoti, juṇhapakkhe panassa pariḷāho
tika-vin02t:1270_2: vūpasammatī”ti apaṇḍakapakkhe pariḷāhavūpasamasseva vuttattā paṇḍakapakkhe ussannapariḷāhatā
tika-vin02t:1270_3: paṇḍakabhāvāpattīti viññāyati, tasmā idamevettha sārato paccetabbaṃ. Itthibhāvo pumbhāvo
tika-vin02t:1270_4: vā natthi etassāti abhāvako. Tasmiṃ yevassa pakkhe pabbajjā vāritāti ettha “apaṇḍakapakkhe
tika-vin02t:1270_5: pabbājetvā paṇḍakapakkhe nāsetabbo”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Keci pana “apaṇḍakapakkhe
tika-vin02t:1270_6: pabbajito sace kilesakkhayaṃ pāpuṇāti, na nāsetabbo”ti vadanti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ
tika-vin02t:1270_7: paṇḍakassa kilesakkhayāsambhavato khīṇakilesassa ca paṇḍakabhāvānupapattito. Ahetukapaṭisandhikathāyañhi
tika-vin02t:1270_8: avisesena paṇḍakassa ahetukapaṭisandhitā vuttā. Āsittausūyapakkhapaṇḍakānañca paṭisandhito
tika-vin02t:1270_9: paṭṭhāyeva paṇḍakasabhāvo, na pavattiyaṃyevāti vadanti. Teneva ahetukapaṭisandhiniddese
tika-vin02t:1270_10: jaccandhabadhirādayo viya paṇḍako jātisaddena visesetvā na niddiṭṭho. Idhāpi catutthapārājikasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1270_12: ahetukapaṭisandhikā, tesaṃ saggo avārito, maggo pana vārito”ti avisesena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1273_0: 110. Theyyasaṃvāsakavatthumhi kolaññāti mātuvaṃse pituvaṃse ca jātā mātāpituppabhutisabbañātayo.
tika-vin02t:1273_1: Theyyāya saṃvāso etassāti theyyasaṃvāsako. So ca na saṃvāsamattasseva thenako idhādhippeto,
tika-vin02t:1273_2: atha kho liṅgassa tadubhayassa ca thenakopīti āha “tayo theyyasaṃvāsakā”tiādi. Na
tika-vin02t:1273_3: yathāvuḍḍhaṃ vandanaṃ sādiyatīti yathāvuḍḍhaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vā sāmaṇerānaṃ vā vandanaṃ
tika-vin02t:1273_4: na sādiyati. Yathāvuḍḍhaṃ vandanaṃ sādiyatīti attanā musāvādaṃ katvā dassitavassānurūpaṃ
tika-vin02t:1273_5: yathāvuḍḍhaṃ vandanaṃ sādiyati. Bhikkhuvassagaṇanādikoti iminā na ekakammādikova
tika-vin02t:1274_0: Rāja…pe… bhayenāti ettha bhaya-saddo paccekaṃ yojetabbo “rājabhayena dubbhikkhabhayenā”tiādinā.
tika-vin02t:1274_1: Saṃvāsaṃ nādhivāseti, yāva so suddhamānasoti rājabhayādīhi gahitaliṅgatāya so suddhamānaso
tika-vin02t:1274_2: yāva saṃvāsaṃ nādhivāsetīti attho. Yo hi rājabhayādiṃ vinā kevalaṃ bhikkhū vañcetvā
tika-vin02t:1274_3: tehi saddhiṃ saṃvasitukāmatāya liṅgaṃ gaṇhāti, so asuddhacittatāya liṅgaggahaṇeneva
tika-vin02t:1274_4: theyyasaṃvāsako nāma hoti. Ayaṃ pana tādisena asuddhacittena bhikkhū vañcetukāmatāya
tika-vin02t:1274_5: abhāvato yāva saṃvāsaṃ nādhivāseti, tāva theyyasaṃvāsako nāma na hoti. Teneva “rājabhayādīhi
tika-vin02t:1274_6: gahitaliṅgānaṃ ‘gihī maṃ samaṇoti jānantū’ti vañcanācitte satipi bhikkhūnaṃ vañcetukāmatāya
tika-vin02t:1274_7: abhāvā doso na jāto”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Keci pana “vūpasantabhayatā idha
tika-vin02t:1274_8: suddhacittatā”ti vadanti, evañca sati so vūpasantabhayo yāva saṃvāsaṃ nādhivāseti,
tika-vin02t:1274_9: tāva theyyasaṃvāsako na hotīti ayamattho viññāyati. Imasmiñca atthe viññāyamāne avūpasantabhayassa
tika-vin02t:1274_10: saṃvāsasādiyanepi theyyasaṃvāsakatā na hotīti āpajjeyya, na ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ avūpasantabhayassa
tika-vin02t:1274_12: ca iminā avūpasantatayenapi saṃvāsaṃ asādiyanteneva vasitabbanti dīpeti. Teneva tīsupi
tika-vin02t:1274_13: gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ “yasmā vihāraṃ āgantvā saṅghikaṃ gaṇhantassa saṃvāsaṃ pariharituṃ
tika-vin02t:1274_14: dukkaraṃ, tasmā sabbapāsaṇḍiyabhattāni bhuñjantoti idaṃ vutta”nti, tasmā rājabhayādīhi
tika-vin02t:1275_0: Sabbapāsaṇḍiyabhattānīti sabbasāmayikānaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ katvā vīthicatukkādīsu ṭhapetvā
tika-vin02t:1275_1: dātabbabhattāni. Kāyaparihāriyānīti kāyena pariharitabbāni. Abbhuggacchantīti abhimukhaṃ
tika-vin02t:1275_3: ādāya vihāraṃ gacchatīti cīvarāni nivāsanapārupanavasena ādāya pattañca aṃsakūṭe
tika-vin02t:1275_4: laggetvā vihāraṃ gacchati. Nāpi sayaṃ jānātīti “yo evaṃ pabbajati, so theyyasaṃvāsako
tika-vin02t:1275_5: nāma hotī”ti vā “evaṃ kātuṃ na labhatī”ti vā “evaṃ pabbajito samaṇo na hotī”ti vā
tika-vin02t:1275_6: na jānāti. Yo evaṃ pabbajati, so theyyasaṃvāsako nāma hotīti idaṃ pana nidassanamattaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1275_7: Anupasampannakāleyevāti iminā upasampannakāle sutvā sacepi nāroceti, theyyasaṃvāsako na hotīti dīpeti.
tika-vin02t:1276_0: Sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya…pe… theyyasaṃvāsako na hotīti idaṃ bhikkhūhi dinnaliṅgassa
tika-vin02t:1276_1: apariccattattā na liṅgathenako hoti, liṅgānurūpassa saṃvāsassa sāditattā nāpi saṃvāsathenako
tika-vin02t:1276_2: hotīti vuttaṃ. Eko bhikkhu kāsāye saussāhova odātaṃ nivāsetvāti etthāpi idameva kāraṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:1276_3: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Parato sāmaṇero saliṅge ṭhitotiādinā sāmaṇerassa vuttavidhānesupi atheyyasaṃvāsakapakkhe
tika-vin02t:1276_4: ayameva nayo. Bhikkhuniyāpi eseva nayoti vuttamevatthaṃ “sāpi hi gihibhāvaṃ patthayamānā”tiādinā
tika-vin02t:1276_5: vibhāveti. Yo koci vuḍḍhapabbajitoti sāmaṇeraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Mahāpeḷādīsūti etena
tika-vin02t:1276_6: gihisantakaṃ dassitaṃ. Sayaṃ sāmaṇerova…pe… theyyasaṃvāsako na hotīti ettha kiñcāpi
tika-vin02t:1276_7: theyyasaṃvāsako na hoti, pārājikaṃ pana āpajjatiyeva. Sesamettha uttānameva.
tika-vin02t:1279_0: Titthiyapakkantakakathāyaṃ tesaṃ liṅge ādinnamatte titthiyapakkantako hotīti “titthiyo
tika-vin02t:1279_1: bhavissāmī”ti gatassa liṅgaggahaṇeneva tesaṃ laddhipi gahitāyeva hotīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1279_2: Kenaci pana “tesaṃ liṅge ādinnamatte laddhiyā gahitāyapi aggahitāyapi titthiyapakkantako
tika-vin02t:1279_3: hotī”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Na hi “titthiyo bhavissāmī”ti gatassa liṅgasampaṭicchanato
tika-vin02t:1279_4: aññaṃ laddhiggahaṇaṃ nāma atthi. Liṅgasampaṭicchaneneva hi so gahitaladdhiko hoti.
tika-vin02t:1279_5: Teneva “vīmaṃsanatthaṃ kusacīrādīni…pe… yāva na sampaṭicchati, tāva taṃ laddhi rakkhati.
tika-vin02t:1279_6: Sampaṭicchitamatte titthiyapakkantako hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Naggova ājīvakānaṃ upassayaṃ
tika-vin02t:1279_7: gacchati, padavāre padavāre dukkaṭanti “ājīvako bhavissa”nti asuddhacittena gamanapaccayā
tika-vin02t:1279_8: dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ. Naggena hutvā gamanapaccayāpi dukkaṭā na muccatiyeva. Kūṭavassaṃ
tika-vin02t:1279_9: gaṇentoti kūṭavassaṃ gaṇetvā saṃvāsaṃ sādiyantoti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:1283_0: 112. Mātughātakādivatthūsu apavāhananti apagamanaṃ, patikaraṇanti attho. Yathā samānajātikassa
tika-vin02t:1283_1: vikopane kammaṃ garutaraṃ, na tathā vijātikassāti āha “manussitthibhūtā”ti. Puttasambandhena
tika-vin02t:1283_2: mātupitusamaññā, dattakittimādivasenapi puttavohāro loke dissati, so ca kho pariyāyatoti
tika-vin02t:1283_3: nippariyāyasiddhataṃ dassetuṃ “janikā mātā”ti vuttaṃ. Yathā manussattabhāve ṭhitasseva
tika-vin02t:1283_4: kusaladhammānaṃ tikkhavisadasūrabhāvāpatti yathā taṃ tiṇṇampi bodhisattānaṃ bodhittayanibbattiyaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1283_5: evaṃ manussattabhāve ṭhitasseva akusaladhammānampi tikkhavisadasūrabhāvāpattīti āha
tika-vin02t:1283_6: “sayampi manussajātikenevā”ti. Cutianantaraṃ phalaṃ anantaraṃ nāma, tasmiṃ anantare
tika-vin02t:1283_7: niyuttaṃ, taṃnibbattanena anantarakaraṇasīlaṃ, anantarapayojanaṃ vā ānantariyaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1283_8: tena ānantariyena mātughātakakammena. Pitughātakepi yena manussabhūto janako pitā
tika-vin02t:1283_9: sayampi manussajātikeneva satā sañcicca jīvitā voropito, ayaṃ ānantariyena pitughātakakammena
tika-vin02t:1283_10: pitughātakotiādinā sabbaṃ veditabbanti āha “pitughātakepi eseva nayo”ti.
tika-vin02t:1284_0: Parivattitaliṅgampi mātaraṃ pitaraṃ vā jīvitā voropentassa ānantariyakammaṃ hotiyeva.
tika-vin02t:1284_1: Satipi hi liṅgaparivatte so eva ekakammanibbatto bhavaṅgappabandho jīvitindriyappabandho
tika-vin02t:1284_2: ca, nāññoti. Yo pana sayaṃ manusso tiracchānabhūtaṃ mātaraṃ vā pitaraṃ vā, sayaṃ
tika-vin02t:1284_3: vā tiracchānabhūto manussabhūtaṃ, tiracchānabhūtoyeva vā tiracchānabhūtaṃ jīvitā
tika-vin02t:1284_4: voropeti, tassa kammaṃ ānantariyaṃ na hoti, bhāriyaṃ pana hoti, ānantariyaṃ āhacceva
tika-vin02t:1284_5: tiṭṭhati. Eḷakacatukkaṃ saṅgāmacatukkaṃ coracatukkañcettha kathetabbaṃ. “Eḷakaṃ māremī”ti
tika-vin02t:1284_6: abhisandhināpi hi eḷakaṭṭhāne ṭhitaṃ manusso manussabhūtaṃ mātaraṃ vā pitaraṃ vā
tika-vin02t:1284_7: mārento ānantariyaṃ phusati maraṇādhippāyeneva ānantariyavatthuno vikopitattā. Eḷakābhisandhinā
tika-vin02t:1284_8: pana mātāpitiaasandhinā vā eḷakaṃ mārento ānantariyaṃ na phusati ānantariyavatthuabhāvato.
tika-vin02t:1284_9: Mātāpitiabhisandhinā mātāpitaro mārento phusateva. Esa nayo itarasmimpi catukkadvaye.
tika-vin02t:1284_10: Yathā ca mātāpitūsu, evaṃ arahantepi etāni catukkāni veditabbāni. Sabbattha hi purimaṃ
tika-vin02t:1284_11: abhisandhicittaṃ appamāṇaṃ, vadhakacittaṃ pana tadārammaṇaṃ jīvitindriyañca ānantariyānānantarabhāve
tika-vin02t:1284_12: pamāṇaṃ. Katānantariyakammo ca “tassa kammassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhissāmī”ti sakalacakkavāḷaṃ
tika-vin02t:1284_13: mahācetiyappamāṇehi kañcanathūpehi pūretvāpi sakalacakkavāḷaṃ pūretvā nisinnassa
tika-vin02t:1284_14: bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvāpi buddhassa bhagavato saṅghāṭikaṇṇaṃ amuñcanto vicaritvāpi
tika-vin02t:1284_15: kāyassa bhedā nirayameva upapajjati, pabbajjañca na labhati.
tika-vin02t:1285_1: Saṅghabhedakakathāvitthāro parato āvi bhavissati. Catunnaṃ kammānanti apalokanādīnaṃ
tika-vin02t:1285_2: catunnaṃ kammānaṃ. Duṭṭhacittenāti vuttamevatthaṃ vibhāveti “vadhakacittenā”ti. Vadhakacetanāya
tika-vin02t:1285_3: hi dūsitacittaṃ idha duṭṭhacittaṃ nāma. Lohitaṃ uppādetīti ettha tathāgatassa abhejjakāyatāya
tika-vin02t:1285_4: parūpakkamena cammacchedaṃ katvā lohitapaggharaṇaṃ nāma natthi, sarīrassa pana antoyeva
tika-vin02t:1285_5: ekasmiṃ ṭhāne lohitaṃ samosarati, āghātena pakuppamānaṃ sañcitaṃ hoti. Devadattena
tika-vin02t:1285_6: paviddhasilato bhijjitvā gatasakkhalikāpi tathāgatassa pādantaṃ pahari, pharasunā
tika-vin02t:1285_7: pahaṭo viya pādo antolohitoyeva ahosi. Jīvako pana tathāgatassa ruciyā satthakena
tika-vin02t:1285_8: cammaṃ chinditvā tamhā ṭhānā duṭṭhalohitaṃ nīharitvā phāsumakāsi, tenassa puññakammameva
tika-vin02t:1286_0: Atha ye parinibbute tathāgate cetiyaṃ bhindanti, bodhiṃ chindanti, dhātumhi upakkamanti,
tika-vin02t:1286_1: tesaṃ kiṃ hotīti? Bhāriyaṃ kammaṃ hoti ānantariyasadisaṃ. Sadhātukaṃ pana thūpaṃ
tika-vin02t:1286_2: vā paṭimaṃ vā bādhamānaṃ bodhisākhaṃ chindituṃ vaṭṭati. Sacepi tattha nilīnā sakuṇā
tika-vin02t:1286_3: cetiye vaccaṃ pātenti, chindituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Paribhogacetiyato hi sarīracetiyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1286_4: garutaraṃ. Cetiyavatthuṃ bhinditvā gacchante bodhimūlepi chinditvā harituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:1286_5: Yā pana bodhisākhā bodhigharaṃ bādhati, taṃ geharakkhaṇatthaṃ chindituṃ na labhati.
tika-vin02t:1286_6: Bodhiatthañhi gehaṃ, na gehatthāya bodhi. Āsanagharepi eseva nayo. Yasmiṃ pana āsanaghare
tika-vin02t:1286_7: dhātu nihitā hoti, tassa rakkhaṇatthāya bodhisākhaṃ chindituṃ vaṭṭati. Bodhijagganatthaṃ
tika-vin02t:1286_8: ojoharaṇasākhaṃ vā pūtiṭṭhānaṃ vā chindituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva, satthu rūpakāyapaṭijaggane viya puññampi hoti.
tika-vin02t:1289_0: 116. Ubhato byañjanamassa atthīti ubhatobyañjanakoti iminā asamānādhikaraṇavisayo
tika-vin02t:1289_1: bāhiratthasamāsoyaṃ, purimapade ca vibhattialopoti dasseti. Byañjananti cettha itthinimittaṃ
tika-vin02t:1289_2: purisanimittañca adhippetaṃ. Atha ubhatobyañjanakassa ekameva indriyaṃ, udāhu dveti?
tika-vin02t:1289_3: Ekameva “yassa itthindriyaṃ uppajjati, tassa purisindriyaṃ uppajjatīti? No. Yassa
tika-vin02t:1289_4: vā pana purisindriyaṃ uppajjati, tassa itthindriyaṃ uppajjatīti? No”ti ekasmiṃ santāne
tika-vin02t:1289_5: indriyadvayassa paṭisiddhattā, tañca kho itthiubhatobyañjanakassa itthindriyaṃ, purisaubhatobyañjanakassa
tika-vin02t:1289_6: purisindriyaṃ. Yadi evaṃ dutiyabyañjanakassa abhāvo āpajjati. Indriyañhi byañjanakāraṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:1289_7: vuttaṃ, tañca tassa natthīti? Vuccate – na tassa indriyaṃ dutiyabyañjanakāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1289_8: Kasmā? Sadā abhāvato. Itthiubhatobyañjanakassa hi yadā itthiyā rāgacittaṃ uppajjati,
tika-vin02t:1289_9: tadā purisabyañjanaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti, itthibyañjanaṃ paṭicchannaṃ guḷhaṃ hoti, tathā
tika-vin02t:1289_10: itarassa itaraṃ. Yadi ca tesaṃ indriyaṃ dutiyabyañjanakāraṇaṃ bhaveyya, sadāpi byañjanadvayaṃ
tika-vin02t:1289_11: tiṭṭheyya, na pana tiṭṭhati, tasmā veditabbametaṃ “na tassa taṃ byañjanakāraṇaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1290_0: Yasmā cassa ekameva indriyaṃ hoti, tasmā itthiubhatobyañjanako sayampi gabbhaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-vin02t:1290_1: parampi gaṇhāpeti. Purisaubhatobyañjanako paraṃ gaṇhāpeti, sayaṃ pana na gaṇhāti.
tika-vin02t:1290_2: Yadi paṭisandhiyaṃ purisaliṅgaṃ, yadi paṭisandhiyaṃ itthiliṅganti ca paṭisandhiyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1290_3: liṅgasabbhāvo kurundiyaṃvutto, so ca ayutto. Pavattiyaṃyeva hi itthiliṅgādīni samuṭṭhahanti,
tika-vin02t:1290_4: na paṭisandhiyaṃ. Paṭisandhiyaṃ pana indriyameva samuṭṭhāti, na liṅgādīni. Na ca
tika-vin02t:1290_5: indriyameva liṅganti sakkā vattuṃ indriyaliṅgānaṃ bhinnasabhāvattā. Vuttañhetaṃ aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ –
tika-vin02t:1291_0: “Itthattaṃ itthibhāvoti ubhayaṃ ekatthaṃ, itthisabhāvoti attho. Ayaṃ kammajo paṭisandhisamuṭṭhito.
tika-vin02t:1291_1: Itthiliṅgādi pana itthindriyaṃ paṭicca pavatte samuṭṭhitaṃ. Yathā bīje sati bījaṃ
tika-vin02t:1291_2: paṭicca bījapaccayā rukkho vaḍḍhitvā sākhāviṭapasampanno hutvā ākāsaṃ pūretvā tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin02t:1291_3: evameva itthibhāvasaṅkhāte itthindriye sati itthiliṅgādīni honti. Bījaṃ viya hi itthindriyaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1291_4: bījaṃ paṭicca vaḍḍhitvā ākāsaṃ pūretvā ṭhitarukkho viya itthindriyaṃ paṭicca itthiliṅgādīni
tika-vin02t:1291_5: pavatte samuṭṭhahanti. Tattha itthindriyaṃ na cakkhuviññeyyaṃ, manoviññeyyameva.
tika-vin02t:1292: Tenevāha “tattha vicāraṇakkamo vitthārato aṭṭhasāliniyā dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathāya veditabbo”ti.
tika-vin02t:1295_0: 117. Sikkhāpadaṃ apaññattaṃ hotīti idheva paññattaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1295_1: Upajjhaṃ aggāhāpetvāti “upajjhāyo me, bhante, hohī”ti evaṃ upajjhaṃ aggāhāpetvā.
tika-vin02t:1295_2: Kammavācāya pana upajjhāyakittanaṃ kataṃyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aññathā “puggalaṃ na parāmasatī”ti
tika-vin02t:1295_3: vuttakammavipattisambhavato kammaṃ kuppeyya, teneva “upajjhāyaṃ akittetvā”ti avatvā
tika-vin02t:1295_4: “upajjhaṃ aggāhāpetvā”icceva vuttaṃ. Yathā ca aparipuṇṇapattacīvarassa upasampādanakāle
tika-vin02t:1295_5: kammavācāya “paripuṇṇassa pattacīvara”nti asantavatthuṃ kittetvā kammavācāya katāyapi
tika-vin02t:1295_6: upasampadā ruhati, evaṃ “ayaṃ buddharakkhito āyasmato dhammarakkhitassa upasampadāpekkho”ti
tika-vin02t:1295_7: asantaṃ puggalaṃ kittetvā kevalaṃ santapadanīhārena kammavācāya katāya upasampadā
tika-vin02t:1295_8: ruhatiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenevāha “kammaṃ pana na kuppatī”ti. “Na, bhikkhave, anupajjhāyako
tika-vin02t:1295_9: upasampādetabbo, yo upasampādeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti ettakameva vatvā “so ca puggalo
tika-vin02t:1295_10: anupasampanno”ti avuttattā kammavipattilakkhaṇassa ca asambhavato “taṃ na gahetabba”nti
tika-vin02t:1295_11: vuttaṃ. “Pañcavaggakaraṇañce, bhikkhave, kammaṃ paṇḍakapañcamo kammaṃ kareyya, akammaṃ
tika-vin02t:1295_12: na ca karaṇīya”ntiādivacanato paṇḍakādīnampi ubhatobyañjanakapariyantānaṃ gaṇapūrakabhāveyeva
tika-vin02t:1295_13: kammaṃ kuppati, na aññathāti āha “ubhatobyañjanakupajjhāyapariyosānesupi eseva nayo”ti.
tika-vin02t:1298_0: 118. Aññe vā bhikkhū dātukāmā hontīti sambandho. Anāmaṭṭhapiṇḍapātanti aggahitaaggaṃ
tika-vin02t:1298_1: piṇḍapātaṃ. Sāmaṇerabhāgasamako āmisabhāgoti ettha kiñcāpi sāmaṇerānaṃ āmisabhāgassa
tika-vin02t:1298_2: samakameva diyyamānattā visuṃ sāmaṇerabhāgo nāma natthi, heṭṭhā gacchantaṃ pana bhattaṃ
tika-vin02t:1298_3: kadāci mandaṃ bhaveyya, tasmā upari aggahetvā sāmaṇerapāḷiyāva gahetvā dātabboti
tika-vin02t:1298_4: adhippāyo. Niyatapabbajjasseva cāyaṃ bhāgo dīyati. Teneva “apakkaṃ patta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
