tika-vin02t:1301_0: 119. Ajapadaketi ajapadasaṇṭhāne padese. Brahmujugattoti brahmā viya ujugatto. Avaseso
tika-vin02t:1301_1: sattoti iminā lakkhaṇena rahitasatto. Etena ṭhapetvā mahāpurisaṃ cakkavattiñca itare
tika-vin02t:1301_2: sattā khujjapakkhikāti dasseti. Yebhuyyena hi sattā khandhe kaṭiyaṃ jāṇūsūti tīsu
tika-vin02t:1301_3: ṭhānesu namanti. Te kaṭiyaṃ namantā pacchato namanti, itaresu dvīsu ṭhānesu namantā
tika-vin02t:1301_4: purato namanti. Dīghasarīrā pana ekena passena vaṅkā honti, eke mukhaṃ unnāmetvā
tika-vin02t:1301_5: nakkhattāni gaṇayantā viya caranti, eke appamaṃsalohitā sūlasadisā honti, eke purato
tika-vin02t:1301_6: pabbhārā honti, pavedhamānā gacchanti. Parivaṭumoti samantato vaṭṭalo.
tika-vin02t:1302_1: tiriyaṃ passanto. “Udakatārakā nāma udakapubbuḷa”nti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Akkhitārakāti
tika-vin02t:1302_2: akkhibhaṇḍakā. Nippakhumakkhīti akkhidalalomehi virahitaakkhiko. Pakhuma-saddo hi
tika-vin02t:1302_3: loke akkhidalalomesu niruḷho. Paṭaṅgamaṇḍūko nāma mahāmukhamaṇḍūko. Eḷamukhoti niccapaggharaṇakalālamukho.
tika-vin02t:1302_4: Sabbañcetanti “kacchugatto vā”tiādiṃ sandhāya vadati. Vātaṇḍikoti aṇḍakesu vuddhirogena
tika-vin02t:1302_5: samannāgato. Vikaṭoti tiriyaṃ gamanapādehi samannāgato, yassa ca caṅkamato jāṇukā
tika-vin02t:1302_6: bahi gacchanti. Paṇhoti pacchato parivattapādehi samannāgato, yassa caṅkamato jāṇukā anto pavisanti.
tika-vin02t:1303_0: Kudaṇḍapādatāya kāraṇaṃ vibhāveti “majjhe saṅkuṭitapādattā”ti. Agge saṅkuṭitapādattāti
tika-vin02t:1303_2: caṅkamanto”ti. Mammananti khalitavacanaṃ. Yo ekameva akkharaṃ catupañcakkhattuṃ vadati,
tika-vin02t:1306_0: 120. Nissayapaṭisaṃyuttavatthūsu bhikkhūhi samāno sīlādiguṇabhāgo assāti bhikkhusabhāgo,
tika-vin02t:1306_1: tassa bhāvo bhikkhusabhāgatā. Dve tīṇi divasāni vasitvā gantukāmena anissitena vasitabbanti
tika-vin02t:1306_2: ettha “yāva bhikkhusabhāgataṃ jānāmī”ti ābhogaṃ vināpi anissitena vasituṃ vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin02t:1306_3: adhippāyo. Bhikkhusabhāgataṃ pana jānanto “sve gamissāmi, kiṃ me nissayenā”ti aruṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:1306_4: uṭṭhapetuṃ na labhati. “Purāruṇā uṭṭhahitvāva gamissāmī”ti ābhogena sayantassa sace
tika-vin02t:1306_5: aruṇo uggacchati, vaṭṭati. “Sattāhaṃ vasissāmī”ti ālayaṃ karontena pana nissayo gahetabboti
tika-vin02t:1306_6: “sattāhamattaṃ vasissāmi, kiṃ bhikkhusabhāgatājānanenā”ti jānane dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā
tika-vin02t:1306_7: vasituṃ na labhati, bhikkhusabhāgataṃ upaparikkhitvā nissayo gahetabboti attho.
tika-vin02t:1308_0: 121. Antarāmagge vissamanto vā…pe… anāpattīti asati nissayadāyake anāpatti. Tassa
tika-vin02t:1308_1: nissāyāti pāḷianurūpato vuttaṃ, taṃ nissāyāti attho. Sace pana āsāḷhīmāse…pe… tattha
tika-vin02t:1308_2: gantabbanti ettha sace so vassūpanāyikāya āsannāya gantukāmo suṇāti “asuko mahāthero
tika-vin02t:1308_3: āgamissatī”ti, tañce āgameti, vaṭṭati. Āgamentasseva ce vassūpanāyikadivaso hoti,
tika-vin02t:1308_4: hotu, gantabbaṃ tattha, yattha nissayadāyakaṃ labhati. Keci pana “sace so gacchanto
tika-vin02t:1308_5: jīvitantarāyaṃ brahmacariyantarāyaṃ vā passati, tattheva vasitabba”nti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:1310_1: ussahāmi therassa nāmaṃ gahetu”nti vuttaṃ, “āyasmato pippalissa upasampadāpekkho”ti
tika-vin02t:1310_2: evaṃ nāmaṃ gahetuṃ na ussahāmīti attho. “Gottenapi anussāvetu”nti vacanato yena vohārena
tika-vin02t:1310_3: voharati, tena vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ. “Konāmo te upajjhāyo”ti puṭṭhenapi gottameva nāmaṃ
tika-vin02t:1310_4: katvā vattabbanti siddhaṃ hoti, tasmā catubbidhesu nāmesu yena kenaci nāmena anussāvanā
tika-vin02t:1310_5: kātabbāti vadanti. Ekassa bahūni nāmāni honti, tattha ekaṃ nāmaṃ ñattiyā, ekaṃ anussāvanāya
tika-vin02t:1310_6: kātuṃ na vaṭṭati, atthato byañjanato ca abhinnāhi anussāvanāhi bhavitabbanti. Kiñcāpi
tika-vin02t:1310_7: “itthannāmo itthannāmassa āyasmato”ti pāḷiyaṃ “āyasmato”ti padaṃ pacchā vuttaṃ, kammavācāpāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1310_8: pana “ayaṃ buddharakkhito āyasmato dhammarakkhitassā”ti paṭhamaṃ likhitanti taṃ uppaṭipāṭiyā
tika-vin02t:1310_9: vuttanti na paccetabbaṃ. Pāḷiyañhi “itthannāmo itthannāmassa āyasmato”ti atthamattaṃ
tika-vin02t:1310_10: dassitaṃ, tasmā pāḷiyaṃ avuttopi “ayaṃ buddharakkhito āyasmato dhammarakkhitassā”ti
tika-vin02t:1310_11: kammavācāpāḷiyaṃ payogo dassito. “Na me diṭṭho ito pubbe iccāyasmā sāriputto”ti ca
tika-vin02t:1310_12: “āyasmā sāriputto atthakusalo”ti ca paṭhamaṃ “āyasmā”ti payogassa dassanatoti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:1310_14: sāveti, sāvanaṃ hāpetīti na vuccati nāmassa ahāpitattāti eke. Sace katthaci “āyasmato
tika-vin02t:1310_16: khettameva otiṇṇantipi eke. Byañjanabhedappasaṅgato anussāvanānaṃ taṃ na vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin02t:1310_17: vadanti. Sace pana sabbaṭṭhānepi eteneva pakārena vadati, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:1312_0: 123. Ekānussāvaneti ettha ekato anussāvanaṃ etesanti ekānussāvanāti asamānādhikaraṇavisayo
tika-vin02t:1312_1: bāhiratthasamāsoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenevāha “dve ekatoanussāvane”ti. Tattha ekatoti ekakkhaṇeti
tika-vin02t:1312_2: attho, vibhattialopena cāyaṃ niddeso. Purimanayeneva ekatoanussāvane kātunti “ekena
tika-vin02t:1312_3: ekassa, aññena itarassā”tiādinā pubbe vuttanayena dvīhi vā tīhi vā ācariyehi ekena
tika-vin02t:1314: 126. Vajjāvajjaṃ upanijjhāyatīti upajjhāti iminā upajjhāyasaddasamānattho upajjhāsaddopīti dasseti.
tika-vin02t:1316_0: 130. Sambhogeti dhammasambhoge āmisasambhoge ca. Anāpatti sambhoge saṃvāseti ettha
tika-vin02t:1316_1: ca ayamadhippāyo – yasmā ayaṃ osāraṇakammassa katattā pakatattaṭṭhāne ṭhito, tasmā
tika-vin02t:1316_2: na ukkhittakena saddhiṃ sambhogādipaccayā pācittiyaṃ, nāpi alajjinā saddhiṃ paribhogapaccayā
tika-vin02t:1316_3: dukkaṭaṃ alajjīlakkhaṇānupapattito. Yo hi ucchurasakasaṭānaṃ sattāhakālikayāvajīvikattā
tika-vin02t:1316_4: vaṭṭati vikāle ucchu khāditunti saññaṃ uppādetvā taṃ khāditvā tappaccayā pācittiyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1316_5: na passati “vaṭṭatī”ti tathāsaññitāya, yo vā pana āpattimāpannabhāvaṃ paṭijānitvā
tika-vin02t:1319_0: Vuttalakkhaṇe apatanato alajjī nāma na hoti. Tasmā yathā pubbe yāva ukkhepanīyakammaṃ
tika-vin02t:1319_1: kataṃ, tāva tena saddhiṃ sambhoge saṃvāse ca anāpatti, evamidhāpīti sabbathā anāpattiṭṭhāneyeva
tika-vin02t:1319_2: anāpatti vuttāti veditabbaṃ. Na hi bhagavā alajjinā saddhiṃ sambhogapaccayā āpattisambhave
tika-vin02t:1319_3: sati “anāpatti sambhoge saṃvāse”ti vadati. Tato yamettha kenaci “anāpatti sambhoge
tika-vin02t:1319_4: saṃvāse”ti iminā pācittiyena anāpatti vuttā, “alajjīparibhogapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ pana
tika-vin02t:1319_5: āpajjatiyevā”ti vatvā bahudhā papañcitaṃ, na taṃ sārato paccetabbaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva.
tika-vin02t:1324: 132. Uposathakkhandhake taranti plavanti ettha bālāti titthaṃ. Itoti imasmiṃ sāsane laddhito. Taṃ kathentīti “imasmiṃ nāma divase muhutte vā idaṃ kattabba”ntiādinā kathenti.
tika-vin02t:1325: 134. “Suṇātu me bhante”tiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ vitthārato āgatamevāti na idha vitthārayissāma, atthikehi pana tatoyeva gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1326_0: 135. Āpajjitvā vā vuṭṭhitoti ettha ārocitāpi āpatti asantī nāma hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1326_1: Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “yassa pana evaṃ anāpannā vā āpatti āpajjitvā ca
tika-vin02t:1326_2: pana vuṭṭhitā vā desitā vā ārocitā vā, tassa sā āpatti asantī nāma hotī”ti. Musāvādo
tika-vin02t:1326_3: nāma vacībhedapaccayā hotīti āha “na musāvādalakkhaṇenā”ti. Bhagavato pana vacanenāti
tika-vin02t:1326_4: sampajānamusāvāde kiṃ hoti? “Dukkaṭaṃ hotī”ti iminā vacanena. Vacīdvāre akiriyasamuṭṭhānā
tika-vin02t:1326_5: āpatti hotīti yasmā yassa bhikkhuno adhammikāya paṭiññāya tuṇhībhūtassa nisinnassa
tika-vin02t:1326_6: manodvāre āpatti nāma natthi, yasmā pana āvi kātabbaṃ na āvi akāsi, tenassa vacīdvāre
tika-vin02t:1327_0: Vācāti vācāya, ya-kāralopenāyaṃ niddeso. Kenaci manujena vācāya anālapantoti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1327_1: Giraṃ no ca pare bhaṇeyyāti “ime sossantī”ti parapuggale sandhāya saddampi na nicchāreyya.
tika-vin02t:1327_2: Āpajjeyya vācasikanti vācato samuṭṭhitaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjeyya.
tika-vin02t:1328_1: adhigamāya antarāyakaro. Tassa bhikkhuno phāsu hotīti avippaṭisāramūlakānaṃ pāmojjādīnaṃ
tika-vin02t:1328_2: vasena tassa bhikkhuno sukhā paṭipadā sampajjatīti attho.
tika-vin02t:1331_0: 138. Itaropīti suddhapaṃsupabbatādiṃ sandhāya vadati. Hatthippamāṇo nāma pabbato
tika-vin02t:1331_1: heṭṭhimakoṭiyā aḍḍhaṭṭhamaratanubbedho. Tasmāti yasmā ekena na vaṭṭati, tasmā. Dvattiṃsapalaguḷapiṇḍappamāṇatā
tika-vin02t:1331_2: thūlatāya gahetabbā, na tulagaṇanāya. Antosāramissakānanti antosārarukkhehi missakānaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1331_3: Sūcidaṇḍakappamāṇoti sīhaḷadīpe lekhanadaṇḍappamāṇoti vadanti, so ca kaniṭṭhaṅguliparimāṇoti
tika-vin02t:1331_4: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Etanti navamūlasākhāniggamanaṃ. Parabhāge kittetuṃ vaṭṭatīti bahi nikkhamitvā
tika-vin02t:1331_5: ṭhitesu aṭṭhasu maggesu ekissā disāya ekaṃ, aparāya ekanti evaṃ catūsu ṭhānesu kittetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:1332_0: Yattha katthaci uttarantiyā bhikkhuniyā antaravāsako temiyatīti sikkhākaraṇīyaṃ āgatalakkhaṇena
tika-vin02t:1332_1: timaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādetvā antaravāsakaṃ anukkhipitvā titthena vā atitthena vā uttarantiyā
tika-vin02t:1332_2: bhikkhuniyā ekadvaṅgulamattampi antaravāsako temiyati. Bhikkhuniyā eva gahaṇañcettha
tika-vin02t:1332_3: bhikkhunīvibhaṅge bhikkhuniyā vasena nadīlakkhaṇassa pāḷiyaṃ āgatattā teneva nayena
tika-vin02t:1332_4: dassanatthaṃ kataṃ. Sīmaṃ bandhantānaṃ nimittaṃ hotīti ayaṃ vuttalakkhaṇā nadī samuddaṃ
tika-vin02t:1332_5: vā pavisatu taḷākaṃ vā, pabhavato paṭṭhāya nimittaṃ hoti. Ajjhottharitvā āvaraṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:1332_6: pavattatiyevāti āvaraṇaṃ ajjhottharitvā sandatiyeva. Appavattamānāti asandamānudakā.
tika-vin02t:1332_7: Āvaraṇañhi patvā nadiyā yattake padese udakaṃ asandamānaṃ santiṭṭhati, tattha nadīnimittaṃ
tika-vin02t:1332_8: kātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Upari sandamānaṭṭhāneyeva vaṭṭati, asandamānaṭṭhāne pana udakanimittaṃ
tika-vin02t:1332_9: kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Ṭhitameva hi udakanimitte vaṭṭati, na sandamānaṃ. Tenevāha “pavattanaṭṭhāne
tika-vin02t:1332_10: nadīnimittaṃ, appavattanaṭṭhāne udakanimittaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Nadiṃ bhinditvāti
tika-vin02t:1332_11: mātikāmukhadvārena nadīkūlaṃ bhinditvā. Ukkhepimanti kūpato viya ukkhipitvā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1333_0: Siṅghāṭakasaṇṭhānāti tikoṇaracchāsaṇṭhānā. Mudiṅgasaṇṭhānāti mudiṅgabherī viya majjhe
tika-vin02t:1333_1: vitthatā ubhosu koṭīsu saṅkoṭitā hoti. Upacāraṃ ṭhapetvāti pacchā sīmaṃ bandhantānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1333_2: sīmāya okāsaṃ ṭhapetvā. Antonimittagatehi panāti ekassa gāmassa upaḍḍhaṃ anto kattukāmatāya
tika-vin02t:1333_3: sati sabbesaṃ āgamane payojanaṃ natthīti katvā vuttaṃ. Āgantabbanti ca sāmīcivasena
tika-vin02t:1333_4: vuttaṃ, nāyaṃ niyamo “āgantabbamevā”ti. Tenevāha “āgamanampi anāgamanampi vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-vin02t:1333_5: Abaddhāya hi sīmāya nānāgāmakhettānaṃ nānāsīmasabhāvattā tesaṃ anāgamanepi vaggakammaṃ
tika-vin02t:1333_6: na hoti, tasmā anāgamanampi vaṭṭati. Baddhāya pana sīmāya ekasīmabhāvato puna aññasmiṃ
tika-vin02t:1333_7: kamme kariyamāne anto sīmagatehi āgantabbamevāti āha “avippavāsasīmā…pe… āgantabba”nti.
tika-vin02t:1333_8: Nimittakittanakāle asodhitāyapi sīmāya nevatthi doso nimittakittanassa apalokanādīsu aññatarābhāvato.
tika-vin02t:1334_0: Bhaṇḍukammāpucchanaṃ sandhāya pabbajjā-gahaṇaṃ. Sukhakaraṇatthanti sabbesaṃ sannipātanaparissamaṃ
tika-vin02t:1334_1: pahāya appatarehi sukhakaraṇatthaṃ. Ekavīsati bhikkhū gaṇhātīti vīsativaggakaraṇīyaparamattā
tika-vin02t:1334_2: saṅghakammassa kammārahena saddhiṃ ekavīsati bhikkhū gaṇhāti. Idañca nisinnānaṃ vasena
tika-vin02t:1334_3: vuttaṃ. Heṭṭhimantato hi yattha ekavīsati bhikkhū nisīdituṃ sakkonti, tattake padese
tika-vin02t:1334_4: sīmaṃ bandhituṃ vaṭṭati. Na sakkhissantīti avippavāsasīmāya baddhabhāvaṃ asallakkhetvā
tika-vin02t:1334_5: “samānasaṃvāsakameva samūhanissāmā”ti vāyamantā na sakkhissanti. Baddhāya hi avippavāsasīmāya
tika-vin02t:1334_6: taṃ asamūhanitvā “samānasaṃvāsakasīmaṃ samūhanissāmā”ti katāyapi kammavācāya asamūhatāva
tika-vin02t:1334_7: hoti sīmā. Paṭhamañhi avippavāsaṃ samūhanitvā pacchā sīmā samūhanitabbā. Ekaratanappamāṇā
tika-vin02t:1334_8: suviññeyyatarā hotīti katvā vuttaṃ “ekaratanappamāṇā vaṭṭatī”ti. Ekaṅgulamattāpi
tika-vin02t:1334_9: sīmantarikā vaṭṭatiyeva. Tattakenapi hi sīmā asambhinnāva hoti.
tika-vin02t:1335_0: Avasesanimittānīti mahāsīmāya bāhirapasse nimittāni. Khaṇḍasīmato paṭṭhāya bandhanaṃ
tika-vin02t:1335_1: āciṇṇaṃ, āciṇṇakaraṇeneva ca sammoho na hotīti āha “khaṇḍasīmatova paṭṭhāya bandhitabbā”ti.
tika-vin02t:1335_2: Kuṭigeheti kuṭighare, bhūmighareti attho. Udukkhalanti khuddakāvāṭaṃ. Nimittaṃ na
tika-vin02t:1335_3: kātabbanti taṃ rājiṃ vā udukkhalaṃ vā nimittaṃ na kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1336_0: Heṭṭhā na otaratīti bhittito oraṃ nimittāni ṭhapetvā kittitattā heṭṭhā ākāsappadesaṃ
tika-vin02t:1336_1: na otarati. Heṭṭhāpi otaratīti sace heṭṭhā antobhittiyaṃ ekavīsatiyā bhikkhūnaṃ okāso
tika-vin02t:1336_2: hoti, otarati. Otaramānā ca uparisīmappamāṇena na otarati, samantā bhittippamāṇena
tika-vin02t:1336_3: otarati. Otaraṇānotaraṇaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbanti sace heṭṭhā ekavīsatiyā bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin02t:1336_4: okāso hoti, otarati. No ce, na otaratīti adhippāyo. Sabbo pāsādo sīmaṭṭho hotīti
tika-vin02t:1336_5: uparimatalena saddhiṃ ekābaddhabhittiko vā hotu mā vā, sabbopi pāsādo sīmaṭṭhova hoti.
tika-vin02t:1337_0: Tālamūlakapabbateti tālamūlasadise pabbate. So ca heṭṭhā mahanto hutvā anupubbena
tika-vin02t:1337_1: tanuko hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Paṇavasaṇṭhāno majjhe tanuko hoti mūle agge ca vitthato.
tika-vin02t:1337_2: Heṭṭhā vā majjhe vāti mudiṅgasaṇṭhānassa heṭṭhā paṇavasaṇṭhānassa majjhe. Ākāsapabbhāranti
tika-vin02t:1337_3: bhittiyā aparikkhittapabbhāraṃ. Antoleṇaṃ hotīti pabbatassa anto leṇaṃ hoti. Sīmāmāḷaketi
tika-vin02t:1337_4: khaṇḍasīmāmāḷake. Mahāsīmaṃ sodhetvā vā kammaṃ kātabbanti mahāsīmagatā bhikkhū hatthapāsaṃ
tika-vin02t:1337_5: vā ānetabbā, sīmato vā bahi kātabbāti adhippāyo. Gaṇṭhipadesu pana “mahāsīmagatehi
tika-vin02t:1337_6: bhikkhūhi taṃ sākhaṃ vā pārohaṃ vā anāmasitvā ṭhātabbanti adhippāyo”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ
tika-vin02t:1337_7: na gahetabbaṃ. Purimanayepīti khaṇḍasīmāya uṭṭhahitvā mahāsīmāya oṇatarukkhepi. Ukkhipāpetvā
tika-vin02t:1337_8: kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti khaṇḍasīmāya anto ṭhitattā rukkhassa tattha ṭhito hatthapāsaṃyeva
tika-vin02t:1338_0: 140. Pārayatīti ajjhottharati. Pārāti sīmāpekkho itthiliṅganiddeso. Assāti bhaveyya.
tika-vin02t:1338_1: Idhādhippetanāvāya pamāṇaṃ dassento āha “yā sabbantimena paricchedena…pe… tayo jane
tika-vin02t:1338_2: vahatī”ti. Iminā ca vuttappamāṇato khuddakā nāvā vijjamānāpi idha asantapakkhaṃ bhajatīti
tika-vin02t:1338_3: dīpeti. Avassaṃ labbhaneyyā dhuvanāvāva hotīti sambandho. Rukkhaṃ chinditvā katoti
tika-vin02t:1338_4: pāṭhaseso. Paratīre sammukhaṭṭhāneti orimatīre sabbapariyantanimittassa sammukhaṭṭhāne.
tika-vin02t:1338_5: Sabbanimittānaṃ anto ṭhite bhikkhū hatthapāsagate katvāti ettha sace ekaṃ gāmakhettaṃ
tika-vin02t:1338_6: hoti, ubhosu tīresu sabbanimittānaṃ anto ṭhite bhikkhū hatthapāsagate katvā sammannitabbā.
tika-vin02t:1338_7: Nānāgāmakkhettaṃ ce, samānasaṃvāsakasīmābandhanakāle anāgantumpi vaṭṭati. Avippavāsasīmāsammutiyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1338_8: pana āgantabbameva. Yasmā ubhosu tīresu nimittakittanamattena dīpako saṅgahito nāma
tika-vin02t:1338_9: na hoti, tasmā dīpakepi nimittāni visuṃ kittetabbānevāti āha “dīpakassa orimante
tika-vin02t:1338_10: ca pārimante ca nimittaṃ kittetabba”nti. Dīpakasikharanti dīpakamatthakaṃ. Pabbatasaṇṭhānāti
tika-vin02t:1341_0: 142. Vatthuvasena vuttanti “mayañcamhā asammatāya bhūmiyā nisinnā pātimokkhaṃ assumhā”ti
tika-vin02t:1341_1: vatthumhi pātimokkhasavanassa āgatattā vuttaṃ. Uposathappamukhaṃ nāma uposathāgārassa
tika-vin02t:1341_2: sammukhaṭṭhānaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ “paṭhamaṃ nimittā kittetabbā”ti ettakameva vatvā sīmāsammutiyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1341_4: vā…pe… yāni kānici nimittānī”ti vuttaṃ. Kittetuṃ vaṭṭatīti iminā sambandho.
tika-vin02t:1343_0: 144. Assāti bhikkhunisaṅghassa. Dvepi sīmāyoti paṭhamaṃ vuttā avippavāsasīmā samānasaṃvāsakasīmā
tika-vin02t:1343_1: ca. Na kammavācaṃ vaggaṃ karontīti kammavācaṃ na bhindanti, kammaṃ na kopentīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:1343_2: Etthāti “ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañcā”ti ettha. Gāmañca gāmūpacārañca na ottharatīti
tika-vin02t:1343_3: “ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañcā”ti vuttattā. Sīmāsaṅkhyameva gacchatīti avippavāsasīmāsaṅkhaṃ
tika-vin02t:1343_4: gacchati. Ekampi kulaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ vāti abhinavakatagehesu sabbapaṭhamaṃ ekampi kulaṃ
tika-vin02t:1343_5: paviṭṭhaṃ atthi. Agataṃ vāti porāṇakagāme aññesu gehāni chaḍḍetvā gatesu ekampi kulaṃ agataṃ atthi.
tika-vin02t:1344_0: Avippavāsasīmā na samūhantabbāti mahāsīmaṃ sandhāya vadati. Nirāsaṅkaṭṭhānesu ṭhatvāti
tika-vin02t:1344_1: cetiyaṅgaṇādīnaṃ khaṇḍasīmāya anokāsattā vuttaṃ. Khaṇḍasīmañhi bandhantā tādisaṃ
tika-vin02t:1344_2: ṭhānaṃ pahāya aññasmiṃ vivitte okāse bandhanti. Appeva nāma samūhanituṃ sakkhissantīti
tika-vin02t:1344_3: avippavāsasīmaṃyeva samūhanituṃ sakkhissanti, na khaṇḍasīmaṃ. Paṭibandhituṃ pana
tika-vin02t:1344_4: na sakkhissantevāti khaṇḍasīmāya aññātattā na sakkhissanti. Na samūhanitabbāti khaṇḍasīmaṃ
tika-vin02t:1344_5: ajānantehi na samūhanitabbā. Uposathassa visuṃ gahitattā avasesakammavasena samānasaṃvāsatā veditabbā.
tika-vin02t:1346_0: 147. Aparicchinnāyāti baddhasīmāvasena akataparicchedāya. Yena kenaci khaṇitvā akatoti
tika-vin02t:1346_1: antamaso tiracchānenapi khaṇitvā akato. Tassa antohatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā ṭhito kammaṃ
tika-vin02t:1346_2: kopetīti iminā bahiparicchedato yattha katthaci ṭhito kammaṃ na kopetīti dīpeti.
tika-vin02t:1346_3: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “paricchedabbhantare hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā ṭhitopi
tika-vin02t:1346_4: paricchedato bahi aññaṃ tattakaṃyeva paricchedaṃ anatikkamitvā ṭhitopi kammaṃ kopeti,
tika-vin02t:1346_5: idaṃ sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu sanniṭṭhāna”nti, tattha “aññaṃ tattakaṃyeva paricchedaṃ anatikkamitvā
tika-vin02t:1346_6: ṭhitopi kammaṃ kopetī”ti idaṃ neva pāḷiyaṃ, na aṭṭhakathāyaṃ upalabbhati. Yadi cetaṃ
tika-vin02t:1346_7: dvinnaṃ saṅghānaṃ visuṃ uposathādikammakaraṇādhikāre vuttattā udakukkhepato bahi
tika-vin02t:1346_8: aññaṃ udakukkhepaṃ anatikkamitvā uposathādikaraṇatthaṃ ṭhito saṅgho sīmāsambhedasambhavato
tika-vin02t:1346_9: kammaṃ kopetīti iminā adhippāyena vuttaṃ siyā, evaṃ sati yujjeyya. Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāya
tika-vin02t:1346_10: līnatthappakāsaniyaṃ vuttaṃ “aññaṃ tattakaṃyeva paricchedanti dutiyaṃ udakukkhepaṃ
tika-vin02t:1346_11: anatikkantopi kopeti. Kasmā? Attano udakukkhepasīmāya paresaṃ udakukkhepasīmāya ajjhotthaṭattā
tika-vin02t:1346_12: sīmāsambhedo hoti, tasmā kopetī”ti. “Idaṃ sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu sanniṭṭhāna”nti ca iminā
tika-vin02t:1346_13: adhippāyena vuttanti gahetabbaṃ sabbāsupi aṭṭhakathāsu sīmāsambhedassa anicchitattā.
tika-vin02t:1346_14: Teneva hi “attano ca aññesañca udakukkhepaparicchedassa antarā añño udakukkhepo sīmantarikatthāya
tika-vin02t:1346_15: ṭhapetabbo”ti vuttaṃ. Aññe panettha aññathāpi papañcenti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1347_0: Sabbattha saṅgho nisīdatīti hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā nisīdati. Udakukkhepasīmākammaṃ
tika-vin02t:1347_1: natthīti yasmā sabbopi nadīpadeso bhikkhūhi ajjhotthaṭo, tasmā samantato nadiyā abhāvā
tika-vin02t:1347_2: udakukkhepe payojanaṃ natthi. Udakukkhepappamāṇā sīmantarikā suviññeyyatarā hoti,
tika-vin02t:1347_3: sīmāsambhedasaṅkā na ca siyāti sāmīcidassanatthaṃ “añño udakukkhepo sīmantarikatthāya
tika-vin02t:1347_4: ṭhapetabbo”ti vuttaṃ. Yattakena pana sīmāsambhedo na hoti, tattakaṃ ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin02t:1347_5: Tenevāhu porāṇā “yattakena sīmāsaṅkaro na hoti, tattakampi ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Ūnakaṃ
tika-vin02t:1347_6: pana na vaṭṭatīti idampi udakukkhepasīmāya parisavasena vaḍḍhanato sīmāsambhedasaṅkā
tika-vin02t:1348_0: Gacchantiyā pana nāvāya kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti ettha udakukkhepamanatikkamitvā parivattamānāya
tika-vin02t:1348_1: kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ. Sīmaṃ vā sodhetvāti ettha sīmasodhanaṃ nāma gāmasīmādīsu
tika-vin02t:1348_2: ṭhitānaṃ hatthapāsānayanādi. “Nadiṃ vināsetvā taḷākaṃ karontī”ti vuttamevatthaṃ vibhāveti
tika-vin02t:1348_3: “heṭṭhā pāḷi baddhā”ti, heṭṭhānadiṃ āvaritvā pāḷi baddhāti attho. Chaḍḍitamodakanti
tika-vin02t:1348_4: taḷākarakkhaṇatthaṃ ekamantena chaḍḍitamudakaṃ. Deve avassanteti dubbuṭṭhikāle vassānepi
tika-vin02t:1348_5: deve avassante. Uppatitvāti uttaritvā. Gāmanigamasīmaṃ ottharitvā pavattatīti vuttappakāre
tika-vin02t:1348_6: vassakāle cattāro māse abbocchinnā pavattati. Vihārasīmanti baddhasīmaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin02t:1349_0: Agamanapatheti yattha tadaheva gantvā paccāgantuṃ na sakkā hoti, tādise padese araññasīmāsaṅkhameva
tika-vin02t:1349_1: gacchatīti sattabbhantarasīmaṃ sandhāya vadati. Tesanti macchabandhānaṃ. Gamanapariyantassa
tika-vin02t:1349_2: oratoti gamanapariyantassa orimabhāge dīpakaṃ pabbatañca sandhāya vuttaṃ, na samuddappadesaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1350_0: 148. Saṃsaṭṭhaviṭapāti iminā aññamaññassa āsannataṃ dīpeti. Baddhā hotīti pacchimadisābhāge
tika-vin02t:1350_1: sīmaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tassā padesanti yattha ṭhatvā bhikkhūhi kammaṃ kātuṃ sakkā
tika-vin02t:1350_2: hoti, tādisaṃ padesaṃ. Yattha pana ṭhitehi kammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkā hoti, tādisaṃ padesaṃ
tika-vin02t:1350_3: antokaritvā bandhantā sīmāya sīmaṃ sambhindanti nāma. Dvinnaṃ sīmānaṃ nimittaṃ hotīti
tika-vin02t:1350_4: nimittassa sīmato bāhirattā sīmāsambhedo na hotīti vuttaṃ. Sīmāsaṅkaraṃ karotīti
tika-vin02t:1350_5: vaḍḍhitvā sīmappadesaṃ paviṭṭhe dvinnaṃ sīmānaṃ gataṭṭhānassa duviññeyyattā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1350_6: na pana tattha kammaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti dassanatthaṃ. Na hi sīmā tattakena asīmā
tika-vin02t:1350_7: hoti, dve pana sīmā pacchā vaḍḍhitena rukkhena ajjhotthaṭattā ekābaddhā honti, tasmā
tika-vin02t:1350_8: ekattha ṭhatvā kammaṃ karontehi itaraṃ sodhetvā kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1353_0: 149. Adhammena vaggaṃ uposathakammanti ettha yattha cattāro vasanti, tattha pātimokkhuddeso
tika-vin02t:1353_1: anuññāto. Yattha dve vā tayo vā vasanti, tattha pārisuddhiuposatho. Idha pana tathā
tika-vin02t:1353_2: akatvā catunnaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne pārisuddhiuposathassa katattā tiṇṇaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne ca
tika-vin02t:1353_3: pātimokkhassa uddiṭṭhattā “adhammenā”ti vuttaṃ. Yasmā sabbeva na sannipatiṃsu, chandapārisuddhi
tika-vin02t:1353_4: ca saṅghamajjhaṃyeva āgacchati, na gaṇamajjhaṃ, tasmā “vagga”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1355_0: 150. Evametaṃ dhārayāmīti “sutā kho panāyasmantehī”ti ettha “evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti
tika-vin02t:1355_1: vatvā “uddiṭṭhaṃ kho āyasmanto nidānaṃ, sutā kho panāyasmantehi cattāro pārājikā
tika-vin02t:1355_2: dhammā”ti vattabbaṃ. Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tatthāyasmante pucchāmi kaccittha
tika-vin02t:1355_3: parisuddhā, dutiyampi pucchāmi…pe… tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmīti vatvā ‘uddiṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin02t:1355_4: kho āyasmanto nidāna’ntiādinā nayena avasese sutena sāvite uddiṭṭho hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1355_6: “Avasesaṃ sutena sāvetabba”nti vacanato nidānuddese aniṭṭhite sutena sāvetabbaṃ nāma
tika-vin02t:1355_7: natthīti āha “dutiyādīsu uddesesū”ti. Uddiṭṭhauddesāpekkhañhi avasesaggahaṇaṃ, tasmā
tika-vin02t:1355_8: nidāne uddiṭṭhe pārājikuddesādīsu yasmiṃ vippakate antarāyo uppajjati, tena saddhiṃ
tika-vin02t:1356_0: Tīhipi vidhīhīti osāraṇakathanasarabhaññehi. Ettha ca atthaṃ bhaṇitukāmatāya suttassa
tika-vin02t:1356_1: osāraṇā osāraṇaṃ nāma. Tasseva atthappakāsanā kathanaṃ nāma. Suttassa tadatthassa
tika-vin02t:1356_2: vā sarena bhaṇanaṃ sarabhaññaṃ nāma. Sajjhāyaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvāti “sajjhāyaṃ karomī”ti
tika-vin02t:1356_3: cittaṃ uppādetvā. Osāretvā pana kathentenāti paṭhamaṃ ussāretvā pacchā atthaṃ kathentena.
tika-vin02t:1356_4: Manussānaṃ pana “bhaṇāhī”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti ettha uccatare nisinnenapi manussānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1356_5: bhaṇāhīti visesetvāyeva vattuṃ vaṭṭati, avisesetvā pana na vaṭṭati. Sajjhāyaṃ karontenāti
tika-vin02t:1356_6: yattha katthaci nisīditvā sajjhāyaṃ karontena. Theroti yo koci attanā vuḍḍhataro.
tika-vin02t:1356_7: Ekaṃ āpucchitvāti ekaṃ vuḍḍhataraṃ āpucchitvā. Aparo āgacchatīti aparo tatopi vuḍḍhataro āgacchati.
tika-vin02t:1359_0: 155. Codanāvatthu nāma ekaṃ nagaraṃ. Saṅghauposathādibhedena navavidhanti saṅghe
tika-vin02t:1359_1: uposatho gaṇe uposatho puggale uposathoti evaṃ kārakavasena tayo, suttuddeso pārisuddhiuposatho
tika-vin02t:1359_2: adhiṭṭhānuposathoti evaṃ kattabbākāravasena tayo, cātuddasiko pannarasiko sāmaggīuposathoti
tika-vin02t:1359_3: evaṃ divasavasena tayoti navavidhaṃ. Catubbidhaṃ uposathakammanti adhammena vaggaṃ
tika-vin02t:1359_4: uposathakammaṃ, adhammena samaggaṃ uposathakammaṃ, dhammena vaggaṃ uposathakammaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1359_5: dhammena samaggaṃ uposathakammanti evaṃ catubbidhampi uposathakammaṃ. Duvidhaṃ pātimokkhanti
tika-vin02t:1359_6: bhikkhupātimokkhaṃ bhikkhunīpātimokkhanti duvidhaṃ pātimokkhaṃ. Navavidhaṃ pātimokkhuddesanti
tika-vin02t:1359_7: bhikkhūnaṃ pañca uddesā, bhikkhunīnaṃ ṭhapetvā aniyatuddesaṃ avasesā cattāroti navavidhaṃ pātimokkhuddesaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1365_0: 164. Yena kenaci aṅgapaccaṅgena viññāpetīti manasā cintetvā hatthappayogādinā yena
tika-vin02t:1365_1: kenaci viññāpeti. Saṅgho nappahotīti dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ antarā hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā
tika-vin02t:1365_2: paṭipāṭiyā ṭhātuṃ nappahoti. Itarā pana biḷālasaṅkhalikapārisuddhi nāmāti ettha keci
tika-vin02t:1365_3: vadanti “biḷālasaṅkhalikā baddhāva hoti antogehe eva sampayojanattā, yathā sā na
tika-vin02t:1365_4: katthaci gacchati, tathā sāpi na gacchatīti adhippāyo. Itarathā visesanaṃ niratthakaṃ
tika-vin02t:1365_5: hotī”ti. Apare pana “yathā bahūhi manussehi ekassa biḷālassa attano attano saṅkhalikā
tika-vin02t:1365_6: gīvāya ābaddhā biḷāle gacchante gacchanti ābaddhattā, na aññasmiṃ biḷāle gacchante
tika-vin02t:1365_7: gacchanti anābaddhattā, evamevassa bhikkhussa bahūhi saṅkhalikasadisā chandapārisuddhi
tika-vin02t:1365_8: dinnā, sā tasmiṃ bhikkhusmiṃ gacchante gacchati tasmiṃ saṅkhalikā viya ābaddhattā,
tika-vin02t:1365_9: na aññasmiṃ anābaddhattā”ti vadanti. Sabbampetaṃ na sārato paccetabbaṃ. Ayaṃ panettha
tika-vin02t:1365_10: sāro – yathā saṅkhalikāya paṭhamavalayaṃ dutiyaṃyeva valayaṃ pāpuṇāti, na tatiyaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1365_11: evamayampi pārisuddhidāyakena yassa dinnā, tato aññattha na gacchatīti saṅkhalikasadisattā
tika-vin02t:1367: 165. “Santi saṅghassa karaṇīyānī”ti vattabbe vacanavipallāsena “karaṇīya”nti vuttaṃ. Tassa sammutidānakiccaṃ natthi. “Hatthapāsaṃ ānetabboyevā”ti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1369_0: 168. Saṅghasannipātato paṭhamaṃ kātabbaṃ pubbakaraṇanti vuttaṃ, pubbakaraṇato pacchā
tika-vin02t:1369_1: kātabbampi uposathakammato paṭhamaṃ kātabbattā pubbakiccanti vuttaṃ. Ubhayampi cetaṃ
tika-vin02t:1369_2: uposathakammato paṭhamaṃ kattabbattā katthaci pubbakiccamicceva voharīyati “kiṃ saṅghassa
tika-vin02t:1370_0: Uposathoti tīsu uposathadivasesu aññataradivaso. Tasmiñhi sati idaṃ saṅghassa uposathakammaṃ
tika-vin02t:1370_1: pattakallaṃ nāma hoti, nāsati. Yathāha “na ca, bhikkhave, anuposathe uposatho kātabbo”ti.
tika-vin02t:1370_2: Yāvatikā ca bhikkhū kammappattāti yattakā bhikkhū tassa uposathakammassa pattā yuttā
tika-vin02t:1370_3: anurūpā sabbantimena paricchedena cattāro bhikkhū pakatattā, te ca kho hatthapāsaṃ
tika-vin02t:1370_4: avijahitvā ekasīmāyaṃ ṭhitā. Sabhāgāpattiyo ca na vijjantīti ettha yaṃ sabbo saṅgho
tika-vin02t:1370_6: vuccanti. Etāsu hi avijjamānāsu visabhāgāsu vijjamānāsupi pattakallaṃ hotiyeva.
tika-vin02t:1371_0: Vajjanīyā ca puggalā tasmiṃ na hontīti “na, bhikkhave, sagahaṭṭhāya parisāyā”ti vacanato
tika-vin02t:1371_1: gahaṭṭho, “na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyā nisinnaparisāya pātimokkhaṃ uddisitabba”ntiādinā
tika-vin02t:1371_2: nayena vuttā bhikkhunī sikkhamānā sāmaṇero sāmaṇerī sikkhāpaccakkhātako antimavatthuajjhāpannako
tika-vin02t:1371_3: āpattiyā adassane ukkhittako āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhittako pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge
tika-vin02t:1371_4: ukkhittako paṇḍako theyyasaṃvāsako titthiyapakkantako tiracchānagato mātughātako
tika-vin02t:1371_5: pitughātako arahantaghātako bhikkhunīdūsako saṅghabhedako lohituppādako ubhatobyañjanakoti
tika-vin02t:1371_6: ime vīsati cāti ekavīsati puggalā vajjanīyā nāma, te hatthapāsato bahikaraṇavasena
tika-vin02t:1371_7: vajjetabbā. Etesu hi tividhe ukkhittake sati uposathaṃ karonto saṅgho pācittiyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1371_8: āpajjati, sesesu dukkaṭaṃ. Ettha ca tiracchānagatoti yassa upasampadā paṭikkhittā,
tika-vin02t:1371_9: sova adhippeto, titthiyā gahaṭṭheneva saṅgahitā. Etepi hi vajjanīyā. Evaṃ pattakallaṃ
tika-vin02t:1372_0: Ajja me uposatho pannarasotipīti pi-saddena pāḷiyaṃ āgatanayeneva “ajja me uposatho”tipi
tika-vin02t:1372_1: vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti dīpeti. Mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “ajja me uposatho cātuddasoti vā
tika-vin02t:1372_2: pannarasoti vā vatvā adhiṭṭhāmīti vattabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1375_0: 169. Nanu ca “na, bhikkhave, sāpattikena uposatho kātabbo, yo kareyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin02t:1375_1: evaṃ sāpattikassa uposathakaraṇe visuṃ paññattā āpatti na dissati, tasmā bhagavatā
tika-vin02t:1375_2: paññattaṃ “na sāpattikena uposatho kātabbo”ti idaṃ kasmā vuttanti āha “yassa siyā
tika-vin02t:1375_3: āpatti…pe… paññattaṃ hotīti veditabba”nti. Kiñcāpi visuṃ paññattā āpatti na dissati,
tika-vin02t:1375_4: atha kho “yassa siyā āpatti, so āvikareyyā”tiādiṃ vadantena atthato paññattāyevāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:1376_0: Pārisuddhidānapaññāpanena cāti imināva “sāpattikena pārisuddhipi na dātabbā”ti dīpitaṃ
tika-vin02t:1376_1: hoti. Na hi sāpattiko samāno “pārisuddhiṃ dammi, pārisuddhiṃ me hara, pārisuddhiṃ
tika-vin02t:1376_2: me ārocehī”ti vattumarahati. Tasmā pārisuddhiṃ dentena paṭhamaṃ santī āpatti desetabbā
tika-vin02t:1376_3: “ahaṃ, āvuso, itthannāmāya āpattiyā vematiko, yadā nibbematiko bhavissāmi, tadā taṃ
tika-vin02t:1376_4: āpattiṃ paṭikarissāmī”ti vatvā uposatho kātabbo. “Pātimokkhaṃ sotabba”nti vacanato
tika-vin02t:1376_5: yāva nibbematiko na hoti, tāva sabhāgāpattiṃ paṭiggahetuṃ na labhati, aññesañca kammānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1376_6: parisuddho nāma hoti. “Puna nibbematiko hutvā desetabbaṃ na cā”ti neva pāḷiyaṃ na
tika-vin02t:1376_7: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ atthi, desite pana doso natthi. “Ito vuṭṭhahitvā paṭikarissāmīti etthāpi
tika-vin02t:1376_8: eseva nayo”ti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Yathā sabbo saṅgho sabhāgāpattiṃ āpajjitvā “suṇātu
tika-vin02t:1376_9: me bhante, saṅgho…pe… paṭikarissatī”ti ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ labhati, evaṃ
tika-vin02t:1376_10: tīhi “suṇantu me āyasmantā, ime bhikkhū sabhāgaṃ āpattiṃ āpannā. Yadā aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ
tika-vin02t:1376_11: suddhaṃ anāpattikaṃ passissanti, tadā tassa santike taṃ āpattiṃ paṭikarissantī”ti
tika-vin02t:1376_12: gaṇañattiṃ ṭhapetvā, dvīhi aññamaññaṃ ārocetvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Ekenapi “parisuddhaṃ
tika-vin02t:1376_13: labhitvā paṭikarissāmī”ti ābhogaṃ katvā kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti ca vadanti.
tika-vin02t:1379_0: 179. Ācārasaṇṭhānanti ācārasaṇṭhiti. Ākarīyati pakāsīyati etenāti ākāro. Līnaṃ gamayati
tika-vin02t:1379_1: bodhetīti liṅgaṃ. Nimiyanti paricchijja ñāyanti etenāti nimittaṃ. Uddisīyanti apadisīyanti
tika-vin02t:1379_2: etenāti uddeso. “Amhākaṃ ida”nti aññātaṃ aviditanti aññātakaṃ. Tañca atthato parasantakaṃyevāti
tika-vin02t:1380: 180. Nānāsaṃvāsakabhāvanti laddhinānāsaṃvāsakabhāvaṃ. Tassa abhibhavo nāma tesaṃ laddhivissajjāpananti āha “taṃ diṭṭhiṃ na nissajjāpentīti attho”ti.
tika-vin02t:1382_0: 181. Uposathādhiṭṭhānatthaṃ sīmāpi nadīpi na gantabbāti garukaṃ pātimokkhuddesaṃ
tika-vin02t:1382_1: vissajjetvā lahukassa akattabbattā vuttaṃ. Āraññakenāpi bhikkhunāti ekacārikena āraññakabhikkhunā,
tika-vin02t:1382_2: yattha vā saṅghapahonakā bhikkhū na santi, tādise araññe vasantena. Tattha uposathaṃ
tika-vin02t:1382_3: katvāva gantabbanti tassa vasanaṭṭhāne saṅghuposathassa appavattanato vuttaṃ. Uposathantarāyoti
tika-vin02t:1384_0: 183. Hatthapāsupagamanameva pamāṇanti bhikkhunīādayo ṭhitā vā hontu nisinnā vā, tesaṃ
tika-vin02t:1384_1: hatthapāsupagamanameva āpattiyā pamāṇanti adhippāyo, tasmā ekasīmāyampi hatthapāsaṃ
tika-vin02t:1384_2: jahāpetvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Sesamettha uttānameva.
tika-vin02t:1388_1: atthantarassa abodhanato vuttaṃ. Aparajjugatāya assāti iminā asamānādhikaraṇavisayo
tika-vin02t:1388_2: bāhiratthasamāsoyanti dasseti. Aparajjūti āsāḷhīpuṇṇamito aparaṃ dinaṃ, pāṭipadanti
tika-vin02t:1390_0: 185. Anapekkhagamanena vā aññattha aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpanena vā āpatti veditabbāti ettha
tika-vin02t:1390_1: anapekkhagamanena upacārātikkame āpatti veditabbā, sāpekkhagamanena aññattha aruṇuṭṭhāpanena āpatti veditabbā.
tika-vin02t:1392_0: 187-189. Tīṇi parihīnānīti bhikkhunīnaṃ vaccakuṭiādīnaṃ paṭikkhittattā pahīnāni.
tika-vin02t:1392_1: Vāreyyanti āvāhavivāhamaṅgalaṃ. Suttantoti attano paguṇasuttanto. Na palujjatīti
tika-vin02t:1394_0: 199. Bhikkhugatikoti bhikkhunissitako. So pana yasmā bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ vasati, tasmā
tika-vin02t:1394_1: vuttaṃ “bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ vasanakapuriso”ti. Sattāhakaraṇīyena gantvā bahiddhā aruṇuṭṭhāpanaṃ
tika-vin02t:1394_2: ratticchedo. Animantitena gantuṃ na vaṭṭatīti ettha animantitattā sattāhakiccaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā
tika-vin02t:1394_3: gacchantassapi vassacchedo ceva dukkaṭañca hotīti veditabbaṃ. Yathāvuttañhi ratticchedakāraṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:1394_4: vinā tirovihāre vasitvā āgacchissāmīti gacchatopi vassacchedaṃ vadanti. Gantuṃ vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin02t:1394_5: sattāhakaraṇīyena gantuṃ vaṭṭati. Evaṃ gacchantena ca antoupacārasīmāyaṃ ṭhiteneva
tika-vin02t:1394_6: “antosattāhe āgacchissāmī”ti ābhogaṃ katvā gantabbaṃ. Sace ābhogaṃ akatvā upacārasīmaṃ
tika-vin02t:1394_7: atikkamati, chinnavassova hotīti vadanti. Bhaṇḍakanti cīvaraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Pahiṇantīti
tika-vin02t:1394_8: cīvaradhovanādikammena pahiṇanti. Sampāpuṇituṃ na sakkoti, vaṭṭatīti ettha “ajjeva
tika-vin02t:1394_9: āgamissāmī”ti sāmantavihāraṃ gantvā puna āgacchantassa antarāmagge sace aruṇuggamanaṃ
tika-vin02t:1394_10: hoti, vassacchedopi na hoti, ratticchedadukkaṭañca natthīti vadanti. “Ācariyaṃ passissāmī”ti
tika-vin02t:1394_11: pana gantuṃ labhatīti “agilānampi ācariyaṃ upajjhāyaṃ vā passissāmī”ti sattāhakaraṇīyena
tika-vin02t:1394_12: gantuṃ labhati. Sace pana naṃ ācariyo “ajja mā gacchā”ti vadati, vaṭṭatīti evaṃ sattāhakaraṇīyena
tika-vin02t:1394_13: gataṃ antosattāheyeva puna āgacchantaṃ sace ācariyo upajjhāyo vā “ajja mā gacchā”ti
tika-vin02t:1394_14: vadati, vaṭṭati, sattāhātikkamepi anāpattīti adhippāyo, vassacchedo pana hotiyevāti
tika-vin02t:1396: 201. Sace dūraṃ gato hoti, sattāhavārena aruṇo uṭṭhāpetabboti iminā vassacchedakāraṇe sati sattāhakaraṇīyena gantuṃ vaṭṭatīti dīpeti.
tika-vin02t:1398_0: 203. “Idha vassaṃ upemī”ti tikkhattuṃ vattabbanti satthassāvihārattā “imasmiṃ vihāre”ti
tika-vin02t:1398_1: avatvā “idha vassaṃ upemī”ti ettakameva vattabbaṃ. Satthe pana vassaṃ upagantuṃ na
tika-vin02t:1398_2: vaṭṭatīti kuṭikādīnaṃ abhāve “idha vassaṃ upemī”ti vacībhedaṃ katvā upagantuṃ na
tika-vin02t:1398_3: vaṭṭati, ālayakaraṇamatteneva vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo. Vippakiratīti visuṃ visuṃ gacchati.
tika-vin02t:1398_4: Tīsu ṭhānesu natthi vassacchede āpattīti tehi saddhiṃ gacchantasseva natthi āpatti,
tika-vin02t:1398_5: tehi viyujjitvā gamane pana āpattiyeva, pavāretuñca na labhati.
tika-vin02t:1400_0: 204. Seyyathāpi pisācillikāti ettha pisācā eva pisācillikā, pisācadārakātipi vadanti.
tika-vin02t:1400_1: Pavisanadvāraṃ yojetvāti sakavāṭabaddhameva yojetvā. Pañcannaṃ chadanānanti tiṇapaṇṇaiṭṭhakasilāsudhāsaṅkhātānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1400_2: pañcannaṃ chadanānaṃ. Idañca yebhuyyena vuttanti veditabbaṃ rukkhādīsu padaracchadanāyapi
tika-vin02t:1400_3: kuṭikāya vassūpagamanassa vuttattā. Na, bhikkhave, asenāsanikena vassaṃ upagantabbanti
tika-vin02t:1400_4: vacībhedaṃ katvā vassūpagamanaṃ sandhāyeva paṭikkhepo, na ālayakaraṇavasena upagamanaṃ
tika-vin02t:1400_5: sandhāyāti vadanti. Pāḷiyaṃ pana avisesena vuttattā aṭṭhakathāyañca dutiyapārājikasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1400_6: “vassaṃ upagacchantena hi nālakapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannenapi pañcannaṃ chadanānaṃ aññatarena
tika-vin02t:1400_7: channeyeva sadvārabandhe senāsane upagantabbaṃ. Tasmā vassakāle sace senāsanaṃ labhati,
tika-vin02t:1400_8: iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. No ce labhati, hatthakammaṃ pariyesitvāpi kātabbaṃ. Hatthakammaṃ
tika-vin02t:1400_9: alabhantena sāmampi kātabbaṃ, na tveva asenāsanikena vassaṃ upagantabba”nti daḷhaṃ
tika-vin02t:1400_10: katvā vuttattā asenāsanikassa nāvādiṃ vinā aññattha ālayo na vaṭṭatīti amhākaṃ khanti.
tika-vin02t:1400_11: Nāvāsatthavajesuyeva hi “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, nāvāya vassaṃ upagantu”ntiādinā sati
tika-vin02t:1400_12: asati vā senāsane vassūpagamanassa visuṃ anuññātattā “na, bhikkhave, asenāsanikena
tika-vin02t:1400_13: vassaṃ upagantabba”nti ayaṃ paṭikkhepo tattha na labbhatīti asati senāsane ālayavasenapi
tika-vin02t:1400_14: nāvādīsu upagamanaṃ vuttaṃ. Ṭaṅkitamañco nāma dīghe mañcapāde majjhe vijjhitvā aṭaniyo
tika-vin02t:1400_15: pavesetvā kato mañco. Tassa idaṃ upari idaṃ heṭṭhāti natthi, parivattetvā atthatopi
tika-vin02t:1400_16: tādisova hoti, taṃ susāne devaṭṭhāne ca ṭhapenti, catunnaṃ pāsāṇānaṃ upari pāsāṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:1403_0: 205. Tassā lakkhaṇaṃ mahāvibhaṅge vuttanti catutthapārājikasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ “yo imamhā
tika-vin02t:1403_1: āvāsā paṭhamaṃ pakkamissati, taṃ mayaṃ arahāti jānissāmā”ti ettha dassitaṃ adhammikakatikavattalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:1403_2: sandhāya vadati, paratopi senāsanakkhandhakavaṇṇanāyaṃ adhammikaṃ katikavattaṃ āvi bhavissatiyeva.
tika-vin02t:1405_0: 207. Yasmā nānāsīmāyaṃ dvīsu āvāsesu vassaṃ vasantassa dutiye “vasāmī”ti citte uppanne
tika-vin02t:1405_1: paṭhamasenāsanaggāho paṭippassambhati, puna paṭhameyeva “vasāmī”ti citte uppanne
tika-vin02t:1405_2: dutiyo paṭippassambhati, tasmā “tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno purimikā ca na paññāyatī”ti
tika-vin02t:1405_3: vuttaṃ. Paṭissavassa visaṃvādanapaccayā hontampi dukkaṭaṃ satiyeva paṭissave hotīti
tika-vin02t:1405_4: āha “tassa tassa paṭissave dukkaṭa”nti. Tenevāha “tañca kho…pe… pacchā visaṃvādanapaccayā”ti.
tika-vin02t:1406_0: Akaraṇīyoti sattāhakaraṇīyena akaraṇīyo. Sakaraṇīyoti sattāhakaraṇīyeneva sakaraṇīyo.
tika-vin02t:1406_1: Yadi evaṃ “sattāhakaraṇīyena akaraṇīyo sakaraṇīyo”ti ca kasmā na vuttanti? “Akaraṇīyo”ti
tika-vin02t:1406_2: vuttepi sattāhakaraṇīyena sakaraṇīyākaraṇīyatā viññāyatīti katvā na vuttaṃ. Yadi
tika-vin02t:1406_4: ettakameva kasmā na vuttanti? Vuccate – tattha “sattāhakaraṇīyenā”ti avatvā “sakaraṇīyo
tika-vin02t:1406_5: pakkamatī”ti vutte so taṃ sattāhaṃ bahiddhā vītināmetīti na sakkā vattunti “sattāhakaraṇīyena
tika-vin02t:1406_6: pakkamatī”ti vuttaṃ. Evañhi vutte sattāhassa adhikatattā so taṃ sattāhaṃ bahi vītināmetīti sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-vin02t:1407_0: Ettha ca ādimhi cattāro vārā nirapekkhagamanaṃ sandhāya vuttā, tatthāpi purimā dve
tika-vin02t:1407_1: vārā vassaṃ anupagatassa vasena vuttā, pacchimā pana dve vārā vassaṃ upagatassa vasena,
tika-vin02t:1407_2: tato paraṃ dve vārā sāpekkhagamanaṃ sandhāya vuttā, tatthāpi paṭhamavāro sāpekkhassapi
tika-vin02t:1407_3: sattāhakaraṇīyena gantvā taṃ sattāhaṃ bahiddhā vītināmentassa vassacchedadassanatthaṃ
tika-vin02t:1407_4: vutto, itaro vuttanayeneva gantvā antosattāhe nivattantassa vassacchedābhāvadassanatthaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1407_5: “So sattāhaṃ anāgatāya pavāraṇāya sakaraṇīyo pakkamatī”ti ayaṃ pana vāro navamito
tika-vin02t:1407_6: paṭṭhāya gantvā sattāhaṃ bahiddhā vītināmentassapi vassacchedābhāvadassanatthaṃ vutto.
tika-vin02t:1407_7: Ettha ca “akaraṇīyo pakkamatī”ti dutiyavārassa anāgatattā navamito paṭṭhāya gacchantenapi
tika-vin02t:1407_8: satiyeva karaṇīye gantabbaṃ, nāsatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ime ca satta vārā bahiddhā katauposathikassa
tika-vin02t:1407_9: vasena āgatā, apare satta antovihāraṃ gantvā katauposathassa vasenāti evaṃ purimikāya
tika-vin02t:1407_10: vasena cuddasa vārā vuttā, tato paraṃ pacchimikāya vasena teyeva cuddasa vārā vuttāti
tika-vin02t:1408_0: Imehi pana sabbavārehi vuttamatthaṃ sampiṇḍetvā dassetuṃ “so tadaheva akaraṇīyotiādīsū”tiādi
tika-vin02t:1408_1: āraddhaṃ. Ko pana vādo dvīhatīhaṃ vasitvā antosattāhe nivattantassāti vassaṃ upagantvā
tika-vin02t:1408_2: dvīhatīhaṃ vasitvā sattāhakaraṇīyena gantvā antosattāhe nivattantassa ko pana vādo,
tika-vin02t:1408_3: kathā eva natthīti adhippāyo. Asatiyā pana vassaṃ na upetīti “imasmiṃ vihāre imaṃ
tika-vin02t:1408_4: temāsaṃ vassaṃ upemī”ti vacībhedaṃ katvā na upeti.
tika-vin02t:1409_0: Komudiyā cātumāsiniyāti pacchimakattikapuṇṇamāyaṃ. Sā hi kumudānaṃ atthitāya komudī,
tika-vin02t:1409_1: catunnaṃ vassikānaṃ māsānaṃ pariyosānattā “cātumāsinī”ti vuccati. Tadā hi kumudāni
tika-vin02t:1409_2: supupphitāni honti, tasmā kumudānaṃ samūho, kumudāni eva vā komudā, te ettha atthīti
tika-vin02t:1409_3: “komudī”ti vuccati, kumudavatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Sesamettha uttānameva.
tika-vin02t:1414_0: 209. Pavāraṇakkhandhake ādito lāpo ālāpo, vacanapaṭivacanavasena samaṃ lāpo sallāpo.
tika-vin02t:1414_1: Piṇḍāya paṭikkameyyāti gāme piṇḍāya caritvā paccāgaccheyya. Avakkārapātiṃ dhovitvā
tika-vin02t:1414_2: upaṭṭhāpeyyāti atirekapiṇḍapātaṃ apanetvā ṭhapanatthāya ekaṃ samuggapātiṃ dhovitvā
tika-vin02t:1414_3: ṭhapeyya. Samuggapāti nāma samuggapuṭasadisā pāti. Appahariteti aparūḷhaharite, yasmiṃ
tika-vin02t:1414_4: ṭhāne piṇḍapātajjhottharaṇena vinassanadhammāni tiṇāni natthi, tasminti attho. Tena
tika-vin02t:1414_5: nittiṇañca mahātiṇagahanañca yattha sakaṭenapi chaḍḍite piṇḍapāte tiṇāni na vinassanti,
tika-vin02t:1414_6: tañca ṭhānaṃ pariggahitaṃ hoti. Bhūtagāmasikkhāpadassa hi avikopanatthametaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1414_7: Appāṇaketi nippāṇake, piṇḍapātajjhottharaṇena maritabbapāṇakarahite vā mahāudakakkhandhe.
tika-vin02t:1414_8: Parittodake eva hi bhattapakkhepena āluḷite sukhumapāṇakā maranti, na mahātaḷākādīsūti.
tika-vin02t:1415_0: Vaccaghaṭanti ācamanakumbhī. Rittanti rittakaṃ. Tucchanti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Avisayhanti
tika-vin02t:1415_1: ukkhipituṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ atibhārikaṃ. Hatthavikārenāti hatthasaññāya. Hatthehi ukkhipanaṃ
tika-vin02t:1415_2: hatthavilaṅghanaṃ. Tenāha “hatthukkhepakenā”ti. Atha vā vilaṅgheti desantaraṃ pāpeti
tika-vin02t:1415_3: etenāti vilaṅghako, hattho eva vilaṅghako hatthavilaṅghako, tena hatthavilaṅghakena,
tika-vin02t:1415_4: aññamaññaṃ saṃsibbitahatthenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Dve hi janā hatthena hatthaṃ saṃsibbetvā
tika-vin02t:1415_5: dvīsu hatthesu ṭhapetvā uṭṭhapentā hatthavilaṅghakena uṭṭhapenti nāma. Titthiyasamādānanti
tika-vin02t:1418_0: 212. Dvemā, bhikkhave, pavāraṇā cātuddasikā ca pannarasikā cāti ettha purimavassaṃvutthānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1418_1: pubbakattikapuṇṇamā, tesaṃyeva sace bhaṇḍanakārakehi upaddutā pavāraṇaṃ paccukkaḍḍhanti,
tika-vin02t:1418_2: atha kattikamāsassa kāḷapakkhacātuddaso vā pacchimakattikapuṇṇamā vā, pacchimavassaṃvutthānañca
tika-vin02t:1418_3: pacchimakattikapuṇṇamā eva vāti ime tayo pavāraṇadivasāti veditabbā. Idañca pakaticārittavasena
tika-vin02t:1418_4: vuttaṃ, tathārūpapaccaye pana sati dvinnaṃ kattikapuṇṇamānaṃ purimesu cātuddasesupi
tika-vin02t:1418_5: pavāraṇaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati, teneva mahāvihāre bhikkhū cātuddasiyā pavāretvā pannarasiyā
tika-vin02t:1418_6: kāyasāmaggiṃ denti, cetiyagirimahadassanatthampi aṭṭhamiyā gacchanti, tampi cātuddasiyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1420: 213. Sace pana vuḍḍhataro hotīti sace pavāraṇadāyako bhikkhu vuḍḍhataro hoti. Tena ca bhikkhunāti pavāraṇadāyakena bhikkhunā.
tika-vin02t:1422_0: 222. Pannarasakesu pavāritamatteti pavāritasamanantaraṃ. Avuṭṭhitāya parisāyāti pavāretvā
tika-vin02t:1422_1: pacchā aññamaññaṃ kathentiyā. Ekaccāya vuṭṭhitāyāti ekaccesu yathānisinnesu ekaccesu
tika-vin02t:1422_2: sakasakaṭṭhānaṃ gatesu. Puna pavāritabbanti punapi sabbehi samāgantvā pavāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1422_3: Āgacchanti samasamā, tesaṃ santike pavāretabbanti gate anānetvā nisinnānaññeva santike
tika-vin02t:1422_4: pavāretabbaṃ. Sabbāya vuṭṭhitāya parisāya āgacchanti samasamā, tesaṃ santike pavāretabbanti
tika-vin02t:1422_5: yadi sabbe vuṭṭhahitvā gatā sannipātetuñca na sakkā, ekacce sannipātetvā pavāretuṃ
tika-vin02t:1422_6: vaṭṭati, ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā kattabbasaṅghakammābhāvā vaggaṃ na hoti. Uposathepi eseva nayo.
tika-vin02t:1424_1: paraṃ maraṇā, na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”tiādinā sassatucchedasaṅkhātaṃ antaṃ
tika-vin02t:1426: 240. Catutthe kate suṇantīti catutthe pannarasikuposathe kate amhākaṃ pavāraṇaṃ ṭhapessantīti suṇanti. Evampi dve cātuddasikā hontīti tatiyena saddhiṃ dve cātuddasikā honti.
tika-vin02t:1428_0: 241. Ayaṃ pavāraṇāsaṅgaho ekassa dinnopi sabbesaṃ dinnova hotīti āha “ekassapi vasena
tika-vin02t:1428_1: dātabbo”ti. Āgantukā tesaṃ senāsanaṃ gahetuṃ na labhantīti sacepi saṭṭhivassabhikkhū
tika-vin02t:1428_2: āgacchanti, tesaṃ senāsanaṃ gahetuṃ na labhanti. Pavāretvā pana antarāpi cārikaṃ
tika-vin02t:1428_3: pakkamituṃ labhantīti pavāraṇāsaṅgahe kate antarā pakkamitukāmā saṅghaṃ sannipātāpetvā
tika-vin02t:1428_4: pavāretuṃ labhanti. Sesamettha pāḷito aṭṭhakathāto ca suviññeyyameva.
tika-vin02t:1432: 242. Cammakkhandhake uṇṇapāvāraṇanti uṇṇāmayaṃ pāvāraṇaṃ. Vihārapacchāyāyanti vihārapaccante chāyāyaṃ. Vihārassa vaḍḍhamānacchāyāyantipi vadanti.
tika-vin02t:1434_0: 243. Suttattho pana suttavaṇṇanātoyeva gahetabboti etthāyaṃ suttavaṇṇanā. Sītavaneti
tika-vin02t:1434_1: evaṃnāmake vane. Tasmiṃ kira paṭipāṭiyā pañca caṅkamanasatāni māpitāni, tesu thero
tika-vin02t:1434_2: attano sappāyaṃ caṅkamanaṃ gahetvā samaṇadhammaṃ karoti. Tassa āraddhavīriyassa hutvā
tika-vin02t:1434_3: caṅkamato pādatalāni bhijjiṃsu, jāṇūhi caṅkamato jāṇukānipi hatthatalānipi bhijjiṃsu,
tika-vin02t:1434_4: chiddāni ahesuṃ. Evaṃ āraddhavīriyo viharanto obhāsanimittamattakampi dassetuṃ nāsakkhi.
tika-vin02t:1434_5: Tassa vīriyena kilamitakāyassa caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ pāsāṇaphalake nisinnassa yo vitakko
tika-vin02t:1434_6: udapādi, taṃ dassetuṃ “atha kho āyasmato”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha āraddhavīriyāti paripuṇṇapaggahitavīriyā.
tika-vin02t:1434_7: Na anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccatīti “sace ahaṃ ugghaṭitaññū vā vipañcitaññū vā
tika-vin02t:1434_8: neyyo vā, na me cittaṃ na vimucceyya, addhā pana padaparamo, yena me cittaṃ na muccatī”ti
tika-vin02t:1434_9: sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā “saṃvijjanti kho panā”tiādīni cintesi. Tattha bhogāti upayogatthe paccattaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1435_0: Pāturahosīti therassa cittācāraṃ ñatvā “ayaṃ soṇo ajja sītavane padhānabhūmiyaṃ nisinno
tika-vin02t:1435_1: imaṃ vitakkaṃ vitakketi, gantvāssa vitakkaṃ sahoḍḍhaṃ gaṇhitvā vīṇopamakammaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1435_2: kathessāmī”ti sītavane pāturahosi. Paññatte āsaneti padhānikabhikkhū attano vasanaṭṭhāne
tika-vin02t:1435_3: ovadituṃ āgatassa buddhassa bhagavato nisīdanatthaṃ yathālābhena āsanampi paññapetvāva
tika-vin02t:1435_4: padhānaṃ karonti, aññaṃ alabhamānā purāṇapaṇṇāni saṅgharitvā upari saṅghāṭiṃ paññapenti.
tika-vin02t:1435_5: Theropi āsanaṃ paññapetvāva padhānaṃ akāsi, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “paññatte āsane”ti.
tika-vin02t:1436_0: Taṃ kiṃ maññasīti satthā “imassa bhikkhuno avasesakammaṭṭhānena attho natthi, ayaṃ
tika-vin02t:1436_1: gandhabbasippe cheko ciṇṇavasī, attano visaye kathiyamāne khippameva sallakkhessatī”ti
tika-vin02t:1436_2: vīṇopamaṃ kathetuṃ “taṃ kiṃ maññasī”tiādimāha. Vīṇāya tantissare kusalatā nāma vīṇāya
tika-vin02t:1436_3: vādanakusalatā, so ca tattha kusalo. Mātāpitaro hissa “amhākaṃ putto aññaṃ sippaṃ
tika-vin02t:1436_4: sikkhanto kāyena kilamissati, idaṃ pana āsane nisinneneva sakkā uggaṇhitu”nti gandhabbasippameva
tika-vin02t:1439_0: Ādikaṃ gandhabbasippaṃ sabbameva paguṇaṃ ahosi. Accāyatāti atiāyatā kharamucchanā.
tika-vin02t:1439_1: Saravatīti sarasampannā. Kammaññāti kammakkhamā kammayoggā. Atisithilāti mandamucchanā.
tika-vin02t:1439_2: Same guṇe patiṭṭhitāti majjhime sare ṭhapetvā mucchitā.
tika-vin02t:1440_0: Accāraddhanti atigāḷhaṃ. Uddhaccāya saṃvattatīti uddhatabhāvāya saṃvattati. Atilīnanti
tika-vin02t:1440_1: atisithilaṃ. Kosajjāyāti kusītabhāvatthāya. Vīriyasamathaṃ adhiṭṭhāhīti vīriyasampayuttaṃ
tika-vin02t:1440_2: samathaṃ adhiṭṭhāhi, vīriyaṃ samathena yojehīti attho. Indriyānañca samataṃ adhiṭṭhāhīti
tika-vin02t:1440_3: saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ samataṃ samabhāvaṃ adhiṭṭhāhi. Tattha saddhaṃ paññāya, paññañca
tika-vin02t:1440_4: saddhāya, vīriyaṃ samādhinā, samādhiñca vīriyena yojayatā indriyānaṃ samatā adhiṭṭhitā
tika-vin02t:1440_5: nāma hoti. Sati pana sabbatthikā, sā sadāpi balavatīyeva vaṭṭati. Tañca pana nesaṃ
tika-vin02t:1440_6: yojanāvidhānaṃ visuddhimagge āgatanayena veditabbaṃ. Tattha ca nimittaṃ gaṇhāhīti
tika-vin02t:1440_7: tasmiñca samabhāve sati yena ādāse mukhabimbeneva nimittena uppajjitabbaṃ, taṃ samathanimittaṃ
tika-vin02t:1440_8: vipassanānimittaṃ magganimittaṃ phalanimittañca gaṇha nibbattehīti evamassa satthā
tika-vin02t:1441_0: Tattha ca nimittaṃ aggahesīti samathanimittañca vipassanānimittañca aggahesi. Ekoti
tika-vin02t:1441_1: asahāyo. Vūpakaṭṭhoti vatthukāmehi ca kilesakāmehi ca kāyena ceva cittena ca vūpakaṭṭho.
tika-vin02t:1441_2: Appamattoti kammaṭṭhāne satiṃ avijahanto. Ātāpīti kāyikacetasikavīriyātāpena ātāpo.
tika-vin02t:1441_3: Ātappati kilesehīti ātāpo, vīriyaṃ. Pahitattoti kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhatāya pesitatto
tika-vin02t:1441_4: vissaṭṭhaattabhāvo, nibbāne vā pesitacitto. Na cirassevāti kammaṭṭhānārambhato na
tika-vin02t:1441_5: cireneva. Aññataroti eko. Arahatanti bhagavato sāvakānaṃ arahantānaṃ abbhantaro eko
tika-vin02t:1442_0: 244. Vusitavāti vutthabrahmacariyavāso. Katakaraṇīyoti catūhi maggehi kattabbaṃ katvā
tika-vin02t:1442_1: ṭhito. Ohitabhāroti khandhabhāraṃ kilesabhāraṃ abhisaṅkhārabhārañca otāretvā ṭhito.
tika-vin02t:1442_2: Anuppattasadatthoti sadattho vuccati arahattaṃ, taṃ pattoti attho. Parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojanoti
tika-vin02t:1442_3: khīṇabhavabandhano. Sammadaññā vimuttoti sammā hetunā kāraṇena jānitvā vimutto. Cha
tika-vin02t:1442_4: ṭhānānīti cha kāraṇāni. Adhimutto hotīti paṭivijjhitvā paccakkhaṃ katvā ṭhito hoti.
tika-vin02t:1442_5: Nekkhammādhimuttotiādi sabbaṃ arahattavasena vuttaṃ. Arahattañhi sabbakilesehi nikkhantattā
tika-vin02t:1442_6: nekkhammaṃ, teheva pavivittattā paviveko, byāpajjābhāvato abyāpajjaṃ, upādānassa
tika-vin02t:1442_7: khayante uppannattā upādānakkhayo, taṇhāya khayante uppannattā taṇhakkhayo, sammohābhāvato
tika-vin02t:1443_0: Kevalaṃ saddhāmattakanti paṭivedharahitaṃ kevalaṃ paṭivedhapaññāya asammissaṃ saddhāmattakaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1443_1: Paṭicayanti punappunaṃ karaṇena vaḍḍhiṃ. Vītarāgattāti maggapaṭivedhena rāgassa vihatattāyeva
tika-vin02t:1443_2: nekkhammasaṅkhātaṃ arahattaṃ paṭivijjhitvā sacchikatvā ṭhito hoti, phalasamāpattivihārena
tika-vin02t:1443_3: viharati, tanninnamānasoyeva hotīti attho. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo.
tika-vin02t:1444_1: Nikāmayamānoti icchamāno patthayamāno. Pavivekādhimuttoti “paviveke adhimutto aha”nti
tika-vin02t:1445_0: Sīlabbataparāmāsanti sīlañca vatañca parāmasitvā gahitaggahaṇamattaṃ. Sārato paccāgacchantoti
tika-vin02t:1445_1: sārabhāvena jānanto. Abyāpajjādhimuttoti abyāpajjaṃ arahattaṃ byākaroti. Imināva
tika-vin02t:1445_2: nayena sabbavāresu attho daṭṭhabbo. Apicettha “nekkhammādhimuttoti imasmiṃyeva arahattaṃ
tika-vin02t:1445_3: kathitaṃ, sesesu pañcasu nibbāna”nti eke vadanti. Apare “asammohādhimuttoti ettheva
tika-vin02t:1445_4: nibbānaṃ kathitaṃ, sesesu arahatta”nti vadanti. Ayaṃ panettha sāro – “sabbesvevetesu
tika-vin02t:1446_0: Bhusāti balavanto dibbarūpasadisā. Nevassa cittaṃ pariyādiyantīti etassa khīṇāsavassa
tika-vin02t:1446_1: cittaṃ gahetvā ṭhātuṃ na sakkonti. Kilesā hi uppajjamānā cittaṃ gaṇhanti nāma. Amissīkatanti
tika-vin02t:1446_2: amissakataṃ. Kilesā hi ārammaṇena saddhiṃ cittaṃ missaṃ karonti, tesaṃ abhāvā amissīkataṃ.
tika-vin02t:1446_3: Ṭhitanti patiṭṭhitaṃ. Āneñjappattanti acalanappattaṃ. Vayañcassānupassatīti tassa
tika-vin02t:1446_4: cesa cittassa uppādampi vayampi passati. Bhusā vātavuṭṭhīti balavā vātakkhandho.
tika-vin02t:1446_5: Neva naṃ saṅkampeyyāti ekabhāgena cāletuṃ na sakkuṇeyya. Na sampakampeyyāti thūṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:1446_6: viya sabbabhāgato kampetuṃ na sakkuṇeyya. Na sampavedheyyāti vedhetvā pavedhetvā
tika-vin02t:1447_0: Nekkhammaṃ adhimuttassāti arahattaṃ paṭivijjhitvā ṭhitassa. Sesapadesupi arahattameva
tika-vin02t:1447_1: kathitaṃ. Upādānakkhayassa cāti upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ. Asammohañca cetasoti cittassa
tika-vin02t:1447_2: ca asammohaṃ adhimuttassa. Disvā āyatanuppādanti āyatanānaṃ uppādañca vayañca disvā.
tika-vin02t:1447_3: Sammā cittaṃ vimuccatīti sammā hetunā nayena imāya vipassanāya paṭipattiyā phalasamāpattivasena
tika-vin02t:1447_4: cittaṃ vimuccati, nibbānārammaṇe adhimuccati. Atha vā iminā khīṇāsavassa pubbabhāgapaṭipadā
tika-vin02t:1447_5: kathitā. Tassa hi āyatanuppādaṃ disvā imāya vipassanāya adhigatassa ariyamaggassa
tika-vin02t:1447_6: ānubhāvena sabbakilesehi sammā cittaṃ vimuccati. Evaṃ tassa sammā vimuttassa…pe…
tika-vin02t:1447_7: na vijjati. Tattha santacittassāti nibbutacittassa. Sesamettha uttānatthameva.
tika-vin02t:1452: 248. Abhijīvanti etenāti abhijīvanikaṃ. Kintaṃ? Sippaṃ. Tenāha “yena sippenā”tiādi.
tika-vin02t:1454_0: 251. Uṇṇāhi katapādukāti uṇṇālomamayakambalehi, uṇṇālomehi eva vā katapādukā. Na,
tika-vin02t:1454_1: bhikkhave, gāvīnaṃ visāṇesu gahetabbantiādīsu “mokkhādhippāyena visāṇādīsu gahetuṃ
tika-vin02t:1456_0: 253. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, purisayuttaṃ hatthavaṭṭakanti ettha “anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin02t:1456_1: purisayuttaṃ, anujānāmi, bhikkhave, hatthavaṭṭaka”nti evaṃ paccekavākyaparisamāpanaṃ
tika-vin02t:1456_2: adhippetanti āha “purisayuttaṃ itthisārathi vā…pe… purisā vā, vaṭṭatiyevā”ti. Pīṭhakasivikanti
tika-vin02t:1458_2: kira tassa lomānī”ti vacanato caturaṅgulato heṭṭhā vaṭṭatīti vadanti. Vānacitro uṇṇāmayattharaṇoti
tika-vin02t:1458_3: bhitticchedādivasena vicitro uṇṇāmayattharaṇo. Ghanapupphako uṇṇāmayattharaṇoti uṇṇāmayalohitattharaṇo.
tika-vin02t:1458_5: tūlikā. “Uddalomīti ubhatodasaṃ uṇṇāmayattharaṇaṃ. Ekantalomīti ekatodasaṃ uṇṇāmayattharaṇa”nti
tika-vin02t:1458_6: dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ, sārasamāse pana “uddalomīti ekato uggatapupphaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1458_9: panettha “ṭhapetvā tūlikaṃ sabbāneva gonakādīni ratanaparisibbitāni vaṭṭantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1458_10: Tattha “ṭhapetvā tūlika”nti etena ratanaparisibbanarahitāpi tūlikā na vaṭṭatīti dīpeti.
tika-vin02t:1458_11: “Ratanaparisibbitāni vaṭṭantī”ti iminā pana yāni ratanaparisibbitāni, tāni bhūmattharaṇavasena
tika-vin02t:1458_12: yathānurūpaṃ mañcādīsu ca upanetuṃ vaṭṭatīti dīpitanti veditabbaṃ. Ettha ca vinayapariyāyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1458_13: patvā garuke ṭhātabbattā idha vuttanayenevettha vinicchayo veditabbo. Suttantikadesanāyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1458_14: pana gahaṭṭhānampi vasena vuttattā tesaṃ saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ “ṭhapetvā tūlikaṃ…pe… vaṭṭantī”ti vuttanti apare.
tika-vin02t:1459_0: Ajinacammehīti ajinamigacammehi. Tāni kira cammāni sukhumatarāni, tasmā dupaṭṭatipaṭṭāni
tika-vin02t:1459_1: katvā sibbanti. Tena vuttaṃ “ajinapaveṇī”ti. Uttaraṃ uparibhāgaṃ chādetīti uttaracchado,
tika-vin02t:1459_2: vitānaṃ, tañca lohitavitānaṃ idhādhippetanti āha “uparibaddhena rattavitānenā”ti.
tika-vin02t:1459_3: “Rattavitānesu ca kāsāvaṃ vaṭṭati, kusumbhādirattameva na vaṭṭatī”ti gaṇṭhipadesu
tika-vin02t:1459_4: vuttaṃ. Mahāupadhānanti pamāṇātikkantaṃ upadhānaṃ. Ettha ca kiñcāpi dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1459_5: “alohitakāni dvepi vaṭṭantiyeva, tato uttari labhitvā aññesaṃ dātabbāni, dātuṃ asakkonto
tika-vin02t:1459_6: mañce tiriyaṃ attharitvā upari paccattharaṇaṃ datvā nipajjitumpi labhatī”ti avisesena
tika-vin02t:1459_8: dvayameva vaṭṭati, gilānassa bimbohanāni santharitvā upari paccattharaṇaṃ datvā nipajjitumpi
tika-vin02t:1459_9: vaṭṭatī”ti vuttattā gilānoyeva mañce tiriyaṃ attharitvā nipajjituṃ labhatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1464_0: 257. Papatake pabbateti ettha “pavatte pabbate”tipi paṭhanti, pavattanāmake pabbateti
tika-vin02t:1464_1: attho. Soṇo upāsakotiādīsu nāmena soṇo nāma, tīhi saraṇagamanehi upāsakattapaṭivedanena
tika-vin02t:1464_2: upāsako, koṭiagghanakassa kaṇṇapiḷandhanassa dhāraṇena “koṭikaṇṇo”ti ca vattabbe
tika-vin02t:1464_3: “kuṭikaṇṇo”ti evaṃ abhiññāto, na sukumārasoṇoti adhippāyo. Ayañhi āyasmato mahākaccānassa
tika-vin02t:1464_4: santike dhammaṃ sutvā sāsane abhippasanno saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhito papatake
tika-vin02t:1464_5: pabbate chāyūdakasampanne ṭhāne vihāraṃ kāretvā theraṃ tattha vasāpetvā catūhi paccayehi
tika-vin02t:1464_6: upaṭṭhāti. Tena vuttaṃ “āyasmato mahākaccānassa upaṭṭhāko hotī”ti.
tika-vin02t:1465_0: So kālena kālaṃ therassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati, thero cassa dhammaṃ deseti, tena saṃvegabahulo
tika-vin02t:1465_1: dhammacariyāyaṃ ussāhajāto viharati. So ekadā satthena saddhiṃ vāṇijjatthāya ujjeniṃ
tika-vin02t:1465_2: gacchanto antarāmagge aṭaviyaṃ satthe niviṭṭhe rattiyaṃ janasambādhabhayena ekamantaṃ
tika-vin02t:1465_3: apakkamma niddaṃ upagañchi. Sattho paccūsavelāyaṃ uṭṭhāya gato, na ekopi soṇaṃ pabodhesi,
tika-vin02t:1465_4: sabbe vissaritvā agamiṃsu. So pabhātāya rattiyā pabujjhitvā uṭṭhāya kañci apassanto
tika-vin02t:1465_5: satthena gatamaggaṃ gahetvā sīghaṃ sīghaṃ gacchanto ekaṃ vaṭarukkhaṃ upagañchi. Tattha
tika-vin02t:1465_6: addasa ekaṃ mahākāyaṃ virūpadassanaṃ bībhacchaṃ purisaṃ aṭṭhito muttāni attano maṃsāni
tika-vin02t:1465_7: sayameva khādantaṃ, disvāna “kosi tva”nti pucchi. Petosmi, bhanteti. Kasmā evaṃ karosīti?
tika-vin02t:1465_8: Attano pubbakammenāti. Kiṃ pana taṃ kammanti? Ahaṃ pubbe bhārukacchanagaravāsī kūṭavāṇijo
tika-vin02t:1465_9: hutvā paresaṃ santakaṃ vañcetvā khādiṃ, samaṇe ca bhikkhāya upagate “tumhākaṃ maṃsaṃ
tika-vin02t:1465_10: khādathā”ti akkosiṃ, tena kammena etarahi imaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavāmīti. Taṃ sutvā soṇo
tika-vin02t:1466_0: Tato paraṃ gacchanto mukhato paggharitakāḷalohite dve petadārake passitvā tatheva
tika-vin02t:1466_1: pucchi, tepissa attano kammaṃ kathesuṃ. Te kira bhārukacchanagare dārakakāle gandhavāṇijjāya
tika-vin02t:1466_2: jīvikaṃ kappentā attano mātari khīṇāsave nimantetvā bhojentiyā gehaṃ gantvā “amhākaṃ
tika-vin02t:1466_3: santakaṃ kasmā samaṇānaṃ desi, tayā dinnaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjanakasamaṇānaṃ mukhato kāḷalohitaṃ
tika-vin02t:1466_4: paggharatū”ti akkosiṃsu. Te tena kammena niraye paccitvā tassa vipākāvasesena petayoniyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1466_5: nibbattitvā tadā imaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavanti. Tampi sutvā soṇo ativiya saṃvegajāto ahosi.
tika-vin02t:1467_0: So ujjeniṃ gantvā taṃ karaṇīyaṃ tīretvā kuraragharaṃ paccāgato theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
tika-vin02t:1467_1: katapaṭisanthāro tamatthaṃ ārocesi. Theropissa pavattinivattīsu ādīnavānisaṃse vibhāvento
tika-vin02t:1467_2: dhammaṃ desesi. So theraṃ vanditvā gehaṃ gato sāyamāsaṃ bhuñjitvā sayanaṃ upagato
tika-vin02t:1467_3: thokaṃyeva niddāyitvā pabujjhitvā sayanatale nisajja yathāsutaṃ dhammaṃ paccavekkhituṃ
tika-vin02t:1467_4: āraddho. Tassa taṃ dhammaṃ paccavekkhato te ca petattabhāve anussarato saṃsāradukkhaṃ
tika-vin02t:1467_5: ativiya bhayānakaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāsi, pabbajjāya cittaṃ nami. So vibhātāya rattiyā
tika-vin02t:1467_6: sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā theraṃ upagantvā attano ajjhāsayaṃ ārocetvā pabbajjaṃ yāci.
tika-vin02t:1467_7: Tena vuttaṃ “atha kho soṇo upāsako…pe… pabbājetu maṃ, bhante, ayyo mahākaccāno”ti.
tika-vin02t:1468_0: Tattha yathā yathātiādipadānaṃ ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – yena yena ākārena ayyo mahākaccāno
tika-vin02t:1468_1: dhammaṃ deseti ācikkhati paññapeti paṭṭhapeti vivarati vibhajati uttāniṃ karoti pakāseti,
tika-vin02t:1468_2: tena tena me upaparikkhato evaṃ hoti “yadetaṃ sikkhattayabrahmacariyaṃ ekampi divasaṃ
tika-vin02t:1468_3: akhaṇḍaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ, ekadivasampi kilesamalena
tika-vin02t:1468_4: amalīnaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparisuddhaṃ, saṅkhalikhitaṃ likhitasaṅkhasadisaṃ
tika-vin02t:1468_5: dhotasaṅkhasappaṭibhāgaṃ caritabbaṃ, idaṃ na sukaraṃ agāraṃ ajjhāvasatā agāramajjhe
tika-vin02t:1469_0: Evaṃ attano parivitakkitaṃ soṇo upāsako therassa ārocetvā taṃ paṭipajjitukāmo “icchāmahaṃ
tika-vin02t:1469_1: bhante”tiādimāha. Thero pana “na tāvassa ñāṇaṃ paripākaṃ gata”nti upadhāretvā ñāṇaparipākaṃ
tika-vin02t:1469_2: āgamayamāno “dukkaraṃ kho”tiādinā pabbajjāchandaṃ nivāresi. Tattha ekaseyyanti adutiyaseyyaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1469_3: Ettha ca seyyāsīsena “eko tiṭṭhati, eko gacchati, eko nisīdatī”tiādinā nayena vuttaṃ
tika-vin02t:1469_4: catūsu iriyāpathesu kāyavivekaṃ dīpeti, na ekikā hutvā sayanamattaṃ. Ekabhattanti
tika-vin02t:1469_5: “ekabhattiko hoti rattūparato virato vikālabhojanā”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ vikālabhojanā viratiṃ
tika-vin02t:1469_7: sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ vā. Iṅghāti codanatthe nipāto. Tatthevāti geheyeva. Buddhānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1469_8: sāsanaṃ anuyuñjāti niccasīlauposathasīlaniyamādibhedaṃ pañcaṅgaṃ aṭṭhaṅgaṃ dasaṅgañca
tika-vin02t:1469_9: sīlaṃ tadanurūpañca samādhipaññābhāvanaṃ anuyuñja. Etañhi upāsakena pubbabhāge anuyuñjitabbaṃ
tika-vin02t:1469_10: buddhasāsanaṃ nāma. Tenāha “kālayuttaṃ ekaseyyaṃ ekabhattaṃ brahmacariya”nti.
tika-vin02t:1470_1: yathāvuttakāle vā tuyhaṃ anuyuñjantassa yuttaṃ patirūpaṃ sakkuṇeyyaṃ, na sabbakālaṃ
tika-vin02t:1470_2: sabbanti adhippāyo. Sabbametaṃ ñāṇassa aparipakkattā tassa kāmānaṃ duppahānatāya
tika-vin02t:1470_3: sammā paṭipattiyaṃ yogyaṃ kārāpetuṃ vadati, na pabbajjāchandaṃ nivāretuṃ. Pabbajjābhisaṅkhāroti
tika-vin02t:1470_4: pabbajituṃ ārambho ussāho. Paṭippassambhīti indriyānaṃ aparipakkattā saṃvegassa ca
tika-vin02t:1470_5: nātitikkhabhāvato vūpasami. Kiñcāpi paṭippassambhi, therena vuttavidhiṃ pana anutiṭṭhanto
tika-vin02t:1470_6: kālena kālaṃ theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā payirupāsanto dhammaṃ suṇāti. Tassa vuttanayeneva
tika-vin02t:1470_7: dutiyampi pabbajjāya cittaṃ uppajji, therassa ca ārocesi, dutiyampi thero paṭikkhipi.
tika-vin02t:1470_8: Tatiyavāre pana ñāṇassa paripakkabhāvaṃ ñatvā “idāni naṃ pabbājetuṃ kālo”ti thero
tika-vin02t:1470_9: pabbājesi, pabbajitañca taṃ tīṇi saṃvaccharāni atikkamitvā gaṇaṃ pariyesitvā upasampādesi.
tika-vin02t:1470_10: Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “dutiyampi kho soṇo…pe… upasampādesī”ti.
tika-vin02t:1471_0: Tattha appabhikkhukoti katipayabhikkhuko. Tadā kira bhikkhū yebhuyyena majjhimadeseyeva
tika-vin02t:1471_1: vasiṃsu, tasmā tattha katipayā eva ahesuṃ. Te ca ekasmiṃ gāme eko, ekasmiṃ nigame
tika-vin02t:1471_2: dveti evaṃ visuṃ visuṃ vasiṃsu. Kicchenāti dukkhena. Kasirenāti āyāsena. Tato tatoti
tika-vin02t:1471_3: tasmā tasmā gāmanigamādito. Therena hi katipaye bhikkhū ānetvā aññesu ānīyamānesu
tika-vin02t:1471_4: pubbe ānītā kenacideva karaṇīyena pakkamiṃsu, kañci kālaṃ āgametvā puna tesu ānīyamānesu
tika-vin02t:1471_5: itare pakkamiṃsu. Evaṃ punappunaṃ ānayanena sannipāto cireneva ahosi. Theropi tadā
tika-vin02t:1471_6: ekavihārī ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ “tiṇṇaṃ vassānaṃ…pe… sannipātāpetvā”ti.
tika-vin02t:1472_0: Vassaṃvutthassāti vassaṃ upagantvā vusitavato. Ediso ca ediso cāti evarūpo ca evarūpo
tika-vin02t:1472_1: ca. “Evarūpāya nāma rūpakāyasampattiyā samannāgato, evarūpāya dhammakāyasampattiyā
tika-vin02t:1472_2: samannāgato”ti sutoyeva me so bhagavā. Na ca mayā sammukhā diṭṭhoti ettha pana puthujjanasaddhāya
tika-vin02t:1472_3: eva āyasmā soṇo bhagavantaṃ daṭṭhukāmo ahosi. Aparabhāge pana satthārā saddhiṃ ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1472_4: vasitvā paccūsasamayaṃ ajjhiṭṭho soḷasa aṭṭhakavaggiyāni satthu sammukhā aṭṭhiṃ katvā
tika-vin02t:1472_5: manasi katvā sabbaṃ cetasā samannāharitvā atthadhammapaṭisaṃvedī hutvā bhaṇanto dhammupasañhitapāmojjādimukhena
tika-vin02t:1472_6: samāhito sarabhaññapariyosāne vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā saṅkhāre sammasanto anupubbena
tika-vin02t:1472_7: arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Etadatthameva hissa bhagavatā attanā saddhiṃ ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vāso āṇattoti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:1473_0: Keci panāhu “na ca mayā sammukhā diṭṭhoti idaṃ rūpakāyadassanameva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1473_1: Āyasmā hi soṇo pabbajitvā therassa santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā ghaṭento vāyamanto
tika-vin02t:1473_2: anupasampannova sotāpanno hutvā upasampajjitvā ‘upāsakāpi sotāpannā honti, ahampi
tika-vin02t:1473_3: sotāpanno, kimettha citta’nti uparimaggatthāya vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā antovasseyeva
tika-vin02t:1473_4: chaḷabhiñño hutvā visuddhipavāraṇāya pavāresi. Ariyasaccadassanena bhagavato dhammakāyo
tika-vin02t:1473_5: diṭṭho nāma hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ ‘yo kho, vakkali, dhammaṃ passati, so maṃ passatī’ti.
tika-vin02t:1473_6: Tasmāssa dhammakāyadassanaṃ pageva siddhaṃ, pavāretvā pana rūpakāyaṃ daṭṭhukāmo ahosī”ti.
tika-vin02t:1474_0: Pāsādikantiādipadānaṃ attho aṭṭhakathāyameva vutto. Tattha visūkāyikavipphanditānanti
tika-vin02t:1474_2: samantapāsādikāya attano sarīrappabhāya sampattiyā rūpakāyadassanabyāvaṭassa janassa
tika-vin02t:1474_4: dhammakāyasampattiyā parikkhakajanassa pasādanīyaṃ pasīditabbayuttaṃ pasādakaṃ vā.
tika-vin02t:1474_8: anuppatvā adhigantvā ṭhitaṃ. Dantanti suparisuddhakāyasamācāratāya hatthapādakukkuccābhāvato
tika-vin02t:1474_9: davādiabhāvato ca kāyena dantaṃ. Guttanti suparisuddhavacīsamācāratāya niratthakavācābhāvato
tika-vin02t:1474_10: ravādiabhāvato ca vācāya guttaṃ. Yatindriyanti suparisuddhamanosamācāratāya ariyiddhiyogena
tika-vin02t:1474_11: abyāvaṭaappaṭisaṅkhupekkhābhāvato ca manindriyavasena yatindriyaṃ. Nāganti chandādivasena
tika-vin02t:1474_12: agamanato, pahīnānaṃ rāgādikilesānaṃ apunāgamanato apaccāgamanato kassacipi āgussa
tika-vin02t:1474_13: sabbathāpi akaraṇato, punabbhavassa ca agamanatoti imehi kāraṇehi nāgaṃ. Ettha ca
tika-vin02t:1474_14: “pāsādika”nti iminā rūpakāyena bhagavato pamāṇabhūtataṃ dīpeti, “pasādanīya”nti iminā
tika-vin02t:1474_15: dhammakāyena. “Santindriya”ntiādinā sesehi pamāṇabhūtataṃ dīpeti, tena catuppamāṇike
tika-vin02t:1474_16: lokasannivāse anavasesato sattānaṃ bhagavato pamāṇabhāvo pakāsitoti veditabbo. Ekavihāreti
tika-vin02t:1474_17: ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ. Gandhakuṭi hi idha “vihāro”ti adhippeto. Vatthunti vasituṃ.
tika-vin02t:1475_0: 258. Ajjhokāse vītināmetvāti ajjhokāse nisajjāya vītināmetvā. “Yasmā bhagavā āyasmato
tika-vin02t:1475_1: soṇassa samāpattisamāpajjanena paṭisanthāraṃ karonto sāvakasādhāraṇā sabbā samāpattiyo
tika-vin02t:1475_2: anulomapaṭilomaṃ samāpajjanto bahudeva rattiṃ ajjhokāse nisajjāya vītināmetvā pāde
tika-vin02t:1475_3: pakkhāletvā vihāraṃ pāvisi, tasmā āyasmāpi soṇo bhagavato adhippāyaṃ ñatvā tadanurūpaṃ
tika-vin02t:1475_4: sabbā tā samāpattiyo samāpajjanto bahudeva rattiṃ ajjhokāse nisajjāya vītināmetvā
tika-vin02t:1475_5: pāde pakkhāletvā vihāraṃ pāvisī”ti keci vadanti. Pavisitvā ca bhagavatā anuññāto
tika-vin02t:1475_6: cīvaraṃ tirokaraṇīyaṃ katvāpi bhagavato pādapasse nisajjāya vītināmesi. Ajjhesīti
tika-vin02t:1475_7: āṇāpesi. Paṭibhātu taṃ bhikkhu dhammo bhāsitunti bhikkhu tuyhaṃ dhammo bhāsituṃ upaṭṭhātu
tika-vin02t:1475_8: ñāṇamukhaṃ āgacchatu, yathāsutaṃ yathāpariyattaṃ dhammaṃ bhaṇāhīti attho.
tika-vin02t:1476_0: Sabbāneva aṭṭhakavaggikānīti aṭṭhakavaggabhūtāni kāmasuttādīni soḷasa suttāni. Sarena
tika-vin02t:1476_1: abhāsīti suttussāraṇasarena abhāsi, sarabhaññavasena kathesīti attho. Sarabhaññapariyosāneti
tika-vin02t:1476_2: ussāraṇāvasāne. Suggahitānīti sammā uggahitāni. Sumanasikatānīti suṭṭhu manasi katāni.
tika-vin02t:1476_3: Ekacco uggahaṇakāle sammā uggahetvāpi pacchā sajjhāyādivasena manasikaraṇakāle byañjanāni
tika-vin02t:1476_4: vā micchā ropeti, padapaccābhaṭṭhaṃ vā karoti, na evamayaṃ. Iminā pana sammadeva
tika-vin02t:1476_5: yathuggahitaṃ manasi katāni. Tena vuttaṃ “sumanasikatānīti suṭṭhu manasi katānī”ti.
tika-vin02t:1476_6: Sūpadhāritānīti atthatopi suṭṭhu upadhāritāni. Atthe hi suṭṭhu upadhārite sakkā pāḷi
tika-vin02t:1476_7: sammā ussāretuṃ. Kalyāṇiyāpi vācāya samannāgatoti sithiladhanitādīnaṃ yathāvidhānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1476_8: vacanena parimaṇḍalapadabyañjanāya poriyā vācāya samannāgato. Vissaṭṭhāyāti vimuttāya.
tika-vin02t:1476_9: Etenassa vimuttavāditaṃ dasseti. Anelagalāyāti elaṃ vuccati doso, taṃ na paggharatīti
tika-vin02t:1476_10: anelagalā, tāya niddosāyāti attho. Atha vā anelagalāyāti anelāya ca agalāya ca, niddosāya
tika-vin02t:1476_11: agalitapadabyañjanāya aparihīnapadabyañjanāyāti attho. Tathā hi naṃ bhagavā “etadaggaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1476_12: bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kalyāṇavākkaraṇānaṃ yadidaṃ soṇo kuṭikaṇṇo”ti
tika-vin02t:1476_13: etadagge ṭhapesi. Atthassa viññāpaniyāti yathādhippetaṃ atthaṃ ñāpetuṃ samatthāya.
tika-vin02t:1477_0: Kativassoti so kira majjhimavayassa tatiye koṭṭhāse ṭhito ākappasampanno ca paresaṃ
tika-vin02t:1477_1: ciratarapabbajito viya khāyati. Taṃ sandhāya bhagavā pucchīti keci, taṃ akāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1477_2: Evaṃ santaṃ samādhisukhaṃ anubhavituṃ yutto, ettakaṃ kālaṃ kasmā pamādaṃ āpannosīti
tika-vin02t:1477_3: pana anuyuñjituṃ satthā “kativassosī”ti taṃ pucchi. Tenevāha “kissa pana tvaṃ bhikkhu
tika-vin02t:1477_4: evaṃ ciraṃ akāsī”ti. Tattha kissāti kiṃkāraṇā. Evaṃ ciraṃ akāsīti evaṃ cirāyi, kena
tika-vin02t:1477_5: kāraṇena evaṃ cirakālaṃ pabbajjaṃ anupagantvā agāramajjhe vasīti attho. Ciraṃ diṭṭho
tika-vin02t:1477_6: meti cirena cirakālena mayā diṭṭho. Kāmesūti vatthukāmesu kilesakāmesu ca. Ādīnavoti
tika-vin02t:1477_7: doso. Apicāti kāmesu ādīnave kenaci pakārena diṭṭhepi na tāvāhaṃ gharāvāsato nikkhamituṃ
tika-vin02t:1477_8: asakkhiṃ. Kasmā? Sambādho gharāvāso, uccāvacehi kiccakaraṇīyehi samupabyūḷho agāriyabhāvo.
tika-vin02t:1478_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti kāmesu yathābhūtaṃ ādīnavadassino cittaṃ cirāyitvāpi gharāvāse
tika-vin02t:1478_1: na pakkhandati, aññadatthu padumapalāse udakabindu viya vinivattatiyevāti etamatthaṃ
tika-vin02t:1478_2: sabbākārato viditvā. Imaṃ udānanti pavattiṃ nivattiñca sammadeva jānanto pavattiyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1478_3: taṃnimitte ca na kadācipi ramatīti idamatthadīpakaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
tika-vin02t:1479_0: Tattha disvā ādīnavaṃ loketi sabbasmimpi saṅkhāraloke “anicco dukkho vipariṇāmadhammo”tiādīnavaṃ
tika-vin02t:1479_1: dosaṃ paññācakkhunā passitvā. Etena vipassanācāro kathito. Ñatvā dhammaṃ nirūpadhinti
tika-vin02t:1479_2: sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggattā nirupadhiṃ nibbānadhammaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñatvā, nissaraṇavivekāsaṅkhatāmatasabhāvato
tika-vin02t:1479_3: maggañāṇena paṭivijjhitvā. “Disvā ñatvā”ti imesaṃ padānaṃ “ghataṃ pivitvā balaṃ hoti,
tika-vin02t:1479_4: sīhaṃ disvā bhayaṃ hoti, paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā hontī”tiādīsu viya
tika-vin02t:1479_5: hetuatthatā daṭṭhabbā. Ariyo na ramatī pāpeti kilesehi ārakattā ariyo sappuriso aṇumattepi
tika-vin02t:1479_6: pāpe na ramati. Kasmā? Pāpe na ramatī sucīti suvisuddhakāyasamācārāditāya suci suddhapuggalo
tika-vin02t:1479_7: rājahaṃso viya uccāraṭṭhāne pāpe saṃkiliṭṭhadhamme na ramati nābhinandati. “Pāpo
tika-vin02t:1479_8: na ramatī suci”ntipi pāṭho, tassattho – pāpo puggalo suciṃ anavajjaṃ vodānadhammaṃ
tika-vin02t:1479_9: na ramati, aññadatthu gāmasūkarādayo viya uccāraṭṭhānaṃ asuciṃ saṃkilesadhammaṃyeva
tika-vin02t:1481: 259. Kāḷasīhoti kāḷamukhavānarajāti. Sesamettha pāḷito aṭṭhakathāto ca suviññeyyamevāti.
tika-vin02t:1486: 262. Susukāti samudde bhavā ekā macchajāti. Kumbhīlātipi vadanti. Saṃsaṭṭhanti parissāvitaṃ. Telaparibhogenāti sattāhakālikaparibhogaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1488: 264. Chakaṇanti gomayaṃ. Pākatikacuṇṇaṃ nāma apakkakasāvacuṇṇaṃ. Tena ṭhapetvā gandhacuṇṇaṃ sabbaṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:1489: 265. Suvaṇṇagerukoti suvaṇṇatutthādi. Añjanūpapisananti añjanatthāya upapisitabbaṃ yaṃ kiñci cuṇṇajātaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1490: 268. Sāmaṃ gahetvāti ettha sappadaṭṭhassa atthāya aññena bhikkhunā gahitampi sāmaṃ gahitasaṅkhameva gacchatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1491_0: 269. Gharadinnakābādho nāma vasīkaraṇatthāya gharaṇiyā dinnabhesajjasamuṭṭhito ābādho.
tika-vin02t:1491_2: vattamāno adhippeto. “Akaṭayūsenāti anabhisaṅkhatena muggayūsena. Kaṭākaṭenāti mugge
tika-vin02t:1491_3: pacitvā acāletvāva parissāvitena muggasūpenā”ti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1495_0: 276. Appamattakepi pavārentīti appamattakepi gahite pavārenti, “bahumhi gahite aññesaṃ
tika-vin02t:1495_1: nappahotī”ti maññamānā appamattakaṃ gahetvā pavārentīti adhippāyo. Paṭisaṅkhāpi paṭikkhipantīti
tika-vin02t:1497: 280. Ubhatopasannāti ubhayato pasannā. Māghātoti “mā ghātetha pāṇino”ti evaṃ māghātaghositadivaso.
tika-vin02t:1499_0: 282. Madhugoḷakanti sakkarādisaṃyuttapūvaṃ. Āyuṃ detīti āyudānaṃ deti. Vaṇṇanti sarīravaṇṇaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1499_1: Sukhanti kāyikacetasikasukhaṃ. Balanti sarīrathāmaṃ. Paṭibhānanti yuttamuttapaṭibhānaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1499_2: Vātaṃ anulometīti vātaṃ anulometvā harati. Vatthiṃ sodhetīti dhamaniyo suddhaṃ karoti.
tika-vin02t:1499_3: Āmāvasesaṃ pācetīti sace āmāvasesakaṃ hoti, taṃ pāceti. Anuppavecchatīti deti. Vātañca
tika-vin02t:1500_0: 283. Nanu ca “paramparabhojanena kāretabbo”ti kasmā vuttaṃ. Paramparabhojanañhi pañcannaṃ
tika-vin02t:1500_1: bhojanānaṃ aññatarena nimantitassa taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññataraṃ
tika-vin02t:1500_2: bhuñjantassa hoti, ime ca bhikkhū bhojjayāguṃ paribhuñjiṃsu, pañcasu bhojanesu aññataranti
tika-vin02t:1500_3: āha “bhojjayāguyā hi pavāraṇā hotī”ti. Yasmā pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññataraṃ paṭikkhipantassa
tika-vin02t:1500_4: vuttā pavāraṇā bhojjayāguṃ paṭikkhipantassapi hotiyeva, tasmā bhojjayāgupi odanagatikāyevāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:1503_0: 285. Pāṭaligāmoti evaṃnāmako magadharaṭṭhe eko gāmo. Tassa kira gāmassa māpanadivase
tika-vin02t:1503_1: gāmaṅgaṇaṭṭhāne dve tayo pāṭalaṅkurā pathavito ubbhijjitvā nikkhamiṃsu. Tena taṃ
tika-vin02t:1503_2: “pāṭaligāmo” tveva vohariṃsu. Tadavasarīti taṃ pāṭaligāmaṃ avasari anupāpuṇi. Pāṭaligāmikāti
tika-vin02t:1503_3: pāṭaligāmavāsino. Upāsakāti te kira bhagavato paṭhamadassanena keci saraṇesu ca sīlesu
tika-vin02t:1503_4: ca patiṭṭhitā. Tena vuttaṃ “upāsakā”ti. Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsūti pāṭaligāme
tika-vin02t:1503_5: kira ajātasattuno licchavirājūnañca manussā kālena kālaṃ gantvā gehasāmike gehato
tika-vin02t:1503_6: nīharitvā māsampi aḍḍhamāsampi vasanti. Tena pāṭaligāmavāsino manussā niccupaddutā
tika-vin02t:1503_7: “etesañceva āgatakāle vasanaṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatīti ekapasse issarānaṃ bhaṇḍapaṭisāmanaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1503_8: ekapasse vasanaṭṭhānaṃ, ekapasse āgantukānaṃ addhikamanussānaṃ, ekapasse daliddānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1503_9: kapaṇamanussānaṃ, ekapasse gilānānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatī”ti sabbesaṃ aññamaññaṃ
tika-vin02t:1503_10: aghaṭṭetvā vasanappahonakaṃ nagaramajjhe mahatiṃ sālaṃ kāresuṃ, tassa nāmaṃ āvasathāgāranti.
tika-vin02t:1503_11: Āgantvā vasanti ettha āgantukāti āvasatho, tadeva āgāraṃ āvasathāgāraṃ.
tika-vin02t:1504_0: Taṃ divasañca taṃ niṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi. Te tattha gantvā iṭṭhakakammasudhākammacittakammādivasena
tika-vin02t:1504_1: supariniṭṭhitaṃ susajjitaṃ devavimānasadisaṃ dvārakoṭṭhakato paṭṭhāya oloketvā “idaṃ
tika-vin02t:1504_2: āvasathāgāraṃ ativiya manoramaṃ sassirikaṃ, kena nu kho paṭhamaṃ paribhuttaṃ amhākaṃ
tika-vin02t:1504_3: dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya assā”ti cintesuṃ, tasmiṃyeva ca khaṇe “bhagavā taṃ gāmaṃ
tika-vin02t:1504_4: anuppatto”ti assosuṃ, tena te uppannapītisomanassā “amhehi bhagavā gantvāpi ānetabbo
tika-vin02t:1504_5: siyā, so sayameva amhākaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ sampatto, ajja mayaṃ bhagavantaṃ idha vasāpetvā
tika-vin02t:1504_6: paṭhamaṃ paribhuñjāpessāma, tathā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ, bhikkhusaṅghe āgate tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ
tika-vin02t:1504_7: āgatameva bhavissati, satthāraṃ maṅgalaṃ vadāpessāma, dhammaṃ kathāpessāma, iti tīhi
tika-vin02t:1504_8: ratanehi paribhutte pacchā amhākaṃ paresañca paribhogo bhavissati, evaṃ no dīgharattaṃ
tika-vin02t:1504_9: hitāya sukhāya bhavissatī”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā etadatthameva bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1504_10: Tasmā evamāhaṃsu “adhivāsetu no, bhante, bhagavā āvasathāgāra”nti. Tenupasaṅkamiṃsūti
tika-vin02t:1504_11: kiñcāpi taṃ divasameva pariniṭṭhitattā devavimānaṃ viya susajjitaṃ supaṭijaggitaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1504_12: buddhārahaṃ pana katvā na paññattaṃ. Buddhā hi nāma araññajjhāsayā araññārāmā, antogāme
tika-vin02t:1504_13: vaseyyuṃ vā no vā, tasmā bhagavato ruciṃ jānitvāva paññapessāmāti cintetvā te bhagavantaṃ
tika-vin02t:1504_14: upasaṅkamiṃsu, idāni bhagavato ruciṃ jānitvā tathā paññāpetukāmā yenāvasathāgāraṃ
tika-vin02t:1504_15: tenupasaṅkamiṃsu. Sabbasanthariṃ āvasathāgāraṃ santharitvāti ettha santharaṇaṃ santhari,
tika-vin02t:1504_16: sabbo sakalo santhari etthāti sabbasanthari. Atha vā santhatanti santhari, sabbaṃ
tika-vin02t:1504_17: santhari sabbasanthari, taṃ sabbasanthariṃ. Bhāvanapuṃsakaniddesovāyaṃ, yathā sabbameva
tika-vin02t:1504_18: santhataṃ hoti, evaṃ santharitvāti attho. Sabbapaṭhamaṃ tāva “gomayaṃ nāma sabbamaṅgalesu
tika-vin02t:1504_19: vaṭṭatī”ti sudhāparikammakatampi bhūmiṃ allagomayena opuñjāpetvā parisukkhabhāvaṃ
tika-vin02t:1504_20: ñatvā yathā akkantaṭṭhāne padaṃ paññāyati, evaṃ cātujjātiyagandhehi limpetvā upari
tika-vin02t:1504_21: nānāvaṇṇakaṭasārake santharitvā tesaṃ upari mahāpiṭṭhikakojave ādiṃ katvā hatthattharaṇādīhi
tika-vin02t:1504_22: nānāvaṇṇehi attharaṇehi santharitabbayuttakaṃ sabbokāsaṃ santharāpesuṃ. Tena vuttaṃ
tika-vin02t:1505_0: Āsanānīti majjhaṭṭhāne tāva maṅgalatthambhaṃ nissāya mahārahaṃ buddhāsanaṃ paññapetvā
tika-vin02t:1505_1: tattha yaṃ yaṃ mudukañca manoramañca paccattharaṇaṃ, taṃ taṃ attharitvā ubhatolohitakaṃ
tika-vin02t:1505_2: manuññadassanaṃ upadhānaṃ upadahitvā upari suvaṇṇarajatatārakavicittavitānaṃ bandhitvā
tika-vin02t:1505_3: gandhadāmapupphadāmapattādāmādīhi alaṅkaritvā samantā dvādasahatthe ṭhāne pupphajālaṃ
tika-vin02t:1505_4: kāretvā tiṃsahatthamattaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭasāṇiyā parikkhipāpetvā pacchimabhittiṃ nissāya
tika-vin02t:1505_6: paccattharāpetvā sālāya pācīnapassaṃ attano nisajjāyoggaṃ kāresuṃ. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ
tika-vin02t:1506_0: Udakamaṇikanti mahākucchikaṃ samekhalaṃ udakacāṭiṃ. Evaṃ bhagavā bhikkhusaṅgho ca
tika-vin02t:1506_1: yathāruciyā hatthapāde dhovissanti, mukhaṃ vikkhālessantīti tesu tesu ṭhānesu maṇivaṇṇassa
tika-vin02t:1506_2: udakassa pūretvā vāsatthāya nānāpupphāni ceva udakavāsacuṇṇāni ca pakkhipitvā kadalipaṇṇehi
tika-vin02t:1507_1: hatthe ṭhapitasuvaṇṇarajatādimayakapallikāsu ca telapadīpe jalayitvā. Yena bhagavā
tika-vin02t:1507_2: tenupasaṅkamiṃsūti ettha pana te pāṭaligāmikaupāsakā na kevalaṃ āvasathāgārameva,
tika-vin02t:1507_3: atha kho sakalasmimpi gāme vīthiyo sajjāpetvā dhaje ussāpetvā gehadvāresu puṇṇaghaṭe
tika-vin02t:1507_4: ca kadaliādayo ca ṭhapāpetvā sakalagāmaṃ dīpamālāhi vippakiṇṇatārakaṃ viya katvā
tika-vin02t:1507_5: “khīrapake dārake khīraṃ pāyetha, daharakumāre lahuṃ lahuṃ bhojetvā sayāpetha, uccāsaddaṃ
tika-vin02t:1507_6: mā karittha, ajja ekarattiṃ satthā antogāme vasissati, buddhā nāma appasaddakāmā
tika-vin02t:1507_7: hontī”ti bheriṃ carāpetvā sayaṃ daṇḍadīpikā ādāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1508_0: Atha kho bhagavā nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena yena āvasathāgāraṃ
tika-vin02t:1508_1: tenupasaṅkamīti “yassa dāni, bhante, bhagavā kālaṃ maññatī”ti evaṃ kira tehi kāle
tika-vin02t:1508_2: ārocite bhagavā lākhārasena tintarattakoviḷārapupphavaṇṇaṃ surattaṃ dupaṭṭaṃ kattariyā
tika-vin02t:1508_3: padumaṃ kantento viya, saṃvidhāya timaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādento nivāsetvā suvaṇṇapāmaṅgena
tika-vin02t:1508_4: padumakalāpaṃ parikkhipanto viya, vijjulatāsassirikaṃ kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā rattakambalena
tika-vin02t:1508_5: gajakumbhaṃ pariyonandhanto viya, ratanasatubbedhe suvaṇṇagghike pavāḷajālaṃ khipamāno
tika-vin02t:1508_6: viya, mahati suvaṇṇacetiye rattakambalakañcukaṃ paṭimuñcanto viya, gacchantaṃ puṇṇacandaṃ
tika-vin02t:1508_7: rattavalāhakena paṭicchādayamāno viya, kañcanagirimatthake supakkalākhārasaṃ parisiñcanto
tika-vin02t:1508_8: viya, cittakūṭapabbatamatthakaṃ vijjulatājālena parikkhipanto viya ca sacakkavāḷasineruyugandharamahāpathaviṃ
tika-vin02t:1508_10: kesarasīho viya, udayapabbatakūṭato puṇṇacando viya, bālasūriyo viya ca attanā nisinnatarusaṇḍato nikkhami.
tika-vin02t:1509_0: Athassa kāyato meghamukhato vijjukalāpā viya rasmiyo nikkhamitvā suvaṇṇarasadhārāparisekapiñjarapattapupphaphalasākhāviṭape
tika-vin02t:1509_1: viya samantato rukkhe kariṃsu. Tāvadeva attano attano pattacīvaramādāya mahābhikkhusaṅgho
tika-vin02t:1509_2: bhagavantaṃ parivāresi. Te ca naṃ parivāretvā ṭhitabhikkhū evarūpā ahesuṃ appicchā
tika-vin02t:1509_3: santuṭṭhā pavivittā asaṃsaṭṭhā āraddhavīriyā vattāro vacanakkhamā codakā pāpagarahino
tika-vin02t:1509_5: Tehi parivārito bhagavā rattakambalaparikkhitto viya suvaṇṇakkhandho, rattapadumasaṇḍamajjhagatā
tika-vin02t:1509_6: viya suvaṇṇanāvā, pavāḷavedikāparikkhitto viya suvaṇṇapāsādo virocittha. Mahākassapappamukhā
tika-vin02t:1509_7: pana mahātherā meghavaṇṇaṃ paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ pārupitvā maṇivammavammitā viya mahānāgā
tika-vin02t:1509_8: parivārayiṃsu vītarāgā bhinnakilesā vijaṭitajaṭā chinnabandhanā kule vā gaṇe vā alaggā.
tika-vin02t:1510_0: Iti bhagavā sayaṃ vītarāgo vītarāgehi, vītadoso vītadosehi, vītamoho vītamohehi,
tika-vin02t:1510_1: nittaṇho nittaṇhehi, nikkileso nikkilesehi, sayaṃ buddho anubuddhehi parivārito pattaparivāritaṃ
tika-vin02t:1510_2: viya kesaraṃ, kesaraparivāritā viya kaṇṇikā, aṭṭhanāgasahassaparivārito viya chaddanto
tika-vin02t:1510_3: nāgarājā, navutihaṃsasahassaparivārito viya dhataraṭṭho haṃsarājā, senaṅgaparivārito
tika-vin02t:1510_4: viya cakkavattī, marugaṇaparivārito viya sakko devarājā, brahmagaṇaparivārito viya
tika-vin02t:1510_5: hāritamahābrahmā, tārāgaṇaparivuto viya puṇṇacando asamena buddhavesena aparimāṇena
