tika-vin02t:1511_0: Athassa puratthimakāyato suvaṇṇavaṇṇā ghanabuddharasmiyo uṭṭhahitvā asītihatthaṃ
tika-vin02t:1511_1: ṭhānaṃ aggahesuṃ, pacchimakāyato dakkhiṇapassato vāmapassato suvaṇṇavaṇṇā ghanarasmiyo
tika-vin02t:1511_2: uṭṭhahitvā asītihatthaṃ ṭhānaṃ aggahesuṃ, uparikesantato paṭṭhāya sabbakesāvattehi
tika-vin02t:1511_3: moragīvavaṇṇā ghanabuddharasmiyo uṭṭhahitvā gaganatale asītihatthaṃ ṭhānaṃ aggahesuṃ,
tika-vin02t:1511_4: heṭṭhāpādatalehi pavāḷavaṇṇā rasmiyo uṭṭhahitvā ghanapathaviyaṃ asītihatthaṃ ṭhānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1511_5: aggahesuṃ, dantato akkhīnaṃ setaṭṭhānato, nakhānañca maṃsavinimuttaṭṭhānato odātā
tika-vin02t:1511_6: ghanabuddharasmiyo uṭṭhahitvā asītihatthaṃ ṭhānaṃ aggahesuṃ, rattapītavaṇṇānaṃ sambhinnaṭṭhānato
tika-vin02t:1511_7: mañjiṭṭhavaṇṇā rasmiyo uṭṭhahitvā asītihatthaṃ ṭhānaṃ aggahesuṃ, sabbatthakameva
tika-vin02t:1511_8: pabhassarā rasmiyo uṭṭhahiṃsu. Evaṃ samantā asītihatthamattaṃ ṭhānaṃ chabbaṇṇā buddharasmiyo
tika-vin02t:1511_9: vijjotamānā vipphandamānā vidhāvamānā kañcanadaṇḍadīpikāhi niccharitvā ākāsaṃ pakkhandamānā
tika-vin02t:1511_10: mahāpadīpajālā viya, cātuddīpikamahāmeghato nikkhantavijjulatā viya ca disodisaṃ
tika-vin02t:1511_11: pakkhandiṃsu. Yāhi sabbadisābhāgā suvaṇṇacampakapupphehi vikiriyamānā viya, suvaṇṇaghaṭato
tika-vin02t:1512_2: vikasitaṃ viya padumavanaṃ, sabbapāliphullo viya yojanasatiko pāricchattako, paṭipāṭiyā
tika-vin02t:1512_4: dvattiṃsamahābrahmānaṃ siriyā siriṃ abhibhavamānaṃ viya virocittha, yathā taṃ dasahi
tika-vin02t:1512_5: pāramīhi dasahi upapāramīhi dasahi paramatthapāramīhīti sammadeva paripūritāhi samatiṃsāya
tika-vin02t:1512_6: pāramīhi alaṅkataṃ kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni dinnena dānena rakkhitena
tika-vin02t:1512_7: sīlena katena kalyāṇakammena ekasmiṃ attabhāve samosaritvā vipākaṃ dātuṃ okāsaṃ alabhamānena
tika-vin02t:1512_8: sambādhappattena viya nibbattitaṃ nāvāsahassassa bhaṇḍaṃ ekaṃ nāvaṃ āropanakālo viya,
tika-vin02t:1512_9: sakaṭasahassassa bhaṇḍaṃ ekaṃ sakaṭaṃ āropanakālo viya, pañcavīsatiyā gaṅgānaṃ sambhijja
tika-vin02t:1512_10: mukhadvāre ekato rāsībhūtakālo viya ca ahosi.
tika-vin02t:1513_0: Imāya buddharasmiyā obhāsamānassapi bhagavato purato anekāni daṇḍadīpikāsahassāni
tika-vin02t:1513_4: thutighosā ca sabbā disā pūrayamānā mukharā viya akaṃsu. Devasupaṇṇanāgayakkhagandhabbamanussānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1513_5: akkhīni amatapānaṃ viya labhiṃsu. Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne ṭhatvā padasahassehi gamanavaṇṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:1521: Unnatañca samaṃ hoti, pathavī ca acetanā.
tika-vin02t:1525: Aghaṭṭayanto niyyāti, ubho jāṇū ca gopphake.
tika-vin02t:1529: Na pekkhamāno so yāti, yugamattañhi pekkhati.
tika-vin02t:1534_0: Vaṇṇakālo nāma kiresa. Evaṃvidhesu kālesu bhagavato sarīravaṇṇe vā guṇavaṇṇe vā dhammakathikassa
tika-vin02t:1534_1: thāmoyeva pamāṇaṃ. Cuṇṇiyapadehi gāthābandhehi vā yattakaṃ sakkoti, tattakaṃ vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1534_2: “dukkathita”nti vā “atitthena pakkhando”ti vā na vattabbo. Aparimāṇavaṇṇā hi buddhā
tika-vin02t:1534_3: bhagavanto, tesaṃ buddhāpi anavasesato vaṇṇaṃ vattuṃ asamatthā. Sakalampi hi kappaṃ
tika-vin02t:1534_4: vadantā pariyosāpetuṃ na sakkonti, pageva itarā pajāti. Iminā sirivilāsena alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ
tika-vin02t:1534_5: pāṭaligāmaṃ pavisitvā bhagavā pasannacittena janena pupphagandhadhūmavāsacuṇṇādīhi
tika-vin02t:1534_6: pūjiyamāno āvasathāgāraṃ pāvisi. Tena vuttaṃ “atha kho bhagavā nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya
tika-vin02t:1535_0: Pāde pakkhāletvāti yadipi bhagavato pāde rajojallaṃ na upalimpati, tesaṃ pana upāsakānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1535_1: kusalābhivuddhiṃ ākaṅkhanto paresaṃ diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjanatthaṃ bhagavā pāde pakkhālesi.
tika-vin02t:1535_2: Apica upādinnakasarīraṃ nāma sītikātabbampi hotīti tadatthampi bhagavā nahānapādadhovanāni
tika-vin02t:1535_3: karotiyeva. Bhagavantaṃyeva purakkhatvāti bhagavantaṃ purato katvā. Tattha bhagavā
tika-vin02t:1535_4: bhikkhūnañceva upāsakānañca majjhe nisinno gandhodakena nahāpetvā dukūlacumbaṭena
tika-vin02t:1535_5: vodakaṃ katvā jātihiṅgulakena majjitvā rattakambalapaliveṭhite pīṭhe ṭhapitā rattasuvaṇṇaghanapaṭimā
tika-vin02t:1535_6: viya ativiya virocittha. Ayaṃ panettha porāṇānaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanamaggo –
tika-vin02t:1548_0: Pāṭaligāmike upāsake āmantesīti yasmā tesu upāsakesu bahū janā sīle patiṭṭhitā, tasmā
tika-vin02t:1548_1: paṭhamaṃ tāva sīlavipattiyā ādīnavaṃ pakāsetvā pacchā sīlasampadāya ānisaṃsaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-vin02t:1548_2: “pañcime gahapatayo”tiādinā dhammadesanatthaṃ āmantesi. Tattha dussīloti nissīlo.
tika-vin02t:1548_3: Abhāvattho hettha du-saddo “duppañño”tiādīsu viya. Sīlavipannoti vipannasīlo bhinnasaṃvaro.
tika-vin02t:1548_4: Ettha ca “dussīlo”ti padena puggalassa sīlābhāvo vutto. So panassa sīlābhāvo duvidho
tika-vin02t:1548_5: asamādānena vā samādinnassa bhedena vāti. Tesu purimo na tathā sāvajjo, yathā dutiyo
tika-vin02t:1548_6: sāvajjataro. Yathādhippetādīnavanimittaṃ sīlābhāvaṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya dassetuṃ
tika-vin02t:1548_7: “sīlavipanno”ti vuttaṃ, tena “dussīlo”ti padassa atthaṃ dasseti. Pamādādhikaraṇanti
tika-vin02t:1548_8: pamādakāraṇā. Idañca suttaṃ gahaṭṭhānaṃ vasena āgataṃ, pabbajitānampi pana labbhateva.
tika-vin02t:1548_9: Gahaṭṭho hi yena yena sippaṭṭhānena jīvikaṃ kappeti yadi kasiyā yadi vaṇijjāya yadi
tika-vin02t:1548_10: gorakkhena. Pāṇātipātādivasena pamatto taṃ taṃ yathākālaṃ sampādetuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-vin02t:1548_11: athassa kammaṃ vinassati. Māghātakāle pāṇātipātaṃ pana adinnādānādīni ca karonto
tika-vin02t:1548_12: daṇḍavasena mahatiṃ bhogajāniṃ nigacchati. Pabbajito dussīlo pamādakāraṇā sīlato
tika-vin02t:1548_13: buddhavacanato jhānato sattaariyadhanato ca jāniṃ nigacchati.
tika-vin02t:1549_0: Pāpako kittisaddoti gahaṭṭhassa “asuko asukakule jāto dussīlo pāpadhammo pariccattaidhalokaparaloko
tika-vin02t:1549_1: salākabhattamattampi na detī”ti catuparisamajjhe pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati.
tika-vin02t:1549_2: Pabbajitassa “asuko nāma satthusāsane pabbajitvā nāsakkhi sīlāni rakkhituṃ, na buddhavacanaṃ
tika-vin02t:1549_3: uggahetuṃ, vejjakammādīhi jīvati, chahi agāravehi samannāgato”ti evaṃ pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati.
tika-vin02t:1550_0: Avisāradoti gahaṭṭho tāva “avassaṃ bahūnaṃ sannipātaṭṭhāne koci mama kammaṃ jānissati,
tika-vin02t:1550_1: atha maṃ niggaṇhissantī”ti vā, “rājakulassa vā dassantī”ti sabhayo upasaṅkamati,
tika-vin02t:1550_2: maṅkubhūto pattakkhandho adhomukho nisīdati, visārado hutvā kathetuṃ na sakkoti.
tika-vin02t:1550_3: Pabbajitopi “bahū bhikkhū sannipatitā, avassaṃ koci mama kammaṃ jānissati, atha me
tika-vin02t:1550_4: uposathampi pavāraṇampi ṭhapetvā sāmaññato cāvetvā nikkaḍḍhissantī”ti sabhayo upasaṅkamati,
tika-vin02t:1550_5: visārado hutvā kathetuṃ na sakkoti. Ekacco pana dussīlopi samāno dappito viya vadati,
tika-vin02t:1551_0: Sammūḷho kālaṃ karotīti dussīlassa hi maraṇamañce nipannassa dussīlyakammānaṃ samādāya
tika-vin02t:1551_1: vattitaṭṭhānāni āpāthamāgacchanti. So ummīletvā attano puttadārādidassanavasena idhalokaṃ
tika-vin02t:1551_2: passati, nimīletvā gatinimittupaṭṭhānavasena paralokaṃ passati, tassa cattāro apāyā
tika-vin02t:1551_3: kammānurūpaṃ upaṭṭhahanti. Sattisatena pahariyamāno viya aggijālāya āliṅgiyamāno
tika-vin02t:1551_4: viya ca hoti. So “vāretha vārethā”ti viravantova marati. Tena vuttaṃ “sammūḷho kālaṃ karotī”ti.
tika-vin02t:1552_0: Kāyassa bhedāti upādinnakakkhandhapariccāgā. Paraṃ maraṇāti tadanantaraṃ abhinibbattakkhandhaggahaṇe.
tika-vin02t:1552_1: Atha vā kāyassa bhedāti jīvitindriyassa upacchedā. Paraṃ maraṇāti cutito uddhaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1552_2: Apāyantiādi sabbaṃ nirayavevacanaṃ. Nirayo hi saggamokkhahetubhūtā puññasaṅkhātā
tika-vin02t:1552_3: ayā apetattā, sukhānaṃ vā āyassa āgamanassa abhāvā apāyo. Dukkhassa gati paṭisaraṇanti
tika-vin02t:1552_4: duggati, dosabahulatāya vā duṭṭhena kammunā nibbattā gatīti duggati. Vivasā nipatanti
tika-vin02t:1552_5: ettha dukkaṭakārinoti vinipāto, vinassantā vā ettha nipatanti saṃbhijjamānaṅgapaccaṅgāti
tika-vin02t:1552_6: vinipāto. Natthi ettha assādasaññito ayoti nirayo.
tika-vin02t:1553_0: Atha vā apāyaggahaṇena tiracchānayoniṃ dīpeti. Tiracchānayoni hi apāyo sugatito apetattā,
tika-vin02t:1553_1: na duggati mahesakkhānaṃ nāgarājādīnaṃ sambhavato. Duggatiggahaṇena pettivisayaṃ
tika-vin02t:1553_2: dīpeti. So hi apāyo ceva duggati ca sugatito apetattā dukkhassa ca gatibhūtattā,
tika-vin02t:1553_3: na tu vinipāto asurasadisaṃ avinipatitattā. Petamahiddhikānaṃ vimānānipi nibbattanti.
tika-vin02t:1553_4: Vinipātaggahaṇena asurakāyaṃ dīpeti. So hi yathāvuttenatthena apāyo ceva duggati
tika-vin02t:1553_5: ca sabbasampattisamussayehi vinipātattā vinipātoti ca vuccati. Nirayaggahaṇena pana
tika-vin02t:1553_6: avīciādikaṃ anekappakāraṃ nirayameva dīpeti. Upapajjatīti nibbattati.
tika-vin02t:1554_0: Ānisaṃsakathā vuttavipariyāyena veditabbā. Ayaṃ pana viseso – sīlavāti samādānavasena
tika-vin02t:1554_1: sīlavā. Sīlasampannoti parisuddhaṃ paripuṇṇañca katvā sīlassa sampādanena sīlasampanno.
tika-vin02t:1554_2: Bhogakkhandhanti bhogarāsiṃ. Sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokanti ettha sugatiggahaṇena manussagatipi
tika-vin02t:1554_3: saṅgayhati, saggaggahaṇena devagati eva. Tattha sundarā gatīti sugati, rūpādīhi visayehi
tika-vin02t:1554_4: suṭṭhu aggoti saggo, so sabbopi lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena lokoti.
tika-vin02t:1555_0: Pāṭaligāmike upāsake bahudeva rattiṃ dhammiyā kathāyāti aññāyapi pāḷimuttāya dhammakathāya
tika-vin02t:1555_1: ceva āvasathānumodanakathāya ca. Tadā hi bhagavā yasmā ajātasattunā tattha pāṭaliputtanagaraṃ
tika-vin02t:1555_2: māpentena aññāsu gāmanigamarājadhānīsu ye sīlācārasampannā kuṭumbikā, te ānetvā dhanadhaññāni
tika-vin02t:1555_3: gharavatthukhettavatthādīni ceva parihārañca dāpetvā nivesiyanti, tasmā pāṭaligāmikā
tika-vin02t:1555_4: upāsakā ānisaṃsadassāvitāya visesato sīlagarukāti sabbaguṇānañca sīlassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato
tika-vin02t:1555_5: tesaṃ paṭhamaṃ sīlānisaṃse pakāsetvā tato paraṃ ākāsagaṅgaṃ otārento viya pathavojaṃ
tika-vin02t:1555_6: ākaḍḍhanto viya mahājambuṃ matthake gahetvā cālento viya yojanappamāṇaṃ mahāmadhuṃ
tika-vin02t:1555_7: cakkayantena pīḷetvā sumadhurarasaṃ pāyamāno viya ca pāṭaligāmikānaṃ upāsakānaṃ hitasukhāvahaṃ
tika-vin02t:1555_8: pakiṇṇakakathaṃ kathentopi “āvāsadānaṃ nāmetaṃ gahapatayo mahantaṃ puññaṃ, tumhākaṃ
tika-vin02t:1555_9: āvāso mayā paribhutto, bhikkhusaṅghena paribhutto, mayā ca bhikkhusaṅghena ca paribhutte
tika-vin02t:1555_10: dhammaratanenapi paribhuttoyeva hoti, evaṃ tīhi ratanehi paribhutte aparimeyyova
tika-vin02t:1555_11: vipāko, apica āvāsadānasmiṃ dinne sabbadānaṃ dinnameva hoti, bhūmaṭṭhakapaṇṇasālāya
tika-vin02t:1555_12: vā sākhāmaṇḍapassa vā saṅghaṃ uddissa katassa ānisaṃso paricchindituṃ na sakkā. Āvāsadānānubhāvena
tika-vin02t:1555_13: hi bhave nibbattamānassapi sampīḷitagabbhavāso nāma na hoti, dvādasahattho ovarako
tika-vin02t:1555_14: viyassa mātukucchi asambādhova hotī”ti evaṃ nānānayavicittaṃ bahuṃ dhammakathaṃ kathetvā –
tika-vin02t:1557: Sarīsape ca makase, sisire cāpi vuṭṭhiyo.
tika-vin02t:1561: Tasmā hi paṇḍito poso, sampassaṃ atthamattano.
tika-vin02t:1566: Yaṃ so dhammaṃ idhaññāya, parinibbāti anāsavo”ti. –
tika-vin02t:1567_0: Evaṃ ayampi āvāsadāne ānisaṃso ayampi āvāsadāne ānisaṃsoti bahudeva rattiṃ atirekadiyaḍḍhayāmaṃ
tika-vin02t:1567_1: āvāsadānānisaṃsaṃ kathesi. Tattha imā gāthāva saṅgahaṃ āruḷhā, pakiṇṇakadhammadesanā
tika-vin02t:1567_2: pana saṅgahaṃ na ārohati. Sandassetvātiādīni vuttatthāneva.
tika-vin02t:1568_0: Abhikkantāti atikkantā dve yāmā gatā. Yassadāni tumhe kālaṃ maññathāti yassa gamanassa
tika-vin02t:1568_1: tumhe kālaṃ maññatha, gamanakālo tumhākaṃ, gacchathāti vuttaṃ hoti. Kasmā pana bhagavā
tika-vin02t:1568_2: te uyyojesīti? Anukampāya. Tiyāmarattiñhi nisīditvā vītināmentānaṃ tesaṃ sarīre ābādho
tika-vin02t:1568_3: uppajjeyya, bhikkhusaṅghopi ca mahā, tassa sayananisajjānaṃ okāsaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin02t:1569_0: Suññāgāranti pāṭiyekkaṃ suññāgāraṃ nāma tattha natthi. Te kira gahapatayo tasseva
tika-vin02t:1569_1: āvasathāgārassa ekapasse paṭasāṇiṃ parikkhipāpetvā kappiyamañcaṃ paññapetvā tattha
tika-vin02t:1569_3: vitānaṃ bandhitvā gandhatelapadīpaṃ āropayiṃsu “appeva nāma satthā dhammāsanato vuṭṭhāya
tika-vin02t:1569_4: thokaṃ vissametukāmo idha nipajjeyya, evaṃ no idaṃ āvasathāgāraṃ bhagavatā catūhi
tika-vin02t:1569_5: iriyāpathehi paribhuttaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissatī”ti. Satthāpi tadeva
tika-vin02t:1569_6: sandhāya tattha saṅghāṭiṃ paññapetvā sīhaseyyaṃ kappesi. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “suññāgāraṃ
tika-vin02t:1569_7: pāvisī”ti. Tattha pādadhovanaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya yāva dhammāsanā agamāsi, ettake ṭhāne
tika-vin02t:1569_8: gamanaṃ nipphannaṃ. Dhammāsanaṃ patvā thokaṃ aṭṭhāsi, idaṃ tattha ṭhānaṃ. Dve yāme
tika-vin02t:1569_9: dhammāsane nisīdi, ettake ṭhāne nisajjā nipphannā. Upāsake uyyojetvā dhammāsanato
tika-vin02t:1569_10: oruyha yathāvutte ṭhāne sīhaseyyaṃ kappesi. Etaṃ ṭhānaṃ bhagavatā catūhi iriyāpathehi
tika-vin02t:1572_0: 286. Sunidhavassakārāti sunidho ca vassakāro ca dve brāhmaṇā. Magadhamahāmattāti
tika-vin02t:1572_1: magadharañño mahāamaccā, magadharaṭṭhe vā mahāmattā, mahatiyā issariyamattāya samannāgatāti
tika-vin02t:1572_2: magadhamahāmattā. Pāṭaligāme nagaraṃ māpentīti pāṭaligāmantasaṅkhāte bhūmippadese
tika-vin02t:1572_3: nagaraṃ māpenti, pubbe “pāṭaligāmo”ti laddhanāmaṃ ṭhānaṃ idāni nagaraṃ katvā māpentīti
tika-vin02t:1572_4: attho. Vajjīnaṃ paṭibāhāyāti licchavirājūnaṃ āyamukhapacchindanatthaṃ. Vatthūnīti
tika-vin02t:1572_5: gharavatthūni gharapatiṭṭhāpanaṭṭhānāni. Cittāni namanti nivesanāni māpetunti rañño
tika-vin02t:1572_6: rājamahāmattānañca nivesanāni māpetuṃ vatthuvijjāpāṭhakānaṃ cittāni namanti. Te kira
tika-vin02t:1572_7: attano sippānubhāvena heṭṭhāpathaviyaṃ tiṃsahatthamatte ṭhāne “idha nāgānaṃ nivāsapariggaho,
tika-vin02t:1572_8: idha yakkhānaṃ, idha bhūtānaṃ nivāsapariggaho, idha pāsāṇo vā khāṇuko vā atthī”ti
tika-vin02t:1572_9: jānanti, te tadā sippaṃ jappitvā tādisaṃ sārambhaṭṭhānaṃ pariharitvā anārambhe ṭhāne
tika-vin02t:1572_10: tāhi vatthupariggāhikāhi devatāhi saddhiṃ mantayamānā viya taṃtaṃgehāni māpenti.
tika-vin02t:1573_0: Atha vā nesaṃ sarīre devatā adhimuccitvā tattha tattha nivesanāni māpetuṃ cittaṃ
tika-vin02t:1573_1: nāmenti. Tā catūsu koṇesu khāṇuke koṭṭetvā vatthumhi gahitamatte paṭivigacchanti.
tika-vin02t:1573_2: Saddhānaṃ kulānaṃ saddhā devatā tathā karonti, assaddhānaṃ kulānaṃ assaddhā devatā
tika-vin02t:1573_3: ca. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Saddhānañhi evaṃ hoti “idha manussā nivesanaṃ māpentā paṭhamaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ
tika-vin02t:1573_4: nisīdāpetvā maṅgalaṃ vadāpessanti, atha mayaṃ sīlavantānaṃ dassanaṃ dhammakathaṃ
tika-vin02t:1573_5: pañhavissajjanaṃ anumodanañca sotuṃ labhissāma, manussādānaṃ datvā amhākaṃ pattiṃ
tika-vin02t:1573_6: dassantī”ti. Assaddhā devatāpi “attano icchānurūpaṃ tesaṃ paṭipattiṃ passituṃ kathañca
tika-vin02t:1574_0: Tāvatiṃsehīti yathā hi ekasmiṃ kule ekaṃ paṇḍitaṃ manussaṃ, ekasmiñca vihāre ekaṃ
tika-vin02t:1574_1: bahussutaṃ bhikkhuṃ upādāya “asukakule manussā paṇḍitā, asukavihāre bhikkhū bahussutā”ti
tika-vin02t:1574_2: saddo abbhuggacchati, evamevaṃ sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ vissakammañca devaputtaṃ upādāya
tika-vin02t:1574_4: devehi tāvatiṃsehi saddhiṃ mantetvā viya sunidhavassakārā nagaraṃ māpentīti dasseti.
tika-vin02t:1575_0: Yāvatā ariyaṃ āyatananti yattakaṃ ariyamanussānaṃ osaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ nāma atthi. Yāvatā
tika-vin02t:1575_1: vaṇippathoti yattakaṃ vāṇijānaṃ āhaṭabhaṇḍassa rāsivaseneva kayavikkayaṭṭhānaṃ nāma,
tika-vin02t:1575_2: vāṇijānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ vā atthi. Idaṃ agganagaranti tesaṃ ariyāyatanavaṇippathānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1575_3: idaṃ nagaraṃ aggaṃ bhavissati jeṭṭhakaṃ pāmokkhaṃ. Puṭabhedananti bhaṇḍapuṭabhedanaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1575_4: bhaṇḍaganthikānaṃ mocanaṭṭhānanti vuttaṃ hoti. Sakalajambudīpe aladdhabhaṇḍampi hi
tika-vin02t:1575_5: idheva labhissati, aññattha vikkayaṃ agacchantampi idha vikkayaṃ gacchissati, tasmā
tika-vin02t:1575_6: idheva puṭaṃ bhindissatīti attho. Āyanti yāni catūsu dvāresu cattāri, sabhāyaṃ ekanti
tika-vin02t:1575_7: evaṃ divase divase pañcasatasahassāni tattha uṭṭhahissanti, tānissa bhāvīni āyāni
tika-vin02t:1575_8: dasseti. Aggito vātiādīsu ca-kārattho vā-saddo, agginā ca udakena ca mithubhedena
tika-vin02t:1575_9: ca nassissatīti attho. Tassa hi eko koṭṭhāso agginā nassissati, nibbāpetumpi naṃ
tika-vin02t:1575_10: na sakkhissati, ekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ gaṅgā gahetvā gamissati, eko iminā akathitaṃ amussa,
tika-vin02t:1575_11: amunā akathitaṃ imassa vadantānaṃ pisuṇavācānaṃ vasena bhinnānaṃ manussānaṃ aññamaññabhedena vinassissati.
tika-vin02t:1576_0: Evaṃ vatvā bhagavā paccūsakāle gaṅgātīraṃ gantvā katamukhadhovano bhikkhācārakālaṃ
tika-vin02t:1576_1: āgamayamāno nisīdi. Sunidhavassakārāpi “amhākaṃ rājā samaṇassa gotamassa upaṭṭhāko,
tika-vin02t:1576_2: so amhe upagate pucchissati ‘satthā kira pāṭaligāmaṃ agamāsi, kiṃ tassa santikaṃ
tika-vin02t:1576_4: na nimantayitthā’ti pucchissati, ‘na nimantayimhā’ti ca vutte amhākaṃ dosaṃ āropetvā
tika-vin02t:1576_5: niggaṇhissati, idañcāpi mayaṃ akataṭṭhāne nagaraṃ māpema, samaṇassa kho pana gotamassa
tika-vin02t:1576_6: gatagataṭṭhāne kāḷakaṇṇisattā paṭikkamanti, taṃ mayaṃ nagaramaṅgalaṃ vācāpessāmā”ti
tika-vin02t:1576_7: cintetvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā nimantayiṃsu. Tena vuttaṃ “atha kho sunidhavassakārā”tiādi.
tika-vin02t:1576_8: Pubbaṇhasamayanti pubbaṇhakāle. Nivāsetvāti gāmappavesananīhārena nivāsanaṃ nivāsetvā
tika-vin02t:1576_9: kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā. Pattacīvaramādāyāti pattañca cīvarañca ādiyitvā kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ
tika-vin02t:1576_10: katvā, cīvaraṃ pārupitvā pattaṃ hatthena gahetvāti attho.
tika-vin02t:1577_0: Sīlavantetthāti sīlavante ettha attano vasanaṭṭhāne. Saññateti kāyavācācittehi saññate.
tika-vin02t:1577_1: Tāsaṃ dakkhiṇamādiseti saṅghassa dinne cattāro paccaye tāsaṃ gharadevatānaṃ ādiseyyapattiṃ
tika-vin02t:1577_2: dadeyya. Pūjitā pūjayantīti “ime manussā amhākaṃ ñātakāpi na honti, tathāpi no pattiṃ
tika-vin02t:1577_3: dentīti ārakkhaṃ susaṃvihitaṃ karothā”ti suṭṭhu ārakkhaṃ karonti. Mānitā mānayantīti
tika-vin02t:1577_4: kālānukālaṃ balikammakaraṇena mānitā “ete manussā amhākaṃ ñātakāpi na honti, tathāpi
tika-vin02t:1577_5: catumāsachamāsantare no balikammaṃ karontī”ti mānenti uppannaparissayaṃ haranti.
tika-vin02t:1577_6: Tato nanti tato naṃ paṇḍitajātikaṃ manussaṃ. Orasanti ure ṭhapetvā saṃvaḍḍhitaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1577_7: yathā mātā orasaṃ puttaṃ anukampati, uppannaparissayaharaṇatthamevassa vāyamati,
tika-vin02t:1577_8: evaṃ anukampantīti attho. Bhadrāni passatīti sundarāni passati.
tika-vin02t:1578_0: Anumoditvāti tehi tadā pasutapuññassa anumodanavasena tesaṃ dhammakathaṃ katvā. Sunidhavassakārāpi
tika-vin02t:1578_1: “yā tattha devatā āsuṃ, tāsaṃ dakkhiṇamādise”ti bhagavato vacanaṃ sutvā devatānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1578_2: pattiṃ adaṃsu. Taṃ gotamadvāraṃ nāma ahosīti tassa nagarassa yena dvārena bhagavā
tika-vin02t:1578_3: nikkhami, taṃ gotamadvāraṃ nāma ahosi. Gaṅgāya pana uttaraṇatthaṃ anotiṇṇattā gotamatitthaṃ
tika-vin02t:1578_4: nāma nāhosi. Pūrāti puṇṇā. Samatittikāti tīrasamaṃ udakassa tittā bharitā. Kākapeyyāti
tika-vin02t:1578_5: tīre ṭhitakākehi pātuṃ sakkuṇeyyaudakā. Tīhipi padehi ubhatokūlasamaṃ paripuṇṇabhāvameva
tika-vin02t:1578_6: vadati. Uḷumpanti pāragamanatthāya lahuke dārudaṇḍe gahetvā kavāṭaphalake viya aññamaññasambandhe
tika-vin02t:1578_7: kātuṃ āṇiyo koṭṭetvā nāvāsaṅkhepena kataṃ. Kullanti veḷunaḷādike saṅgharitvā valliādīhi
tika-vin02t:1579_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ mahājanassa gaṅgudakamattassapi kevalaṃ tarituṃ asamatthataṃ,
tika-vin02t:1579_1: attano pana bhikkhusaṅghassa ca atigambhīravitthataṃ saṃsāramahaṇṇavaṃ taritvā ṭhitabhāvañca
tika-vin02t:1579_2: sabbākārato viditvā tadatthaparidīpanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi. Udānagāthāya attho pana
tika-vin02t:1579_3: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dassitoyeva. Tattha udakaṭṭhānassetaṃ adhivacananti yathāvuttassa yassa
tika-vin02t:1579_4: kassaci udakaṭṭhānassa etaṃ aṇṇavanti adhivacanaṃ, na samuddassevāti adhippāyo. Saranti
tika-vin02t:1579_5: idha nadī adhippetā sarati sandatīti katvā. Gambhīraṃ vitthatanti agādhaṭṭhena gambhīraṃ,
tika-vin02t:1579_6: sakalalokattayabyāpitāya vitthataṃ. Visajjāti anāsajja appatvā eva pallalāni tesaṃ
tika-vin02t:1579_7: ataraṇato. Kullañhi jano bandhatīti kullaṃ bandhituṃ āyāsaṃ āpajjati. Vinā eva kullenāti
tika-vin02t:1579_8: īdisaṃ udakaṃ kullena īdisena vinā eva. Tiṇṇā medhāvino janāti ariyamaggañāṇasaṅkhātāya
tika-vin02t:1579_9: medhāya samannāgatattā medhāvino buddhā ca buddhasāvakā ca tiṇṇā paratīre patiṭṭhitā.
tika-vin02t:1582_0: 287. Koṭigāmoti mahāpanādassa rañño pāsādakoṭiyaṃ katagāmo, patitassa pāsādassa thupikāya
tika-vin02t:1582_1: patiṭṭhitaṭṭhāne niviṭṭhagāmoti attho. Ariyasaccānanti ye paṭivijjhanti, tesaṃ ariyabhāvakarānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1582_2: saccānaṃ. Ananubodhāti abujjhanena ajānanena. Appaṭivedhāti appaṭivijjhanena. Anubodho
tika-vin02t:1582_3: cettha pubbabhāgiyañāṇaṃ, paṭivedho maggañāṇena abhisamayo. Tattha yasmā anubodhapubbako
tika-vin02t:1582_4: paṭivedho anubodhena vinā na hoti, anubodhopi ekacco paṭivedhasambandho tadubhayābhāvahetukañca
tika-vin02t:1582_5: vaṭṭe saṃsaraṇaṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ “ananubodhā…pe… tumhākañcā”ti. Tattha sandhāvitanti
tika-vin02t:1582_6: paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena bhavato bhavantarupagamanena sandhāvitaṃ. Saṃsaritanti aparāparaṃ
tika-vin02t:1582_7: cavanupapajjanavasena saṃsaritaṃ. Mamañceva tumhākañcāti mayā ca tumhehi ca. Atha
tika-vin02t:1582_8: vā sandhāvitaṃ saṃsaritanti sandhāvanaṃ saṃsaraṇaṃ mamañceva tumhākañca ahosīti evamettha attho veditabbo.
tika-vin02t:1583_0: Saṃsitanti saṃsaritaṃ. Bhavanetti samūhatāti dīgharajjuyā baddhasakuṇaṃ viya rajjuhattho
tika-vin02t:1583_1: puriso desantaraṃ, taṇhārajjuyā baddhasattasantānaṃ abhisaṅkhāro bhavantaraṃ neti
tika-vin02t:1583_2: etāyāti bhavanetti, sā bhavato bhavaṃ nayanasamatthā taṇhārajju ariyamaggasatthena
tika-vin02t:1583_3: suṭṭhu hatā chinnā appavattikatāti bhavanetti samūhatā.
tika-vin02t:1585: 288. Yānassa bhūmīti yattha sakkā hoti yānaṃ āruyha yānena gantuṃ, ayaṃ yānassa bhūmi nāma. Yānā paccorohitvāti vihārassa bahidvārakoṭṭhake yānato orohitvā.
tika-vin02t:1587_0: 289. Nīlāti idaṃ sabbasaṅgāhakavacanaṃ. Nīlavaṇṇātiādi tasseva vibhāgadassanatthaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1587_1: Tattha na tesaṃ pakativaṇṇo nīlo, nīlavilepanavilittattā panetaṃ vuttaṃ. Nīlavatthāti
tika-vin02t:1587_2: paṭadukūlakoseyyādīnipi nesaṃ nīlāneva honti. Nīlālaṅkārāti nīlamaṇialaṅkārehi nīlapupphehi
tika-vin02t:1587_3: ca alaṅkatā. Te kira alaṅkārā suvaṇṇavicittāpi indanīlamaṇiobhāsehi ekanīlā viya
tika-vin02t:1587_4: khāyanti, rathāpi nesaṃ nīlamaṇikhacitā nīlavatthaparikkhittā nīladhajanīlavammikehi
tika-vin02t:1587_5: nīlābharaṇehi nīlaassehi yuttā, patodayaṭṭhiyopi nīlāyevāti iminā nayena sabbapadesu
tika-vin02t:1587_6: attho veditabbo. Paṭivaṭṭesīti pahari. Kissa je ambapālīti je-ti ālapanaṃ, bhoti
tika-vin02t:1587_7: ambapāli kiṃkāraṇāti vuttaṃ hoti. Sāhāranti ettha āharanti imasmā rājapurisā balinti
tika-vin02t:1587_8: āhāro, tabbhuttajanapado. Tena sahitaṃ sāhāraṃ, sajanapadanti attho. Aṅguliṃ phoṭesunti
tika-vin02t:1587_9: aṅguliṃ cālesuṃ. Ambakāyāti mātugāmena. Upacāravacanañhetaṃ, itthīsu yadidaṃ ambakā
tika-vin02t:1587_10: mātugāmo jananikāti. Olokethāti passatha. Apalokethāti apavattitvā oloketha, punappunaṃ
tika-vin02t:1587_11: passathāti attho. Upasaṃharathāti upanetha, imaṃ licchavīparisaṃ tumhākaṃ cittena
tika-vin02t:1587_12: tāvatiṃsasadisaṃ upasaṃharatha upanetha allīyāpetha. Yatheva tāvatiṃsā abhirūpā pāsādikā
tika-vin02t:1587_13: nīlādinānāvaṇṇā, evamime licchavīrājānopīti tāvatiṃsehi samake katvā passathāti attho.
tika-vin02t:1588_0: Kasmā pana bhagavā anekasatehi suttehi cakkhādīnaṃ rūpādīsu nimittaggāhaṃ paṭisedhetvā
tika-vin02t:1588_1: idha mahantena ussāhena nimittaggāhe niyojetīti? Hitakāmatāya tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yathā
tika-vin02t:1588_2: āyasmato nandassa hitakāmatāya saggasampattidassanatthaṃ. Tatra kira ekacce bhikkhū
tika-vin02t:1588_3: osannavīriyā, te sampattiyā palobhento “appamādena samaṇadhammaṃ karontānaṃ evarūpā
tika-vin02t:1588_4: issariyasampatti sulabhā”ti samaṇadhamme ussāhajananatthaṃ āha. Atha vā nayidaṃ nimittaggāhe
tika-vin02t:1588_5: niyojanaṃ, kevalaṃ pana “dibbasampattisadisā etesaṃ rājūnaṃ issariyasampattī”ti anupubbikathāya
tika-vin02t:1588_6: sampattikathanaṃ viya daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aniccalakkhaṇavibhāvanatthañcāpi evamāha. Na cirasseva
tika-vin02t:1588_7: hi sabbepime ajātasattussa vasena vināsaṃ pāpuṇissanti, atha nesaṃ rajjasirisampattiṃ
tika-vin02t:1588_8: disvā ṭhitabhikkhū “tathārūpāyapi nāma sirisampattiyā vināso paññāyissatī”ti aniccalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:1588_9: bhāvetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇissantīti aniccalakkhaṇavibhāvanatthaṃ āha.
tika-vin02t:1589_0: Adhivāsetūti ambapāliyā nimantitabhāvaṃ ñatvāpi kasmā nimantentīti? Asaddahanatāya
tika-vin02t:1589_1: ca vattasīsena ca. Sā hi dhuttā itthī animantetvāpi “nimantesi”nti vadeyyāti tesaṃ
tika-vin02t:1589_2: ahosi. Dhammaṃ sutvā gamanakāle ca nimantetvā gamanaṃ nāma manussānaṃ vattameva.
tika-vin02t:1592_0: 290. Abhiññātāti ñātā paññātā pākaṭā. Santhāgāreti mahājanassa santhambhanāgāre vissamanatthāya
tika-vin02t:1592_1: kate agāre. Sā kira santhāgārasālā nagaramajjhe ahosi, catūsu dvāresu ṭhitānaṃ paññāyati,
tika-vin02t:1592_2: catūhi disāhi āgatamanussā paṭhamaṃ tattha vissamitvā pacchā attano attano phāsukaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1592_3: gacchanti. Rājakulānaṃ rajjakiccasantharaṇatthaṃ kataṃ agārantipi vadantiyeva. Tattha
tika-vin02t:1592_4: hi nisīditvā licchavīrājāno rajjakiccaṃ santharanti karonti vicārenti. Sannisinnāti
tika-vin02t:1592_6: āsanesu sannisinnā. Anekapariyāyena buddhassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantīti rājakulakiccañceva
tika-vin02t:1592_7: lokatthakiriyañca vicāretvā anekehi kāraṇehi buddhassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti. Paṇḍitā hi
tika-vin02t:1592_8: te rājāno saddhāsampannā sotāpannāpi sakadāgāminopi anāgāminopi ariyasāvakā, te sabbepi
tika-vin02t:1592_9: lokiyajaṭaṃ bhinditvā buddhādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti.
tika-vin02t:1593_0: Tattha tividho buddhavaṇṇo nāma cariyavaṇṇo sarīravaṇṇo guṇavaṇṇoti. Tatrime rājāno
tika-vin02t:1593_1: cariyāya vaṇṇaṃ ārabhiṃsu – “dukkaraṃ vata kataṃ sammāsambuddhena kappasatasahassādhikāni
tika-vin02t:1593_2: cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni dasa pāramiyo dasa upapāramiyo dasa paramatthapāramiyoti samatiṃsa
tika-vin02t:1593_3: pāramiyo pūrentena ñātatthacariyaṃ lokatthacariyaṃ buddhatthacariyaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā
tika-vin02t:1593_4: pañca mahāpariccāge pariccajantenā”ti aḍḍhacchakkehi jātakasatehi buddhavaṇṇaṃ kathentā
tika-vin02t:1593_5: tusitabhavanaṃ pāpetvā ṭhapayiṃsu. Dhammassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantā panete “bhagavatā dhammo
tika-vin02t:1593_6: desito, nikāyato pañca nikāyā honti, piṭakato tīṇi piṭakāni, aṅgato nava aṅgāni,
tika-vin02t:1593_8: Saṅghassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantā “satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddhā kulaputtā
tika-vin02t:1593_10: agaṇayitvā nikkhamma satthu varasāsane pabbajanti, setacchattaṃ pahāya pabbajitānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1593_13: paricchedo natthi, evarūpā ca evarūpā ca kulaputtā satthu sāsane pabbajantī”ti pabbajjāsaṅkhepavasena
tika-vin02t:1594_0: Sīho senāpatīti evaṃnāmako senāya adhipati. Vesāliyañhi satta sahassāni satta satāni
tika-vin02t:1594_1: satta ca rājāno, te sabbepi sannipatitvā sabbesaṃ manaṃ gahetvā “raṭṭhaṃ vicāretuṃ
tika-vin02t:1594_2: samatthaṃ ekaṃ vicinathā”ti vicinantā sīharājakumāraṃ disvā “ayaṃ sakkhissatī”ti
tika-vin02t:1594_3: sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā tassa rattamaṇivaṇṇakambalapariyonaddhaṃ senāpaticchattaṃ adaṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1594_4: Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “sīho senāpatī”ti. Nigaṇṭhasāvakoti nigaṇṭhassa nāṭaputtassa
tika-vin02t:1594_5: paccayadāyako upaṭṭhāko. Jambudīpatalasmiñhi tayo janā nigaṇṭhānaṃ aggupaṭṭhākā –
tika-vin02t:1594_6: nāḷandāyaṃ upāli gahapati, kapilapure vappo sakko, vesāliyaṃ ayaṃ sīho senāpatīti.
tika-vin02t:1594_7: Nisinno hotīti sesarājūnampi parisāya antare āsanāni paññāpayiṃsu, sīhassa pana majjhe
tika-vin02t:1594_8: ṭhāneti tasmiṃ paññatte mahārahe rājāsane nisinno hoti. Nissaṃsayanti nibbicikicchaṃ
tika-vin02t:1594_9: addhā ekaṃsena. Na hete yassa vā tassa vā appesakkhassa evaṃ anekasatehi kāraṇehi vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti.
tika-vin02t:1595_0: Yena nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto tenupasaṅkamīti nigaṇṭho kira nāṭaputto “sacāyaṃ sīho kassacideva
tika-vin02t:1595_1: samaṇassa gotamassa vaṇṇaṃ kathentassa sutvā samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamissati,
tika-vin02t:1595_2: mayhaṃ parihāni bhavissatī”ti cintetvā paṭhamataraṃyeva sīhaṃ senāpatiṃ etadavoca
tika-vin02t:1595_3: “senāpati imasmiṃ loke ‘ahaṃ buddho ahaṃ buddho’ti bahū vadanti, sace tvaṃ kañci
tika-vin02t:1595_4: dassanāya upasaṅkamitukāmo ahosi, maṃ puccheyyāsi, ahaṃ te yuttaṭṭhānaññeva pesessāmi,
tika-vin02t:1595_5: ayuttaṭṭhānato nivāressāmī”ti. So taṃ kathaṃ anussaritvā “sace maṃ pesessati, gamissāmi.
tika-vin02t:1595_6: No ce, na gamissāmī”ti cintetvā yena nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto tenupasaṅkami.
tika-vin02t:1596_0: Athassa vacanaṃ sutvā nigaṇṭho mahāpabbatena viya balavasokena otthaṭo “yattha dānissāhaṃ
tika-vin02t:1596_1: gamanaṃ na icchāmi, tattheva gantukāmo jāto, hatohamasmī”ti anattamano hutvā “paṭibāhanupāyamassa
tika-vin02t:1596_2: karissāmī”ti cintetvā “kiṃ pana tva”ntiādimāha. Evaṃ vadanto carantaṃ goṇaṃ tuṇḍe
tika-vin02t:1596_3: paharanto viya jalamānaṃ padīpaṃ nibbāpento viya bhattabharitaṃ pattaṃ nikujjanto
tika-vin02t:1596_4: viya ca sīhassa uppannaṃ pītiṃ vināsesi. Gamikābhisaṅkhāroti hatthiyānādīnaṃ yojāpanagandhamālādiggahaṇavasena
tika-vin02t:1596_5: pavatto payogo. So paṭippassambhīti so vūpasanto.
tika-vin02t:1597_0: Dutiyampi khoti dutiyavārampi. Imasmiñca vāre buddhassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantā tusitabhavanato
tika-vin02t:1597_1: paṭṭhāya yāva mahābodhipallaṅkā dasabalassa heṭṭhā pādatalehi upari kesaggehi paricchinditvā
tika-vin02t:1597_3: Dhammassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantā “ekapadepi ekabyañjanepi avakkhalitaṃ nāma natthī”ti sukathitavaseneva
tika-vin02t:1597_4: dhammaguṇaṃ kathayiṃsu. Saṅghassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantā “evarūpaṃ yasasirivibhavaṃ pahāya
tika-vin02t:1597_5: satthu sāsane pabbajitā na kosajjapakatikā honti, terasasu pana dhutaguṇesu paripūrakārino
tika-vin02t:1597_6: hutvā sattasu anupassanāsu kammaṃ karonti, aṭṭhatiṃsa ārammaṇavibhattiyo vaḷañjentī”ti
tika-vin02t:1598_0: Tatiyavāre pana buddhassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsamānā “itipi so bhagavā”ti suttantapariyāyeneva
tika-vin02t:1598_1: buddhaguṇe kathayiṃsu, “svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo”tiādinā suttantapariyāyeneva dhammaguṇe,
tika-vin02t:1598_2: “suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho”tiādinā suttantapariyāyeneva saṅghaguṇe ca kathayiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1598_3: Tato sīho cintesi “imesaṃ licchavīrājakulānaṃ tatiyadivasato paṭṭhāya buddhadhammasaṅghaguṇe
tika-vin02t:1598_4: kathentānaṃ mukhaṃ nappahoti, addhā anomaguṇasamannāgato so bhagavā, imaṃ dāni uppannaṃ
tika-vin02t:1598_5: pītiṃ avijahitvāva ahaṃ ajja sammāsambuddhaṃ passissāmī”ti. Athassa “kiñhi me karissanti
tika-vin02t:1598_6: nigaṇṭhā”ti vitakko udapādi. Tattha kiñhi me karissantīti kiṃ nāma mayhaṃ nigaṇṭhā
tika-vin02t:1598_7: karissanti. Apalokitā vā anapalokitā vāti āpucchitā vā anāpucchitā vā. Na hi me te
tika-vin02t:1598_8: āpucchitā yānavāhanasampattiissariyayasavisesaṃ dassanti, nāpi anāpucchitā māressanti,
tika-vin02t:1599_0: Divā divassāti divassa divā majjhanhike atikkantamatte. Vesāliyā niyyāsīti yathā
tika-vin02t:1599_1: hi gimhakāle deve vuṭṭhe udakaṃ sandamānaṃ nadiṃ otaritvā thokameva gantvā tiṭṭhati
tika-vin02t:1599_2: nappavattati, evaṃ sīhassa paṭhamadivase “dasabalaṃ passissāmī”ti uppannāya pītiyā
tika-vin02t:1599_3: nigaṇṭhena paṭibāhitakālo, yathā dutiyadivase deve vuṭṭhe udakaṃ sandamānaṃ nadiṃ
tika-vin02t:1599_4: otaritvā thokaṃ gantvā vālikāpuñjaṃ paharitvā appavattaṃ hoti, evaṃ sīhassa dutiyadivase
tika-vin02t:1599_5: “dasabalaṃ passissāmī”ti uppannāya pītiyā nigaṇṭhena paṭibāhitakālo, yathā tatiyadivase
tika-vin02t:1599_6: deve vuṭṭhe udakaṃ sandamānaṃ nadiṃ otaritvā purāṇapaṇṇasukkhadaṇḍakanaḷakacavarādīni
tika-vin02t:1599_7: parikaḍḍhantaṃ vālikāpuñjaṃ bhinditvā samuddaninnameva hoti, evaṃ sīho tatiyadivase
tika-vin02t:1599_8: tiṇṇaṃ vatthūnaṃ guṇakathaṃ sutvā uppanne pītipāmojje “aphalā nigaṇṭhā, nipphalā
tika-vin02t:1599_9: nigaṇṭhā, kiṃ me ime karissanti, gamissāmahaṃ satthu santika”nti gamanaṃ abhinīharitvā
tika-vin02t:1599_10: vesāliyā niyyāsi. Niyyanto ca “cirassāhaṃ dasabalassa santikaṃ gantukāmo jāto, na
tika-vin02t:1599_11: kho pana me yuttaṃ aññātakavesena gantu”nti “ye keci dasabalassa santikaṃ gantukāmo,
tika-vin02t:1599_12: sabbe nikkhamantū”ti ghosanaṃ kāretvā pañca rathasatāni yojāpetvā uttamarathe ṭhito
tika-vin02t:1599_13: tehi ceva pañcahi rathasatehi mahatiyā ca parisāya parivuto gandhapupphacuṇṇavāsādīni gāhāpetvā niyyāsi.
tika-vin02t:1600_0: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti ārāmaṃ pavisanto dūratova asītianubyañjanabyāmappabhādvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇāni
tika-vin02t:1600_1: chabbaṇṇā ghanabuddharasmiyo disvā “evarūpaṃ nāma purisaṃ evaṃ āsanne vasantaṃ ettakaṃ
tika-vin02t:1600_2: kālaṃ nāddasaṃ, vañcito vatamhi, alābhā vata me”ti cintetvā mahānidhiṃ disvā daliddapuriso
tika-vin02t:1600_3: viya sañjātapītipāmojjo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami. Dhammassa cānudhammaṃ byākarontīti
tika-vin02t:1600_4: bhotā gotamena vuttakāraṇassa anukāraṇaṃ kathenti. Kāraṇavacano hettha dhamma-saddo
tika-vin02t:1600_5: “hetumhi ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā”tiādīsu viya. Kāraṇanti cettha tathāpavattassa
tika-vin02t:1600_6: saddassa attho adhippeto tassa pavattihetubhāvato. Atthappayutto hi saddappayogo.
tika-vin02t:1600_7: Anukāraṇanti ca so evaṃ parehi tathā vuccamāno. Sahadhammiko vādānuvādoti parehi
tika-vin02t:1600_8: vuttakāraṇena sakāraṇo hutvā tumhākaṃ vādo vā tato paraṃ tassa anuvādo vā koci appamattakopi
tika-vin02t:1600_9: viññūhi garahitabbaṃ ṭhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ na āgacchati. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – kiṃ sabbākārenapi
tika-vin02t:1600_10: tava vāde gārayhakāraṇaṃ natthīti. Anabbhakkhātukāmāti na abhūtena vattukāmā.
tika-vin02t:1601_0: 291-292. Atthi sīha pariyāyotiādīnaṃ attho verañjakaṇḍe āgatanayeneva veditabbo.
tika-vin02t:1601_1: Paramena assāsenāti catumaggacatuphalasaṅkhātena uttamaassāsena. Assāsāya dhammaṃ
tika-vin02t:1601_2: desetīti assāsanatthāya santhambhanatthāya dhammaṃ deseti. Iti bhagavā aṭṭhahaṅgehi
tika-vin02t:1602_0: 293. Anuviccakāranti anuviditvā cintetvā tulayitvā kātabbaṃ karohīti vutta hoti.
tika-vin02t:1602_1: Sādhu hotīti sundaro hoti. Tumhādisasmiñhi maṃ disvā maṃ saraṇaṃ gacchante nigaṇṭhaṃ
tika-vin02t:1602_2: disvā nigaṇṭhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchante “kiṃ ayaṃ sīho diṭṭhadiṭṭhameva saraṇaṃ gacchatī”ti
tika-vin02t:1602_3: garahā uppajjati, tasmā anuviccakāro tumhādisānaṃ sādhūti dasseti. Paṭākaṃ parihareyyunti
tika-vin02t:1602_4: te kira evarūpaṃ sāvakaṃ labhitvā “asuko nāma rājā vā rājamahāmatto vā seṭṭhi vā
tika-vin02t:1602_5: amhākaṃ saraṇaṃ gato sāvako jāto”ti paṭākaṃ ukkhipitvā nagare ghosentā āhiṇḍanti.
tika-vin02t:1602_6: Kasmā? “Evaṃ no mahantabhāvo āvi bhavissatī”ti ca, sace panassa “kimahaṃ ete saraṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:1602_7: gato”ti vippaṭisāro uppajjeyya, tampi so “etesaṃ me saraṇagatabhāvaṃ bahū jānanti,
tika-vin02t:1602_8: dukkaraṃ dāni paṭinivattitu”nti vinodetvā na paṭikkamissatīti ca. Tenāha “paṭākaṃ
tika-vin02t:1602_9: parihareyyu”nti. Opānabhūtanti paṭiyattaudapāno viya ṭhitaṃ. Kulanti tava nivesanaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1602_10: Dātabbaṃ maññeyyāsīti pubbepi dasapi vīsatipi saṭṭhipi jane āgate disvā natthīti
tika-vin02t:1602_11: avatvā desi, idāni maṃ saraṇaṃ gatakāraṇamatteneva mā imesaṃ deyyadhammaṃ upacchindittha,
tika-vin02t:1602_12: sampattānañhi dātabbamevāti ovadati. Sutaṃ me taṃ bhanteti kuto sutaṃ? Nigaṇṭhānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1602_13: santikā. Te kira kulagharesu evaṃ pakāsenti “mayaṃ yassa kassaci sampattassa dātabbanti
tika-vin02t:1602_14: vadāma, samaṇo pana gotamo ‘mayhameva dānaṃ dātabbaṃ…pe… na aññesaṃ sāvakānaṃ dinnaṃ
tika-vin02t:1602_15: mahapphala’nti evaṃ vadatī”ti. Taṃ sandhāya ayaṃ “sutaṃ me ta”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin02t:1603_0: 294. Pavattamaṃsanti pakatiyā pavattaṃ kappiyamaṃsaṃ, mūlaṃ gahetvā antarāpaṇe pariyesāhīti
tika-vin02t:1603_1: adhippāyo. Sambahulā nigaṇṭhāti pañcasatamattā nigaṇṭhā. Thūlaṃ pasunti thūlaṃ mahāsarīraṃ
tika-vin02t:1603_2: gokaṇṇamahiṃsasūkarasaṅkhātaṃ pasuṃ. Uddissakatanti attānaṃ uddisitvā kataṃ, māritanti
tika-vin02t:1603_3: attho. Paṭiccakammanti ettha kamma-saddo kammasādhano atītakālikoti āha “attānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1603_4: paṭicca kata”nti. Nimittakammassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ “paṭicca kammaṃ phusatī”tiādīsu
tika-vin02t:1603_5: viya. Nimittakammassāti nimittabhāvena laddhabbakammassa, na karaṇakārāpanavasena.
tika-vin02t:1603_6: Paṭiccakammaṃ ettha atthīti maṃsaṃ paṭiccakammaṃ yathā “buddhaṃ etassa atthīti buddho”ti.
tika-vin02t:1603_7: Atha vā paṭicca kammaṃ phusatīti pāṭhaseso daṭṭhabbo, svāyaṃ etaṃ maṃsaṃ paṭicca
tika-vin02t:1603_8: taṃ pāṇavadhakakammaṃ phusatīti attho. Tañhi akusalaṃ upaḍḍhaṃ dāyakassa, upaḍḍhaṃ
tika-vin02t:1603_9: paṭiggāhakassa hotīti nesaṃ laddhi. Upakaṇṇaketi kaṇṇamūle. Alanti paṭikkhepavacanaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1603_10: hotu kiṃ imināti attho. Na ca pana teti ete āyasmantā dīgharattaṃ avaṇṇakāmā hutvā
tika-vin02t:1603_11: avaṇṇaṃ bhāsantāpi abbhācikkhantā na jiridanti, abbhakkhānassa antaṃ na gacchantīti
tika-vin02t:1603_12: attho. Atha vā lajjanatthe idaṃ jiridantīti padaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, na lajjantīti attho.
tika-vin02t:1606_0: 295. Abhilāpamattanti desanāmattaṃ. Āmisakhādanatthāyāti tattha tattha chaḍḍitassa
tika-vin02t:1606_1: āmisassa khādanatthāya. Anuppageyevāti pātoyeva. Oravasaddanti mahāsaddaṃ. Taṃ pana
tika-vin02t:1606_2: avatvāpīti andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃvuttanayena avatvāpi. Pi-saddena tathā vacanampi anujānāti.
tika-vin02t:1606_4: vā, ‘kappiyakuṭī’ti vā vutte sādhāraṇalakkhaṇa”nti sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu vuttaussāvanantikākuṭikaraṇalakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1606_5: Cayanti adhiṭṭhānaṃ. Yato paṭṭhāyāti yato iṭṭhakato silato mattikāpiṇḍato vā paṭṭhāya.
tika-vin02t:1606_6: Paṭhamiṭṭhakādīnaṃ heṭṭhā na vaṭṭantīti bhittiyā paṭhamiṭṭhakādīnaṃ heṭṭhā bhūmiyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1606_7: patiṭṭhāpiyamānā iṭṭhakādayo bhūmigatikattā “kappiyakuṭiṃ karomā”ti vatvā patiṭṭhāpetuṃ
tika-vin02t:1606_8: na vaṭṭanti. Yadi evaṃ bhūmiyaṃ nikhaṇitvā patiṭṭhāpiyamānā thambhā kasmā tathā vatvā
tika-vin02t:1606_9: patiṭṭhāpetuṃ vaṭṭantīti āha “thambhā pana…pe… vaṭṭantī”ti. Saṅghasantakamevāti vāsatthāya
tika-vin02t:1606_10: kataṃ saṅghikasenāsanaṃ sandhāya vadati. Bhikkhusantakanti vāsatthāya eva kataṃ bhikkhussa
tika-vin02t:1609_0: 300. Yena āpaṇaṃ tadavasarītiādīsu āpaṇanti ekassa nigamassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tasmiṃ
tika-vin02t:1609_1: kira nigame vīsati āpaṇamukhasahassāni vibhattāni ahesuṃ. Iti so āpaṇānaṃ ussannattā
tika-vin02t:1609_2: “āpaṇa”ntveva saṅkhaṃ gato. Tassa pana nigamassa avidūre nadītīre ghanacchāyo ramaṇīyabhūmibhāgo
tika-vin02t:1609_3: mahāvanasaṇḍo, tasmiṃ bhagavā viharati. Keṇiyoti tassa nāmaṃ. Jaṭiloti āharimajaṭādharo
tika-vin02t:1609_4: tāpaso. So kira brāhmaṇamahāsālo, dhanarakkhaṇatthāya pana tāpasapabbajjaṃ samādāya
tika-vin02t:1609_5: rañño paṇṇākāraṃ datvā bhūmibhāgaṃ gahetvā tattha assamaṃ kāretvā pañcahi sakaṭasatehi
tika-vin02t:1609_6: vaṇijjaṃ payojetvā kulasahassassa nissayo hutvā vasati. Assamepi cassa eko tālarukkho
tika-vin02t:1609_7: divase divase ekaṃ sovaṇṇamayaṃ phalaṃ muñcatīti vadanti. So divā kāsāvāni dhāreti,
tika-vin02t:1609_8: jaṭā ca bandhati, rattiṃ kāmasampattiṃ anubhavati.
tika-vin02t:1610_0: Pavattāroti pavattayitāro, pāvacanavasena vattāroti attho. Yesanti yesaṃ santakaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1610_1: Mantapadanti mantasadde bahikatvā raho bhāsitabbaṭṭhena mantā eva taṃtaṃatthapaṭipattihetutāya
tika-vin02t:1610_2: padanti mantapadaṃ, vedavacanaṃ. Gītanti aṭṭhakādīhi dasahi porāṇabrāhmaṇehi udāttānudāttādisarasampattivasena
tika-vin02t:1610_3: sajjhāyitaṃ. Pavuttanti pāvacanavasena aññesaṃ vuttaṃ, vācitanti attho. Samihitanti
tika-vin02t:1610_4: samupabyūḷhaṃ rāsikataṃ, iruvedayajuvedasāmavedādivasena tatthāpi paccekaṃ mantabrāhmaṇādivasena
tika-vin02t:1610_5: sajjhāyanavācakādivasena ca piṇḍaṃ katvā ṭhapitanti attho. Tadanugāyantīti etarahi
tika-vin02t:1610_6: brāhmaṇā taṃ tehi pubbe gītaṃ anugāyanti anusajjhāyanti. Tadanubhāsantīti taṃ anubhāsanti,
tika-vin02t:1610_7: idaṃ purimasseva vevacanaṃ. Bhāsitamanubhāsantīti tehi bhāsitaṃ sajjhāyitaṃ anusajjhāyanti.
tika-vin02t:1610_8: Vācitamanuvācentīti tehi aññesaṃ vācitaṃ anuvācenti. Seyyathidanti te katameti attho.
tika-vin02t:1610_9: Aṭṭhakotiādīni tesaṃ nāmāni. Te kira dibbacakkhuparibhaṇḍena yathākammūpagañāṇena
tika-vin02t:1610_10: sattānaṃ kammassakatādiṃ pubbenivāsañāṇena atītakappe brāhmaṇānaṃ mantajjhenavidhiñca
tika-vin02t:1610_11: oloketvā parūpaghātaṃ akatvā kassapasammāsambuddhassa bhagavato vaṭṭasannissitena
tika-vin02t:1610_12: vacanena saha saṃsanditvā mante ganthesuṃ. Aparāpare pana okkākarājakālādīsu uppannabrāhmaṇā
tika-vin02t:1610_13: pāṇātipātādīni pakkhipitvā tayo vede bhinditvā buddhavacanena saddhiṃ viruddhe akaṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1610_14: Rattibhojanaṃ ratti, tato uparatāti rattūparatā. Atikkante majjhanhike yāva sūriyatthaṅgamanā
tika-vin02t:1610_15: bhojanaṃ vikālabhojanaṃ nāma, tato viratattā viratā vikālabhojanā. Paṭiyādāpetvāti
tika-vin02t:1610_16: sappimadhusakkarādīhi ceva maricehi ca susaṅkhataṃ pānaṃ paṭiyādāpetvā.
tika-vin02t:1611_0: “Mahā kho keṇiya bhikkhusaṅgho”ti kasmā bhagavā punappunaṃ paṭikkhipi? Titthiyānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1611_1: paṭikkhepapasannatāya. Titthiyā hi “aho vatāyaṃ appiccho, yo nimantiyamānopi na sādiyatī”ti
tika-vin02t:1611_2: upanimantiyamānassa paṭikkhepe pasīdantīti keci, akāraṇañcetaṃ. Natthi buddhānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1611_3: paccayahetu evarūpaṃ kohaññaṃ, ayaṃ pana aḍḍhatelasāni bhikkhusatāni disvā ettakānaṃyeva
tika-vin02t:1611_4: bhikkhaṃ paṭiyādessati, sveva selo brāhmaṇo tīhi purisasatehi saddhiṃ pabbajissati,
tika-vin02t:1611_5: ayuttaṃ kho pana navake aññato pesetvā imeheva saddhiṃ gantuṃ, ime vā aññato pesetvā
tika-vin02t:1611_6: navakehi saddhiṃ gantuṃ. Athāpi sabbeva gahetvā gamissāmi, bhikkhāhāro nappahossati.
tika-vin02t:1611_7: Tato bhikkhūsu piṇḍāya carantesu manussā ujjhāyissanti “cirassampi keṇiyo samaṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:1611_8: gotamaṃ nimantetvā yāpanamattaṃ dātuṃ nāsakkhī”ti, sayañca vippaṭisārī bhavissati.
tika-vin02t:1611_9: Paṭikkhepe pana kate “samaṇo gotamo punappunaṃ ‘tvañca brāhmaṇesu abhippasanno’ti
tika-vin02t:1611_10: brāhmaṇānaṃ nāmaṃ gaṇhātī”ti cintetvā brāhmaṇepi nimantetukāmo bhavissati, tato brāhmaṇe
tika-vin02t:1611_11: pāṭiyekkaṃ nimantessati, te tena nimantitā bhikkhū hutvā bhuñjissanti, evamassa saddhā
tika-vin02t:1611_12: anurakkhitā bhavissatīti punappunaṃ paṭikkhipi. Kiñcāpi kho bho gotamāti iminā idaṃ
tika-vin02t:1611_13: dīpeti “bho gotama, kiṃ jātaṃ, yadi ahaṃ brāhmaṇesu abhippasanno, adhivāsetu bhavaṃ
tika-vin02t:1611_14: gotamo, ahaṃ brāhmaṇānampi dātuṃ sakkomi tumhākampī”ti. Ṭhapetvā dhaññaphalarasanti
tika-vin02t:1611_15: ettha taṇḍuladhovanodakampi dhaññarasoyevāti vadanti. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ucchurasanti
tika-vin02t:1612_0: Imāhi gāthāhīti imāhi keṇiyassa cittānukūlāhi gāthāhi. Tattha aggiparicariyaṃ vinā
tika-vin02t:1612_1: brāhmaṇānaṃ yaññābhāvato “aggihuttamukhā yaññā”ti vuttaṃ, aggihuttaseṭṭhā aggijuhanappadhānāti
tika-vin02t:1612_2: attho. Brāhmaṇā hi “aggimukhā devā”ti aggijuhanapubbakaṃ yaññaṃ vidahanti. Vede sajjhāyantehi
tika-vin02t:1612_3: paṭhamaṃ sajjhāyitabbato sāvittī “chandaso mukha”nti vuttā, sāvittī vedassa pubbaṅgamāti
tika-vin02t:1612_4: attho taṃpubbakattā vedasavanassa. Manussānaṃ seṭṭhabhāvato rājā “mukha”nti vutto.
tika-vin02t:1612_5: Ogāhantīnaṃ nadīnaṃ ādhārabhāvato gantabbaṭṭhānabhāvena paṭisaraṇato ca sāgaro “mukha”nti
tika-vin02t:1612_6: vutto. Candasamāyogena “ajja kattikā, ajja rohiṇī”ti saññāyanato nakkhattāni abhibhavitvā
tika-vin02t:1612_7: ālokakaraṇato nakkhattehi ativisesasommabhāvato ca “nakkhattānaṃ mukhaṃ cando”ti
tika-vin02t:1612_8: vuttaṃ. “Dīpasikhā aggijālā asanivicakka”nti evamādīnaṃ tapantānaṃ vijjulatānaṃ aggattā
tika-vin02t:1612_9: ādicco “tapataṃ mukha”nti vutto. Dakkhiṇeyyānaṃ pana aggattā visesena tasmiṃ samaye
tika-vin02t:1612_10: buddhappamukhaṃ saṅghaṃ sandhāya “puññaṃ ākaṅkhamānānaṃ, saṅgho ve yajataṃ mukha”nti
tika-vin02t:1612_11: vuttaṃ. Tena saṅgho puññassa āyamukhaṃ aggadakkhiṇeyyabhāvenāti dasseti.
tika-vin02t:1615_0: 301. Rojavatthumhi vihāroti gandhakuṭiṃ sandhāya āhaṃsu. Ataramānoti aturanto, saṇikaṃ
tika-vin02t:1615_1: padappamāṇaṭṭhāne padaṃ nikkhipanto vattaṃ katvā susammaṭṭhaṃ muttādalasinduvārasantharasadisaṃ
tika-vin02t:1615_2: vālikaṃ avināsentoti attho. Āḷindanti pamukhaṃ. Ukkāsitvāti ukkāsitasaddaṃ katvā.
tika-vin02t:1615_3: Aggaḷanti kavāṭaṃ. Ākoṭehīti agganakhena īsakaṃ kuñcikachiddasamīpe koṭehīti vuttaṃ
tika-vin02t:1615_4: hoti. Dvāraṃ kira atiupari amanussā, atiheṭṭhā tiracchānajātikā koṭenti, tathā akoṭetvā
tika-vin02t:1615_5: majjhe chiddasamīpe manussā koṭenti, idaṃ dvārakoṭakavattanti dīpentā vadanti. Vivari
tika-vin02t:1615_6: bhagavā dvāranti na bhagavā uṭṭhāya dvāraṃ vivari, vivaratūti pana hatthaṃ pasāresi.
tika-vin02t:1615_7: Tato “bhagavā tumhehi anekāsu kappakoṭīsu dānaṃ dadamānehi na sahatthā dvāravivaraṇakammaṃ
tika-vin02t:1615_8: kata”nti sayameva dvāraṃ vivaṭaṃ. Taṃ pana yasmā bhagavato manena vivaṭaṃ, tasmā
tika-vin02t:1618_0: 303. Ātumāvatthumhi aññataro vuḍḍhapabbajitoti subhaddo nāma aññataro bhikkhu vuḍḍhakāle
tika-vin02t:1618_1: pabbajitattā “vuḍḍhapabbajito”ti vutto. Dve dārakāti sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ ṭhitā dve puttā.
tika-vin02t:1618_2: Nāḷiyāvāpakenāti nāḷiyā ceva thavikāya ca. Saṃhariṃsūti yasmā manussā te dārake mañjubhāṇine
tika-vin02t:1618_3: paṭibhānavante disvā kāretukāmāpi akāretukāmāpi kārentiyeva, katakāle ca “kiṃ gaṇhissatha
tika-vin02t:1618_4: tātā”ti pucchanti. Te vadanti “na amhākaṃ aññena kenaci attho, pitā pana no bhagavato
tika-vin02t:1618_5: āgatakāle yāgudānaṃ kātukāmo”ti. Taṃ sutvā manussā aparigaṇetvāva yaṃ te sakkonti
tika-vin02t:1618_6: harituṃ, sabbaṃ denti. Yampi na sakkonti, manussehi pesenti. Tasmā te dārakā bahuṃ
tika-vin02t:1618_7: loṇampi telampi sappimpi taṇḍulampi khādanīyampi saṃhariṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1619_0: Ātumāyaṃ viharatīti ātumaṃ nissāya viharati. Bhusāgāreti bhusamaye agārake. Tattha
tika-vin02t:1619_1: kira mahantaṃ palālapuñjaṃ abbhantarato palālaṃ nikkaḍḍhitvā sālāsadisaṃ pabbajitānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1619_2: vasanayoggaṭṭhānasadisaṃ kataṃ, tadā bhagavā tattha vasi. Atha bhagavati ātumaṃ āgantvā
tika-vin02t:1619_3: bhusāgārakaṃ paviṭṭhe subhaddo sāyanhasamayaṃ gāmadvāraṃ gantvā manusse āmantesi
tika-vin02t:1619_4: “upāsakā nāhaṃ tumhākaṃ santikā aññaṃ kiñci paccāsīsāmi, mayhaṃ dārakehi ānītatelādīniyeva
tika-vin02t:1619_5: saṅghassa pahonti, hatthakammamattaṃ me dethā”ti. Kiṃ, bhante, karomāti? “Idañcidañca
tika-vin02t:1619_6: gaṇhathā”ti sabbūpakaraṇāni gāhetvā vihāre uddhanāni kāretvā ekaṃ kāḷakaṃ kāsāvaṃ
tika-vin02t:1619_7: nivāsetvā tādisameva pārupitvā “idaṃ karotha, idaṃ karothā”ti sabbarattiṃ vicārento
tika-vin02t:1619_8: satasahassaṃ vissajjetvā bhojjayāguñca madhugoḷakañca paṭiyādāpesi. Bhojjayāgu nāma
tika-vin02t:1619_10: yaṃkiñci khādanīyaṃ nāma, sabbaṃ pavisati, kīḷitukāmānaṃ sīsamakkhanayoggā hoti sugandhagandhā.
tika-vin02t:1620_0: Atha bhagavā kālasseva sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto piṇḍāya carituṃ
tika-vin02t:1620_1: ātumagāmanagarābhimukho pāyāsi. Manussā tassa ārocesuṃ “bhagavā piṇḍāya gāmaṃ pavisati,
tika-vin02t:1620_2: tayā kassa yāgu paṭiyāditā”ti. So yathānivatthapāruteheva tehi kāḷakakāsāvehi ekena
tika-vin02t:1620_3: hatthena dabbiñca kaṭacchuñca gahetvā brahmā viya dakkhiṇajāṇumaṇḍalaṃ bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā
tika-vin02t:1620_4: vanditvā “paṭiggaṇhātu me, bhante, bhagavā yāgu”nti āha. Tena vuttaṃ “atha kho so
tika-vin02t:1620_5: vuḍḍhapabbajito tassā rattiyā accayena bahutaraṃ yāguṃ paṭiyādāpetvā bhagavato upanāmesī”ti.
tika-vin02t:1620_6: Jānantāpi tathāgatā pucchantītiādi vuttanayameva. Kutāyanti kuto ayaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva.
tika-vin02t:1621: 304. Dasabhāgaṃ datvāti dasamabhāgaṃ datvā. Tenevāha “dasa koṭṭhāse katvā eko koṭṭhāso bhūmisāmikānaṃ dātabbo”ti.
tika-vin02t:1624_0: 305. Parimaddantāti upaparikkhantā. Pattuṇṇadese sañjātavatthaṃ pattuṇṇaṃ. Koseyyavisesoti
tika-vin02t:1624_1: hi abhidhānakose vuttaṃ. Cīnadese somāradese ca sañjātavatthāni cīnasomārapaṭāni.
tika-vin02t:1624_2: Pattuṇṇādīni tīṇi koseyyassa anulomāni pāṇakehi katasuttamayattā. Iddhimayikaṃ ehibhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin02t:1624_3: puññiddhiyā nibbattacīvaraṃ. Taṃ khomādīnaṃ aññataraṃ hotīti tesaṃyeva anulomaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1624_4: Devatāhi dinnacīvaraṃ devadattiyaṃ. Taṃ kapparukkhe nibbattaṃ jālinīdevakaññāya anuruddhattherassa
tika-vin02t:1624_5: dinnavatthasadisaṃ. Tampi khomādīnaññeva anulomaṃ hoti tesu aññatarabhāvato. Dve
tika-vin02t:1624_6: paṭā desanāmeneva vuttāti tesaṃ sarūpadassanaparametaṃ, nāññaṃ nivattanaparaṃ pattuṇṇapaṭassapi
tika-vin02t:1624_7: desanāmeneva vuttattā. Tumbāti bhājanāni. Phalatumboti lābuādi. Udakatumboti udakukkhipanakakuṭako.
tika-vin02t:1624_8: Kilañjacchattanti veḷuvilīvehi vāyitvā katachattaṃ. Sambhinnarasanti sammissitarasaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1624_9: Pānakaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ hotīti ambapānādipānakaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ hoti, taṃ vikālepi kappati
tika-vin02t:1624_10: asambhinnarasattā. Tena tadahupaṭiggahitena saddhinti tena sattāhakālikena tadahupaṭiggahitena
tika-vin02t:1629_1: thiranti attho”ti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. “So nesaṃ bhavissatī”ti yujjatīti “so tumhāka”nti
tika-vin02t:1629_2: avatvā “nesa”nti vacanaṃ yujjati. Ye atthatakathināti na kevalaṃ tumhākameva, ye
tika-vin02t:1629_3: aññepi atthatakathinā, tesampi bhavissatīti attho. Anāmantetvā caraṇanti cārittasikkhāpade
tika-vin02t:1629_4: vuttanayena anāpucchitvā kulesu caraṇaṃ. Matakacīvaranti matassa santakaṃ cīvaraṃ.
tika-vin02t:1630_0: Paṭhamapavāraṇāya pavāritāti idaṃ vassacchedaṃ akatvā vassaṃvutthabhāvasandassanatthaṃ
tika-vin02t:1630_1: vuttaṃ antarāyena appavāritānampi vutthavassānaṃ kathinatthārasambhavato. Teneva
tika-vin02t:1630_2: “appavāritā vā”ti avatvā “chinnavassā vā pacchimikāya upagatā vā na labhantī”ti ettakameva
tika-vin02t:1630_3: vuttaṃ. Aññasmiṃ vihāre vutthavassāpi na labhantīti nānāsīmāya aññasmiṃ vihāre vutthavassā
tika-vin02t:1630_4: imasmiṃ vihāre kathinatthāraṃ na labhantīti attho. Khalimakkhitasāṭakoti ahatavatthaṃ
tika-vin02t:1630_5: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Dānakammavācāti kathinadussadānakammavācā. Akātuṃ na labbhatīti
tika-vin02t:1630_6: iminā anādariyena akarontassa dukkaṭanti dīpeti. Kammavācā pana ekāyeva vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin02t:1630_7: kathinatthārasāṭakassa dānakāle vuttā ekāyeva kammavācā vaṭṭati. Puna tassa aññasmiṃ
tika-vin02t:1630_8: vatthe diyyamāne kammavācāya dātabbakiccaṃ natthi, apalokanameva alanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:1631_1: hoti. Pañcakanti pañcakhaṇḍaṃ. Esa nayo sesesupi. Paṭhamacimilikāti kathinavatthato
tika-vin02t:1631_2: aññā attano pakaticimilikā. “Kucchicimilikaṃ katvā sibbitamattenāti thirajiṇṇānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1631_3: cimilikānaṃ ekato katvā sibbanassetaṃ adhivacana”nti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Mahāpaccariyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1631_4: kurundiyañca “vuttavacananidassanaṃ byañjane eva bhedo, atthe natthīti dassanatthaṃ
tika-vin02t:1631_5: kata”nti vadanti. Piṭṭhianuvātāropanamattenāti dīghato anuvātassa āropanamattena.
tika-vin02t:1631_6: Kucchianuvātāropanamattenāti puthulato anuvātassa āropanamattena. Sāruppaṃ hotīti
tika-vin02t:1634_0: 311. Ayanti āsāvacchediko kathinuddhāro. Idha na vuttoti pāḷiyaṃ mātikāpadabhājane
tika-vin02t:1634_1: savanantikānantaraṃ na vutto. Tatthāti tasmiṃ sīmātikkantike kathinuddhāre. “Sīmātikkantiko
tika-vin02t:1634_3: atikkantattā sīmātikkantiko”ti ayaṃ amhākaṃ khanti. Sahubbhāre “so katacīvaro”ti
tika-vin02t:1634_4: pāṭho dissati, evañca sati cīvarapalibodho paṭhamaṃ chijjatīti viññāyati, idha pana
tika-vin02t:1634_5: parivārapāḷiyañca “dve palibodhā apubbaṃ acarimaṃ chijjantī”ti vacanato taṃ na sameti,
tika-vin02t:1635_1: Keci pana “sabbaṃ attano parikkhāraṃ anavasesetvā pakkamanto ‘samādāya pakkamatī’ti
tika-vin02t:1635_2: vuccatī”ti vadanti. Puna samādāyavārepi teyeva dassitāti sambandho. Vippakatacīvare
tika-vin02t:1635_4: hi kathinuddhāro niṭṭhitacīvarasseva vasena vutto “bhikkhu atthatakathino katacīvaraṃ
tika-vin02t:1635_5: ādāya pakkamatī”ti vuttattā, tasmā so vippakatacīvaro na sambhavatīti chaḷeva ubbhārā tattha dassitā.
tika-vin02t:1636_0: Tatrāyaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya vāravibhāvanā – ādāyavārā satta, tathā samādāyavārāti dve
tika-vin02t:1636_1: sattakavārā, tato pakkamanantikaṃ vajjetvā vippakatacīvarassa ādāyasamādāyavāravasena
tika-vin02t:1636_2: dve chakkavārā, tato paraṃ niṭṭhānasanniṭṭhānanāsanantikānaṃ vasena tīṇi tikāni dassitāni.
tika-vin02t:1636_3: Tattha paṭhamattikaṃ antosīmāyaṃ “paccessaṃ na paccessa”nti imaṃ vidhiṃ anāmasitvā
tika-vin02t:1636_5: tattha na yujjanti. Dutiyattikaṃ antosīmāyaṃ “na paccessa”nti pavattaṃ. Tatiyattikaṃ
tika-vin02t:1636_6: anadhiṭṭhita-padena visesetvā pavattaṃ, atthato paṭhamattikena sameti. Anadhiṭṭhitenāti
tika-vin02t:1636_7: ca “paccessaṃ na paccessa”nti evaṃ anadhiṭṭhitena, aniyamitenāti attho. Tatiyattikānantaraṃ
tika-vin02t:1636_9: Tathā ca yojiyamānaṃ itarehi savanantikādīhi aviruddhaṃ hotīti catutthattikaṃ ahutvā
tika-vin02t:1636_10: chakkaṃ jātanti veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ tīṇi tikāni ekaṃ chakkañcāti paṭhamaṃ pannarasakaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1637_0: 316-320. Tato idameva pannarasakaṃ upasaggavisesena dutiyaṃ samādāyapannarasakaṃ
tika-vin02t:1637_1: nāma kataṃ. Puna “vippakatacīvaraṃ ādāyā”ti tatiyaṃ pannarasakaṃ, “samādāyā”ti catutthaṃ
tika-vin02t:1637_2: pannarasakaṃ dassitanti evaṃ cattāri pannarasakāni veditabbāni. Tattha paṭhamadutiyesu
tika-vin02t:1637_3: pannarasakesu sabbena sabbaṃ akatacīvaraṃ adhippetaṃ, itaresu dvīsu vippakatanti
tika-vin02t:1637_5: eko vāroti idamekaṃ catukkaṃ jātaṃ, tasmā pubbe vuttāni tikāni āsāvacchedikāni tīṇi
tika-vin02t:1637_6: ca tikānīti etaṃ anāsāyadvādasakanti veditabbaṃ. Tadanantare āsāyadvādasake kiñcāpi
tika-vin02t:1637_7: paṭhamaṃ dvādasakaṃ labbhati, tathāpi taṃ nibbisesanti tamekaṃ dvādasakaṃ avuttasiddhaṃ
tika-vin02t:1637_8: katvā visesato dassetuṃ ādito paṭṭhāya “antosīmāyaṃ paccessa”nti vuttaṃ. Taṃ dutiyacatukke
tika-vin02t:1637_10: veditabbaṃ. Idaṃ pana dvādasakaṃ anāsāyavasenapi labbhamānaṃ iminā avuttasiddhaṃ
tika-vin02t:1637_11: katvā na dassitanti veditabbaṃ. Evamettha dve dvādasakāni uddharitabbāni. Karaṇīyadvādasakepi
tika-vin02t:1637_12: yathādassitaṃ anāsāyadvādasakaṃ avuttasiddhaṃ āsāyadvādasakañcāti dve dvādasakāni uddharitabbāni.
tika-vin02t:1638_1: idaṃ avuttasiddhameva, tasmā taṃ na vuttaṃ. Ettāvatā ca āvāsapalibodhābhāvo dassito.
tika-vin02t:1638_2: Cīvarapaṭivīsaṃ apavilāyamānoti iminā cīvarapalibodhasamaṅgitamassa dasseti. Tattha
tika-vin02t:1638_3: cīvarapaṭivīsanti attano pattabbacīvarabhāgaṃ. Apavilāyamānoti ākaṅkhamāno. Tassa
tika-vin02t:1638_4: cīvaralābhe sati vassaṃvutthāvāse niṭṭhānasanniṭṭhānanāsanantikānaṃ vasena ekaṃ tikaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1638_5: tesaṃyeva vasena antarāmagge ekaṃ, gataṭṭhāne ekanti tiṇṇaṃ tikānaṃ vasena ekaṃ navakaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1639: 324. Tato paraṃ niṭṭhānasanniṭṭhānanāsanantikasīmātikkantikasaubbhārānaṃ vasena phāsuvihārapañcakaṃ vuttaṃ. Sesamettha pāḷito aṭṭhakathāto ca suviññeyyameva.
tika-vin02t:1644: 329-330. Cīvarakkhandhake kammavipākanti kammajarogaṃ. Saṃyamassāti ānisaṃsassa, upayogatthe cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1646_0: 334-336. Vicchikassa jātoti tassa kira mātuyā utusamaye sayanagatāya vicchiko nābhippadesaṃ
tika-vin02t:1646_1: āruḷho, sā tassa samphassena gabbhaṃ gaṇhi. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “vicchikassa jāto”ti.
tika-vin02t:1648_0: 337. Itarītarenāti itarena itarena. Itara-saddo pana aniyamavacano dvikkhattuṃ vuccamāno
tika-vin02t:1648_1: yaṃkiñci-saddehi samānattho hotīti vuttaṃ “appagghenapi mahagghenapi yena kenacī”ti.
tika-vin02t:1650: 340. Upacāreti susānassa āsanne padese. Chaḍḍetvā gatāti kiñci avatvāyeva chaḍḍetvā gatā. So eva sāmīti akatāya katikāya yena gahitaṃ, sova sāmī.
tika-vin02t:1652_1: sabbesaṃ jānanatthāya vihāramajjheyeva nisinnehi sammannitabbaṃ. Tulābhūtoti tulāsadiso.
tika-vin02t:1652_2: Vaṇṇāvaṇṇaṃ katvāti sabbakoṭṭhāse agghato samake katvā. Tenevāha “same paṭivīse ṭhapetvā”ti.
tika-vin02t:1652_3: Idanti sāmaṇerānaṃ upaḍḍhapaṭivīsassa dānaṃ. Phātikammanti sammuñjanībandhanādihatthakammaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1652_4: Ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontīti mahāsaddaṃ karonti. Samapaṭivīso dātabboti karissāmāti yācantānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1654_0: 344. Rajanakumbhiyā majjhe ṭhapetvāti antorajanakumbhiyā majjhe ṭhapetvā evaṃ vaṭṭādhārake
tika-vin02t:1654_1: antorajanakumbhiyā pakkhitte majjhe udakaṃ tiṭṭhati, vaṭṭādhārakato bahi samantā
tika-vin02t:1654_2: antokumbhiyaṃ rajanacchalli. Rajanaṃ pakkhipitunti rajanacchalliṃ pakkhipituṃ.
tika-vin02t:1656: 346. Uddhaste aruṇeti uggate aruṇasīse. Nandimukhiyāti tuṭṭhamukhiyā.
tika-vin02t:1658: 348. Acchupeyyanti patiṭṭhapeyyaṃ. Hatavatthakānanti kālātītavatthānaṃ. Uddharitvā allīyāpanakhaṇḍanti dubbalaṭṭhānaṃ apanetvā allīyāpanavatthakhaṇḍaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1660: 349-351. Visākhāvatthumhi kallakāyāti akilantakāyā pītisomanassehi phuṭasarīrā. Gatīti ñāṇagati ñāṇādhigamo. Abhisamparāyoti ñāṇābhisamparāyo ñāṇasahito peccabhāvo.
tika-vin02t:1661_0: Taṃ bhagavā byākarissatīti “so bhikkhu sotāpanno sakadāgāmī”tiādinā tassa taṃ ñāṇagatiṃ,
tika-vin02t:1661_1: tato paraṃ “niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā dukkhassantaṃ karissatī”tiādinā
tika-vin02t:1661_2: ñāṇābhisamparāyañca āvi karissati. Sovaggikanti saggasaṃvattanikaṃ. Sokaṃ nudati
tika-vin02t:1663: 353. Dukkhaṃ supatīti nānāvidhasupinaṃ passanto dukkhaṃ supati. Dukkhaṃ paṭibujjhatīti paṭibujjhantopi uttasitvā salomahaṃso dukkhaṃ paṭibujjhati.
tika-vin02t:1665_1: tattha tattha gabbhaṃ dassetvā sibbituṃ. Aggaḷaguttiyeva pamāṇanti imehi catūhi nikkhepakāraṇehi
tika-vin02t:1667_0: 363. Pañca māseti accantasaṃyoge upayogavacanaṃ. Vaḍḍhiṃ payojetvā ṭhapitaupanikkhepatoti
tika-vin02t:1667_1: vassāvāsikatthāya veyyāvaccakarehi vaḍḍhiṃ payojetvā ṭhapitaupanikkhepato. Tatruppādatoti
tika-vin02t:1667_3: vā aññena vā kenaci ākārena saṅghaṃ uddissa uppannacīvaraṃ, sabbaṃ tasseva atthatakathinassa
tika-vin02t:1667_4: pañca māse, anatthatakathinassa ekaṃ cīvaramāsaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti avisesato vatvāpi puna
tika-vin02t:1667_5: vassāvāsikalābhavasena uppanne labbhamānavisesaṃ dassetuṃ “yaṃ pana ida”ntiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1667_6: Tattha idhāti abhilāpamattametaṃ. “Vassaṃvutthasaṅghassa demā”ti vuttepi soyeva nayo.
tika-vin02t:1667_7: Anatthatakathinassapi pañca māse pāpuṇātīti vassāvāsikalābhavasena uppannattā anatthatakathinassapi
tika-vin02t:1667_8: vutthavassassa pañca māse pāpuṇāti. Kenaci pana “idha-saddena niyamitattā”ti kāraṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:1667_9: vuttaṃ, taṃ akāraṇaṃ. Tathā hi idha-saddena aniyametvāpi “vassaṃvutthasaṅghassa demā”ti
tika-vin02t:1667_10: vā “vassāvāsikaṃ demā”ti vā antohemante vassāvāsikalābhavasena dinnaṃ cīvaraṃ anatthatakathinassapi
tika-vin02t:1667_11: vutthavassassa pañca māse pāpuṇāti, teneva parato aṭṭhasu mātikāsu “vassaṃvutthasaṅghassa
tika-vin02t:1667_12: detī”ti imassa mātikāpadassa vinicchaye “cīvaramāsato paṭṭhāya yāva hemantassa pacchimo
tika-vin02t:1667_13: divaso, tāva vassāvāsikaṃ demāti vutte kathinaṃ atthataṃ vā hotu anatthataṃ vā, atītavassaṃvutthānameva
tika-vin02t:1667_14: pāpuṇātī”ti vuttaṃ. Tato paranti pañcamāsato paraṃ, gimhānassa paṭhamadivasato paṭṭhāyāti attho.
tika-vin02t:1668_0: “Kasmā? Piṭṭhisamaye uppannattā”ti idaṃ “udāhu anāgatavasse”ti imassānantaraṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1668_1: Gimhānassa paṭhamadivasato paṭṭhāya uppannameva hi piṭṭhisamaye uppannattā “kiṃ atītavasse
tika-vin02t:1668_2: idaṃ vassāvāsika”ntiādinā pucchitabbaṃ, teneva paratopi vakkhati “gimhānaṃ paṭhamadivasato
tika-vin02t:1668_3: paṭṭhāya vutte pana mātikā āropetabbā ‘atītavassāvāsassa pañca māsā atikkantā, anāgato
tika-vin02t:1668_5: dammī’ti vadati, taṃantovassaṃvutthānameva pāpuṇātī”ti. Potthakesu pana “anatthatakathinassapi
tika-vin02t:1668_6: pañca māse pāpuṇātī”ti imassānantaraṃ “kasmā? Piṭṭhisamaye uppannattā”ti idaṃ likhanti,
tika-vin02t:1668_7: taṃ na yujjati. Na hi piṭṭhisamaye uppannaṃ sandhāya “anatthatakathinassapi pañca
tika-vin02t:1668_8: māse pāpuṇātī”ti vuttaṃ, na ca piṭṭhisamaye uppannaṃ vutthavassasseva pāpuṇāti, sammukhībhūtānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1668_9: sabbesaṃ pāpuṇāti, teneva parato vakkhati “asukavihāre vassaṃvutthasaṅghassāti vadati,
tika-vin02t:1668_10: tatra vassaṃvutthānameva yāva kathinassubbhārā pāpuṇāti. Sace pana gimhānaṃ paṭhamadivasato
tika-vin02t:1668_11: paṭṭhāya evaṃ vadati, tatra sammukhībhūtānaṃ sabbesaṃ pāpuṇāti. Kasmā? Piṭṭhisamaye uppannattā”ti.
tika-vin02t:1669_0: Ṭhitikā pana na tiṭṭhatīti ettha aṭṭhitāya ṭhitikāya puna aññasmiṃ cīvare uppanne
tika-vin02t:1669_1: sace eko bhikkhu āgacchati, majjhe chinditvā dvīhipi gahetabbaṃ. Ṭhitāya pana ṭhitikāya
tika-vin02t:1669_2: puna aññasmiṃ cīvare uppanne sace navakataro āgacchati, ṭhitikā heṭṭhā gacchati.
tika-vin02t:1669_3: Sace vuḍḍhataro āgacchati, ṭhitikā uddhamārohati. Atha añño natthi, puna attano pāpetvā
tika-vin02t:1669_4: gahetabbaṃ. Duggahitāni hontīti ettha saṅghikāneva hontīti adhippāyo. Gahitameva
tika-vin02t:1669_5: nāmāti “imassa idaṃ patta”nti kiñcāpi na viditaṃ, te pana bhāgā atthato tesaṃ pattāyevāti
tika-vin02t:1672_0: 364. Sattāhavārena aruṇameva uṭṭhāpetīti etaṃ vacanamattameva ekasmiṃ vihāre sattāhakiccābhāvato.
tika-vin02t:1672_1: Idanti ekādhippāyadānaṃ. Nānālābhehītiādīsu nānā visuṃ visuṃ lābho etesūti nānālābhā,
tika-vin02t:1672_2: dve vihārā, tehi nānālābhehi. Nānā visuṃ visuṃ pākārādīhi paricchinno upacāro etesanti
tika-vin02t:1672_3: nānūpacārā, tehi nānūpacārehi. Ekasīmavihārehīti ekūpacārasīmāyaṃ dvīhi vihārehi.
tika-vin02t:1674_0: 365. Palipannoti nimuggo, makkhitoti attho. Uccāretvāti ukkhipitvā. Samānācariyakoti
tika-vin02t:1674_1: ettha sacepi ekassa ācariyassa eko antevāsiko hoti, eko saddhivihāriko, etepi aññamaññaṃ
tika-vin02t:1675_0: 366. Bhesajjaṃ yojetuṃ asamattho hotīti vejjena “idañcidañca bhesajjaṃ gahetvā iminā
tika-vin02t:1675_1: yojetvā dātabba”nti vutte tathā kātuṃ asamatthoti attho. Nīhātunti nīharituṃ, chaḍḍetunti attho.
tika-vin02t:1677: 367-369. Bhikkhussa kālakateti ettha kālakata-saddo bhāvasādhanoti āha “kālakiriyāyā”ti. Tattha tattha saṅghassāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ vihāre saṅghassa.
tika-vin02t:1679: 376. Yattha pana dakkhiṇodakaṃ pamāṇanti bhikkhū yasmiṃ raṭṭhe dakkhiṇodakapaaggahaṇamattenapi deyyadhammassa sāmino hontīti adhippāyo. Parasamuddeti jambudīpe.
tika-vin02t:1680_0: 378. Matakacīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhātīti ettha maggaṃ gacchanto tassa kālakiriyaṃ sutvā avihāraṭṭhāne
tika-vin02t:1680_1: ce dvādasaratanabbhantare aññesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abhāvaṃ ñatvā “idaṃ cīvaraṃ mayhaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti
tika-vin02t:1682_1: puggalādhiṭṭhānanayena vuttaṃ. Parikkhepārahaṭṭhānena paricchinnāti iminā aparikkhittassa
tika-vin02t:1682_2: vihārassa dhuvasannipātaṭṭhānādito paṭhamaleḍḍupātassa anto upacārasīmāti dasseti.
tika-vin02t:1682_3: Idāni dutiyaleḍḍupātassa antopi upacārasīmāyevāti dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1682_6: upacārasīmāya vasena veditabbaṃ. Lābhatthāya ṭhapitasīmā lābhasīmā. Samānasaṃvāsaavippavāsasīmāsu
tika-vin02t:1682_7: dinnassa idaṃ nānattaṃ – “avippavāsasīmāya dammī”ti dinnaṃ gāmaṭṭhānaṃ na pāpuṇāti.
tika-vin02t:1683_0: Buddhādhivutthoti buddhena bhagavatā adhivuttho. Ekasminti ekasmiṃ vihāre. Pākavaṭṭanti
tika-vin02t:1683_1: dānavaṭṭaṃ. Vattatīti pavattati. Paṃsukūlikānampi vaṭṭatīti “tuyhaṃ demā”ti avatvā
tika-vin02t:1683_2: “bhikkhūnaṃ dema, therānaṃ demā”ti vuttattā paṃsukūlikānaṃ vaṭṭati. Vicāritamevāti
tika-vin02t:1684_0: Upaḍḍhaṃ dātabbanti yaṃ ubhatosaṅghassa dinnaṃ, tato upaḍḍhaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, upaḍḍhaṃ
tika-vin02t:1684_1: bhikkhunīnaṃ dātabbaṃ. Sacepi eko bhikkhu hoti ekā vā bhikkhunī, antamaso anupasampannassapi
tika-vin02t:1684_2: upaḍḍhameva dātabbaṃ. “Bhikkhusaṅghassa ca bhikkhunīnañca tuyhañcā”ti vutte pana
tika-vin02t:1684_3: puggalo visuṃ na labhatīti idaṃ aṭṭhakathāpamāṇeneva gahetabbaṃ. Na hettha visesakāraṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:1684_4: upalabbhati. Tathā hi “ubhatosaṅghassa ca tuyhañca dammī”ti vutte sāmaññavisesavacanehi
tika-vin02t:1684_5: saṅgahitattā yathā puggalo visuṃ labhati, evamidhāpi “bhikkhusaṅghassa ca tuyhañcā”ti
tika-vin02t:1684_7: tasmā aṭṭhakathāvacanamevettha pamāṇaṃ. Pāpuṇanaṭṭhānato ekameva labhatīti attano
tika-vin02t:1684_8: vassaggena pattaṭṭhānato ekameva koṭṭhāsaṃ labhati. Tattha kāraṇamāha “kasmā? Bhikkhusaṅghaggahaṇena
tika-vin02t:1684_9: gahitattā”ti, bhikkhusaṅghaggahaṇeneva puggalassapi gahitattāti adhippāyo. Bhikkhusaṅghassa
tika-vin02t:1684_10: harāti vuttepi haritabbanti īdisaṃ gihiveyyāvaccaṃ na hotīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1685_0: Lakkhaṇaññū vadantīti idaṃ sanniṭṭhānavacanaṃ, aṭṭhakathāsu anāgatattā pana evaṃ
tika-vin02t:1685_1: vuttaṃ. Bahiupacārasīmāyaṃ…pe… sabbesaṃ pāpuṇātīti yattha katthaci vutthavassānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1685_2: sabbesaṃ pāpuṇātīti adhippāyo. Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyampi “sace pana bahiupacārasīmāyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1685_3: ṭhito ‘vassaṃvutthasaṅghassā’ti vadati, yattha katthaci vutthavassānaṃ sabbesaṃ sampattānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1685_4: pāpuṇātī”ti vuttaṃ. Gaṇṭhipadesu pana “vassāvāsassa ananurūpe padese ṭhatvā vuttattā
tika-vin02t:1685_5: vassaṃvutthānaṃ avutthānañca sabbesaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Na hi
tika-vin02t:1685_6: “vassaṃvutthasaṅghassa dammī”ti vutte avutthavassānaṃ pāpuṇāti. Evaṃ vadatīti “vassaṃvutthasaṅghassa
tika-vin02t:1685_7: dammī”ti vadati. Uddesaṃ gahetuṃ āgatoti tassa santike uddesaṃ agahitapubbassapi
tika-vin02t:1685_8: uddesaṃ gaṇhissāmīti āgatakālato paṭṭhāya antevāsikabhāvūpagamanato vuttaṃ. Sesamettha suviññeyyameva.
tika-vin02t:1690_0: 380. Campeyyakkhandhake campāyanti evaṃnāmake nagare. Tassa hi nagarassa ārāmapokkharaṇīādīsu
tika-vin02t:1690_1: tesu tesu ṭhānesu campakarukkhāva ussannā ahesuṃ, tasmā “campā”ti saṅkhaṃ agamāsi.
tika-vin02t:1690_2: Gaggarāya pokkharaṇiyā tīreti tassa campānagarassa avidūre gaggarāya nāma rājamahesiyā
tika-vin02t:1690_3: khaṇitattā “gaggarā”ti laddhavohārā pokkharaṇī atthi, tassā tīre samantato nīlādipañcavaṇṇakusumapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
tika-vin02t:1690_4: mahantaṃ campakavanaṃ, tasmiṃ bhagavā kusumagandhasugandhe campakavane viharati.
tika-vin02t:1690_5: Taṃ sandhāya “gaggarāya pokkharaṇiyā tīre”ti vuttaṃ. Tantibaddhoti tanti vuccati
tika-vin02t:1690_6: byāpāro, tattha baddho pasuto ussukkaṃ āpannoti attho, tasmiṃ āvāse akataṃ senāsanaṃ
tika-vin02t:1690_7: karoti, jiṇṇaṃ paṭisaṅkharoti, kate issaro hotīti adhippāyo. Tenāha “tasmiṃ āvāse
tika-vin02t:1692_0: 385-387. Paṭikkosantesūti nivārentesu. Hāpanaṃ vā aññathā karaṇaṃ vā natthīti ñattikammassa
tika-vin02t:1692_1: ekāya eva ñattiyā kattabbattā tato hāpanaṃ na sambhavati, anussāvanāya abhāvato pacchā
tika-vin02t:1692_2: ñattiṭhapanavasena dvīhi ñattīhi karaṇavasena ca aññathā karaṇaṃ natthi.
tika-vin02t:1696_0: 395. Appatto nissāraṇanti ettha nissāraṇakammaṃ nāma kuladūsakānaññeva anuññātaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1696_1: ayañca “bālo hoti abyatto”tiādinā niddiṭṭho kuladūsako na hoti, tasmā “appatto”ti
tika-vin02t:1696_2: vutto. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ sunissārito hotīti? Bālaabyattatādiyuttassapi kammakkhandhake
tika-vin02t:1696_4: tasmā sunissārito hotī”ti. Tattha tanti pabbājanīyakammaṃ. Esoti “bālo”tiādinā niddiṭṭho.
tika-vin02t:1697_0: Tañce saṅgho nissāreti, sunissāritoti ettha adhippetassa pabbājanīyakammassa vasena
tika-vin02t:1697_1: atthaṃ dassetvā idāni yadi “tañce saṅgho nissāretī”ti tajjanīyādikammavasena nissāraṇā
tika-vin02t:1697_2: adhippetā, tadā nissāraṇaṃ sampattoyeva tajjanīyādivasena sunissāritoti byatirekamukhena
tika-vin02t:1697_3: atthaṃ dassetuṃ puna “tañce saṅgho nissāretī”ti ulliṅgetvā attho kathito. Natthi
tika-vin02t:1697_4: etassa apadānaṃ avakhaṇḍanaṃ āpattipariyantoti anapadāno. Ekekenapi aṅgena nissāraṇā
tika-vin02t:1697_5: anuññātāti kammakkhandhake anuññātā. Sesamettha pāḷito aṭṭhakathāto ca suviññeyyameva.
tika-vin02t:1702_0: 451. Kosambakakkhandhake sace hoti, desessāmīti subbacatāya sikkhākāmatāya ca āpattiṃ
tika-vin02t:1702_1: passi. Natthi āpattīti anāpattipakkhopi ettha sambhavatīti adhippāyenāha. Sā panāpatti
tika-vin02t:1702_2: eva. Tenāha “so tassā āpattiyā anāpattidiṭṭhi ahosī”ti.
tika-vin02t:1703_0: 453-454. Sambhamaatthavasenāti turitatthavasena. “Akāraṇe tumhehi so bhikkhu ukkhitto”ti
tika-vin02t:1703_1: vadeyyāti yasmā pubbe vinayadharassa vacanena “sace āpatti hoti, desessāmī”ti anena
tika-vin02t:1703_2: paṭiññātaṃ, idānipi tasseva vacanena “asañcicca assatiyā katattā natthettha āpattī”ti
tika-vin02t:1703_3: anāpattisaññī, tasmā “akāraṇe tumhehi so bhikkhu ukkhitto”ti ukkhepake bhikkhū yadi
tika-vin02t:1703_4: vadeyyāti adhippāyo. Ukkhittānuvattake vā “tumhe āpattiṃ āpannā”ti vadeyyāti yasmā
tika-vin02t:1703_5: vatthujānanacittenāyaṃ sacittakā āpatti, ayañca udakāvasese udakāvasesasaññī, tasmā
tika-vin02t:1703_6: sāpattikasseva “tumhe chandāgatiṃ gacchathā”ti adhippāyena “tumhe āpattiṃ āpannā”ti
tika-vin02t:1704_0: 455-456. Kammaṃ kopetīti “nānāsaṃvāsakacatuttho ce, bhikkhave, kammaṃ kareyya, akammaṃ
tika-vin02t:1704_1: na ca karaṇīya”ntiādivacanato sace saṅgho taṃ gaṇapūrakaṃ katvā kammaṃ kareyya, ayaṃ
tika-vin02t:1704_2: tattha nisinnopi taṃ kammaṃ kopetīti adhippāyo. Upacāraṃ muñcitvāti ettha upacāro
tika-vin02t:1705_0: 457. Bhaṇḍanajātātiādīsu kalahassa pubbabhāgo bhaṇḍanaṃ nāma, taṃ jātaṃ etesanti
tika-vin02t:1705_1: bhaṇḍanajātā, hatthaparāmāsādivasena matthakaṃ patto kalaho jāto etesanti kalahajātā,
tika-vin02t:1705_2: viruddhavādabhūtaṃ vādaṃ āpannāti vivādāpannā. Mukhasattīhīti vācāsattīhi. Vitudantāti
tika-vin02t:1705_3: vijjhantā. Bhagavantaṃ etadavocāti “idha, bhante, kosambiyaṃ bhikkhū bhaṇḍanajātā”tiādivacanaṃ
tika-vin02t:1705_4: avoca, tañca kho neva piyakamyatāya, na bhedādhippāyena, atha kho atthakāmatāya hitakāmatāya.
tika-vin02t:1705_5: Sāmaggīkārako kiresa bhikkhu, tasmāssa etadahosi “yathā ime bhikkhū vivādaṃ āraddhā,
tika-vin02t:1705_6: na sakkā mayā, nāpi aññena bhikkhunā samagge kātuṃ, appeva nāma sadevake loke aggapuggalo
tika-vin02t:1705_7: bhagavā sayaṃ vā gantvā attano vā santikaṃ pakkosāpetvā etesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ khantimettāpaṭisaṃyuttaṃ
tika-vin02t:1705_8: sāraṇīyadhammadesanaṃ kathetvā sāmaggiṃ kareyyā”ti atthakāmatāya hitakāmatāya gantvā
tika-vin02t:1705_9: avoca. Tasmā evamāhāti atthakāmattā evamāha, na bhagavato vacanaṃ anādiyanto. Ye
tika-vin02t:1705_10: pana tadā satthu vacanaṃ na gaṇhiṃsu, te kiñci avatvā tuṇhībhūtā maṅkubhūtā aṭṭhaṃsu,
tika-vin02t:1708_0: 458. Atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesītiādīsu bhūtapubbanti idaṃ bhagavā pathavīgataṃ
tika-vin02t:1708_1: nidhiṃ uddharitvā purato rāsiṃ karonto viya bhavapaṭicchannaṃ purāvutthaṃ dassento
tika-vin02t:1708_2: āha. Aḍḍhoti issaro. Yo koci attano santakena vibhavena aḍḍho hoti, ayaṃ pana na
tika-vin02t:1708_3: kevalaṃ aḍḍhoyeva, mahaddhano mahatā aparimāṇasaṅkhena dhanena samannāgatoti āha
tika-vin02t:1708_4: “mahaddhano”ti. Bhuñjitabbato paribhuñjitabbato visesato kāmā bhogā nāma, tasmā pañcakāmaguṇavasena
tika-vin02t:1708_5: mahantā uḷārā bhogā assāti mahābhogo. Mahantaṃ senābalañceva thāmabalañca etassāti
tika-vin02t:1708_6: mahabbalo. Mahanto hatthiassādivāhano etassāti mahāvāhano. Mahantaṃ vijitaṃ raṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin02t:1708_7: etassāti mahāvijito. Paripuṇṇakosakoṭṭhāgāroti koso vuccati bhaṇḍāgārasāragabbho,
tika-vin02t:1708_8: koṭṭhaṃ vuccati dhaññassa āṭhapanaṭṭhānaṃ, koṭṭhabhūtaṃ agāraṃ koṭṭhāgāraṃ, nidahitvā
tika-vin02t:1708_9: ṭhapitena dhanena paripuṇṇakoso dhaññānañca paripuṇṇakoṭṭhāgāroti attho.
tika-vin02t:1709_0: Atha vā catubbidho koso hatthī assā rathā pattīti. Yathā hi asino tikkhabhāvaparipālako
tika-vin02t:1709_1: paricchado “koso”ti vuccati, evaṃ rañño tikkhabhāvaparipālakattā caturaṅginī senā
tika-vin02t:1709_2: “koso”ti vuccati. Tividhaṃ koṭṭhāgāraṃ dhanakoṭṭhāgāraṃ dhaññakoṭṭhāgāraṃ vatthakoṭṭhāgāranti.
tika-vin02t:1709_3: Taṃ sabbampi paripuṇṇamassāti paripuṇṇakosakoṭṭhāgāro. Caturaṅginiṃ senanti hatthiassarathapattisaṅkhātehi
tika-vin02t:1709_4: catūhi aṅgehi samannāgataṃ senaṃ. Sannayhitvāti cammapaṭimuñcanādīhi sannāhaṃ kāretvā.
tika-vin02t:1709_5: Abbhuyyāsīti abhiuyyāsi, abhimukho hutvā nikkhamīti attho. Ekasaṅghātampīti ekappahārampi.
tika-vin02t:1709_6: Dhovananti dhovanudakaṃ. Parinetvāti nīharitvā. “Anatthado”ti vattabbe da-kārassa
tika-vin02t:1710_0: 464. Vaggabhāvena vā puthu nānā saddo assāti puthusaddo. Samajanoti bhaṇḍane samajjhāsayo
tika-vin02t:1710_1: jano. Tatthāti tasmiṃ janakāye. Ahaṃ bāloti na maññitthāti bālalakkhaṇe ṭhitopi “ahaṃ
tika-vin02t:1710_2: bālo”ti na maññi. Bhiyyo cāti attano bālabhāvassa ajānanato bhiyyo ca bhaṇḍanassa
tika-vin02t:1710_3: upariphoṭo viya saṅghabhedassa attano kāraṇabhāvampi uppajjamānaṃ na maññittha nāññāsi.
tika-vin02t:1711_0: Kalahavasena pavattavācāyeva gocarā etesanti vācāgocarā. Mukhāyāmanti vivadanavasena
tika-vin02t:1711_1: mukhaṃ āyāmetvā bhāṇino. Na taṃ jānantīti taṃ kalahaṃ na jānanti. Kalahaṃ karonto
tika-vin02t:1711_2: ca taṃ na jānanto nāma natthi. Yathā pana na jānanti, taṃ dassetuṃ āha “evaṃ sādīnavo
tika-vin02t:1711_3: aya”nti, ayaṃ kalaho nāma attano paresañca atthahāpanato anatthuppādanato diṭṭheva
tika-vin02t:1711_4: dhamme samparāye ca sādīnavo sadosoti attho. Taṃ na jānantīti taṃ kalahaṃ na jānanti.
tika-vin02t:1711_5: Kathaṃ na jānantīti āha “evaṃ sādīnavo aya”nti, “evaṃ sādīnavo ayaṃ kalaho”ti evaṃ
tika-vin02t:1712_0: Akkocchi mantiādīsu akkocchīti akkosi. Avadhīti pahari. Ajinīti kūṭasakkhiotāraṇena
tika-vin02t:1712_1: vā vādapaṭivādena vā karaṇuttariyakaraṇena vā ajesi. Ahāsīti mama santakaṃ pattādīsu
tika-vin02t:1712_2: kiñcideva avahari. Ye ca tanti ye keci devā vā manussā vā gahaṭṭhā vā pabbajitā vā
tika-vin02t:1712_3: taṃ “akkocchi ma”ntiādivatthukaṃ kodhaṃ sakaṭadhuraṃ viya naddhinā pūtimacchādīni
tika-vin02t:1712_4: viya ca kusādīhi punappunaṃ veṭhentā upanayhanti upanāhavasena anubandhanti, tesaṃ
tika-vin02t:1712_5: sakiṃ uppannaṃ veraṃ na sammatīti attho.
tika-vin02t:1713_0: Ye ca taṃ nupanayhantīti assatiyā amanasikāravasena vā kammapaccavekkhaṇādivasena
tika-vin02t:1713_1: vā ye taṃ akkosādivatthukaṃ kodhaṃ “tayāpi koci niddoso purimabhave akkuṭṭho bhavissati,
tika-vin02t:1713_2: pahaṭo bhavissati, kūṭasakkhiṃ otāretvā jito bhavissati, kassaci te pasayha kiñci
tika-vin02t:1713_3: acchinnaṃ bhavissati, tasmā niddoso hutvāpi akkosādīni pāpuṇāsī”ti evaṃ na upanayhanti,
tika-vin02t:1713_4: tesu pamādena uppannampi veraṃ iminā anupanayhanena nirindhano viya jātavedo upasammati.
tika-vin02t:1714_0: Na hi verena verānīti yathā hi kheḷasiṅghāṇikādiasucimakkhitaṃ ṭhānaṃ teheva asucīhi
tika-vin02t:1714_1: dhovanto suddhaṃ niggandhaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti, atha kho taṃ ṭhānaṃ bhiyyoso mattāya
tika-vin02t:1714_2: asuddhatarañca duggandhatarañca hoti, evameva akkosantaṃ paccakkosanto paharantaṃ
tika-vin02t:1714_3: paṭipaharanto verena veraṃ vūpasametuṃ na sakkoti, atha kho bhiyyo verameva karoti.
tika-vin02t:1714_4: Iti verāni nāma verena kismiñcipi kāle na sammanti, atha kho vaḍḍhantiyeva. Averena
tika-vin02t:1714_5: ca sammantīti yathā pana tāni kheḷādīni asucīni vippasannena udakena dhoviyamānāni
tika-vin02t:1714_6: nassanti, taṃ ṭhānaṃ suddhaṃ hoti niggandhaṃ, evameva averena khantimettodakena yonisomanasikārena
tika-vin02t:1714_7: paṭisaṅkhānena paccavekkhaṇena verāni vūpasammanti paṭippassambhanti abhāvaṃ gacchanti.
tika-vin02t:1714_8: Esa dhammo sanantanoti esa averena verūpasamanasaṅkhāto porāṇako dhammo sabbesaṃ
tika-vin02t:1715_0: Na jānantīti aniccasaññaṃ na paccupaṭṭhāpentīti adhippāyo. Tato sammanti medhagāti
tika-vin02t:1715_1: tato tasmā kāraṇā medhagā kalahā sammanti vūpasamaṃ gacchanti. Kathaṃ te sammantīti
tika-vin02t:1715_2: āha “evañhī”tiādi. Tattha evañhi te jānantāti te paṇḍitā “mayaṃ maccusamīpaṃ gacchāmā”ti
tika-vin02t:1715_3: evaṃ jānantā yonisomanasikāraṃ uppādetvā medhagānaṃ kalahānaṃ vūpasamāya paṭipajjanti,
tika-vin02t:1715_4: atha nesaṃ tāya paṭipattiyā te medhagā sammantīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:1716_0: Tesampi hoti saṅgatīti ye mātāpitūnaṃ aṭṭhīni chindanti, pāṇe haranti, gavādīni ca
tika-vin02t:1716_1: pasayha gaṇhanti, evaṃ raṭṭhaṃ vilumpamānānaṃ tesampi saṅgati hoti, kimaṅgaṃ pana
tika-vin02t:1717_0: Vaṇṇāvaṇṇadīpanatthaṃ vuttāti “bālasahāyatāya ime bhikkhū kalahapasutā, paṇḍitasahāyānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1717_1: pana idaṃ na siyā”ti paṇḍitasahāyassa bālasahāyassa ca vaṇṇāvaṇṇadīpanatthaṃ vuttā.
tika-vin02t:1717_2: Nipakanti nepakkapaññāya samannāgataṃ. Sādhuvihāri dhīranti bhaddakavihāriṃ paṇḍitaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1717_3: Pākaṭaparissaye ca paṭicchannaparissaye ca abhibhavitvāti sīhabyagghādayo pākaṭaparissaye
tika-vin02t:1717_4: ca rāgabhayadosabhayādayo paṭicchannaparissaye cāti sabbeva parissaye abhibhavitvā.
tika-vin02t:1718_0: Ekakā cariṃsūti “idaṃ rajjaṃ nāma mahantaṃ pamādaṭṭhānaṃ, kiṃ amhākaṃ rajjena kāritenā”ti
tika-vin02t:1718_1: raṭṭhaṃ pahāya tato mahāaraññaṃ pavisitvā tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā catūsu iriyāpathesu
tika-vin02t:1719_0: Ekassa caritaṃ seyyoti pabbajitassa pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya ekībhāvābhiratassa ekakasseva
tika-vin02t:1719_1: caritaṃ seyyoti attho. Natthi bāle sahāyatāti cūḷasīlaṃ majjhimasīlaṃ mahāsīlaṃ dasa
tika-vin02t:1719_2: kathāvatthūni terasa dhutaguṇā vipassanāñāṇaṃ cattāro maggā cattāri phalāni tisso
tika-vin02t:1719_3: vijjā cha abhiññā amatamahānibbānanti ayaṃ sahāyatā nāma, sā bālaṃ nissāya adhigantuṃ
tika-vin02t:1719_4: na sakkāti natthi bāle sahāyatā. Mātaṅgo araññe mātaṅgaraññeti saralopena sandhi.
tika-vin02t:1719_5: “Mātaṅgarañño”tipi pāṭho, araññako mātaṅgo viyāti attho. Mātaṅga-saddeneva hatthibhāvassa
tika-vin02t:1719_6: vuttattā nāgavacanaṃ tassa mahattavibhāvanatthanti āha “nāgoti mahantādhivacanameta”nti.
tika-vin02t:1719_7: Mahantapariyāyo hi nāga-saddo hoti “etaṃ nāgassa nāgena, īsādantassa hatthino”tiādīsu.
tika-vin02t:1722_1: dhammasenāpatimahāmoggallānattheresu vā asītimahāsāvakesu vā antamaso dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṃ
tika-vin02t:1722_2: ānandattherampi kañci anāmantetvā sayameva pattacīvaramādāya anīkanissaṭo hatthī
tika-vin02t:1722_3: viya yūthanissaṭo kāḷasīho viya vātacchinno valāhako viya ca ekakova upasaṅkami.
tika-vin02t:1722_4: Kasmā upasaṅkami? Gaṇe kirassa ādīnavaṃ disvā ekavihāriṃ bhikkhuṃ passitukāmatā udapādi,
tika-vin02t:1722_5: tasmā sītādipīḷito uṇhādiṃ patthayamāno viya upasaṅkami. Atha vā bhagavatā so ādīnavo
tika-vin02t:1722_6: pageva pariññāto, na tena satthā nibbinno, tasmiṃ pana antovasse keci buddhaveneyyā
tika-vin02t:1722_7: nāhesuṃ, tena aññattha gamanaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ damanupāyoti pālileyyakaṃ uddissa
tika-vin02t:1722_8: gacchanto ekavihāriṃ āyasmantaṃ bhaguṃ sampahaṃsetuṃ tattha gato. Evaṃ gate ca satthari
tika-vin02t:1722_9: pañcasatā bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āhaṃsu “āvuso ānanda satthā ekakova gato, mayaṃ
tika-vin02t:1722_10: anubandhissāmā”ti. “Āvuso, yadā bhagavā sāmaṃ senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya
tika-vin02t:1722_11: anāmantetvā upaṭṭhāke anapaloketvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ adutiyo gacchati, tadā ekacārikaṃ
tika-vin02t:1722_12: carituṃ bhagavato ajjhāsayo, sāvakena nāma satthu ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1722_13: tasmā na imesu divasesu bhagavā anugantabbo”ti nivāresi, sayampi nānugañchi. Dhammiyā
tika-vin02t:1725_0: 466. Yena pācīnavaṃsadāyoti tattha kasmā upasaṅkami? Yathā nāma jighacchitassa bhojane,
tika-vin02t:1725_1: pipāsitassa pānīye, sītena phuṭṭhassa uṇhe, uṇhena phuṭṭhassa sīte, dukkhitassa sukhe
tika-vin02t:1725_2: abhiruci uppajjati, evameva bhagavato kosambake bhikkhū aññamaññaṃ vivādāpanne asamaggavāsaṃ
tika-vin02t:1725_3: vasante, samaggavāsaṃ vasante āvajjentassa ime tayo kulaputtā āpāthamāgamiṃsu, atha
tika-vin02t:1725_4: nesaṃ paggaṇhitukāmo upasaṅkami “evāyaṃ paṭipattianukkamena kosambakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin02t:1725_5: vinayanūpāyo hotī”ti. Viharantīti sāmaggirasaṃ anubhavamānā viharanti.
tika-vin02t:1726_0: Dāyapāloti araññapālo. So araññaṃ yathā icchiticchitappadesena manussā pavisitvā
tika-vin02t:1726_1: tattha pupphaṃ vā phalaṃ vā niyyāsaṃ vā dabbasambhāraṃ vā na haranti, evaṃ vatiyā
tika-vin02t:1726_2: parikkhittassa araññassa yojite dvāre nisīditvā araññaṃ rakkhati, tasmā “dāyapālo”ti
tika-vin02t:1726_3: vutto. Attakāmarūpā viharantīti attano hitaṃ kāmayamānasabhāvā hutvā viharanti. Yo
tika-vin02t:1726_4: hi imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitvāpi vejjakammadūtakammapahiṇagamanādīnaṃ vasena ekavīsatianesanāhi
tika-vin02t:1726_5: jīvikaṃ kappeti, ayaṃ na attakāmarūpo nāma. Yo pana imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitvā ekavīsatianesanaṃ
tika-vin02t:1726_6: pahāya catupārisuddhisīle patiṭṭhāya buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā sappāyadhutaṅgaṃ adhiṭṭhāya
tika-vin02t:1726_7: aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu cittaruciyaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā gāmantaṃ pahāya araññaṃ
tika-vin02t:1726_8: pavisitvā samāpattiyo nibbattetvā vipassanāya kammaṃ kurumāno vicarati, ayaṃ attakāmo
tika-vin02t:1726_9: nāma. Tepi tayo kulaputtā evarūpā ahesuṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “attakāmarūpā viharantī”ti.
tika-vin02t:1727_0: Mā tesaṃ aphāsumakāsīti tesaṃ aphāsukaṃ mā akāsīti bhagavantaṃ vāresi. Evaṃ kirassa
tika-vin02t:1727_1: ahosi “ime kulaputtā samaggā viharanti, ekaccassa ca gataṭṭhāne bhaṇḍanakalahavivādā
