tika-vin02t:1727_2: vattanti, tikhiṇasiṅgo caṇḍagoṇo viya ovijjhanto vicarati, athekamaggena dvinnaṃ
tika-vin02t:1727_3: gamanaṃ na hoti, kadāci ayampi evaṃ karonto imesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ samaggavāsaṃ bhindeyya,
tika-vin02t:1727_4: pāsādiko ca panesa suvaṇṇavaṇṇo rasagiddho maññe, gatakālato paṭṭhāya paṇītadāyakānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1727_5: attano upaṭṭhākānaṃ vaṇṇakathanādīhi imesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ appamādavihāraṃ bhindeyya,
tika-vin02t:1727_6: vasanaṭṭhānāni cāpi etesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ nibaddhāni paricchinnāni tissova paṇṇasālā
tika-vin02t:1727_7: tayo caṅkamā tīṇi divāṭṭhānāni tīṇi mañcapīṭhāni, ayaṃ pana samaṇo mahākāyo vuḍḍhataro
tika-vin02t:1727_8: maññe bhavissati, so akāle ime kulaputte senāsanā vuṭṭhapessati, evaṃ sabbathāpi
tika-vin02t:1727_9: etesaṃ aphāsu bhavissatī”ti. Taṃ anicchanto “mā tesaṃ aphāsumakāsī”ti bhagavantaṃ vāreti.
tika-vin02t:1728_0: Kiṃ panesa jānanto vāresi ajānantoti? Ajānanto. Sammāsambuddho hi nāma yadā anekabhikkhusahassaparivāro
tika-vin02t:1728_2: dassento vicarati, tadā “ko eso”ti apucchitvāva jānitabbo hoti. Tadā pana bhagavā
tika-vin02t:1728_3: “māssu koci mama buddhānubhāvaṃ aññāsī”ti tathārūpena iddhābhisaṅkhārena sabbampi
tika-vin02t:1728_4: taṃ buddhānubhāvaṃ cīvaragabbhena viya paṭicchādetvā valāhakagabbhena paṭicchanno
tika-vin02t:1728_5: puṇṇacando viya sayameva pattacīvaramādāya aññātakavesena agamāsi. Iti taṃ ajānantova dāyapālo vāresi.
tika-vin02t:1729_0: Etadavocāti thero kira “mā samaṇā”ti dāyapālassa kathaṃ sutvā cintesi “mayaṃ tayo
tika-vin02t:1729_1: janā idha viharāma, añño pabbajito nāma natthi, ayañca dāyapālo pabbajitena viya
tika-vin02t:1729_2: saddhiṃ katheti, ko nu kho bhavissatī”ti divāṭṭhānato uṭṭhāya dvāre ṭhatvā maggaṃ
tika-vin02t:1729_3: olokento bhagavantaṃ addasa. Bhagavāpi therassa saha dassaneneva sarīrobhāsaṃ muñci,
tika-vin02t:1729_4: asītianubyañjanavirājitā byāmappabhā pasāritasuvaṇṇapaṭo viya virocittha. Thero “ayaṃ
tika-vin02t:1729_5: dāyapālo phaṇakataāsīvisaṃ gīvāya gahetuṃ hatthaṃ pasārento viya loke aggapuggalena
tika-vin02t:1729_6: saddhiṃ kathentova na jānāti, aññatarabhikkhunā viya saddhiṃ kathetī”ti nivārento
tika-vin02t:1730_0: Tenupasaṅkamīti kasmā bhagavato paccuggamanaṃ akatvāva upasaṅkami? Evaṃ kirassa ahosi
tika-vin02t:1730_1: “mayaṃ tayo janā samaggavāsaṃ vasāma, sacāhaṃ ekakova paccuggamanaṃ karissāmi, samaggavāso
tika-vin02t:1730_2: nāma na bhavissati, piyamitte gahetvāva paccuggamanaṃ karissāmi. Yathā ca bhagavā
tika-vin02t:1730_3: mayhaṃ piyo, evaṃ sahāyānampi me piyo”ti tehi saddhiṃ paccuggamanaṃ kātukāmo sayaṃ
tika-vin02t:1730_4: akatvā upasaṅkami. Keci pana “tesaṃ therānaṃ paṇṇasāladvāre caṅkamanakoṭiyā bhagavato
tika-vin02t:1730_5: āgamanamaggo hoti, tasmā thero tesaṃ saññaṃ dadamānova gato”ti vadanti. Abhikkamathāti
tika-vin02t:1730_6: ito āgacchatha. Pāde pakkhālesīti vikasitapadumasannibhehi jālahatthehi maṇivaṇṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:1730_7: udakaṃ gahetvā suvaṇṇavaṇṇesu piṭṭhipādesu udakaṃ āsiñcitvā pādena pādaṃ ghaṃsento
tika-vin02t:1730_8: pakkhālesi. Buddhānaṃ kāye rajojallaṃ nāma na upalimpati, kasmā pakkhālesīti? Sarīrassa
tika-vin02t:1730_9: utuggahaṇatthaṃ tesañca cittasampahaṃsanatthaṃ. Amhehi abhihaṭena udakena bhagavā
tika-vin02t:1730_10: pāde pakkhālesi, paribhogaṃ akāsīti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ balavasomanassavasena cittaṃ
tika-vin02t:1731_0: Āyasmantaṃ anuruddhaṃ bhagavā etadavocāti so kira tesaṃ vuḍḍhataro, tassa saṅgahe
tika-vin02t:1731_1: kate sesānaṃ katova hotīti theraññeva etaṃ “kacci vo anuruddhā”tiādivacanaṃ avoca.
tika-vin02t:1731_2: Anuruddhāti vā ekasesanayena vuttaṃ virūpekasesassapi icchitabbattā, evañca katvā
tika-vin02t:1731_3: bahuvacananiddeso ca samatthito hoti. Kaccīti pucchanatthe nipāto. Voti sāmivacanaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1731_4: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – kacci anuruddhā tumhākaṃ khamanīyaṃ, iriyāpatho vo khamati, kacci
tika-vin02t:1731_5: yāpanīyaṃ, kacci vo jīvitaṃ yāpeti ghaṭiyati, kacci piṇḍakena na kilamatha, kacci
tika-vin02t:1731_6: tumhākaṃ sulabhapiṇḍaṃ, sampatte vo disvā manussā uḷuṅkayāguṃ vā kaṭacchubhikkhaṃ
tika-vin02t:1731_7: vā dātabbaṃ maññantīti bhikkhācāravattaṃ pucchati. Kasmā? Yasmā paccayena akilamantena
tika-vin02t:1731_8: sakkā samaṇadhammo kātuṃ, vattameva vā etaṃ pabbajitānaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1732_0: Atha tena paṭivacane dinne “anuruddhā tumhe rājapabbajitā mahāpuññā, manussā tumhākaṃ
tika-vin02t:1732_1: araññe vasantānaṃ adatvā kassa aññassa dātabbaṃ maññissanti, tumhe pana etaṃ bhuñjitvā
tika-vin02t:1732_2: kiṃ nu kho migapotakā viya aññamaññaṃ ghaṭṭentā viharatha, udāhu sāmaggibhāvo vo
tika-vin02t:1732_3: atthī”ti sāmaggirasaṃ pucchanto “kacci pana vo anuruddhā samaggā”tiādimāha. Tattha
tika-vin02t:1732_4: khīrodakībhūtāti yathā khīrañca udakañca aññamaññaṃ saṃsandati, visuṃ na hoti, ekattaṃ
tika-vin02t:1732_5: viya upeti, kacci evaṃ sāmaggivasena ekattupagatacittuppādā viharathāti pucchati.
tika-vin02t:1732_6: Piyacakkhūhīti mettacittaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā olokanato piyabhāvadīpakāni cakkhūni
tika-vin02t:1732_7: piyacakkhūni nāma, “kacci tathārūpehi cakkhūhi aññamaññaṃ passantā viharathā”ti pucchati.
tika-vin02t:1732_8: Tagghāti ekaṃsatthe nipāto, ekaṃsena mayaṃ bhanteti vuttaṃ hoti. Yathā kathaṃ panāti
tika-vin02t:1732_9: ettha yathāti nipātamattaṃ, kathanti kāraṇapucchā, kathaṃ pana tumhe evaṃ viharatha,
tika-vin02t:1732_10: kena kāraṇena viharatha, taṃ me kāraṇaṃ brūhīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin02t:1733_0: Mettaṃ kāyakammanti mettacittavasena pavattaṃ kāyakammaṃ. Āvi ceva raho cāti sammukhā
tika-vin02t:1733_1: ceva parammukhā ca. Itaresupi eseva nayo. Tattha sammukhā kāyavacīkammāni sahavāse
tika-vin02t:1733_2: labbhanti, itarāni vippavāse, manokammaṃ sabbattha labbhati. Yañhi saheva vasantesu
tika-vin02t:1733_3: ekena mañcapīṭhaṃ vā dārubhaṇḍaṃ vā mattikābhaṇḍaṃ vā bahi dunnikkhittaṃ hoti, taṃ
tika-vin02t:1733_4: disvā “kenidaṃ vaḷañjita”nti avaññaṃ akatvā attanā dunnikkhittaṃ viya gahetvā paṭisāmentassa
tika-vin02t:1733_5: paṭijaggitabbayuttaṃ vā pana ṭhānaṃ paṭijaggantassa sammukhā mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma
tika-vin02t:1733_6: hoti. Ekasmiṃ pakkante tena dunnikkhittaṃ senāsanaparikkhāraṃ tatheva nikkhipantassa
tika-vin02t:1733_7: paṭijaggitabbayuttaṃ vā pana ṭhānaṃ paṭijaggantassa parammukhā mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ
tika-vin02t:1733_8: nāma hoti. Sahavasantassa pana therehi saddhiṃ madhuraṃ sammodanīyakathaṃ paṭisanthārakathaṃ
tika-vin02t:1733_9: sāraṇīyakathaṃ dhammakathaṃ sarabhaññaṃ sākacchaṃ pañhapucchanaṃ pañhavissajjananti
tika-vin02t:1733_10: evamādikaraṇe sammukhā mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma hoti. Theresu pana pakkantesu “mayhaṃ
tika-vin02t:1733_11: piyasahāyo nandiyatthero kimilatthero evaṃ sīlasampanno evaṃ ācārasampanno”tiādiguṇakathane
tika-vin02t:1733_12: parammukhā mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma hoti. “Mayhaṃ piyamitto nandiyatthero kimilatthero
tika-vin02t:1733_13: avero hotu abyāpajjo sukhī”ti evaṃ samannāharato pana sammukhāpi parammukhāpi mettaṃ
tika-vin02t:1734_0: Nānā hi kho no bhante kāyāti ayañhi kāyo piṭṭhaṃ viya mattikā viya ca omadditvā ekato
tika-vin02t:1734_1: kātuṃ na sakkā. Ekañca pana maññe cittanti cittaṃ pana no attano viya aññamaññassa
tika-vin02t:1734_2: hitabhāvena avirodhabhāvena bhedābhāvena samaggabhāvena ekamevāti dasseti. Kathaṃ
tika-vin02t:1734_3: panete sakaṃ cittaṃ nikkhipitvā itaresaṃ cittavasena vattiṃsūti? Ekassa patte malaṃ
tika-vin02t:1734_4: uṭṭhahati, ekassa cīvaraṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ hoti, ekassa paribhaṇḍakammaṃ hoti. Tattha yassa
tika-vin02t:1734_5: patte malaṃ uṭṭhitaṃ, tena “mamāvuso patte malaṃ uṭṭhitaṃ, pacituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vutte
tika-vin02t:1734_6: itare “mayhaṃ cīvaraṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ dhovitabbaṃ, mayhaṃ paribhaṇḍaṃ kātabba”nti avatvā
tika-vin02t:1734_7: araññaṃ pavisitvā dārūni āharitvā bhinditvā pattakaṭāhe bahalatanumattikāhi lepaṃ
tika-vin02t:1734_8: katvā pattaṃ pacitvā tato paraṃ cīvaraṃ vā dhovanti, paribhaṇḍaṃ vā karonti. “Mamāvuso
tika-vin02t:1734_9: cīvaraṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ, dhovituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti “mama paṇṇasālā uklāpā, paribhaṇḍaṃ kātuṃ
tika-vin02t:1735_0: Idāni tesaṃ appamādalakkhaṇaṃ pucchanto “kacci pana vo anuruddhā”tiādimāha. Tattha
tika-vin02t:1735_1: voti nipātamattaṃ, paccattavacanaṃ vā, kacci tumheti attho. Amhākanti amhesu tīsu
tika-vin02t:1735_2: janesu. Piṇḍāya paṭikkamatīti gāme piṇḍāya caritvā paccāgacchati. Avakkārapātinti
tika-vin02t:1735_3: atirekapiṇḍapātaṃ apanetvā ṭhapanatthāya ekaṃ samuggapātiṃ dhovitvā ṭhapeti. Yo pacchāti
tika-vin02t:1735_4: te kira therā na ekatova bhikkhācāraṃ pavisanti. Phalasamāpattiratā hete pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ
tika-vin02t:1735_5: katvā vattapaṭipattiṃ pūretvā senāsanaṃ pavisitvā kālaparicchedaṃ katvā phalasamāpattiṃ
tika-vin02t:1735_6: appetvā nisīdanti. Tesu yo paṭhamataraṃ nisinno attano kālaparicchedavasena paṭhamataraṃ
tika-vin02t:1735_7: uṭṭhāti, so piṇḍāya caritvā paṭinivatto bhattakiccaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā jānāti “dve bhikkhū
tika-vin02t:1735_8: pacchato, ahaṃ paṭhamataraṃ āgato”ti. Atha pattaṃ pidahitvā āsanapaññāpanādīni katvā
tika-vin02t:1735_9: yadi patte paṭivīsamattameva hoti, nisīditvā bhuñjati, yadi atirekaṃ hoti, avakkārapātiyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1735_10: pakkhipitvā pātiṃ pidhāya bhuñjati, katabhattakicco pattaṃ dhovitvā vodakaṃ katvā
tika-vin02t:1735_11: thavikāya osāpetvā pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisati.
tika-vin02t:1736_0: Dutiyopi āgantvāva jānāti “eko paṭhamaṃ āgato, eko pacchato”ti. So sace patte bhattaṃ
tika-vin02t:1736_1: pamāṇameva hoti, bhuñjati. Sace mandaṃ, avakkārapātito gahetvā bhuñjati. Sace atirekaṃ
tika-vin02t:1736_2: hoti, avakkārapātiyaṃ pakkhipitvā pamāṇameva bhuñjitvā purimatthero viya vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1736_3: pavisati. Tatiyopi āgantvāva jānāti “dve paṭhamaṃ āgatā, ahaṃ pacchimo”ti. Sopi dutiyatthero
tika-vin02t:1736_4: viya bhuñjitvā katabhattakicco pattaṃ dhovitvā vodakaṃ katvā thavikāya osāpetvā āsanāni
tika-vin02t:1736_5: ukkhipitvā paṭisāmeti, pānīyaghaṭe vā paribhojanīyaghaṭe vā avasesaudakaṃ chaḍḍetvā
tika-vin02t:1736_6: ghaṭe nikujjitvā avakkārapātiyaṃ sace avasesabhattaṃ hoti, taṃ vuttanayena jahitvā
tika-vin02t:1736_7: pātiṃ dhovitvā paṭisāmeti, bhattaggaṃ sammajjati, so kacavaraṃ chaḍḍetvā sammajjaniṃ
tika-vin02t:1736_8: ukkhipitvā upacikāhi muttaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā pattacīvaramādāya vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisati.
tika-vin02t:1736_9: Idaṃ therānaṃ bahivihāre araññe bhattakiccakaraṇaṭṭhāne bhojanasālāya vattaṃ. Idaṃ
tika-vin02t:1737_0: Yo passatītiādi pana nesaṃ antovihāre vattanti veditabbaṃ. Tattha vaccaghaṭanti ācamanakumbhiṃ.
tika-vin02t:1737_1: Rittanti rittakaṃ. Tucchanti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Avisayhanti ukkhipituṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1737_2: atibhāriyaṃ. Hatthavikārenāti hatthasaññāya. Te kira pānīyaghaṭādīsu yaṃkiñci tucchakaṃ
tika-vin02t:1737_3: gahetvā pokkharaṇiṃ gantvā anto ca bahi ca dhovitvā udakaṃ parissāvetvā tīre ṭhapetvā
tika-vin02t:1737_4: aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ hatthavikārena āmantenti, odissa vā anodissa vā saddaṃ na karonti.
tika-vin02t:1737_5: Kasmā odissa na karonti? Tañhi bhikkhuṃ saddo bādheyyāti. Kasmā anodissa na karonti?
tika-vin02t:1737_6: Anodissa sadde dinne “ahaṃ pure, ahaṃ pure”ti dvepi nikkhameyyuṃ. Tato dvīhi kattabbakamme
tika-vin02t:1737_7: tatiyassa kammacchedo bhaveyya. Saṃyatapadasaddo pana hutvā aparassa bhikkhuno divāṭṭhānasantikaṃ
tika-vin02t:1737_8: gantvā tena diṭṭhabhāvaṃ ñatvā hatthasaññaṃ karoti, tāya saññāya itaro āgacchati,
tika-vin02t:1737_9: tato dve janā hatthena hatthaṃ saṃsibbantā dvīsu hatthesu ṭhapetvā uṭṭhāpenti. Taṃ
tika-vin02t:1738_0: Pañcāhikaṃ kho panāti cātuddase pannarase aṭṭhamiyanti idaṃ tāva pakatidhammassavanameva,
tika-vin02t:1738_1: taṃ akhaṇḍaṃ katvā pañcame pañcame divase dve therā nātivikāle nahāyitvā anuruddhattherassa
tika-vin02t:1738_2: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanti. Tattha tayopi nisīditvā tiṇṇaṃ piṭakānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ aññamaññaṃ
tika-vin02t:1738_3: pañhaṃ pucchanti, aññamaññaṃ vissajjenti. Tesaṃ evaṃ karontānaṃyeva aruṇaṃ uggacchati.
tika-vin02t:1738_4: Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Ettāvatā therena bhagavatā appamādalakkhaṇaṃ pucchitena pamādaṭṭhānesuyeva
tika-vin02t:1738_5: appamādalakkhaṇaṃ vissajjitaṃ hoti. Aññesañhi bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhācārapavisanakālo
tika-vin02t:1738_6: nikkhamanakālo nivāsanaparivattanaṃ cīvarapārupanaṃ antogāme piṇḍāya caraṇaṃ dhammakathanaṃ
tika-vin02t:1738_7: anumodanaṃ antogāmato nikkhamitvā bhattakiccakaraṇaṃ pattadhovanaṃ pattaosāpanaṃ
tika-vin02t:1738_8: pattacīvarapaṭisāmananti papañcakaraṇaṭṭhānāni etāni. Tasmā thero “amhākaṃ ettakaṃ
tika-vin02t:1738_9: ṭhānaṃ muñcitvā vissaṭṭhakathāpavattanena kammaṭṭhāne pamajjanaṭṭhānāni, tatthāpi
tika-vin02t:1738_10: mayaṃ, bhante, kammaṭṭhānaviruddhaṃ na paṭipajjāmā”ti aññesaṃ pamādaṭṭhānesuyeva
tika-vin02t:1738_11: sikhāppattaṃ attano appamādalakkhaṇaṃ vissajjesi. Imināva etāni ṭhānāni muñcitvā
tika-vin02t:1738_12: aññattha vihārasamāpattīnaṃ avaḷañjanavasena pamādakālo nāma amhākaṃ natthīti dīpeti.
tika-vin02t:1741_0: 467. Dhammiyā kathāyāti samaggavāse ānisaṃsapaṭisaṃyuttāya dhammakathāya. Anupubbena
tika-vin02t:1741_1: cārikaṃ caramānoti anukkamena gāmanigamapaṭipāṭiyā cārikaṃ caramāno. Yena pālileyyakaṃ
tika-vin02t:1741_2: tadavasarīti ekakova yena pālileyyakagāmo, taṃ avasari. Pālileyyakagāmavāsinopi paccuggantvā
tika-vin02t:1741_3: bhagavato dānaṃ datvā pālileyyakagāmassa avidūre rakkhitavanasaṇḍo nāma atthi, tattha
tika-vin02t:1741_4: bhagavato paṇṇasālaṃ katvā “ettha bhagavā vasatū”ti yācitvā vāsayiṃsu. Bhaddasāloti
tika-vin02t:1741_5: pana tattheko manāpo laṭṭhiko sālarukkho. Bhagavā taṃ gāmaṃ upanissāya vanasaṇḍe
tika-vin02t:1741_6: paṇṇasālāya samīpe tasmiṃ rukkhamūle vihāsi. Tena vuttaṃ “pālileyyake viharati rakkhitavanasaṇḍe bhaddasālamūle”ti.
tika-vin02t:1742_0: Atha kho bhagavato rahogatassātiādi bhagavato vivekasukhapaccavekkhaṇadassanaṃ. Ākiṇṇo
tika-vin02t:1742_1: na phāsu vihāsinti sambādhappatto ākiṇṇo vihāsiṃ. Kiṃ pana bhagavato sambādho atthi
tika-vin02t:1742_2: saṃsaggo vāti? Natthi. Na hi koci bhagavantaṃ anicchāya upasaṅkamituṃ sakkoti. Durāsadā
tika-vin02t:1742_3: hi buddhā bhagavanto sabbattha ca anupalittā, hitesitāya pana sattesu anukampaṃ upādāya
tika-vin02t:1742_4: “mutto mocessāmī”ti paṭiññānurūpaṃ caturoghanittharaṇatthaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ parisānaṃ attano
tika-vin02t:1742_5: santikaṃ kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamanaṃ adhivāseti, sayañca mahākaruṇāsamussāhito kālaññū
tika-vin02t:1742_6: hutvā tattha upasaṅkamīti idaṃ sabbabuddhānaṃ āciṇṇaṃ. Nāyamidha ākiṇṇavihāro adhippeto,
tika-vin02t:1742_7: idha pana tehi kalahakārakehi kosambakabhikkhūhi saddhiṃ ekavihāre vāsaṃ vihāsi,
tika-vin02t:1742_8: tadā vinetabbābhāvato ākiṇṇavihāraṃ katvā vuttaṃ “ahaṃ kho pubbe ākiṇṇo na phāsu
tika-vin02t:1743_0: Daharapotakehīti daharehi hatthipotakehi, ye bhiṅkātipi vuccanti. Tehīti hatthiādīhi.
tika-vin02t:1743_1: Kaddamodakānīti kaddamamissāni udakāni. Ogāhāti ettha “ogāha”ntipi pāḷi. Assāti hatthināgassa.
tika-vin02t:1743_2: Upanighaṃsantiyoti ghaṭṭentiyo. Upanighaṃsiyamānopi attano uḷārabhāvena na kujjhati,
tika-vin02t:1743_3: tena tā ghaṃsantiyeva. Vūpakaṭṭhoti vūpakaṭṭho dūrībhūto.
tika-vin02t:1744_0: Yūthāti hatthighaṭāya. Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti so kira hatthināgo yūthavāse
tika-vin02t:1744_1: ukkaṇṭhito taṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ paviṭṭho. Tattha bhagavantaṃ disvā ghaṭasahassena nibbāpitasantāpo
tika-vin02t:1744_2: viya nibbuto hutvā pasannacitto bhagavato santike aṭṭhāsi, tato paṭṭhāya vattasīse
tika-vin02t:1744_3: ṭhatvā bhaddasālassa paṇṇasālāya ca samantato appaharitaṃ katvā sākhābhaṅgena sammajjati,
tika-vin02t:1744_4: bhagavato mukhadhovanaṃ deti, nahānodakaṃ āharati, dantakaṭṭhaṃ deti, araññato madhurāni
tika-vin02t:1744_5: phalāphalāni āharitvā satthu upaneti. Satthā tāni paribhuñjati. Tena vuttaṃ “soṇḍāya
tika-vin02t:1744_6: bhagavato pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpetī”tiādi. So kira soṇḍāya dārūni āharitvā
tika-vin02t:1744_7: aññamaññaṃ ghaṃsitvā aggiṃ uṭṭhāpetvā dārūni jālāpetvā tattha pāsāṇakhaṇḍāni tāpetvā
tika-vin02t:1744_8: tāni daṇḍakehi vaṭṭetvā soṇḍiyaṃ khipitvā udakassa tattabhāvaṃ ñatvā bhagavato santikaṃ
tika-vin02t:1744_9: upagantvā tiṭṭhati. Bhagavā “hatthināgo mama nahānaṃ icchatī”ti tattha gantvā nahānakiccaṃ
tika-vin02t:1744_10: karoti. Pānīyepi eseva nayo. Tasmiṃ pana sītale jāte upasaṅkamati. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ
tika-vin02t:1745_0: Attano ca pavivekaṃ viditvāti kehici anākiṇṇabhāvaladdhaṃ kāyavivekaṃ jānitvā. Itare
tika-vin02t:1745_1: pana vivekā bhagavato sabbakālaṃ vijjantiyeva. Imaṃ udānaṃ udānesīti imaṃ attano
tika-vin02t:1745_2: hatthināgassa ca vivekābhiratiyā samānajjhāsayabhāvadīpanaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
tika-vin02t:1746_0: Gāthāya pana evamatthayojanā veditabbā – etaṃ īsādantassa rathaīsāsadisadantassa
tika-vin02t:1746_1: hatthināgassa cittaṃ nāgena buddhanāgassa cittena sameti saṃsandati. Kathaṃ sameti
tika-vin02t:1746_2: ce? Yadeko ramatī vane, yasmā buddhanāgo “ahaṃ kho pubbe ākiṇṇo vihāsi”nti purimaṃ
tika-vin02t:1746_3: ākiṇṇavihāraṃ jigucchitvā vivekaṃ upabrūhayamāno idāni yathā eko adutiyo vane araññe
tika-vin02t:1746_4: ramati abhiramati, evaṃ ayampi hatthināgo pubbe attano hatthiādīhi ākiṇṇavihāraṃ
tika-vin02t:1746_5: jigucchitvā idāni eko asahāyo vane ekavihāraṃ ramati abhinandati, tasmāssa cittaṃ
tika-vin02t:1746_6: nāgena sameti, tassa cittena sametīti katvā ekībhāvaratiyā ekasadisaṃ hotīti attho.
tika-vin02t:1749_0: 473. Yo paṭibāheyya, āpatti dukkaṭassāti ettha yo senāsanārahassa senāsanaṃ paṭibāhati,
tika-vin02t:1749_1: tasseva āpatti. Kalahakārakādīnaṃ panettha “okāso natthī”tiādikaṃ saṅghassa katikaṃ
tika-vin02t:1749_2: ārocetvā na paññapentassa “ahaṃ vuḍḍho”ti pasayha attanāva attano paññapetvā gaṇhantaṃ
tika-vin02t:1749_3: “yuttiyā gaṇhathā”ti vatvā vārentassa ca natthi āpatti. “Bhaṇḍanakārakaṃ nikkaḍḍhatīti
tika-vin02t:1749_4: vacanato kuladūsakassa pabbājanīyakammānuññāya ca idha kalahavūpasamanatthaṃ āgatānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1749_5: kosambakānampi ‘yathāvuḍḍha’nti avatvā ‘vivitte asati vivittaṃ katvāpi dātabba’nti
tika-vin02t:1749_6: vuttattā vivittaṃ katvā dentaṃ paṭibāhantasseva āpattī”ti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1751: 476. Na mūlā mūlaṃ gantvāti mūlato mūlaṃ agantvā. Atthato apagatāti sāmaggisaṅkhātaatthato apagatā.
tika-vin02t:1752: 477. Yena naṃ paccatthikā vadeyyuṃ, taṃ na hi hotīti sambandho. Anapagatanti kāraṇato anapetaṃ, sakāraṇanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin02t:1753_1: dassitanti veditabbaṃ. Aṭṭhahi dūtaṅgehīti “sotā ca hoti sāvetā ca uggahetā ca dhāretā
tika-vin02t:1753_2: ca viññāpetā ca kusalo ca sahitāsahitadassano ca akalahakārako cā”ti evaṃ vuttehi
tika-vin02t:1753_3: aṭṭhahi dūtaṅgehi. Sesamettha pāḷito aṭṭhakathāto ca suviññeyyameva.
tika-vin02t:1761_0: 1. Cūḷavaggassa paṭhame kammakkhandhake tāva “yaṭṭhiṃ pavesaya, kunte pavesayā”tiādīsu
tika-vin02t:1761_1: viya sahacaraṇañāyena “mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontī”tiādīsu viya nissitesu nissayavohāravasena
tika-vin02t:1761_2: vā paṇḍukalohitakanissitā paṇḍukalohitakasaddena vuttāti āha “tesaṃ nissitakāpi paṇḍukalohitakātveva
tika-vin02t:1763_0: 4. Tīhi aṅgehi samannāgatanti paccekaṃ samuditehi vā tīhi aṅgehi samannāgataṃ. Na
tika-vin02t:1763_1: hi tiṇṇaṃ eva aṅgānaṃ samodhānena adhammakammaṃ hoti, ekenapi hotiyeva. “Appaṭiññāya
tika-vin02t:1763_2: kataṃ hotīti lajjiṃ sandhāya vutta”nti gaṇṭhipadesu kathitaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1764_0: Nanu ca “adesanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṃ hotī”ti idaṃ parato “tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi
tika-vin02t:1764_1: samannāgatassa bhikkhuno ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho tajjanīyakammaṃ kareyya, adhisīle sīlavipanno
tika-vin02t:1764_2: hotī”ti iminā virujjhati. Adesanāgāminiṃ āpanno hi “adhisīle sīlavipanno”ti vuccatīti?
tika-vin02t:1764_3: Tattha keci vadanti “tajjanīyakammassa hi visesena bhaṇḍanakārakattaṃ aṅga’nti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1764_4: vuttaṃ, taṃ pāḷiyā āgatanidānena sameti, tasmā sabbatikesupi bhaṇḍanaṃ āropetvā bhaṇḍanapaccayā
tika-vin02t:1764_5: āpannāpattivasena idaṃ kammaṃ kātabbaṃ. Tasmā ‘adhisīle sīlavipanno’ti etthāpi pubbabhāge
tika-vin02t:1764_6: vā parabhāge vā codanāsāraṇādikāle bhaṇḍanapaccayā āpannāpattivaseneva kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1764_7: na kevalaṃ saṅghādisesapaccayā kātabba”nti. Apare pana vadanti “adesanāgāminiyāti
tika-vin02t:1764_8: idaṃ pārājikāpattiṃyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ, na saṅghādisesaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ‘adesanāgāminiyāti
tika-vin02t:1764_9: pārājikāpattiyā vā saṅghādisesāpattiyā vā’ti vuttaṃ. Tattha saṅghādisesāpattiyā vāti
tika-vin02t:1764_10: atthuddhāravasena vuttaṃ, ‘adhisīle sīlavipanno’ti ca idaṃ saṅghādisesaṃyeva sandhāya
tika-vin02t:1764_11: vuttaṃ, na pārājikaṃ. Tasmā pārājikāpattipaccayā na tajjanīyakammaṃ kātabbaṃ payojanābhāvā,
tika-vin02t:1764_12: saṅghādisesapaccayā kātabbanti ayamattho siddho hoti. Sukkapakkhe ‘desanāgāminiyā
tika-vin02t:1764_13: āpattiyā kataṃ hotī’ti iminā virujjhatīti ce? Na ekena pariyāyena saṅghādisesassapi
tika-vin02t:1768_0: 11. Niyassakamme “nissāya te vatthabbanti garunissayaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na itara”nti
tika-vin02t:1768_1: kenaci likhitaṃ. Gaṇṭhipade pana “niyassakammaṃ yasmā bālavasena karīyati, tasmā
tika-vin02t:1768_2: nissāya vatthabbanti nissayaṃ gāhāpetabbo”ti vuttaṃ, vīmaṃsitvā yuttataraṃ gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1768_3: Apissūti ettha suiti nipātamattaṃ, bhikkhū api niccabyāvaṭā hontīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin02t:1770: 29. Pabbājanīyakamme tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho pabbājanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetūti idaṃ tesu vibbhamantesupi pakkamantesupi sammāvattanteyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1772_0: 33. Sudhammavatthusmiṃ macchikāsaṇḍeti evaṃnāmake nagare. Tattha kira citto gahapati
tika-vin02t:1772_1: pañcavaggiyānaṃ abbhantaraṃ mahānāmattheraṃ piṇḍāya caramānaṃ disvā tassa iriyāpathe
tika-vin02t:1772_2: pasīditvā pattaṃ ādāya gehaṃ pavesetvā bhojetvā bhattakiccāvasāne dhammakathaṃ suṇanto
tika-vin02t:1772_3: sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā acalasaddho hutvā ambāṭakavanaṃ nāma attano uyyānaṃ saṅghārāmaṃ
tika-vin02t:1772_4: kātukāmo therassa hatthe udakaṃ pātetvā niyyātesi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe “patiṭṭhitaṃ buddhasāsana”nti
tika-vin02t:1772_5: udakapariyantaṃ katvā mahāpathavī kampi, mahāseṭṭhi uyyāne mahāvihāraṃ kāresi. Tatthāyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1772_6: sudhammo bhikkhu āvāsiko ahosi. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “āyasmā sudhammo macchikāsaṇḍe
tika-vin02t:1772_7: cittassa gahapatino āvāsiko hotī”tiādi. Tattha dhuvabhattikoti niccabhattiko.
tika-vin02t:1773_0: Aparena samayena cittassa guṇakathaṃ sutvā bhikkhusahassena saddhiṃ dve aggasāvakā
tika-vin02t:1773_1: tassa saṅgahaṃ kattukāmā macchikāsaṇḍaṃ agamaṃsu. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “tena kho pana
tika-vin02t:1773_2: samayena sambahulā therā”tiādi. Citto gahapati tesaṃ āgamanaṃ sutvā addhayojanamattaṃ
tika-vin02t:1773_3: paccuggantvā te ādāya attano vihāraṃ pavesetvā āgantukavattaṃ katvā “bhante, thokaṃ
tika-vin02t:1773_4: dhammakathaṃ sotukāmomhī”ti dhammasenāpatiṃ yāci. Atha naṃ thero “upāsaka, addhānenāmhā
tika-vin02t:1773_5: kilantarūpā, apica thokaṃ suṇāhī”ti tassa dhammakathaṃ kathesi. Tena vuttaṃ “ekamantaṃ
tika-vin02t:1773_6: nisinnaṃ kho cittaṃ gahapatiṃ āyasmā sāriputto dhammiyā kathāya sandassesī”tiādi.
tika-vin02t:1773_7: So therassa dhammakathaṃ suṇantova anāgāmiphalaṃ pāpuṇi.
tika-vin02t:1774_0: 41. Nāsakkhi cittaṃ gahapatiṃ khamāpetunti so tattha gantvā “gahapati, mayhameva
tika-vin02t:1774_1: so doso, khamāhi me”ti vatvāpi “nāhaṃ khamāmī”ti tena paṭikkhitto maṅkubhūto taṃ
tika-vin02t:1774_2: khamāpetuṃ nāsakkhi. Punadeva satthu santikaṃ paccāgamāsi. Satthā “nāssa upāsako
tika-vin02t:1774_3: khamissatī”ti jānantopi “mānathaddho esa tiṃsayojanaṃ gantvāva paccāgacchatū”ti khamanupāyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1774_4: anācikkhitvāva uyyojesi. Athassa puna āgatakāle nihatamānassa anudūtaṃ datvā “gaccha,
tika-vin02t:1774_5: iminā saddhiṃ gantvā upāsakaṃ khamāpehī”ti vatvā “samaṇena nāma ‘mayhaṃ vihāro, mayhaṃ
tika-vin02t:1774_6: nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ, mayhaṃ upāsako, mayhaṃ upāsikā’ti mānaṃ vā issaṃ vā kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin02t:1774_7: Evaṃ karontassa hi icchāmānādayo kilesā vaḍḍhantī”ti ovadanto –
tika-vin02t:1776: Āvāsesu ca issariyaṃ, pūjā parakulesu ca.
tika-vin02t:1779: Iti bālassa saṅkappo, icchā māno ca vaḍḍhatī”ti. –
tika-vin02t:1781_0: Sudhammattheropi imaṃ ovādaṃ sutvā satthāraṃ vanditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā
tika-vin02t:1781_1: tena anudūtena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ gantvā upāsakassa cakkhupathe āpattiṃ paṭikaritvā
tika-vin02t:1781_2: upāsakaṃ khamāpesi. So upāsakena “khamāmahaṃ bhante, sace mayhaṃ doso atthi, khamatha
tika-vin02t:1781_3: me”ti paṭikhamāpito satthārā dinnaovāde ṭhatvā katipāheneva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
tika-vin02t:1783_0: 50. Tassā adassaneyeva kammaṃ kātabbanti tassā adassaneyeva ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1783_1: Tajjanīyādikammaṃ pana āpattiṃ āropetvā tassā adassane appaṭikamme vā bhaṇḍanakārakādiaṅgehi
tika-vin02t:1787_0: 75. Pārivāsikakkhandhake navakataraṃ pārivāsikanti attano navakataraṃ pārivāsikaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1787_1: Pārivāsikassa hi attano navakataraṃ pārivāsikaṃ ṭhapetvā aññe mūlāyapaṭikassanārahamānattārahamānattacārikaabbhānārahāpi
tika-vin02t:1787_3: ghaṃsenti etenāti pādaghaṃsanaṃ, sakkharakathalādi. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tisso
tika-vin02t:1787_4: pādaghaṃsaniyo sakkharaṃ kathalaṃ samuddapheṇaka”nti hi vuttaṃ. Saddhivihārikādīnampi
tika-vin02t:1787_5: sādiyantassāti saddhivihārikānampi abhivādanādiṃ sādiyantassa. “Mā maṃ gāmappavesanaṃ
tika-vin02t:1787_6: āpucchathā”ti vutte anāpucchāpi gāmaṃ pavisituṃ vaṭṭati. Yo yo vuḍḍhoti pārivāsikesu
tika-vin02t:1787_7: bhikkhūsu yo yo vuḍḍho. Navakatarassa sāditunti pārivāsikanavakatarassa abhivādanādiṃ sādituṃ.
tika-vin02t:1788_0: Tatthevāti saṅghanavakaṭṭhāneyeva. Attano pāḷiyā pavāretabbanti attano vassaggena
tika-vin02t:1788_1: pattapāḷiyā pavāretabbaṃ, na pana sabbesu pavāritesūti attho. Yadi pana na gaṇhāti
tika-vin02t:1788_2: na vissajjetīti yadi purimadivase attano na gaṇhāti gahetvā ca na vissajjeti. Catussālabhattanti
tika-vin02t:1788_3: bhojanasālāyaṃ paṭipāṭiyā diyyamānabhattaṃ. Hatthapāse ṭhitenāti dāyakassa hatthapāse ṭhitena.
tika-vin02t:1789_0: 76. Añño sāmaṇero na gahetabboti upajjhāyena hutvā añño sāmaṇero na gahetabbo. Upajjhaṃ
tika-vin02t:1789_1: datvā gahitasāmaṇerāpīti pakatattakāle upajjhaṃ datvā gahitasāmaṇerāpi. Laddhasammutikena
tika-vin02t:1789_2: āṇattopi garudhammehi aññehi vā ovadituṃ labhatīti āha “paṭibalassa vā bhikkhussa
tika-vin02t:1789_3: bhāro kātabbo”ti. Āgatā bhikkhuniyo vattabbāti sambandho. Savacanīyanti sadosaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1789_4: Jeṭṭhakaṭṭhānaṃ na kātabbanti padhānaṭṭhānaṃ na kātabbaṃ. Kiṃ tanti āha “pātimokkhuddesakena vā”tiādi.
tika-vin02t:1790_0: Rajehi hatā upahatā bhūmi etissāti rajohatabhūmi, rajokiṇṇabhūmīti attho. Paccayanti
tika-vin02t:1790_1: vassāvāsikalābhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Ekapasse ṭhatvāti pāḷiṃ vihāya bhikkhūnaṃ pacchato
tika-vin02t:1790_2: ṭhatvā. Senāsanaṃ na labhatīti seyyāpariyantabhāgitāya vassaggena gaṇhituṃ na labhati.
tika-vin02t:1790_3: Assāti bhaveyya. “Āgantukena ārocetabbaṃ, āgantukassa ārocetabba”nti avisesena vuttattā
tika-vin02t:1790_4: sace dve pārivāsikā gataṭṭhāne aññamaññaṃ passanti, ubhohipi aññamaññassa ārocetabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1790_5: Yathā bahi disvā ārocitassa bhikkhuno vihāraṃ āgate puna ārocanakiccaṃ natthi, evaṃ
tika-vin02t:1790_6: aññaṃ vihāraṃ gatenapi tattha pubbe ārocitassa puna ārocanakiccaṃ natthīti vadanti.
tika-vin02t:1791: 81. Avisesenāti pārivāsikassa ukkhittakassa ca avisesena. Obaddhanti palibuddhaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1792: 83. Sahavāsoti vuttappakāre channe pakatattena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ sayanameva adhippetaṃ, na sesairiyāpathakappanaṃ. Sesamettha suviññeyyameva.
tika-vin02t:1796_1: vuttanayena dvīhi padehi ekena vā samādātabbaṃ. Vediyāmīti cittena sampaṭicchitvā
tika-vin02t:1796_2: sukhaṃ anubhavāmi, na tappaccayā ahaṃ dukkhitoti adhippāyo. Vuttanayeneva saṅghamajjhe
tika-vin02t:1796_3: nikkhipitabbanti pārivāsikakkhandhake vuttanayena “mānattaṃ nikkhipāmi, vattaṃ nikkhipāmī”ti
tika-vin02t:1796_4: imehi dvīhi ekena vā nikkhipitabbaṃ. Tassa ārocetvā nikkhipitabbanti anārocanena
tika-vin02t:1796_5: vattabhedadukkaṭaparimocanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvāti bhikkhūnaṃ sajjhāyanasaddasavanūpacāravijahanatthaṃ
tika-vin02t:1796_6: vuttaṃ, mahāmaggato okkammāti maggappaṭipannabhikkhūnaṃ upacāravijahanatthaṃ, gumbena
tika-vin02t:1796_7: vā vatiyā vā paṭicchannaṭṭhāneti dassanūpacāravijahanatthaṃ. Anikkhittavattena antoupacāragatānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1796_8: sabbesampi ārocetabbattā “ayaṃ nikkhittavattassa parihāro”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha nikkhittavattassāti
tika-vin02t:1796_9: vattaṃ nikkhipitvā parivasantassāti attho. Ayaṃ panettha therassa adhippāyo – vattaṃ
tika-vin02t:1796_10: nikkhipitvā parivasantassa upacāragatānaṃ sabbesaṃ ārocanakiccaṃ natthi, diṭṭharūpānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1798_0: 102. “Satiyeva antarāye antarāyikasaññī chādeti, acchannā hoti. Antarāyikassa pana
tika-vin02t:1798_1: anantarāyikasaññāya chādayato acchannāvā”tipi pāṭho. Averīti hitakāmo. Uddhaste aruṇeti
tika-vin02t:1798_2: uṭṭhite aruṇe. Suddhassa santiketi sabhāgasaṅghādisesaṃ anāpannassa santike. Vatthunti
tika-vin02t:1799_0: Sukkavissaṭṭhīti vatthu ceva gottañcāti sukkavissaṭṭhīti idaṃ asucimocanalakkhaṇassa
tika-vin02t:1799_2: sukkavissaṭṭhiyā eva pakāsanato gottañca hotīti attho. Gaṃ tāyatīti hi gottaṃ. Saṅghādisesoti
tika-vin02t:1799_3: nāmañceva āpatti cāti saṅghādisesoti tena tena vītikkamena āpannassa āpattinikāyassa
tika-vin02t:1799_4: nāmappakāsanato nāmañceva hoti āpattisabhāgattā āpatti ca.
tika-vin02t:1801_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ
tika-vin02t:1801_1: sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ ekāhapaṭicchannaṃ, so saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā
tika-vin02t:1801_2: ekāhapaṭicchannāya ekāhaparivāsaṃ yāci. Saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā
tika-vin02t:1801_3: sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhapaṭicchannāya ekāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi. So parivutthaparivāso.
tika-vin02t:1801_4: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1801_5: so saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ sañcetanikānaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhīnaṃ paṭicchannāya ca appaṭicchannāya
tika-vin02t:1801_6: ca chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācati. Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno
tika-vin02t:1801_7: dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ sañcetanikānaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhīnaṃ paṭicchannāya ca appaṭicchannāya
tika-vin02t:1801_8: ca chārattaṃ mānattaṃ dadeyya, esā ñatti.
tika-vin02t:1802_0: Suṇātu me, bhante…pe… so parivutthaparivāso. Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu ekaṃ āpattiṃ
tika-vin02t:1802_1: āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ, so saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ…pe… yācati.
tika-vin02t:1802_2: Saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ sañcetanikānaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhīnaṃ
tika-vin02t:1802_3: paṭicchannāya ca appaṭicchannāya ca chārattaṃ mānattaṃ deti. Yassāyasmato khamati
tika-vin02t:1802_4: itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ sañcetanikānaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhīnaṃ paṭicchannāya
tika-vin02t:1802_5: ca appaṭicchannāya ca chārattaṃ mānattassa dānaṃ, so tuṇhassa. Yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyya.
tika-vin02t:1803: Dutiyampi etamatthaṃ vadāmi…pe… tatiyampi etamatthaṃ vadāmi…pe…
tika-vin02t:1804_0: Dinnaṃ saṅghena itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ sañcetanikānaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhīnaṃ
tika-vin02t:1804_1: paṭicchannāya ca appaṭicchannāya ca chārattaṃ mānattaṃ, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā
tika-vin02t:1805: Evaṃ kammavācaṃ katvā mānattaṃ dātabbaṃ. Ciṇṇamānattassa ca imināva nayena kammavācaṃ yojetvā abbhānaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1806: Aññasminti suddhantaparivāsavasena āpattivuṭṭhānato aññasmiṃ. Dasasataṃ āpattiyo rattisataṃ chādayitvāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1808_0: Attano sīmaṃ sodhetvā vihārasīmāyāti vihāre baddhasīmameva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Vihārūpacāratopi
tika-vin02t:1808_1: dve leḍḍupātā atikkamitabbāti bhikkhuvihāraṃ sandhāya vadati gāmūpacārātikkameneva
tika-vin02t:1808_2: bhikkhunīvihārūpacārātikkamassa siddhattā. Vihārassa cāti bhikkhuvihārassa. Gāmassāti
tika-vin02t:1808_3: na vuttanti gāmassa upacāraṃ muñcituṃ vaṭṭatīti na vuttaṃ, tasmā gāmūpacārepi vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t:1809_0: Tattheva ṭhānaṃ paccāsīsantīti bhikkhūnaṃ ṭhānaṃ paccāsīsanti. Parivāsavattādīnanti
tika-vin02t:1809_2: viya bhikkhuniyāpi antoupacārasīmagatānaṃyeva ārocetabbaṃ, na gāme ṭhitānampi gantvā
tika-vin02t:1809_3: ārocetabbanti dīpeti. Tasmiṃ gāmeti yasmiṃ gāme bhikkhunupassayo hoti, tasmiṃ gāme.
tika-vin02t:1809_4: Bahi upacārasīmāya ṭhatvāti upacārasīmato bahi ṭhatvā. Sammannitvā dātabbāti ettha
tika-vin02t:1809_5: sammannitvā dinnāya sahavāsepi ratticchedo na hoti.
tika-vin02t:1811: 108. Visuṃ mānattaṃ caritabbanti mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ akatvā visuṃ kammavācāya mānattaṃ gahetvā caritabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1814_0: 134. Ekāpattimūlakanti “ekā āpatti ekāhappaṭicchannā, ekā āpatti dvīhappaṭicchannā”tiādinā
tika-vin02t:1814_1: vuttanayaṃ sandhāya vadati. Āpattivaḍḍhanakanti “ekā āpatti ekāhappaṭicchannā, dve
tika-vin02t:1816: 181. Thullaccayādīhi missakanti ekavatthumhi pubbabhāge āpannathullaccayadukkaṭehi missakaṃ. Makkhadhammo nāma chādetukāmatā.
tika-vin02t:1817: 182. Sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati parimāṇampītiādi jātivasenekavacanaṃ, bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso vā. Sesamettha pāḷito aṭṭhakathāto ca suviññeyyameva.
tika-vin02t:1821: 187. Samathakkhandhake saññāpetīti ettha saṃ-saddūpapado ñā-saddo tosanavisiṭṭhe avabodhane vattatīti āha “paritosetvā jānāpetī”ti.
tika-vin02t:1823_1: khīṇāsavassa dātabbo vinayo sativinayo. Amūḷhassa dātabbo vinayo amūḷhavinayo. Paṭiññātena
tika-vin02t:1824: 212. Tiṇavatthārakasadisattāti taṃsadisatāya tabbohāroti dasseti yathā “esa brahmadatto”ti.
tika-vin02t:1826_0: 216. Vivādādhikaraṇassa kiṃ mūlantiādīsu vivādamūlānīti vivādassa mūlāni. Kodhanoti
tika-vin02t:1826_1: kujjhanalakkhaṇena kodhena samannāgato. Upanāhīti veraappaṭinissaggalakkhaṇena upanāhena
tika-vin02t:1826_2: samannāgato. Agāravoti gāravavirahito. Appatissoti appatissayo anīcavutti. Ettha
tika-vin02t:1826_3: pana yo bhikkhu satthari dharamāne tīsu kālesu upaṭṭhānaṃ na yāti, satthari anupāhane
tika-vin02t:1826_4: caṅkamante saupāhano caṅkamati, nīce caṅkame caṅkamante ucce caṅkamati, heṭṭhā vasante
tika-vin02t:1826_5: upari vasati, satthu dassanaṭṭhāne ubho aṃse pārupati, chattaṃ dhāreti, upāhanaṃ
tika-vin02t:1826_6: dhāreti, nahāyati, uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā karoti, parinibbute vā pana cetiyaṃ vandituṃ
tika-vin02t:1826_7: na gacchati, cetiyassa paññāyanaṭṭhāne satthudassanaṭṭhāne vuttaṃ sabbaṃ karoti,
tika-vin02t:1826_8: aññehi ca bhikkhūhi “kasmā evaṃ karosi, na idaṃ vaṭṭati, sammāsambuddhassa nāma lajjituṃ
tika-vin02t:1826_9: vaṭṭatī”ti vutte “tuṇhī hohi, buddho buddhoti vadasi, kiṃ buddho nāmā”ti bhaṇati,
tika-vin02t:1827_0: Yo pana dhammasavane saṅghuṭṭhe sakkaccaṃ na gacchati, sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ na suṇāti,
tika-vin02t:1827_1: niddāyati vā sallapanto vā nisīdati, sakkaccaṃ na gaṇhāti na vāceti, “kiṃ dhamme
tika-vin02t:1827_2: agāravaṃ karosī”ti vutte “tuṇhī hohi, dhammo dhammoti vadasi, kiṃ dhammo nāmā”ti
tika-vin02t:1827_3: vadati, ayaṃ dhamme agāravo nāma. Yo pana therena bhikkhunā anajjhiṭṭho dhammaṃ deseti
tika-vin02t:1827_4: uddisati pañhaṃ katheti, vuḍḍhe bhikkhū ghaṭṭento gacchati tiṭṭhati nisīdati, dussapallatthikaṃ
tika-vin02t:1827_5: vā hatthapallatthikaṃ vā karoti, saṅghamajjhe ubho aṃse pārupati, chattupāhanaṃ dhāreti,
tika-vin02t:1827_6: “bhikkhusaṅghassa lajjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttepi “tuṇhī hohi, saṅgho saṅghoti vadasi,
tika-vin02t:1827_7: kiṃ saṅgho, migasaṅgho ajasaṅgho”tiādīni vadati, ayaṃ saṅghe agāravo nāma. Ekabhikkhusmimpi
tika-vin02t:1827_8: hi agārave kate saṅghe katoyeva hoti. Tisso sikkhā pana apūrayamāno sikkhāya na paripūrakārī nāma.
tika-vin02t:1828_0: Ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussānanti ekasmiṃ vihāre dvinnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ uppannavivādo
tika-vin02t:1828_1: kathaṃ devamanussānaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattati? Kosambakakkhandhake viya hi dvīsu
tika-vin02t:1828_2: bhikkhūsu vivādaṃ āpannesu tasmiṃ vihāre tesaṃ antevāsikā vivadanti, tesaṃ ovādaṃ
tika-vin02t:1828_3: gaṇhanto bhikkhunisaṅgho vivadati, tato tesaṃ upaṭṭhākā vivadanti, atha manussānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1828_4: ārakkhadevatā dve koṭṭhāsā honti. Tattha dhammavādīnaṃ ārakkhadevatā dhammavādiniyo
tika-vin02t:1828_5: honti, adhammavādīnaṃ adhammavādiniyo. Tato ārakkhadevatānaṃ mittā bhummadevatā bhijjanti.
tika-vin02t:1828_6: Evaṃ paramparāya yāva brahmalokā ṭhapetvā ariyasāvake sabbe devamanussā dve koṭṭhāsā
tika-vin02t:1828_7: honti. Dhammavādīhi pana adhammavādinova bahutarā honti. Tato “yaṃ bahukehi gahitaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1828_8: taṃ taccha”nti dhammaṃ vissajjetvā bahutarā adhammaṃ gaṇhanti. Te adhammaṃ purakkhatvā
tika-vin02t:1828_9: viharantā apāyesu nibbattanti. Evaṃ ekasmiṃ vihāre dvinnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ uppanno vivādo
tika-vin02t:1828_10: bahūnaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya hoti. Ajjhattaṃ vāti attani vā attano parisāya vā. Bahiddhā
tika-vin02t:1828_11: vāti parasmiṃ vā parassa parisāya vā. Āyatiṃ anavassavāyāti āyatiṃ anuppādāya.
tika-vin02t:1829_0: Makkhīti paresaṃ guṇamakkhanalakkhaṇena makkhena samannāgato. Paḷāsīti yugaggāhalakkhaṇena
tika-vin02t:1829_1: paḷāsena samannāgato. Issukīti parasakkārādīnaṃ issāyanalakkhaṇāya issāya samannāgato.
tika-vin02t:1829_2: Maccharīti āvāsamacchariyādīhi samannāgato. Saṭhoti kerāṭiko. Māyāvīti katapāpapaṭicchādako.
tika-vin02t:1829_3: Pāpicchoti asantasambhāvanicchako dussīlo. Micchādiṭṭhīti natthikavādī ahetukavādī
tika-vin02t:1829_4: akiriyavādī. Sandiṭṭhiparāmāsīti sayaṃ diṭṭhameva parāmasati gaṇhāti. Ādhānaggāhīti
tika-vin02t:1829_5: daḷhaggāhī. Duppaṭinissaggīti na sakkā hoti gahitaṃ nissajjāpetuṃ. Ettha ca kodhano
tika-vin02t:1829_6: hoti upanāhītiādinā puggalādhiṭṭhānanayena kodhūpanāhādayo akusaladhammā vivādamūlānīti
tika-vin02t:1829_7: dassitāni, tathā duṭṭhacittā vivadantītiādinā lobhadosamohā. Aduṭṭhacittā vivadantītiādinā
tika-vin02t:1830_0: 217. Dubbaṇṇoti paṃsupisācako viya jhāmakhāṇuvaṇṇo. Duddassikoti vijātamātuyāpi amanāpadassano.
tika-vin02t:1830_1: Okoṭimakoti lakuṇḍako. Kāṇoti ekakkhikāṇo vā ubhayakkhikāṇo vā. Kuṇīti ekahatthakuṇī
tika-vin02t:1830_2: vā ubhayahatthakuṇī vā. Khañjoti ekapādakhañjo vā ubhayapādakhañjo vā. Pakkhahatoti
tika-vin02t:1831_0: 220. Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ kusalaṃ akusalaṃ abyākatanti vivādādhikaraṇaṃ kiṃ kusalaṃ akusalaṃ
tika-vin02t:1831_1: udāhu abyākatanti pucchati. Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ siyā kusalantiādi vissajjanaṃ. Esa nayo
tika-vin02t:1831_2: sesesupi. Vivadanti etenāti vivādoti āha “yena vivadanti, so cittuppādo vivādo”ti.
tika-vin02t:1831_3: Kathaṃ pana so cittuppādo adhikaraṇaṃ nāmāti āha “samathehi ca adhikaraṇīyatāya adhikaraṇa”nti,
tika-vin02t:1831_4: samathehi sametabbatāya adhikaraṇanti attho. Vivādahetubhūtassa hi cittuppādassa
tika-vin02t:1831_5: vūpasamena tappabhavassa saddassapi vūpasamo hotīti cittuppādassa samathehi adhikaraṇīyatā
tika-vin02t:1832_0: 222. Āpattādhikaraṇaṃ siyā akusalaṃ siyā abyākatanti ayaṃ vikappo paññattivajjaṃyeva
tika-vin02t:1832_1: sandhāya vutto, na lokavajjanti dassetuṃ “sandhāyabhāsitavasenā”tiādimāha. Kasmā
tika-vin02t:1832_2: panettha sandhāyabhāsitavasena attho veditabboti āha “yasmiṃ hī”tiādi. Pathavīkhaṇanādiketi
tika-vin02t:1832_3: ettha ādi-saddena bhūtagāmapātabyatādipaññattivajjaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Yo vinaye
tika-vin02t:1832_4: apakataññutāya vattasīsena sammuñjaniādinā pathavīkhaṇanādīni karoti, tadā tassuppannacittaṃ
tika-vin02t:1832_5: sandhāya vuttaṃ “kusalacittaṃ aṅgaṃ hotī”ti. Aṅgaṃ hotīti ca vattasīsena karontassapi
tika-vin02t:1832_6: “imaṃ pathaviṃ khaṇāmī”tiādinā vītikkamajānanavasena pavattattā taṃ kusalacittaṃ
tika-vin02t:1832_7: āpattādhikaraṇaṃ, kusalacittaṃ āpattiyā kāraṇaṃ hotīti attho. Na hi vītikkamaṃ ajānantassa
tika-vin02t:1832_8: pathavīkhaṇanādīsu āpatti sambhavati. Tasmiṃ satīti tasmiṃ kusalacitte āpattibhāvena
tika-vin02t:1832_9: gahite satīti adhippāyo. Tasmāti yasmā kusalacitte āpattibhāvena gahite sati “natthi
tika-vin02t:1832_10: āpattādhikaraṇaṃ kusala”nti na sakkā vattuṃ, tasmā. Nayidaṃ aṅgappahonakacittaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin02t:1832_11: vuttanti “āpattādhikaraṇaṃ siyā akusalaṃ siyā abyākataṃ, natthi āpattādhikaraṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:1832_12: kusala”nti idaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhāpakabhāvena aṅgappahonakaṃ āpattiyā kāraṇabhūtaṃ cittaṃ
tika-vin02t:1832_13: sandhāya na vuttaṃ. Kiṃ pana sandhāya vuttanti āha “idaṃ panā”tiādi. Bhikkhumhi kammaṭṭhānagatacittena
tika-vin02t:1832_14: nipanne niddāyante vā mātugāmo ce seyyaṃ kappeti, tasmiṃ khaṇe seyyākārena vattamānarūpameva
tika-vin02t:1832_15: āpatti, na kusalādivasappavattaṃ cittanti āha “asañcicca…pe… sahaseyyādivasena āpajjato
tika-vin02t:1832_16: abyākataṃ hotī”ti. Tasmiñhi khaṇe uṭṭhātabbe jāte anuṭṭhānato tadākārapavatto rūpakkhandhova āpatti.
tika-vin02t:1833_0: “Āpattiṃ āpajjanto kusalacitto vā āpajjati akusalābyākatacitto vā”ti vacanato kusalampi
tika-vin02t:1833_1: āpattādhikaraṇaṃ siyāti ce? Na. Yo hi āpattiṃ āpajjatīti vuccati, so tīsu cittesu
tika-vin02t:1833_2: aññataracittasamaṅgī hutvā āpajjati, na aññathāti dassanatthaṃ “kusalacitto vā”tiādi
tika-vin02t:1833_3: vuttaṃ. Ayañhettha attho – pathavīkhaṇanādīsu kusalacittakkhaṇe vītikkamādivasena
tika-vin02t:1833_4: pavattarūpasambhavato kusalacitto vā tathāpavattarūpasaṅkhātaṃ abyākatāpattiṃ āpajjati,
tika-vin02t:1833_5: tathā abyākatacitto vā abyākatarūpasaṅkhātaṃ abyākatāpattiṃ āpajjati. Pāṇātipātādiṃ
tika-vin02t:1833_6: akusalacitto vā akusalāpattiṃ āpajjati, rūpaṃ panettha abbohārikaṃ. Supinante ca
tika-vin02t:1833_7: pāṇātipātādiṃ karonto sahaseyyādivasena āpajjitabbāpattiṃ āpajjanto akusalacitto
tika-vin02t:1834_0: Kusalacittaṃ āpajjeyyāti eḷakalomaṃ gahetvā kammaṭṭhānamanasikārena tiyojanaṃ atikkamantassa
tika-vin02t:1834_1: paññattiṃ ajānitvā padaso dhammaṃ vācentassa ca āpajjitabbāpattiyā kusalacittaṃ āpajjeyya.
tika-vin02t:1834_2: Na ca tattha vijjamānampi kusalacittaṃ āpattiyā aṅganti tasmiṃ vijjamānampi kusalacittaṃ
tika-vin02t:1834_3: āpattiyā aṅgaṃ na hoti, sayaṃ āpatti na hotīti attho. Calitappavattānanti calitānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1834_4: pavattānañca. Calito kāyo, pavattā vācā. Aññatarameva aṅganti kāyavācānaṃ aññatarameva
tika-vin02t:1834_5: āpattīti attho. Tañca rūpakkhandhapariyāpannattā abyākatanti iminā abyākatamāpattādhikaraṇaṃ, nāññanti dasseti.
tika-vin02t:1835_0: Yadi evaṃ “sāpattikassa, bhikkhave, nirayaṃ vā vadāmi tiracchānayoniṃ vā”ti vacanato
tika-vin02t:1835_1: abyākatassapi vipākadhammatā āpajjeyyāti? Nāpajjeyya. Asañcicca āpannā hi āpattiyo
tika-vin02t:1835_2: yāva so na jānāti, tāva anantarāyakarā, jānitvā chādento pana chādanappaccayā aññaṃ
tika-vin02t:1835_4: antarāyakaraṇanti sāpattikassa apāyagāmitā vuttā. Abyākataṃ pana āpattādhikaraṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:1835_6: kalyāṇaputhujjano sekkho arahāti cattāro puggale dassetvā tesu arahato āpattādhikaraṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:1835_7: abyākatameva, tathā sekkhānaṃ, tathā kalyāṇaputhujjanassa asañcicca vītikkamakāle
tika-vin02t:1835_8: abyākatameva. Itarassa akusalampi hoti abyākatampi. Yasmā cassa sañcicca vītikkamakāle
tika-vin02t:1835_9: akusalameva hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ ‘natthi āpattādhikaraṇaṃ kusala’nti. Sabbattha evaṃ
tika-vin02t:1835_10: abyākatanti vipākābhāvamattaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti likhitaṃ. Yañca āpattādhikaraṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:1835_11: akusalaṃ, tampi desitaṃ vuṭṭhitaṃ vā anantarāyakaraṃ. Yathā hi ariyūpavādakammaṃ
tika-vin02t:1835_12: akusalampi samānaṃ accayaṃ desetvā khamāpanena payogasampattipaṭibāhitattā avipākadhammataṃ
tika-vin02t:1835_13: āpannaṃ ahosikammaṃ hoti, evamidampi desitaṃ vuṭṭhitaṃ vā payogasampattipaṭibāhitattā
tika-vin02t:1835_15: bhikkhave, nirayaṃ vā vadāmi tiracchānayoniṃ vā”ti sāpattikasseva apāyagāmitā vuttā.
tika-vin02t:1840: 231. Ubbāhikāya khīyanake pācitti na vuttā tattha chandadānassa natthitāya.
tika-vin02t:1841: 236. Tassa kho tanti ettha kho tanti nipātamattaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1842: 238. “Kā ca tattha tassapāpiyasikāyā”ti potthakesu likhanti. “Kā ca tassapāpiyasikā”ti evaṃ panettha pāṭho veditabbo.
tika-vin02t:1843_0: 242. Kiccādhikaraṇaṃ ekena samathena sammatīti ettha “kiccameva kiccādhikaraṇa”nti
tika-vin02t:1843_1: vacanato apalokanakammādīnametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Taṃ vivādādhikaraṇādīni viya samathehi
tika-vin02t:1843_2: sametabbaṃ na hoti, kintu sammukhāvinayena sampajjati, tasmā sammatīti ettha sampajjatīti
tika-vin02t:1847: 243. Khuddakavatthukkhandhake aṭṭhapadākārenāti aṭṭhapadaphalakākārena, jūtaphalakasadisanti vuttaṃ hoti. Mallakamūlasaṇṭhānenāti kheḷamallakamūlasaṇṭhānena.
tika-vin02t:1848: 245. Muttolambakādīnanti ādi-saddena kuṇḍalādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Palambakasuttanti yaññopacitākārena olambakasuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1851_0: 249. Caturassena vattenāti paripuṇṇena uccāraṇavattena. Taraṅgavattādīnaṃ uccāraṇavidhānāni
tika-vin02t:1851_1: naṭṭhappayogāni. Bāhiralominti bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso, yathā tassa uṇṇapāvārassa bahiddhā
tika-vin02t:1851_2: lomāni dissanti, tathā dhārentassa dukkaṭanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin02t:1852_0: 251. Imāni cattāri ahirājakulānīti idaṃ daṭṭhavise sandhāya vuttaṃ. Ye hi keci daṭṭhavisā,
tika-vin02t:1852_1: sabbe te imesaṃ catunnaṃ ahirājakulānaṃ abbhantaragatāva honti. Attaguttiyāti attano
tika-vin02t:1852_2: guttatthāya. Attarakkhāyāti attano rakkhaṇatthāya. Attaparittaṃkātunti attano parittāṇatthāya
tika-vin02t:1853_0: Idāni yathā taṃ parittaṃ kātabbaṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ “evañca pana bhikkhave”tiādimāha.
tika-vin02t:1853_1: Tattha virūpakkhehīti virūpakkhanāgakulehi. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Sahayoge cetaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1853_2: etehi saha mayhaṃ mittabhāvoti vuttaṃ hoti apādakehīti apādakasattehi. Sesesupi eseva
tika-vin02t:1853_3: nayo. Sabbe sattāti ito pubbe ettakena ṭhānena odissakamettaṃ kathetvā idāni anodissakamettaṃ
tika-vin02t:1853_4: kathetuṃ idamāraddhaṃ. Tattha sattā pāṇā bhūtāti sabbānetāni puggalavevacanāneva.
tika-vin02t:1853_5: Bhadrāni passantūti bhadrāni ārammaṇāni passantu. Mā kañci pāpamāgamāti kañci sattaṃ
tika-vin02t:1854_0: Appamāṇo buddhoti ettha buddhoti buddhaguṇā veditabbā, te hi appamāṇā nāma. Sesadvayesupi
tika-vin02t:1854_1: eseva nayo, pamāṇavantānīti guṇappamāṇena yuttāni. Uṇṇanābhīti lomasanābhiko makkaṭako.
tika-vin02t:1854_2: Sarabūti gharagoḷikā. Katā me rakkhā kataṃ me parittanti mayā ettakassa janassa rakkhā
tika-vin02t:1854_3: ca parittāṇañca kataṃ. Paṭikkamantu bhūtānīti sabbepi me kataparittāṇā sattā apagacchantu,
tika-vin02t:1854_4: mā maṃ viheṭhayiṃsūti attho. Sohanti yassa mama etehi sabbehipi mettaṃ, so ahaṃ bhagavato
tika-vin02t:1854_5: namo karomi, vipassīādīnañca sattannaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ namo karomīti sambandho.
tika-vin02t:1855: Aññamhi chetabbamhīti rāgānusayaṃ sandhāya vadati. Tādisaṃ vā dukkhanti muṭṭhiādīhi dukkhaṃ uppādentassa.
tika-vin02t:1856_0: 252. Jālāni parikkhipāpetvāti parissayamocanatthañceva pamādena gaḷitānaṃ ābharaṇādīnaṃ
tika-vin02t:1856_1: rakkhaṇatthañca jālāni karaṇḍakākārena parikkhipāpetvā. Candanagaṇṭhi āgantvā jāle
tika-vin02t:1856_2: laggāti eko kira rattacandanarukkho gaṅgāya uparitīre jāto gaṅgodakena dhotamūlo
tika-vin02t:1856_3: patitvā tattha tattha pāsāṇesu sambhijjamāno vippakiri. Tato ekā ghaṭappamāṇā ghaṭikā
tika-vin02t:1856_4: pāsāṇesu ghaṃsiyamānā udakaūmīhi pothiyamānā maṭṭhā hutvā anupubbena vuyhamānā sevālapariyonaddhā
tika-vin02t:1856_5: āgantvā tasmiṃ jāle laggi. Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Lekhanti likhitagahitaṃ cuṇṇaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1856_6: Uḍḍitvāti veḷuparamparāya uddhaṃ pāpetvā, uṭṭhāpetvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Oharatūti iddhiyā otāretvā gaṇhatu.
tika-vin02t:1857_0: Pūraṇakassapādayo cha satthāro. Tattha pūraṇoti tassa satthupaṭiññassa nāmaṃ. Kassapoti
tika-vin02t:1857_1: gottaṃ. So kira aññatarassa kulassa ekūnadāsasataṃ pūrayamāno jāto. Tenassa “pūraṇo”ti
tika-vin02t:1857_2: nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Maṅgaladāsattā cassa kataṃ “dukkaṭa”nti vattā natthi, akataṃ vā “na
tika-vin02t:1857_3: kata”nti. So “kimahaṃ ettha vasāmī”ti palāyi. Athassa corā vatthāni acchindiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1857_4: So paṇṇena vā tiṇena vā paṭicchādetumpi ajānanto jātarūpeneva ekaṃ gāmaṃ pāvisi.
tika-vin02t:1857_5: Manussā taṃ disvā “ayaṃ samaṇo arahā appiccho, natthi iminā sadiso”ti pūvabhattādīni
tika-vin02t:1857_6: gahetvā upasaṅkamanti. So “mayhaṃ sāṭakaṃ anivatthabhāvena idaṃ uppanna”nti tato
tika-vin02t:1857_7: paṭṭhāya sāṭakaṃ labhitvāpi na nivāsesi, tadeva pabbajjaṃ aggahesi. Tassa santike
tika-vin02t:1857_8: aññepi aññepīti pañcasatā manussā pabbajiṃsu. Evamayaṃ gaṇācariyo hutvā “satthā”ti loke pākaṭo ahosi.
tika-vin02t:1858_0: Makkhalīti tassa nāmaṃ. Gosālāya jātattā gosāloti dutiyanāmaṃ. Taṃ kira sakaddamāya
tika-vin02t:1858_1: bhūmiyā telaghaṭaṃ gahetvā gacchantaṃ “tāta mā khalī”ti sāmiko āha. So pamādena khalitvā
tika-vin02t:1858_2: patitvā sāmikassa bhayena palāyituṃ āraddho. Sāmiko upadhāvitvā sāṭakakaṇṇe aggahesi,
tika-vin02t:1858_3: so sāṭakaṃ chaḍḍetvā acelako hutvā palāyi. Sesaṃ pūraṇasadisameva.
tika-vin02t:1859_0: Ajitoti tassa nāmaṃ. Kesakambalaṃ dhāretīti kesakambalo. Iti nāmadvayaṃ saṃsanditvā
tika-vin02t:1859_1: “ajito kesakambalo”ti vuccati. Tattha kesakambalo nāma manussānaṃ kesehi katakambalo.
tika-vin02t:1859_2: Tato paṭikiṭṭhataraṃ vatthaṃ nāma natthi. Yathāha “seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, yāni kānici
tika-vin02t:1859_3: tantāvutānaṃ vatthānaṃ, kesakambalo tesaṃ paṭikiṭṭho akkhāyati. Kesakambalo, bhikkhave,
tika-vin02t:1859_4: sīte sīto uṇhe uṇho dubbaṇṇo duggandho dukkhasamphasso”ti.
tika-vin02t:1860_0: Pakudhoti tassa nāmaṃ. Kaccāyanoti gottaṃ. Iti nāmagottaṃ saṃsanditvā “pakudho kaccāyano”ti
tika-vin02t:1860_1: vuccati. Sītūdakapaṭikkhittako esa, vaccaṃ katvāpi udakakiccaṃ na karoti, uṇhodakaṃ
tika-vin02t:1860_2: vā kañjiyaṃ vā labhitvā karoti, nadiṃ vā maggodakaṃ vā atikkamma “sīlaṃ me bhinna”nti
tika-vin02t:1860_3: vālikathūpaṃ katvā sīlaṃ adhiṭṭhāya gacchati. Evarūpanissirikaladdhiko esa.
tika-vin02t:1861_0: Sañcayoti tassa nāmaṃ. Belaṭṭhassa putto belaṭṭhaputto. “Amhākaṃ gaṇṭhanakileso palibundhanakileso
tika-vin02t:1861_1: natthi, kilesagaṇṭhirahitā maya”nti evaṃvāditāya laddhanāmavasena nigaṇṭho. Nāṭassa puttoti nāṭaputto.
tika-vin02t:1862_0: Piṇḍolabhāradvājoti piṇḍaṃ ulamāno pariyesamāno pabbajitoti piṇḍolo. So kira parijiṇṇabhogo
tika-vin02t:1862_1: brāhmaṇo hutvā mahantaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa lābhasakkāraṃ disvā piṇḍatthāya nikkhamitvā
tika-vin02t:1862_2: pabbajito. So mahantaṃ kapallapattaṃ “patta”nti gahetvā carati, kapallapūraṃ yāguṃ
tika-vin02t:1862_3: pivati, bhattaṃ bhuñjati, pūvakhajjakañca khādati. Athassa mahagghasabhāvaṃ satthu
tika-vin02t:1862_4: ārocayiṃsu. Satthā tassa pattatthavikaṃ nānujāni. Thero heṭṭhāmañce pattaṃ nikujjitvā
tika-vin02t:1862_5: ṭhapeti. So ṭhapentopi ghaṃsentova paṇāmetvā ṭhapeti, gaṇhantopi ghaṃsentova ākaḍḍhitvā
tika-vin02t:1862_6: gaṇhāti. Taṃ gacchante gacchante kāle ghaṃsanena parikkhīṇaṃ nāḷikodanamattasseva
tika-vin02t:1862_7: gaṇhanakaṃ jātaṃ. Tato satthu ārocesuṃ. Athassa satthā pattatthavikaṃ anujāni. Thero
tika-vin02t:1862_8: aparena samayena indriyabhāvanaṃ bhāvento aggaphale arahatte patiṭṭhāsi. Iti so pubbe
tika-vin02t:1862_9: savisesaṃ piṇḍatthāya ulatīti piṇḍolo. Gottena pana bhāradvājoti ubhayaṃ ekato katvā
tika-vin02t:1863_0: “Atha kho āyasmā piṇḍolabhāradvājo…pe… etadavocā”ti kasmā evamāhaṃsu? So kira seṭṭhi
tika-vin02t:1863_1: neva sammādiṭṭhi, na micchādiṭṭhi, majjhattadhātuko. So cintesi “mayhaṃ gehe candanaṃ
tika-vin02t:1863_2: bahu, kiṃ nu kho iminā karissāmī”ti. Athassa etadahosi “imasmiṃ loke ‘mayaṃ arahanto,
tika-vin02t:1863_3: mayaṃ arahanto’ti vattāro bahū, ahaṃ ekaṃ arahantampi na jānāmi, gehe bhamaṃ yojetvā
tika-vin02t:1863_4: pattaṃ likhāpetvā sikkāya ṭhapetvā veḷuparamparāya saṭṭhihatthamatte ākāse olambāpetvā
tika-vin02t:1863_5: ‘sace arahā atthi, ākāsenāgantvā gaṇhātū’ti vakkhāmi. Yo taṃ gahessati, tassa saputtadāro
tika-vin02t:1863_6: saraṇaṃ gamissāmī”ti. So cintitaniyāmeneva pattaṃ likhāpetvā veḷuparamparāya ussāpetvā
tika-vin02t:1863_7: “yo imasmiṃ loke arahā, so ākāsena āgantvā imaṃ pattaṃ gaṇhātū”ti āha.
tika-vin02t:1864_0: Tadā cha satthāro “amhākaṃ esa anucchaviko, amhākameva naṃ dehī”ti vadiṃsu. So “ākāsenāgantvā
tika-vin02t:1864_1: gaṇhathā”ti āha. Chaṭṭhe divase nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto antevāsike pesesi “gacchatha seṭṭhiṃ
tika-vin02t:1864_2: evaṃ vadetha ‘amhākaṃ ācariyasseva anucchaviko, mā appamattakassa kāraṇā ākāsena
tika-vin02t:1864_3: āgamanaṃ kari, dehi kira te patta’nti”. Te gantvā seṭṭhiṃ tathā vadiṃsu. Seṭṭhi “ākāsenāgantvā
tika-vin02t:1864_4: gaṇhituṃ samatthova gaṇhātū”ti āha. Nāṭaputto sayaṃ gantukāmo hutvā antevāsikānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1864_5: saññaṃ adāsi “ahaṃ ekaṃ hatthañca pādañca ukkhipitvā uppatitukāmo viya bhavissāmi,
tika-vin02t:1864_6: tumhe maṃ ‘ācariya kiṃ karotha, dārumayapattassa kāraṇā paṭicchannaṃ arahattaguṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:1864_7: mahājanassa mā dassayitthā’ti vatvā maṃ hatthesu ca pādesu ca gahetvā ākaḍḍhantā
tika-vin02t:1864_8: bhūmiyaṃ pāteyyāthā”ti. So tattha gantvā seṭṭhiṃ āha “mahāseṭṭhi ayaṃ patto aññesaṃ
tika-vin02t:1864_9: nānucchaviko, mā te appamattakassa kāraṇā mama ākāse uppatanaṃ rucci, dehi me patta”nti.
tika-vin02t:1864_10: Bhante, ākāsena uppatitvāva gaṇhathāti. Tato nāṭaputto “tena hi apetha apethā”ti
tika-vin02t:1864_11: antevāsike apanetvā “ākāse uppatissāmī”ti ekaṃ hatthañca pādañca ukkhipi. Atha naṃ
tika-vin02t:1864_12: antevāsikā “ācariya, kiṃ nāmetaṃ karotha, chavassa dārumayapattassa kāraṇā paṭicchannaguṇena
tika-vin02t:1864_13: tumhehi mahājanassa dassitena ko attho”ti taṃ hatthapādesu gahetvā ākaḍḍhitvā bhūmiyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1864_14: pātesuṃ. So seṭṭhiṃ āha “mahāseṭṭhi, ime me uppatituṃ na denti, dehi me patta”nti.
tika-vin02t:1864_15: Uppatitvāva gaṇhatha bhanteti. Evaṃ titthiyā cha divasāni vāyamitvāpi pattaṃ na labhiṃsuyeva.
tika-vin02t:1865_0: Atha sattame divase āyasmato ca moggallānassa āyasmato ca piṇḍolabhāradvājassa “rājagahe
tika-vin02t:1865_1: piṇḍāya carissāmā”ti gantvā ekasmiṃ piṭṭhipāsāṇe ṭhatvā cīvaraṃ pārupanakāle dhuttakā
tika-vin02t:1865_2: kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “hambho pubbe cha satthāro ‘mayaṃ arahantāmhā’ti vicariṃsu,
tika-vin02t:1865_3: rājagahaseṭṭhino pana ajja sattamo divaso pattaṃ ussāpetvā ṭhapayato ‘sace arahā
tika-vin02t:1865_4: atthi, ākāsenāgantvā gaṇhātū’ti vadantassa, ekopi ‘ahaṃ arahā’ti ākāse uppatanto
tika-vin02t:1865_5: natthi, ajja no loke arahantānaṃ natthibhāvo ñāto”ti. Taṃ kathaṃ sutvā āyasmā mahāmoggallāno
tika-vin02t:1865_6: āyasmantaṃ piṇḍolabhāradvājaṃ āha “sutaṃ te, āvuso bhāradvāja, imesaṃ vacanaṃ, ime
tika-vin02t:1865_7: buddhasāsanaṃ pariggaṇhantā viya vadanti, tvañca mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo, gacchetaṃ
tika-vin02t:1865_8: pattaṃ ākāsena gantvā gaṇhāhī”ti. “Āvuso moggallāna, tvaṃ ‘iddhimantānaṃ aggo’ti
tika-vin02t:1865_9: pākaṭo, tvaṃ etaṃ gaṇha, tayi pana aggaṇhante ahaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti āha. Atha āyasmā
tika-vin02t:1865_10: mahāmoggallāno “gaṇhāvuso”ti āha. Iti te lokassa arahantehi asuññabhāvadassanatthaṃ evamāhaṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1866_0: Tikkhattuṃ rājagahaṃ anupariyāyīti tikkhattuṃ rājagahaṃ anugantvā paribbhami. “Sattakkhattu”ntipi
tika-vin02t:1866_1: vadanti. Thero kira abhiññāpādakaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā uṭṭhāya tigāvutaṃ piṭṭhipāsāṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:1866_2: antantena paricchindanto tūlapicu viya ākāse uṭṭhāpetvā rājagahanagarassa upari sattakkhattuṃ
tika-vin02t:1866_3: anupariyāyi. So tigāvutappamāṇassa nagarassa apidhānaṃ viya paññāyi. Nagaravāsino
tika-vin02t:1866_4: “pāsāṇo no avattharitvā gaṇhātī”ti bhītā suppādīni matthake katvā tattha tattha nilīyiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1866_5: Sattame vāre thero piṭṭhipāsāṇaṃ bhinditvā attānaṃ dasseti. Mahājano theraṃ disvā
tika-vin02t:1866_6: “bhante piṇḍolabhāradvāja, tava pāsāṇaṃ gāḷhaṃ katvā gaṇha, mā no sabbe nāsayī”ti
tika-vin02t:1866_7: āha. Thero pāsāṇaṃ pādantena khipitvā vissajjesi. So gantvā yathāṭhāneyeva patiṭṭhāsi.
tika-vin02t:1866_8: Thero seṭṭhissa gehamatthake aṭṭhāsi. Taṃ disvā seṭṭhi urena nipajjitvā “otara sāmī”ti
tika-vin02t:1866_9: vatvā ākāsato otiṇṇaṃ theraṃ nisīdāpetvā pattaṃ gahetvā catumadhurapuṇṇaṃ katvā therassa
tika-vin02t:1866_10: adāsi. Thero pattaṃ gahetvā vihārābhimukho pāyāsi. Athassa ye araññagatā pāṭihāriyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1866_11: nāddasaṃsu, te sannipatitvā “bhante, amhākampi pāṭihāriyaṃ dassehī”ti theraṃ anubandhiṃsu.
tika-vin02t:1866_12: So tesaṃ tesaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ dassento vihāraṃ agamāsi. Satthā taṃ anubandhitvā unnādentassa
tika-vin02t:1866_13: mahājanassa saddaṃ sutvā “ānanda, kasseso saddo”ti pucchi. Tena vuttaṃ “assosi kho
tika-vin02t:1866_14: bhagavā…pe… kiṃ nu kho so, ānanda, uccāsaddo mahāsaddo”ti.
tika-vin02t:1867_0: Vikubbaniddhiyā pāṭihāriyaṃ paṭikkhittanti ettha vikubbaniddhi nāma “so pakativaṇṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:1867_1: vijahitvā kumārakavaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti nāgavaṇṇaṃ vā, vividhampi senābyūhaṃ dassetī”ti
tika-vin02t:1867_2: evamāgatā pakativaṇṇavijahanavikāravasena pavattā iddhi. Adhiṭṭhāniddhi pana “pakatiyā
tika-vin02t:1867_3: eko bahukaṃ āvajjati sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā satasahassaṃ vā, āvajjitvā ñāṇena adhiṭṭhāti
tika-vin02t:1867_4: ‘bahuko homī”’ti evaṃ vibhajitvā dassitā adhiṭṭhānavasena nipphannā iddhi.
tika-vin02t:1868_0: 253-254. Na acchupiyantīti na suphassitāni honti. Rūpakākiṇṇānīti itthirūpādīhi ākiṇṇāni.
tika-vin02t:1868_2: bahūhi daṇḍakehi kataādhārake vāti attho, tīhi daṇḍehi kato pana na vaṭṭati. Bhūmiyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1868_3: pana nikkujjitvā ekameva ṭhapetabbanti ettha dve ṭhapentena upari ṭhapitapattaṃ ekena
tika-vin02t:1868_4: passena bhūmiyaṃ phusāpetvā ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti. Ālindakamiḍḍhikādīnanti pamukhamiḍḍhikānaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1868_5: Parivattitvā tattheva patiṭṭhātīti ettha “parivattitvā tatiyavāre tattheva miḍḍhiyā
tika-vin02t:1868_6: patiṭṭhātī”ti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Paribhaṇḍaṃ nāma gehassa bahi kuṭṭapādassa thirabhāvatthaṃ
tika-vin02t:1868_7: katā tanukamiḍḍhikā vuccati. Tanukamiḍḍhikāyāti khuddakamiḍḍhikāya. Miḍḍhantepi ādhārake
tika-vin02t:1868_8: ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ādhāraka”nti hi vacanato miḍḍhādīsu yattha
tika-vin02t:1868_9: katthaci ādhārakaṃ ṭhapetvā tattha pattaṃ ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati ādhārake ṭhapanokāsassa
tika-vin02t:1868_10: aniyamitattāti vadanti. “Pattamāḷo nāma vaṭṭetvā pattānaṃ agamanatthaṃ vaṭṭaṃ vā
tika-vin02t:1868_11: caturassaṃ vā iṭṭhakādīhi parikkhipitvā kato”ti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1869_0: 255. Ghaṭikanti upari yojitaṃ aggaḷaṃ. Tāvakālikaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti sakideva
tika-vin02t:1869_1: gahetvā tena āmisaṃ paribhuñjitvā chaḍḍetuṃ vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo. Ghaṭikaṭāheti bhājanakapāle.
tika-vin02t:1869_2: Abhuṃ meti ettha bhavatīti bhū, vaḍḍhi. Na bhūti abhū, avaḍḍhi. Bhayavasena pana
tika-vin02t:1869_3: sā itthī “abhu”nti āha, vināso mayhanti attho. Chavasīsassa pattanti chavasīsamayaṃ
tika-vin02t:1869_4: pattaṃ. Pakativikārasambandhe cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ, abhedepi vā bhedūpacārenāyaṃ vohāro
tika-vin02t:1870_0: Cabbetvāti khāditvā. Ekaṃ udakagaṇḍusaṃ gahetvāti vāmahattheneva pattaṃ ukkhipitvā
tika-vin02t:1870_1: mukhena gaṇḍusaṃ gahetvā. Ucchiṭṭhahatthenāti sāmisena hatthena. Ettāvatāti ekagaṇḍusagahaṇamattena.
tika-vin02t:1870_2: Luñcitvāti tato maṃsaṃ uddharitvā. Etesu sabbesu paṇṇattiṃ jānātu vā mā vā, āpattiyeva.
tika-vin02t:1871_1: gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Bidalakanti duguṇakaraṇasaṅkhātassa kiriyāvisesassa adhivacanaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1871_2: Kassa duguṇakaraṇaṃ? Yena kilañjādinā mahantaṃ kathinaṃ atthataṃ, tassa. Tañhi daṇḍakathinappamāṇena
tika-vin02t:1871_3: pariyante saṃharitvā duguṇaṃ kātabbaṃ. Paṭiggahanti aṅgulikañcukaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1872: 257-259. Pāti nāma paṭiggahaṇasaṇṭhānena kato bhājanaviseso. Na sammatīti nappahoti.
tika-vin02t:1873_0: 260-262. Nīcavatthukaṃ cinitunti bahikuṭṭassa samantato nīcavatthukaṃ katvā cinituṃ.
tika-vin02t:1873_1: Arahaṭaghaṭiyantaṃ nāma sakaṭacakkasaṇṭhānaṃ are are ghaṭikāni bandhitvā ekena dvīhi
tika-vin02t:1874: 263. Āviddhapakkhapāsakanti kaṇṇikamaṇḍalassa samantā ṭhapitapakkhapāsakaṃ. Maṇḍaleti kaṇṇikamaṇḍale. Pakkhapāsake ṭhapetvāti samantā pakkhapāsakaphalakāni ṭhapetvā.
tika-vin02t:1875_1: anadhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Ettheva paviṭṭhānīti maḷorikāya eva antogadhāni.
tika-vin02t:1875_2: Pubbe pattasaṅgopanatthaṃ ādhārako anuññāto, idāni bhuñjanatthaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1876_0: 265. Nikkujjitabboti tena dinnassa deyyadhammassa appaṭiggahaṇatthaṃ pattanikkujjanakammavācāya
tika-vin02t:1876_1: nikkujjitabbo, na adhomukhaṭhapanena. Tenevāha “evañca pana, bhikkhave, nikkujjitabbo”tiādi.
tika-vin02t:1876_2: Alābhāyāti catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ alābhatthāya. Anatthāyāti upaddavāya avaḍḍhiyā.
tika-vin02t:1877_0: 266. Pasādessāmāti āyācissāma. Etadavocāti “appatirūpaṃ mayā kataṃ, bhagavā pana
tika-vin02t:1877_1: mahantepi aguṇe acintetvā mayhaṃ accayaṃ paṭiggaṇhissatī”ti maññamāno etaṃ “accayo
tika-vin02t:1877_2: maṃ bhante”tiādivacanaṃ avoca. Tattha ñāyapaṭipattiṃ aticca eti pavattatīti accayo,
tika-vin02t:1877_3: aparādho. Maṃ accagamāti maṃ atikkamma abhibhavitvā pavatto. Purisena madditvā abhibhavitvā
tika-vin02t:1877_4: pavattitopi hi aparādho atthato purisaṃ aticca abhibhavitvā pavatto nāma hoti. Paṭiggaṇhātūti
tika-vin02t:1877_5: khamatu. Āyatiṃ saṃvarāyāti anāgate saṃvaraṇatthāya puna evarūpassa aparādhassa dosassa
tika-vin02t:1877_6: khalitassa akaraṇatthāya. Tagghāti ekaṃsena. Yathādhammaṃ paṭikarosīti yathā dhammo
tika-vin02t:1877_7: ṭhito, tatheva karosi, khamāpesīti vuttaṃ hoti. Taṃ te mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāmāti taṃ tava
tika-vin02t:1877_8: aparādhaṃ mayaṃ khamāma. Vuḍḍhi hesā, āvuso vaḍḍha, ariyassa vinayeti esā, āvuso
tika-vin02t:1877_9: vaḍḍha, ariyassa vinaye buddhassa bhagavato sāsane vuḍḍhi nāma. Katamā? Accayaṃ accayato
tika-vin02t:1877_10: disvā yathādhammaṃ paṭikaritvā āyatiṃ saṃvarāpajjanā. Desanaṃ pana puggalādhiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1877_11: karonto “yo accayaṃ accayato disvā yathādhammaṃ paṭikaroti, āyatiṃ saṃvaraṃ āpajjatī”ti āha.
tika-vin02t:1878_0: 268. Bodhirājakumāravatthumhi kokanadoti kokanadaṃ vuccati padumaṃ, so ca maṅgalapāsādo
tika-vin02t:1878_1: olokanapadumaṃ dassetvā kato, tasmā “kokanado”ti saṅkhaṃ labhi. Yāva pacchimasopānakaḷevarāti
tika-vin02t:1878_2: ettha pacchimasopānakaḷevaranti paṭhamasopānaphalakaṃ vuttaṃ tassa sabbapacchā dussena
tika-vin02t:1878_3: santhatattā. Uparimasopānaphalakato paṭṭhāya hi sopānaṃ santhataṃ. Addasā khoti olokanatthaṃyeva
tika-vin02t:1879_0: Bhagavā tuṇhī ahosīti “kissa nu kho atthāya rājakumārena ayaṃ mahāsakkāro kato”ti
tika-vin02t:1879_1: āvajjento puttapatthanāya katabhāvaṃ aññāsi. So hi rājaputto aputtako. Sutañcānena
tika-vin02t:1879_2: ahosi “buddhānaṃ kira adhikāraṃ katvā manasā icchitaṃ labhantī”ti. So “sacāhaṃ puttaṃ
tika-vin02t:1879_3: labhissāmi, sammāsambuddho imaṃ celapaṭikaṃ akkamissati. No ce labhissāmi, na akkamissatī”ti
tika-vin02t:1879_4: patthanaṃ katvā santharāpesi. Atha bhagavā “nibbattissati nu kho etassa putto”ti
tika-vin02t:1879_5: āvajjetvā “na nibbattissatī”ti addasa. Pubbe kira so ekasmiṃ dīpe vasamāno samānacchandena
tika-vin02t:1879_6: sakuṇapotake khādi. Sacassa mātugāmo puññavā bhaveyya, puttaṃ labheyya. Ubhohi pana
tika-vin02t:1879_7: samānacchandehi hutvā pāpakammaṃ kataṃ, tenassa putto na nibbattissatīti aññāsi.
tika-vin02t:1879_8: Dusse pana akkante “buddhānaṃ adhikāraṃ katvā patthitaṃ labhantīti loke anussavo,
tika-vin02t:1879_9: mayā ca mahāadhikāro kato, na ca puttaṃ labhāmi, tucchaṃ idaṃ vacana”nti micchāgahaṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:1879_10: gaṇheyya. Titthiyāpi “natthi samaṇānaṃ akattabbaṃ nāma, celapaṭikaṃ maddantā āhiṇḍantī”ti
tika-vin02t:1879_11: ujjhāyeyyuṃ. Etarahi ca akkamantesu bahū bhikkhū paracittaviduno, te bhabbataṃ jānitvā
tika-vin02t:1879_12: akkamissanti, abhabbataṃ jānitvā na akkamissanti. Anāgate pana upanissayo mando bhavissati,
tika-vin02t:1879_13: anāgataṃ na jānissanti, tesu akkamantesu sace patthitaṃ ijjhissati, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1879_14: No ce ijjhissati, “pubbe bhikkhusaṅghassa adhikāraṃ katvā icchiticchitaṃ labhanti,
tika-vin02t:1879_15: idāni na labhanti, teyeva maññe bhikkhū paṭipattipūrakā ahesuṃ, ime pana paṭipattiṃ
tika-vin02t:1879_16: pūretuṃ na sakkontī”ti manussā vippaṭisārino bhavissantīti imehi tīhi kāraṇehi bhagavā
tika-vin02t:1879_17: akkamituṃ anicchanto tuṇhī ahosi. Pacchimaṃ janataṃ tathāgato anukampatīti idaṃ pana
tika-vin02t:1879_18: thero vuttesu kāraṇesu tatiyaṃ kāraṇaṃ sandhāyāha. Maṅgalaṃ icchantīti maṅgalikā.
tika-vin02t:1880: 269. Bījaninti caturassabījaniṃ. Tālavaṇṭanti tālapattādīhi kataṃ maṇḍalikabījaniṃ.
tika-vin02t:1881_1: ettha sata-saddo anekapariyāyo, anekena kammenāti attho, mahatā ussāhenāti vuttaṃ
tika-vin02t:1882_0: 278. “Akāyabandhanena sañcicca asañcicca vā gāmappavesane āpatti. Saritaṭṭhānato
tika-vin02t:1882_1: bandhitvā pavisitabbaṃ nivattitabbaṃ vā”ti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Murajavaṭṭisaṇṭhānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1882_2: veṭhetvā katanti bahū rajjuke ekato katvā nānāvaṇṇehi suttehi veṭhetvā murajavaṭṭisadisaṃ
tika-vin02t:1882_3: kataṃ. Teneva dutiyapārājikavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttaṃ “bahū rajjuke ekato katvā ekena nirantaraṃ
tika-vin02t:1882_4: veṭhetvā kataṃ bahurajjukanti na vattabbaṃ, taṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1882_5: taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Muddikakāyabandhanaṃ nāma caturassaṃ akatvā sajjitaṃ. Pāmaṅgadasā
tika-vin02t:1883: 280-282. Muṇḍavaṭṭīti mallakammakarādayo. Pamāṇaṅgulenāti vaḍḍhakīaṅgulaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sesamettha pāḷito aṭṭhakathāto ca suviññeyyameva.
tika-vin02t:1887_0: 294. Senāsanakkhandhake senāsanaṃ apaññattaṃ hotīti vihārasenāsanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1887_1: Catubbidhañhi senāsanaṃ vihārasenāsanaṃ mañcapīṭhasenāsanaṃ santhatasenāsanaṃ okāsasenāsananti.
tika-vin02t:1887_2: Tattha “mañcopi senāsanaṃ, pīṭhampi bhisipi bimbohanampi vihāropi aḍḍhayogopi pāsādopi
tika-vin02t:1887_3: hammiyampi guhāpi aṭṭopi māḷopi leṇampi veḷugumbopi rukkhamūlampi maṇḍapopi senāsanaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1887_4: Yattha vā pana bhikkhū paṭikkamanti, sabbametaṃ senāsana”nti vacanato vihāro aḍḍhayogo
tika-vin02t:1887_5: pāsādo hammiyaṃ guhāti idaṃ vihārasenāsanaṃ nāma. Mañco pīṭhaṃ bhisi bimbohananti
tika-vin02t:1887_6: idaṃ mañcapīṭhasenāsanaṃ nāma. Cimilikā cammakhaṇḍo tiṇasanthāro paṇṇasanthāroti
tika-vin02t:1887_7: idaṃ santhatasenāsanaṃ nāma. Yattha vā pana bhikkhū paṭikkamantīti idaṃ okāsasenāsanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin02t:1888_0: Rukkhamūletiādīsu rukkhamūlasenāsanaṃ nāma yaṃkiñci sandacchāyaṃ vivittaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1888_1: Pabbato nāma selo. Tattha hi udakasoṇḍīsu udakakiccaṃ katvā sītāya rukkhacchāyāya
tika-vin02t:1888_2: nisinnā nānādisāsu khāyamānāsu sītena vātena bījiyamānā samaṇadhammaṃ karonti. Kandareti
tika-vin02t:1888_3: kaṃ vuccati udakaṃ, tena dārito udakena bhinno pabbatappadeso kandaraṃ. Yaṃ “nitamba”ntipi
tika-vin02t:1888_4: “nadīkuñja”ntipi vadanti. Tattha hi rajatapaṭṭasadisā vālikā hoti, matthake maṇivitānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1888_5: viya vanagahanaṃ, maṇikkhandhasadisaṃ udakaṃ sandati, evarūpaṃ kandaraṃ oruyha pānīyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1888_6: pivitvā gattāni sītaṃ katvā vālikaṃ ussāpetvā paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ paññapetvā tattha
tika-vin02t:1888_7: nisinnā te bhikkhū samaṇadhammaṃ karonti. Giriguhā nāma dvinnaṃ pabbatānaṃ antarā,
tika-vin02t:1889_0: “Vanapatthanti dūrānametaṃ senāsanānaṃ adhivacana”ntiādivacanato yattha na kasanti
tika-vin02t:1889_1: na vapanti, tādisaṃ manussānaṃ upacāraṭṭhānaṃ atikkamitvā ṭhitaṃ araññakasenāsanaṃ
tika-vin02t:1889_2: “vanapattha”nti vuccati. Ajjhokāso nāma kenaci acchanno padeso. Ākaṅkhamānā panettha
tika-vin02t:1889_3: cīvarakuṭiṃ katvā vasanti. Palālapuñjeti palālarāsimhi. Mahāpalālapuñjato hi palālaṃ
tika-vin02t:1889_4: nikkaḍḍhitvā pabbhāraleṇasadise ālaye karonti, gacchagumbādīnampi upari palālaṃ parikkhipitvā
tika-vin02t:1889_5: heṭṭhā nisinnā samaṇadhammaṃ karonti, taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Pañca leṇānīti pañca
tika-vin02t:1889_6: līyanaṭṭhānāni. Nilīyanti ettha bhikkhūti leṇāni, vihārādīnametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Supaṇṇavaṅkagehanti
tika-vin02t:1890_1: vā uppajjanakasītaṃ. Uṇhanti aggisantāpaṃ, tassa vanadāhādīsu vā sambhavo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin02t:1890_2: Paṭihantīti bādhati. Yathā tadubhayavasena kāyacittānaṃ bādhanaṃ na hoti, evaṃ karoti.
tika-vin02t:1890_3: Sītuṇhabbhāhate hi sarīre vikkhittacitto bhikkhu yoniso padahituṃ na sakkoti. Vāḷamigānīti
tika-vin02t:1890_4: sīhabyagghādivāḷamige. Guttasenāsanañhi pavisitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya nisinnassa te parissayā
tika-vin02t:1890_5: na honti. Sarīsapeti ye keci sarante gacchante dīghajātike. Makaseti nidassanamattametaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1890_6: ḍaṃsādīnampi eteneva saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Sisireti sisirakālavasena sattāhavaddhalikādivasena
tika-vin02t:1890_7: ca uppanne sisirasamphasse. Vuṭṭhiyoti yadā tadā uppannā vassavuṭṭhiyo.
tika-vin02t:1891_0: Vātātapo ghoroti rukkhagacchādīnaṃ ummūlabhañjanādivasena pavattiyā ghoro sarajaarajādibhedo
tika-vin02t:1891_1: vāto ceva gimhapariḷāhasamayesu uppattiyā ghoro sūriyātapo ca paṭihaññati paṭibāhīyati.
tika-vin02t:1891_2: Leṇatthanti nānārammaṇato cittaṃ nivattetvā paṭisallānārāmatthaṃ. Sukhatthanti vuttaparissayābhāvena
tika-vin02t:1891_3: phāsuvihāratthaṃ. Jhāyitunti aṭṭhatiṃsārammaṇesu yattha katthaci cittaṃ upanijjhāyituṃ.
tika-vin02t:1892_0: Vihāreti patissaye. Kārayeti kārāpeyya. Rammeti manorame nivāsasukhe. Vāsayettha
tika-vin02t:1892_1: bahussuteti kāretvā pana ettha vihāresu bahussute sīlavante kalyāṇadhamme nivāseyya.
tika-vin02t:1892_2: Te nivāsento pana tesaṃ bahussutānaṃ yathā paccayehi kilamatho na hoti, evaṃ annañca
tika-vin02t:1892_3: pānañca vatthasenāsanāni ca dadeyya ujubhūtesu ajjhāsayasampannesu kammaphalānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1893_0: Idāni gahaṭṭhapabbajitānaṃ aññamaññupakāritaṃ dassetuṃ “te tassā”ti gāthamāha. Tattha
tika-vin02t:1893_1: teti te bahussutā. Tassāti upāsakassa. Dhammaṃ desentīti sakalavaṭṭadukkhāpanūdanaṃ
tika-vin02t:1893_2: saddhammaṃ desenti. Yaṃ so dhammaṃ idhaññāyāti so puggalo yaṃ saddhammaṃ imasmiṃ
tika-vin02t:1893_3: sāsane sammā paṭipajjanena jānitvā aggamaggādhigamena anāsavo hutvā parinibbāyati.
tika-vin02t:1894_0: So ca sabbadado hotīti āvāsadānasmiṃ dinne sabbadānaṃ dinnameva hotīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1894_1: Tathā hi dve tayo gāme piṇḍāya caritvā kiñci aladdhā āgatassapi chāyūdakasampannaṃ
tika-vin02t:1894_2: ārāmaṃ pavisitvā nahāyitvā patissaye muhuttaṃ nipajjitvā uṭṭhāya nisinnassa kāye
tika-vin02t:1894_3: balaṃ āharitvā pakkhittaṃ viya hoti, bahi vicarantassa ca kāye vaṇṇadhātu vātātapehi
tika-vin02t:1894_4: kilamati, patissayaṃ pavisitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya muhuttaṃ nipannassa visabhāgasantati
tika-vin02t:1894_5: vūpasammati, sabhāgasantati patiṭṭhāti, vaṇṇadhātu āharitvā pakkhittā viya hoti,
tika-vin02t:1894_6: bahi vicarantassa ca pāde kaṇṭako vijjhati, khāṇu paharati, sarīsapādiparissayā ceva
tika-vin02t:1894_7: corabhayañca uppajjati, patissayaṃ pavisitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya nipannassa sabbe parissayā
tika-vin02t:1894_8: na honti, sajjhāyantassa dhammapītisukhaṃ, kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontassa upasamasukhañca
tika-vin02t:1894_9: uppajjati bahiddhāvikkhepābhāvato, bahi vicarantassa ca sedā muccanti, akkhīni phandanti,
tika-vin02t:1894_10: senāsanaṃ pavisanakkhaṇe mañcapīṭhāni na paññāyanti, muhuttaṃ nisinnassa pana akkhipasādo
tika-vin02t:1894_11: āharitvā pakkhitto viya hoti, dvāravātapānamañcapīṭhādīni paññāyanti, etasmiñca āvāse
tika-vin02t:1894_12: vasantaṃ disvā manussā catūhi paccayehi sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahanti. Tena vuttaṃ “so ca
tika-vin02t:1895_0: 296. Āviñchanacchiddanti yattha aṅguliṃ pavesetvā dvāraṃ ākaḍḍhantā dvārabāhaṃ phusāpenti,
tika-vin02t:1895_1: tassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Āviñchanarajjunti kavāṭeyeva chiddaṃ katvā tattha pavesetvā
tika-vin02t:1895_2: yena rajjukena kaḍḍhantā dvāraṃ phusāpenti, taṃ āviñchanarajjukaṃ. Senāsanaparibhoge
tika-vin02t:1895_3: akappiyacammaṃ nāma natthīti dassanatthaṃ “sacepi dīpinaṅguṭṭhena katā hoti, vaṭṭatiyevā”ti
tika-vin02t:1895_4: vuttaṃ. Cetiye vedikāsadisanti vātapānabāhāsu cetiye vedikāya viya paṭṭikādīhi dassetvā
tika-vin02t:1895_5: kataṃ. Thambhakavātapānaṃ nāma tiriyaṃ dārūni adatvā ujukaṃ ṭhitehi eva veṇusalākādīhi kataṃ.
tika-vin02t:1898_1: āha “yesaṃ kesañci tiṇajātikāna”nti. Pañcavidhaṃ uṇṇāditūlampi vaṭṭatīti etthāpi
tika-vin02t:1898_2: “bimbohane”ti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. “Tūlapūritaṃ bhisiṃ apassayituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin02t:1898_3: keci vadanti, vaṭṭatīti apare. Upadahantīti ṭhapenti. Sīsappamāṇanti yattha galavāṭakato
tika-vin02t:1898_4: paṭṭhāya sabbasīsaṃ upadahanti, taṃ sīsappamāṇaṃ. Tañca ukkaṭṭhaparicchedato tiriyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1898_5: muṭṭhiratanaṃ hotīti dassetuṃ “yassa vitthārato tīsu kaṇṇesū”tiādimāha. Majjhaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1898_6: muṭṭhiratanaṃ hotīti bimbohanassa majjhaṭṭhānaṃ tiriyato muṭṭhiratanappamāṇaṃ hoti.
tika-vin02t:1898_7: Masūraketi cammamayabhisiyaṃ. Phusitāni dātunti saññākaraṇatthaṃ bindūni dātuṃ.
tika-vin02t:1899: 298. Na nibandhatīti anibandhanīyo, na allīyatīti attho. Paṭibāhetvāti maṭṭhaṃ katvā.
tika-vin02t:1901_0: 300. Rukkhaṃ vijjhitvāti rukkhadāruṃ vijjhitvā. Khāṇuke ākoṭetvāti dve dve khāṇuke
tika-vin02t:1901_1: ākoṭetvā. Taṃ āharimaṃ bhittipādanti vuttanayena khāṇuke ākoṭetvā kataṃyeva sandhāya
tika-vin02t:1901_2: vuttaṃ. Bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetunti mūlena bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā bhittipādassa upatthambhanavasena
tika-vin02t:1901_3: ussāpetvā khāṇukehi bhittipādaṃ ussāpetvā ṭhapetunti adhippāyo. Ubhato kuṭṭaṃ nīharitvā
tika-vin02t:1901_4: katapadesassāti yathā antodvārasamīpe nisinnehi ujukaṃ bahi oloketuṃ na sakkā hoti,
tika-vin02t:1901_5: evaṃ ubhohi passehi kuṭṭaṃ nīharitvā abhimukhe bhittiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā katapadesassa.
tika-vin02t:1901_6: Samantā pariyāgāroti samantato āviddhapamukhaṃ. Ugghāṭanakiṭikanti daṇḍehi ukkhipitvā
tika-vin02t:1903_1: Anāthapiṇḍiko kira rājagahaseṭṭhi ca aññamaññaṃ bhaginipatikā honti. Yadā rājagahe
tika-vin02t:1903_2: uṭṭhānakabhaṇḍaṃ samagghaṃ hoti, tadā rājagahaseṭṭhi taṃ gahetvā sakaṭasatehi sāvatthiṃ
tika-vin02t:1903_3: gantvā yojanamatte ṭhito attano āgatabhāvaṃ jānāpeti. Anāthapiṇḍiko paccuggantvā
tika-vin02t:1903_4: tassa mahāsakkāraṃ katvā ekaṃ yānaṃ āropetvā sāvatthiṃ pavisati. So sace bhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin02t:1903_5: lahukaṃ vikkīyati, vikkiṇāti. No ce, bhaginighare ṭhapetvā pakkamati. Anāthapiṇḍikopi
tika-vin02t:1903_6: tatheva karoti. Svāyaṃ tadāpi teneva karaṇīyena agamāsi. Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1904_0: Taṃ divasaṃ pana rājagahaseṭṭhi yojanamatte ṭhitena anāthapiṇḍikena āgatabhāvajānanatthaṃ
tika-vin02t:1904_1: pesitaṃ paṇṇaṃ na suṇi, dhammassavanatthāya vihāraṃ agamāsi. So dhammakathaṃ sutvā
tika-vin02t:1904_2: svātanāya buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā attano ghare uddhanakhaṇāpanadāruphālanādīni
tika-vin02t:1904_3: kāresi. Anāthapiṇḍikopi “idāni mayhaṃ paccuggamanaṃ karissati, idāni karissatī”ti
tika-vin02t:1904_4: gharadvārepi paccuggamanaṃ alabhitvā antogharaṃ paviṭṭho paṭisanthārampi na bahuṃ
tika-vin02t:1904_5: alattha. “Kiṃ mahāseṭṭhi kusalaṃ dārakarūpānaṃ, nasi magge kilanto”ti ettakova paṭisanthāro
tika-vin02t:1904_6: ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ “atha kho anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa etadahosī”tiādi.
tika-vin02t:1905_0: Buddhoti tvaṃ gahapati vadesīti tassa kira mukhato buddhasaddaṃ sutvā anāthapiṇḍiko
tika-vin02t:1905_1: pañcavaṇṇaṃ pītiṃ paṭilabhati, sā tassa sīse uṭṭhahitvā yāva pādapiṭṭhiyā, pādapiṭṭhiyā
tika-vin02t:1905_2: uṭṭhāya yāva sīsā gacchati, ubhato uṭṭhāya majjhe osarati, majjhe uṭṭhāya ubhato
tika-vin02t:1905_3: gacchati. So pītiyā nirantaraṃ phuṭo “buddhoti tvaṃ gahapati vadesī”ti evaṃ tikkhattuṃ
tika-vin02t:1905_4: pucchi. Akālo kho, gahapati, imaṃ kālaṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamitunti
tika-vin02t:1905_5: “buddhā nāma durāsadā āsīvisasadisā honti, satthā ca sivathikāya samīpe vasati, na
tika-vin02t:1905_6: sakkā tattha imāya velāya iminā gantu”nti maññamāno evamāha. Buddhagatāya satiyā
tika-vin02t:1905_7: nipajjīti aññaṃ kiñci acintetvā buddhagatāya eva satiyā nipajji. Taṃ divasaṃ kirassa
tika-vin02t:1905_8: bhaṇḍasakaṭesu vā upaṭṭhākesu vā cittampi nuppajji, sāyamāsampi na akāsi. Sattabhūmikaṃ
tika-vin02t:1905_9: pana pāsādaṃ āruyha supaññattālaṅkatavarasayane “buddho buddho”ti sajjhāyaṃ karontova
tika-vin02t:1905_10: nipajjitvā niddaṃ okkami. Tikkhattuṃ vuṭṭhāsi pabhātaṃ maññamānoti paṭhamayāme tāva
tika-vin02t:1905_11: vītivatte uṭṭhāya buddhaṃ anussari, athassa balavappasādo udapādi, pītiāloko ahosi,
tika-vin02t:1905_12: sabbatamaṃ vigacchi, dīpasahassujjalanaṃ viya canduṭṭhānasūriyuṭṭhānaṃ viya ca jātaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1905_13: So “pamādaṃ āpannomhi, vañcitomhi, sūriyo uggato”ti uṭṭhāya ākāsatale ṭhatvā candaṃ
tika-vin02t:1905_14: oloketvā “ekova yāmo gato, aññe dve atthī”ti puna pavisitvā nipajji, etenupāyena
tika-vin02t:1905_16: pana balavapaccūseyeva uṭṭhāya ākāsatalaṃ āgantvā mahādvārābhimukho ahosi, sattabhūmikadvāraṃ
tika-vin02t:1905_17: sayameva vivaṭaṃ ahosi, pāsādā oruyha antaravīthiṃ paṭipajji.
tika-vin02t:1906_0: 305. Amanussāti adhigatavisesā devatā. Tathā hi tā seṭṭhissa bhāvinisampattiṃ paccakkhato
tika-vin02t:1906_2: sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ aggupaṭṭhāko hutvā asadisaṃ saṅghārāmaṃ
tika-vin02t:1906_3: katvā cātuddisassa ariyasaṅghassa anāvaṭadvāro bhavissati, na yuttamassa dvāraṃ pidahitu”nti
tika-vin02t:1906_4: cintetvā dvāraṃ vivariṃsu. Antaradhāyīti rājagahaṃ kira ākiṇṇamanussaṃ, antonagare
tika-vin02t:1906_5: nava koṭiyo bahinagare navāti taṃ upanissāya aṭṭhārasa manussakoṭiyo vasanti. Avelāya
tika-vin02t:1906_6: matamanusse bahi nīharituṃ asakkontā aṭṭālake ṭhatvā bahidvāre khipanti. Mahāseṭṭhi
tika-vin02t:1906_7: nagarato bahi nikkhantamattova allasarīraṃ pādena akkami, aparampi piṭṭhipādena pahari,
tika-vin02t:1906_8: makkhikā uppatitvā pakiriṃsu, duggandho nāsāpuṭaṃ abhihani, buddhappasādo tanuttaṃ
tika-vin02t:1906_9: gato. Tenassa āloko antaradhāyi andhakāro pāturahosi pītivegassa tanubhāve taṃsamuṭṭhitarūpānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1907_0: Sataṃ kaññāsahassānīti purimapadānipi imināva sahassa-padena saddhiṃ sambandhitabbāni.
tika-vin02t:1907_1: Yatheva hi sataṃ kaññāsahassāni, evaṃ sataṃ sahassāni hatthī, sataṃ sahassāni assā,
tika-vin02t:1907_2: sataṃ sahassāni rathāti ayamettha attho, iti ekekaṃ satasahassaṃ dīpitaṃ hoti. Padavītihārassāti
tika-vin02t:1907_3: padaṃ vītiharati etthāti padavītihāro. So dutavilambitaṃ akatvā samagamane dvinnaṃ
tika-vin02t:1907_4: padānaṃ antare muṭṭhiratanamattaṃ. Kalaṃ nāgghanti soḷasinti taṃ ekaṃ padavītihāraṃ
tika-vin02t:1907_5: soḷasa bhāge katvā tato eko koṭṭhāso puna soḷasadhā, tato eko soḷasadhāti evaṃ soḷasa
tika-vin02t:1907_6: vāre soḷasadhā bhinnassa eko koṭṭhāso soḷasī kalā nāma, taṃ soḷasiṃ kalaṃ etāni cattāri
tika-vin02t:1907_7: satasahassāni na agghanti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – sataṃ hatthisahassāni sataṃ assasahassāni
tika-vin02t:1907_8: sataṃ rathasahassāni sataṃ kaññāsahassāni, tā ca kho āmukkamaṇikuṇḍalā sakalajambudīparājadhītarovāti
tika-vin02t:1907_9: imasmā ettakā lābhā vihāraṃ gacchantassa tasmiṃ soḷasikalāsaṅkhāte padese laṅghanasādhanavasena
tika-vin02t:1907_10: pavattacetanāva uttaritarāti. Padaṃ vā vītiharati etenāti padavītihāro, tathāpavattā
tika-vin02t:1907_11: kusalacetanā, tassā phalaṃ soḷasadhā katvāti ca vadanti. Idaṃ pana vihāragamanaṃ
tika-vin02t:1907_12: kassa vasena gahitanti? Vihāraṃ gantvā anantarāyena sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahantassa
tika-vin02t:1907_13: vasena gahitaṃ. “Gandhamālādīhi pūjaṃ karissāmi, cetiyaṃ vandissāmi, dhammaṃ sossāmi,
tika-vin02t:1907_14: dīpapūjaṃ karissāmi, saṅghaṃ nimantetvā dānaṃ dassāmi, sikkhāpadesu vā saraṇesu vā
tika-vin02t:1908_0: Andhakāro antaradhāyīti so kira cintesi “ahaṃ ekakoti saññaṃ karomi, amanussā ca
tika-vin02t:1908_1: me anugāmino sahāyā atthi, kasmā bhāyāmī”ti sūro ahosi. Athassa balavā buddhappasādo
tika-vin02t:1908_2: udapādi, tasmā andhakāro antaradhāyi. Sesavāresupi eseva nayo. Āloko pāturahosīti
tika-vin02t:1908_3: purimabuddhesu cirakālaparicayasambhūtassa balavato pasādassa vasena uppannāya uḷārāya
tika-vin02t:1908_4: buddhārammaṇāya pītiyā samuṭṭhāpito vipassanobhāsasadiso sātisayo cittapaccayautusamuṭṭhāno
tika-vin02t:1908_5: āloko pāturahosi. Devatāhi katotipi vadanti, purimoyevettha yuttataro. Ehi sudattāti
tika-vin02t:1908_6: so kira seṭṭhi gacchamānova cintesi “imasmiṃ loke bahū pūraṇakassapādayo titthiyā
tika-vin02t:1908_7: ‘mayaṃ buddhā, mayaṃ buddhā’ti vadanti, kathaṃ nu kho ahaṃ satthu buddhabhāvaṃ jāneyya”nti.
tika-vin02t:1908_8: Athassa etadahosi “mayhaṃ guṇavasena uppannaṃ nāmaṃ mahājano jānāti, kuladattiyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1908_9: pana me nāmaṃ aññatra mayā na koci jānāti, sace buddho bhavissati, kuladattikanāmena
tika-vin02t:1908_10: maṃ ālapissatī”ti. Satthā tassa cittaṃ ñatvā evamāha.
tika-vin02t:1909_0: Parinibbutoti kilesaparinibbānena parinibbuto. Āsattiyoti rūpādīsu āsañjanaṭṭhena
tika-vin02t:1909_1: āsattiyo, taṇhāyo. Santinti kilesavūpasamaṃ. Pappuyyāti aggamaggena patvā. Sesamettha
tika-vin02t:1909_2: pāḷianusāreneva veditabbaṃ. Yañcettha anuttānamatthaṃ, taṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttameva.
tika-vin02t:1913_0: 310-311. Dakkhiṇodakanti aggato upanīyamānaṃ dakkhiṇodakaṃ. Atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū
tika-vin02t:1913_1: āmantesīti tehi bhikkhūhi attano attano rucivasena aggāsanādirahānaṃ kathitakāle
tika-vin02t:1913_2: “na, bhikkhave, mayhaṃ sāsane aggāsanādīni patvā khattiyakulā pabbajito pamāṇaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1913_3: na brāhmaṇakulā, na gahapatikulā pabbajito, na vinayadharo, na suttantiko, na ābhidhammiko,
tika-vin02t:1913_4: na paṭhamajjhānādilābhino, na sotāpannādayo pamāṇaṃ, atha kho, bhikkhave, imasmiṃ
tika-vin02t:1913_5: sāsane yathāvuḍḍhaṃ abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ kattabbaṃ,
tika-vin02t:1913_6: aggāsanaṃ aggodakaṃ aggapiṇḍo laddhabbo, idamettha pamāṇaṃ, tasmā vuḍḍhataro bhikkhu
