tika-vin02t:1913_7: etesaṃ anucchaviko. Idāni kho pana, bhikkhave, sāriputto mayhaṃ aggasāvako anudhammacakkappavattako
tika-vin02t:1913_8: mamānantarasenāsanaṃ laddhuṃ arahati. So imaṃ rattiṃ senāsanaṃ alabhanto rukkhamūle
tika-vin02t:1913_9: vītināmesi. Tumhe idāneva evaṃ agāravā appatissā, gacchante gacchante kāle kinti
tika-vin02t:1913_10: katvā viharissathā”ti vatvā atha nesaṃ ovādadānatthāya “pubbe, bhikkhave, tiracchānagatāpi
tika-vin02t:1913_11: ‘na kho panetaṃ amhākaṃ patirūpaṃ, yaṃ mayaṃ aññamaññaṃ agāravā appatissā asabhāgavuttino
tika-vin02t:1913_12: vihareyyāma, amhesu mahallakataraṃ jānitvā tassa abhivādanādīni karissāmā’ti sādhukaṃ
tika-vin02t:1913_13: vīmaṃsitvā ‘ayaṃ mahallako’ti ñatvā tassa abhivādanādīni katvā devapathaṃ pūrayamānā
tika-vin02t:1913_14: gatā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āharitvā dassetuṃ bhikkhū āmantesi.
tika-vin02t:1914_0: Ye vuḍḍhamapacāyantīti jātivuḍḍho vayovuḍḍho guṇavuḍḍhoti tayo vuḍḍhā. Tesu jātisampanno
tika-vin02t:1914_1: jātivuḍḍho nāma, vaye ṭhito vayovuḍḍho nāma, guṇasampanno guṇavuḍḍho nāma. Tesu guṇasampanno
tika-vin02t:1914_2: vayovuḍḍho imasmiṃ ṭhāne vuḍḍhoti adhippeto. Apacāyantīti jeṭṭhāpacāyikakammena pūjenti.
tika-vin02t:1914_3: Dhammassa kovidāti jeṭṭhāpacāyanadhammassa kovidā kusalā. Diṭṭheva dhammeti imasmiṃyeva
tika-vin02t:1914_4: attabhāve. Pāsaṃsāti pasaṃsārahā. Samparāye ca suggatīti samparetabbe imaṃ lokaṃ
tika-vin02t:1914_5: hitvā gantabbe paralokepi tesaṃ sugatiyeva hotīti attho. Ayaṃ panettha piṇḍattho
tika-vin02t:1914_6: – bhikkhave, khattiyā vā hontu brāhmaṇā vā vessā vā suddā vā gahaṭṭhā vā pabbajitā
tika-vin02t:1914_7: vā tiracchānagatā vā, ye keci sattā jeṭṭhāpacitikamme chekā kusalā guṇasampannānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1914_8: vayovuḍḍhānaṃ apacitiṃ karonti, te imasmiñca attabhāve jeṭṭhāpacitikārakāti pasaṃsaṃ
tika-vin02t:1914_9: vaṇṇanaṃ thomanaṃ labhanti, kāyassa ca bhedā sagge nibbattantīti.
tika-vin02t:1917: 313-4. Uddissakatanti gihīhi saṅghaṃ uddissa kataṃ. Gihivikatanti gihīhi kataṃ paññattaṃ, gihisantakanti vuttaṃ hoti. Atisamīpaṃ agantvāti bhikkhūnaṃ āsannataraṃ ṭhānaṃ agantvā.
tika-vin02t:1919_0: 318. Paccayeneva hi taṃ paṭijagganaṃ labhissatīti tasmiṃ senāsane mahātherā tassa
tika-vin02t:1919_1: paccayassa kāraṇā aññattha agantvā vasantāyeva naṃ paṭijaggissantīti attho. Ubbhaṇḍikā
tika-vin02t:1919_2: bhavissantīti ukkhittabhaṇḍā bhavissanti, attano attano parikkhāre gahetvā tattha
tika-vin02t:1919_3: tattha vicarissantīti attho. Dīghasālāti caṅkamanasālā. Maṇḍalamāḷo upaṭṭhānasālā.
tika-vin02t:1919_4: Anudahatīti pīḷeti. Jambudīpe panāti ariyadese bhikkhū sandhāya vuttaṃ. Te kira tathā
tika-vin02t:1919_5: paññāpenti. Na gocaragāmo ghaṭṭetabboti vuttamevatthaṃ vibhāveti “na tattha manussā
tika-vin02t:1919_6: vattabbā”tiādinā. Vitakkaṃ chinditvāti “iminā nīhārena gacchantaṃ disvā nivāretvā
tika-vin02t:1919_7: paccaye dassantī”ti evarūpaṃ vitakkaṃ anuppādetvā. Tesu ce ekoti tesu manussesu eko
tika-vin02t:1919_8: paṇḍitapuriso. Bhaṇḍapaṭicchādananti paṭicchādanakabhaṇḍaṃ, sarīrapaṭicchādanaṃ cīvaranti attho.
tika-vin02t:1920_0: Paṭijaggitabbānīti sammajjanādīhi paṭijaggitabbāni. Muṇḍavedikāyāti cetiyassa hammiyavedikāya.
tika-vin02t:1920_1: Hammiyavedikāti ca cetiyassa upari caturassavediyo vuccati. Paṭikkammāti vihārato
tika-vin02t:1920_2: apasakkitvā. Upanikkhepanti khettaṃ vā nāḷikerādiārāmaṃ vā kahāpaṇādīni vā ārāmikādīnaṃ
tika-vin02t:1920_3: niyyātetvā “ito uppannā vaḍḍhi vassāvāsikatthāya hotū”ti dinnaṃ. Vattaṃ katvāti tasmiṃ
tika-vin02t:1921_0: Puggalavaseneva kātabbanti parato vakkhamānanayena “bhikkhū cīvarena kilamanti, ettakaṃ
tika-vin02t:1921_1: nāma taṇḍulabhāgaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cīvaraṃ kātuṃ ruccatī”tiādinā puggalaparāmāsavaseneva
tika-vin02t:1921_2: kātabbaṃ, “saṅgho cīvarena kilamatī”tiādinā pana saṅghaparāmāsavasena na kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1921_3: Cīvarapaccayanti cīvarasaṅkhātaṃ paccayaṃ. Vuttanti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃvuttaṃ. Kasmā
tika-vin02t:1921_4: evaṃ vuttanti āha “evañhi navako vuḍḍhatarassa, vuḍḍho ca navakassa gāhessatī”ti,
tika-vin02t:1921_5: yasmā attanāva attano pāpetuṃ na sakkā, tasmā dvīsu sammatesu navako vuḍḍhatarassa,
tika-vin02t:1921_6: vuḍḍho ca navakassāti ubho aññamaññaṃ gāhessantīti adhippāyo. Sammatasenāsanaggāhāpakassa
tika-vin02t:1921_7: āṇattiyā aññena gāhitepi gāho ruhatiyevāti veditabbaṃ. Aṭṭhapi soḷasapi jane sammannituṃ
tika-vin02t:1921_8: vaṭṭatīti kiṃ visuṃ visuṃ sammannituṃ vaṭṭati, udāhu ekatoti? Ekatopi vaṭṭati. Niggahakammameva
tika-vin02t:1921_9: hi saṅgho saṅghassa na karoti, sammutidānaṃ pana bahūnampi ekato kātuṃ vaṭṭati, teneva
tika-vin02t:1921_10: sattasatikakkhandhake ubbāhikasammutiyaṃ aṭṭhapi janā ekato sammatāti.
tika-vin02t:1922_0: Maggoti magge katadīghasālā. Pokkharaṇīti nahāyantānaṃ pokkharaṇiyaṃ katasālā. Rukkhamūlādayo
tika-vin02t:1922_1: channā kavāṭabaddhāva senāsanaṃ. Vijaṭetvāti viyojetvā, visuṃ visuṃ katvāti attho.
tika-vin02t:1922_2: Āvāsesūti senāsanesu. Pakkhipitvāti ettha pakkhipanaṃ nāma tesu vasantānaṃ ito uppannavassāvāsikadānaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1922_3: Pavisitabbanti aññehi bhikkhūhi tasmiṃ mahālābhe pariveṇe vasitvā cetiye vattaṃ katvāva
tika-vin02t:1923_0: Paccayaṃ vissajjetīti cīvarapaccayaṃ nādhivāseti. Ayampīti tena vissaṭṭhapaccayopi.
tika-vin02t:1923_1: Upanibandhitvā gāhetabbanti “imasmiṃ rukkhe vā maṇḍape vā vasitvā cetiye vattaṃ katvā
tika-vin02t:1923_2: gaṇhathā”ti evaṃ upanibandhitvā gāhetabbaṃ. “Kattha nu kho vasissāmi, kattha vasantassa
tika-vin02t:1923_3: phāsu bhavissati, kattha vā paccayo bhavissatī”ti evaṃ uppannena vitakkena caratīti
tika-vin02t:1923_4: vitakkacāriko. Araññavihāresu parissayavijānanatthaṃ icchitabbattā “pañca pañca ukkā
tika-vin02t:1924_1: Sodhetvā pabbājethāti bhabbe ācārakulaputte upaparikkhitvā pabbājetha. Dasavatthukakathā
tika-vin02t:1924_2: nāma appicchakathā santuṭṭhikathā pavivekakathā asaṃsaggakathā vīriyārambhakathā
tika-vin02t:1925_0: Viggahasaṃvattanikavacanaṃ viggāhikaṃ. Caturārakkhaṃ ahāpentāti buddhānussati mettā
tika-vin02t:1925_1: asubhaṃ maraṇassatīti imaṃ caturārakkhaṃ aparihāpentā. Dantakaṭṭhakhādanavattaṃ ācikkhitabbanti
tika-vin02t:1925_2: ettha dantakaṭṭhakhādanavattaṃ yo devasikaṃ saṅghamajjhe osarati, tena sāmaṇerādīhi
tika-vin02t:1925_3: āharitvā bhikkhūnaṃ yathāsukhaṃ paribhuñjanatthāya dantakaṭṭhamāḷake nikkhittesu
tika-vin02t:1925_4: dantakaṭṭhesu divase divase ekameva dantakaṭṭhaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Yo pana devasikaṃ na
tika-vin02t:1925_5: osarati, padhānaghare vasitvā dhammassavane vā uposathagge vā dissati, tena pamāṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:1925_6: sallakkhetvā cattāri pañca dantakaṭṭhāni attano vasanaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā khāditabbāni.
tika-vin02t:1925_7: Tesu khīṇesu sace punapi dantakaṭṭhamāḷake bahūni hontiyeva, punapi āharitvā khāditabbāni.
tika-vin02t:1925_8: Yadi pana pamāṇaṃ asallakkhetvā āharati, tesu akhīṇesuyeva māḷake khīyati, tato keci
tika-vin02t:1925_9: therā “yehi gahitāni, te paṭiharantū”ti vadeyyuṃ, keci “khādantu, puna sāmaṇerā āharissantī”ti.
tika-vin02t:1925_10: Tasmā vivādaparihāratthaṃ pamāṇaṃ sallakkhetabbaṃ. Gahaṇe pana doso natthi, maggaṃ
tika-vin02t:1925_11: gacchantenapi ekaṃ vā dve vā thavikāya pakkhipitvā gantabbanti. Bhikkhācāravattaṃ
tika-vin02t:1926_0: Pattaṭṭhāneti vassaggena āgantukabhikkhuno pattaṭṭhāne. Tesaṃ chinnavassattā “sādiyantāpi
tika-vin02t:1926_1: hi te neva vassāvāsikassa sāmino”ti vuttaṃ, paṭhamaṃyeva katikāya katattā khīyantāpi
tika-vin02t:1926_2: ca āvāsikā neva adātuṃ labhantīti vuttaṃ. Bhatiniviṭṭhanti bhatiṃ katvā viya niviṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin02t:1926_3: pariyiṭṭhaṃ. Saṅghikaṃ pana apalokanakammaṃ katvā gāhitanti tatruppādaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin02t:1926_4: vuttaṃ. Paccayavasena gāhitanti dāyakānaṃ vassāvāsikapaccayavasena gāhitaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin02t:1926_5: vuttaṃ. “Idha, bhikkhave, vassaṃvuttho bhikkhu vibbhamati, saṅghasseveta”nti vacanato
tika-vin02t:1926_6: “gataṭṭhāne…pe… saṅghikaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Manusseti dāyakamanusse. Varabhāgaṃ sāmaṇerassāti
tika-vin02t:1929_0: 319. Yaṃ tayā tattha senāsanaṃ gahitaṃ…pe… idha muttaṃ hotīti yaṃ tayā tattha gāmakāvāse
tika-vin02t:1929_1: pacchā senāsanaṃ gahitaṃ, taṃ te gaṇhanteneva idha sāvatthiyaṃ paṭhamagahitasenāsanaṃ
tika-vin02t:1929_2: muttaṃ hoti. Idha dānāhaṃ …pe… tatrāpi muttanti “idānāhaṃ, āvuso, imasmiṃ gāmakāvāse
tika-vin02t:1929_3: gahitasenāsanaṃ muñcāmī”ti vadantena tatrāpi gāmakāvāse gahitasenāsanaṃ muttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1930_0: 320. Dīghāsanaṃ nāma mañcapīṭhavinimuttaṃ yaṃ kiñci ekato sukhaṃ nisīdituṃ pahoti.
tika-vin02t:1930_1: Hatthimhi nakho assāti hatthinakho. “Pāsādassa nakho nāma heṭṭhimaparicchedo, so
tika-vin02t:1930_2: ca hatthikumbhe patiṭṭhito”ti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Gihivikatanīhārena labbhantīti
tika-vin02t:1930_3: gihivikatanīhārena paribhuñjituṃ labbhanti, tehi attharitvā dinnāneva nisīdituṃ labbhanti,
tika-vin02t:1932_0: 321. Arañjaroti bahuudakagaṇhanakā mahācāṭi. Jalaṃ gaṇhituṃ alanti arañjaro. “Vaṭṭacāṭi
tika-vin02t:1932_1: viya hutvā thokaṃ dīghamukho majjhe paricchedaṃ dassetvā kato”ti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1933_0: Thāvarena ca thāvaraṃ garubhaṇḍena ca garubhaṇḍanti ettha pañcasu koṭṭhāsesu purimadvayaṃ
tika-vin02t:1933_1: thāvaraṃ, pacchimattayaṃ garubhaṇḍanti veditabbaṃ. Jānāpetvāti bhikkhusaṅghaṃ jānāpetvā.
tika-vin02t:1933_2: Kappiyamañcā sampaṭicchitabbāti “saṅghassa demā”ti dinnaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sace pana
tika-vin02t:1933_4: Na kevalaṃ…pe… parivattetuṃ vaṭṭantīti iminā athāvarena thāvarampi athāvarampi parivattetuṃ
tika-vin02t:1933_5: vaṭṭatīti dasseti. Thāvarena athāvarameva hi parivattetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Akappiyaṃ vā
tika-vin02t:1933_6: mahagghaṃ kappiyaṃ vāti ettha akappiyaṃ nāma suvaṇṇamayamañcādi akappiyabhisibimbohanāni
tika-vin02t:1933_7: ca. Mahagghaṃ kappiyaṃ nāma dantamayamañcādi pāvārādikappiyaattharaṇādīni ca.
tika-vin02t:1934_0: Pārihāriyaṃ na vaṭṭatīti attano santakaṃ viya gahetvā pariharituṃ na vaṭṭati. “Gihivikatanīhāreneva
tika-vin02t:1934_1: paribhuñjitabba”nti iminā sace ārāmikādayo paṭisāmetvā paṭidenti, paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin02t:1935_0: “Aḍḍhabāhūti kapparato paṭṭhāya yāva aṃsakūṭa”nti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Aḍḍhabāhu
tika-vin02t:1935_1: nāma vidatthicaturaṅgulantipi vadanti. Tatthajātakāti saṅghikabhūmiyaṃ jātā. Aṭṭhaṅgulasūcidaṇḍamattoti
tika-vin02t:1935_2: dīghato aṭṭhaṅgulamatto pariṇāhato paṇṇasūcidaṇḍamatto. Muñjapabbajānaṃyeva pāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin02t:1935_3: visuṃ āgatattā “muñjaṃ pabbajañca ṭhapetvā”ti vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhaṅgulappamāṇoti dīghato
tika-vin02t:1935_4: aṭṭhaṅgulappamāṇo. Ghaṭṭanaphalakaṃ nāma yattha ṭhapetvā rajitacīvaraṃ hatthena ghaṭṭenti.
tika-vin02t:1935_5: Ghaṭṭanamuggaro nāma anuvātādighaṭṭanatthaṃ katoti vadanti. Ambaṇanti phalakehi pokkharaṇīsadisaṃ
tika-vin02t:1935_6: katapānīyabhājanaṃ. Rajanadoṇīti yattha pakkarajanaṃ ākiritvā ṭhapenti. Bhūmattharaṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:1935_7: kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti akappiyacammaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Paccattharaṇagatikanti iminā mañcapīṭhepi
tika-vin02t:1935_8: attharituṃ vaṭṭatīti dīpeti. Pāvārādipaccattharaṇampi garubhaṇḍanti eke, noti apare,
tika-vin02t:1935_9: vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ. Muṭṭhipaṇṇanti tālapaṇṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1937_0: 323. Kiñcideva samādapetvā kāressatīti sāmikoyeva kañci bhikkhuṃ samādapetvā kāressati.
tika-vin02t:1937_1: Utukāle paṭibāhituṃ na labhatīti hemantagimhesu aññe sampattabhikkhū paṭibāhituṃ
tika-vin02t:1937_2: na labhati. Tibhāganti tatiyabhāgaṃ. Sace saddhivihārikānaṃ dātukāmo hotīti sace
tika-vin02t:1937_3: so saṅghassa bhaṇḍakaṭhapanaṭṭhānaṃ vā navakānaṃ vā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ dātuṃ na icchati,
tika-vin02t:1937_4: attano saddhivihārikānaññeva dātukāmo hotīti attho. Etañhi saddhivihārikānaṃ dātuṃ
tika-vin02t:1937_5: labhatīti etaṃ tatiyabhāgaṃ upaḍḍhabhāgaṃ vā dātuṃ labhati. Akataṭṭhāneti senāsanato
tika-vin02t:1937_6: bahi cayādīnaṃ akataṭṭhāne. Bahikuṭṭeti kuṭṭato bahi.
tika-vin02t:1939_0: 324. Cakkalikanti kambalādīhi veṭhetvā cakkasaṇṭhānena pādapuñchanayoggaṃ kataṃ.
tika-vin02t:1939_1: Paribhaṇḍakatā bhūmi nāma saṇhamattikāhi katā kāḷavaṇṇādibhūmi. Senāsanaṃ mañcapīṭhādi.
tika-vin02t:1939_2: Tatheva vaḷañjetuṃ vaṭṭatīti aññehi āvāsikabhikkhūhi paribhuttanīhārena paribhuñjituṃ
tika-vin02t:1939_3: vaṭṭati. “Nevāsikā pakatiyā anatthatāya bhūmiyā ṭhapenti ce, tesampi anāpattiyevā”ti
tika-vin02t:1939_4: gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Dvārampītiādinā vuttadvāravātapānādayo aparikammakatāpi na apassayitabbā.
tika-vin02t:1941_0: 325. Uddesabhattaṃ nimantananti imaṃ vohāraṃ pattānīti ettha iti-saddo ādiattho,
tika-vin02t:1941_1: “uddesabhattaṃ nimantana”ntiādivohāraṃ pattānīti ayamettha attho. Tampi anto katvāti
tika-vin02t:1941_2: āyatiṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kukkuccavinodanatthāya tampi saṅghabhattaṃ anto katvā.
tika-vin02t:1943_0: Attano vihāradvāreti vihārassa dvārakoṭṭhakasamīpaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Bhojanasālāyāti
tika-vin02t:1943_1: bhattuddesaṭṭhānabhūtāya bhojanasālāya. “Dinnaṃ panā”ti vatvā yathā so dāyako deti,
tika-vin02t:1943_2: taṃ vidhiṃ dassetuṃ “saṅghato bhante”tiādimāha. Antaraghareti antogehe. Antoupacāragatānanti
tika-vin02t:1943_3: ettha gāmadvāravīthicatukkesu dvādasahatthabbhantaraṃ antoupacāro nāma. Antaragharassa
tika-vin02t:1943_4: upacāre pana labbhamānavisesaṃ dassetuṃ “gharūpacāro cetthā”tiādimāha. Ekavaḷañjanti
tika-vin02t:1943_5: ekena dvārena vaḷañjitabbaṃ. Nānānivesanesūti nānākulassa nivesanesu. Lajjī pesalo
tika-vin02t:1943_6: agatigamanaṃ vajjetvā medhāvī ca upaparikkhitvā uddisissatīti āha “pesalo lajjī medhāvī
tika-vin02t:1943_7: icchitabbo”ti. Nisinnassapi niddāyantassapīti anādare sāmivacanaṃ. Ticīvaraparivāranti
tika-vin02t:1943_8: ettha “udakapattalābhī viya aññopi uddesabhattaṃ alabhitvā vatthādimanekappakārakaṃ
tika-vin02t:1943_9: labhati ce, tasseva ta”nti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Attano rucivasena yaṃ kiñci vatvā
tika-vin02t:1943_10: āharituṃ vissajjitattā vissaṭṭhadūto nāma. Yaṃ icchatīti “uddesapattaṃ dethā”tiādīni
tika-vin02t:1944_0: “Ekā kūṭaṭṭhitikā nāma hotī”ti vatvā tameva ṭhitikaṃ vibhāvento “rañño vā hī”tiādimāha.
tika-vin02t:1944_1: Aññehi uddesabhattehi amissetvā visuṃyeva ṭhitikāya gahetabbattā “ekacārikabhattānī”ti
tika-vin02t:1944_2: vuttaṃ. Theyyāya harantīti pattahārakā haranti. Gīvā hotīti āṇāpakassa gīvā hoti.
tika-vin02t:1944_3: “Manussānaṃ vacanaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti gacchantīti “manussānaṃ vacanaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin02t:1944_4: tena bhikkhunā vuttā gacchanti. Akatabhāgo nāmāti āgantukabhāgo nāma. “Sabbo saṅgho
tika-vin02t:1944_5: paribhuñjatū”ti vutteti ettha “paṭhamameva ‘sabbaṃ saṅghikaṃ pattaṃ dethā’ti vatvā
tika-vin02t:1944_6: pacchā ‘sabbo saṅgho paribhuñjatū’ti avuttepi bhājetvāva paribhuñjitabba”nti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1946_0: “Ettake bhikkhū saṅghato uddisitvā dethā”tiādīni avatvā “ettakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bhattaṃ
tika-vin02t:1946_1: gaṇhathā”ti vatvā dinnaṃ saṅghikaṃ nimantanaṃ nāma. Piṇḍapātikānampi vaṭṭatīti bhikkhāpariyāyena
tika-vin02t:1946_2: vuttattā vaṭṭati. Paṭipāṭiyāti laddhapaṭipāṭiyā. Vicchinditvāti “bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti
tika-vin02t:1946_3: padaṃ avatvā. Tenevāha “bhattanti avadantenā”ti. Ālopasaṅkhepenāti ekekapiṇḍavasena.
tika-vin02t:1946_4: Ayañca nayo nimantaneyeva, na uddesabhatte. Tattha hi ekassa pahonakappamāṇaṃyeva
tika-vin02t:1946_5: bhājetabbaṃ, tasmā uddesabhatte ālopaṭṭhitikā nāma natthi. Acchatīti tiṭṭhati. “Ekavāranti
tika-vin02t:1946_6: yāva tasmiṃ āvāse vasanti bhikkhū, sabbe labhantī”ti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ panettha
tika-vin02t:1946_7: adhippāyo – ekavāranti na ekadivasaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, yattakā pana bhikkhū tasmiṃ
tika-vin02t:1946_8: āvāse vasanti, te sabbe. Ekasmiṃ divase gahitabhikkhū aññadā aggahetvā yāva ekavāraṃ
tika-vin02t:1946_9: sabbe bhikkhū bhojitā honti, tāva ye jānanti, te gahetvā gantabbanti.
tika-vin02t:1948_0: Upanibandhitvāti likhitvā. Niggahena datvāti anicchantampi niggahena sampaṭicchāpetvā.
tika-vin02t:1948_1: Ekagehavasenāti ekāya gharapāḷiyā vasena. Uddisitvāti “tuyhañca tuyhañca pāpuṇātī”ti
tika-vin02t:1948_2: vatvā. Dūrattā niggahetvāpi vārena gāhetabbagāmo vāragāmo. Vihāravāre niyuttā vihāravārikā,
tika-vin02t:1948_3: vārena vihārarakkhaṇakā. Aññathattanti pasādaññathattaṃ. Phātikammameva bhavantīti
tika-vin02t:1948_4: vihārarakkhaṇatthāya saṅghena dātabbaatirekalābhā honti. Saṅghanavakena laddhakāleti
tika-vin02t:1948_5: divase divase ekekassa pāpitāni dve tīṇi ekacārikabhattāni teneva niyāmena attano
tika-vin02t:1948_6: pāpuṇanaṭṭhāne saṅghanavakena laddhakāle. Yassa kassaci sammukhībhūtassa pāpetvāti
tika-vin02t:1948_7: ettha “yebhuyyena ce bhikkhū bahisīmagatā honti, sammukhībhūtassa yassa kassaci pāpetabbaṃ
tika-vin02t:1948_8: sabhāgattā ekena laddhaṃ sabbesaṃ hoti, tasmimpi asati attano pāpetvā dātabba”nti
tika-vin02t:1949_0: “Saṅghato nirāmisasalākāpi vihāre pakkabhattampi vaṭṭatiyevā”ti sādhāraṇaṃ katvā
tika-vin02t:1949_1: visuddhimagge vuttattā “evaṃ gāhite sāditabbaṃ, evaṃ na sāditabba”nti visesetvā avuttattā
tika-vin02t:1949_2: ca bhesajjādisalākāyo cettha kiñcāpi piṇḍapātikānampi vaṭṭanti, salākavasena gāhitattā
tika-vin02t:1949_3: pana na sāditabbāti ettha adhippāyo vīmaṃsitabbo. Yadi hi bhesajjādisalākā salākavasena
tika-vin02t:1949_4: gāhitā na sāditabbā siyā, saṅghato nirāmisasalākā vaṭṭatiyevāti na vadeyya, “atirekalābho
tika-vin02t:1949_6: gāhetabbaṃ bhattameva paṭikkhittaṃ, na bhesajjaṃ. Saṅghabhattādīni hi cuddasa bhattāniyeva
tika-vin02t:1949_7: tena na sāditabbānīti vuttāni, khandhakabhāṇakānaṃ vā matena idha evaṃ vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1949_8: Aggato dātabbabhikkhā aggabhikkhā. Laddhā vā aladdhā vāti labhitvā vā alabhitvā vā.
tika-vin02t:1949_9: Nibaddhāya aggabhikkhāya appamattikāya eva sambhavato labhitvāpi punadivase gaṇhituṃ
tika-vin02t:1949_10: vuttaṃ. Aggabhikkhāmattanti hi ettha matta-saddo bahubhāvaṃ nivatteti.
tika-vin02t:1950_0: Salākabhattaṃ nāma vihāreyeva uddisīyati vihārameva sandhāya diyyamānattāti āha “vihāre
tika-vin02t:1950_1: apāpitaṃ panā”tiādi. Tatra āsanasālāyāti tasmiṃ gāme āsanasālāya. Vihāraṃ ānetvā
tika-vin02t:1950_2: gāhetabbanti tathā vatvā tasmiṃ divase dinnabhattaṃ vihārameva ānetvā ṭhitikāya gāhetabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1950_3: Tatthāti tasmiṃ disābhāge. Taṃ gahetvāti taṃ vāragāmasalākaṃ attanā gahetvā. Tenāti
tika-vin02t:1950_4: yo attano pattaṃ vāragāmasalākaṃ disaṃgamikassa adāsi, tena. Anatikkanteyeva tasmiṃ
tika-vin02t:1950_5: tassa salākā gāhetabbāti yasmā upacārasīmaṭṭhasseva salākā pāpuṇāti, tasmā tasmiṃ
tika-vin02t:1950_6: disaṃgamike upacārasīmaṃ anatikkanteyeva tassa disaṃgamikassa pattasalākā attano pāpetvā gahetabbā.
tika-vin02t:1951_0: Anāgatadivaseti ettha kathaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āgatānāgatabhāvo viññāyatīti ce? Yasmā
tika-vin02t:1951_1: tato tato āgatā bhikkhū tasmiṃ gāme āsanasālāya sannipatanti, tasmā tesaṃ āgatānāgatabhāvo
tika-vin02t:1951_2: sakkā viññātuṃ. Amhākaṃ gocaragāmeti salākabhattadāyakānaṃ gāme. Bhuñjituṃ āgacchantīti
tika-vin02t:1951_3: “mahāthero ekakova vihāre ohīno avassaṃ sabbasalākā attano pāpetvā ṭhito”ti maññamānā āgacchanti.
tika-vin02t:1953_0: Abhilakkhitesu catūsu pakkhadivasesu dātabbabhattaṃ pakkhikaṃ. Abhilakkhitesūti ettha
tika-vin02t:1953_2: lakkhitabbesu sallakkhetabbesu upalakkhetabbesūti vuttaṃ hoti. Sve pakkhoti “ajja
tika-vin02t:1953_3: pakkhikaṃ na gāhetabba”nti pakkhikassa aniyamattā vuttaṃ. “Sve amhākaṃ ghare lūkhabhattaṃ
tika-vin02t:1953_4: bhavissatī”ti potthakesu likhanti, “pakkhabhattaṃ bhavissatī”ti pāṭhena bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1953_5: Uposathe dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ uposathikaṃ. Nibandhāpitanti “asukavihārassā”ti niyamitaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1953_6: Gāhetvā bhuñjitabbanti tasmiṃ senāsane vasantehi ṭhitikāya gāhetvā bhuñjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1953_7: Taṇḍulādīnipesenti…pe… vaṭṭatīti abhihaṭabhikkhattā vaṭṭati. Tathā paṭiggahitattāti
tika-vin02t:1953_8: bhikkhānāmena paṭiggahitattā. Pattaṃ pūretvā thaketvā dinnanti “guḷakabhattaṃ demā”ti
tika-vin02t:1953_9: dinnaṃ. Guḷapiṇḍepi…pe… dātabboti ettha guḷapiṇḍaṃ tālapakkappamāṇanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1957_1: rassattaṃ anunāsikassa ca āgamaṃ katvā “anupiyaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ. Mallānanti mallarājūnaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1957_2: Na heṭṭhā pāsādā orohatīti uparipāsādato heṭṭhimatalaṃ na orohati, “heṭṭhāpāsāda”ntipi
tika-vin02t:1957_3: paṭhanti. Anuruddho vā pabbājeyyāti yojetabbaṃ. Gharāvāsatthanti gharāvāsassa anucchavikaṃ
tika-vin02t:1957_4: kammaṃ. Udakaṃ abhinetabbanti udakaṃ āharitabbaṃ. Ninnetabbanti ābhatamudakaṃ puna
tika-vin02t:1957_5: nīharitabbaṃ. Niddhāpetabbanti antarantarā uṭṭhitatiṇāni uddharitvā apanetabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1957_6: Lavāpetabbanti paripakkakāle lavāpetabbaṃ. Ubbāhāpetabbanti khalamaṇḍalaṃ harāpetabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1957_7: Ujuṃ kārāpetabbanti puñjaṃ kārāpetabbaṃ. Palālāni uddharāpetabbānīti palālāni apanetabbāni.
tika-vin02t:1957_8: Bhusikā uddharāpetabbāti gunnaṃ khuraggehi sañchinnā bhusasaṅkhātā nāḷadaṇḍā apanetabbā.
tika-vin02t:1957_9: Opunāpetabbanti vātamukhe opunāpetvā palālaṃ apanetabbaṃ. Atiharāpetabbanti antokoṭṭhāgāraṃ
tika-vin02t:1957_10: upanetabbaṃ. Na kammāti na kammāni. Gharāvāsatthenāti upayogatthe karaṇavacanaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1957_11: Upajānāhīti ca upasaggamatto upa-saddo. Tenāha “gharāvāsatthaṃ jānāhī”ti. Jānāhīti
tika-vin02t:1957_12: cettha paṭipajjāti attho veditabbo. Akāmakāti anicchamānā.
tika-vin02t:1958_0: 331-332. Yaṃ na nivattoti yasmā na nivatto. Suññāgāragatoti “ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca
tika-vin02t:1958_1: avasesaṃ arañña”nti (pārā.92) vuttaṃ araññaṃ rukkhamūlañca ṭhapetvā aññaṃ pabbatakandarādi
tika-vin02t:1958_3: Atha vā jhānakaṇṭakānaṃ saddānaṃ abhāvato vivittaṃ yaṃ kiñci agārampi “suññāgāra”nti
tika-vin02t:1958_4: veditabbaṃ. Taṃ suññāgāraṃ upagato. Abhikkhaṇanti bahulaṃ. Udānaṃ udānesīti so hi
tika-vin02t:1958_5: āyasmā araññe divāvihāraṃ upagatopi rattivāsūpagatopi yebhuyyena phalasamāpattisukhena
tika-vin02t:1958_6: nirodhasamāpattisukhena ca vītināmesi, tasmā taṃ sukhaṃ sandhāya pubbe attanā anubhūtaṃ
tika-vin02t:1958_7: sabhayaṃ sapariḷāhaṃ rajjasukhaṃ jigucchitvā “aho sukhaṃ aho sukha”nti somanassasahitañāṇasamuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1958_8: pītisamuggāraṃ samuggirati. Te bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocunti te sambahulā bhikkhū
tika-vin02t:1958_9: ullumpanasabhāvasaṇṭhitā tassa anuggaṇhanādhippāyena bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ, na ujjhānavasena.
tika-vin02t:1958_10: Nissaṃsayanti asandehena, ekantenāti attho. Te kira bhikkhū puthujjanā tassa āyasmato
tika-vin02t:1958_11: vivekasukhaṃ sandhāya udānaṃ ajānantā evamāhaṃsu. Samanussarantoti ukkaṇṭhanavasena anussaranto.
tika-vin02t:1959_0: Aññataranti nāmagottena apākaṭaṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ. Āmantesīti āṇāpesi te bhikkhū saññāpetukāmo.
tika-vin02t:1959_1: Evanti vacanasampaṭiggahe, sādhūti attho. Evaṃ bhanteti ettha pana evaṃ-saddo paṭiññāyaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1959_2: “Abhikkhaṇaṃ ‘aho sukhaṃ aho sukha’nti imaṃ udānaṃ udānesī”ti yathā te bhikkhū vadanti,
tika-vin02t:1959_3: taṃ evaṃ tathevāti attano udānaṃ paṭijānāti. “Kiṃ pana tvaṃ bhaddiyā”ti kasmā bhagavā
tika-vin02t:1959_4: pucchati, kiṃ tassa cittaṃ na jānātīti? No na jānāti, teneva pana tamatthaṃ vadāpetvā
tika-vin02t:1959_5: te bhikkhū saññāpetuṃ pucchati. Vuttañhetaṃ “jānantāpi tathāgatā pucchanti, jānantāpi
tika-vin02t:1960_0: Antopi antepureti itthāgārassa sañcaraṇaṭṭhānabhūte rājagehassa abbhantare, yattha
tika-vin02t:1960_1: rājā nahānabhojanasayanādiṃ kappeti. Rakkhā susaṃvihitāti ārakkhādikatapurisehi gutti
tika-vin02t:1960_2: suṭṭhu samantato vihitā. Bahipi antepureti aṭṭakaraṇaṭṭhānādike antepurato bahibhūte
tika-vin02t:1960_3: rājagehe. Evaṃ rakkhito gopito santoti evaṃ rājageharājadhānīrajjadesesu anto bahi
tika-vin02t:1960_4: ca anekesu ṭhānesu anekasatehi susaṃvihitarakkhāvaraṇaguttiyā mameva nibbhayatthaṃ
tika-vin02t:1960_5: phāsuvihāratthaṃ rakkhito gopito samāno. Bhītotiādīni padāni aññamaññavevacanāni.
tika-vin02t:1960_6: Atha vā bhītoti pararājūhi bhāyamāno. Ubbiggoti sakarajjepi pakatikkhobhato uppajjanakabhayubbegena
tika-vin02t:1960_7: ubbiggo calito. Ussaṅkīti “raññā nāma sabbakālaṃ avissatthena bhavitabba”nti vacanato
tika-vin02t:1960_8: sabbattha avissāsanavasena tesaṃ tesaṃ kiccakaraṇīyānaṃ accayato uppajjanakaparisaṅkāya
tika-vin02t:1960_9: ca uddhamuddhaṃ saṅkamāno. Utrāsīti “santikāvacarehipi ajānantasseva me kadāci anattho
tika-vin02t:1960_10: bhaveyyā”ti uppannena sarīrakampampi uppādanasamatthena tāsena utrāsi. “Utrasto”tipi
tika-vin02t:1961_0: Etarahīti idāni pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya. Ekoti asahāyo. Tena vivekaṭṭhakāyataṃ dasseti.
tika-vin02t:1961_1: Abhītotiādīnaṃ padānaṃ vuttavipariyāyena attho veditabbo. Bhayādinimittassa pariggahassa
tika-vin02t:1961_2: taṃnimittassa ca kilesagahanassa abhāvenevassa abhītāditāti etena cittavivekaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin02t:1961_3: Appossukkoti sarīraguttiyaṃ nirussukko. Pannalomoti lomahaṃsuppādakassa chambhitattassa
tika-vin02t:1961_4: abhāvena anuggatalomo. Padadvayenapi serivihāraṃ dasseti. Paradattavuttoti parehi
tika-vin02t:1961_5: dinnena cīvarādinā vattamāno. Etena sabbaso saṅgābhāvadīpanamukhena anavasesabhayahetuvirahaṃ
tika-vin02t:1961_6: dasseti. Migabhūtena cetasāti vissatthavihāritāya migassa viya jātena cittena. Migo
tika-vin02t:1961_7: hi amanussapathe araññe vasamāno vissattho tiṭṭhati nisīdati nipajjati yenakāmañca
tika-vin02t:1961_8: pakkamati appaṭihatacāro, evaṃ ahampi viharāmīti dasseti. Vuttañhetaṃ paccekasambuddhena –
tika-vin02t:1966_0: Imaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhante, atthavasanti bhagavā yadidaṃ mama etarahi paramaṃ vivekasukhaṃ
tika-vin02t:1966_1: phalasamāpattisukhaṃ, idameva kāraṇaṃ sampassamāno “aho sukhaṃ, aho sukha”nti udānemi.
tika-vin02t:1966_2: Etamatthanti etaṃ bhaddiyattherassa puthujjanavisayātītaṃ vivekasukhasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ
tika-vin02t:1966_3: sabbākārato viditvā. Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ sahetukabhayasokavigamānubhāvadīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
tika-vin02t:1967_0: Yassantarato na santi kopāti yassa ariyapuggalassa antarato abbhantare attano citte
tika-vin02t:1967_2: dosakopā eva vā na santi, maggena pahīnattā na vijjanti. Ayañhi antara-saddo kiñcāpi
tika-vin02t:1967_4: vemajjhe, “antarā ca jetavanaṃ antarā ca sāvatthi”ntiādīsu vivare, “bhayamantarato
tika-vin02t:1967_5: jāta”ntiādīsu citte, idhāpi citte eva daṭṭhabbo. Tenevāha “yassa citte kopā na santī”ti.
tika-vin02t:1968_0: Abhava-saddassa vibhava-saddena atthuddhāre kāraṇamāha “vibhavoti ca abhavoti ca
tika-vin02t:1968_1: atthato eka”nti. Iti-saddo pakāravacanoti āha “iti anekappakārā bhavābhavatā”ti.
tika-vin02t:1968_2: Vītivattoti atikkanto. Ettha ca “yassā”ti idaṃ yo vītivattoti vibhattivipariṇāmavasena
tika-vin02t:1968_3: yojetabbaṃ. Taṃ vigatabhayanti taṃ evarūpaṃ yathāvuttaguṇasamannāgataṃ khīṇāsavaṃ
tika-vin02t:1968_5: Vivekasukhena aggaphalasukhena ca sukhiṃ, vigatabhayattā eva asokaṃ. Devā nānubhavanti
tika-vin02t:1968_6: dassanāyāti adhigatamagge ṭhapetvā sabbepi upapattidevā vāyamantāpi cittacāradassanavasena
tika-vin02t:1968_7: dassanāya daṭṭhuṃ nānubhavanti na abhisambhuṇanti na sakkonti, pageva manussā. Sekkhāpi
tika-vin02t:1968_8: hi puthujjanā viya arahato cittappavattiṃ na jānanti. Tassa dassanaṃ devānampi dullabhanti
tika-vin02t:1968_9: etthāpi cittacāradassanavasena tassa dassanaṃ devānampi dullabhaṃ alabbhanīyaṃ, devehipi
tika-vin02t:1968_10: taṃ dassanaṃ na sakkā pāpuṇitunti evamattho gahetabbo. Abhāvattho hettha du-saddo
tika-vin02t:1969_0: 333. Bhattābhihāroti abhiharitabbabhattaṃ. Tassa pana pamāṇaṃ dassetuṃ “pañca ca
tika-vin02t:1969_1: thālipākasatānī”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha eko thālipāko dasannaṃ purisānaṃ bhattaṃ gaṇhāti.
tika-vin02t:1969_2: Lābhasakkārasilokenāti ettha lābho nāma catupaccayalābho. Sakkāroti tesaṃyeva sukatānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1969_3: susaṅkhatānaṃ lābho. Silokoti vaṇṇaghoso. Manomayaṃ kāyanti jhānamanena nibbattaṃ
tika-vin02t:1969_4: brahmakāyaṃ. Upapannoti upagato. Attabhāvappaṭilābhoti sarīrapaṭilābho. Dve vā tīṇi
tika-vin02t:1969_5: vā māgadhakāni gāmakhettānīti ettha māgadhakaṃ gāmakhettaṃ atthi khuddakaṃ, atthi
tika-vin02t:1969_6: majjhimaṃ, atthi mahantaṃ. Khuddakaṃ gāmakhettaṃ ito cattālīsa usabhāni, etto cattālīsa
tika-vin02t:1969_7: usabhānīti gāvutaṃ hoti. Majjhimaṃ ito gāvutaṃ, etto gāvutanti aḍḍhayojanaṃ hoti.
tika-vin02t:1969_8: Mahantaṃ ito diyaḍḍhagāvutaṃ, etto diyaḍḍhagāvutanti tigāvutaṃ hoti. Tesu khuddakena
tika-vin02t:1969_9: gāmakhettena tīṇi, khuddakena ca majjhimena ca dve gāmakhettāni tassa attabhāvo.
tika-vin02t:1969_10: Tigāvutañhissa sarīraṃ. Pariharissāmīti paṭijaggissāmi gopayissāmi. Rakkhassetanti rakkhassu etaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1971_0: 334. Satthāroti gaṇasatthāro. Nāssassāti na etassa bhaveyya. Tanti taṃ satthāraṃ.
tika-vin02t:1971_1: Tenāti amanāpena. Samudācareyyāmāti katheyyāma. Sammannatīti amhākaṃ sammānaṃ karoti.
tika-vin02t:1971_2: Tenāha “sammānetī”ti, sammannatīti vā parehi sammānīyatīti attho.
tika-vin02t:1972_0: 335. Nāsāya pittaṃ bhindeyyunti acchapittaṃ vā macchapittaṃ vā nāsāpuṭe pakkhipeyyuṃ.
tika-vin02t:1972_1: Parābhavāyāti avaḍḍhiyā vināsāya. Assatarīti vaḷavāya kucchismiṃ gadrabhassajātā,
tika-vin02t:1972_2: taṃ assena saddhiṃ sampayojenti, sā gabbhaṃ gaṇhitvā kāle sampatte vijāyituṃ na sakkoti,
tika-vin02t:1972_3: pādehi bhūmiṃ paharantī tiṭṭhati, athassā cattāro pāde catūsu khāṇukesu bandhitvā
tika-vin02t:1972_4: kucchiṃ phāletvā potakaṃ nīharanti, sā tattheva marati. Tena vuttaṃ “attavadhāya gabbhaṃ gaṇhātī”ti.
tika-vin02t:1975_0: 342. Mā kuñjara nāgamāsadoti bho, kuñjara, buddhanāgaṃ vadhakacittena mā upagaccha.
tika-vin02t:1975_1: Dukkhanti dukkhakāraṇattā dukkhaṃ. Kathaṃ taṃ dukkhanti āha “na hi nāgahatassā”tiādi.
tika-vin02t:1975_2: Nāgahatassa sugatipaṭikkhepena buddhanāgassa ghāto duggatidukkhakāraṇanti dasseti.
tika-vin02t:1975_3: Itoti ito jātito. Yatoti yasmā. Ito paraṃ yatoti ito paraṃ gacchantassāti vā attho.
tika-vin02t:1975_4: Madoti mānamado. Pamādoti pamattabhāvo. Paṭikuṭitoti saṅkuṭito. Alakkhikoti ahiriko.
tika-vin02t:1977_0: 343. Tikabhojananti tīhi bhuñjitabbabhojanaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ ekato paṭiggahetvā bhuñjituṃ
tika-vin02t:1977_1: paññapessāmīti attho. Kokālikotiādīni catunnaṃ devadattapakkhiyānaṃ gaṇapāmokkhānaṃ
tika-vin02t:1977_2: nāmāni. Āyukappanti ekaṃ mahākappaṃ asītibhāgaṃ katvā tato ekabhāgamattaṃ kālaṃ antarakappasaññitaṃ kālaṃ.
tika-vin02t:1978_0: Āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavocāti devadatto sabbaṃ saṅghabhedassa pubbabhāgaṃ nipphādetvā
tika-vin02t:1978_1: “ekaṃseneva ajja āveṇikaṃ uposathaṃ saṅghakammañca karissāmī”ti cintetvā etaṃ “ajjatagge”tiādivacanaṃ
tika-vin02t:1978_2: avoca. Tattha aññatreva bhagavatāti vinā eva bhagavantaṃ, taṃ satthāraṃ akatvāti
tika-vin02t:1978_3: attho. Aññatra bhikkhusaṅghā uposathaṃ karissāmi saṅghakammāni cāti bhagavato ovādakārakaṃ
tika-vin02t:1978_4: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ vinā maṃ anuvattantehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ āveṇikaṃ uposathaṃ saṅghakammāni
tika-vin02t:1978_5: ca karissāmi. Ajjatagge, bhante, devadatto saṅghaṃ bhindissatīti bhedakārakānaṃ sabbesaṃ
tika-vin02t:1978_6: devadattena sajjitattā “ekaṃseneva devadatto ajja saṅghaṃ bhindissatī”ti maññamāno
tika-vin02t:1979_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ avīcimahānirayuppattisaṃvattaniyaṃ kappaṭṭhiyaṃ atekicchaṃ
tika-vin02t:1979_1: devadattena nibbattiyamānaṃ saṅghabhedakammaṃ sabbākārato viditvā. Imaṃ udānanti
tika-vin02t:1979_2: kusalākusalesu yathākkamaṃ sappurisāsappurisānaṃ sukarā paṭipatti, na pana nesaṃ
tika-vin02t:1980_0: Tattha sukaraṃ sādhunā sādhūti attano paresañca hitaṃ sādhetīti sādhu, sammāpaṭipanno.
tika-vin02t:1980_1: Tena sādhunā sāriputtādinā sāvakena paccekasambuddhena sammāsambuddhena aññena vā
tika-vin02t:1980_2: lokiyasādhunā sādhu sundaraṃ bhaddakaṃ attano paresañca hitasukhāvahaṃ sukaraṃ sukhena
tika-vin02t:1980_3: kātuṃ sakkā. Sādhu pāpena dukkaranti tadeva pana vuttalakkhaṇaṃ sādhu pāpena devadattādinā
tika-vin02t:1980_4: pāpapuggalena dukkaraṃ kātuṃ na sakkā, na so taṃ kātuṃ sakkotīti attho. Pāpaṃ pāpena
tika-vin02t:1980_5: sukaranti pāpaṃ asundaraṃ attano paresañca anatthāvahaṃ pāpena yathāvuttapāpapuggalena
tika-vin02t:1980_6: sukaraṃ sukhena kātuṃ sakkuṇeyyaṃ. Pāpamariyehi dukkaranti ariyehi pana buddhādīhi
tika-vin02t:1980_7: taṃ pāpaṃ dukkaraṃ durabhisambhavaṃ. Setughātoyeva hi tesaṃ tatthāti dīpeti.
tika-vin02t:1982_0: 345. Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto ādesanāpāṭihāriyānusāsaniyātiādīsu parassa cittaṃ
tika-vin02t:1982_1: ñatvā kathanaṃ ādesanāpāṭihāriyaṃ, sāvakānañca buddhānañca satataṃ dhammadesanaṃ
tika-vin02t:1982_2: anusāsanīpāṭihāriyaṃ, iddhividhaṃ iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ. Tattha iddhipāṭihāriyena saddhiṃ
tika-vin02t:1982_4: anusāsanīpāṭihāriyaṃ dhammasenāpatissa. Tena vuttaṃ “āyasmā sāriputto ādesanāpāṭihāriyānusāsaniyā
tika-vin02t:1982_5: bhikkhū dhammiyā kathāya ovadī”tiādi. Tadā hi dvīsu aggasāvakesu dhammasenāpati tesaṃ
tika-vin02t:1982_6: bhikkhūnaṃ cittacāraṃ ñatvā dhammaṃ desesi, mahāmoggallānatthero vikubbanaṃ dassetvā
tika-vin02t:1982_7: dhammaṃ desesi, pāḷiyañcettha dvinnampi therānaṃ desanāya dhammacakkhupaṭilābhova
tika-vin02t:1982_8: dassito. Dīghabhāṇakā pana evaṃ vadanti “bhagavatā pesitesu dvīsu aggasāvakesu dhammasenāpati
tika-vin02t:1982_9: tesaṃ cittacāraṃ ñatvā dhammaṃ desesi, therassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pañcasatāpi bhikkhū
tika-vin02t:1982_10: sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu. Atha nesaṃ mahāmoggallānatthero vikubbanaṃ dassetvā
tika-vin02t:1982_11: dhammaṃ desesi, taṃ sutvā sabbe arahattaphale patiṭṭhahiṃsū”ti. Devadattaṃ uṭṭhāpesīti
tika-vin02t:1983_0: 346. Sarasīti saro. Suvikkhālitanti suṭṭhu vikkhālitaṃ, suvisodhitaṃ katvāti attho.
tika-vin02t:1983_1: Saṃkhāditvāti suṭṭhu khāditvā. Mahiṃ vikubbatoti mahiṃ dantehi vilikhantassa. Nadīsu
tika-vin02t:1983_2: bhisaṃ ghasānassāti yojetabbaṃ. Nadīti cettha mahāsaro adhippeto. Jaggatoti hatthiyūthaṃ
tika-vin02t:1983_3: pālentassa. Bhiṅkovāti hatthipotako viya. Mamānukubbanti maṃ anukaronto.
tika-vin02t:1984_0: 347. Dūteyyanti dūtakammaṃ. Gantumarahatīti dūteyyasaṅkhātaṃ sāsanaṃ harituṃ dhāretvā
tika-vin02t:1984_1: harituṃ arahati. Sotāti yaṃ assa sāsanaṃ denti, tassa sotā. Sāvetāti taṃ uggaṇhitvā
tika-vin02t:1984_2: “idaṃ nāma tumhehi vutta”nti paṭisāvetā. Uggahetāti suuggahitaṃ katvā uggahetā. Dhāretāti
tika-vin02t:1984_3: sudhāritaṃ katvā dhāretā. Viññātāti attanā tassa atthaṃ jānitā. Viññāpetāti paraṃ
tika-vin02t:1984_4: vijānāpetā. Sahitāsahitassāti “idaṃ sahitaṃ, idaṃ asahita”nti evaṃ sahitāsahitassa
tika-vin02t:1984_5: kusalo upagatānupagatesu cheko sāsanaṃ ārocento sahitāsahitaṃ sallakkhetvā āroceti.
tika-vin02t:1984_6: Na byathatīti na vedhati na chambhati. Uggavādininti pharusavacanena samannāgataṃ.
tika-vin02t:1985_0: 348. Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, asaddhammehītiādīsu asaddhammehīti asataṃ dhammehi, asantehi
tika-vin02t:1985_1: vā asobhanehi vā dhammehi. Abhibhūtoti ajjhotthaṭo. Pariyādinnacittoti khepitacitto
tika-vin02t:1985_2: lābhādihetukena icchācārena mānamadādinā ca khayaṃ pāpitakusalacitto. Atha vā pariyādinnacittoti
tika-vin02t:1985_3: parito ādinnacitto, vuttappakārena akusalakoṭṭhāsena yathā kusalacittassa uppattivāro
tika-vin02t:1985_4: na hoti, evaṃ samantato gahitacittasantānoti attho. Apāye nibbattanārahatāya āpāyiko.
tika-vin02t:1985_5: Tatthapi avīcisaṅkhāte mahāniraye uppajjatīti nerayiko. Ekaṃ antarakappaṃ paripuṇṇameva
tika-vin02t:1985_6: katvā tattha tiṭṭhatīti kappaṭṭho. Atekicchoti buddhehipi anivattanīyattā avīcinibbattiyā
tika-vin02t:1985_7: tikicchābhāvato atekiccho, atikicchanīyoti attho. Lābhenāti lābhena hetubhūtena.
tika-vin02t:1985_8: Atha vā lābhahetukena mānādinā. Lābhañhi nissāya idhekacce puggalā pāpicchā icchāpakatā
tika-vin02t:1985_9: icchācāre ṭhatvā “lābhaṃ nibbattessāmā”ti anekavihitaṃ anesanaṃ appatirūpaṃ āpajjitvā
tika-vin02t:1985_10: ito cutā apāyesu nibbattanti. Apare yathālābhaṃ labhitvā taṃnimittaṃ mānātimānamadamacchariyādivasena
tika-vin02t:1985_11: pamādaṃ āpajjitvā ito cutā apāyesu nibbattanti, ayañca tādiso. Tena vuttaṃ “lābhena,
tika-vin02t:1985_12: bhikkhave, abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto devadatto āpāyiko”tiādi. Asakkārenāti hīḷetvā
tika-vin02t:1985_13: paribhavitvā parehi attani pavattitena asakkārena, asakkārahetukena vā mānādinā.
tika-vin02t:1985_14: Asantaguṇasambhāvanādhippāyena pavattā pāpā icchā etassāti pāpiccho, tassa bhāvo
tika-vin02t:1985_15: pāpicchatā, tāya. “Ahaṃ buddho bhavissāmi, bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pariharissāmī”ti hi tassa
tika-vin02t:1985_16: icchā uppannā. Kokālikādayo pāpā lāmakā mittā etassāti pāpamitto, tassa bhāvo pāpamittatā, tāya.
tika-vin02t:1987_0: 350. Tīhi, bhikkhave, asaddhammehītiādi vuttanayameva. Oramattakena visesādhigamena
tika-vin02t:1987_1: antarā vosānaṃ āpādīti ettha pana ayamattho. Oramattakenāti appamattakena jhānābhiññāmattena.
tika-vin02t:1987_2: Visesādhigamenāti uttarimanussadhammādhigamena. Antarāti vemajjhe. Vosānaṃ āpādīti
tika-vin02t:1987_3: akatakiccova samāno “katakiccomhī”ti maññamāno samaṇadhammato vigamaṃ āpajji. Idaṃ
tika-vin02t:1987_4: vuttaṃ hoti – jhānābhiññāhi uttarikaraṇīye adhigantabbe maggaphale anadhigate satiyeva
tika-vin02t:1987_5: taṃ anadhigantvā samaṇadhammato vigamaṃ āpajjīti. Iti bhagavā iminā suttena visesato
tika-vin02t:1987_6: puthujjanabhāve ādīnavaṃ pakāseti “bhāriyo puthujjanabhāvo, yatra hi nāma jhānābhiññāpariyosānā
tika-vin02t:1987_8: asappurisasaṃsaggaṃ ālasiyānuyogañca avijahanto avīcisaṃvattanikaṃ kappaṭṭhiyaṃ atekicchaṃ
tika-vin02t:1988_0: Gāthāsu māti paṭisedhe nipāto. Jātūti ekaṃsena. Kocīti sabbasaṅgāhakavacanaṃ. Lokasminti
tika-vin02t:1988_1: sattaloke. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – imasmiṃ sattaloke koci puggalo ekaṃsena pāpiccho mā
tika-vin02t:1988_2: hotūti. Tadamināpi jānātha, pāpicchānaṃ yathā gatīti pāpicchānaṃ puggalānaṃ yathāgati
tika-vin02t:1988_3: yādisī nibbatti yādiso abhisamparāyoti imināpi kāraṇena jānāthāti devadattaṃ nidassento evamāha.
tika-vin02t:1989_0: Paṇḍitoti samaññātoti pariyattibāhusaccena paṇḍitoti ñāto. Bhāvitattoti sammatoti
tika-vin02t:1989_1: jhānābhiññāhi bhāvitacittoti sambhāvito. Tathā hi so “mahiddhiko godhiputto, mahānubhāvo
tika-vin02t:1989_2: godhiputto”ti dhammasenāpatināpi pasaṃsito ahosi. Jalaṃva yasasā aṭṭhā, devadattoti
tika-vin02t:1989_3: vissutoti attano kittiyā parivārena ca jalanto viya obhāsanto viya ṭhito devadattoti
tika-vin02t:1989_4: evaṃ vissuto pākaṭo ahosi. “Me suta”ntipi pāṭho, mayā sutaṃ sutamattaṃ, katipāheneva
tika-vin02t:1990_0: So pamādaṃ anuciṇṇo, āsajja naṃ tathāgatanti so evaṃbhūto devadatto “buddhopi sākiyaputto,
tika-vin02t:1990_1: ahampi sākiyaputto, buddhopi samaṇo, ahampi samaṇo, buddhopi iddhimā, ahampi iddhimā,
tika-vin02t:1990_3: dhamme jānāti, ahampi te jānāmī”ti attano pamāṇaṃ ajānitvā sammāsambuddhaṃ attanā
tika-vin02t:1990_4: samasamaṭṭhapanena pamādaṃ āpajjanto “idānāhaṃ buddho bhavissāmi, bhikkhusaṅghaṃ
tika-vin02t:1990_5: pariharissāmī”ti abhimārapayojanādinā tathāgataṃ āsajja āsādetvā viheṭhetvā. “Pamādamanujiṇṇo”tipi
tika-vin02t:1990_6: paṭhanti. Tassattho – pamādaṃ vuttanayena pamajjanto pamādaṃ nissāya bhagavatā saddhiṃ
tika-vin02t:1990_7: yugaggāhacittuppādena saheva jhānābhiññāhi anujiṇṇo parihīnoti. Avīcinirayaṃ patto,
tika-vin02t:1990_8: catudvāraṃ bhayānakanti jālānaṃ tattha uppannasattānaṃ vā nirantaratāya “avīcī”ti
tika-vin02t:1990_9: laddhanāmaṃ catūsu passesu catumahādvārayogena catudvāraṃ atibhayānakaṃ mahānirayaṃ
tika-vin02t:1995_0: Aduṭṭhassāti aduṭṭhacittassa. Dubbheti dusseyya. Tameva pāpaṃ phusatīti tameva aduṭṭhadubbhiṃ
tika-vin02t:1995_1: pāpapuggalaṃ pāpaṃ nihīnaṃ pāpaphalaṃ phusati pāpuṇāti abhibhavati. Bhesmāti vipulabhāvena
tika-vin02t:1995_2: gambhīrabhāvena ca bhiṃsāpano, bhiṃsāpento viya vipulagambhīroti attho. Vādenāti
tika-vin02t:1995_3: dosena. Upahiṃsatīti bādhati āsādeti. Vādo tamhi na rūhatīti tasmiṃ tathāgate parena
tika-vin02t:1995_4: āropiyamāno doso na ruhati na tiṭṭhati, visakumbho viya samuddassa na tassa vikāraṃ janetīti attho.
tika-vin02t:1996_0: Evaṃ chahi gāthāhi pāpicchatādisamannāgatassa nirayūpagabhāvadassanena dukkhato aparimuttiṃ
tika-vin02t:1996_2: mitta”nti osānagāthamāha. Tassattho – yassa sammā paṭipannassa maggānugo paṭipattimaggaṃ
tika-vin02t:1996_3: anugato sammā paṭipanno appicchatādiguṇasamannāgamena sakalassa vaṭṭadukkhassa khayaṃ
tika-vin02t:1996_4: pariyosānaṃ pāpuṇeyya, tādisaṃ buddhaṃ buddhasāvakaṃ vā paṇḍito sappañño attano mittaṃ
tika-vin02t:1996_5: kubbetha tena mettiṃ kareyya, tañca sevetha tameva payirupāseyyāti.
tika-vin02t:1997: Kiṃ panetaṃ suttaṃ devadattassa nirayūpapattito pubbe bhāsitaṃ, udāhu pacchāti? Itivuttakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ tāva –
tika-vin02t:1998_1: gotamena abhisapito devadatto pathaviṃ paviṭṭho’ti abbhācikkhiṃsu. Taṃ sutvā sāsane
tika-vin02t:1998_2: anabhippasannā manussā ‘siyā nu kho etadevaṃ, yathā ime bhaṇantī’ti āsaṅkaṃ uppādesuṃ.
tika-vin02t:1998_3: Taṃ pavattiṃ bhikkhū bhagavato ārocesuṃ. Atha kho bhagavā ‘na, bhikkhave, tathāgatā
tika-vin02t:1998_4: kassaci abhisapaṃ denti, tasmā na devadatto mayā abhisapito, attano kammeneva nirayaṃ
tika-vin02t:1998_5: paviṭṭho’ti vatvā tesaṃ micchāgāhaṃ paṭisedhento imāya aṭṭhuppattiyā idaṃ suttaṃ abhāsī”ti –
tika-vin02t:1999_0: Vuttaṃ, tasmā tesaṃ matena tassa nirayūpapattito pacchāpi bhagavā idaṃ suttamabhāsīti
tika-vin02t:1999_1: veditabbaṃ. Idha pana tassa nirayūpapattito paṭhamameva uppanne vatthumhi bhāsitaṃ
tika-vin02t:1999_2: pāḷiāruḷhanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Teneva “avīcinirayaṃ patto”ti idaṃ pana āsaṃsāyaṃ atītavacananti
tika-vin02t:1999_3: vuttaṃ, āsaṃsāti cettha avassambhāvinī atthasiddhi adhippetā. Avassambhāviniñhi atthasiddhimapekkhitvā
tika-vin02t:1999_4: anāgatampi bhūtaṃ viya voharanti, tañca saddalakkhaṇānusārena veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:2002_0: 351. Upālipañhe yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dassitameva. Tattha anunayantoti
tika-vin02t:2002_1: anujānāpento, bhedassa anurūpaṃ vā bodhento, yathā bhedo hoti, evaṃ bhinditabbe bhikkhū
tika-vin02t:2003_2: natthi adhammabhāvo, bhagavatā pana desitākārena hāpetvā vaḍḍhetvā vā kathanaṃ yathādhammaṃ
tika-vin02t:2003_3: akathananti katvā adhammabhāvoti dassento āha “tayo satipaṭṭhānā”tiādi. Niyyānikanti
tika-vin02t:2003_4: sapāṭihīraṃ appaṭihataṃ hutvā pavattatīti attho. Tathevāti iminā “evaṃ amhāka”ntiādinā
tika-vin02t:2003_5: vuttamatthaṃ ākaḍḍhati. Kātabbaṃ kammaṃ dhammo nāmāti yathādhammaṃ karaṇato dhammo
tika-vin02t:2004_0: Rāgavinayo…pe… ayaṃ vinayo nāmāti rāgādīnaṃ vinayanato saṃvaraṇato pajahanato paṭisaṅkhānato
tika-vin02t:2004_1: ca vinayo nāma, vuttavipariyāyena itaro avinayo. Vatthusampattiādivasena sabbesaṃ
tika-vin02t:2004_2: vinayakammānaṃ akuppatāti āha “vatthusampatti…pe… ayaṃ vinayo nāmā”ti. Tappaṭipakkhato
tika-vin02t:2004_3: avinayo veditabbo. Tenāha “vatthuvipattī”tiādi. Yāsaṃ āpannassa pabbajjā sāvasesā,
tika-vin02t:2005_0: 354. Āpāyikotiādigāthāsu saṅghassa bhedasaṅkhāte vagge ratoti vaggarato. Adhammikatāya
tika-vin02t:2005_1: adhamme bhedakaravatthumhi saṅghabhedasaṅkhāte eva ca adhamme ṭhitoti adhammaṭṭho.
tika-vin02t:2005_2: Yogakkhemā padhaṃsatīti hitato parihāyati, catūhipi yogehi anupaddutattā yogakkhemaṃ
tika-vin02t:2005_3: nāma arahattaṃ nibbānañca, tato panassa dhaṃsane vattabbameva natthi. Diṭṭhisīlasāmaññato
tika-vin02t:2005_4: saṅghataṭṭhena saṅghaṃ, tato eva ekakammādividhānayogena samaggaṃ sahitaṃ bhinditvā
tika-vin02t:2005_5: pubbe vuttalakkhaṇena saṅghabhedena bhinditvā. Kappanti antarakappasaṅkhātaṃ āyukappaṃ.
tika-vin02t:2006_0: Sukhā saṅghassa sāmaggīti sukhassa paccayabhāvato sāmaggī “sukhā”ti vuttā yathā “sukho
tika-vin02t:2006_2: sāmaggianurūpaṃ vā, yathā te sāmaggiṃ na vijahanti, tathā gahaṇaṃ ṭhapanaṃ anubalappadānanti
tika-vin02t:2006_3: attho. Samaggaṃ katvānāti bhinnaṃ saṅghaṃ saṅgharājippattaṃ vā samaggaṃ sahitaṃ katvā.
tika-vin02t:2006_4: Kappanti āyukappameva. Saggamhi modatīti kāmāvacaradevaloke aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi
tika-vin02t:2006_5: abhibhavitvā dibbasukhaṃ anubhavanto icchitanibbattiyā ca modati pamodati laḷati kīḷati.
tika-vin02t:2007_0: 355. Siyā nu kho, bhante, saṅghabhedakotiādi pāḷianusāreneva veditabbaṃ. “Pañcahi,
tika-vin02t:2007_1: upāli, ākārehi saṅgho bhijjati kammena uddesena voharanto anussāvanena salākaggāhenā”ti
tika-vin02t:2007_2: evaṃ parivāre āgatampi saṅghabhedalakkhaṇaṃ idha vuttena kiṃ nānākaraṇanti dassetuṃ
tika-vin02t:2007_3: “parivāre panā”tiādimāha. Ettha ca sīmaṭṭhakasaṅghe asannipatite visuṃ parisaṃ gahetvā
tika-vin02t:2007_4: katavohārānussāvanasalākaggāhassa kammaṃ vā karontassa uddesaṃ vā uddisantassa bhedo
tika-vin02t:2007_5: ca hoti ānantariyakammañca. Samaggasaññāya pana “vaṭṭatī”ti saññāya vā karontassa
tika-vin02t:2007_6: bhedova hoti, na ānantariyakammaṃ. Tato ūnaparisāya karontassa neva saṅghabhedo na
tika-vin02t:2007_7: ānantariyaṃ. Sabbantimena hi paricchedena navannaṃ janānaṃ yo saṅghaṃ bhindati, tassa
tika-vin02t:2007_8: ānantariyakammaṃ hoti, anuvattakānaṃ adhammavādīnaṃ mahāsāvajjaṃ kammaṃ, dhammavādino
tika-vin02t:2012_1: uparipadesatoti attho. Vissajjetabbanti sukkhāpanatthaṃ ātape vissajjitabbaṃ. Abhivādāpetabboti
tika-vin02t:2012_2: tassa vasse pucchite yadi daharo hoti, sayameva vandissati, tadā imināva vandāpito
tika-vin02t:2012_3: nāma hoti. Nilloketabboti oloketabbo. Yathābhāganti pubbe paññattaṃ padesabhāgaṃ
tika-vin02t:2012_4: anatikkamitvā. Santānakanti uṇṇanābhisuttaṃ. Ullokāti gehassa uparibhāgato paṭṭhāya,
tika-vin02t:2016: 362. Pañcame nisinneti anumodanatthāya nisinne. Upanisinnakathā nāma bahūsu sannipatitesu parikathākathanaṃ.
tika-vin02t:2018_0: 364. Manussānaṃ parivisanaṭṭhānanti yattha manussā saputtadārā āvasitvā denti. Hatthadhovanaudakaṃ
tika-vin02t:2018_1: sandhāyāti bhuttāvissa bhojanāvasāne hatthadhovanaudakaṃ sandhāya. Tenevāha “antarā
tika-vin02t:2018_2: pipāsitena pana…pe… hatthā na dhovitabbā”ti. Potthakesu pana “pānīyaṃ pivitvā hatthā
tika-vin02t:2018_3: na dhovitabbā”ti likhanti, “hatthā dhovitabbā”ti pāṭhena bhavitabbanti amhākaṃ khanti.
tika-vin02t:2018_4: Aññathā “na tāva udakanti idaṃ hatthadhovanaudakaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti vatvā “antarā
tika-vin02t:2018_5: pipāsitena panā”tiādinā vuttaviseso na upalabbhati. Atha mataṃ “na tāva therena udakaṃ
tika-vin02t:2018_6: paṭiggahetabbanti idaṃ kiṃ pānīyapaṭiggahaṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, udāhu hatthadhovanaudakaggahaṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:2018_7: sandhāyāti āsaṅkānivattanatthaṃ ‘idaṃ hatthadhovanaudakaṃ sandhāya vutta’ntiādi kathita”nti,
tika-vin02t:2018_8: tañca na, tattha āsaṅkāya eva asambhavato. Na hi bhagavā “yāva aññe na bhuttāvino
tika-vin02t:2018_9: honti, tāva pānīyaṃ na pātabba”nti vakkhatīti sakkā viññātuṃ. Yadi cetaṃ pānīyapaṭiggahaṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:2018_10: sandhāya vuttaṃ, “na tāva therena udakaṃ paṭiggahetabba”nti udakasaddappayogo ca
tika-vin02t:2018_11: na kattabbo siyā, aṭṭhakathāyañca “idaṃ hatthadhovanaudakaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti vatvā
tika-vin02t:2018_12: tena nivattitabbamatthaṃ dassentena “antarā pipāsitena pana gale vilaggāmisena vā
tika-vin02t:2018_13: pānīyaṃ pivitabba”nti ettakameva vattabbaṃ, “pānīyaṃ pivitvā hatthā na dhovitabbā”ti
tika-vin02t:2018_14: evaṃ pana na vattabbanti. Dhure nisinnā hontīti dvārasamīpe nisinnā honti.
tika-vin02t:2020: 366. Parāmasatīti gaṇhāti. Ṭhapeti vāti “tiṭṭhatha, bhante”ti vadantī ṭhapeti nāma.
tika-vin02t:2022: 367. Kenajja, bhante, yuttanti kena nakkhattena ajja cando yuttoti evaṃ vadantena nakkhattaṃ pucchitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin02t:2024_0: 369-370. Aṅgaṇeti abbhokāse. Na vuḍḍhaṃ anāpucchāti ettha tassa ovarake tadupacāre
tika-vin02t:2024_1: ca āpucchitabbanti vadanti. Bhojanasālādīsupi evameva paṭipajjitabbanti bhojanasālādīsupi
tika-vin02t:2026_0: 373-374. Idaṃ ativivaṭanti idaṃ ṭhānaṃ gumbādīhi appaṭicchannattā ativiya pakāsanaṃ.
tika-vin02t:2026_1: Nibaddhagamanatthāyāti attano nibaddhagamanatthāya. Puggalikaṭṭhānaṃ vāti attano
tika-vin02t:2027_1: senāsana jantāghara vaccakuṭi upajjhācariya saddhivihārika antevāsikavattāni cuddasa
tika-vin02t:2027_2: mahāvattāni nāma, ito aññāni pana kadāci tajjanīyakammakatādikāleyeva caritabbāni
tika-vin02t:2027_3: asīti khandhakavattānīti veditabbāni. Gaṇṭhipadesu pana “imāniyeva cuddasa mahāvattāni
tika-vin02t:2027_4: aggahitaggahaṇena gahiyamānāni asīti khandhakavattāānī”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:2031_0: 383. Pātimokkhaṭṭhapanakkhandhake tadahūti tasmiṃ ahani tasmiṃ divase. Uposatheti
tika-vin02t:2031_1: ettha upavasanti etthāti uposatho, upavasantīti sīlena vā anasanena vā upetā hutvā
tika-vin02t:2031_2: vasantīti attho. Ayañhi uposatha-saddo “aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ uposathaṃ upavasāmī”tiādīsu
tika-vin02t:2031_3: sīle āgato. “Uposatho vā pavāraṇā vā”tiādīsu pātimokkhuddesādivinayakamme. “Gopālakūposatho
tika-vin02t:2031_5: pannaraso”tiādīsu divase. Idhāpi divaseyeva daṭṭhabbo. Tasmā tadahuposatheti tasmiṃ
tika-vin02t:2031_6: uposathadivasabhūte ahanīti attho. Nisinno hotīti mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivuto ovādapātimokkhaṃ
tika-vin02t:2031_7: uddisituṃ upāsikāya ratanapāsāde nisinno hoti. Nisajja pana bhikkhūnaṃ cittāni olokento
tika-vin02t:2031_8: ekaṃ dussīlapuggalaṃ disvā “sacāhaṃ imasmiṃ puggale idha nisinneyeva pātimokkhaṃ
tika-vin02t:2031_9: uddisissāmi, sattadhāvassa muddhā phalissatī”ti tasmiṃ anukampāya tuṇhīyeva ahosi.
tika-vin02t:2032_0: Abhikkantāti atikkantā parikkhīṇā. Uddhaste aruṇeti uggate aruṇasīse. Nandimukhiyāti
tika-vin02t:2032_1: tuṭṭhimukhiyā. Uddhastaṃ aruṇanti aruṇuggamanaṃ patvāpi “uddisatu, bhante, bhagavā
tika-vin02t:2032_2: bhikkhūnaṃ pātimokkha”nti thero bhagavantaṃ pātimokkhuddesaṃ yāci tasmiṃ kāle “na,
tika-vin02t:2032_3: bhikkhave, anuposathe uposatho kātabbo”ti sikkhāpadassa apaññattattā. Aparisuddhā,
tika-vin02t:2032_4: ānanda, parisāti tikkhattuṃ therena pātimokkhuddesassa yācitattā anuddesassa kāraṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:2032_5: kathento “asukapuggalo aparisuddho”ti avatvā “aparisuddhā, ānanda, parisā”ti āha.
tika-vin02t:2032_6: Kasmā pana bhagavā tiyāmarattiṃ tathā vītināmesi? Tato paṭṭhāya ovādapātimokkhaṃ
tika-vin02t:2033_0: Addasāti kathaṃ addasa. Attano cetopariyañāṇena tassaṃ parisati bhikkhūnaṃ cittāni
tika-vin02t:2033_1: parijānanto tassa purisassa dussīlyacittaṃ passi. Yasmā pana citte diṭṭhe taṃsamaṅgīpuggalo
tika-vin02t:2033_2: diṭṭho nāma hoti, tasmā “addasā kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno taṃ puggalaṃ dussīla”nti
tika-vin02t:2033_3: vuttaṃ. Yatheva hi anāgate sattasu divasesu pavattaṃ paresaṃ cittaṃ cetopariyañāṇalābhī
tika-vin02t:2033_4: pajānāti, evaṃ atītepīti. Dussīlanti nissīlaṃ, sīlavirahitanti attho. Pāpadhammanti
tika-vin02t:2033_5: dussīlattā eva hīnajjhāsayatāya lāmakasabhāvaṃ. Asucinti aparisuddhehi kāyakammādīhi
tika-vin02t:2033_6: samannāgatattā na suciṃ. Saṅkassarasamācāranti kiñcideva asāruppaṃ disvā “idaṃ iminā
tika-vin02t:2033_7: kataṃ bhavissatī”ti evaṃ paresaṃ āsaṅkanīyatāya saṅkāya saritabbasamācāraṃ. Atha
tika-vin02t:2033_8: vā kenacideva karaṇīyena mantayante bhikkhū disvā “kacci nu kho ime mayā katakammaṃ
tika-vin02t:2033_9: jānitvā mantentī”ti attanoyeva saṅkāya saritabbasamācāraṃ. Lajjitabbatāya paṭicchādetabbassa
tika-vin02t:2033_10: karaṇato paṭicchannaṃ kammantaṃ etassāti paṭicchannakammantaṃ. Kucchitasamaṇavesadhāritāya
tika-vin02t:2033_11: na samaṇanti assamaṇaṃ. Salākaggahaṇādīsu “kittakā samaṇā”ti gaṇanāya “ahampi samaṇomhī”ti
tika-vin02t:2033_12: micchāpaṭiññāya samaṇapaṭiññaṃ. Aseṭṭhacāritāya abrahmacāriṃ. Aññe brahmacārino sunivatthe
tika-vin02t:2033_13: supārute kusumbhakapaṭadhare gāmanigamādīsu piṇḍāya caritvā jīvikaṃ kappente disvā
tika-vin02t:2033_14: abrahmacārī samāno sayampi tādisena ākārena paṭipajjanto uposathādīsu ca sandissanto
tika-vin02t:2033_15: “ahampi brahmacārī”ti paṭiññaṃ dento viya hotīti brahmacāripaṭiññaṃ. Pūtinā kammena
tika-vin02t:2033_16: sīlavipattiyā anto anupaviṭṭhattā antopūtiṃ. Chahi dvārehi rāgādikilesāvassavena
tika-vin02t:2033_17: tintattā avassutaṃ. Sañjātarāgādikacavarattā sīlavantehi chaḍḍetabbattā ca kasambujātaṃ.
tika-vin02t:2033_18: Majjhe bhikkhusaṅghassa nisinnanti saṅghapariyāpanno viya bhikkhusaṅghassa anto nisinnaṃ.
tika-vin02t:2034_0: Diṭṭhosīti “ayaṃ na pakatatto”ti bhagavatā diṭṭho asi. Yasmā ca evaṃ diṭṭho, tasmā
tika-vin02t:2034_1: natthi te tava bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ ekakammādisaṃvāso. Yasmā pana so saṃvāso tava natthi,
tika-vin02t:2034_2: tasmā uṭṭhehi āvusoti evamettha padayojanā veditabbā. Tatiyampi kho so puggalo tuṇhī
tika-vin02t:2034_3: ahosīti anekavāraṃ vatvāpi “thero sayameva nibbinno oramissati, idāni imesaṃ paṭipattiṃ
tika-vin02t:2034_4: jānissāmī”ti vā adhippāyena tuṇhī ahosi. Bāhāyaṃ gahetvāti “bhagavatā mayā ca yāthāvato
tika-vin02t:2034_5: diṭṭho, yāvatatiyaṃ ‘uṭṭhehī’ti ca vutto na uṭṭhāti, idānissa nikkaḍḍhanakālo, mā
tika-vin02t:2034_6: saṅghassa uposathantarāyo ahosī”ti bāhāyaṃ aggahesi. Bahi dvārakoṭṭhakā nikkhāmetvāti
tika-vin02t:2034_7: dvārakoṭṭhakā dvārasālato nikkhāmetvā, bahīti pana nikkhāmitaṭṭhānadassanaṃ. Atha
tika-vin02t:2034_8: vā bahidvārakoṭṭhakāti bahidvārakoṭṭhakatopi nikkhāmetvā, na antodvārakoṭṭhakato
tika-vin02t:2034_9: eva. Ubhayathāpi vihārato bahikatvāti attho. Sūcighaṭikaṃ datvāti aggaḷasūciñca uparighaṭikañca
tika-vin02t:2034_10: ādahitvā, suṭṭhu kavāṭaṃ thaketvāti attho. Yāva bāhāgahaṇāpi nāmāti “aparisuddhā,
tika-vin02t:2034_11: ānanda, parisā”ti vacanaṃ sutvā eva hi tena pakkamitabbaṃ siyā, evaṃ apakkamitvā
tika-vin02t:2034_12: yāva bāhāgahaṇāpi nāma so moghapuriso āgamissati, acchariyamidanti dasseti. Idañca
tika-vin02t:2036_0: 384. Aṭṭhime, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddeti ko anusandhi? Yvāyaṃ aparisuddhāya parisāya
tika-vin02t:2036_1: pātimokkhassa anuddeso, so imasmiṃ dhammavinaye acchariyo abbhuto dhammoti taṃ aparehi
tika-vin02t:2036_2: sattahi acchariyaabbhutadhammehi saddhiṃ vibhajitvā dassetukāmo paṭhamaṃ tāva tesaṃ
tika-vin02t:2036_3: upamābhāvena mahāsamudde acchariyaabbhutadhamme dassento satthā “aṭṭhime, bhikkhave,
tika-vin02t:2036_4: mahāsamudde”tiādimāha. Asurāti devā viya na suranti na īsanti na virocantīti asurā.
tika-vin02t:2036_5: Surā nāma devā, tesaṃ paṭipakkhāti vā asurā, vepacittipahārādādayo. Tesaṃ bhavanaṃ
tika-vin02t:2036_6: sinerussa heṭṭhābhāge, te tattha pavisantā nikkhamantā sinerupāde maṇḍapādīni nimminitvā
tika-vin02t:2036_7: kīḷantāva abhiramanti. Sā tattha tesaṃ abhirati ime guṇe disvāti āha “ye disvā disvā
tika-vin02t:2036_8: asurā mahāsamudde abhiramantī”ti. Tattha abhiramantīti ratiṃ vindanti, anukkaṇṭhamānā vasantīti attho.
tika-vin02t:2037_0: Anupubbaninnotiādīni sabbāni anupaṭipāṭiyā ninnabhāvasseva vevacanāni. Na āyatakeneva
tika-vin02t:2037_1: papātoti nacchinnataṭamahāsobbho viya ādito eva papāto. So hi tīradesato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin02t:2037_3: gambhīro hutvā gacchanto gacchanto sinerupādamūle caturāsītiyojanasahassagambhīro
tika-vin02t:2038_0: Ṭhitadhammoti ṭhitasabhāvo avaṭṭhitasabhāvo. Kuṇapenāti yena kenaci hatthiassādikaḷevarena.
tika-vin02t:2038_1: Vāhetīti hatthena gahetvā viya vīcippahāreneva thale khipati. Gaṅgā yamunāti anotattadahassa
tika-vin02t:2038_2: dakkhiṇamukhato nikkhantanadī pañcadhārā hutvā pavattaṭṭhāne gaṅgātiādinā pañcadhā
tika-vin02t:2038_3: saṅkhaṃ gatā. Tattha nadī ninnagātiādikaṃ gottaṃ, gaṅgā yamunātiādikaṃ nāmaṃ. Savantiyoti
tika-vin02t:2038_4: yā kāci savamānā sandamānā gacchantiyo mahānadiyo vā kunnadiyo vā. Appentīti allīyanti
tika-vin02t:2038_5: osaranti. Dhārāti vuṭṭhidhārā. Pūrattanti puṇṇabhāvo. Mahāsamuddassa hi ayaṃ dhammatā
tika-vin02t:2038_6: – “imasmiṃ kāle devo mando jāto, jālakkhipādīni ādāya macchakacchape gaṇhissāmī”ti
tika-vin02t:2038_7: vā “imasmiṃ kāle atimahantā vuṭṭhi, labhissāma nu kho piṭṭhipasāraṇaṭṭhāna”nti vā
tika-vin02t:2038_8: na sakkā vattuṃ. Paṭhamakappikakālato paṭṭhāya hi tīraṃ bhassitvā sinerumekhalaṃ
tika-vin02t:2038_9: āhacca udakaṃ ṭhitaṃ, tato ekaṅgulamattampi udakaṃ neva heṭṭhā otarati, na uddhaṃ
tika-vin02t:2039_1: anekavidho maṇi. Veḷuriyoti vaṃsavaṇṇasirīsapupphavaṇṇādisaṇṭhānato anekavidho. Saṅkhoti
tika-vin02t:2039_4: padumarāgādibhedo anekavidho. Masāragallaṃ kabaramaṇi. Cittaphalikantipi vadanti.
tika-vin02t:2039_5: Mahataṃ bhūtānanti mahantānaṃ sattānaṃ. Timi timiṅgalo timitimiṅgaloti tisso macchajātiyo.
tika-vin02t:2039_6: Timiṃ gilanasamattho timiṅgalo, timiñca timiṅgalañca gilanasamattho timitimiṅgaloti
tika-vin02t:2041_0: 385. Evameva khoti kiñcāpi satthā imasmiṃ dhammavinaye soḷasapi bāttiṃsapi tato bhiyyopi
tika-vin02t:2041_1: acchariyabbhutadhamme vibhajitvā dassetuṃ sakkoti, upamābhāvena pana gahitānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ
tika-vin02t:2041_2: anurūpavasena aṭṭheva te upametabbadhamme vibhajitvā dassanto “evameva kho, bhikkhave,
tika-vin02t:2041_3: imasmiṃ dhammavinaye aṭṭha acchariyā abbhutā dhammā”ti āha. Tattha anupubbasikkhāya
tika-vin02t:2041_4: tisso sikkhā gahitā, anupubbakiriyāya terasa dhutadhammā, anupubbapaṭipadāya satta
tika-vin02t:2041_5: anupassanā aṭṭhārasa mahāvipassanā aṭṭhatiṃsa ārammaṇavibhattiyo sattatiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhammā
tika-vin02t:2041_6: ca gahitā. Na āyatakeneva aññāpaṭivedhoti maṇḍūkassa uppatitvā gamanaṃ viya āditova
tika-vin02t:2041_7: sīlapūraṇādīni akatvā arahattapaṭivedho nāma natthi, paṭipāṭiyā pana sīlasamādhipaññāyo
tika-vin02t:2042_0: Mama sāvakāti sotāpannādike ariyapuggale sandhāya vadati. Na saṃvasatīti uposathakammādivasena
tika-vin02t:2042_1: saṃvāsaṃ na karoti. Ukkhipatīti apaneti. Ārakāvāti dūre eva. Tathāgatappavediteti
tika-vin02t:2042_2: tathāgatena bhagavatā sāvakesu desite akkhāte pakāsite. Na tena nibbānadhātuyā ūnattaṃ
tika-vin02t:2042_3: vā pūrattaṃ vāti asaṅkhyeyyepi mahākappe buddhesu anuppajjantesu ekasattopi parinibbātuṃ
tika-vin02t:2042_4: na sakkoti, tadāpi “tucchā nibbānadhātū”ti na sakkā vattuṃ, buddhakāle pana ekekasmiṃ
tika-vin02t:2042_5: samāgame asaṅkhyeyyāpi sattā amataṃ ārādhenti, tadāpi na sakkā vattuṃ “pūrā nibbānadhātū”ti.
tika-vin02t:2042_6: Vimuttirasoti kilesehi vimuccanaraso. Sabbā hi sāsanasampatti yāvadeva anupādāya
tika-vin02t:2043: Ratanānīti ratijananaṭṭhena ratanāni. Satipaṭṭhānādayo hi bhāviyamānā pubbabhāgepi anekavidhaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ nibbattenti, pageva aparabhāge. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-vin02t:2046: Lokiyaratananimittaṃ pana pītipāmojjaṃ na tassa kalabhāgampi agghati. Apica –
tika-vin02t:2049_0: Yadi ca cittīkatādibhāvena ratanaṃ nāma hoti, satipaṭṭhānādīnaññeva bhūto ratanabhāvo.
tika-vin02t:2049_1: Bodhipakkhiyadhammānañhi so ānubhāvo, yaṃ sāvakā sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ, paccekasambuddhā
tika-vin02t:2049_2: paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ, sammāsambuddhā sammāsambodhiṃ adhigacchanti āsannakāraṇattā. Paramparakāraṇañhi
tika-vin02t:2049_3: dānādiupanissayoti evaṃ ratijananaṭṭhena cittīkatādiatthena ca ratanabhāvo bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ
tika-vin02t:2049_4: sātisayo. Tena vuttaṃ “tatrimāni ratanāni, seyyathidaṃ – cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”tiādi.
tika-vin02t:2050_0: Ārammaṇe okkanditvā upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena paṭṭhānaṃ, satiyeva paṭṭhānaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin02t:2050_1: Ārammaṇassa pana kāyādivasena catubbidhattā vuttaṃ “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”ti. Tathā
tika-vin02t:2051_0: Sammā padahanti etena, sayaṃ vā sammā padahati, pasatthaṃ sundaraṃ vā padahananti
tika-vin02t:2051_1: sammappadhānaṃ, puggalassa vā sammadeva padhānabhāvakaraṇato sammappadhānaṃ, vīriyassetaṃ
tika-vin02t:2051_2: adhivacanaṃ. Tampi anuppannuppannānaṃ akusalānaṃ anuppādanapahānavasena anuppannuppannānaṃ
tika-vin02t:2051_3: kusalānaṃ uppādanaṭhāpanavasena ca catukiccasādhakattā vuttaṃ “cattāro sammappadhānā”ti.
tika-vin02t:2052_0: Ijjhatīti iddhi, samijjhati nipphajjatīti attho. Ijjhanti tāya vā sattā iddhā vuddhā
tika-vin02t:2052_1: ukkaṃsagatā hontīti iddhi. Paṭhamena atthena iddhi eva pādo iddhipādo, iddhikoṭṭhāsoti
tika-vin02t:2052_2: attho. Dutiyena atthena iddhiyā pādo patiṭṭhā adhigamupāyoti iddhipādo. Tena hi uparūparivisesasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin02t:2052_3: iddhiṃ pajjanti pāpuṇanti. Svāyaṃ iddhipādo yasmā chandādike cattāro adhipatidhamme
tika-vin02t:2052_4: dhure jeṭṭhake katvā nibbattīyati, tasmā vuttaṃ “cattāro iddhipādo”ti.
tika-vin02t:2053_0: Pañcindriyānīti saddhādīni pañca indriyāni. Tattha assaddhiyaṃ abhibhavitvā adhimokkhalakkhaṇe
tika-vin02t:2053_1: indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti saddhā indriyaṃ. Kosajjaṃ abhibhavitvā paggahalakkhaṇe, pamādaṃ
tika-vin02t:2053_2: abhibhavitvā upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇe, vikkhepaṃ abhibhavitvā avikkhepalakkhaṇe, aññāṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:2053_3: abhibhavitvā dassanalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti paññā indriyaṃ.
tika-vin02t:2054: Tāniyeva assaddhiyādīhi anabhibhavanīyato akampiyaṭṭhena sampayuttadhammesu thirabhāvena ca balāni veditabbāni.
tika-vin02t:2055_0: Satta bojjhaṅgāti bodhiyā, bodhissa vā aṅgāti bojjhaṅgā. Yā hi esā dhammasāmaggī,
tika-vin02t:2055_3: dhammasāmaggiyā ariyasāvako bujjhati kilesaniddāya uṭṭhahati, cattāri vā ariyasaccāni
tika-vin02t:2055_4: paṭivijjhati, nibbānameva vā sacchikarotīti “bodhī”ti vuccati, tassā dhammasāmaggisaṅkhātāya
tika-vin02t:2055_5: bodhiyā aṅgāti bojjhaṅgā jhānaṅgamaggaṅgādayo viya. Yopesa vuttappakārāya dhammasāmaggiyā
tika-vin02t:2055_6: bujjhatīti katvā ariyasāvako “bodhī”ti vuccati, tassa bodhissa vā aṅgātipi bojjhaṅgā
tika-vin02t:2055_7: senaṅgarathaṅgādayo viya. Tenāhu porāṇā “bujjhanakassa puggalassa aṅgāti bojjhaṅgā”ti,
tika-vin02t:2056_0: Ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggoti taṃtaṃmaggavajjhehi kilesehi ārakattā ariyabhāvakarattā
tika-vin02t:2056_1: ariyaphalapaṭilābhakarattā ca ariyo. Sammādiṭṭhiādīni aṭṭhaṅgāni assa atthi, aṭṭhaṅgāniyeva
tika-vin02t:2056_2: vā aṭṭhaṅgiko. Mārento kilese gacchati, nibbānatthikehi vā maggīyati, sayaṃ vā nibbānaṃ
tika-vin02t:2056_3: maggatīti maggoti evametesaṃ satipaṭṭhānādīnaṃ atthavibhāgo veditabbo.
tika-vin02t:2057_0: Sotāpannoti maggasaṅkhātaṃ sotaṃ āpajjitvā pāpuṇitvā ṭhito, sotāpattiphalaṭṭhoti
tika-vin02t:2057_2: paṭipajjamāno paṭhamamaggaṭṭho, yo aṭṭhamakotipi vuccati. Sakadāgāmīti sakideva imaṃ
tika-vin02t:2057_3: lokaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena āgamanasīlo dutiyaphalaṭṭho. Anāgāmīti paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena
tika-vin02t:2057_4: kāmalokaṃ anāgamanasīlo tatiyaphalaṭṭho. Yo pana saddhānusārī dhammānusārī ekabījīti
tika-vin02t:2057_5: evamādiko ariyapuggalavibhāgo, so tesaṃyeva bhedoti. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
tika-vin02t:2058_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ attano dhammavinaye matakuṇapasadisena dussīlapuggalena
tika-vin02t:2058_1: saddhiṃ saṃvāsābhāvasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ viditvā. Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ asaṃvāsārahasaṃvāsārahabhāvānaṃ
tika-vin02t:2059: Tattha channamativassatīti āpattiṃ āpajjitvā paṭicchādento aññaṃ navaṃ āpattiṃ
tika-vin02t:2060_0: Āpajjati, tato aparanti evaṃ āpattivassaṃ kilesavassaṃ ativiya vassati. Vivaṭaṃ nātivassatīti
tika-vin02t:2060_1: āpattiṃ āpanno taṃ appaṭicchādetvā vivaranto sabrahmacārīnaṃ pakāsento yathādhammaṃ
tika-vin02t:2060_2: yathāvinayaṃ paṭikaronto desento vuṭṭhahanto aññaṃ navaṃ āpattiṃ nāpajjati, tenassa
tika-vin02t:2060_3: taṃ vivaṭaṃ puna āpattivassaṃ kilesavassaṃ na vassati. Yasmā ca etadeva, tasmā channaṃ
tika-vin02t:2060_4: chāditaṃ āpattiṃ vivaretha. Evaṃ taṃ nātivassatīti evaṃ sante taṃ āpattiṃ āpajjanapuggalānaṃ
tika-vin02t:2060_5: attabhāvaṃ ativijjhitvā kilesavassanena na vassati na temeti, evaṃ so kilesehi anavassuto
tika-vin02t:2060_6: parisuddhasīlo samāhito hutvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā sammasanto anukkamena nibbānaṃ
tika-vin02t:2063_0: 386. Atha bhagavā cintesi “idāni bhikkhusaṅghe abbudo jāto, aparisuddhā puggalā uposathaṃ
tika-vin02t:2063_1: āgacchanti, na ca tathāgato aparisuddhāya parisāya uposathaṃ uddisati, anuddisante
tika-vin02t:2063_2: ca bhikkhusaṅghassa uposatho pacchijjati, yannūnāhaṃ ito paṭṭhāya bhikkhūnaññeva
tika-vin02t:2063_3: pātimokkhuddesaṃ anujāneyya”nti, evaṃ pana cintetvā bhikkhūnaññeva pātimokkhuddesaṃ
tika-vin02t:2063_4: anujāni. Tena vuttaṃ “atha kho bhagavā…pe… pātimokkhaṃ uddiseyyāthā”ti. Tattha nadānāhanti
tika-vin02t:2063_5: na idāni ahaṃ. Uposathaṃ na karissāmi, pātimokkhaṃ na uddisissāmīti paccekaṃ na-kārena
tika-vin02t:2063_6: sambandho. Duvidhaṃ pātimokkhaṃ āṇāpātimokkhaṃ ovādapātimokkhanti. Tesu “suṇātu me
tika-vin02t:2063_7: bhante”tiādikaṃ āṇāpātimokkhaṃ, taṃ sāvakāva uddisanti, na buddhā, yaṃ anvaddhamāsaṃ
tika-vin02t:2063_8: uddisīyati. “Khantī paramaṃ…pe… sabbapāpassa akaraṇaṃ…pe… anupavādo anupaghāto…pe…
tika-vin02t:2063_9: etaṃ buddhāna sāsana”nti imā pana tisso gāthā ovādapātimokkhaṃ nāma, taṃ buddhāva
tika-vin02t:2063_10: uddisanti, na sāvakā. Channampi vassānaṃ accayena uddisanti. Dīghāyukabuddhānañhi
tika-vin02t:2063_11: dharamānakāle ayameva pātimokkhuddeso, appāyukabuddhānaṃ pana paṭhamabodhiyaṃyeva,
tika-vin02t:2063_12: tato paraṃ itaro, tañca kho bhikkhū eva uddisanti, na buddhā. Tasmā amhākampi bhagavā
tika-vin02t:2063_13: vīsativassamattaṃ imaṃ ovādapātimokkhaṃ uddisitvā imaṃ antarāyaṃ disvā tato paraṃ na uddisi.
tika-vin02t:2064_0: Aṭṭhānanti akāraṇaṃ. Anavakāsoti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Kāraṇañhi tiṭṭhati ettha phalaṃ
tika-vin02t:2064_1: tadāyattavuttitāyāti “ṭhāna”nti vuccati, evaṃ “avakāso”tipi vuccati. Yanti kiriyāparāmasanaṃ.
tika-vin02t:2064_2: Na ca, bhikkhave, sāpattikena pātimokkhaṃ sotabbantiādi padatthato suviññeyyaṃ. Vinicchayato
tika-vin02t:2064_3: panettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ aṭṭhakathāya vuttameva. Tattha pure vā pacchā vāti ñattito pubbe vā pacchā vā.
tika-vin02t:2066: 387. Katañca akatañca ubhayaṃ gahetvāti yassa ekantena katāpi atthi, akatāpi atthi, tassa tadubhayaṃ gahetvā.
tika-vin02t:2068: 389. Parisā vuṭṭhātīti yasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ pātimokkhaṃ ṭhapitaṃ, taṃ vatthuṃ avinicchinitvā kenaci antarāyena vuṭṭhāti.
tika-vin02t:2069: 393. Paccādiyatīti pati ādiyati, “akataṃ kamma”ntiādinā puna ārabhatīti attho.
tika-vin02t:2071: 398. Paraṃ codetuṃ attanā ādātabbaṃ gahetabbaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ attādānaṃ. Tenāha “sāsanaṃ sodhetukāmo”tiādi. Vassārattoti vassakālo.
tika-vin02t:2073: 399. Paṭimāsitunti parāmasituṃ. Palibodhe chinditvā…pe… adhigataṃ mettacittanti iminā appanāppattaṃ mettābhāvanaṃ dasseti. Tenevāha “vikkhambhanavasena vihatāghāta”nti.
tika-vin02t:2075: 400. No dosantaroti ettha cittapariyāyo antara-saddoti āha “na duṭṭhacitto hutvā”ti.
tika-vin02t:2077: 401. Karuṇanti appanāppattaṃ karuṇajjhānaṃ. Karuṇāpubbabhāganti parikammupacāravasappavattaṃ karuṇaṃ. Mettañca mettāpubbabhāgañcāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Sesamettha suviññeyyamevāti.
tika-vin02t:2081_0: 402. Bhikkhunikkhandhake sakkesu viharatīti paṭhamagamanena gantvā viharati. Mahāpajāpati
tika-vin02t:2081_1: gotamīti ettha gotamīti gottaṃ. Nāmakaraṇadivase panassā laddhasakkārā brāhmaṇā lakkhaṇasampattiṃ
tika-vin02t:2081_2: disvā “sace ayaṃ dhītaraṃ labhissati, cakkavattirañño mahesī bhavissati. Sace puttaṃ
tika-vin02t:2081_3: labhissati, cakkavattirājā bhavissatīti ubhayathāpi mahatīyevassā pajā bhavissatī”ti
tika-vin02t:2081_4: byākariṃsu, tasmā puttapajāya ceva dhītupajāya ca mahantatāya “mahāpajāpatī”ti nāmaṃ
tika-vin02t:2081_5: akaṃsu, idha pana gottena saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā “mahāpajāpati gotamī”ti vuttaṃ. Yena
tika-vin02t:2081_6: bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti bhagavā kapilapuraṃ gantvā paṭhamameva nandaṃ pabbājesi,
tika-vin02t:2081_7: sattame divase rāhulakumāraṃ. Cumbaṭakakalahe pana ubhayanagaravāsikesu yuddhatthāya
tika-vin02t:2081_8: nikkhantesu satthā gantvā te rājāno saññāpetvā attadaṇḍasuttaṃ kathesi. Rājāno pasīditvā
tika-vin02t:2081_9: aḍḍhateyyasate aḍḍhateyyasate dārake adaṃsu. Tāni pañca kumārasatāni satthu santike
tika-vin02t:2081_10: pabbajiṃsu. Atha nesaṃ pajāpatiyo sāsanaṃ pesetvā anabhiratiṃ uppādayiṃsu. Satthā
tika-vin02t:2081_11: tesaṃ anabhiratiyā uppannabhāvaṃ ñatvā te pañcasate daharabhikkhū kuṇāladahaṃ netvā
tika-vin02t:2081_12: attano kuṇālakāle nisinnapubbe pāsāṇatale nisīditvā kuṇālajātakakathāya tesaṃ anabhiratiṃ
tika-vin02t:2081_13: vinodetvā sabbepi te sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpesi, puna mahāvanaṃ ānetvā arahattaphale.
tika-vin02t:2081_14: Tesaṃ cittajānanatthaṃ punapi pajāpatiyo sāsanaṃ pahiṇiṃsu. Te “abhabbā mayaṃ gharāvāsassā”ti
tika-vin02t:2081_15: paṭisāsanaṃ pahiṇiṃsu. Tā “na dāni amhākaṃ paragharaṃ gantuṃ yuttaṃ, mahāpajāpatiyā
tika-vin02t:2081_16: santikaṃ gantvā pabbajjaṃ anujānāpetvā pabbajissāmā”ti pañcasatāpi mahāpajāpatiṃ
tika-vin02t:2081_17: upasaṅkamitvā “ayye, amhākaṃ pabbajjaṃ anujānāpethā”ti āhaṃsu. Mahāpajāpati ca tā
tika-vin02t:2081_18: itthiyo gahetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, setacchattassa heṭṭhā rañño parinibbutakāle
tika-vin02t:2081_19: upasaṅkamītipi vadantiyeva. Pakkāmīti puna kapilapurameva pāvisi.
tika-vin02t:2082_0: Yathābhirantaṃ viharitvāti bodhaneyyasattānaṃ upanissayaṃ olokento yathājjhāsayena
tika-vin02t:2082_1: viharitvā. Cārikaṃ pakkāmīti mahājanasaṅgahaṃ karonto uttamāya buddhasiriyā anopamena
tika-vin02t:2082_2: buddhavilāsena aturitacārikaṃ pakkāmi. Sambahulāhi sākiyānīhi saddhinti antonivesanasmiṃyeva
tika-vin02t:2082_3: dasabalaṃ uddissa pabbajjāvesaṃ gahetvā tāpi pañcasatā sākiyāniyo pabbajjāvesaṃyeva
tika-vin02t:2082_4: gāhāpetvā sabbāhipi tāhi sambahulāhi sākiyānīhi saddhiṃ. Pakkāmīti gamanaṃ abhinīhari.
tika-vin02t:2082_5: Gamanābhinīharaṇakāle panassā “sukumārā rājitthiyo padasā gantuṃ na sakkhissantī”ti
tika-vin02t:2082_6: sākiyakoliyarājāno suvaṇṇasivikāyo upaṭṭhāpayiṃsu, tā pana “yāne āruyha gacchantīhi
tika-vin02t:2082_7: satthari agāravo kato hotī”ti ekapaṇṇāsayojanikaṃ maggaṃ padasāva paṭipajjiṃsu. Rājānopi
tika-vin02t:2082_8: purato ca pacchato ca ārakkhaṃ saṃvidahāpetvā taṇḍulasappitelādīnaṃ sakaṭāni pūretvā
tika-vin02t:2082_9: “gatagataṭṭhāne āhāraṃ paṭiyādethā”ti purise pesayiṃsu. Sūnehi pādehīti tāsañhi sukhumālattā
tika-vin02t:2082_10: pādesu eko phoṭo uṭṭheti, eko bhijjati, ubho pādā kaṭakaṭṭhisamparikiṇṇā viya hutvā
tika-vin02t:2082_11: uddhumātā. Tena vuttaṃ “sūnehi pādehī”ti. Bahidvārakoṭṭhaketi dvārakoṭṭhakassa bahi.
tika-vin02t:2082_12: Kasmā panevaṃ ṭhitāti? Evaṃ kirassā ahosi “ahaṃ tathāgatena anuññātā sayameva pabbajjāvesaṃ
tika-vin02t:2082_13: aggahesiṃ, evaṃ gahitabhāvo ca pana me sakalajambudīpe pākaṭo jāto, sace satthā pabbajjaṃ
tika-vin02t:2082_14: anujānissati, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. Sace nānujānissati, mahatī garahā bhavissatī”ti vihāraṃ
tika-vin02t:2082_15: pavisituṃ asakkontī rodamānā aṭṭhāsi. Kiṃ nu tvaṃ gotamīti kiṃ nu rājakulānaṃ vipatti
tika-vin02t:2082_16: uppannā, kena nu tvaṃ kāraṇena evaṃ vivaṇṇabhāvaṃ pattā sūnehi pādehi…pe… ṭhitāti.
tika-vin02t:2083_0: Aññenapi pariyāyenāti aññenapi kāraṇena. Āpādikāti saṃvaḍḍhikā, tumhākaṃ hatthapādesu
tika-vin02t:2083_1: hatthapādakiccaṃ asādhentesu hatthe ca pāde ca vaḍḍhetvā paṭijaggikāti attho. Posikāti
tika-vin02t:2083_2: divasassa dve tayo vāre nahāpetvā bhojetvā pāyetvā tumhe posesi. Thaññaṃ pāyesīti
tika-vin02t:2083_3: nandakumāro kira bodhisattato katipāheneva daharataro. Tasmiṃ jāte mahāpajāpati attano
tika-vin02t:2083_4: puttaṃ dhātīnaṃ datvā sayaṃ bodhisattassa dhātikiccaṃ sādhayamānā attano thaññaṃ
tika-vin02t:2083_5: pāyesi. Taṃ sandhāya thero evamāha. Sādhu bhanteti “bahukārā”tiādīhi tassā guṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:2086_0: 403. Satthāpi “itthiyo nāma parittasaddhā, ekāyācitamatteyeva pabbajjāya anuññātāya
tika-vin02t:2086_1: na mama sāsanaṃ garuṃ katvā gaṇhissantī”ti tikkhattuṃ paṭikkhipitvā idāni garuṃ katvā
tika-vin02t:2086_2: gāhāpetukāmatāya “sace, ānanda, mahāpajāpati gotamī aṭṭha garudhamme paṭiggaṇhāti,
tika-vin02t:2086_3: sāvassā hotu upasampadā”tiādimāha. Tattha sāvassāti sā eva assā pabbajjāpi upasampadāpi hotu.
tika-vin02t:2087_0: Tadahupasampannassāti taṃ divasampi upasampannassa. Abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ
tika-vin02t:2087_1: sāmīcikammaṃ kātabbanti mānātimānaṃ akatvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena abhivādanaṃ, āsanā uṭṭhāya
tika-vin02t:2087_2: paccuggamanavasena paccuṭṭhānaṃ, dasanakhe samodhānetvā añjalikammaṃ, āsanapaññāpanabījanādikaṃ
tika-vin02t:2087_3: anucchavikakammasaṅkhātaṃ sāmīcikammañca kattabbaṃ. Abhikkhuke āvāseti yattha vasantiyā
tika-vin02t:2087_4: anantarāyena ovādatthāya upasaṅkamanārahe ṭhāne ovādadāyako ācariyo natthi, ayaṃ
tika-vin02t:2087_5: abhikkhuko āvāso nāma, evarūpe āvāse vassaṃ na upagantabbaṃ. Anvaddhamāsanti anuposathikaṃ.
tika-vin02t:2087_6: Ovādūpasaṅkamananti ovādatthāya upasaṅkamanaṃ. Diṭṭhenāti cakkhunā diṭṭhena. Sutenāti
tika-vin02t:2087_7: sotena sutena. Parisaṅkāyāti diṭṭhasutavasena parisaṅkitena. Garudhammanti garukaṃ
tika-vin02t:2087_8: saṅghādisesāpattiṃ. Pakkhamānattanti anūnāni pannarasa divasāni mānattaṃ. Chasu dhammesūti
tika-vin02t:2087_9: vikālabhojanacchaṭṭhesu sikkhāpadesu. Sikkhitasikkhāyāti ekasikkhampi akhaṇḍaṃ katvā pūritasikkhāya.
tika-vin02t:2088_0: Na akkositabbo na paribhāsitabboti dasannaṃ akkosavatthūnaṃ aññatarena akkosavatthunā
tika-vin02t:2088_1: na akkositabbo, bhayupadaṃsanāya kāyaci paribhāsāya na paribhāsitabbo. Ovaṭo bhikkhunīnaṃ
tika-vin02t:2088_3: bhikkhūsu ovaṭo pihito, na bhikkhuniyā koci bhikkhu ovaditabbo vā anusāsitabbo vā,
tika-vin02t:2088_4: “bhante porāṇakattherā idañcidañca vattaṃ pūrayiṃsū”ti evaṃ pana paveṇivasena kathetuṃ
tika-vin02t:2088_5: vaṭṭati. Anovaṭo bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīsūti bhikkhūnaṃ pana bhikkhunīsu vacanapatho
tika-vin02t:2088_6: anivārito, yathāruciyā ovadantu anusāsantu dhammakathaṃ kathentūti ayamettha saṅkhepo,
tika-vin02t:2088_7: vitthārato panesā garudhammakathā mahāvibhaṅge vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
tika-vin02t:2089_0: Ime pana aṭṭha garudhamme satthu santike uggahetvā therena attano ārociyamāne sutvā
tika-vin02t:2089_1: mahāpajāpatiyā tāvamahantaṃ domanassaṃ khaṇena paṭippassambhi. Anotattadahato āhaṭena
tika-vin02t:2089_2: sītudakassa ghaṭasatena matthake parisittā viya vigatapariḷāhā attamanā hutvā garudhammapaṭiggahaṇena
tika-vin02t:2089_3: uppannapītipāmojjaṃ āvi karontī “seyyathāpi, bhante”tiādikaṃ udānaṃ udānesi. Tattha
tika-vin02t:2089_4: daharoti taruṇo. Yuvāti yobbaññabhāve ṭhito. Maṇḍanakajātikoti alaṅkārasabhāvo. Tattha
tika-vin02t:2089_5: koci taruṇopi yuvā na hoti yathā atitaruṇo. Koci yuvāpi maṇḍanakajātiko na hoti yathā
tika-vin02t:2089_6: upasantasabhāvo ālasiyabyasanādīhi vā abhibhūto, idha pana daharo ceva yuvā ca maṇḍanakajātiko
tika-vin02t:2089_7: ca adhippeto, tasmā evamāha. Uppalādīni lokasammatattā vuttāni. Ito paraṃ yaṃ yaṃ
tika-vin02t:2090_0: Tattha mātugāmassa pabbajitattāti idaṃ pañcavassasatato uddhaṃ aṭṭhatvā pañcasuyeva
tika-vin02t:2090_2: vuttanti ettha “paṭisambhidāpattakhīṇāsavaggahaṇena jhānānipi gahitāneva honti. Na
tika-vin02t:2090_3: hi nijjhānakānaṃ sabbappakārasampatti ijjhatī”ti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavavasena
tika-vin02t:2090_4: vassasahassantiādinā ca yaṃ vuttaṃ. Taṃ khandhakabhāṇakānaṃ matena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin02t:2091: “Paṭisambhidāpattehi vassasahassaṃ aṭṭhāsi, chaḷabhiññehi vassasahassaṃ, tevijjehi vassasahassaṃ, sukkhavipassakehi vassasahassaṃ, pātimokkhena vassasahassaṃ aṭṭhāsī”ti.
tika-vin02t:2093_0: “Buddhānañhi parinibbānato vassasahassameva paṭisambhidā nibbattetuṃ sakkonti, tato
tika-vin02t:2093_1: paraṃ cha abhiññā, tato tāpi nibbattetuṃ asakkontā tisso vijjā nibbattenti, gacchante
tika-vin02t:2093_2: gacchante kāle tāpi nibbattetuṃ asakkontā sukkhavipassakā honti. Eteneva upāyena
tika-vin02t:2096_0: “Paṭhamabodhiyañhi bhikkhū paṭisambhidāpattā ahesuṃ. Atha kāle gacchante paṭisambhidā
tika-vin02t:2096_1: pāpuṇituṃ na sakkhiṃsu, chaḷabhiññā ahesuṃ, tato cha abhiññā pattuṃ asakkontā tisso
tika-vin02t:2096_2: vijjā pāpuṇiṃsu. Idāni kāle gacchante tisso vijjā pāpuṇituṃ asakkontā āsavakkhayamattaṃ
tika-vin02t:2096_3: pāpuṇissanti, tampi asakkontā anāgāmiphalaṃ, tampi asakkontā sakadāgāmiphalaṃ, tampi
tika-vin02t:2096_4: asakkontā sotāpattiphalaṃ, gacchante kāle sotāpattiphalampi pattuṃ na sakkhissantī”ti –
tika-vin02t:2098_0: Yasmā cetaṃ sabbaṃ aññamaññapaṭiviruddhaṃ, tasmā tesaṃ tesaṃ bhāṇakānaṃ matameva
tika-vin02t:2098_1: ācariyena tattha tattha dassitanti gahetabbaṃ. Aññathā hi ācariyasseva pubbāparavirodhappasaṅgo siyāti.
tika-vin02t:2099_0: Tāniyevāti tāniyeva pañca vassasahassāni. Pariyattimūlakaṃ sāsananti āha “na hi pariyattiyā
tika-vin02t:2099_1: asati paṭivedho atthī”tiādi. Pariyattiyā hi antarahitāya paṭipatti antaradhāyati,
tika-vin02t:2099_2: paṭipattiyā antarahitāya adhigamo antaradhāyati. Kiṃkāraṇā? Ayañhi pariyatti paṭipattiyā
tika-vin02t:2099_3: paccayo hoti, paṭipatti adhigamassa, iti paṭipattitopi pariyattiyeva pamāṇaṃ. Tattha
tika-vin02t:2099_4: paṭivedho ca paṭipatti ca hotipi na hotipi. Ekasmiñhi kāle paṭivedhakarā bhikkhū
tika-vin02t:2099_5: bahū honti, “esa bhikkhu puthujjano”ti aṅguliṃ pasāretvā dassetabbo hoti, imasmiṃyeva
tika-vin02t:2099_6: dīpe ekavāraṃ puthujjanabhikkhu nāma nāhosi. Paṭipattipūrakāpi kadāci bahū honti,
tika-vin02t:2099_7: kadāci appā, iti paṭivedho ca paṭipatti ca hotipi na hotipi. Sāsanaṭṭhitiyā pana
tika-vin02t:2099_8: pariyattiyeva pamāṇaṃ. Paṇḍito hi tepiṭakaṃ sutvā dvepi pūreti. Yathā amhākaṃ bodhisatto
tika-vin02t:2099_9: āḷārassa santike pañcābhiññā satta ca samāpattiyo nibbattetvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyā
tika-vin02t:2099_10: parikammaṃ pucchi, so “na jānāmī”ti āha, tato udakassa santikaṃ gantvā adhigatavisesaṃ
tika-vin02t:2099_11: saṃsanditvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa parikammaṃ pucchi, so ācikkhi, tassa vacanasamanantarameva
tika-vin02t:2099_12: mahāsatto taṃ sampādesi, evameva paññavā bhikkhu pariyattiṃ sutvā dvepi pūreti, tasmā
tika-vin02t:2099_13: pariyattiyā ṭhitāya sāsanaṃ ṭhitaṃ hoti. Yathāpi mahato taḷākassa pāḷiyā thirāya
tika-vin02t:2099_14: udakaṃ na ṭhassatīti na vattabbaṃ, udake sati padumādīni pupphāni na pupphissantīti
tika-vin02t:2099_15: na vattabbaṃ, evameva mahātaḷākassa thirapāḷisadise tepiṭake buddhavacane sati mahātaḷāke
tika-vin02t:2099_16: udakasadisā paṭipattipūrakā kulaputtā natthīti na vattabbaṃ, tesu sati mahātaḷāke
tika-vin02t:2099_17: padumādīni pupphāni viya sotāpannādayo ariyapuggalā natthīti na vattabbaṃ. Evaṃ ekantato
tika-vin02t:2100_0: Pariyattiyā antarahitāyāti ettha pariyattīti tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ sāṭṭhakathā
tika-vin02t:2100_1: pāḷi. Yāva sā tiṭṭhati, tāva pariyatti paripuṇṇā nāma hoti. Gacchante gacchante kāle
tika-vin02t:2100_2: kaliyugarājāno adhammikā honti, tesu adhammikesu tesampi amaccādayo adhammikā honti,
tika-vin02t:2100_3: tato raṭṭhajanapadavāsinoti tesaṃ adhammikatāya na devo sammā vassati, tato sassāni
tika-vin02t:2100_4: na sampajjanti, tesu asampajjantesu paccayadāyakā bhikkhusaṅghassa paccaye dātuṃ
tika-vin02t:2100_5: na sakkonti, bhikkhū paccayehi kilamantā antevāsike saṅgahetuṃ na sakkonti. Gacchante
tika-vin02t:2100_6: gacchante kāle pariyatti parihāyati, atthavasena dhāretuṃ na sakkonti, pāḷivaseneva
tika-vin02t:2100_7: dhārenti. Tato kāle gacchante pāḷimpi sakalaṃ dhāretuṃ na sakkonti, paṭhamaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ
tika-vin02t:2100_8: parihāyati, parihāyamānaṃ matthakato paṭṭhāya parihāyati. Paṭhamameva hi mahāpakaraṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:2100_9: parihāyati, tasmiṃ parihīne yamakaṃ, kathāvatthu, puggalapaññatti, dhātukathā, vibhaṅgo, dhammasaṅgahoti.
tika-vin02t:2101_0: Evaṃ abhidhammapiṭake parihīne matthakato paṭṭhāya suttantapiṭakaṃ parihāyati. Paṭhamañhi
tika-vin02t:2101_1: aṅguttaranikāyo parihāyati, tasmimpi paṭhamaṃ ekādasakanipāto…pe… tato ekakanipātoti.
tika-vin02t:2101_2: Evaṃ aṅguttaranikāye parihīne matthakato paṭṭhāya saṃyuttanikāyo parihāyati. Paṭhamañhi
tika-vin02t:2101_3: mahāvaggo parihāyati, tato saḷāyatanavaggo, khandhakavaggo, nidānavaggo, sagāthāvaggoti.
tika-vin02t:2101_4: Evaṃ saṃyuttanikāye parihīne matthakato paṭṭhāya majjhimanikāyo parihāyati. Paṭhamañhi
tika-vin02t:2101_5: uparipaṇṇāsako parihāyati, tato majjhimapaṇṇāsako, tato mūlapaṇṇāsakoti. Evaṃ majjhimanikāye
tika-vin02t:2101_6: parihīne matthakato paṭṭhāya dīghanikāyo parihāyati. Paṭhamañhi pāthikavaggo parihāyati,
tika-vin02t:2101_7: tato mahāvaggo, tato sīlakkhandhavaggoti. Evaṃ dīghanikāye parihīne suttantapiṭakaṃ
tika-vin02t:2101_8: parihīnaṃ nāma hoti. Vinayapiṭakena saddhiṃ jātakameva dhārenti. Vinayapiṭakañhi
tika-vin02t:2101_9: lajjino dhārenti, lābhakāmā pana “suttante kathitepi sallakkhentā natthī”ti jātakameva
tika-vin02t:2101_10: dhārenti. Gacchante kāle jātakampi dhāretuṃ na sakkonti. Atha nesaṃ paṭhamaṃ vessantarajātakaṃ
tika-vin02t:2101_11: parihāyati, tato paṭilomakkamena puṇṇakajātakaṃ, mahānāradajātakanti pariyosāne apaṇṇakajātakaṃ
tika-vin02t:2102_0: Gacchante kāle tampi matthakato paṭṭhāya parihāyati. Paṭhamañhi parivāro parihāyati,
tika-vin02t:2102_1: tato khandhako, bhikkhunīvibhaṅgo, mahāvibhaṅgoti anukkamena uposathakkhandhakamattameva
tika-vin02t:2102_2: dhārenti. Tadāpi pariyatti anantarahitāva hoti. Yāva pana manussesu catuppadikagāthāpi
tika-vin02t:2102_3: pavattati, tāva pariyatti anantarahitāva hoti. Yadā saddho pasanno rājā hatthikkhandhe
tika-vin02t:2102_4: suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭakamhi sahassatthavikaṃ ṭhapāpetvā “buddhehi kathitaṃ catuppadikaṃ gāthaṃ
tika-vin02t:2102_5: jānanto imaṃ sahassaṃ gaṇhatū”ti nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā gaṇhanakaṃ alabhitvā “ekavāraṃ
tika-vin02t:2102_6: carāpite nāmaṃ suṇantāpi honti asuṇantāpī”ti yāvatatiyaṃ carāpetvā gaṇhanakaṃ alabhitvā
tika-vin02t:2102_7: rājapurisā sahassatthavikaṃ puna rājakulaṃ pavesenti, tadā pariyatti antarahitā nāma hoti.
tika-vin02t:2103_0: Ciraṃ pavattissatīti pariyattiyā antarahitāyapi liṅgamattaṃ addhānaṃ pavattissati.
tika-vin02t:2103_1: Kathaṃ? Gacchante gacchante hi kāle cīvaraggahaṇaṃ pattaggahaṇaṃ samiñjanapasāraṇaṃ
tika-vin02t:2103_2: ālokitavilokitaṃ na pāsādikaṃ hoti, nigaṇṭhasamaṇā viya alābupattaṃ bhikkhū pattaṃ
tika-vin02t:2103_3: aggabāhāya parikkhipitvā ādāya vicaranti, ettāvatāpi liṅgaṃ anantarahitameva hoti.
tika-vin02t:2103_4: Gacchante pana kāle aggabāhato otāretvā hatthena vā sikkāya vā olambetvā vicaranti,
tika-vin02t:2103_5: cīvarampi rajanasāruppaṃ akatvā oṭṭhaṭṭhivaṇṇaṃ katvā rajanti. Gacchante kāle rajanampi
tika-vin02t:2103_6: na hoti, dasacchindanaṃ ovaṭṭikāvijjhanaṃ kappamattañca katvā vaḷañjanti, puna ovaṭṭikaṃ
